
1a1(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig skyes pa'i glu bzhugs/
1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sa hA dza gI ti/ bod skad du/ lhan cig skyes pa'i glu/ bla ma dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
1b2(rgyud 'grel): stong pa'i nags las me tog rab rgyas pa/ /me tog gcig la kha dog sna tshogs te/ /dpe med me tog skyes na phyogs las
1b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal/ /rin thang med pa'i me tog long zhig dang/ /de la rtsa ba med cing yal 'dab med/ /grogs dag ser kha bzang po'i
1b4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs rgyal ltos/ /dpe med me tog skyes na phyogs las rgyal/ /rin thang med pa'i me tog long zhig dang/ /ge sar blangs
2a1(rgyud 'grel): pas sgyu 'phrul mkhan po yin/ /rdo rje dbang phyug chos kyi dbyings la mchod/ /dpe med me tog skyes na phyogs
2a2(rgyud 'grel): las rgyal/ /rin thang med pa'i me tog long zhig dang/ /mchog dang dga' bral rnam par brtags te zung/ /bla ma dam pa'i
2a3(rgyud 'grel): zhabs la gus pas mchod/ /dpe med me tog skyes na phyogs las rgyal/ /rin thang med pa'i me tog long zhig dang/ /rnal
2a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor gyi dbang phyug shAn+ta de bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bla ma d+hi ri sh+rI dz+nyA na'i zhabs dang/ lo tsA ba rma ban
2b1(rgyud 'grel): chos 'bar gyis bsgyur pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ tat+twaM swa b+hA ba driSh+Ti gI ti ka do ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ rang bzhin gyi do ha mdzod kyi glu'i lta ba
2b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnyis med bdud rtsi kun 'dus grub thob kyi/ /dri med dgongs pa lta spyod la sogs ni/ /nyams len thabs
2b3(rgyud 'grel): de kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /bde gshegs rnams la phyag 'tshal bshad par bya/ /dngos po yang ni ma yin zhing/ /dngos med la ni ma skyes pa'i/ /'di lta bu yi
2b4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin ni/ /su zhig gis ni rtogs par 'gyur/ /lU yi pa ni smra bar byed/ /'di lta bu ni ngo mtshar che/ /khams gsum gnas su longs spyod kyang/ /de
2b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid gnas ni rtogs pa med/ /de yi kha dog rigs dang ni/ /dbyibs kyang bdag gis rtogs pa med/ /de lta bu yi rang bzhin ni/ /dngos por ma grub ji ltar
3a1(rgyud 'grel): bstan/ /lU yi pa ni smra bar byed/ /'di lta bu ni ngo mtshar che/ /khams gsum gnas su longs spyod kyang/ /de nyid gnas ni rtogs pa med//
3a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis gzhan la ji ltar dri/ /chu gting zla ba gzugs brnyan ni/ /don dam sgyu mar rtogs pa med/ /lU yi pa ni smra bar byed/ /'di lta bu ni ngo mtshar che/ /khaMs
3a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum gnas su longs spyod kyang/ /de nyid gnas ni rtogs pa med/ /lU yi pa ni smra bar byed/ /bdag gis gzhan la ji ltar dri/ /de yi rang bzhin rtogs pa med//
3a4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gyi do ha mdzod kyi glu'i lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon lU yi pas mdzad pa rdzogsho?// //rgya gar skad du/ bi kalpa pa ri ha ra sti ka nA ma/ bod
3a5(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ rnam rtog spang ba'i glu zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /b+ho la gsang ba'i rdo rje la/ /'dus pa sems kyi rang bzhin ni/ /thig le gsang
3b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rtsa la breng/ /kak+ko la yi kha sbyor la/ /kye'o ro ro? ni 'bar bar byed/ /kri pi ta yi sgra sgrogs pas/ /rtsa drug 'khor lo hUM gis bcing/ /sku gsung d+hU tIr bdag med rtogs/ /rang byung me tog ldan pa yi/ /ga bur
3b2(rgyud 'grel): po la bsres byas nas/ /ka ru ka'i bdud rtsi 'thung bar gyis/ /ka li dzer skal bar ldan/ /rnal 'byor tshogs su bsre bar bya/ /du d+hur skal bar mi ldan te/ spongs shig rnal 'byor dam tshig go /bzhi mnyam
3b3(rgyud 'grel): gla rtsi lus byugs nas/ /rtog pa rnams ni spang bar bya/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i tshogs dag tu/ /he ru ka yi nga rgyal ldan/ /sha wang zhing chen khur byas nas/ /ma la rigs skyes bram ze la/ /kun tu
3b4(rgyud 'grel): phrad pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /rtog pa mi bya lus la gnas/ /kye 'o skal ldan mchod par gyis/ /li la bdag med seng ge yis/ /stong nyid don ni rtogs par 'gyur/ /rnam rtog spang phyir rnal 'byor kye//
3b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni gan rkyal nyal byas nas/ /lag pa bsnol nas brang la sbyar/ /rang rig nam mkha' i phyogs su gtad/ /li la skyes te gnyis med rtogs/ /rtog med rnal 'byor grub pa thob/ /li la pa yis rtogs
3b6(rgyud 'grel): nas grol/ /rnam rtog spang ba'i glu zhes bya ba/ slob dpon li la pas mdzad pa rdzogs ho// //rgya gar skad du/ karma tsaN+Da li ka do ha gI ti nA ma/ bod skad du/
4a1(rgyud 'grel): las kyi gtum mo'i do ha mdzod kyi glu zhes bya pa/ don thams cad grub ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nang nas gtum mo'i me sbar bas/ /dbus nas bdud rtsi 'bab par byed/ /rang 'byung sdong bu skyes pa
4a2(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /rtse mo'i ril phyin te gnas/ /mgon po'i bdud rtsi 'bab par byed/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yun ring bcom/ /gshin rjer 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa spangs/ /sangs rgyas yon tan phreng ba 'byung/ /bde ba chen po rgyas
4a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /thams cad kyis ni khyab par 'gyur/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yun ring bcom/ /gshin rjer 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa spangs/ /rdo rjes bkos shing bgos pa la/ /nyi zla gnyis ni bsres byas nas/ /
4a4(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i dbyings su thim par 'gyur/ /bde ba chen po'i grong du phyin/ /kun dbus sangs rgyas yon tan gyis/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i gnas su brtol/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yun ring bcom/ /gshin rjer 'gro
4a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'jigs pa spangs/ /'byung rgyu'i rlung ni bkag pa yis/ /rin chen gsal ba'i gnas su phyin/ /rtags shing rtags shing dpyad ba yis/ /bi rU bdag gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yun
4a6(rgyud 'grel): ring bcom/ /gshin rjer 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa spangs/ /las kyi gtum mo'i he ha mdzod kyi glu zhes bya ba/ slob dpon bi rU pas mdzad pa rdzog sho// //rgya gar skad du/
4b1(rgyud 'grel): b+ha? bA na driSh+Ti tsArya pa la do ta gI ti ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ lta bsgom spyod pa 'bras bu'i do ha glu zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngos po sna tshogs rang gi sems nyid yin/ /'khor 'das thams cad rnal 'byor dbyer med pa/ /sangs rgyas sems
4b2(rgyud 'grel): can gnyis su med pa ste/ /dper na chu dang de yi rlabs bzhin no/ /dngos dang dngos ma ni sngar? sa pa'i sems nyid 'di/ /rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor skad cig gcig la ni/ /sgron me chung du zhig gis mun pa ltar/ /'khor ba'i dug lnga rang bzhin rab rib sel/ /zung 'jug bya
4b3(rgyud 'grel): brgya blo 'das chen po ni/ /bde gsal mi rtog nam mkha' lta bu ste/ /khyab cing rgya chen snying rje chen po'i do/ /snang yang rang bzhin med pa chu zla bzhin/ /gsal yang tha snyad mdza' dbus kun dang bral/ /gang gis ma gos dri med re dogs bral/ /lkugs pa'i rmi lam bzhin
4b4(rgyud 'grel): du smra mi shes/ /tshad med bde chen rang bzhin ye shes ni/ /nyi zla'i 'od bzhin phyogs dang bral ba med/ /kye 'o rnal 'byor rang 'byung ngo mtshar che/ /gnyug ma ma bcos sems ni chos sku ste/ /bcos pa'i sems kyis rnal 'byor thob mi 'gyur/ /de phyir bde ba'i phyogs su
4b5(rgyud 'grel): yin par mthong/ /rang bzhin grub pa'i lam thob rnal 'byor bde/ /rnam rtog bral bas zhe 'dod 'byung mi srid/ /rta mgrin grub thob bdag nyid sar tas smras/ /kye 'o rnal 'byor lta ba'i nyams lan gyis/ /de yi rang bzhin gang zhig sgom 'dod na/ /rang lus ri bo 'di ni
4b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas kyi mchog /sems nyid dus kyi rnal 'byor bsgrub pa po/ /dbang po rnams bcings mtshams bcad bde bar 'gyur/ /g.yeng ba rnams kyang ched du spang mi bya/ /tug phrad sems su shes na yi dam lha/ /shes ba ma bkug rtog par rims kyis spangs/ /sems la
4b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam rtog byung na rnal 'byor pas/ /ras bal 'dab ma bzhin du glod la zhog bya ba spongs la rang sems rang gis ltos/ /zhe 'dod byung na bdud du shes par gyis/ /rnam rtog rnams kyi rtsa ba sems yin te/ /de med phyir na rnam rtog yod min/ /dran pa pa dran med bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor
5a1(rgyud 'grel): te/ /sems 'di rtag par ma grub rang la thim/ /bsgom 'dod med pas sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob/ /rnal 'byor bu chung lta bur rtog pa med/ /ldum ra'i bung pa'i me tog ro myong ltar/ /nags nas nags su 'khyam pa seng ge bzhin/ /kun tu rgyu ba sna tshogs
5a2(rgyud 'grel): rlung ltar ni/ /sems nyid bag dang ldan pa spyod pa'i mchog /rang bzhin mi dgag spyon pa lta bur spyad/ /rgyab tu mi chags mdun du zhen pa med/ /mdor na lta sgom spyod pa nyams len la/ /ji ltar phan pa'i spyod pas rnal 'byor spyod/ /sna tshogs snang ba
5a3(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi ngo bo 'di/ /thug phrad tsam gyis ma grub phyag rgya che/ /snang la mi snang 'bras bu sangs rgyas 'byung/ /de la sems ma? dngos grub dam pa yin/ /phyi nang thams cad lhan cig skyes pa 'di/ /rnam rtog chu ba'i rgyun gyi rnal 'byor 'dra/ /de yang sems las
5a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan na btsal du med/ /yid la mi bzhag phyag rgya chen po'i lam/ /'bras bu ma re rtogs na phyag rgya tshe/ /ma rtogs rtags pa nam mkha' i sprin dang 'dra/ /rtogs na da nyid rang bzhin steng pa yin/ /lta spyod 'bras bu dbyer med lhan cig skyes/ /rang bzhin gnyis
5a5(rgyud 'grel): med rtags na 'bras bu'i mchog /lta spyod sgom pa 'bras bu do ha'i glu zhes bya pa/ slob dpon sa ra ha pas mdzad brdzog ste// //rgya gar skad du/ taN+Dwi? do ha gI ti ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ de ha mdzod kyi de nyid kyi zhes bya ba/ 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag
5a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /brtags na bdag gzhan dngos po med/ /byis pa lkug pa'i rmi lam 'dra/ /de nyid rtogs pa shin tu dka' / /byis ba rgyan po rtse ba 'dra/ /tha ka na ni smra bar byed/ /de nyid tshig gis brjod pa dka' / /snang stong rtog pa ma sel bar/ /thar pa thob par ga la 'gyur/ /lus
5a7(rgyud 'grel): ngag yid gsum dbyings su ni/ /de nyid mnyam par ma shes na/ /de nyid rtogs par shin tu dka' / /byis pa rgyan po rtse ba 'dra/ /dngos po tshig gis brjod pa dka' / /chos rnams tshig tu smra ba yang/ /? tsam gyis ni 'grub pa ma ci/ /sems kyi de nyid ma rtogs par/ /thams
5b1(rgyud 'grel): cad gcig par rtogs pa med/ /don dam rtogs pa shin tu dka' / /byis pa rgyan po rtse ba 'dra/ /tha ka na ni smra bar byed/ /do ha mdzod kyi de nyid kyi glu zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ka na rig nas brgyud pa/ tha ka nas mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ tsarya do ha gI hi
5b2(rgyud 'grel): ga nA ma/ bod skad du/ spyod pa'i ngo ha mdzod kyi glu zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ldong ros kyis ni thig le byas/ /ka tsa ri ni bstan par bya/ /kye ma rtsed? mos bdud bzhi bcom/ /gzi brjid ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /smra bar byed pa'i khyab 'jug gam/ /drag
5b3(rgyud 'grel): po tshangs pa bsrung mi nus/ /kye ma gal te smra pa na/ /'chi bdag gis ni za bar 'gyur/ /ma rungs mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis bsrungs/ /kye ma rmongs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /glags so tshal bsam bas ci zhig bya/ /kye'o byol song mkha' gro mo/ /glags tshol bsam pas ci zhig bya//
5b4(rgyud 'grel): kye'o 'bar ba'i mer? ma dug/ gzi brjid ldan pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /smra bar byed pa khyab 'jug gam/ /drag po tshangs pa bsrung mi nus/ /ji ltar sbu gri ral gri'i so/ /de bzhin la ba pa yi zhabs/ /dam tshig spyod pa ngo mtshar tsha/ /gzi brdzid ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /smra bar byed
5b5(rgyud 'grel): pa khyab 'jug gam/ /drag po tshangs pa bsrung mi nus/ /spyod pa'i do ha mdod kyi glu zhes bya ba/ slob dpon kaM? pa la nas brgyud pa/ slob dpon kaM ka nas gsungs pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du /sa ha dzA ananda gI ti ka driSh+Ti nA ma/ bod skad du/ lhan cig skyes
5b6(rgyud 'grel): dga' i de ha mdzod kyi glu'i lta ba zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnyis sbyor dug po drang la stabs/ /b+ha d+he pa ni gnyid du log /ji ltar kun la mkhas pa yis /dug po de ni ji ltar khyer/ /tshem bu thob par gyur pa na/ /chags sdang gti mug gnas su dag/ tshem bu 'di la
5b7(rgyud 'grel): dbye ba'am/ /rin gyi grangs kyis chod pa med/ /da ni bdag gi tshem bu 'di/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam par 'gyur/ /tshem bu thab par 'gyur pa na/ /chags sdang gti mug gnas su dag/ b+ha d+he tshom bu tshol? du phyin/ /thams cad du ni btsal bas na/ /bdag nyid kyang ni dmigs med 'gyur/ /tshem?
6a1(rgyud 'grel): bu thob par 'gyur ba na/ /chags sdang gti mug gnas su dag/ lhan cig skyes dga' i doha? mdzod kyi glu'i lta ba zhes pa/ slob dpon b+ha d+hes mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ su ga ta dri'Sh+Ta gI ti ka nA ma/ bod skad du /bde gshegs kyi lta ba'i
6a2(rgyud 'grel): glu zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /thams cad du ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /skye 'gag sdug bsngal sgrol phyir mdzad/ /d+ha ma pa ni smra par byed/ /kha de gshegs spyi bor bkur ba yis/ /bdag nyid don dam de nyid rtogs/
6a3(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi lha gang du/ /'di du bdag ni rab tu 'byung/ /chos rnams thams cad khongs su chud/ /d+ha ma pa ni smra bar byed/ /bde gshegs spyi bor bkur ba yis/ /bdag gis don dam de nyid rtogs/ /ri rab dang ni rtsa yi tshegs?/ /ji ltar srang la gzhal lam ci/ /de bzhin
6a4(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol thams cad kyis/ /lta ba 'di dang mnyam mam ci/ /d+ha ma pa ni smra ba? byed/ /bde gshegs spyi bor bkur bar yis/ /bdag gis don dam de nyid rtogs/ /nor bu rin chen bor nas ni/ /su dag 'tshing pu len par byed/ /sangs rgyas chos dang
6a5(rgyud 'grel): dge 'dun ni//brtags na bden gnyis yin par smra?/ /d+ha ma pa ni skye bar byed/ /bde gshegs spyi bor bkur pa yis/ /bdag gis don dam de nyid rtogs/ /bde gshegs kyi lta pa'i glu zhes bya ba/ slob dpon d+ha ma pas mdzad pa rdzogs to// //
6a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ pA yu ta twaM do ha kI ti ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ rlung gi de nyid kyi do hwa'i glu zhes bya ba/ gnyis med bde chen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /brtan g.yo rlung gi gzhal yas khang/ /sems kyi rdo rje gdan du bzhugs/ /stong pa nyid ni zab mo la/ /
6a7(rgyud 'grel): kye 'o lhan cig skyes pa yi/ /dga' mo bdag gi dbang du gsol/ /srid pa 'di ni rab g.yos na/ /slar yang ji ltar phrad par 'gyur/ /skye bo lhan cig skyes pa yi/ /mdzes ma bdag gi dbang du gsol/ /khyed ni bzhugs na bdag gis ni/ /ji
6b1(rgyud 'grel): star bdag gis gzhan la btsal/ /gru ni 'bying bar 'gyur ba la/ /yongs su drang bar 'dod pa la/ /kye 'o lhan cig skyes pa yi/ /dga' mo bdag gi dbang du gsol/ /srid pa 'di ni rab g.yos na/ /slar yang ji ltar phrad par 'gyur/ /khyed kyi slad du bdag gis ni/ /rigs lnga'i grong ni
6b2(rgyud 'grel): bsad byas kyang/ khyod kyi zhal ni bdag gis ni/ /skad cig gcig kyang ma mthong ngo/ /kye'o lhan cig skyes pa yi/ /dga' mo bdag gi dbang du gsol/ /srid pa 'di ni rab g.yos na/ /slar yang ji ltar phrad par 'gyur/ /kye'o lhan cig skyes pa yi/ /mdzes ma bdag gi dpang du gsol
6b3(rgyud 'grel): khyed kyi slad du bdag gis ni/ /phyag rgya dgos te cung tsam yang/ /rigs bram ze'i bsam pa med/ /kye 'o? lhan cig skyes pa yang/ /rigs bram ze'i bsam pa med/ /kye 'o? lhan cig skyes pa na/ /slar yang ji ltar phrad par 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho'i nang du rdzings bcas pa/ /thod pa can ni
6b4(rgyud 'grel): ka? ? las/ /ma his gdams ngag thob par 'gyur/ /srid pa'i bcings pa yongs su bcad/ /kye'o lhan cig skyes pa yi/ /mdzes ma bdag gi dbang du gsol/ /rlung gi de nyid kyi do ha'i glu zhes bya ba/ slob dpon nag po nas brgyud pa/ /slob dpon ma hi pas mdzad pa rdzogs to// //
6b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ b+ha si ti til ka do ha gI ti ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ dbyid kyi thig le do ha mdzod kyi glu zhes bya ba /dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /se b+hu sku gsum la sogs kyi/ /sos ka'i me tog mthong pa yi/ /gzhon nu bdag ni myos par 'gyur/ /he ru ka la chags pa yis/ /sos ka'i dang
6b6(rgyud 'grel): po dang po 'dir/ /khyod kyis bdag ni srung bar mdzod/ /gdung bas 'gum bar ma mdzad cig /me tog aM? d+ha ka ru Na/ dri bsung ldan pas dgyes par 'gyur/ /sha ris pa ni brdungs pas brdungs/ /me mar khur nas tsaN+Da li /re mo bdag la 'bab bo zhes/ /kan pa ni gshegs par re//
6b7(rgyud 'grel): so ka'i dang po dbying dus la/ /khyod kyis bdag ni bsrung ba mdzod/ /gdung pas 'gum par ma mdzad cig/ phyogs bcur bltas na bdag gis ni/ /khyod las gzhan ni mthod ba med/ /gdung ba'i me yis bdag gis ni/ /bdag gi lus kyang bsam pa med/ /rnal 'byor ma brgyad las bzhi/
7a1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /bdag cag gsol ba btab pa yis/ /bcom ldan 'das ni bzhengs par mdzod/ /dpyid kyi thig le do ha mdzod kyi glu zhes bya ba/ slob dpon nag po gnas brgyud pa/ slob dpon sa ra has mdzad pa rdzogs to// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra tsa tur gI ti ka nA ma/ bod skad
7a2(rgyud 'grel): du/ rdo rje bzhi'i glu zhes bya ba/ dpal sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi mthun sems ni khyod ma bsgom/ /de nyid de bzhin nyid ma 'dzin/ /'bras bu re ba bsgom ma byed/ /mi dmigs phyag rgya chen po bsgoms/ /gal te mnol la gnas med na/ /de ni dpal gyi theg chen min/ /'bras
7a3(rgyud 'grel): bu re ba bsgom ma byed/ /mi dmigs phyag rgya chen po sgoms/ /phung po khams te phyag rgya che/ /dam tshig 'khor lo de rang bzhin/ /'bras bu re ba bsgom ma byed/ /mi dmigs phyag rgya chen po sgoms/ /gnyis med yon tan rgyal 'di yin/ /gnyis med yon tan rnal 'byor gsung/ /
7a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu re bsgom ma byed/ /mi dmigs phyag rgya chen po sgoms/ /sha ri'i yul du sku 'khrungs pa/ /a ba d+hU tI gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa/ /a ma ra sing+gi glu rdzogs to// //gang yang mi skye mi 'gag dngos po bcings pa med/ /khams gsum grol med
7a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul ba rnams la snang/ /rtsa ba sems nyid sna tshogs 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin ni/ /thog med 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin gzhigs na rnyed mi 'gyur/ /dngos rnams gdong nas skye med mthong ba gang zhig yin/ /su zhig skye bar 'gyur dang 'gag dang bcing ba sems/ /
7a6(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba sems nyid sna tshogs 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin ni/ /thog med 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin gzhigs na rnyed mi 'gyur/ /sems ni nam mkha' dri med dang 'dra slob dpon gsung/ /srid pa gsum po de 'dra ba yi rang bzhin yin/ /rtsa ba sems nyid sna tshogs 'khrul pa'i rang
7a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin ni/ /thog med 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin gshigs na rnyed mi 'gyur/ /rang bzhin mi rtog rang rig nyams su myong bas 'grub /rang bzhin 'od gsal 'khrul pas ci phyir rmongs par 'gyur/ /rtsa ba sems nyid sna tshogs 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin ni/ /thog med 'khrul pa'i rang
7b1(rgyud 'grel): /bor sbyor ba'i mda'/ /nga yis lhan skyes mda''phangs brgyab/ /'ben med cig kyang phog pa med/ /de rnams nas ni tshor ba med/ /de yis 'di yin gnyis med song/ /da yis lhan skyes mda''phangs rgyab/ /'ben med cig kyang phog pa med/ /gla ster
7b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gron? bu nyi shu med/ /de 'dra'i/ bol po bi ru byed/ /nga yis lhan skyes mnga' 'phangs rgyab/ /'ben med cig kyang phog pa med?/ /bi ru byed pa'i rdo rje'i glu rdzogs sho// //sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdul chen dkyil 'khor bum pa rdo rje sogs/ /grol
7b3(rgyud 'grel): bar mi lha? phung po 'grangs pa'i ? pas/ /kan pas brjod de 'bras su zhig byed/ /thams cad brdzun pas bslu ba yin par 'dod/ /ka na ba'i glu rdzogs to// //sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bye bram zer la can skyes bu saM g+ha ba/ /sangs rgyas ye shes
7b4(rgyud 'grel): dag la mos par gyis/ de 'dra'i skyes bu'i sems ni dga' ba yin/ /brtan g.yo thams cad dri med rin po che/ /mi gnas rang bzhin bud ba khyod ni bsgoms/ /yang dag bla ma'i man ngag nan tan gyis /de 'dra'i skyes bu'i sems ni dga' ba yin/ /brtan g.yo
7b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dri med rin po che/ /mi gnas rang bzhin bung ba ma skyes pa/ /rmi lam bud med de bzhin med pa ste/ /de 'dra'i skyes bu'i sems ni dga' ba yin/ /brtan g.yo thams cad dri med rin po che/ /mi gnas rang bzhin bung ba de shes na/ /tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas
7b6(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub 'grub/ /de 'dra'i skyes bu'i sems ni dga' ba yin/ /brtan g.yo thams cad dri med rin po che/ ? gnas pa yi don thugs su chud pa/ bla ma rje btsun d+hiSh+Ti dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas/ rdo rje'i glu zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
7b7(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar bltas pa de ltar mthong ba med/ /brdzun pa med pa'i slu ba 'ba' zhig ste/ /bsam mi khyab cing grub smra he ru ba/ /skyob pa'i sems kyis rang bzhin gzugs mi shes/ /ji ltar de ltar glo bur gdal bzhag /'dod pa'i mdung gis rang la ci te zug/ bsam mi khyab cing
8a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gzhigs na rnyed mi 'gyur/ /bla ma me tri'i glu rdzogs sho// //sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zab mo zab mo 'jig rten kun smra yang/ /ma skyes pa la dga' ba dga' ba 'ga' zhig 'dug /kye sems kyi zab mo shes par dka' bas na/ /lhan cig skyes pa gzhigs na med pa
8a2(rgyud 'grel): yin// mi gnas sems ni mi dmigs pa la bzhag /rnal 'byor me yis dngos po thams cad bsreg /kye? sems kyi zab mo shes par dka' bsan/ /lhan cig skyes pa gzhigs na med pa yin/ /rnal 'byor 'dod pa bla mas bstan du med/ /bla ma'i byin rlabs gong na med pa len//
8a3(rgyud 'grel): kye sems kyi zab mo shes par dka' bas na/ /lhan cig skyes pa gzhigs na med pa yin/ /dpal gyi bde ba chen po tshol 'dod ni/ /dbus mtshol 'dod mig med khrod par ltung/ /kye sems kyi zab mo rtogs par dka' bas na/ /lhan cig skyes pa gzhigs na med pa yin/ /sa ra
8a4(rgyud 'grel): ha'i glu rdzogs ho?// //sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /stong pa dang ni snying rje'i rang bzhin 'dres/ /stong nyid dbyer med rgyun mi 'chad par yod/ /bdag gis stong pa'i rnal 'byor ma de mthong/ /nam mkha' bzhes shing bzhes shing 'thung zhing 'dug /nam mkha' nam mkhar sbyor
8a5(rgyud 'grel): ba de ma mthong/ /'khor bas bcings pa'i sa la de mi gnas/ /bdag gis stong pa'i rnal 'byor ma de mthong/ /nam mkha' bzhos shing bzhos shing 'thung zhing 'dug /de 'dra'i rnal 'byor rtsa ba'i khyim las g.yo/ /snying rje'i ro chen dri ma med pa yin/ /bdag gis stong pa'i rnal
8a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma de mthong/ /nam mkha' bzhos shing bzhos shing 'thung zhing 'dug /sa ra has brjod gang gzhan ci phyir byed/ /nyin dang mtshan du nam mkha' 'byo phyir 'gro/ /bdag gis stong pa'i rnal 'byor ma de mthong/ /nam mkha' bzhos shing bzhos shing 'thung zhing 'dug /sa ra ha'i
8a7(rgyud 'grel): glu rdzogs sho// //sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor mda''dzin de/ /chos rnams mtshon par rab shes nas/ /da yis lhan skyes mda''phangs rgyab/ /'ben med cig kyang phog pa med/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i gtam gson cig/ thams cad dngos
8b1(rgyud 'grel): grub smra he ru pa/ /skyob pa'i sems kyis rang bzhin gzugs mi shes/ /lhan cig sems te mkha' lus bde snying lus/ gnyis med gnyis yin stong dang snying rje'i sems/ /bsam gyi mi khyab grub smra he ru pa/ /skyob pa'i sems kyis rang bzhin gzugs mi shes/ /de ni mi skye
8b2(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gag rkyen med/ /rang bzhin rtogs na rtsa ba'i sems shes yin/ /bsam gyis mi khyab grub smra he ru pa/ /skyob pa'i sems kyis rang bzhin gzugs mi shes/ /bla ma d+hiSh+Tri? dzA na'i zhal snga nas kyi klu rdzogs// //sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kye ma khams gsum
8b3(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams/ /rnam rtog sgrog gis dam bcings te/ /'khor ba'i mya ngan snam bu ru/ /phyogs bcu kun tu rnam par 'khyams/ /e ma lam gyi khams gsum bde bar gshegs/ /gdod ma nyid nas grol ba che/ /rnam dag zhing ni bde ba can/ /sangs rgyas rol mo rab tu
8b4(rgyud 'grel): ston/ /kye ma rnam rtag sdug bsngal lam/ /phyin pa'i dus med smon pa bzhin/ /bde bral 'dod pa sdug bsngal nyid/ mnyam nyid don la rab tu gol/ /e ma'o lam med lam gyi mchog /lhun rdzogs nam mkha' i bya bzhin du/ /de dogs med la phyag rgya che/ /skyon yon dbang
8b5(rgyud 'grel): gis bslad du med/ /kye mo'i bskal pa grangs med gsum/ /de nyid btsal bas mi rnyed/ /rmongs pa nam mkha' i mdza' cho la bzhin/ /sangs rgyas zhes bya rnyed mi srid/ /e ma'o skad cig gcig nyid la/ /ma dral 'bras bu rang la rnyed/ /rang rig ye shes stobs po che/ /'jig rten
8b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang sgyur kun gyi rje/ /rdzogs sho// /mkha' la ba 'jo 'jo byed bla ma ste/ /'thung ba'i be'u ni rang gi sems nyid yin/ /mkha' la rgyun mi 'chad 'jog na pa/ /rnal 'byor sdom pa'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul/ /ba 'jo snod gsol ga re mA ma kA/
8b7(rgyud 'grel): ba 'dzi? snod ni dri med lhan cig skyes/ /mkha' la rgyun mi 'chang 'jo ka na pa/ /rnal 'byor sdom pa'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul/ /mkha' la bzhos shing gzhos shing snod bkang bzhag /bzung bar mi nus 'di ltar glang po lnga/ /mkha' la rgyun mi 'chang 'jog na pa/ /rnal
9a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor sdom pa'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul/ /mkha' la ba 'jo 'jo 'dzo byed 'dir ma mthong/ /ji ltar nang du chus gang ka li pa/ /mkha' la rgyun mi 'chad 'jog na pa/ /rnal 'byor sdom pa'i tshogs la mchod par 'bul/ /kar+Na ri'i glu rdzogs sto// //
9a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /me tog gcig rgyas kha dog sna tshogs pa/ /stong pa'i ljon shing dag las shin tu rgyas/ /btsan pa dpe med me tog rab rgyas pa/ /rin thang med pa'i me tog 'di snoms shig/ de shing rtsa ba yal ga lo ma med/ /ltos dang zla nyal 'gro
9a3(rgyud 'grel): ni bzang po'i dus/ /btsan po dpe med me tog rab rgyas pa/ /rin thang med pa'i me tog 'di snoms shig /ge sar gcod mkhas sgyu ma'i mkhan po yin/ /chos dbyings rdo rje dbang phyug mchod pa 'bul/ /btsan po dpe med me tog rab rgyas pa/ /rin thang med pa'i me
9a4(rgyud 'grel): tog 'di snoms shig/ mchog dga' dang ni dga' bral gzhig nas longs/ /yang dag bla ma'i zhabs btud nan tan gyis/ /btsan po dpe med me tog rab rgyas pa/ /rin thang med pa'i me tog 'di snoms shig /ma ti tsi tra'i glu rdzogs sho// //
9a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/ /dge dang mi dga' i las rnams la/ /dga' dang mi dga' khyod ma byed/ /rang dga' ye shes seng ge bzhin/ /chos nyid zab mo rnal 'byor yul/ /sgom dang mi sgom byang chub sems/ /ldan dang mi
9a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan khyod ma byed/ /rang dga' ye shes seng ge bzhin/ /sangs rgyas dang ni sems can kyi/ /spyod pa'i lam ni 'di yin zhes/ /mthun dang mi mthun khyod ma byed/ /rang dga' ye shes seng ge bzhin/ /bde dang sdug bsngal 'bras bu'i chos/ /'khor dang mya ngan
9a7(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa la/ /re dang dogs pa khyod ma byed/ /rang dga' ye shes seng ge bzhin/ /glu rdzogs sto// //bdag ni 'dug ste shi dang ma'i med/ /bdag gi yid la don cig 'jug pa med/ /kan ral gris zhags pa rab bcad pas/ /da lta re ba med dpe?
9b1(rgyud 'grel): da smra/ /gru gnyis sna la rkang pa rab bzhag nas/ /lus 'gyel gyur te sems la sdug bsngal skye/ /ka na'i ral gris zhags pa rab bcad pas/ /da lta re pa med dpe? da smra/ /mi gang rtsa ba khron pas bskor gyur kyang/ /shing gcig la ni 'bras bu gnyis mi 'byung//
9b2(rgyud 'grel): ka na'i ral gris zhags pa rab bcad pas/ /de lta re pa med de pa da smra/ /mig sman ril bu bcud len dang dngos grub/ /de rnams la ni bdag ni le lor gyur/ /ka na'i ral gris zhags pa rab bcad pas/ /da lta re ba med de pa da smra /rdzogs sho// //
9b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kye yul rnams thams cad lta 'dod na/ /ri bo chen po'i kha nas ltos/ /chos rnams thams cad skye 'gag med pa'i yul/ /rang sems rig na ri rab rtse/ /chu rnams thams cad 'thung 'dod na/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i chu la 'thung
9b4(rgyud 'grel): skye med byang chub sems kyi chu/ /mdza' dbus med pa'i rgya mtsho che/ /brtan g.yo thams cad bsreg 'dod na/ /'jig pa'i dus kyi me chen spor/ /rnam rtog brtan g.yo thams cad de/ /lhun grub ye shes sems kyi me/ /'jigs med bde ba'i gnas 'dod na/ /
9b5(rgyud 'grel): dgon pa chen po'i gnas su 'dug /'khong ba rnam dag bde? ba'i gnas/ /byang chub sems ni dgon pa che/ /yA tsarya dpa' bo rnam par snang mdzad kyi glu rdzogs sho// //sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang bzhin bdag med ma de ni/ /bdag
9b6(rgyud 'grel): gi me ring byed pa yin/ /chags pa med pa de yis ni/ /nyon mongs zhi bar byed pa yin/ /skye dang 'chi ba srid pa yin/ /'khrul pa rnams ni spong pa yin/ /bde ba chen po ster byed pa'i/ /len gyi 'khrul pa ma yin no/ /nges na kha dog dbyibs med de/ /tshad
9b7(rgyud 'grel): kyang yod pa ma mthong ngo/ /'dod pa med pa de yis ni/ /nga rgyal skye ba mi 'dod do/ /gang tshe bdag med ma de ni/ /bdag gi snying la zhugs pa na/ /bdag dang gzhan rnams ma lus pa'i/ /dbye ba yod par ma mthong ngo/ /'gro ba med cing 'od ba med/ /gang yang
10a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa ma yin te/ /nam mkha' yin ni ngo bo ltar/ /yongs su gsal bar snang ba yin/ /thub pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ ma lus pa dang ral pa ni/ /de ni me li bdag med mar/ /de ltar bdag nyid smra ba yin/ /nA ro paN+Di ta'i
10a2(rgyud 'grel): glu rdzogs sho// //sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can nyon mongs gdung bas sa steng bskor pa'i lha/ /de lta na yang bde chen chung ma'i lus mi 'dor/ /kye kye dpe med chung ma la ni rab tu chags/ /bskal pa dpag med mi 'bral
10a3(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo'i 'jig rten lha/ /shin tu ngo mtshar bdud kyi chung ma de mi len/ /gzhan las khyad 'phags gzugs mchog mnga' ba'i lha/ /kye kye dpe med chung ma la ni rab tu chags/ /bskal pa dpag med mi 'bral gtso bo 'jig rten lha/ /'gro ba brgya phrag mang po nad
10a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis thebs la bskor/ /de dag bde ster lha ni khams gsum me long yin/ /kye kye dpe med chung ma la ni rab tu chags/ /bskal pa dpag med mi 'bral gtso bo'i 'jig rten lha/ /mnyam med mnyam pa'i bde gsol ma ti ro ha na/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan mang ldan
10a5(rgyud 'grel): karSha pa na'i lha/ /kye kye dpe med chud ma la ni rab tu chags/ /bskal pa dpag med mi 'bral gtso bo'i 'jig rten lha/ /lU yi pa'i glu rdzogs sho// //sangs rgyas la phyag tshal lo/ /sgyu ma'i nags tshal mang po de dang der/ /ri dags bsad phyir blon po
10a6(rgyud 'grel): Dom+b+hi 'gro /log 'gro ri dags gar 'gro nga yis mthong/ /Dom+bi mda' rnon bkang nas nang du zhugs/ /mnga' lnga yod de lnga gshar gyis bton/ /Dom+b+hi gzhu bkad bzung nas rnam par 'dug/ log lta'i ri dags gang 'gro nga yis mthong/ /Dom+bi mda' rnon bkang nas nang du
10a7(rgyud 'grel): zhugs/ /gzhu med rgyud med sgyud med mde'u med/ /Dom+bi the tshom med de nges par bsad/ /log lta'i ri dags gang 'gro nga yis mthong/ /Dom+bi mnga' rnon bkang nas nang du zhugs/ /rgyal ba rigs lnga dbu rgyan byas nas su/ /ri dags gsad pa slar la sogs par bya/ /log lta'i ri
10b1(rgyud 'grel): dags gar 'gro nga yis mthong/ /Dom+bi mda' non bkang nas nang du zhugs/ /Dom+bi'i glu rdzogs sho// //sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ngan pa ngan pa 'jig rten kun smra yang/ /gces pa'i yon tan dri med zab mo yod/ /utpal chu nang btus nas chus mi reg/ de 'dra'i
10b2(rgyud 'grel): mang po'i sgyu mkhan bi rU pa/ /tshong 'dus dang ni grong dang chu 'gram ni/ /gang du phyin nas lus 'gyel de mi shes/ /utpal chu nang btus nas chus mi reg /de 'dra'i mang po'i sgyu mkhan bi rU pa/ /'jig rten ngan par smra ba de brdzun yin/ /khros pa gang gA bab pa rgyun las bzlog/
10b3(rgyud 'grel): utpal chu nang btus nas chus mi reg /de 'dra'i mang po'i sgyu mkhan bi rU pa/ /nyi ma gte mang bcug nas chang ni 'thungs/ /anda 'jigs byas b+he me'i sar bshig /utpal chu nang btus nas chus mi reg /de 'dra'i mang po'i sgyu mkhan bi rU pa/ bi rU pa'i glu rdzogs sto// //
10b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bltos dang skye ba gnas pa med pa na/ /de tshe lhan cig skyes dang khyad par med/ /de nyid rang bzhin shin tu go gyur nas/ /de nyid mi mthun pa de rnam par smros/ /'di ltar khams gsum bde bar gshegs pa lta?/ /de yi tshe na gang gis bcings par
10b5(rgyud 'grel): sems/ /de nyid rang bzhin shin tu go gyur nas/ /ji ltar mi mthun pa de rnam par smros/ /'di kun rtsa ba'i rang bzhin ma rnyed stor/ /de yi tshe na nam mkha' i rang bzhin mi 'chi 'am/ /de nyid rang bzhin shin tu go gyur nas/ /de nyid mi mthun pa de rnam par smros/ /rmongs par ma byed
10b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med mdud pa yis/ /cis te stong pa'i khu tshung? brdzun gyis bcings/ /de nyid rang bzhin shin tu go gyur nas/ /ji ltar mi mthun pa de rnam par smos/ /la pa pa'i glu rdzogs sho// //ji ltar til la til mar khyab pa bzhin/ /de bzhin khams gsum 'jam
10b7(rgyud 'grel): dpal sku yis gang/ /de shes lhan grub rnal 'byor bsgom pa yis/ /bde chen dam pa chos kyi glu 'di long/ /bde gshegs kun gyi btsun mo ming med ma/ /sna tshogs gzugs can snying rje can de dang/ /lhan cig 'grogs na sdug bsngal thams cad sel/ /bde chen dam pa tshe sa kyi
11a1(rgyud 'grel): glu 'di long/ /nam mkha' nam mkha' i mtshan nyid ci 'dra bar/ /sems kyi chos nyid de 'dra bla ma gsung/ /bla med don de mi shes bsgom mi nus/ /bde pa chen po chos kyi glu 'di long/ /nyi ma me shel ras bal 'dus ji bzhin/ /lung dang man ngag de
11a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin brtan pa las/ /rang rig ye shes me ni 'bar bar 'gyur/ /bde chen dam pa chos kyi glu 'di long/ /glegs bam chos dang med/ /'phags pa'i nor chen rang gi sems la chongs/ /bde chen med/ /'phags pa'i nor chen rang gi sems la chongs/ /bde chen dam pa
11a3(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi glu 'di long/ /bde dang sdug bsngal gnas skabs thams cad du/ /yid bzhin nor 'dra'i de nyid byang chub sems/ /'jam dpal kun 'dul nyin mtshan nan tan byos/ /bde chen dam pa chos kyi glu 'di long/ /ma hA su kha ta'i glu rdzogs sho// //
11a4(rgyud 'grel): Fdpal sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shin tu ngo mtshar bdag gi gtam/ /glang chen btsongs nas gnyid log ltar/ /gang zhig nor yod mel tshe byed/ /kun khyab dpa' bo pra sar/ chos dang chos min gtam mi 'dra/ /rang byung rang bzhin g.yo ba med/ /glang chen btsongs nas gnyid
11a5(rgyud 'grel): log ltar/ /gang zhig nor yod me la tshe byed/ /kun khyab dpa' bo bra sa ra/ /rnal 'byor me tri'i dbye shes pas/ /thogs med dus bsags skyon kun bral/ /gang zhig nor yod mel tshe byed/ /kun khyab dpa' bo pra sa ra/ /rnal 'byor pra sa ra'i glu rdzogs sho// //
11a6(rgyud 'grel): stong pa la gnas snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /zhing na bzhugs pa'i thabs dang shes rab tshogs/ /gzugs brnyan lta bur shes par bya/ /snying rje ro yis tha dad brtsod pa spangs/ /der ni kun rdzob yul gyi sha rnams bza' / /shin tu rnam dag stong pa'i chang ni btung/ /skye
11a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro skal ldan rnams la don 'di bstan/ /skal med rnams la shin tu gsang bar bya/ /rnam thar byung pas phyi nang brlan byas la/ /yul gyi longs spyod la ni ci bder spyad/ /phan tshun 'gro dang 'ong ba'i chos rnams la/ /dag dang ma ngag yid lam bya'o/ /byang chub sems kyi phreng bas
11b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam rgyan la/ /gsang pa'i dkyil 'khor nang du 'jug bya ste/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor brgyun mi 'chang/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i g.yung mo mi spang ngo/ /klu sgrub kyi glu rdzogs sto// //sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam rtog 'jig pa'i tshom rkun 'jigs shes na/ /tshul
11b2(rgyud 'grel): khrims nor can bsrung phyir mel tshe gyis/ /kye snyoms las ma byed sems kyi mel tshe gyis/ /gti mug gnyid kyis 'khor ba'i mtshan mo ring/ /kye snyoms las ma byed sems kyi mel tshe gyis/ /gnyid log na ni khyim dang chom rkun 'gro /khyod kyis tshul khrims nor chen 'phrog par 'gyur//
11b3(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims nor de med na ting 'dzin med/ /de med na ni nyi ma 'char ba med/ /de nyid nyi ma bsgom pas mel tshe gyis/ /skad cig gcig kyang nor chung gzhan ma byed/ /de yi dus na de nyid nyi ma 'char/ /'di ltar de tshe 'khor ba'i nam langs 'gyur/ /kye snyoms las ma byed sems kyi
11b4(rgyud 'grel): mel tshe gyis/ /dI pi ka ra sh+rI dz+nyA na'i chos kyi glu rdzogs sho// //*/ /do ha spyod pa'i glu'i lta ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /*/ /rgya gar skad du /tsarya diShI? do ha kI tika nA ma/ bod skad du/ do ha spyod pa'i klu'i lta ba zhes bya ba/ rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rma bya'i gdugs sgreng
11b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin byed cing/ /cha byang sna tshogs 'dzin byed pa'i/ rnal 'byor pa ni smyon pa 'dra/ /nga rgyal can la rgyal ba'i lam/ /med ces lU yi smra bar byed/ /lus kyi tshem bu bsrungs pas grub/ /dbang bskur mang po blang bya ste/ /don med par ni slu bar byed/ /dbang bskur rtogs par ma gyur na/ /dus kyi dbang du 'gro
11b6(rgyud 'grel): ba yin/ /nga rgyal can la rgyal ba'i lam/ /med ces lku yI smra bar byed/ /lus kyi chem bu bsrungs pas brub/ /gnyid dang chad drang rtsod pa dang/ /sbyor bas rnal 'byor ji ltar grub/ /bzlog ? srid pa'i zhags pas bcings/ /nga rgyal can la rgyal pa'i lam/ /med ces lU yi smra bar byed/ /lus kyi tshim?/
11b7(rgyud 'grel): bu bsrungs pas grub tshong 'dus kham phor gser skyogs ltar/ /gal te de ltar byas ba na/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad par 'gyur/ /nga rgyal can la rgyal pa'i lam/ /med ces ? yi smra bar byed/ /lus kyi tshem bu bsrungs pas grub/ /do ha spyod pa'i glu'i lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon lU yI pa nas brgyud
12a1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ slob dpon kir pas mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ shU n+ya tA driShI nA ma/ bod skad du/ stong pa nyid kyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems kyi rtog rtse chos nyid ni/ /sa bon nam mkha' i dbyings su smos/ /bdag med
12a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhon nu'i mgul nas ?/ /gnyid sad byed pa nyid du gnas/ /spongs shig dor shig bdag rmongS so/ /kye'o bcings pa ma lus pa/ /sha ba ri bde chen bor rol/ /stong pa'i btsun mo 'khyud byas te/ /kye'o lus ngag sems smin te/ /thams cad du ni brtags pa yis/ /sha ba ri ni myos par
12a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /dga' pa'i rnam pa thams cad du/ /sha ba ri ni gnyid log nas/ /gnyid ni nam mkha' i dbyings log /kye'o bdag gi da nyid ni/ /sa bon nam mkhar mnyam par smos/ /'bras bu nam mkhar skar chen shar/ /spongs shig dor shig bdag rmongs so/ /srid pas bcings pa'i glang chen bsang/ /?
12a4(rgyud 'grel): lnga yi gtor ma byas/ /bdag gi sdug bsngal thams cad spangs/ /spongs shig dor shig bdag rmongs so/ /nyin mtshan rtag tu gnyid med par/ /rang gi sems la byar byas/ /de nas skyes pa bud med ni/ /gcig tu dben par song steg nas/ /gtso bo 'jig rten mgon dang smra/ /spongs shig dor shig bdag
12a5(rgyud 'grel): rmongs so/ /stong pa'i bcun mo 'khyud? byas te/ /sha ba rin bde ba chen por gnas/ /stong pa nyid kyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon sha pa ri pas gsungs brdzogs sho// rgya gar skad du/ su kha du ? a d+hya pa rirya g+hA driSh+Ti nA ma?/ 'od skad du/ bde sdug gnyis bral gyi lta bzhes bya ba/ yum shes rab
12a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgom las 'das pa sgrub rgyu med/ /mkhan po rnams kyi bdag nyid can/ /grub thob rnams kyi bla ma la/ /phyag 'tshal gnyis bral lta ba bshad/ /rang bzhin sgom rgyu med pa'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor sgom las 'das pa yin/ /dngos dang dngos min gnyis dang bral
12a7(rgyud 'grel): de phyir kun rdzob grub pa med/ /dngos po sgom med dngos med yin/ /rang bzhin dbyer med rgyu las 'das/ nam yang rang bzhin ? te/ zung 'jug dga' ba gnyis su med/ /dran pa dang bral dran med de/ /rnal 'byor pa yi 'khrul pa yin/ /shes rab thabs kyi zung 'jug la/ /rnal 'byor gzhan gyi dgongs pa
12b1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ dang po thabs ni bsgom pa'i phyir/ /mi rtog shes rab skad cig la/ /ma grub thabs kyang 'grub mi 'gyur/ /mthong min de ni bsgom pa min/ /gang zhig thabs ni sgom byed na/ /bla ma'i gdams ngag ldan pa yis/ /yang dag phyag rgya thabs nyid kyis/ /phra zhing rang bzhin rab rgyud/ /ye shes
12b2(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi bdud rtsi 'bab/ mtshon pa'i 'od gsal skad cig la/ /blo ldan brtan pa'i sems kyis bsgom/ /brtags pas ma grub rtogs bral yin/ /dper na 'gron po yul 'gro bzhin/ /chos sku'i mtshan mar sems gtad pas/ /rim gyis sleb pas de nyid min/ /sngar bzhin mtshan ma med
12b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bas/ /rnam rtog dang bral bde chen 'grub/ /sna tshogs pa yis rig pa rnams/ /rang rig gzhan gyis rig mi 'gyur/ /de rtogs nyin mtshan bde chen mnyam/ /gnyis dang gnyis med spangs gyur pa'i/ /gang la mi gnas rnal 'byor de/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa rtogs/ /de rtogs bdag
12b4(rgyud 'grel): med lta ba yin/ /rnal 'byor bde sdug gnyis dang bral/ /gnyis bral rnal 'byor shAM ti pa/ /rtogs pas phyag rgya chen po thob /bde sdug gnyis bral gyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon shAM ti pas mdzad ba rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ a saM band+ha driSh+Ti nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'brel med kyi lta
12b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhes bya ba/ 'brel med rgyun chad ye shes lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig dang rten pa'i tha snyad la/ /re zhig brten na 'jig rgyu med/ /'jig dang rten gyis ci zhig bya/ /de phyir 'jig rten pa yis ni/ rnam par bzhag pa yod min la/ /'jal byed tshad mar shes par bya/ /khyab bya dang ni khyab byed kyi/
12b6(rgyud 'grel): dbye ba'i dpe yi dbang du ni/ /nyi ma khyab bya zhes bya ste/ /'od zer khyab byar shes par bya/ /dper na 'o mar 'dres pa yis/ /mar ni dang por yod min te/ /khyab bya khyab byed thad min la/ /de dag 'brel ba yod min no/ me gi rgyu ni gang yin la/ /de la 'bras bu ji ltar 'byung/ me yi mtshan nyid sreg byed/ /de
12b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid khyab byed ces bya ste/ /khyab byar du ba yin par mthong/ /pa ni sangs rgyas khyab byed de/ /bu ni dam chos khyab byar gsungs/ /dper na bum pa'i me de ni/ /nang gsal phyir ni gsal mi byed/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas gsal byed me/ chos ni ji ltar gsal bar byed/ /dang po chos min sangs rgyas min/ /skye min la
13a1(rgyud 'grel): ni ji ltar 'brel/ /rgyu rnams 'dra ba'i 'bras bu 'byung/ /gsungs pa rgyu med 'bras bu med/ /khyab bya khyab byed ji ltar bsgrub/ /g.yo dang mi g.yo rnams kyis ni/ /rten 'jigs 'byung ba rnams kyi ste/ /'byung
13a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi mdza' dag rang mi sgrub/ /shing ni khyab bya yal ga dang/ /rtsa ba khyab bya ji ltar yod/ /bdag dang bdag gi rtog pa yis/ /ming dang ming can 'phros pas 'byung/ /dang po ming can ming zhe na/ /de ltar gang zhig ldog pa ni/ /khyab bya de
13a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin ldog pa'o/ /rten cing 'brel pas 'byung ba ste/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'gag par byed/ /cig la yang dag 'byung ba ni/ /byis pa rnams kyis smra bzhin byed/ /khyab bya ldog na 'gal ba med/ /de ltar de ni 'jig rten gyi/ /'jal
13a4(rgyud 'grel): byed tshad mar shes par bya/ /ji ltar ri bong? rwa co ni/ /brtags bzhin yod pa ma yin te/ /de bzhin du ni chos rnams la/ /gang zhig rtogs bzhin yod pa min/ /ba yi ra co ji ltar ni/ /shar dang nub ni de bzhin du/ /phrad par shes par mi
13a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur te/ /dpe ni de bzhin lta drug pa/ /phyi nang mu stegs rtags can dang/ /nang pa sangs rgyas nyan thos dang/ /a ti dang ni gcer bu dang/ /grub mdza' khyab 'jug tshangs skud can/ /phyi nang gnyis ni sgrub min pa/ /rnams la 'brel
13a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yod min la/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pa de yin te/ /de dang mi ldan gang zag ni/ /'jig rten 'das zhes mi bya'o/ /de yi dbang du byas nas ni/ /brtags pas khyab bya gang zag ni/ /bdag gzhan gang zag yod min no/ /bya ba mtho ris
13a7(rgyud 'grel): ngan song dang/ /khyab bya sems nyid gnyis su mthong/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa bzhin/ /bdag gir 'dzin pas 'khor ba ste/ /de nyid bral zhing bde gshegs te/ /chags pa zhe sdang rmongs pa dang/ /bral zhing rgyun chad mya ngan 'das/ /de ltar
13b1(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pas sangs rgyas te/ /gsungs pa de ni mi rigs so/ /'khor ba de ni mya ngan min/ /mya ngan 'das la mya ngan med/ /rig pa dang ni ma rig pa'o/ /gnas skabs rtog pa bcing bar byed/ /mi rtog bkrol bas gsungs pa ste/ /rtog pa
13b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams la khyad par med/ /yong 'gro dag ni byang chub la/ /nye ring tha snyad yod pa min/ /nyon mongs mun pa byang 'gyur la/ /mthong min de la yod min no/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni lung las gsungs/ /mdza' dbus med pa'i rgya mtsho ni/ /ji ltar yi
13b3(rgyud 'grel): dags skams par mthong/ /de bzhin ma rig mun pa yis/ /tshig pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas ni/ /yod pa min la mthong pa min/ /rdzogs chen po'i lung las ni/ /chos nyid bzhi 'am ma bcos pa/ /khyab byed de la 'byung ba yi/ /'gro
13b4(rgyud 'grel): thug? khyab byar gsungs pa'o/ /cung zad dge ba'i chos rnams la/ /sangs rgyas mi sgrub ci zhig byed/ /dper na dbus long skyes bu la/ /'bar ba'i rin chen lag mthil bzhag /mthong min de yis ci zhig bya/ /nang pa mu stegs dbang
13b5(rgyud 'grel): du ni/ /rang rig 'od gsal khyab byed de/ /rnam par rig pa khyab bya sems/ /dper na chu dang bsres pa yi/ /'o ma snod ni gcig pa ste/ /ji ltar chu ni lus byas nas/ /ngang pas 'o ma 'thung bar byed/ /de bzhin nyon mongs 'dres pa ni/ /ye shes
13b6(rgyud 'grel): snod ni gcig pa ste/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor rig pa 'thung/ /ma rig pa ni lus par byed/ /nang pa mu stegs rnams kyis ni/ /lta ba de ni gsungs pa'o/ /de la lan gyi dbang du ni/ /sangs rgyas lung las 'di ltar gsungs/ /byed po med la
13b7(rgyud 'grel): las kyang med/ /de dag med la khyab bya med/ /gsum med 'brel pa ji ltar bsgrub/ /phyi ni bden pa gal te yod/ /nang ni bden par rang bzhin no/ /gang zhig rtog pa phyi don la/ /de med gang zhig yod pa min/ /rang dang gzhan gyi rig pa min//
14a1(rgyud 'grel): de phyir khams gsum 'brel pa med/ /de phyir rig pa dngos po la/ /mtshan nyid yod pa ma yin no/ /dngos po rig min dngos min bzhin/ /skye min de ni bdag med pa/ /bdag med pa ni skye mi len/ /de ni kun rdzo pa mi
14a2(rgyud 'grel): rigs te/ /gal te rigs na don dam med/ /re zhig rgyu med skye ba med/ /'bras bu med la skye ba med/ /bdag la mi skye gzhan la min/ /gnyis la min phyir kun rdzob min/ /rang rig bde gsal khyab byed dang/ /rnam rig tsam du khams gsum
14a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /sems kyi 'dod pa khyab bya yi/ /dbang du bshad pa byas nas ni/ /nyan thos rnams kyi dbang du ni/ /kun bzhi rnam shes khyab byed la/ /nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong dang/ /rtogs pa rnams ni khyab bya'o/ /dper na nam mkha' khyab
14a4(rgyud 'grel): byed de/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang/ /sprin dang glog dang chu sogs dang/ /khyab bya mi 'gag yon tan bcu/ /de ltar dpe rnams gnyis yin te/ /tha snyad 'jal byed tshad mar shes/ /de la don dam 'jal byed kyi/ /tshad ma'i dbang du byas
14a5(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /gong ma'i dpe don rnam gnyis ni/ /kaM pa lo yi dgongs pa ni/ /phyi sgrub lus las gsungs pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas dang ni sgrub rnams kyis/ /nyams rang rig pa gsal bar gsungs/ /de las lung gi dbang du ni/ /chos kyi bdag
14a6(rgyud 'grel): ni yod min la/ /khams gsum thams cad stong pa ste/ /'dus byas thams cad rtag min gsungs/ /de rnams sems nyid rtog pa ste/ /rtog pa de nyid 'khor ba yin/ /gang zhig rtog med grol ba'o/ /chags pa zhe sdang nga rgyal dang/ /gzhan
14a7(rgyud 'grel): yang byis pa rnams kyis ni/ /'khor ba mya ngan 'das pas/ /chos rnams ji ltar gsungs pa ste/ /sems kyis rtogs par shes par bya/ /bzang dang ngan pa'i rtog pa la/ /khyad ni yod pa ma yin no/ /dper na shing chen ma la ni/ /khyad ni
14b1(rgyud 'grel): yod pa ma yin la/ /gang la reg pa tshig par byed/ /tsan dan ga bur la sogs kyi/ /'bar ba'i me yis de bzhin tshig/ /de phyir cung zad rtog pa ni/ /lta shes rnal 'byor pa yis spang/ /rigs pas brtags pas ma grub ste/ /dbang
14b2(rgyud 'grel): po'i yul la chags pa med/ /phyi nang sems la yong pa min/ /gzhan la gnas min bdag la min/ /dper na ma rtogs pa yis ni/ /ji ltar thog ni sprin las 'byung/ /de bzhin zhe sdang nga rgya la dang/ /nyon mongs la sogs sems
14b3(rgyud 'grel): las byung/ /bdag gi bdag nyid stong pa ste/ /dbang po rnams la rten yang med/ /de med sems ni yod min la/ /bems po 'brel pa ji ltar bsgrub/ /khyab bya dang ni khyab byed kyi/ /'brel pa ha cang ches pa ste/ /skad cig gcig kyang
14b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa med/ /nyams kyi dbang du byas nas ni/ /byams dang snying rje mdor bstan nas/ /ma grub pa yi sgo nas bshad/ /skad cig ma ni dang po la/ /zhe sdang skyes pa'i dus su ni/ /byams pa'i ming yang yod min la/ /byams pa skyes pa'i
14b5(rgyud 'grel): dus su ni/ /zhe sdang mun pa yod min no/ /de la rtog pa gsum yin te/ /de rnams sems las 'byung bar shes/ /sems nyid de ni don dam du/ /lung las gsungs bzhin yod min no/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ /sems nyid sgyu ma rmi lam
14b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dra/ /de yi don ni 'di lta ste/ /dper na gcig dang du ma ni/ /sems nyid rang bzhin chos rnams mthong/ /de dag sems nyid sprul pa ste/ /sems nyid med la spros pa med/ /dper na skar ma'i yon tan ni/ /snam bu yong la yon tan yong/ /de nyid
14b7(rgyud 'grel): med la yon tan med/ /gcig dang du ma rigs med la/ /snam bu don yod min no/ /de ltar dpe yi dbang du ni/ /sems nyid med la byams pa dang/ /snying rje btang snyoms dga' sogs ni/ /de dag yod pa ma yin no/ /de la rigs pa'i dbang du ni/ /rgyun
15a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig gam tha dang dam/ /rgyun ni gcig pa yin na ni/ /thog mar zhe sdang skyes pa na/ /byams pa phyi nas skye mi rigs/ /'on te byams pa sngon las ni/ /zhe sdang phyi nas skyes pa 'am/ /yang na de gsum dus mnyam
15a2(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /yang na las kyi 'bras bu yin/ /mi rtag rnams la 'brel par 'byung/ /dper na ras bal sa bon la/ /ras bal ji ltar dmar po 'byung/ /de bzhin skad cig gcig las ni/ /'byung ba'i phung po rnams las kyang/ /gzhan
15a3(rgyud 'grel): dag rnams la las kyis 'brel/ /ji ltar rigs pa yod pa yis/ /de bzhin rang re rang 'dus la/ /'brel pa yod par rig pa'o/ /byams pa'i dus su byams pa ste/ /rang 'dus 'byung ba zhe sdang la/ /ha cang skyon ni mi rigs so/ /
15a4(rgyud 'grel): lha sbyin byas pa'i las la ni/ /mchod sbyin la ni 'brel pa med/ /de bzhin zhe sdang byams pa la/ /'brel pa yod pa ma yin no/ /de ltar dgos pa mi rigs so/ /mi rigs pa ni ji ltar na/ /lha sbyin mchod sbyin rigs la ni/ /
15a5(rgyud 'grel): phan tshun 'brel pa med pa'i phyir/ /dper na ki pe'i? bar dag dang/ /nas dang 'bras kyi so pa bzhin/ /de bzhin skyes pa'i phung po bzhin/ /gzhan dag phung pos 'brel pa med/ /de bzhin zhe sdang byams pa la/ /'brel pa yod par mi rigs so/ /
15a6(rgyud 'grel): gal te sems nyid rgyun gcig na/ /'brel pa yod na rigs so zhes/ /dper na tsha grang bzhin du ni/ /phan tshun spangs pa'i 'gal ba yin/ /snga ma byams pa zhe sdang ni/ /rgyun ni gal te gsungs par rigs/ /grang pa yis na rig pa las/ /tsha ba'i
15a7(rgyud 'grel): ? pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de yi rgyu ni gzhan zer na/ /skad cig dang po'i gnas ni bsgrub/ /lus dang sems drag ma gtogs pa/ /gzhan yang gang zhig yod min la/ /rgyu zhes gang la dgag du med/ /gal te dus mnyam smras pas ni/ /de ni
15b1(rgyud 'grel): ? bar med pa 'chig /'gro la sems rgyud gnyis mi 'chang/ /de nyid nyams dang lung las gsal/ /de yi rigs pa 'di lta ste/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dag /brtan dang khyab dang g.yo ba yi/ /de rnams spangs pa'i gzhan ma ni/ /bdag
15b2(rgyud 'grel): dang skyes bu phung po sogs/ /mu stegs rnams kyis smras pa ni/ /sems ni spangs pa gzhan med de/ /de rnams sna tshogs mi rtag pa/ /gzhan rnams smras pas rtag pa'o/ /cha skyes pa la byams pa dang/ /snying rje la sogs rgyun chad pas/
15b3(rgyud 'grel): thog ma tha ma mi dmigs so/ /gal te rtag na 'di skyon te/ /sa bon myu gu dus gcig du/ /de phyir don dam 'jal byed kyi/ /tshang ma'i dbang du byas nas ni/ /'jig rten khyab bya khyab byed dang/ /dpe don rgyu dang 'bras bu dang/ /'brel pa la
15b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs skad cig kyang/ /ma grub par ni gsungs pa'o/ /ma grub pa yi rigs pa ni/ /dang po me dang du ba ni/ /gnyis kyi 'brel pa ma grub ste/ /sreg byed gsal pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /du ba mun pa mi rigs/ /rigs nas gsal ba med
15b5(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /me la skyon ni 'gel bar byed/ /gang nyid pa me yin na/ /mi rigs pa yi gsal bskyon/ /bud rgyu med la me med pa'i/ /me ni shing la mi gnas so/ /de phyir 'brel pa yod min no/ /yang na bdag nyid gcig pa dang/ /de las byung ba'i
15b6(rgyud 'grel): 'brel pa ste/ /de dag yod pa ma yin no/ /bdag nyid gcig pa'i 'brel yod na/ /phan tshun dag la ba'i skyon yin no/ /mes ni gsal bar byed pa bzhin/ /du bde bzhin thal ba'i skyon/ /de las 'byung ba'i 'brel yod na/ /mes ni sreg par byed pa la/ /
15b7(rgyud 'grel): du bas de bzhin bseg par thal/ /du ba nag pa de bzhin du/ /me yang nag par thal pa'i skyon/ /de phyir 'brel pa yod min la/ /dper na snam bu snal ma la/ /ji ltar 'brel pa yong min la/ /snam bu min la snal ma min/ /snal ma yin la snam bu
16a1(rgyud 'grel): min/ /snam bu yin na thag pa min/ /thag pas ji ltar snam bu'o/ /de dag phan tshun 'gal ba yin/ /chos dang sangs rgyas 'brel pa med/ /dang por chos min sangs rgyas min/ /sangs rgyas yin na chos
16a2(rgyud 'grel): min no/ /bskur pa min la ma skyes so/ /ma skyes pa la 'brel ba med/ /de bzhin pha dang bu la ni/ /lung dang rigs bzhin bshad par bya/ /rlung gi shugs can 'khor lo la/ /shar nub ji ltar 'grub pa med/ /pha dang bul 'brel pa yang//
16a3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin yod pa ma yin no/ /gal te kun rdzob bden pa la/ /'di lta'i skyon ni yod min no/ /de la bdag ni kaM pa la'i/ /med pa'i rigs pa 'di yin no/ /yod pa skye min yod pa'i phyir/ /dper na yod pa'i bum pa la/ /skyes bu'i rtsol
16a4(rgyud 'grel): bas skye mi nus/ /med pa de bzhin skye min te/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu med pa'i phyir/ /dper na me long sbu bzhin no/ /de bzhin yod dang med pa yi/ /rang las ma yin gzhan las min/ /sa skyes rang bzhin bdag nyid med/ /pha dang bu yang ji
16a5(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'grub/ /de dag grub pa med pa ni/ /pha dang bu yi tha snyad med/ /de yi tha snyad dbang du ni/ /dang po bu ni ma grub pa'i/ /pha yi tha snyad ji ltar 'byung/ /bu ni ma grub dus su ni/ /dus kyi mtshan nyid ma grub po/ /de phyir pa yi tha snyad dang/ /bu yi
16a6(rgyud 'grel): 'brel pa ga la yod/ /gal te gzhan dag dgongs pa ni/ /rigs pas brtags na ma grub bzhin/ /yod med 'brel pa yod par 'dod/ /de la bdag gi dgongs pa ni/ /de la bdag nyid gcig pa 'am/ /de las 'byung ba'i 'brel pa yod/ /bdag
16a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid gcig pa'i 'brel pa med/ /pha yi ngo bo ma grub phyir/ /de las 'byung ba'i 'brel pa ni/ /dper na mar ni 'o ma las/ /ji ltar 'byung yang shes par bya/ /khyod kyi 'du byas gang smras pa/ /skye 'jig gnas so rim pa las/ /'on te so sor
16b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'o/ /de las skyes pa'i gnas su ni/ /'jig dang gnas pa yod min no/ /de dag med pa'i skye ba med/ /'brel pa ji ltar grub pa'o/ /gal te gnas pa'i rang bzhin ni/ /so sor gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /'brel pa ji ltar 'grub pa'o/ /dngos po
16b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ni ma grub na/ /pha zhes bdag su ga la rung/ /skad cig dang po pa yis ni/ /nus pa dngos med de las ni/ /de nyid la ni bu zhes ni/ /tha snyad mi 'grub zhe na ni/ /de phyir gnyis ni ma grub na/ /de dag nyid kyis 'grub pa med/ /rgyu lta pha zhes
16b3(rgyud 'grel): ma grub kyang/ /'bras bu bu ni grub po zhes/ /med pa yod par thal ba'i skyon/ /don byed tshad ma yod pa'i skyon/ /de phyir khyab bya khyab byed dang/ /'di yi skabs su grub pa med/ /de dag ji ltar ma grub pa/ /'brel pa de ni grub min no/ /skad cig de bzhin
16b4(rgyud 'grel): grub pa med/ /dper na myu gu sa bon bzhin/ /myu gu med pa'i skyon la ni/ /gang la bltos nas sa bon bzhag /myu gu la bltos smra zhe na/ /myu gu 'byung ba'i dus su ni/ /sa bon de ni grub pa med/ /sa bon 'byung ba stobs med pa'i/ /nus
16b5(rgyud 'grel): pa 'bras bu skogs pa'o/ /de phyir sa bon ma grub ste/ /med pa de ni ji ltar 'brel/ /yod pa de ni 'brel lo zhes/ /yod pa de ni ther zug bstan/ /dngos po can la 'bras bu med/ /khyab bya khyab byad ji ltar grub/ /ma grub pa ni dngos med de/ /kha dog
16b6(rgyud 'grel): dbyibs ni yod min no/ /de dag med pa de ltar gyis/ /dus kyi skad cig ma grub bo/ /'das pa'i dus na ma 'ongs pa/ /ma grub bdag ni ma yin no/ /dpe dang de bzhin don la ni/ /khyab byed bdag gi gang zag gi /brtag pa de ni byed pa po/ /khyab bya mtho
16b7(rgyud 'grel): ris ngan song la/ /bdag nyid gcig pa'i 'brel pa 'am/ /de las 'byung pa'i 'brel pa yod/ /de las 'byung ba'i 'brel yod na/ /rtag pa byed pa'i ming can rnams/ /mtho ris ngan song bden pa min/ /rtag pa byed par thal ba'i skyon/ /gal
17a1(rgyud 'grel): te ci phyir zhe na ni/ bdag nyid sa ni gcig pa'i phyir/ /dper na snam bu bum pas ni/ /mi rtag par ni bshad pa bzhin/ /dbang po'i don ni dngos po ste/ /bum pa'i gzugs ni yod par mthong/ /med pa'i gzugS
17a2(rgyud 'grel): ni mthong min te/ /de phyir gzugs mthong bum pa bzhin/ /de ltar smas pa mi rigs pa/ /bum pa dang ni dbang po dang/ /gcig gam 'on te mi gcig pa/ /gal te de nyid mi gcig na/ /dbang po de ni 'brel med la/ /bum pa de ni mthong
17a3(rgyud 'grel): min la/ /gal te de dag gcig pa ste/ /dbang po med la bum pa ma ni/ /bdag nyid gcig pa'i 'bral pa med/ /gal te dbang po med la ni/ /bum pa de ni yod ce na/ /de la de dag gcig pa med/ /mi gcig pa ni 'brel med do/ /
17a4(rgyud 'grel): de las 'byung ba'i 'brel zhe na/ /rtag par bdag nyid byed par/ /mtho ris ngan song 'byung bar thal// /mtho ris ngan song de dag kyang/ /rtag par byed pa po las ni/ /'byung bar thal ba'i skyon yin no/ /gal te 'brel pa med na yang/ /rtag
17a5(rgyud 'grel): pa gcig pu yin zhe na/ don 'di sems can rnams kyis ni/ /gzhan don byed dam mi byed do/ /de ltar mi byed ce na ni/ /rdo dang khyad par med par thal/ /gal te don ni byed do zhes/ /rim gyis byed dam gcig car byed/ /de ni rim gyis
17a6(rgyud 'grel): byed ce na/ /rtag par nyams par thal ba'i skyon/ /cig car byed do zhe na ni/ /bdag cig skyes pa'i dus su na/ /'gro drug thams cad skyes par thal/ /de bzhin rga shi skye 'gag sogs/ /ci rigs rnams dang 'brel par bya/ /de
17a7(rgyud 'grel): sra? mu stegs rnams kyis ni/ /bdag med 'brel med lta ba 'dri/ /thams cad mkhyen pa rigs kyi bu/ /phung po 'brel med bstan pa ste/ /phung po 'di la bdag med na/ /ji ltar 'gro 'od rgod pa dang/ /du dang rol mo khro ba sogs/ /
17b1(rgyud 'grel): de ? bdag cag rnams la ni/ /rnam rtogs 'byung ste sgrol bar 'dod/ /phung por bdag ni yod min la/ /theg pa chen po'i rigs can ni/ /bdag med 'brel ba ji ltar rigs/ /bdag ni phung po 'di la ni/ /mu stegs yod pa ma
17b2(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /yod pa dang ni med pa dang/ /de dge gnyis ni smra mi bya/ /bdag nyid yod par smra ba yi/ /med par de ni mi rigs so/ /gal te yod na 'di rnams la/ /gnas pa ji ltar mi mthong ngo/ /skra dang pags pa sen mo dang/ /mgo dang
17b3(rgyud 'grel): sha dang rus pa la/ rkang dang chi la dang chu ba dang/ /mkhris pa dang ni rgyu ma las/ /lag pa rkang pa la sogs la/ /phyi nang rnam pa gnyis su ni/ /lta zhing bdag med mi mthong ngo/ /de la mu stegs 'dri ba ni/ /bdag med mi gzugs ji ltar
17b4(rgyud 'grel): 'brel/ /theg pa chen po'i rigs can ni/ /'brel med de la 'di ltar smra/ /sha yi mig ni ha rdang mes/ /ye shes mig gis ma mthong/ /kha dog dbyings dang gnas 'brel pa'i/ /de na ji ltar mthong pa'i rigs/ /de la mu stegs
17b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dri ba ni/ /'o na de ni med do zhes/ /theg pa chen po'i rigs can smra/ /med pa'i tshig ni smra ba yis/ /yod pa de ni mi rigs so/ /slar yang 'di ltar med nani/ /tshang ma 'di rnams ji ltar mthong/ /sa dang me dang chu dang rlung/ /de
17b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams la brten? rol mo'i tshogs/ /de phyr me ni mi rigs so/ /yod pa de yang ma grub po/ /de la mu stegs 'di ltar smra/ /'o na de rten gang yin na/ /theg pa chen po'i rigs can no/ /bdag med 'brel med ji ltar smra/ /rten ni gang
17b7(rgyud 'grel): yang yod min no/ /mu stegs rgol ba 'di skad smra/ /ji lam stong pa'i nam mkha' la/ /theg pa chen po 'di skad smra/ /rtags can de ni de bzhin smra/ /mu stegs pa ni 'di skad smra/ /'o na dngos po can rnams ma/ /du dang rgod pa
18a1(rgyud 'grel): rol mo'i tshogs/ /ji ltar shes par bya'o zhes/ /theg pa chen po 'di skad smra/ /sgyu ma dang ni rmi lam dang/ /cho 'phrul gzhan du shes par bya/ /mu stegs pa ni mi skad smra/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i rmi lam dang//
18a2(rgyud 'grel): theg pa chen po 'di skad smra/ /rgyu ma nam mkha' lta bu la/ /rmi lam de ni 'dzin byed pa/ /cho 'phrul de ni brdzun pa'o/ /yul dang yul can 'dus byas te/ /brjod bya'i yul ni ma grub bo/ /rtags can ji ltar phyag gis sogs/ /
18a3(rgyud 'grel): slar yang kun rdzob mthong ba ri/ /don ni dam pa de bzhin no/ /kun rdzob ming can 'di lta ste/ /'di na bdag dang gzhan dag dang/ /sems dang skyes bu phung po dang/ /chor ba dang ni byed pa po/ /nor dang bu dang lang tsho sogs/ /de
18a4(rgyud 'grel): dag don dam 'brel pa med/ /gang la bdag med gzhan med la/ /sems med skyes bu yod min la/ /byed po med la chor ba med/ /nor dang lang chos dregs pa sogs/ /don ni dam par shes par bya/ /de dag rnams la 'brel
18a5(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ /don ni yod pa ma yin te/ /kun rdzob la ni brten byas nas/ /nyon mongs pa yis dbang thob pas/ /'khor ba du ni grangs med 'khyams// /sdug bsngal nyon mongs thob pa yis/ /'gro ba'i lam ni shes min la/ /
18a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten pa bzhin 'khor bar 'khor/ /dper na nyin mtshan nyi zla bzhin/ /don ni dam par byang chub sems/ /rten med pa la rang bzhin med/ /thams cad stong pa la gnas med/ /spros pa rnams kyi 'brel pa ste/ /don dam byang
18a7(rgyud 'grel): chub tshad nyid la/ /'jam pa ma yin mkhregs pa min/ /dro ba ma yin gsil ba min/ /rigs bya rigs min 'dzin pa med/ /phra dang rags pa ma yin te/ /byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid do/ /mu stegs mthong min sgom las 'das/
18b1(rgyud 'grel): dngos med mthong min bsgom med pa'i/ /gsal dang mi gsal nyid dang bral/ /'brel med de ni byang chub sems/ /thams cad rgya mtsho'i chu bur 'dra/ /snying po med la sku ba bzhin/ /rtag min bdag med sgyu ma ltar/ /ri dags smig rgyu lta bu la/ /rdzas bus
18b2(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin du ni/ /tshe 'phrul rnams kyis bkang pa la/ /dbus su 'khor lo stong grub min/ /de ltar don dam kun rdzob ni/ /de dag ji ltar 'brel pa grub/ /sems rtog rmi lam lta bu la/ /sems ni yod min nam mkha' ltar/ /re zhig sems
18b3(rgyud 'grel): nyid ji ltar 'brel/ /slob dpon kaM ba la'i 'brel med kyi lta ba 'di/ /rnal 'byor rtogs tshad kyi lta ba rdzogs so// //bla ma ratna pha las rang 'gyur du bsgyur ba'o// //*/ rgya gar skad du/ a sa shAnda? sarga driSh+Ti
18b4(rgyud 'grel): rA ma/ bod skad du/ zhen med kyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ yum phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /srid pa gsum gyi dgyus sa 'di/ /dpa' bo bdag gis dkyus sar thungs/ /bde gshegs lnga yi rta la zhon/ /rta ba bdag 'dra'i dpa' po ni/ /
18b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten na ni yod ma yin/ /rgyugs pas dug gsum rta rgod btul/ /lha chen bzhi yi sga yis gtad/ /shes rab thabs kyis srab du bcug /rta ba bdag 'dra'i dpa' bo ni/ /'jig rten na ni yod ma yin/ /rgyugs pas dug gsum rta
18b6(rgyud 'grel): rgod bdul/ /nyon mongs bcu yi ba sos gcig byin/ /lta bug dbus kyi bres su bcug /rgyugs pas dug gsum rta rgod btul/ /rta ba bdag 'dra'i dpa' bo ni/ /'jig rten na ni yod ma yin/ /bla ma lung gi ral gri thogs/ /tshangs pa'i gan
18b7(rgyud 'grel): drug sted du 'gro/ /rta pa bdag 'dra'i dpa' bo ni/ /'jig rten na ni yod ma yin/ /brgyugs pas dug gsum rta rgod btul/ /phyogs bcu dag tu rgyugs pas kyang/ /de yi rta rjes mngon pa med/ /rta pa bdag 'dra'i dpa' bo ni/ /'jig rten na ni
19a1(rgyud 'grel): yod ma yin/ /rgyugs pas dug gsum rta rgod thul/ /slob dpon kaM pa las mdzad pa/ /zhen med kyi lta ba zhes bya ba rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ shU n+ya tA ka tu Na drishti nA ma/ bod skad du/ stong nyid snying rje'i lta pa zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa
19a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi gtsang ba yi sred pa dang/ /'jig rten pa yi spyod pa dang/ /rnam pas dpyad cing bltas pas na/ /dngos po stong pa nyid du snang/ /kye ma snying rje Da ma ru/ /sgra sgrogs pa ni ngo mtshar ?/ /Arya de ba dmigs med pa'i/ /
19a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po'i srid la doms pa med/ /gang du yid dang rlung dag dang/ /dbang po gnas pa yod min na/ /bdag ni gang du 'gro ba dang/ /gang du gnas pa ma shes so/ /kye ma snying rje Da ma ru/ /sgra sgrogs pa ni ngo mtshar che/ /Arya de ba dmigs med pa'i/ /rgyal po'i srid la
19a4(rgyud 'grel): doms pa med/ /zla ba las ni zla ba yi/ /'od zer yongs su gsal bar 'byung/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin ni/ /de nyid du ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /kye ma snying rje Da ma ru/ /sgra sgrogs pa ni ngo mtshar che/ /Arya de ba dmigs med pa'i/ /rgyal po'i srid la doms pa med//
19a5(rgyud 'grel): A rya de ba thams cad sbyang/ /sbyad pas rang bzhin dmigs med 'gyur/ /kye ma snying rje Da ma ru/ /sgra sgrogs pa ni ngo mtshar che/ /A rya de ba dmigs med pa'i/ /rgyal po'i srid la ngoms pa med/ /stong nyid snying rje'i lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon Arya de ba nas brgyud pa/ slob
19a6(rgyud 'grel): dpon tsa ta bas mdzad pa rdzogs ho// //rgya gar skad du/ tsat+ti ratna drishTi nA ma/ bod skad du/ sems nyid rin chen gyi lta bzhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag nyid bde gshegs khyab 'jug dang ni lha chen tshangs pa rnams/ /a ti gcer bu
19a7(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma dang ni grub mdza' i ngo bo dag /bdag ni dpa' bo chen po 'jig rten gsum na gcig bu yin/ /'jig rten pa ni rmongs pas mi rtogs gti mug dra bas bcings/ /bdag ni dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum na gcig bu yin/ /srid pa bdag ste srid bar rol pa bdag gi ngo bo nyid
19b1(rgyud 'grel): gar byed mnyam nyid klong du 'gran zla med pa'i rnal 'byor gnas/ /bdag ni dpa' bo chen po 'jig rten gsum na gcig pu yin/ /'jig rten pa ni rmongs pas mi shes gti mug dra bas bcings/ /skyes pa bud med dag tu snang yang bdag gi rnam 'phrul yin/ /srid pa chags pa
19b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig pa de yang bdag gi rnam 'phrul yin/ /bdag ni dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum na gcig pu yin/ /'jig rten pa rnams rmongs pas mi shes gti mug dra bas bcings/ /bla ma slob ma bdag nyid bshad par byed pa bdag nyid/ /dpe don bdag nyid sdug bsngal skyob par byed
19b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bdag nyid yin/ /bdag ni dpa' bo chen po 'jig rten gsum na gcig pu yin/ /'jig rten rnams ni rmongs pas mi shes gti mug dra bas bcings/ /kha dog du mar snang ba de yang bdag gi ngo bo yin/ /kan smra bar byed pa gcdig kyang du ma'i ngo bo yin/ /bdag ni
19b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo chen po 'jig rten gsum na gcig bu yin/ /'jig rten rnams ni rmongs pas mi shes gti mug dra bas bcings/ /bdag ni dpa' bo chen po 'jig rten gsum na gcig bu yin/ /sems nyid rin chen gyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ka na pa nas rgyud pa/ slob
19b5(rgyud 'grel): dpon d+he ta nas mdzad pa rdzogs sto// //*//rgya gar skad du/ tat+twa aSh+Ta ka drishTi nA ma/ bo d skad du/ de nyid brgyad kyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor 'das dngos po'i rtag pa 'di/ /grub pa med chu zla bzhin//
19b6(rgyud 'grel): kun rdzob tha snyad brten byas nas/ /de nyid brgyad kyi lta ba 'chang/ /dri bcas sems ni 'khor ba ste/ /tha snyad dang bral mya ngan 'das/ /dper na sprin med nam mkha' ni/ /gang la mi gnas phyag rgya che/ /in+d+ra bo d+hi smra bar byed/ /'khor pa mya ngan 'das pa dang/ /bod dang sdug
19b7(rgyud 'grel): bsngal gang zhig kyang/ /sems kyi rtog pas sreg par byed/ /dper na ga bur me bzhin no/ /de phyir rnal 'byor rtog pa ni/ /chung yang kun tu sba bar bya/ /sems dang sems nyid dngos po'o/ /dngos po thams cad mi gnas pa/ /dper na dri za'i grong khyer bzhin/ /mi gnas mi
20a1(rgyud 'grel): 'das 'khrul snang yin/ /in+d+ra bo d+his? gnyis med smras/ /de ni dbus ma'i de nyid de/ /bdag med chos kyang rang bzhin la/ /thog mdza' i rang bzhin de nyid do/ /bde gshegs lta ba de nyid do/ /stong nyid don yang shes par bya/ /dngos med dran med
20a2(rgyud 'grel): blo 'das smra/ /dper na nyi ma zla ba dang/ /nam mkha' skar ma'i 'khro lo dang/ /sa dang chu dang rgya mtsho dang/ /phyogs dang mtshams dang de yin la/ /ri rab la sogs 'khrul snang yin/ /in+d+ra bo d+hi smra bar byed/ /de rnams gang yang grub pa med/ /gnyis med don la nyams
20a3(rgyud 'grel): len gyis/ /de nyid brgyad kyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon in+d+ra bo d+hi sa mdzad pa rdzogs sto// //rgya gar skad du/ cit+ta kalpa pa ri ha ri drishti nA ma/ bod skad du/ /bod skad du/ sems nyid kyi rtog pa 'joms pa'i lta ba zhes bya ba/ gshin rje gshed la phyag
20a4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /mar sar mgo bo bcad pa yis/ /sta re'i so ni 'chag par byed/ /spal pas glang po med par 'gyur/ /kye ma shing thun dgod par byed/ /kyi mdo mtshar me go kye/ /sems la the tshom ma byed cig/ mtshar na a ba d+hA tI ba/ /sems la rtog pa ma byed
20a5(rgyud 'grel): cig /kho yis ma bshad 'di ma go /nam mkha' las ni me tog 'byung/ /kye ma ngo mtshar me go kye/ /sems la the tshom ma byed cig/ mtshar na a ba b+hU ? ba/ /sems kyi the tshom ci zhig bya/ /kye ma mo gshan bu skyes na/ /khri yang gar ni byed par 'gyur/ /ras
20a6(rgyud 'grel): bal dkon par thob 'gyur bas/ /nam mkha' i gos can du bar byed/ /kye ma ngo mtar me go kye/ /sems kyi the tshom ci zhig bya/ /mcher na a ba d+hU tI ba/ /sems la the tshom ma byed cig /kye ma glang chen khril 'dug /sbrang bu gnyis kyis 'degs par byed//
20a7(rgyud 'grel): dmus long lam ston ngo mtshar che/ /lkugs pas gtam ni smra bar byed/ /kye ma ngo mtshar me go kye/ /sems la the tshom ma byed cig /mtshar na a ba d+hu tI pa/ /sems kyi the tshom ci zhig bya/ /kye ma spre'u ltogs pa ni/ /? kham gyis za bar byed/ /kye ma
20b1(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi nyams myong ni/ sus kyang brjod par nus pa yin/ /kye ma ngo mtshar me go kye/ /sems la the tsom ma byed cig/ mtshar na a ba d+hU tI pa/ /sems kyi the tshom ci zhig bya/ /sems nyid rtog pa 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba/ kaM ka la dang/ me kha la nas brgyud pa
20b2(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon lakshmI yis gsungs pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ sho ka b+hi no d+ha drishti nA ma/ bod skad du/ mya ngan gyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gi phung po ngan pa 'di/ /bla ma haM dang bral 'gyur bas/ /snang ba rnams ni nub
20b3(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /bla ma dam pa'i mya ngan gyis/ /ma hi la dag mya ngan gnas/ /bla ma ye shes mig med pas/ /phyogs mtshams gang yang mthong ba med/ /bla ma dam pa'i mya ngan gyis/ /ma Ni b+ha dra bdag ni du/ /snying rje rje chung gdugs dkar phub/ /rnal 'byor rgyal
20b4(rgyud 'grel): po mdzes pa'i bdag/ sdig can gang gis spyan drangs nas/ /ma Ni b+ha dra re ma dga' / /grub thob brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yis/ /nam mkha' i dbyings su dkyil 'khor bzhangs/ /de dbus bla ma nor bu bzhugs/ /sems kyis gdud pas bdag lus bsregs/ /d+ha ma d+hU ma
20b5(rgyud 'grel): re ma dga' / /skad cig gcig la kA ma ru/ /blo ma longs spyod thim par mthong/ /sna tshogs skad cig gcig la ni/ /rnam par dngos med mthong 'gyur bas/ /bla ma gshegs pas te ma dga' / /nor dang lang tsho thams cad spangs pa srid la chags pa'i nga rgyal
20b6(rgyud 'grel): bcom/ /nor bu bzang po ma hi la/ /d+ha ma d+hU ma bdag cag gi /dpal ldan bla ma med 'gyur bas/ /phyogs mtshams thams cad mun pas khebs/ /kye ma gnyis med Da ma ru/ /nam mkha' i dbyings su gdud byas nas/ /gdud bas rnal 'byor bdag cag gis/ /bla ma'i
20b7(rgyud 'grel): gdud thal lus la byugs/ /de nyid spyi bor bsgom byas nas/ /snying rjes b+ha hu ri bdag gis bsad/ /bdud kyis khyer ba'i b+ha ri khyod/ /bla ma'i sku dgra khyod yin no/ /bdag cag khyod kyi mun las bsgribs/ /bdag cag rnams kyis mdun ma byas/ /dug po gyon zhing sgra rnams breD?
21a1(rgyud 'grel): dbyug pa dang ni thod pa thogs/ /mya ngan lus rnams ked rus 'byung/ /kye ma 'byor mi rtag to/ bdag cag rnams kyis b+ha hu ri bcom/ /de b+hi b+han+tu ko ti nas/ /sri mi la'i gnas chen phyed dang gsum/ /bla ma nag po'i lta ba yis/ /rnal
21a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor dag po ma hi las/ /mkha' 'gro drug cu rtsa bzhi skrag?/ sro ma? li bshags b+ha hu ti bsad/ /kye ma bla ma'i sku dag bskal/ /bdag cag mkha' spyod gnas su 'gro/ /mya ngan gyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ma hil nas brgyud pa/ d+he'u ris mdzad pa rdzogs
21a3(rgyud 'grel): sho// //rgya gar skad du/ tsit+ta mA tra drISh+Ti nA ma/ bod skad du/ sems tsam gyi lta ba zhes byaba/ dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha' zhes bya'i gru la ni/ /lus ngag yid gsum dkrugs shing byas/ /bla ma'i man ngag gsung
21a4(rgyud 'grel): shing btsugs/ /sems kyi brtan pas gru mnan zhing/ /pha rol sgrol bar byas pa las/ /'di las thabs gzhan rnal 'byor la/ /yod ba dag ni ma yin no/ /'di las rnam rtog yod min la/ /dkrugs shing dag kyang yod ma yin/ /rlung gnyis kyis ni ded nas
21a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro /thabs kyis de ru rtol te gnas/ /gru 'di myur bar ma bskyod na/ /bar nas choms po'i 'jigs pa che/ /rgya mtsho'i chu rlabs g.yos pa yis/ /srid gsum g.yang sar rnal 'byor lhung/ /sems kyi gru 'di brtan gzung ba/ /pha rol dag tu sgrol ba
21a6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /'di las thabs gzhan rnal 'byor la/ /yod pa dag ni ma yin no/ /ma rtogs pa ni thams cad kyis/ /bye brag tu ni smra bar byed/ /rtags shing lta drug thams cad kyang/ /kru 'di gcig tu 'dus par 'gyur/ /sems kyi gru 'di brtan gzung la/ /pha
21a7(rgyud 'grel): rol dag tu bgrod par bya/ /'di las thabs gzhan rnal 'byor pa/ /yod pa dag ni ma yin no/ /mdza' gcig nas ni dngos byas nas/ /gru 'di gyen la bgrod par bya/ /sa ra ha ni sma bar byed/ /sems ni stong nyid gnas su thim/ /sems kyi gru 'di brtan bzung la//
21b1(rgyud 'grel): pha rol dag tu mgrod par bya/ /'di las thabs gzhan rnal 'byor pa/ /yod pa dag ni ma yin no/ /sems tsam gyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon sa ra ha nas brgyud pa/ slob dpon mi tri pas gsungs pa rdzogs ho// //rgya gar skad du/ kA ru Na ka pA la
21b2(rgyud 'grel): tsarya(rgyud 'grel): drishti nA ma/ bod skad du/ snying rje spyod pa thod pa'i lta ba zhes bya ba/ dpal bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkhar gser gyi yu ba can/ /gdugs steng mgo la 'dzin nas gnas/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro gshegs par mdzod/ /d+ha ri mkha' 'gro ma yi sras/ /ci
21b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir zhe na de yi ni/ /drin gyi rnal 'byor bsam pa grub/ /stong nyid kham phor lag tu thogs/ /thabs kyi khu bas bkang byas nas/ /sangs rgyas zhing du phyin te gnas/ /srid gsum bcing ba'i brtsad nas bcad/ /mkha' 'gro ma brgyad rtag tu bsungs/ /sgo bcu dag ni
21b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya yis btab/ /d+ha ri ka ni smra bar byed/ /kun la khyab kyang gcig gis ni/ /de yi mtshan nyid rtog med na/ /bdag gis ji ltar bstan par byas/ /d+ha ri mkha' 'gro ma yi sras/ /ci phyir zhe na de yi ni/ /bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub par 'gyur/ /snying rje thod pa
21b5(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'i lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon d+ha ri ka ba nas brgyud pa/ slob dpon sa ra b+ha khas mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ a sam+b+hand+ha driSh+Ti nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'bral med kyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo//
21b6(rgyud 'grel): nor dang lang tsho rigs kyis dregs/ /bdag nyid 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus/ /de dag gcig kyang snang ba med/ /khyod dang nga zhes bya ba ni/ /phrad par 'gyur ba ga la yod/ /rgya mtsho'i nang du gru zhig pa/ /slar yang 'du bar 'gyur ram ci/ /pha dang ma dang bu che
21b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /gar la blta phyir 'dus pa 'dra/ /gar mkhan song nas ltad mo gyes/ /khyod dang nga zhes bya ba ni/ /phrad par 'gyur ba ga la yod/ /rgya mtsho'i nang du gru zhig pa/ /slar yang 'du bar 'gyur ram ci/ /tshong 'dus dag gam srang ngag gam/ /ri'am thad?
22a1(rgyud 'grel): ngam chu 'gram du/ /lus ngag gang gi sar 'jig pa/ /bdag gis de ni ma shes so/ /khyod dang nga? zhes bya ba ni/ /phrad par 'gyur ba ga la yod/ /rgya mtsho'i nang du gru zhig pa/ /slar yang 'du bar 'gyur dam? ci/ /ka na pa ni smra bar byed/ /bdag pos?
22a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di las rtogs pa med/ /'gro 'ong byas pas bdag nyid bcom/ /khyod dang nga zhes bya ba ni/ /phrad bar 'gyur ba ga la yod/ /rgya mtsho'i nang du gru zhig pa/ /slar yang 'du bar 'gyur ram ci/ /slob dpon nag po pas mdzad pa/ 'brel med kyi lta ba zhes bya ba rdzogs sho//
22a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ta thA ga tA drishti nA ma/ bod skad du/ de bzhin nyid kyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin nyid kyi shing dung la/ /rtsa ba yal ga dmigs pa med/ /ma tog 'bras bu rtag tu 'byin/ /kye ma shing 'di ngo mtshar
22a4(rgyud 'grel): ltos/ /sa bon myu gu med pa yi/ /'bras bu dpag tu med pa 'byung/ /de yi rang bzhin ji lta bu/ /nam mkha' chan bar bcug nas ni/ /khu tshu da dag gis gcog pa bzhin/ /shing de gcog pa de dang 'dra/ /rtsa ba dag kyang yod 'gyur la/ /yal ga dag kyang yod pa yi/ /shing
22a5(rgyud 'grel): gis nam mkha' khyab par snang/ /kye ma ltos dang shing 'di la/ /nam mkha' khyab pa ngo mtshar che/ /kye ma shing 'di ngo mtshar ltos/ /sa bon myu gu med pa yi/ /'bras bu dpag tu med pa 'byung/ /de bzhin nyid kyi shing 'di yi/ /mtshan nyid khyod kyis rtogs pa med/ /bdag
22a6(rgyud 'grel): gis bstan par rtogs par 'gyur/ /d+ha ri pa ni smra bar byed/ /'di la le lo byas pa yi/ /mdza' ru phyin par ma gyur pas/ /bar du phud bar ma byed cig /kye ma shing 'di ngo mtshar ltos/ /sa bon myu gu med pa yi/ /'bras bu dpag tu med par 'byung/ /de bzhin nyid
22a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon d+ha ri ka pas mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //thig le bcu drug gi nyams len zhes bya ba bzhugs/ /*/ /rgya gar skad du/ Sho Da ? bind+hu b+ha bA na nA ma/ bod skad du/ thig le bcu drug gi nyams len nas bya ba/
22b1(rgyud 'grel): yum bdag med ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang lus khong stong bsam byas nas/ /mtshan med a ba d+hu tI la/ /'khor lo bzhi ni bsam par bya/ /yi ge drug cu rtsa bzhi ni/ /sprul ba'i 'khor lor byin gyis brlabs/ /bde gshegs lnga dang lha mo rnams/ /'dab brgyad pad+ma dgod par bya
22b2(rgyud 'grel): khams dang phung po dag pa'i phyir/ /dbyangs can bcu drug longs spyod bsgom/ /de rnams nyid 'gyur spyi bo ru/ /bdag nyid bsrung ba'i man ngag go /bcu drug thig le rab tu 'bar/ /rtsa brgyad thig le rgyu ba yin/ /bzhi po zhu ste rol pa gnyis/ /gnyis kyi phyed ni bdag med ma//
22b3(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug phyed phyed grangs yin no/ /ka nas brtsams nas ma yi bar/ /reg byed nyi shu rtsa lnga yin/ /ya nas brtsams nas ha yi bar/ /mi rigs ming can brgyad yin no/ /bsdus pa A phreng kA phreng gnyis/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lor bsam par bya/ /nyi ma'i 'od kyis dros tsam na/ /khang g?
22b4(rgyud 'grel): bsreg cing zhu bar bsam/ /chos kyi rim pa'i rjes 'brangs nas/ /ri bong can gyis rgyas par 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro longs spyod bdag thim nas/ /dga' ba'i bdag nyid skad cig la/ /dpa' rgyal snying rje chen po skye/ /yang dag zung 'jug grub pa yis/ /sgrib pa thams cad dag pa
22b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /skye 'gag med pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ /kaM ka li bdag grub pa thob/ /kye 'o ma yengs rnal 'byor pa/ /rang gi sems la nyams len gyis/ /slob dpon kaM ka li pas mdzad pa/ /'khor lo bzhi'i nyams kyi zhal gdams rdzogs sho// //
22b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ bAhya an+ta bod+hi tsit+ta band+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyi nang byang chub sems bcing pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /don dam kun rdzob byang chub sems/ /lhan cig skyes te mun bas bsgribs/ /kun tu skye ba'i nyams len
22b7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /bdag gis 'di ru bshad par bya/ /spyi bo'i gtsug nas bo la'i bar/ /sna tshogs rtsa ni bsgom par bya/ /de nas bde chen 'khor lo ru/ /sgo nga'i khog pa lta bu yi/ /byang chub sems la sems gtad nas/ /bo la'i rtsa la rgyal po tsam/ /gsal la sran rdog tsam du bsgom//
23a1(rgyud 'grel): bde chen sgo nga'i rtse la ni/ /byang chub sems ni 'jig par bya/ /lte ba'i bar du rnal 'byor kye/ /gnyis med bdud rtsis bkang byas nas/ /shes pa bde ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /sgom pa'i spyod yul phar mi spro/ /sems ni tshur la bkug mi bya/ /dper na sprul
23a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi mdud pa bzhin/ /sems ni rang grol gnas pa ste/ /dngos po'i bya ba bral 'gyur ba/ /rnal 'byor yid kyi zhen pa mchod/ /mi nA bdag gis rtogs pas grol/ /byang chub kyi sems bcing ba'i man ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon mi na bas mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //
23a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ bA yu tA twaM swa b+ha bA no ba de sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ rlung gi de nyid bsgom pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /g+ho ra kha ni ba lang bsrung/ /brdzi ba lang 'che bar byed/ /'tsho bar byed cing gnyid med 'gyur/ /nyi ma dang ni
23a4(rgyud 'grel): zla ba gnyis/ /ro gcig par ni 'dres bar 'gyur/ /g+ho ra kha ni sgra gcan gyis/ /nyi ma zes pa ngo mtshar che/ /gal te rgyab kyi sgal tshigs su/ /drag tu bcings pas rnal 'byor pas/ /skad cig tsam gyis khams su grub/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba gnyis/ /ro gcig par ni 'dres
23a5(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /g+ho ra kha ni sgra gcan gyis/ /nyi ma zos pa ngo mtshar che/ /shing bu gting du nub pa dang/ /pha bod gyen du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dga' bas bdag ni bskubs so zhes/ /g+ho ra kha ni smra bar byed/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba gnyis/ /ro gcig par ni 'dres par 'gyur/ /g+ho ra kha ni
23a6(rgyud 'grel): sgra gcan gyis/ /nyi ma zos pa ngo mtshar che/ /nor bu thams cad rdo rjes 'bigs/ /g+ho ra kha yi rnal 'byor ni/ /bla ma'i drin gyis grub pa yin/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba gnyis/ /ro gcig par ni 'dres par 'gyur/ /g+ho ra kha ni sgra gcan gyis/ /nyi ma zos pa ngo mtshar che//
23a7(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi de nyid bsgom pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon g+ho ra khas mdzad pa rdzogs ho// //rgya gar skad du/ bA yu tat+twaM b+ha ba nA ma/ bod skad du/ rlung gi de nyid bsgom pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dur khrod ma ni lhan skyes rtog pa
23b1(rgyud 'grel): med/ /phra zhing mi dmigs rang bzhin yid 'ong ba/ /pad+ma'i dbus 'gyur sna tshogs rol mdzad de/ /dus kyi stobs kyi dpa' bo gnyis med pa/ /nam mkhar khyab cing thim par dmigs pa med/ /mnyam pa'i bde rtogs skad cig gcig la ni/ /khams gsum g.yo zhing bde
23b2(rgyud 'grel): lta rtogs pa ste/ /bla ma'i bka' yis gang yang lhan skyes so/ /bla mas ma rtogs lhan skyes gzhan du min/ /yon tan rnams la nga rgyal ma byed kye/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i gnyid log myos 'gyur ba/ /dam tshig glang chen lta bur spyod/ /dbang po sgo dgu'i sngags kyi lam
23b3(rgyud 'grel): bkag pas/ /brtan pa'i bum pas de ni mya ngan 'das/ /pad+ma'i ge sar rlung gi 'byung 'jug 'di/ /brtan par bcings na mgon po 'chags par 'gyur/ /rlung nyid thim pas mi 'gyur kha dog med/ /'brel mer dran sems nyid ni stong pa la/ /sgom dang sgom rgyu bsgom
23b4(rgyud 'grel): bya de la med/ /g.yo ba'i sems nyid ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ /sems kyi rgyal po brten med mkha' la ldid/ /mnyam par non cig lus kyi 'khrul 'khor bya/ /sems nyid bde chen bkram pas mya ngan 'das/ /gti mug zhags pa bcad cing gzhan dag spongs/ /skad
23b5(rgyud 'grel): cig gcig la 'khor ba'i chags pa bral/ /de nyid bcings pas bya ba bral 'gyur ba/ /'gro ba drug du yang dag skye mi len/ gang zhig rtsa sgor ma yengs gnas pa des/ /drag po'i rkun mas de la 'jigs pa med/ /gang zhig brdzun pa rku brdzun ni mya ngan med/ /sngags nyid
23b6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi lus la gnas pa ste/ /bde ba thams cad rnal 'byor dran par gyis/ /bde ba rtogs pas rnal 'byor skyes 'gyur ba/ /khyim gyi bdag mo rang lus tshim gnas la/ /rlung gi sems nyid pad+ma'i chu dang 'dra/ /'byung ba rnams ni de yis myong 'gyur pas/ /de phyir g.yo ba'i
23b7(rgyud 'grel): sems la rnal 'byor pa'i/ /sgo dgu bkag nas nan tan gyis/ /rnal 'byor gyi ni gti mug bcad byas la/ /gnas kyi yon tan rtogs par chags med 'gyur/ /sprin ltar mi 'phrul rang bzhin kun brtags kyi/ /gti mug gnas kyi gti mug bsregs byas nas/ /lhan cig skyes
24a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas la rnal 'byor thim/ /thams cad nub pas steng 'og lam 'gags pas/ /gnas kyi nyams kyis 'khor ba mya ngan 'das/ /de ni rnal 'byor bla ma'i drin gyis rtogs/ /nyin mtshan bla ma spyi bor bsgom byas nas/ /lhan cig skyes ?
24a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid du gnas 'gyur ba/ /yang nas yang du nam mkha' i bdud rtsi rdzub?/ /rjes 'brang bkur sti dri med sku thob pas/ /ka ba gcig la gzhal yas sgo dgu ste/ /lam gyi rgyu lus bdag gis gcig tu rtogs/ /de yis bdud bzhi bar gcod sel bar 'gyur/ /de phyir dge sbyin khrims
