24a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs dgos mi 'gyur/ /dge sbyong chos smras lha nyid bsgom pa de/ /chos kyi ri ni sus kyang rtogs pa med/ /sku gsum brtan par 'dod na rnal 'byor kye/ /phyi nang byang chub sems kyi rlung nyid sgoms/ dug lnga'i yan lag bcad bas myur du ni/ /byang chub sems kyi lam la legs par
24a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jug/ rnal 'byor bstan pa thob ste skye mi 'gyur/ /rlung gi de nyid bsgom pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon tsor gyis mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skod du/ /badzra DA ki ni ni sh+yan+nA kra ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa/ rdo rje phag mo la phyag
24a5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro gzhu ru thogs/ /dngos po thams cad 'ben du btsugs /gnyis su med pa'i mnga' yis brgyab/ /sgom dang sgom rgyu dmigs pa med/ /bsnun pas skye ba dmigs ma gyur/ /bdag gzhan gnyis kyi mdza' yang bcad/ /gnyis su med pa'i mda' yis brgyal
24a6(rgyud 'grel): sgom dang sgom rgyu gnyis ka med/ /stong pa'i gzhu ni bkang byas nas/ /shog med mnga' ni rdeg par byed/ /bsad dang bsang bya gnyis ka med/ /gnyis su med pa'i mda' yis brgyag /sgom dang sgom rgyu gnyis ka med/ /nam mkha' i cho 'phrul chen po yis/ /chos nyid thams cad
24a7(rgyud 'grel): bsdus byas nas/ /gnyis su med pa'i mda' yis brgyab/ /sgom dang skom rgyu gnyis ka med/ /bi rlus 'di ltar 'khor byas nas/ /gcig nas nyi shu'i bar du ni/ /dngos po cing yang zhugs pa med/ /yi ge stong pa gsos su byin/ /gnyis su med pa'i mda' yis brgyag /sgom dang sgom rgyu
24b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ka med/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon pi rU pa nas brgyud pa/ slob dpon b+hi na pas mdzad pa rdzogs sho// ///rgya gar skad du/ tsa tu rlog b+ha bA na nA ma/ bod skad du/ rnal 'byor bzhi'i nyams len gyi thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo
24b2(rgyud 'grel): rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems dang sems nyid rgyu med de/ /bsgrub bya sgrub byed thig le'i ngo/ /'bras bu ma grub mya ngan 'das/ /dpal ldan dpa' bo yi ge med/ /lte bar gsang ba'i ge lar la/ a li kA li la brt+tn nas/ /rnal 'byor bzhi yi nyams len bshad/
24b3(rgyud 'grel): lte ba ye shes 'khor lo ru/ /rtsa ni brgyad kyi thog btab nas/ /A 'phreng kA phrer mnyam bsams nas/ /mkha' 'gro brgyad kyis me lce sbar/ /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni/ /nam mkha' i dbyings kyi 'od las ni/ /gnyis med zung 'jug 'jig byas pas/ /dpa' bo rnams kyi
24b4(rgyud 'grel): ? nas rgyu /de 'gag rnal 'byor mtshan ma med/ /brtan pa'i rnal 'byor grub 'gyur ba/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis lam thob/ /A li kA li'i rnal 'byor ro/ /a ho bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor ba/ /dngos dang dngos med bral 'gyur bas/ /phyi nang dug gi rnam pa sal/ rnal 'byor 'di ni
24b5(rgyud 'grel): brtan grub na/ /zla ba drug nas 'grub 'gyur ba'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam mo/ /de ni rig pa'i rnal 'byor ro/ /sems nyid gnas su pad+ma ni/ /mnyam pa nyid ni dmar por bsam/ /pad 'dab bzhi la thig le ni/ /dbus su rgyu med thig le yin/ /de dag rnams kyi kha rog ri/ /shar du dmar
24b6(rgyud 'grel): dang byang du ser/ /nub tu dkar dang lho ru gnag /sna tshogs 'od gsal dbus su 'gro/ /sngar bshad sngags dang bcas pa ni/ /bsgom na rnal 'byor dbang phyug de/ /skad cig gcig la rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /de ni mnyam nyid rnal 'byor ro/ /mi skyod chu dang rnam snang dang/ /phyi nang bdud rtsis yi ni/
24b7(rgyud 'grel): ? pa'i thabs kyis rnal 'byor kye/ tan+ti bdag gis grub pa thog/ /rnal 'byor bzhi'i nyams len ces bya ba/ slob dpon tan+ti pas mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du pradz+nyo pA ya bi ni sh? ba sa mud yaM nA ma/ bod skad du/ thabs dang shes rab gtan ula dab
25a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig sprin ltar rtog pa sel cing rang bzhin dri ma med/ /nang pa rnams kyi gzhan dang mi mnyam gnyis med chos sku de/ /gzugs ldan sna tshogs longs sku rang bzhin rnamS
25a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyur gyur pa/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sprul sku de la phyag 'tshal nas/ /lham mkhan rigs 'dzin bdag gzhan don du rnam par bsdu byas nas/ /ma rtogs sems can rnams la phan phyir ma lus de nyid ni/ /bdag gis bshad bya blo ldan rnams
25a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis gus pas mnyan par gyis/ /dngos po'i rtog pa la brten nas/ /dngos med bdag med yang dag 'byung/ /gnyi ga rtog par mnyam mod kyi/ /byis pa rnams la drang phyir gsungs/ /de la nyon mongs thams cad de/ /skye 'jig sdug bsngal de las 'byung/ /bdag
25a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gnyis kyi 'dzin pa yis/ /thar pa thob par mi 'gyur pas/ /de phyir dngos po spang bya zhing/ /dngos med la yang brten mi bya/ /rnal 'byor dngos po la brten na/ /'khor ba nyid las gzhan du min/ /phan tshun 'brel phyir de dag ma ni/ /de min bdag gzhan grub pa med/
25a5(rgyud 'grel): dper na nam mkha' i me tog bzhin/ /de phyir dngos dang dngos med ni/ /brdun pa'i cho 'phrul spang bar bya/ /rang bzhin ma grub dri ma med/ /de phyir pha rol phyin mar grags/ /khyab byed snying rje dbyer med de/ /rnal 'byor pa yi thabs yin/ /chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa ltar/ /thabs
25a6(rgyud 'grel): dang shes rab gnyis med pa/ /'dzin? bya 'dzin byed thog mdza' med/ /dri med dngos po'i mtshan ma bral/ /gnyis dang gnyis min zhi ba'i bdag/ de rnams la gnas bde pa'i mchog/ /rang rig ye shes chos kyi dbyings/ /zhi du la pha rol phyin ma yin/ /theg pa gsum dang sku
25a7(rgyud 'grel): gsum ldan/ /sngags ni 'bum sde grangs las 'das/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog phyag rgya dang/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten rnams/ /lha dang lha min brgya byin dang/ /mi dang yi dags dud 'gro sogs/ /dper na chu yi brlabs bzhin te/ /de las byung zhing thim par 'gyur//
25b1(rgyud 'grel): de phyir thabs dang shes rab kyis/ /gnyis med don ni bsgom par bya/ /mi mnyam pa yi sngags nyid kyis/ /stong nyid bsgom par mi bya zhing/ /de bzhin dngos po bsgom mi bya/ /de dag gnyis kyi 'dzin pa ni/ /mya ngan 'das kyang 'khor ba yin/ /de ni mi rtag spang byas pas /dmigs
25b2(rgyud 'grel): med stong nyid 'grub 'gyur ro/ /brjod bral nam mkha' i snying rje ste/ /de nyid yid bzhin nor bu ltar/ /'gro ba'i don ni byams pa yin/ /nam mkha' kun la khyab pa bzhin/ /gnyis med sems ni dga' ba yin/ /dngos dang dngos med gnyis dag la/ /bsgom pa'i btang snyoms de nyid ni//
25b3(rgyud 'grel): dngos med don dam bsgom par bya/ /bya ba dang ni byed pa po/ /bsgom dang bsgom rgyu gnyis ka med/ /sbyin dang sbyin bya gnyis ma grub/ /'dzin bya dang ni 'dzin pa po/ /brtags pas nyon mongs dngos po med/ /de nyid ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /byang chub sems ni grub 'gyur ro//
25b4(rgyud 'grel): chags pas bsgribs pas 'khor ba yin/ /sprin med na mkha' lta bu ni/ /rtog pa dang bral mya ngan 'das/ /de phyir sems ni brtan byas nas/ /blo dang ldan pas bsgom par bya/ /bla ma'i zhal gyi pad+ma las thob gdams ngag bris/ /bdag nyid grub pa gang zhig dge ba'i 'bras bu des//
25b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro drug nyon mongs 'dam las brgal phyir dri med pa/ /byang chub sems la gnas shing grub pa thob par shog /thabs dang shes gtan la phab pa'i dngos grub bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon tsam ris gsungs pa rdzogs ho// //rgya gar skad du/
25b6(rgyud 'grel): swab+hA ba a sid+d+hi nA ma u pa de sha/ bod skad du/ rang bzhin grub pa med pa'i gzhi'i man ngag ces bya ba/ rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo /e ma ji ltar mkhas pa yi/ /lha khang 'di ni bzhengs par bya/ /ka ba gcig la sgo dgu pa'i/ /shing mkhan gang gis khang
25b7(rgyud 'grel): par byas/ /ji ltar nam zhig lha khang der/ /'jig par 'gyur ba mi shes na/ /lha khang nang nas phug ron ni/ /gnas ni gang du tshol bar byed/ /ji ltar nam zhig lha khang der/ /'jig par 'gyur ba ma shes na/ /gang gis g.yogs shing zhal zhal byas/ /sgo rab
26a1(rgyud 'grel): bsdams pa de ltar na/ /ka ba srin gyis dros pa na/ /ji ltar nam zhig lha khang der/ /'jig par 'gyur ba ma shes so/ /gang gis g.yogs shing zhal zhal byas/ /lha khang nang nas phug ron ni/ /gnas ni gang du tshol bar byed/ /mar ngang sbrang rtsi'i
26a2(rgyud 'grel): bras? byin yang/ /rigs ? gyi ni spyod pa 'dra/ /de bzhin rdo rje 'gro bar byed/ /ji ltar nam zhig lha khang der/ /'jig par 'gyur ba ma shes so/ /lha khang nang de'i phug ron ni/ /gnas ni gang du tshol bar byed/ /sna tshogs mdog can phug ron ni/ /lha khang bum pa spangs nas ni//
26a3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' po'i sgo nas smra bar byed/ /ji ltar nam zhig lha khang der/ /'jig par 'gyur pa ma shes so/ /lha khang nang nas phug ron ni/ /gnas ni gang du tshol bar byed/ /lha khang bum pa spangs nas na?/ /dpa' bo'i sgo nas smra bar byed/ /sems kyi rnam 'phrul yin no zhes/ /'phags pa
26a4(rgyud 'grel): klu sgrub smra bar byed/ /rang bzhin grub pa med pa'i gzhi'i man ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ sha ? a k+Sha ra b+haTTa? sya sa dzwa tai ya b+ha ba na/ bod skad du/ rje btsun yi ge brgya pa'i sems dpa' gsum gyi bsgom/
26a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thabs/ /bla ma rje btsun rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyi lam/ /dge ba gsum gyi bdag nyid can/ /sku gsung thugs la phyag 'tshal te/ /blong man dang ldan sgrub brtson zhing/ /bla ma'i gdams ngag dang bral la/ /phan phyir sgrub thabs/
26a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum bsres tsam/ /oM shI badzra he ru ka sa ma ya ma nu pA la ya/ he ru ka twe no batiSh?/ Di Dho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nurak+to me? b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi ma pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsam me/ tsit+taM sh+re ya(rgyud 'grel): ku ru hUM ha ha ha ha ho:b+ha ga wAn/ badzra nA me muny+tsa/
26a7(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka badzrI b+ha ba ma hA sa ya satwa a hUM phaT/ /de la bsgom pa'i man dag ni/ /rang snying dbus gur phra ba yi/ /hUM gi dkyil du mthe bo tshad/ /TaM yig dkar 'od lta bu ni/ /de yi spyi bor gnas par bsam/ /hUM las byung ba'i 'od zer ni/ /ting 'dzin sems dpa' i
26b1(rgyud 'grel): snying gi yi/ /kha sbyor nam mkha' i dbus su ni/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /oM dang hUM gi sbyor pa las/ /pad+ma rdo rje rnam par bsgom/ /oM ni du pa'i mdog lta bu/ /dam tshig sems dpa' shes par bya/ /de gnyis nye bar sbyor pa las/ /a ni ye shes sems dpa' bsgom/
26b2(rgyud 'grel): dang bzhin 'od gsal stong pa nyid/ /thig le'i ngo bo yi ge med/ /gnyis dang gnyis min zhe ba nyid/ /nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med/ /'di lta bu ni mgrin par bsgom/ /gnyis kyang 'od zer gcig la spro/ /du ba me khyer mar me'i nad/ /mkha' snang dang ni smig rgyu'o/ /kha dog lnga
26b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'od zer ni/ /dbang po'i ? 'dra'i ngo bo nyid/ /rnam snang rdo rje nyi ma dang/ /pad+ma gar dbang rdo rje rgyal/ /rdor sems drug pa he ru ka /mgrin par bsdus te rnam par gnas/ /de ltar bla med rgyud rnams la/ /bsnyen pa'i sems dpa' gsum gyis ni/ /bsgrub pa'i gdam//
26b4(rgyud 'grel): dag zhal gyi lung/ /rim pa ji bzhin bshad byas nas/ /da ni rnal 'byor rgyud bzhin du/ /bsgrub pa'i zhal gdams bshad par bya/ /rnal 'byor rgyud du dpang thob pa'i/ /shes rab ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /bde par stan la 'dug byas la/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM gis sems
26b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' ni/ /gsum gyi don la 'di ltar brtsam/ /thog mar rdo rje skyil krung bcas/ /ting 'dzin rgyal bcas sna rtser lta/ /oM A:hUM ni brjod byas pas/ /gnas gsum du ni rnam par bsam/ /de nas so so'i kha dog gi /'od zer lcags kyu lta bu ni/ /spros pas
26b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas sras bcas rnams/ /mdun gyi nam mkhar sbyar drang zhir/ /de la lnga 'am bdun pas mchod/ /gsum la skyabs 'gro la sogs bya/ /de nas sprin bral nam mkha' la/ /gnas pa'i skar ma lta bu ni/ /yig rgya'i sngags ni 'di yin to/ /oM sh+rI badzra la sogs
26b7(rgyud 'grel): ba/ de nas 'di lta'i sngags brjod bya/ //oM dad swa b+ha bshud+d+ha:/ /sarba d+harma swa b+ha ba/ /shud+d+ho hi nas brjod byas pas/ /skar ma ltar gsal dag par bsam/ /oM dad tsit+ta pra ti be/ /d+hAM? dang ka ro mi brjod pas so// de la nam mkhar hUM pas ni/ /sna tshogs pad+ma bas
27a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /de nas yi ge oM gyis ni/ nam mkhar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /de yi steng du A brjod pas/ /rang nyid skar ma ltar gsal pa/ /zla pa'i steng du rnam par bsam/ /de rjes aM? dang bo d+hi tsit/ /ta dang utpa ta A
27a2(rgyud 'grel): min brjod de rang nyid yi ge A/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya/ /de yi rang bzhin gsal ba yi/ /byang chub kyi naM sems yin pas/ /'gro ba rnams la khyab byed cing/ /gsal bar byed pa'i bdag nyid bsam/ de rjes gsum pa yi ge ni/ ha zhes brjod pas skye
27a3(rgyud 'grel): po yi/ /tshangs pa'i bu gar hUM bsams la/ /de las byung ba'i rdo rje ni/ /rtse lnga pa ni rnam bsams te/ /brten byed sngags 'di brjod par bya/ /oM dang tiSh+Ta? badzra hUM/ /de zhu ba las rdo rje sems/ /bdag nyid 'di yi rigs can ni/ /yin par yang ni rab bsams te/ /zhal gcig
27a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar/ /phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/ de la shI ni dpal gyi don/ /de ni rdo rje sems dpar brjod/ /de ltar oM gyi yi ge yis/ /dam tshig sems dpa' rnam par bstan/ /yang na 'di ltar shes par bya/ /oM ni zla ba'i de steng du/ /hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa//
27a5(rgyud 'grel): de yi dbus kyi rtse mo la/ /dbyangs yig dang po las byung pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar/ /zhal phyag la sogs snga ma bzhin/ /de ni oM ste dam tshig sems/ /thog mar dge ba bkra shis pa'o/ /da ni ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' ni/ /sgom pa rnam par brtsam
27a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /oM dang ya ta ta ta thA/ /ga ta ta ? haM zhes pa/ /brjod pas mdun du hUM sngon bsam/ /de byung 'khor lo bcu drug rtsibs/ /de yi dbus 'byung rdo rje ni/ /rgyab ma? de dbus paM las kyang/ /sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /de yi ge sar steng du ni/ /hUM 'byung rdo rje sems//
27a7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bsam/ /de nas shar gyi 'dab ma la/ /tshangs yig dang po bris pa yi/ /mA me muny+dza'i sngags brjod pas/ /rang gi sa bon las byung ba'i/ /mi skyed mgon po bsam par bya/ /rang gi sa bon las byung ba'i/ /rin chen 'byung ldan g.yas 'dab la/ /oM dang badzra satwa
27b1(rgyud 'grel): te/ no pa tiShtha brjod pas so/ /oM dad dri Dho me b+ha ba/ /brjod pas rgyab dkyil pad 'dab la/ /sa bon las byung 'od dpag med/ /g.yon gyi pad+ma'i 'dab ? la/ /oM dang su to? Sh+yo me b+ha pa/ /brjod pas don grub sa bon las/ /me yi phyogs ki 'dab ma la/ /rnam snang yi ge dang bcas
27b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ /brjod pas rang gi sa bon las/ /rdo rje sems ma sku mdog dkar/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yon du gzigs/ /phyag gnyis dgu? brten gtso dang mtshungs/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje 'bar/ /bden bral oM dang su poSh+yo/ /me b+ha ba brjod rigs
27b3(rgyud 'grel): can ma/ /sa bon las byung sku mdog ser/ /phyag g.yon sngar bzhin g.yas ?/ /rin chen 'dzin cing g.yon du gzigs/ /rlung oM sarba sid+d+hommi?/ /pra yats+tshe brjod chos ma dmar/ /g.yas pad g.yon pa snga ma bzhin/ /g.yon du gzigs te dbang ldan du/ /rig byed
27b4(rgyud 'grel): tshig gi dang ba dang/ /sarba karma su tsam/ /tsit+ta? sh+re ya(rgyud 'grel): ku ru brjod/ /sa? bon las byung las ma ni/ /ljang ser sna tshogs rdo rje ?/ /phyag g.yon mthun la g.yon du gzigs/ /yUm?  bzhi'i dbu rgyan rigs kyi bdag/ de rjes 'khor lo'i rtsibs la ni/ /dbang ldan las
27b5(rgyud 'grel): brtsams g.yon skor du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa/ /sems dpa' bcu drug ris bzhin bskyed/ /hUM ha ha ha ha swob+ha?/ /ga bAn badzra satwa ni/ /kun la khyab par byed pa'i tshig /ma ni 'dren ba'i don yin te/ /me ni bdag tu rnam par bshad/ /muny+tsa 'dzin par brjod
27b6(rgyud 'grel): cig pa'o/ /de phyir bdag ni zung la drongs/ /khyad par byung ba rdo rje sems/ /sku mdog ljang gu g.yon du gzigs/ /g.yas pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /g.yon pa dril bu dkur brten te/ /pad+ma'i gdan la brten pa'o/ /badzrI las rdo rje rgyal po ser/ /phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yon lcags kyu/
27b7(rgyud 'grel): kha cig g.yas pa lcags kyu ste/ /phyag g.yon dkur ni brten pa 'chang/ /sa byung chags pa sku mdog dmar/ /g.yas ? g.yon ni gzhu 'dzin pa'o/ /stwaM las legs pa ma rgad mdog /skyabs sbyin g.yas la g.yon dkur brten/ /lha 'byung rdo rje rin chen ser/ /dpang
28a1(rgyud 'grel): bskur phreng ba gnyis kyis 'dzin/ /ga las rdo rje nyi ma dmar/ /snying gar phyag gnyis nyi mar 'dzin/ /ban las rgyal mtshan nam mkha' i mdog/ yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan ni/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni 'dzin pa'o/ /ma byung bzhungs?  sund+da? ri//
28a2(rgyud 'grel): mdog can rgyal mtshan so yis ni/ /phreng bas mtshan pa 'dzin pa'o/ /hA las ches ni dkar dmar mdog/ g.yon gyi pad sdong g.yas kyis 'byed/ /sa 'byung rnon po gur gum mdog/ phyag g.yon po ti g.yas ral gri/ /ma lus byung ba'i rdo rje rgyu/ /sku
28a3(rgyud 'grel): mdog ser la chos 'chad rgya/ /ya las rdo rje 'od mdog dmar/ /g.yon du g.yas pas lce 'dzin pa/ /sa las rdo rje las ljang ser/ /phyag gnyis rdo rje rtse gsum pa/ /gang stabs kyis ni spyi bor 'dzin/ /twa las bsrung ba sku mdog ser/ /gnyis kyis rdo rje go cha
28a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin/ /twa byung rdo rje gnod sbyin nag/ phyag gnyis kyis ni zhal phyogs su/ /mche 'dzin bdud rnams 'jigs byed rgya/ /a las rdo rje khu tshur dkar/ /rdo rje 'ching byed gnyis kyis 'dzin/ /de ni hUM gi rang bzhin can/ /ting 'dzin sems dpa' shes par bya/ /a ni
28a5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems dpa' ste/ /de yi sbyor ba bshad par bya/ /phyag rgya snga ma la gnas nas/ /rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya las/ /'od zer spro ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /oM sh+rI badzra satwa dang/ /sa ma yo haM zhes brjod pas/ /dam tshig sems dpa' bdag nyid bsam//
28a6(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya stwaM zhes brjod pas/ /rang mdun nam mkhar zla dkyil la/ /gnas pa'i ye shes sems dpa' dgug /yang ni sa ma ya staM zhes/ /ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes 'phreng/ /de yang mdun gyi nam mkha' la/ /zla steng a ni dkar po yi/ /ngo bor zhugs pa'i ye shes
28a7(rgyud 'grel): sems/ /bkug ste gtso bo'i thugs kar bstim/ /yang na phyag rgya snga ma yis/ /'di lta'i rdo rje sems dpa' dgug/ a ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ /hUM ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /de yi dbus kyi rtse mo la/ /oM ni ye shes sems dpa' ste/ /de nyid rdo rje sems dpas par bshad/ /rtse
28b1(rgyud 'grel): mo bzhi la rigs bzhi ste/ /mtshams bzhir lha mo rnam pa bzhi/ /'od kyi tshul du rnam par gnas/ /de nas zla ba rdo rje la/ /rdo rje hUM ni oM la ste/ /de la rtse bzhi'i 'od dbus la/ /mtshams kyang dbus la thim pa dang/ /de ni ting 'dzin sems dpa' la/ /thim par gyur par rnam pas
28b2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /de ni dam tshig sems dpa' la/ /de yang gnyis med don du bshad/ /de rjes yi ge hUM gyur pas/ /rdo rje lce ni rdo rje yi/ /'od zer spro bar rnam bsam bya/ /de yis phyi nang dag byas nas/ /bdag nyid la ni dbang bskur te/ /de rjes bzlas pa ci nus bya/ /bzlas pa'i rig
28b3(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di lnga ste/ /oM sh+rI badzra satwa sa ma ya ma nu pa la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dri Dho mi b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+te me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hiM? me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me/ tsit+ti sh+re ye:ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho:b+ha ga bAn/ badzra satwa mA me
28b4(rgyud 'grel): muny+tsa/ badzrA b+ha ba/ ma hA sa ma ya satwa a:// //nges ni dam tshig bsrung bar gsungs/ /yi ge brgya pa btus pa yis/ /sgo nas sems dpa' gsum gyi don/ /sgrub thabs dge pa gsum ldan pa/ /rnal 'byor rgyud dang mthun par bstan/ /da ni
28b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i rgyud gsungs pa'i/ /sems dpa' gsum gyi sbyor ba brtsam/ /thog mar rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis/ /phung po lnga yi nga rgyal bya/ /de rjes sngags ni 'di ltar brjod/ /oM ma Ni d+ha? ri badzri Ni/ ma hA pra ti sa re/ rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// //
28b6(rgyud 'grel): lus kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom byas la/ /de rjes byams sogs dran byas nas/ /mdun du lam skyes gru bzhi ste/ /de dbus sna tshogs pad+ma bsam/ /de steng oM las byung pa yi/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam/ /utpal phyag rgyas bkug pa yi/ /utpal rigs
28b7(rgyud 'grel): brgya bsam par bya/ /phyag rgya de ni dam tshig gi /sems dpar yang ni rnam par bshad/ /de rjes ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /sngags 'di yis ni dgug par bya/ /oM e hye hi b+ha ga ba ti/ pra sA d+hi ci d+ha yaM ku ru a/ pu dzaM? grah+NaM/ a na sana? hi to b+ha ba/ 'di brjod aM ku'i 
29a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya yis/ /ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang bya/ /nga ni ting 'dzin sems dpa' yi/ /sbyor pa 'di ltar shes par bya/ /oM b+ha ga ba ti sa ma ye shwa ri sarba bud+d+ha ma te/ ta re a tiSh+Tha nAny+tsa me ku ru swAhA/ /taM yig hUM gis brkyang pa las//
29a2(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i sgrol ma ljang gu ni/ /zhal gsum phyag drug spyan gsum ste/ /mi bskyod pa yid bu rgyan can/ /rgyan rnams kyis ni legs par spras/ /g.yas zhal dkar la g.yon zhal gnag/ g.yas gsum phyag mtshan rim par ni/ /mi 'jigs sbyin dang mda'
29a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ni/ /rdo rje rtse lnga rnam par 'dzin/ /g.yon gsum rim bzhin sdigs mdzub dang/ /gzhu dang utpal shes par bya/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du ni/ /pad+ma'i steg rgya'i bzhugs stabs kyis/ /mkha' lding lnga la brten pa'o/ /dbus kyi mkha' lding dkar
29a4(rgyud 'grel): po ste/ /lag pa gnyis kyis dum pa 'dzin/ /g.yas su nag dang ser po ste/ /g.yon pa ljang dang dam? po yang/ /rim pa bzhin du shes par bya/ /de ? ting 'dzin sems dpar bshad/ /rang lus la ni rnam dag don/ /yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /oM
29a5(rgyud 'grel): dkar spyi po'i gtsug tu ste/ /mgrin par A:yig dmar po bsam/ /hUM nag snying ga'i pad+ma ru/ /de ltar rang lus rnam bsam bya/ /sa bon rnams la legs bskor pa'i/ /yi ge brgya pa bzlas par bya/ /oM b+ha ga ba ti tA re/ sa ma ya ma nu pA la ya/ tA ra ka
29a6(rgyud 'grel): twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dri Dto me b+ha pa/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba / sarba sid+d+hi me pra yats+tsha / sarba karma su tsa mo? / tsit+taM shi ya:ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga pa tI badzra tA re mA me mu ? tA ra/ b+ha ga ba ti many+dzu? sa ma ya sa twa a :// //
29a7(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar mi skyo'i par du bzla/ /smon lam rgya chen btab byas la/ /oM gats+tsha twaM bud+d+ha bi Sha yaM bun ra ga ma na yats+tsha/ dza:hUM baM ho:zhes bya ba'i don ni oM khyed ni sangs rgyas gnas su gshegs/ /slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol zhes pa'o/ /hUM gis dgug cing dza?
29b1(rgyud 'grel): gis gshegs/ /bgyis bcings shing ho:sa dgyes pa'o// //de ltar bya ba'i rgyud la ni/ /brten pa'i sems dpa' gsum don bshad/ /nga ni rgyu yi theg pa las/ /grags pa'i sems dpa' i don bshad bya// //yang na gcig kyang ldan pas
29b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /'jig rten chos la blo ldog ste/ /rnam par dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ /bde bar stan la 'dug nas su/ /'di ltar bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba tsam/ /dang por maN+Dal la sogs bsham/ /sems bskyed sngon du song pa yis/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro/ skyabs
29b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi dam pa bla med pa'i/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /zhes brjod lus yid sbyor ldan bya/ /nges ni byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /dge bsnyen du ni mi 'gyur te/ /de rjes byang chub sems bskyed de/ /bdag dang tha mi dad pa yi/ /byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang/ /btang
29b4(rgyud 'grel): snyoms kyang ni bsgom par bya/ /de yi rjes la bla ma la/ /dad pa bskyed de dang pa bsgom/ /de ltar byas bas 'bras bu ni/ /'khor ba las ni grol 'gyur te/ /bar chang rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo?/ /gdams ngag don ni rnam pa gnyis/ /bsgom dang de bzhin bzlas pa'o// //
29b5(rgyud 'grel): sgom don dang po mal nas langs byas te/ /de rjes dkon mchog gsum ni rjes dran bya/ /de nas bdag nyid thog mar khrus byas te/ /rang gi lag mthil g.yon par oM las ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de yi steng du h+rI:/ /de las byung ba 'o ma'i mdog can gyi/ /bdud
29b6(rgyud 'grel): rtsi'i chu bsam oM h+rI:swAhA yi/ /byin gyis brlab bya chu dang rang nyid la/ /dbang bskur tshul du sngags 'di brjod par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+rI ye hUM/ /zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod rang nyid spyi bor gtor/ /bsgrub pa'i gnas la sogs la gtor
29b7(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /de rjes yi ge gsum gnas ni gsum du dgong/ /spyi bor tshangs pa'i yi ge dkar po ste/ /mgrin par ye shes yi ge A(rgyud 'grel): dmar bsam/ /khro yig sngon po snying ga'i dbus su dgod/ /de ni sems dpa' rnam pa gsum du bshad/ /de yi man ngag khro yi?
30a1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma ste/ /a ni zla ba rig byed dang po'i tshig/ bcom ldan shAkya thub pa yin zhes bsam/ /de ni gnas gsum bsrung zhing dag pa'o/ /de rjes shar gyi phyogs su kha bltas la/ /gser sogs snod du chu ni gtsang ma ltam/ /shar gyi phyogs su
30a2(rgyud 'grel): nam mkhar hUM yig bsam/ /de gyur las byung pad+ma'i ge sar la/ /a las zla ba de yi rigs skyes mtshon/ /de steng rnam snang yig gyur nyi dkyil 'khor/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor lta bur rnam par bsam/ /zla dbus bcom ldan shAkya thub chos 'chad rgya/ /nyi 'od thub dang
30a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med par bsam/ /de yi rjes la gsang sngags 'di brjod de/ /oM na mo ta thA ga ta sya phaT phaT/ mriShaM an N+Na pa ni/ pra yats+tsha me swA hA/ /me tog re blangs sngags re brjod byas pas/ /sngar bshams chu la nyi shu rtsa gcig dor/ /yang na rig pa de nyid brjod
30a4(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ /snga ma'i me tog re re blangs nas kyang/ /maN+Dal la sogS sa phyogs gtsang mar ni/ /bcom ldan shAkya thub la dbul bar bya/ /de rjes dpal ldan yi ge brgya pa ni/ /mi skyo'i yid kyis ci nus bzlas par bya/ /oM b+ha ga bA ti mu na ye sa ma ya ma nu pA
30a5(rgyud 'grel): la ya/ shAkya mu ni twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dri Dho me b+ha ba/ su toSh+yo me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+himma? pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su ci me/ tsit+taM sh+re ye:ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga bAn shAkya mu ne mA me muny+tsa/ bud+d+ha b+ha ga bAn/ mahA sa ma ya satwa A:// //
30a6(rgyud 'grel): de ni thog mar gti mug yi ge la/ /bar du sgra gcan tha mar dbyangs yig las/ /yi ge a ste sems dpa' gsum du grags/ /de rjes dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo byas te/ /dza:hUM baM ho:sa gshegs su gsol bar bya/ /rig gnas lnga la mkhas pa rnams kyis kyang//
30a7(rgyud 'grel): spyad par rtogs dka' rdo rje 'chang gi dngos/ /rtsa ba'i grub chen lU yi nas brgyud pa/ /gdams pa phyi nang gsang ba'i sems dpa' gsum/ /sgrub thabs slob ma mchog gi gsol btab ngor/ /bla ma'i gdams pa bum rgyun legs 'thungs pa/ /brtson shugs
30b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i snying rjes sna drangs te/ /nyams chung bzung phyir rin chen phreng bar bsdebs/ /ji srid thub pa'i bstan pa gnas bar du/ /mdza' kho ba phyogs su dar cing rgyas gyur cig/ rje btsun gyi yi ge brgya pa'i sems dpa' gsum gyi sgom pa'i thabs/ /slob dpon nA ro
30b2(rgyud 'grel): pas mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ ratna mA la nA ma/ bod skad du/ rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgon po kun gyi bdag nyid ni/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin ma grub pa'i/ /bla ma rjes la phyag 'tshal nas/ /rin chen
30b3(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba bshad par bya/ /sgom dang sgom rgyu rnal 'byor gyi/ /rtog pa de ni bden pa min/ /bden gnyis grub pa med pa'i phyir/ /sgom la brten par mi bya'o/ /chos kyi dbyings dang de bzhin nyid/ /gang yang rang bzhin rtogs pa de/ /zhi ba dang rig gnyis su med/ /bla ma dam
30b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dgongs pa'o/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i shes rab ni/ /phyag rgya bla ma'i gdams ngag bcas/ /phra zhing rang rgyud ye shes kyi/ /ma rdzogs pa yi skad cig la/ /yang dag grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /bla ma gnyis pa'i dgongs pa'o/ /rnam par rtog pa bden pa min/ /rtog med rjes su
30b5(rgyud 'grel): 'brel pa yi/ /rim gyis rnam rtog rnams dang bral/ /? gu'i sprul 'dzin te/ /rnal 'byor rtog med bde ba che/ /bla ma gsum pa'i dgongs pa'o/ /ma rig pa yi snang ba 'di/ /rang rig ye shes rtogs 'gyur na/ /rmi lam nyin mo'i snang ba rnams/ /mnyam
30b6(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid du don rtogs pas/ /tshor ba tshor byed gnyis su med/ /gnyis dang gnyis min spangs pa yi/ /gang la mi gnas rnal de/ /shes rab pha rol phyin ma yin/ /bla ma bzhi pa'i dgongs pa'o/ /bdag nyid shi li'i dgongs pa ni/ /dmigs med snying rje'i
30b7(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa/ /gnyis 'dzin gnyis med don rtogs can/ /zab mo'i chos nyid la gnas pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i gnas thob 'gyur/ /rtog pa dang dral dri ma med/ /rnal 'byor rol pa'i lta spyod ni/ /chos rnams rang bzhin rtogs gyur na/ /bde dang sdug bsngal gnyis
31a1(rgyud 'grel): med rtogs/ /de ltar rtogs pas rang grol 'gyur/ /rin chen phreng bzhes bya ba/ slob dpon si la ya lis mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ ku ru Na a b+heSh+ThA na b+ha ba rna nA ma/ bod skad du/ snying rje sgom pa'i byin brlabs
31a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba/ bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma'i byin brlabs thob gyur pas/ /skad cig gcig la mnyam par rtogs/ /rgyud sde rnams la mi gsal bas/ /snying rje sgom pa'i nyams len bshad/ /rnal 'byor de nyid dran byas nas/ /mtshan
31a3(rgyud 'grel): bcas mtshan med rang bzhin gyi/ /snying ga'i dbus su thig le ni/ /mun pa'i rab rib bsal gyur pa/ /zla rtse'i steng du bsam par bya/ /rang bzhin bdag po rol mdzad pa/ /drag po'i gzi brjid phreng bar brgyan/ /he ru ka dpal mgon po che/ /bdud bzhi
31a4(rgyud 'grel): las ni rnam par rgyal/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i dur khrod gnas/ /bde ba chen po dga' ba'i mchog/ ro myangs longs sku byang sems ldan/ /yi ge rgyu med yang dag gsungs/ /lha sgom phreng sngags mtshams gcod dang/ /sbyin bsreg klog sogs dgos
31a5(rgyud 'grel): ba med/ /rtog pa rnams ni sdang byas nas/ /'jigs med snying rje bskyed byas la/ /slob ma dang ni bdag nyid kyi/ /snying gar bsgoms pas ye shes ni/ /thams cad mkhyed dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /de nyid rtogs pas yang dag phrad/ /rdzu 'phrul
31a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dang sa bcu thob/ /nam mkhar spyod mi snang 'grub/ skye ba dran zhing rang sems rtogs/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar ni/ /rang rig gzhan rig thams cad kyi/ /mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba ltar/ /sna tshogs sems kyi rang bzhin gyi/ /nyams
31a7(rgyud 'grel): skyes rnal 'byor grub pa thob/ /snying rje sgom pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon te lo pas mdzad pa rdzogs ho?// //rgya gar skad du/ ma hA yA na a ba ta ri nA ma/ bod skad du/ theg pa chen po'i gnas lugs gtan la 'bebs pa zhes bya ba/
31b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /theg pa chen po'i bdag nyid ni/ /bde chen rgya mtsho'i bdud rtsi yis/ /mdza' dbus mnyam pa'i tshad nang sel/ /dga' ba che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /theg pa rnams kyi mchog gyur pa/ /shes dang shes bya'i ye shes ni/ /gzhan la phan
31b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir rang la ni/ /bdag gis gtan la dbab par bya/ /'dzin dang 'dzin bya'i rig pa ni/ /so so'i las dang rnam par ldan/ /dngos po gzugs can 'ching ba'i rgyu/ /phyi dang nang gi gzugs med pas/ /de nyid ma grub gnyis med/ /gang zhig 'dzin pa gzugS
31b3(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ /'dzin pa med pas de nyid do/ /de ni dam pa'i ye shes te/ /lhun grub kha dog dbyibs dang bral/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis rang rig rtogs/ /gang zhig rig pa stong pa de/ /stong pa min la rig pa min/ /'di dag thams cad rang 'gag go /bden gnyis bral
31b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /stong nyid rig pa'i lta ba 'di/ /snying rje chen po'i shes rab po/ /rdzogs pa'i rim dang lha sgrub sogs/ /rgyud rnams kun las gsungs pas kyang/ /de nyid don dam ye shes min/ /don dam ye shes stobs kyis ni/ /rdzogs pa'i lha ni grub bar
31b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /de phyir bdag ni rngo khand+his?/ /blo dman rnams kyi yul min ba/ /don dam kun rdzob gnyis med bshad/ /theg pa chen po'i gnas lugs gtan la 'bebs pa zhes bya ba/ /slob dpon chen po rdo khand+his mdzad pa rdzogs sho?// //
31b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ tsit+tasya saM pra d+ha ya byA pa? naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ sems la gros 'debs zhes bya ba/ yum rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo 'byung po rnams kyis bskor byas pa'i/ /dpal chen he ru ka yi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ /khams
31b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum sems can rnams kyi sgrib pa bsal pa'i phyir/ /bdag gzhan rnams kyi don du sems la phan pa'i gros 'debs bya/ /'dod pa pad+ma'i chu ltar rig nas sems nyid kyi/ /bla med lta bsgom 'bras bu khyod kyis dran par gyis/ /de yis dpal ldan zhal
32a1(rgyud 'grel): mthong gnyis med don rtogs te/ /de phyir nyams len brtson pas phyag rgya chen po thob pa'i phyir/ /sna tshogs gzugs sgra sogs la ma chags ma zhen na/ /'khor bar mi gnas rgyu med mya ngan 'das pa thob/ /pad+ma bzhi mdzas
32a2(rgyud 'grel): mngon sum mig gi dbang po dang/ /sgra brnyan rna ba nyams shing sems nyid rmongs 'gyur pas/ /kye ma zhe sdang phrag dog dug ni ci phyir 'dzin/ /skra dkar gnyer ma la sogs khyod kyis mthong gyur kyang/ /yongs su 'chol ba'i zhen pas nyes pa skyon gyis
32a3(rgyud 'grel): bcings/ /rab 'bring tha ma'i spyod lam 'dod chags zhe sdang gis/ /mkhas btsun mngon pa'i nga rgyal 'khor ba'i gnas su 'khyam?/ /yi dags lnga min dud 'gro la sogs sdug bsngal mang/ /de phyir phrag dog spangs la rang nyid dmigs par gyis/ /lha dang
32a4(rgyud 'grel): klu dang mi rnams bde bar grangs mang thob gyur kyang/ /sems kyi rgyal po 'dod pas mi doms ngo mtshar che/ /gnyen bral sdug bsngal mchi ma rgya mtsho bas kyang lhag /dur khrod gnas kyi keng rus bsags pa ri dang mnyam/ /'dod pa'i rma phyung 'khrugs pa'i khrag ni
32a5(rgyud 'grel): mtsho dang 'dra/ /kye ma sems kye rgyal po'i rnal 'byor ci phyir srid mi spong/ /mi lus 'dod bya khom ldan yang dag thob byas nas/ /dngos po rnams ni chu bur lta bur brtags byas la/ /khyod kyis bdag gzhan rnams la ji srid phan par gyis/ /'khor ba'i 'dam la
32a6(rgyud 'grel): bying 'gyur thar pa shin tu dka' / /dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du 'bod tsha grang sreg cing bcir/ /sred pas phrag dog yi dags bkres skom skye 'gyur la/ /snying rje'i gnas thob dud 'gro phan tshun zhe sdang che/ /lha yang gnas nas lhung 'gyur mi rnams sdug bsngal
32a7(rgyud 'grel): mang/ /de ltar 'gro pa'i sdug bsngal khyod kyis dran byos la/ /don dam kun rdzob tha snyad sna tshogs spang bar gyis/ /longs spyod sprin chung? glog ltar rnam par g.yo bar 'gyur/ /tshe ni rlung gis bskyod pa'i pad+ma'i chu ltar 'jig/ lang tshe rnams ni mi rtag de ltar bltas byas nas
32b1(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pa rnams ni myur du nags su 'gro bar gyis/ /'khor ba'i 'dod pa'i gnyen bshes chags pas phrag dog skye/ /mthar yang gshin rje'i gnas 'gro rgyal ba thob mi 'gyur/ /khyod kyis de ltar shes na thar pa'i lam thob po/ /mi lus dam pa yang dang yang du thob pa
32b2(rgyud 'grel): dka' / /dper na rgya mtsho'i chu rlabs rlangs snang zla ba'i gzugs brnyan dang/ /rmi lam mig 'phrul 'khrul snang sna tshogs bsgom byed na/ /'khor ba'i zhags pas bcings grol rgya la bya bzhin no/ /de phyir sems nyid ma chags ma zhen nyams len gyis/ /'khrul
32b3(rgyud 'grel): zad gang zhig rnal 'byor bde ba thob pa des/ /sems gsal yal ga brgya yi sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob/ /sems kyi gros 'debs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon a dzo kyis mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ s+tha na marga pha la ma hA mu dra
32b4(rgyud 'grel): b+ha bAn nA ma/ bod skad du/ gzhi lam 'bras bu sgom pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i nyams len zhes bya ba / dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum gyi ni/ /rtsa gsum rgyud pa'i bla ma dang/ /yig 'bru gsum gyi nyams len ni/ /nyam chung
32b5(rgyud 'grel): nyon cig bshad par bya/ /lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo nas/ /sna bug gnyis dang tshangs pa'i bar/ /rtsa gsum la ni sems gtad bya/ /g.yon gyi dkar dang g.yas rtsa dmar/ /dbus kyi mi bskyod mthing ga la/ /g.yas par hUM dang g.yon par oM/ /tshangs pa bu gar
32b6(rgyud 'grel): a yig bsam/ /'od gsal mthing ga dkar dang dmar/ /khams gsum sprul pa'i 'od kyis khyab/ /gdul bya brtul nas slar yang thim/ /yi ge gsum gyi zla mtshes la/ /stong pa'i thig le steng du ni/ /rgyud pa'i bla ma 'od gsal ni/ /de steng 'di ltar bsgom par
32b7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /g.yon gyi sna bug yi ge la/ /yid ches nyams myong bla ma ni/ /skar ma lta bu'i 'od gsal bsgom/ /'bras bu mngon sum bla ma ste/ /hUM yig zla tshes steng du ste/ /brtan par bsam gtan bsgom par bya/ /rlung gsum 'gag ste gdon gsum sel/ /dug gsum rnam 
33a1(rgyud 'grel): rtog bral 'gyur ba/ /rgyu 'bras chos kyi rtog pa spangs/ /lus kyi dgon pa brtan 'gyur bas/ /bdag gzhan gnyis med don rtogs te/ /dur khrod kyi ni 'jigs pa spangs/ /ha ri tsan dra nam mkha' i dbyings/ /dri za'i grong khyer longs spyod byed/ /gzhi lam 'bras
33a2(rgyud 'grel): bu bla ma bsgom pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i nyams len zhes bya ba/ slob dpon paM ka las mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ nA da bindu dwa re yo gi ni tsarya nA ma/ bod skad du/ rtsa rlung gi sgo nas rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa zhes bya ba/ yum bdag
33a3(rgyud 'grel): med ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni mdog sdug 'phyon ma min/ /dbyibs legs 'byon ma'ang ma yin te/ /dgyes rdor spyod pa'i dge sbyong gis/ /de ni bdag gi bdag par 'gyur/ /bdag ni mtshams su 'phung bar 'gyur/ /b+harb+ha? pa yis mtshams su bcom//
33a4(rgyud 'grel): de ni bdag gis ji ltar bya/ /phyogs bzhir bltas na thar pa med/ /thams cad bltas pas nam mkha' i dbyings/ /bdag ni mtshams su phung bar 'gyur/ /b+hand+ha pa yis mtshams su bcom/ /da ni stong pa'i de nyid rtogs/ /smros dang sems khyod ci rtogs na/ /de dor
33a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan cig 'gro bar byed/ /bdag ni mtshams su phung bar 'gyur/ /b+hand+ha pa yis mtshams su bcom /da ni dur khrod dgon pa ru/ /de ru bdag ni gnas par byed/ /ri sbyong ba yi gnas dag tu/ /skye rga'i rgyun ni bcad nas gnas/ /bdag ni mtshams su 'phung bar
33a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /b+hand+ha pa yis mtshams su bcom/ /b+hand+ha mkhas pa chen po des/ /sna tshogs sems ni gar byed pa/ /de yi rang bzhin dbang du 'dus/ /bdag ni mtshams su 'phung bar 'gyur/ /b+hand+ha pa yis mtshams su bcom/ /rtsa rlung gi sgo nas rnal 'byor gyi spyod
33a7(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon DoM bi bas mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ ak+Sha ra dwi pa u pa de sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ yi ge gnyis pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ bla ma rje btsun rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig byed dang ni brtun shing
33b1(rgyud 'grel): yin/ dzE dang mu sel brtun brdungs yin/ /sa ma b+he dang brtun du byas/ /a thar shil mas phyag rdar byas/ /kye 'o bdag gi brtun 'di ni/ /bla ma dam pa'i bka' dang brdungs/ /bla ma dam pa'i man ngag dang/ /drangs shing rkang pas brdeg par byed/ /dngos
33b2(rgyud 'grel): po'i rang bzhin spyod pa na/ /lta ba drug ni sangs rgyas pa'i/ /lam 'di bdag gis dang du blangs/ /kye ma rtse gcig sems kyis brdungs/ /'di ltar 'bras bu nag po las/ /bsod nams brdeg pa gnyi ka yi/ /bsnun pas snyigs ma zad 'gyur te/ /rang sems stong pha
33b3(rgyud 'grel): nyid du lus/ /kye 'o bdag gi brtun brdungs yin/ /nyi zla gnyis ni 'gram shing byas/ /rkang pa'i rtun nad bdag gis gnas/ /'di ni lkug pa'i rmi lam 'dra/ /ji ltar gang la smra bar byed/ /kye'o bdag gi brtun shing ni/ /nam mkha' i he dang hUM sgra sgrogs/ /srid pa'i nges
33b4(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis spangs te/ /nyin mtshan skad cig re re la/ brtun dang mnyam pa nyid du gnas/ /yi ge gnyis pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ /slob dpon DeM bis mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du / a nu yo ga ta twa b+ha pa na aSh+Na de sha yi nA ma/ bod skad du/
33b5(rgyud 'grel): de nyid bde ba sgom pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnal 'byor sgom pa'i man dag ces bya ba/ /rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig snying gar kha sbyor pad+ma'i dbus su ni/ /sems nyid phra zhing rab gsal khyab pa nyams dang ldan/ /khams gsum thams
33b6(rgyud 'grel): cad nye bar gnyis med thob 'gyur ba/ /mnyam zhing gnyis med chos kyi dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo /g.yo 'gyur dbang po'i rta rgod nang du thim pa de/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi ye shes yang dag snod du ni/ /mkhas pas gnyis med thob 'gyur myur ma'i don rtogs pas/
33b7(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan dri med nam mkha' ltar ni lta ba grub/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran rnal 'byor chos kyi dbyings la ni/ /chos dang chos nyid bsgoms pas chos sku'i rang bzhin thob/ /de nyid dran tshor rig pa med 'gyur ye shes mthong/ /shin tu bsgoms pa'i dgos pa 'od gsal yid
34a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med/ /yi ge med pa'i thig le snying gar gnas pa ni/ /sgom par byed pa'i rnal 'byor ye shes rab tu skye/ /de las rdo rje mkha' 'gro snying rjer ldan pa thams cad gnas/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' 
34a2(rgyud 'grel): khams su bcas/ /de nyid rang bzhin mchod pas mchod 'os rnams las mchod pa thob/ /gang zhig rnal 'byor sgom byed sangs rgyas rnams kyis mchod/ /mchod sgom byed pa de ni 'bras bu sangs rgyas gsungs/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor nang gi bdag nyid gnyis
34a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bas/ /de phyir rdo rje'i mchod pas mkhas pa rnams kyis mchod/ /ye shes lnga 'phros sangs rgyas 'grub 'gyur the tshom med/ /gang zhig rnal 'byor lta ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo la/ /bandu ka yi 'bras ltar pad drug ge ser dbus/ /a Ni su tri pre bu//
34a4(rgyud 'grel): ka rigs drug 'gag phyir bsgom/ /dbus su khong stong yig 'bru drug po rim gyis ni/ /ka la thim pas sems nyid 'gag ste skye ba med/ /sgrib bya sgrib byed rang sems dri med dmigs pa med/ /rgyud rnams 'dul phyir gsungs te rnal 'byor don dam min/ /sangs
34a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad 'grub 'gyur rang bzhin mchod pa che/ /gnas tshan nyi shu rang gnas sa lam rim pa thob/ /de phyir de nyid gzhan du mi tshol rang la gnas/ /rnal 'byor de nyid ma rtogs 'khyams nas ci zhig bya/ /gal te de nyid rtogs na ? zhig bya//
34a6(rgyud 'grel): skal bzang bdag nyid rang la grub cing de nyid thob/ /gang zhig gang gis sbyor bas brtul zhugs can gyis ni/ /gnyis med bsam gtan la ni smyon pa bzhin tu spyod/ /nam mkha' gos can yang na rnal 'byor de min pa/ /lus la yi dam lha gnas rang bzhin de nyid
34a7(rgyud 'grel): sgom/ /zla ba drug tu dag bsdams mkha' 'gro rnams dang phrad/ /ye shes 'od 'phros rnal 'byor sangs rgyas rnams dang mnyam/ /sgyu ma mkhan ltar 'dul mchog 'gro ba'i don mdzad do/ /de nyid bde bsgom pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnal 'byor sgom pa'i gdams ngag
34b1(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba/ slob dpon ku ku ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ sra ba pa rits+tsha da na nA ma// bod skad du/ 'dzag pa gcod pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ /yum don grub ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rkyen dang rgya mtsho rgyas pa dang/ /grang ba
34b2(rgyud 'grel): spyod lam nyes pa ste/ /kha zas byin brlabs dam tshig gis/ /grang ba 'dzag pa chu rgyun bzlog/ rdo rje'i rked par ngar dkar bsgril/ /dar gyi skud pas dam par bcing/ /g.yas g.yon ra dag rab tu sprugs/ /bsam gtan lte bar gtad par gyis/ /rnam snang sgo
34b3(rgyud 'grel): ru sku yig sgom/ /rgyun gcod sngags ni zhal nas longs/ /zla ba rgyas na rgya mtsho lung/ /kha brag brgyad la chu rgyun 'dzag/ gaM gA'i rgyun bzlog rnal 'byor kye/ /mi ltung tshe ring bde ba thob/ /rdo rje'i spyi bor drag ser bsgom/ /h+rIM twIM hUM gis thig le 'dra/ /steng
34b4(rgyud 'grel): rlung bcings nas bzhag pa ltar/ /g.yas skor g.yon skor rtsa la gram/ /rgya mtsho grang ba me yis bsre/ /bcud len sman gyi sbyor ba byas/ /a ru gser mdog 'o mar bskol/ /tsha ba gsum dang cong zhi bsre/ /bcud can zas dang sbyar la bza' / /na pa'i sa ru mu
34b5(rgyud 'grel): sdug dang/ /bem brtol brgya dang rtsa brgyad brgyab/ /mar skol ras bal me rtsa gdab/ /grang 'don pags pa rked la dkri/ /lha srung log na gdon gyis rkyen/ /rgya mtsho ma thub 'dzag pa la/ /rang 'byung me tog gu gul nag/ yungs kar thal ba mi klad bsre/ /ha bu'i
34b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags bzlas rdo rje byug /dog pa nag bos bcing bar bya/ /drag po'i spyod lam bzlas byas nas/ /bub pa'i rlung bcir hUM phaT 'dren/ /rnal 'byor kha zas nyams na ni/ /se'u'i shun pags 'o mar skol/ /khar btab 'thungs 'gag par 'gyur/ /dam tshig
34b7(rgyud 'grel): nyams nas rgyu ba la/ /mchod dang gtor ma byin brlabs zhu/ /gzhan du thams cad rnal 'byor la/ /yod pa dag ni ma yin no/ /'dzag pa gcod pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon ku ku ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ ti thi?
35a1(rgyud 'grel): ka tsaN+Da li ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ mu stegs kyi gtum mo zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thal skud can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bud med gnas ni dbu rgyan mA/ /rigs ni gtum mo'i rigs gyur pa/ /srid pa gsum yang sreg par
35a2(rgyud 'grel): byed/ me lces nam mkhar khyab par byed/ /a tsan dpal ni gar byed 'gyur/ /nam mkhar rde? chungs la rje chung brdung/ /rdo rje me yis rgya mtsho skems/ /nyi zla gnyis kyang skyabs su bzhugs/ /gar byed dpal gyi a tsen thod pa can/ /nam mkhar rde chung sa la rde ? brdung
35a3(rgyud 'grel): lha dang lha min mi rnams dang/ /dbang phyug u ma la sogs pa/ /thams cad ye shes me yis bsregs/ /gar byed dpal gyi a rtsen thod pa can/ /nam mkhar rje chung sa la rde chung brdung/ /rnal 'byor ma ni khrid byas nas/ /mgon po'i gnas su 'jug par byed//
35a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di lta'i dkyil 'khor glu ru blangs/ /gar byed dpal ni a con thod pa can/ /nam mkhar rje chung sa la rje chung brdub/ /mu stegs kyi gtum mo zhes bya ba/ slob dpon a tsin+tas mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du /d+ha turb+ha d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du
35a5(rgyud 'grel): gser 'gyur gyi rtsi zhes bya ba/ /yum rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol rdzogs pa'i phyir/ /gser 'gyur rtsi yi gdams pa ni/ /nyams su len pa'i gang zag la/ /tshogs ni bsag phyir bshad par bya/ /bal po se'u sman tsha? dang/ /sa'ur
35a6(rgyud 'grel): bsreg se? sa/ /chad skyur ngang ni sbyar bar bya/ /zangs kyi snod du zhag gsum bzhag /de nas bdun gsum nyi shu gcig/ zhal gyi gdams pa'i sman rtsi yis/ /srab mo'i lcags rnams zangs su 'gyur/ /dngul chu dang ni khams dang/ /sems rtsi dang ni lci ba ni//
35a7(rgyud 'grel): lde gur byas nas de yi dbus/ /zangs mar bzhag na dngul du 'gyur/ /rta mig dang ni lug ru dang/ /ru sbal shun lbags shi lar bcas/ /bzhus pa'i gser la dngul btab nas/ /de rnams bsdus pa'i cha brgyad kyis/ /bzhus pa'i zha nye btab byas nas/ /zla ba
35b1(rgyud 'grel): ltar ni dngul 'gyur ro/ /dngul dang 'khar ba mnyam byas nas/ /zha nye'i tshad du bsre bar bya/ /phyi lta'i snod kyi nang du ni/ /zhu bas thams cad dngul du 'gyur/ /sha chen srad ni brgyad dang ni/ /zha nye dkar po de dang mnyam/ /sa dzI srang gnyis sman tsha dang/ /dug bsar?
35b2(rgyud 'grel): gcig dang dngul chu mnyam/ /gangs can sman ni khu ba yis/ /snga ma'i sman rnams mnye bar bya/ /thams cad rwa dkar nang du bcug/ yang na rdza sa'i snod du ni/ /kha sbyor byas nas bsreg par bya/ /sman thal bar du bzhag nas bton/ /dngul ni zla ltar grub par 'gyur/
35b3(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa tsam gyis sha'u yi/ /bu ri sha na blang byas nas/ /nyi ma zhu nas btab par bya/ /de ni bzhi 'gyur phye yis ni/ /zha nye dkar po'i zhun mar la/ /btab nas chu skams dngul du 'gyur/ /sman tshad dang ni tshal dang/ /ya bak+Shar sa dzi ka/ rtsi dkar sman ni khu ba
35b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /dug dang ha nu ma sha ti'i/ /chu ni ma he'i zho dang sbyar/ /zhag gsum zha nye'i nang du bzhag /du ba mi 'byung thabs kyis bsreg/ dngul 'gyur 'phongs pa'i sdug bsngal sel/ /dngul 'gyur sbyor ba bshad byas nas/ /gser 'gyur bdud rtsi bshad par bya/ /gangs
35b5(rgyud 'grel): can ri po rnams la ni/ /ru tat+ti? zhes sman mchog grags/ /lo mas sa phyogs zil ni bral/ /gser gyi mdog can khu ba 'dzag /zha nye dkar po dngul chu ldan/ /thal sbyor zhal gyi gdams pa yis/ /reg pas dngul zangs? gser du 'gyur/ /dang po me yis dngul
35b6(rgyud 'grel): chu yi/ /mi 'tshor pa yi sbyor pa bya/ /de nas sman gyi rtsi shes nas/ /rnal 'byor gser 'gyur 'grub 'gyur ro/ /mi dang lhan cig ma gnas na/ /gser 'gyur 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir kha sbyor 'khor lo yis/ /ci nas dngul chu bcing bar bya/ /da bcings gang
35b7(rgyud 'grel): yang gser du 'gyur/ /zos pas thams cad rdo rje'i sku ru 'gyur/ /gser 'gyur rtsi'i gdams pa/ /slob dpon na lis mdzad pa rdzogs sto// //rgya gar skad du/ tsit+ta tse? til sha pa no pa yi/ bod skad du/ sems dang sems nyid 'dul ba'i
36a1(rgyud 'grel): thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sbu mdog sna tshogs te/ /rkang pas rdeg cing phyogs bzhir 'gro/ brdas nas nam mkhar bsad par byas/ /rang gi sha yis rang lus la/ /rnam pa kun tu dgra ru song/ /b+hu su ku yi rngon
36a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /skad cig gcig kyang gtong ba med/ /ri dags mo ni pho la smra/ /nags su gnas na bde bar 'dug /de nas byung? nas gsod par phyed/ /rang gi sha yis rang lus la/ /rnam pa kun tu dgra ru song/ /b+hu su ku yi rngon pa yis/ /skad cig gcig
36a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang gtong ba med/ /pho ni mo la 'di skad smra/ /su la bdag gis gnod ma byas/ /ci yang bdag gis zos pa med/ /su la'ang gnod pa ma byas na/ /ci yi phyir na sod cig smra/ /rang gi sha yis rang lus la/ /rnam pa kun tu dgra ru song/ /b+hu su sku yi
36a4(rgyud 'grel): rngon pa yis/ /skad cig gcig kyang gtong ba med/ /rtswa dang chu la mi gnod pa'i/ /gang du gnas kyang ltogs pa med/ /rtag tu btsal yang ma rnyed pa'i/ /ri dags pho mo 'di gnyis ni/ /bdag gis rnyed par ma gyur to/ /rang gi sha yis rang lus la//
36a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa kun tu dgra ru song/ /b+hu su sku yi rngon pa yis/ /skad cig gcig kyang gtong ba med/ /rgyug cing 'gro ba'i ri dags ni/ /de yis rjes ni rnyed pa med/ /brngas pas nam mkha' i dbyings su gtor/ /b+hu su sku yi rngon pa yis/ /skad cig gcig kyang
36a6(rgyud 'grel): gtong ba med/ /sems dang sems nyid 'dul ba'i man ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon shAn+ta de ba nas brgyud pa/ slob dpon me ko las gsungs pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ sarba de ba d+ha ni sa paM kra ma marga nA ma/ bod skad du/
36a7(rgyud 'grel): lha kun gyi rdzogs pa'i lam zhes bya ba// mkha' 'gro rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi snyan dgra sogs spangs pa yi/ /dben zhing gsang ba'i sa phyogs sam/ /yid dang mthun pa'i dgon pa ru/ /rim pa 'di bzhin bsgom par bya/ /shing gcig byang
36b1(rgyud 'grel): chub sems yin te/ /a ba d+hU tI'i chu 'gram la/ /lte ba'i gtum mo dur khrod de/ /ri thod snying ga'i pad+ma la/ /dgon pa rnam snang gnas yin te/ /nags tshal pad+ma'i gsang ba ru/ /b+hi Da dang ni rdo rje chu/ /byang chub sems dang bzhi mnyam dang/ /rin
36b2(rgyud 'grel): chen 'byung ldan 'od dpag med/ /thig le'i gnas ni drug la bsgom/ /rnal 'byor pa yi sgrub sa bstan/ /de nas lus kyi maN+Dal ni/ /rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i rtsa/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i nyams dang ldan/ /zlum po nam mkha' lta bu ste/ /mthe bong tshad
36b3(rgyud 'grel): ni bde chen la/ /oM mam haM gnyis gang rung bsgom/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis/ /maN+Dal byin gyis brlabs byas nas/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni/ /rnal 'byor snying ga'i sgra gcan gyi/ /steng du hUM ni dud ka bsam/ /mi bskyod pa yi rgya mtsho la//
36b4(rgyud 'grel): oM ni skar ma lta bu ste/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni/ /mgrin pa'i 'khor lor bsam par bya/ /byang chub sems dang rak+ta dang/ /mi bskyod chu yi thig le'o/ /de ltar byin brlabs rtsa bsgoms nas/ /bsod nams chogs ni bsags pa'i phyir/ /mtshan med
36b5(rgyud 'grel): rtsa dang 'khor lo bzhi/ /phyag rgya ba ni yi rgyas btab nas/ /thig le bzhi la nyams len bya/ /tshad med bzhi yi nyams skye'o/ /de ltar rnal 'byor bzhi bsgoms nas/ /rdzogs pa'i hUM bsam bgegs bskrod/ /snying ga'i khong stong dbus su ni/ /paM las pad+ma raM nyi ma/ /hUM
36b6(rgyud 'grel): las 'bar ba'i rdo rje 'phro/ /phyi dang nang bgegs mtshams bcad do/ /de nas rnal 'byor snying nyid ni/ /skyil krung bcas zhing lus nyid bsrang/ /mig gi dbang po sna rtser gtad/ /dngos po thams cad rjes dran nas/ /dri ma med pa'i nam mkha' la/ /skar ma lta bu'i sems
36b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis/ /phra rab tsam gyi bdag gzhan sgom/ /stong nyid lta ba brtan byas nas/ rdzogs pa'i dbang gi rim pa bstan/ /rdo rje dril bu'i sbyor ba yis/ /dkan gyis phyogs su 'gyur lha mo/ /bde pa chen po'i zla rgyun ni/ /'bab bsam dbang bskur lus tshim mo/ /de nas dpa' ? 
37a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' mo yis/ /gang yang dpal ldan 'dus pa'i sku/ /dri med me long gzugs brnyan dang/ /nam mkha' i skyes bu lta bu ni/ /rang bzhin kha dog dbyibs dang bral/ /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin ni/ /nam mkha' i dbyings su bsgom par bya/ /de ltar rdzogs pa'i rim
37a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /skal ldan rnams kyi don phyir brtsams/ /de yis dge ba gang theb pa/ /'gro ba byang chub thob phyir bsngo/ /lha kun gyi rdzogs pa'i rim pa/ g+ha d+ha ris mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ so ma sUr? band+ha no pA ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ nyi zla bcing ba'i
37a3(rgyud 'grel): thabs zhes bya ba/ yum don yod grub ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun rnams kyis yon tan brjod mi shes pa yi/ /gaN+Di'i sgra brdungs skyon smras phyi rol ngag tu bskrad/ /chu yi steng gshegs me tog len cing chu yi gting mi 'bying?/ /ngo mtshar phul du byung ba'i bi dU pa
37a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes grags/ /tshong 'dus srang 'dus 'khyam zhing zas kyi lhag ma ?/ /yud tsam khros pas gang gA'i chu rgyun gyen la zlog /chu yi steng gshegs me tog len cing chu yi gting mi 'bying/ /yon tan phul du byung ba'i birpa? pa zhes grags/ /chang tshong dag la khro bar mi byed nyi ma ni/ /khyod
37a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis khang par gta' mar bzhag ces smras te 'dug /chu yi steng gshegs me tog len cing chu yi gting mi 'bying/ /ngo mtshar phul du byung ba'i birba pa zhes grags/ /mu stegs rten la spyan zur gzigs pas li kaM bkas/ /de mthong khyab 'jug lha yi rten te and+ha 'dar//
37a6(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma gta' mar bcug nas chang 'thungs bi rU pa/ /'jig rten rnams ni phyugs 'dra bi rU pa zhes brjod/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i sems nyid phra zhing dri ma med/ /chu yi steng gshegs me tog len cing chu yi gting mi 'bying/ /ngo mtshar phul du byung ba'i birU pa zhes grags//
37a7(rgyud 'grel): nyi zla bcings pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /slob dpon birU pa nas brgyud pa/ ka ma ris mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ hUM kar tsit+ta bindu b+ha pa na kra ma/ bod skad du/ sems kyi thig le hUM nyid bsgom pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag
37b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje nyi zla'i steng du ni/ /de steng rin chen 'od byed pas/ /na? pad+ma'i kha ni dbye bar byed/ /mdzes ma lha mdzes btsun mo kyi/ /pad+ma'i chas ni btang ba yis/ /gzhan na yon tan ci zhig yod/ /sems kyi bung ? sar la/ /khu ba dag ni 'thung bar byed/ /gzugs ni
37b2(rgyud 'grel): skams nas 'phur te 'gro /mi rgod lnga dang mo tshogs bzhi/ /de lnga mnan te thog tu gnas/ /dga' ba'i gzhu ni bkang byas nas/ /mda' ni bde ba chen por brgyab/ /sems kyi bung ba ge sar la/ /khu ba dag ni 'thung bar byed/ /gzugs skams gyur nas 'phur
37b3(rgyud 'grel): te 'gro/ pung ba mo la 'di skad smra/ /smras kyang go bar mi byed dam/ /'di 'thungs rtag tu 'di ru gnas/ /bde ba chen po'i khu ba 'di/ /'thung zhing sgra skad sgrags par byed/ /bde dang sdug bsngal grong khyer gnyis/ /mtshams na bdud rtsi'i rdzing bu gnas/ /de ru chu
37b4(rgyud 'grel): 'thung mi byed pa'i/ /yon tan med pa'i bung ba khyod/ /sems kyi bung ba ge sar ni/ /khu ba dag ni 'thung par byed/ /gzugs skams gyur nas 'phur te 'gro/ /stong nyid zhags pa chen po yis/ /sems kyi rgyal po bcing bar bya/ /bde gshegs lnga ni sdom byas nas//
37b5(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu mgol bkur byas te/ /bde bas gar ni byed par 'gyur/ /sems nyid kyi thig le'i hUM nyid bsgom pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba /slob dpon dzA land+ha ris mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ a tsin+ta b+ha ba ti pa ri b+ha ba na nA ma/ bod skad du/
37b6(rgyud 'grel): bsam gyis mi khyab bsgom pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgongs pa mdor bsdus rnal 'byor gyi/ /tshang med bzhi yi nyams len ni/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bshad par bya/ /rgyu 'bras stong pa'i rang bzhin la//
37b7(rgyud 'grel): dngos med gzugs dang gnyis med smra/ /dmigs med 'bras bu 'bad med 'gyur/ /dper na 'brug med char bzhin no/ /de phyir rang bzhin bdag med kyi/ /brtul zhugs skal ldan rnal 'byor pas/ /snang zhing srid pa sna tshogs 'di/ /dngos po stong pa bdag med de/ /ngo bo nyid kyis rnam
38a1(rgyud 'grel): bar dag/ de lta bu yi snying rje la/ /sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med/ /mi sgom mi rtog rang bzhin gsal/ /mdza' dbus bral ba dbus pa'i don/ /de lta'i sems kyi rang bzhin sgom/ /ma rtogs pa yi sems can la/ /dang 'don snying rje sgom par bya//
38a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi mdun du gang zhig kyang/ /mnyam par bzhag ste mnyam par sgom/ /de la rnam pa thams cad kyis/ /gnyis med don ni 'grub 'gyur ro/ /dgon pa'i snyan brgyud gdams ngag ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sku/ /kun gyi sems nyid hUM yig dkar//
38a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang gzhan gyi snying gar bsgom/ /nyi ma'i gdan steng thig ler bsgom/ /de nyid kyis ni 'phro 'du la/ /nyon mongs thams cad sbyang par bsam/ /de ni gnyis med don yin te/ /lha yi de nyid rang bzhin med/ /de ltar snying rje sgom byas nas/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i byams
38a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ phan phyir 'di ltar bsam par bya/ /rnal 'byor bdag nyid snying ga ru/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad sran ma'i tshad/ /de nas 'od gsal dkar dmar te/ /bar du me lha'i aM? yig ni/ /dngos po'i rnal 'byor gang yang med/ /de las ci yang bsam mi/ bya ba/ /gang zhig sgom
38a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rnal 'byor de/ /gnyis med ye shes 'gug 'gyur ro/ /gsal rig med pa chos kyi sku/ /de ltar phra ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /mngon shes shar te gnyis med rtags/ /dga' pa'i rang bzhin 'byung 'gyur la/ /btang snyoms 'bras bu thob pa'o/ kha cig lha mo bzhi
38a6(rgyud 'grel): bskoms nas/ /kha cig ngag gi don la brten/ /gnyis med sgom pa mi shes so/ /zhal nas zhal du brgyud pa yi/ /zhal gdams gzhan la phan phyir ni/ /rA hu las ni bshad par byas/ /chad med bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab bsgom pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rA hu las
38a7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs to// //rgya gar skad du/ hUM ka ra tsit+ta bindu b+ha ba na kla nA ma / bod skad du /hUM yig sems nyid thig le sgom pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ yum rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /g.yas dang g.yon dang dbus ma yi/ /gyen thur gnas pa'i
38b1(rgyud 'grel): rtsa drug la/ /de rnams la ni sman drug 'bab/ /dri dang zla ba sman gnyis ni/ /gyen thur gnyis kyi dbye ba yis/ /ra sa nA nas yang dag rgyu/ /chu dang nyi ma kun 'dar ma/ /gyen thur gnyis kyi dbye ba yis/ /snga ma bzhin du yang dag rgyu/ /dbus ma a ba d+hu tI la/ /dbugs
38b2(rgyud 'grel): dang sgra gcan mi rgyu ba/ /mi dang chu khams mgrin pa yi/ /dus gsum gnas pa'i phag mo mchod/ /nyi zla'i shukra rak+ta yi/ /thig le 'dzin byed sgra gcan dang/ /sems nyid thig le ji ltar dag /thig le de ni gang la gnas/ /'khor lo bzhi yi dbus su ni/
38b3(rgyud 'grel): kha sbyor pad+ma'i 'dab brgyad la/ /de'i dbus nyi zla kha sbyor la/ /nA da binU? rnam par brgyan/ /gnas pa phra zhing yungs kar tshad/ /yi ge hUM nyid sgom par bya/ /de las 'od 'phros thig le bzhi/ /pad 'dab bzhi la 'phro bar bsam /shar gyi thig ler mkha' gro me?
38b4(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod chu yi rang bzhin no/ /nub phyogs la ma'i thig le ni/ /gsal ba'i dri ni rnam snang ngo/ /khaN+Da ro ha byang phyogs te/ /byang chub sems kyi thig ler 'phro/ /lho yi phyogs su rU pa ni/ /thig le dmar po bsgom par bya/ /gnas bzhi'i 'khor lo dag pa yi//
38b5(rgyud 'grel): skye gnas bzhi ni dag par byas/ /de ltar 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyis/ /'gro drug sems can dag par bsam/ /slar yang thig le thim pa yi/ /sbyor pa 'di ltar shes par bya/ /thig le bzhi ni hUM thim pa'i/ /hUM ni zla tshes bsdu bar bya/ /zla tshes nam mkha' i thig le
38b6(rgyud 'grel): bsdu/ /nam mkha' i thig le khang stong la/ /nyi zla'i kha sbyor thig le ni/ /gsal zhing kha dog sbyibs dang bral/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya/ /hUM yig sems nyid thig le bsgom pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon nag po ba nas brgyud pa'i/ /slob
38b7(rgyud 'grel): dpon d+harmA pas mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ pra kri ti sid+d+hi nA ma// bod skad du /rang bzhin grub ba zhes bya ba / dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mdor bsdus pa yi rim pa 'od/ /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin te/ /lus la gnas
39a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i blo ldan rnams/ /rjes su dran zhing nyams su blangs/ /yab yum sbyor ba'i nga rgyal bya/ /gang zhig rgyud de'i rdzogs pa'i rim/ /de phyir bdag nyid yi dam gyi/ /nga rgyal dang ni bral mi bya/ /yum ni rigs kyi lha mo ste/ /dpal ldan yab ni
39a2(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'o/ /de dag gnyis kyi longs spyod ni/ /'od 'phags thim pa bde gshegs so/ /zhe sdang rdo rje mi bskyod pa/ /gti mug dra ba rnam snang ngo/ /nga rgyal rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /phrag dog don yod grub pa'o/ /gzhan yang thabs dang shes rab kyi/ /lus la gnas
39a3(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di dag go /sa yi khams ni sangs rgyas spyan/ /chu khams mA ma kI zhes bya/ /gos dkar mo ni me khams he/ /sgrol ma rlung khams ngo bo nyid/ /nam mkha' rdo rje dbang phyug ma/ /sa yi snying bo mig dag la/ /phyag na rdo rje rna ba la/ /sna la nam mkha' i snying po
39a4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ lce ni spyan ras gzigs dbang po/ /lus la sgrib pa rnam sel te/ /yid la kun tu bzang po'o/ /byang chub sems las 'di rnams 'byung/ /de phyir bdag ni chos dbyings so/ /sa dang me dang rlung khams sogs/ /brjod bya tsam du rnam par sprul//
39a5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin dri ma dag pa yi/ /de nas sngags gsum brjod byas nas/ /rang lus khong stong bsam byas nas/ /de dbus b+hUM las gzhan yas khang/ /sor bzhi tsam gyis rnam par bskyed/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM brjod yi dam lha/ /rnal 'byor dag gi sgo lnga nas/ /gzhal yas
39a6(rgyud 'grel): dbus su spyan drangs bya/ /de nyid thig le zhu byas nas/ /lam du rgyu zhing chos 'byung dbus/ /zil pa lta bu'i thig le la// bde gshegs dgug gzhug gnyis med bsam/ /de nas byang chub sems nyid ni/ /pad+ma'i dbyibs ldan bsam byas nas/ /de la bdag nyid
39a7(rgyud 'grel): sems gtong ngo/ /rang bzhin grub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rdo ka ris mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ sa ha dza an+ta yi nA ma/ bod skad du/ lhan cig skyes pa'i gdams pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo//
39b1(rgyud 'grel): snying ga'i kha sbyor dbus su ni/ /gnyis med thig ge yungs kar tshad/ /de yang 'o ma'i rgya mtsho ltar/ /rim gyis rgyas pa bsam par bya/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi lus nyid ni/ /dri med bdud rtsi'i zho ltar gang/ /rlung nad sel cing sems nyid bcing/ /me d+hi bdag ni smra bar byed//
39b2(rgyud 'grel): dngos por sems btang dngos med rtogs/ /kye 'o ma yengs rang sems bzung/ /rnal 'byor grub rtags dngos med ba/ /phan tshun gnyis kyi 'brel pa gcad/ /dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin la/ /mdza' gnyis mi gnas lhan skyes grub/ /dngos po thams cad skye med//
39b3(rgyud 'grel): sgrib bas bdag gis ma rtogs/ /snang ba thams cad sems pho bo/ /sems nyid ma grub sems nyid de/ /bdag nyid snying rje kun tu khyab/ /nam mkhar lta bur 'gyur ba med/ /gnyis la mi gnas sems nyid yin/ /me d+hi bdag ni smra bar byed/ /rang rig ma bcos bya ba
39b4(rgyud 'grel): ?/ 'dzin med dran med sems nyid/ /chad par mi 'gyur rang rig rtogs/ /brtog par mi 'gyur sgro 'dogs bcad/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin rtag chad med/ /me d+hi bdag ni smra bar byed/ /lta ba sgom med 'bras bu med/ /snang la rang bzhin dngos po med/ /rnam
39b5(rgyud 'grel): tog sbrul gyi mdud pa ltar/ /rang grol zung 'jug tha snyad med/ /de ltar sgoms pas stong nyid rtogs/ /me d+hi bdag ni smra bar byed/ /lhan skyes zung 'jug stong nyid ni/ /rnal 'byor bdag gis rtogs pa'o/ /lhan skyes thung 'jug gi gdams pa/ slob dpon me
39b6(rgyud 'grel): d+hi nis mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du / a nut+ta ra sarba shud+d+he kra mi nA ma/ bod skad du / bla med sbyor ba'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar pad+ma 'dam las skyes/ /de bzhin ma rig mun pa las/ /gnyis med rig
39b7(rgyud 'grel): pa skye 'gyur pa'i/ /rang rig de la phyag 'tshal nas/ /bla med sbyor ba'i rim pa yi/ /dri med dam chos bshad par bya/ /stong dang shin tu stong pa ste/ /stong pa chen po gsum pa yin/ /bzhi pa rgyu 'bras thams cad do/ /thabs shes yang dag sbyor pa yis/ /rdzogs rims yang
40a1(rgyud 'grel): dag nye bar 'gyur/ /rdzogs pa nye bar mthong ba yis/ /thams cad stong pa'i 'od gsal yin/ /rang rig gsum gyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /rgyu gsum rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /stong nyid don ni rtogs pa yin/ /bla na med pa'i gnas
40a2(rgyud 'grel): thob 'gyur/ /'od gsal stong pa shes rab dang/ /sems nyid gzhan gyi rjes su 'brang/ /de la bdag gis 'di ltar ni/ /yang dag 'phros pas bshad par bya/ /rnam par chags shing shin tu chags/ /chags pa chen po de bzhin no/ /gti mug la sogs dug
40a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyis/ /brtan dang g.yo pa'i sems nyid 'di/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gsum/ /zhi dang chags dang rtogs par ldan/ /phyi rol ji ltar nang na gnas/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar ba/ /'das pa'i 'das par bdag gnas so/ /sred pa che dang
40a4(rgyud 'grel): shin tu sred/ /dkros dang skor pa kun tu ldan/ /tshor ba nyal ba'i tshor pa dang/ /shin tu tshor ba'i skad cig gcig /so sor rtog dang snying rje ldan/ /ngo mtshar ldan pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /nyams dang phrag dog rnam par bsags/ /de ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyis//
40a5(rgyud 'grel): rang rig ye shes rnam par 'gribs/ /rnal 'byor pa yi nyams len la/ /nam mkha' bde chen pad+ma'i dbus/ /zla ba'i gdan la haM? yig gnas/ /kun rdzob gsal zhing dri ma med/ /'byung 'jug rlung 'dzin ye shes yin/ /zla tshes dmar po shes rab ste/ /dbyangs
40a6(rgyud 'grel): yig dang po thig ler ldan/ /rlung ni 'dzin phyir bsgom par bya/ /de ni 'od gsal skar chen ltar/ /sems nyid stong pa'i thabs yin no/ /gzugs dang bral zhing kha dog med/ /zhi ba'i rnam pa bzung 'jug bral/ /brtan dang g.yo ba'i tha snyad med/ /de ltar bla ma'i
40a7(rgyud 'grel): drin gyis ni/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar ba/ /rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /ci yang mthong 'gyur the tshom med/ /ji ltar bud shing skam po la/ /mi rgyu gnas kyang 'bar ba med/ /de bzhin brda dang rtsol med la/ /byams sems gnas kyang grub pa med//
40b1(rgyud 'grel): de phyir nga rgyal la sogs spang/ /brtson 'grus bskyed la bla ma bkur/ /dbang bskur thob nas nyams len gyis/ /rnal 'byor dang po'i sbyor pa yis/ /sa ni brgyad po thob par 'gyur/ /'od gsal gsum ldan rdzogs pa yi/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i sa thob po//
40b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur thob kyang skur pa 'debs pa dang/ /brtson 'grus chung la log lta 'dzin pa dang/ /bla ma'i skyon brjod yon tan brjod mi 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i lam ni de yis thob mi 'gyur/ /bkur bsti med cing de nyid thob tu re/ /tshig ni 'jam ste khro tshul bstan nas
40b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro/ /mi tshogs mang po gnas pa'i sa ru ni/ /bla ma mthong yang phyag sogs mi byed de/ /snod dang mi ldan gdams ngag mi sbyin no/ /yon tan bzang thob brtson 'grus ldan pa ni/ /bla ma 'khor la sogs pa bkur bsti ldan pa la/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang mnyam
40b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dka' bar 'dzin/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chos la sred pa che/ /rgyud rten rgyud mangs rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' i lam du 'gyur ba de/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba gang thob rgyur 'gyur ba/ /'gro ba drug la bsngo zhing bkra shis shog /bla med sbyor ba'i
40b5(rgyud 'grel): rim pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon bAd+ha? dzas mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du /A li kA li man tra dz+nyA na nA ma/ bod skad du/ a phreng ka phreng gi sngags kyi rim pa zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed
40b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi bcu rtsa dgu yi/ /bdag gzhan sku yi rig pa'i sgra don ni/ /brdzi la sogs grangs kyang de don rtogs pa med/ /de phyir gsal don bdag gis bshad par bya/ /sgra yi gnas ni brgyad yin te/ /rkan dang lce dang so rnams te/ /spyi bo mgrin pa mchu dang ni/ /khang
40b7(rgyud 'grel): ba sna la rnam par gnas/ /de yi dang po a phreng ni/ thun phyed bcu drug la sogs ldan/ /shes rab me long ye shes te/ /blo dang ldan pas shes par bya/ /de yi thog ma bcu bzhi pa/ /dbyangs can sgra gsal yi ge'o/ /de dag rnams kyi dang po ni/ /bcu ni mnyam pa'i 
41a1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes so/ /skabs 'byung lnga ni thung ba ste/ /gzhan rnams ring bar shes par bya/ /dbyangs rnams kyi ni thog ma gnyis/ /spangs te bcu bzhi'i ming can no/ /e i o aau bzhi dag ni/ /don dam kun rdzob bral yig go /a ni stong pa'i thig le'o//
41a2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba nyi ma gtum mo'o/ /thig le gnyis ldan a yig ni/ /drag po'i sgra ni dbye bar byed/ /ri rI li lI 'byung ba bzhi/ /dbye bas sred byed yi ge'o/ /thung ba'i mig 'dzum skad cig gcig /mig 'dzum ring ba skad cig gnyis/ /skad cig gsum pa 'bod
41a3(rgyud 'grel): yig yin/ /skad cig phyed pa gsal byed/ /rnal 'byor g.yon gyi phyogs su ni/ /dbyangs can bcu drug shes rab bo/ /de rnams sgra gnas 'di yin te/ /a ku ha yig thig le gnyis la ltung/ /a ni khong gi yi ge'o/ /i tsu ya sha rkan la gnas/ /li tu las
41a4(rgyud 'grel): so 'byung ngo/ /ri Tu ra Sha spyi bor grags/ /aM ni 'od gsal sna ldan te/ /lte bar gnas te gyen la rgyu/ /e e mgrin pa o aau mchu/ /de yi thog mar chos dbyings so/ /de ltar a phreng bshad byas nas/ /a ka tsa Ta ta pa yang sha ste/ /rtsa pa'i sgras ni de rnams so//
41a5(rgyud 'grel): ka las brtsams te ha yi mthar/ /g.yas phyogs gsal byed shes par bya/ /ka phreng lnga tshan lnga po ste/ /bzhi yi sgra yi rig pa'o/ /sha Sha sa ha bcas pa ni/ /thog mar gnyis gnyis grangs min no/ /lhag ma gsum gsum sgra yin te/ /lnga tshan lnga ni
41a6(rgyud 'grel): sna las 'byung/ /mdza' la gnas pa'i 'byung ba bzhi/ /rnal 'byor kun rdzob 'dod pas bcad/ /mtshan lnga pa'i nam mkha' la/ /sha Sha sa ha drod can gnas/ /k+Sha ni kA li ma mo 'dus/ /de ni 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor ro/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dbye ba yis/ /rgyu yi
41a7(rgyud 'grel): yig? ge bshad par bya/ /ka nas brtsams nas ha yi par/ /stir re yi gdan yin no/ /ya ra la ba ma yis brgyan/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyi bskyed thabs so/ /ki ni thod pa kha TwA gi /tsha ni keng rus gdugs yin te/ /nga tshan lnga ni nyi ma yin/ /sha Sha dur khrod shes par bya//
41b1(rgyud 'grel): sa bon yi ge bshad byas nas/ /kA li rnal 'byor ngo sprod bstan/ /ka chan ya dang bcas pa ni/ /zla gam sngon po nang nub la/ /phu phu sa dang gzhan la chags/ /ji ltar ri mo bri dang mthong/ /shar gyi yi ge rlung yin no/ /tsa tshan ra dang sha dang bcas//
41b2(rgyud 'grel): gru gsum dmar dang nyi ma phyed/ /zhe sdang dus su sprul yang bri/ /lho phyogs drag po'i gnas yin no/ /Ta cha? na b+ha dang bcas pa ni/ /zlum la dkar te snga dro'i dus/ /ka li dzan dang 'bug ka ni/ /gti mug bya yi ri mo can/ /nub kyi phyogs su mo gdon no/ /ta tshan k+Sha dang Na
41b3(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa/ /gru bzhi ljang ser nam phyed ni/ /sa dang rlung gi khams yin no/ /phrag dog dmar po rgyas pa'i dus/ /rmi lam rta dang stag mthong ba/ /rgyal pos bdag gdon gyi ngo/ /byang gi phyogs su 'dzin par bya/ /ba tshan sngon po chu klung ste/ /gru gsum zla
41b4(rgyud 'grel): gam dbyibs dang ldan/ /nang nub dus su khams lci ba/ /rigs pas rnal 'byor brtag par bya/ /de bzhin 'byung chung nyi shu lnga'i/ /gdams pa zhal nas blang bar bya/ /dri med shes rab brgyan pa yi/ /thabs dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /tha snyad mun par
41b5(rgyud 'grel): bsal ba'i/ /de dag sems nyid stong pa bdag/ tha snyad la bkod dge ba nges/ /'gro drug sdug bsngal zang phyir bsngo/ /A li kA li'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba/ /slob dpon g+hand+hAs mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ kA li marga b+ha ba
41b6(rgyud 'grel): na nA ma/ bod skad du/ ka phreng sgom pa'i lam zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /don dam kun rdzob rab gsal ba'i/ /a sogs bzhi bcu rtsa dgu yi/ /rang byung yi ge rnams kyi ni/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i sgom lam bshad/ /bdag gi gnas
41b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi rtsa lnga dang/ /sum mdo rlung lha 'khor lo nas/ /lte bar 'bar ba'i gtum mo la /snying gar sbar pa'i 'khor lo yin/ /steng du brtan pa'i 'khor lo gnas/ /spyi bor chu klung ljang gu ste/ /de rnams la ni rim pa bzhin/ /ka phreng yi ge lnga la dgod/ /thog
42a1(rgyud 'grel): mar chags pa'i 'dab ma la/ /shar du kaM dang lho ru khaM/ /nub tu gi ste byang du g+haM?/ /dbus kyi nam mkhar daM zhes bsgom/ /rim bzhin sngo dang dmar dang dkar/ /ser dang sngo ba bsam par bya/ /chags pa skyes te chags pa na/ /chags pa'i
42a2(rgyud 'grel): nad rnams sel bar byed/ /kaM gi rlung ni me la phog /gtum mo 'od zer rjes dran nas/ /chu skams brtol rlangs pa 'byung/ /de nas lte ba nas hig hUM bgrang/ /bde chen haM la sems gtad nas/ /bdud rtsi rgyun ni 'bab por bsam/ /lte ba'i rdzing bu bkang
42a3(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /spyi bo'i tshang bug sgra skad 'byung/ /bde chen khong stong bsam byas nas/ /lte dbus khong stong sems gtang bya/ /rnal 'byor sdig pa dag par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor d+ha ma d+hu ma yis/ /de ltar sbyang ba'i 'pho ba smras/ /yul nas yul du 'bo byed na//
42a4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor bdag gis mdun du ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi maN+Dal bya/ /tsa na ka yi 'bras bu sto?/ /thod pa nag por bzhag par bya/ /kun d+ha lta bu'i hUM nyid bri/ /de bzhin rang gi snying ga ru/ /zla tshes steng du hUM nyid bsgom/ /sems nyid rtogs nas rnal 'byor pas/ /thod
42a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbus su sems gtad na/ /grub pa'i rtags 'byung rnal 'byor bde/ /sems la sems nyid thim par bya/ /de nas me khyer ro langs la/ /de yi snying gar hUM bsam bya/ /ro langs grub rtags byung ba yiS?/ /rigs bzang gzhon nu'i rol ni/ /kha sbyor de nyid hUM nyid bsgom//
42a6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor grong nas grong du 'pho/ /rnal 'byor btsan thabs 'pho ba la/ /seng ge rnam rgyal me tog 'dzin/ /phyag rgya bcas la tshangs pa phye/ /sems nyid ri rab rtse mo'i steng/ /pad 'dab brgyad pa'i ge sar la/ /hUM las sems nyid gtang par bya/ /dpal ldan
42a7(rgyud 'grel): nag po'i 'pho? pa 'di/ /d+ha ma d+hu ma bdag gis smras/ /rnal 'byor gang zhig 'grub 'gyur na/ /nam mkhar thim 'gyur the tshom med/ /ka phreng bsgom pa'i lam zhes bya ba/ slob dpon d+ha ma d+hu mas mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ sam+bar tsakre shwa ra
42b1(rgyud 'grel): A li kA li mahA yo ga b+ha ban nA ma/ bod skad du /a phreng ka phreng bde mchog 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor chen po bsgom pa zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor ba'i thog mdza' i tshad nad ni/ /bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid kyi/ /rgya mtsho lta bu'i bdud rtsis sel//
42b2(rgyud 'grel): dga' chen de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan phag mo'i snying po yis/ /bde chen dkyil 'khor shin tu mdzes/ /dpa' po dpa' mo nyi shu bzhis/ /sa mu dra yi lus nyid la/ /go cha drug gi rkyas btab la/ /yi ge bdun pa'i rna rgyan can/ /dpal ldan phreng pa'i sngags
42b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni/ /mgo phreng bzhi bcu rtsa dgus brgyan/ /glang po che yi g.yang gzhi ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro 'dzin/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rig pa ni/ /rnal 'byor rgya mtshos rked rgyan byas/ /thong phreng ye shes lnga yin te/ /bde gshegs lnga yis spyi bor brgyan//
42b4(rgyud 'grel): sA gar bdag dang gang byed do/ /tshangs spyod rtag tu bsrung byas nas/ /rnal 'byor chen po gnyis med bsam/ /rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags mched bya/ /bdag nyid rnal 'byor sa ga ra/ /du khrod brgyad du gnas byed kyang/ /'jigs pa rnams dang bral ba yin/ /de phyir rna pa
42b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byor dbang phyug rnams/ /bde mchog 'khor lor rtag tu mchod/ /kye bo rigs lnga'i spyod pa 'di/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu rtogs/ /rtog pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /'dod yon lnga ni spyod par gyis/ /rgyan drug gis ni brgyan pa'i sku/ /seng ge bzhin
42b6(rgyud 'grel): du rtag? tu spyod/ /a phreng ka phreng rnal 'byor che/ /mdun du bsam zhing gnyis med skye/ /rnal 'byor chen po bsre byas nas/ /bdag gi lte ba'i khung bu la/ /zla ba'i thig le rgyas par bsam/ /yang dag pa yi yi ge ni/ /bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho'i dbus bsams nas//
42b7(rgyud 'grel): dbang bzhi zhing gnyis med 'grub/ /bsam gtan bsam med 'grub rgyu med/ /bsam med bsams na grub pa thob/ /sA ga ra bdag smra par byed/ /grub pa'i rtags ni glang chen phul/ /rnal 'byor chen po gnyis med do/ /ma phreng ka phreng bde mchog 'khor lo'i rnal
43a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor chen po bsgom pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon sA ga ras mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ /bA yu s+tha na ro ga pa rig dz+nyA na nA ma/ bod skad du/ rlung dang nad kyi brtag pa zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge dang mi
43a2(rgyud 'grel): dge'i chags pas 'khor pa'i gzhi/ /de dag chags bral rnal 'byor mya ngan 'das/ /me rlung chags pa'i gnas su gnas 'gyur ba/ /rlung gi chu gnas g.yo ba'i sems nyid dag/ de yis rnam rtog gang yang rim gyis 'gags/ /dper na chu dang nam mkha' i skyes bu bzhin/ /me
43a3(rgyud 'grel): rlung nag pos snang ba 'dod gyur pas/ /dkar po'i shel ltar la sogs ye shes 'grub/ /dang po'i yan lag mgo ni gti mug gnas/ /sngar ltar sgoms pas de nyid ye shes yin/ /dbang po lnga la nyi zla'i mig gnyis chags/ /lus kyi yan lag lta ba'i ye shes
43a4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /chags pa'i 'khor lor srog gi rtsa gnas so/ /de la zla grangs rtsa ni bcu gnyis la/ /lus kyi tshad ni 'dom gang gu bzhi yin/ /'dzam bu'i gling bzhi gling phran brgyad dag byung/ /nyi zla'i sgo nas rlung ni yang dag 'byung/ /lho byang gnyis dag nyi zla'i lam yin te//
43a5(rgyud 'grel): dbyar zla 'bring po byang gi bar du dgu /dgun zla 'bring po lho ru shes par bya/ /ston dpyid gnyis kyi 'bring po nyin mtshan mnyam// //da i rnal 'byor rlung gi grangs la ni/ /skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig yin te/ /thun brgyad thun phyed
43a6(rgyud 'grel): sum brgya drug cu bzhag /lo gcig hUM nyid thig ler shes par bya/ /nyi zla gnyis kyi sgo nas rlung lnga ni/ /rang nas mi rgyu gzhan nas rgyu ba nges/ /dpal ldan rnal 'byor rlung log na bar 'gyur/ /de la rlung gi ming dang gnas rnams ni/ /brtan g.yo bar gnas khris
43a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas bde gshegs rlung/ /rim par gti mug chu klung mgo la rgyu/ /bad kan skyes pas rnal 'byor lha gnas mnyam/ /g.yo bo'i rlung ni gzhan gyi rtsal rgyu/ /mdung par chags na drod nyams dran pa ste/ /chu rlung bar na me rlung gnas pa de/ /rtsub pa'i rlung
43b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin dal dub byas pa'i tshe/ /drag po'i zhe sdang mthar yang snying rlung ldang/ /'dus pa'i gnas su dug gsum rlung 'dus pa/ /'dus pa'i nad kyis sems kyi dbang po 'khrul/ /bde gshegs gnas su mi rgyu gzhan rgyu na/ /rnal 'byor las kyi nang du shes par kyis
43b2(rgyud 'grel): sman dang sman pa rang gi lus la gnas pa la/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor brgyad kyis thig le las/ /sor ni bcu gnyis bcu gnyis steng du ni/ /bzhi bzhi gnad 'dzin brgyad la sems gtang bya/ /bung ba'i rlung 'dzin 'khrul 'khor nad 'don bya/ /dbus
43b3(rgyud 'grel): mar mchung rlung ni rtsa bzhi ru/ /bzung bas rnal 'byor mngon rtogs 'di ltar 'char/ /sa yi rlung gis lus lci sems mi gsal/ /mi rtag chu brgal zla ba mthong ba dang/ /chu mig la sogs rtags ni sna tshogs 'byung/ /rnal 'byor sha rgyas
43b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa shin tu dka' / /thang la 'gro bar 'gyur na blo snying brdung/ /rlung gi rlung ni zin pa'i sngon rtags ni/ /grang ba skye zhing lus khol thig le 'dzag /pho ban zhing g.yang za yan lag 'khums/ /me rlung zin pa'i rtags ni mkhris pa rgyas/ /sems
43b5(rgyud 'grel): nyams drod skyes ro stod lci zhing na/ /rmi ltas mi mthong snang ba dmar po mthong/ /'chi rlung g.yang za 'gro 'dod sems mi dga' / /mi rtags 'bur dang lhung dang 'phrang mi thar/ /bde gshegs rlung 'dzin sems bde gnyid med gnas/ /gsus pa'i gegs
43b6(rgyud 'grel): sel rims bzhin 'di ltar bya/ /dmigs pas me spangs khebs bsreg par bya/ /chu mig brgyad la rnal 'byor rlangs pa 'thul/ /chu 'brug sa sbyang rlung gi phyag dar bya/ /tho rangs mi bskyod grangs nas btung bar bya/ /rlung la me sgoms ha ma rgyud dmar
43b7(rgyud 'grel): chen dril/ /bel rtol brgyab pas ba spu'i bu ga che/ /'khor lo bsgom zhing grang ba sel bar byed/ /dbus mar ma chud chu rlung gzhan zhugs na/ /bad gnan bas bu ga gnyis dag byed/ /lus bca' chu 'brub rlangs pa 'thul bar bsam/ /me rlung gnyis
44a1(rgyud 'grel): kis 'byung bar sems gtad do/ /khris pa ldang na gangs kyi chu 'brub bya/ /bdud rtsis lus gang gangs nas du ba 'thul/ /spyi bor bla ma'i bdud rtsi lus la byug /rlung gi rlung ni 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /byang chub sems kyi ting nge 'dzin la
44a2(rgyud 'grel): bslab/ /gzhan yang nang rtags nas 'don zhal las shes/ /rlung gnas nad kyi brtag pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon a dzo kis mdzad pa rdzogs sho/ //rgya gar skad du/ tsit+ta ta two po da? shaM nA ma/ bod skad du/ sems nyid kyi de nyid bcing bzhes bya ba
44a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nyid kyis ni bcings pa la/ /de nyid kyis ni grol bar byed/ /bla ma'i bka' yis thams cad rtogs/ /g.yon nas 'gro pa'i lce sbyar ni/ /de bzhin g.yas 'gro shes par bya/ /ko d+ha li ni smra bar byed/ /de tsam gyis ni bya ba grub/ /
44a4(rgyud 'grel): grub/ /'khor pas ba ni de nyid tsam du rtogs/ /bshad dang dkyil 'khor ci zhig bya/ /gang gis bcings pa ma rtogs sam/ /g.yon nas 'gro ba'i lce sbyang ni/ /de gnyis g.yas 'gro shes par byed/ /ko d+ha li ni smra par byed/ /de tsam gyis ni bya ba grub//
44a5(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ? sgyur nas yal ga dag /btsal ba nges ni ci zhig bya/ /bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag gis/ /'jig rten ? yang gsal par byas/ /g.yon nas 'gro ba'i lce sbyang yang/ /de nyid g.yas 'gro shes par byed/ /de tsam gyis ni bya ba grub/ /chos nyid ji ltar
44a6(rgyud 'grel): snang ba yang/ /de yi rang bzhin rang la bzhag /g.yon nas 'gro ba'i lce sbyang yang/ /de nyid g.yas 'gro shes par byed/ /ko d+ha li ni smra bar byed/ de tsam gyis ni bya ba grub/ /sems nyid kyi de nyid bcing ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ko d+ha yis mdzod pa rdzogs sho/
44a7(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du / tsaN+Da li ka bindu phra spha ra Na nA ma/ bod skad du/ gtum mo'i thig le bkram pa zhes bya ba/ yum gtum mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lus ni gru bzhi 'dom gang tshad/ /'khor lo bzhi ni rang bzhin gnas/ /rlung ni gnyis te 'khor lo drug/ /rlung gi de nyid yang
44b1(rgyud 'grel): dag ni/ /brtan dang g.yo bo'i rtsol ba dgag/ rlung gi de nyid bsgoms nas ni/ /me chu sa yi de nyid shes/ /rtsa gsum gru gsum rang bzhin te/ /phyi rol ma yin nang yin no/ /srog gi rtsa nas yab kyi ngos/ /sor bzhi gnas su de gnas te/ /thig le dang ldan yi ge oM//
44b2(rgyud 'grel): lta ba ye shes 'khor lo yin/ /sprul ba'i gnas su bsgom bya ste/ /de steng sor ni bcu gnyis la/ /chos kyi rang bzhin brgyad du ni/ /rigs bzhi yum bzhi sa bon gyi/ /rlung dang me dang chu ru gnas/ /de steng longs spyod bcu drug ni/ /me long
44b3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes yi ge i/ /gsal la shel ltar bsgom par bya/ /bde chen 'khor lo'i gnas su ni/ /a phreng gnyis ldan yi ge haM/ /de ltar shes pa'i lus gnas ni/ /bde ba chen po'i yul zhes bya/ /lte pa'i raM yig yi rlung gis/ /ye shes me
44b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid 'bar bar 'gyur/ /g.yo pa'i ye shes rlung yin te/ /brtan pa'i mtshan nyid ye shes me/ /aM bcas dbus su 'bar na ni/ /sdug bsngal dug lnga'i nang rnams dag /bdag nyid stong pa'i mnyam nyid lha/ /log min rgyu nas 'khrul 'khor bya/ /bde
44b5(rgyud 'grel): chen gnas nas chos dbyings 'bar/ /sems kyi bde ba cher skyes na/ /gzhu rgod then nas 'phen par 'gyur/ / thig le 'ther nas bkram par bya/ /sems nyid snying gar bstims nas bsgom/ /gtum mo thig le bkram pa zhes bya ba / /
