44b6(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon lu rtsi kis mdzad pa rdzogs sto// rgya gar skad du / sha rI ra Na ri ka bindu sA mA tA i nA ma / bod skad du lus kyis rtsa thig le mnyam pa nyid kyi man ngag ces bya ba/ dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji srid ?
44b7(rgyud 'grel): sdong bu rnams/ /brkos pas de ni ma byas na/ /de srid phag rgod gsod pa yi/ /mda' ba de ni tsha ste yin/ /gnad du bsnun pas phag rgod pas de/ /rdzing bu skams par ma gyur pas/ /de gong du ni brlag par byas/ /dpag ched phyed dang bzhi pa yin?  /gru bzhi 
45a1(rgyud 'grel): pa yi rdzing bu la/ /nang du zhugs pa byas nas ni/ /zas ni don du gnyer par byed/ /shin tu bkang bar byas nas ni/ /gnad du bsnun nas phag rgod bsad/ /rdzing bu skams par ma gyur par/ /de gong du ni brlag par byas/ /lte ba'i
45a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gzhu ru byas/ /rtsa gnyis de ni rgyud du sbrengs/ /bla ma'i man ngag mda' ru byas/ /shin tu bkang par byas nas ni/ /gnad du bsnun nas phag rgod bsad/ /rdzing bu bskams par ma gyur par/ /de gong du ni brlag par byas/ /mtsho la
45a3(rgyud 'grel): phag rgod ji ltar 'thung/ /'phrang la snying ni gzugs byas nas/ /gnad du bsnun nas phag rgod bsad/ /ji srid rdzing bu ma skams par/ /de gong du ni brlag par byas/ /lus kyi rtsa thig mnyam pa nyid kyi man ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon ni ku nis
45a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ tsa turbud+d+hab+ha ba b+hya ba sha ni kra maM nA ma/ bod skad du / 'byung ba bzhi'i srid pa'i cha lugs zhes bya ba/ thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ri rab zur na brgyad pa dang/ /rol pa'i
45a5(rgyud 'grel): mtsho ni bdun pa dang/ /tshangs pa brgya byin nyi ma dang/ /zla ba dang ni lha chen dang/ /mthu chen 'di dag rtag min na/ /bdag gis ji ltar brtan pa thob/ /bdag ni brtags na ji ltar yin/ /bdag gi ma ni gang du song/ /pha yang gang du song bar
45a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /'di lta bu yi 'jig rten ni/ /bltas pas 'jig rten rmi lam 'dra/ /stobs ldan gyur na sus kyang bkur/ /stobs nyams gyur na smra mi byed/ /de bas tshem bu'i gos gyon la/ /bsod snyoms kyis ni 'tsho ba de/ /yul dang grong
45a7(rgyud 'grel): khyer so ma ru/ /yang yang sbrang pa mkhas pa yin/ /'di lta bu yi spyod pa yis/ /'jig rten kun la rgyal ba thob/ /skal ldan dag ni tsa ? pa tri smra/ /'byung ba bzhi srid pa'i cha lugs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon tsa ra pa tris mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //
45b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ At+ma pa rag dz+nyA na driSh+Ti u pa de sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ rang rig ye shes kyi lta ba'i nyams len zhes bya ba/ yum bdag med ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang rig ye shes las yin na/ /byed pa po med las med do/ /de dag med na bya ba
45b2(rgyud 'grel): med/ gsum ni ji ltar gnyis med do/ /gal te phyi ni bden pa yin/ /tha snyad 'brel phyir nang du brjod/ /gal te kun rdzob rang rig yin/ /rig pas rig pa rig pa med/ /rnal 'byor bdag nyid rig na ni/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'joms par
45b3(rgyud 'grel): byed/ tha snyad 'di yis dngos po rnams/ /rang bzhin ma grub dri ma med/ /dngos po rnams ni ma grub pas/ /gzhan dag dag la grub? rgyu med/ /de phyir bdag ni rten med pa/ /gal te sgra don rtogs bya yin/ /rang bzhin don la sgra don med//
45b4(rgyud 'grel): dngos po ma grub rnal 'byor pa/ /da bdag 'di ni gzhan ma bral/ /gnyis bral ma rig mun pa med/ /de med dri med ye shes te/ /'di ltar rnal 'byor rig pa yis/ /'khor ba'i 'ching ba grol par byed/ /gan rgyal nyal ba rnal 'byor gyis//
45b5(rgyud 'grel): lus kyi rnam gzhag dran par gyis/ /mig bgrang rnam par shes pa 'bul/ /nam mkha' i phyogs su bltas byas pas/ /mthong rgyu yid la 'dzin rgyu med/ /phyogs kyi rtog pa bral ba yin/ /dbang po nub 'gyur gnyis med 'grub/ /rang rig ye shes kyi nyams
45b6(rgyud 'grel): len zhes bya ba/ slob dpon tsampa? kas mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ tsa bu ra muk+ti ka ra NaM u pa yaM nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'jigs pa brgyad rmongs par byed pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sprul stag
45b7(rgyud 'grel): tshom rkun mdal dang ma yis ni/ /'jigs bas mi 'jigs klu sgrub gdams pa thob/ /skar mkhan pi kha na ni 'jigs med de/ /'on kyang rnal 'byor nyams kyi nus pa bri/ /sems nyid 'dul zhing bdud 'joms rnal 'byor la/ /las ni ma rtogs rkyen gyi
46a1(rgyud 'grel): bar chod 'byung/ /de phyir dang po rnal 'byor sgrub pa pos/ /'jigs skyob dran zhing bla ma spyi bor bsgom/ /sbyor ba bcas pa'i snying po la sogs bzla/ /oM ste a rjes la ni bzhi pas sbyar/ /ka phreng gnyis pa las 'byung gsum pa ste//
46a2(rgyud 'grel): A phreng gsum pa rnal 'byor 'brel par mdzod/ /baM gyis bcings te d+ha ni rjes su bri/ /skan gyis dang po dbyangs can lnga pas bcings/ /la dang i 'byor sha za'i skad yin no/ /dbyangs can bcu gsum yi ge tsa yig ni/ /'brel nas mthar yang 'byung chen
46a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa bri/ /byis 'byung seng ge'i nang du stag ltar spyod/ /byA b+ha'i sgra sgrogs stag gi 'jigs pa med/ /kaM d+hA bzla zhing mda' yis 'jigs pa bral/ /sab pa snal chen rnams kyis 'jigs pa sel/ /mu khaM kha bcings band+ha swAhA bri// //
46a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i don du rnal 'byor sems bskyed nas/ /bzlas bya nyon mongs bral zhing thar pa thob/ /a khu nag po'i khrag gis mig sman dang/ /sor bzhi'i shang bu blangs nas rnam par 'phyang/ /zla brgyad ro yis yan lag brgyad blangs nas/ /zla ba'i
46a5(rgyud 'grel): zhag la mchod dang gtor ma byas/ /zla zin dus su mi snang sgrub bzlas bya/ /tshe na'i sbyor bas mgo ni mthong min no/ /mi mthong mi snang sbyor ba 'di yin no/ /oM ka li ka li mahA ka li/ maM sa shod+ha ni bo d+ha ni/ /sman ? na b+ha si ni d+ha byi dang/ ma maM pa sh+yan+ta ma chu? sha/
46a6(rgyud 'grel): a dang ha ha hI:hUM swA hA mthar/ /brgyad dang bcu bzhi nag po'i tshes la ni/ /gos dmar gtsor? bu dur khrod mtshan mo ni/ /khri bzlas rok+ta'i gtor mas mi snang 'grub/ /da ni rnal 'byor yang snying sbyor ba ni/ /snying po 'di lta ste gzhan yang zhal las blang/ /oM
46a7(rgyud 'grel): ru d+ha ki rA ti/ ki ri ki ri/ mi ri mi ri/ ru drA? a me la/ k+Shu pa k+Shu pa swAhA// //'di ni brgyad brgya rnal 'byor bzlas byas nas/ /lam du 'gro ba'i dus su sbyor ba bya/ /sbral stag chom rkun mda' bcing bshad byas nas/ /sreg byed me'i nus pa'i rten
46b1(rgyud 'grel): 'brel bshad/ /chu bal btang ba sbal tshil 'dzam b+hir chu/ /zhib du btags nas rkang pa lag pa bsku/ /'di ltar snying po nye snying bshad byas nas/ /shar ba'i mar gyis gtor nas bsreg mi nus/ /sid+d+hwi? nA gArdzu na ba dang ni/ /agni? mo ha ri ha ra sgra dang/
46b2(rgyud 'grel): de rjes te ta da ka ran+ta? bri/ /ni pa ri b+ha na te mi nus med/ /oM sid+d+hi ni gArdzu na pa ste /pa yi ra gsum mthar sngags rdzogs par bzla/ /lan gsum gcod cing yungs kar mar khu gtor/ /lcags bsregs ma ru zhugs kyang bsreg mi nus/ /nus pa mtha?
46b3(rgyud 'grel): phyin sngags sbyor gnyis pa ni/ /na mo la b+hi shwa mi tra ya te/ /hU ta b+ha ha ha staM staM b+ha ya mi/ /ci li swAhA me nus med par gyis/ /de ltar byang sems ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /rim bzhin bsgrubs na 'grub 'gyur the tshom med/ /'jigs pa brgyad
46b4(rgyud 'grel): rmongs par byed pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon b+ha kha nas mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du / bi Sha an+ta ra bA hya ni bri ti pha b+ha nakra maM?/ bod skad du / phyi nang gi dug sel gyi rim pa zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag
46b5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /yid dang mthun pa'i sgrub gnas su/ /phyi nang dug ni sel ba yi/ /gsang ba'i rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i thabs/ /tai lo bdag gis bshad par bya/ /rnal 'byor bskyed pa'i rim par ldan/ /ru tsog sbrul la sogs pa yi/ /dug chen 'dzoms pa'i
46b6(rgyud 'grel): oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ /lan gsum brjod cing 'di ltar bsam/ /rtse mor bcu gnyis tshad du ni/ /spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu gal? /dbus su oM bsam bdud rtsi 'bab/ /sbyor ba de yi rnal 'byor ni/ /skad cig gcig la mdangs ldan no/ /de ni phyi yi dug sel to// //
46b7(rgyud 'grel): nang zhi 'di ltar bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje chen po'i snying ga'i dbus/ /sku mdog dkar po bsil ba'i 'od/ /chos gnyis zla bar sprin chen po/ /bsgoms shing 'phros 'gyur rnam par bsdu/ /yang dang yang du bsam byas pas/ /nang gi nad med kun tu bzang//
47a1(rgyud 'grel): ri rgyal dang mnyam dug yod kyang/ /skad cig gcig la sel zhing 'dren/ /skabs las byung ba'i dug sel ni/ /'dab brgyad pad+ma na sa ru/ /zla dkar gsal zhing dri ma med/ /ye shes lnga ldan bdud rtsi ni/ /a yig de dbus bsam par
47a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ dug lnga gag lhog rkyen gyi nang/ /spre'u khyim bya'i gzugs can rnams/ /de dag phyung zhing nam mkhar thim/ /bdag gi sku gsung thugs rdo rje/ /'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs khams dang/ /gzugs med khams dang dngos med pas/ /de phyir rang
47a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nam mkha' ste/ /des ni stong pa rten yod pa/ /rnal 'byor mi rtog sems gtang ngo/ /phyi nang nang sel gyi gdams pa/ /slob dpon tai los mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ d+ha naM d+ha ta tra ya mu khA a g+haM maM nA ma/ bod skad du /g.yung
47a4(rgyud 'grel): drung 'khyil pa gsum gyi zhal gdams kyi nyams len zhes bya ba/ yum rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma'i zhal gdams thob byas nas/ /g.yung drung gsum gyi gdams pa ni/ /stong nyid don ni rtogs pa'i phyir/ /kaM ka me kha la bshad bya//
47a5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi lus ni khong stong la/ /spyi bor brtsams nas lte pa'i bar/ /rtsa gsum ser dang dkar dmar ro/ /de rnams nang ni khong stong ste/ /g.yas kyi rtsa la khab rtse tshang/ /rang bzhin gsal la bsam par bya/ /g.yon par zla ba'i thig le ste/ /dbus kyi rtsa ni khong
47a6(rgyud 'grel): stong ngo/ /de la sems gtad phyi nang stong/ /shes pa rgod na g.yas g.yon gyi/ /thig le gnyis la sems gtad la/ /de nas dbu bcad d+hU tI'i steng/ /h+rI:las g.yung drung 'khyil ba ni/ /me yi mdog can rnam bsam bya/ /g.yung drung 'khyil pa'i grur?
47a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi la/ /oM dang A:dang hUM dang phaT/ /g.yas phyogs ra sa'i steng du ni/ /a las zla ba'i g.yung drung 'khyil/ /byang chub sems kyi chu rlung bkag /g.yon pa la la na'i steng du ni/ /oM las g.yung drung 'khyil pa dmar/ /bsam pas me yi rlung 'gag go/
47b1(rgyud 'grel): dza nas rlung gi 'khor lo nas/ /rlung ni langs te mgrin par slob/ /dbus su bde gshegs rlung rgyu bas/ /sor ni bcu gnyis rtsa 'thon nas/ /g.yas g.yon chu rlung me rlung ni/ /nyi zla'i rtsa nas 'byung byas nas/ /lha mo gnyis dag zhal du rdub/ /slar yang nyis kyis
47b2(rgyud 'grel): phu byas pas/ /rtsa dag gnyis kyis rtsa bug brtol/ /rnam par rgyu ste g.yung drung 'phog /dbus kyi sems bskor byas nas su/ /gnyis ni g.yas skor g.yon skor ro/ /slar yang rlung gi phu byas nas/ /g.yung drung gnyis la thim byas nas/ /dbus kyi 'khyil
47b3(rgyud 'grel): pa thim par bsam/ /ye shes me spar rang lus ni/ /mgrin pa'i gnas nas rkang mthil bar/ /rim gyis zhu ste chos dbyings su/ /mnyam nyid thig ler sems gtong ngo/ /brtags pas ma grub dngos med yin/ /dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad
47b4(rgyud 'grel): bral/ de? ltar ma bsgoms ci byas kyang/ /lhan skyes ma rtogs 'khor bar 'khyams/ /thig le de las blangs byas nas/ /bdag nyid dbu bcad sum du bskyed de nas lte bar h+rIM:yig bsam /sum mdo rlung ldang gyen la rgyu/ /h+ri ni thig la gsum du
47b5(rgyud 'grel): zhu i ni rlung gi thig le ste/ /ha ste byang chub thog le'o/ /rak+ta'i thig le raM yig ste/ /mdor ni rim par sngo dkar dmar/ /ma shar rlung gis gyen la 'dod/ /dbu bcad rtsa sgrubs rgyu ne ni/ /steng du sor bzhi 'thon par bsam /g.yen? pa g.yon bskor g.yas
47b6(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yas/ /dbus kyi thig le 'bar zhing thim/ /lha mo gnyis kyis phus btab pas/ /g.yas g.yon thig le dbus la thim/ /de nyid mar la rdzub byas pas/ /snying ga'i hUM la thim par bsam/ /de ni gsal la dri ma med/ /gnyis med thig le rang rig ste//
47b7(rgyud 'grel): bde dang sdug bsngal thams cad bral/ /'khor ba snang ba rang rig stong/ /kye'o rnal 'byor bsgoms nas ni/ /gnyis med ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /g.yung drung 'khyil pa gsum gyi zhal gdams ni/ /yum ki? ka la me ka las gsungs pa rdzogs sho//
48a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sa ha dza? a nan+ta swa b+hA ba na nA ma/ bod skad du/ lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba/ rdo rje mkha' gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor lo rna rgyan mgul rgyan gdu bu dang/ /ska rags khyod la bzang zhing rab tu mdzes
48a2(rgyud 'grel): po la kak+ko la myos ngo mtshar che/ /skad cig gcig la he ru ka dpal dgyes/ /kye 'o rtsa lag 'di la bdag yid dga' / /lus ngag sems kyi ro ni gcig byas nas/ /nam mkhar bsdus nas rnal 'byor spas par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma skye 'di la bdag yid
48a3(rgyud 'grel): dga' / /'jigs byed dus mtshan zhabs kyi 'og du mnan/ /nam mkha' i mthar thug he dang hUM sgra spro/ /phyogs bcur chang gis myos pa yis/ /kye 'o dpal ldan rnal 'byor ma/ /kye ma dpa' po rnal 'byor med/ /stong pa dang ni snying rje'i rang bzhin la//
48a4(rgyud 'grel): dngos dang dngos med gnyis ka med/ /kye 'o rnal 'byor ma dang yum lnga'i grong/ /A li dang ni kA li nyi ma rnams/ /med pa rmongs pa rnams kyang gti mug che/ /A li rnams dang kA li nyi zla dag /med la shes min phyugs 'dra the tshom med/ /dpa' bo
48a5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ma rnams sbyor ba yis/ /srid pa'i 'ching ba gcod pa ngo mtshar che/ /kye 'o rtsa lag 'di la bdag yid dga' / /lus ngag sems kyi ro ni gcig byas nas/ /nam mkha' i khams su bsdus nas spas par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma kye 'di la bdag
48a6(rgyud 'grel): sems dga' / /tshad med gnas bzhi'i dbus su ni/ /bdag gis cir yang dngos po brjod du med/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor dbang phyug ngo mtshar che/ /ji ltar chu gting chu zla dang 'dres ltar/ /rnal 'byor ma kye 'di la bdag sems dga' / /sha rlon dam
48a7(rgyud 'grel): tshig rdzas 'di ngo mtshar che/ /go ku la sogs dam tshig la chags pas/ /de yis bdag med ma ni gar mdzad do/ /kye 'o bde gshegs rnam snang phyag rgya can/ /rnal 'byor ma kye 'di la bdag sems dga' / /lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba /
48b1(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon kaM thA ris mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du / a ti yo ga b+ha ba na nA ma/ bod skad du /a ti rnal 'byor gyi sgom pa'i thabs shes bya ba / 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dur khrod brgyad la
48b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byed brgyad/ /dus mdza' i me 'bar khams gsum bsreg /tshangs pa'i sgo nas du ba 'thul/ /rgya mtsho skams shing pad+ma 'bar/ /rdo rje ze 'bru'i dbus su ni/ /nyi ma'i gdan steng gnas pa de/ /nam mkha' i 'od chen hUM nyid sgrogs/ /mdzes
48b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems nyid rgyu ba yin/ /rus sbal 'then cing sgra skad 'byung/ /ri bong can gyis mdud pa bkrol/ /nyams myong dpa' bo rang rig rgyal/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i 'jigs pa'i bdag /mgon po nyid ni bsam bar gyis/ /de nyid snying rje'i dkyil 'khor
48b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phro/ /de nyid dur khrod me yin te/ /de nyid smra dang zla rgyun 'dzag /skye rga shi dang khams gsum gnas/ /rang nyid dran te de nyid mthong/ /'di ni gnyis med dbyibs dang bral/ /dngos po'i cho 'phrul brdzun pa ste/ /sems nyid 'khrul bsam rtogs so/ /a
48b5(rgyud 'grel): ti'i rnal 'byor rig pa med/ /ji ltar bzhag pa de ltar yin/ /gnyis med sems la rtag lta dang/ /chad par 'gyur pa'ang ma yin no/ /de phyir nyi zla'i dbus su ni/ /phra ba'i hUM nyid bsgom par gyis/ /a ti rnal 'byor gyi bsgom pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ slob
48b6(rgyud 'grel): dpon klu'i byang chub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ bA yu bo d+hi tsit+ta sra ba na b+ha ba na u pa yaM nA ma/ bod skad du/ byang chub sems kyi rlung rgyu ba'i gdams ngag bsgom pa zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /?
48b7(rgyud 'grel): khong stong bsam byas nas/ /lte ba'i dkyil du rlung nyid ni/ /phra la sngo ba yungs kar tshad/ /rnal 'byor de la sems gtad bya/ /rnal 'byor pa yi sems nyid skye/ /de nyid khong stong nam mkha' ru/ /nam mkha' i sprin ltar thim par bsam/ /rnal 'byor pho rlung 'khrog 
49a1(rgyud 'grel): tsam na/ /'di ltar me rlung bdud rtsi 'bab/ /sum mdo rgyab kyi rgal tshigs la/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po bsam/ /lte bar me dang snying gar chu/ /mgrin pa'i sa las rlangs pa thon/ /gnyis med d+hu tI me yis khengs/ /me mda' chu shing
49a2(rgyud 'grel): me tog las/ /rgyas shing sems kyi bung ba ni/ /go sar bdud rtsi 'dzib par bsam/ /rlung gis me sbar chu khol bas/ /drod skyes nam mkha' i bdud rtsi 'bab/ /khong stong bdud rtsis khengs par bsam/ /lus la bde ba chen po skye/ /'byung ba yas mar rim gyis
49a3(rgyud 'grel): thim/ rlung gi gzhu dang sems kyi mda'/ /spyi bor bde chen haM las ni/ /sa nas nam mkha' i dbyings kyi bar/ /'ja' tshon mdog ltar sems gtang bya/ /phyi nang byang chub rang la shar/ /gnyis med ye shes rang bzhin skye/ /su ta li bdag bsam mi khyab/ /
49a4(rgyud 'grel): gcig la sna tshogs ri bo can/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal skye 'gag med/ /bla ma drin gyis sgrub pa thob/ /byang chub sems kyi rlung rgyu ba'i man ngag bsgom pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ta lis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ //
49a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ tsarya driSh+Ti a nutpan+na tAta bta ba na nDa ma/ bod skad du / lta spyod skye med kyi bsgom pa zhes bya ba / bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems nyid stong pa skye med yin/ /de nyid ma bcos chos nyid de/ /de yang dbyer med lta ba rtogs//
49a6(rgyud 'grel): sgom las ma 'das pa na ?/ /? med rnal 'byor rang sar spyod/ /phyogs bcu bar med 'bras bu yin/ /de la mi re chags pa spyad/ /rang bzhin nyams skyes ngo mtshar che/ /pa na ha ni smra bar byed/ /gnyis med ye shes rtogs pa yin/ /bde chen 'dul?
49a7(rgyud 'grel): rtsi bdag gis 'thungs/ /kuny+tsa'i? phreng bas mgul ba brgyan/ /la ma'i sham thabs brtan par chings/ /myos pas nags kyi gseb du 'khyam/ /bdag nyid pa na ha ngo mtshar mthong/ /pu rim lar bdag po lnga/ /gcig dang mi 'brel ngo mtshar ?/ /
49b1(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan 'des pa'i gnas su ni/ /me tog ldum ra rgyas par byed/ /de ni ge sar 'jib par byed/ /bdag nyid bo la kak+ko la'i/ /rnal 'byor rgyal po grub pa thob/ /lta spyod skye med kyi sgom pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon pa na ha sa mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //
49b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ a yu pa ri rak+Sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ che bsgrub pa'i gdams ngag ces bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/ /bcud len zhal gyi gdams pa yis /lus ngag rtag tu
49b3(rgyud 'grel): bsrung bar bya/ /de med sgrub bya grub min pas /des na thams cad 'bad pa yis/ /don ni thams cad sgrub pa'i phyir/ /skabs 'byung tshe bsgrub 'di ru bshad/ /mar dang sprang rtsi 'o ma mnyam/ /snum pa'i snod la sbyar byas nas/ /nas kyi spang mar
49b4(rgyud 'grel): zhag gcig bzhag /de nas ston nas nye bar bza' / /so dang sen mo ? drug gis /rjes 'gyur lo ni stong thub ste/ /rtags ni mig rno stobs ldan no/ /nyer shing rtsa ba blang byas nas/ /grib skams zhib du btags par bya/ /'o ma la? no dang sbyar
49b5(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /zho ni langs nas dkrog par bya/ /mar sar blangs nas tho rangs bza' / /zhag ni bdun nas rtags 'byung ste/ /bdun gnyis gyur nas nyi 'od ldan/ /bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig nas/ /'bras bu nang sel lus yang ngo/ /lo drug tu ni bza' 
49b6(rgyud 'grel): btung gis /rnam rtog bral zhing tshe 'grub po/ /tho ? su bri srang phyed ni/ /yungs kar mar khus btul nas bza' / /shu ba'i nad sel tshe 'grub 'gyur/ /sprin nag zho gnyis sprul dmigs pa'i/ /khu bas mnyes nas gang bar bya/ /zhi rjes drug cu'i
49b7(rgyud 'grel): 'bras chan btang/ /'o ma btung zhing tsha sngo spang/ /lo gcig sbyor pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /'bring g+ha ra dza'i phye la ni/ /mang dang sprang gi rtsi sbyar nas/ /lto steng dag la bza' bar bya/ /sgyur rtsab bcud can la ? btang/ /zla ba drug tu bos 'gyur na/ /
50a1(rgyud 'grel): nad rnams sel cing nyis brgya thub/ /'bras bu gsum dang lcags phye dang/ /de bzhin 'bring ga ra dza dang/ /ru rta dang ni cha mnyam ste/ /'bring g+ha'i khu bas lde gur sngar/ /grib skams phye ma bza' bar bya/ /reg pa dang ni
50a2(rgyud 'grel): sngo skyur spang/ /lo gnyis kyis ni 'grub 'gyur ro/ /lcags kyi lhung bzed mar gyis bkang/ /lha shing rtsa ba'i shun lpags ni/ /zhib btags sbyar la lo gcig bzhag /gza' skar bzang po'i dus su bton/ /yi dam lha yi bsnyan pa bskyal/ /ra yi
50a3(rgyud 'grel): 'o ma btung bar bya/ /zla ba gsum na gnyer ma dangs?/ /zla ba drug nas rlung shugs ldan/ /lo gcig sbyor bas tshe 'grub bo/ /'bras bu gsum dang 'bring lha'i phye/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar la bza' / /sman nyid zhu ba'i dus su ni /'o ma 'bras bskol
50a4(rgyud 'grel): bza' bar bya/ /mig rno nad med sum brgya thub/ /tho rangs a ru gnyis dag dang/ /nyi ma phyed la ba ru ste/ /zhag dus skya ru bzhi dag bza' / /drug cu'i 'bras dang 'o ma yi/ /rnal 'byor kha zas ci nus btang/ /skra dkar gnyer ma nad
50a5(rgyud 'grel): med pas/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug nang med ldan/ /bya? khyung? lta bur mig rno 'gyur/ /'bras bu gsum gyi lde gu ni/ /lcags kyi snod la bskus byas la/ /nyin mtshan gnyis ni khrus byas nas/ /mar dang sprang rtsi sbyar la bza' / /lo gcig sbyor bas
50a6(rgyud 'grel): sum brgya thub/ /nang byang so dang sen mo brje/ /? lta bu'i skad ldan 'gyur/ /de phyir bdag nyid ko kil grags/ /tshe bsgrub pa'i gdams ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon ko ki las mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/
50a7(rgyud 'grel): bi Sha mi bar+NaM b+ha ba na ni kra ma nA ma /bod skad du/ dug sel sgom pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyi dang nang gi dug bzhis rtsa ba ni/ /sems can rnams kyi srog gcod 'khyams pa'i rgyu/ /de rnams sel
50b1(rgyud 'grel): thabs zhal nas zhal brgyud pa/ /a raM bdag gis bsgom lugs bshad/ /thog mar nang gi dug sel bzhi rnams la/ /zhe sdang gnyen po bdag gzhan grub med la/ /chags pa'i gnyen po mi gtsang rang lus sman/ /nga rgyal gnyen po 'di
50b2(rgyud 'grel): dag mi rtag pa/ /phrag dog 'dus pa'i nad ni spang byas nas/ /gti mug gnyen po bla ma lha nyid dang/ /rnal 'byor tshad med bzhi ni bsgom par bya/ /de yis bdag gzhan nad sel nad med 'grub/ /phyi ltar tshad med 'bras bu rang snying dbus/
50b3(rgyud 'grel): tha? yig dkar po pa tshan lnga pas brgyan/ /ye shes bya khyung? phyag rdor snying por ldan/ /bdud kyi gdan la haM sa'i bya khyung ste/ /hUM 'byung sna tshogs gser gyi gshog pa can/ /dbu skra bcas pa'i khyung zhal dmar po ste/ /rwa gnyis nyi zla'i thig
50b4(rgyud 'grel): le dag gis brgyan/ /pus mo ser la brang? dang lte ba dkar/ /'jigs byed klu rgyal rnams kyis brgyan pa bsgom/ /zhal nas haM sa'i bdud rtsi dkar ser 'dzag /ha phus zhal nas dug gi rlangs pa 'thul/ /de ltar bsgoms shing sngags kyi glu nyid
50b5(rgyud 'grel): blang/ oM a ra had Ta g+ha'i dza'i/ g+ho sa'i phyig? ka ra'i/ b+hi sun sa'i/ ? hi b+hi tu ka pa laM/ tig khu phi sa na'i/ b+his b+hi Na NaM/ ne sa su ma sa Ne/ a b+ha ru ha b+hu Nu/ b+han+ti b+hu ye sa la ye/ b+ha bi se na/ ki d+hi ta thi/ e larwa bti? la Da Na/ a tha ka'i/
50b6(rgyud 'grel): tsande tsand+h+dE? bti? sa Ne/ u pa ri d+ha hi/ a tha ka'i ka ra/ h+riM dzraM b+h+raMhma ts+tsho/ h+riM dzIM yaM/ ya sa pa yi NaM me/ dzAM g+ha li/ phi sa kha ni/ b+ha saM pi waM mi/ le pa NaM/ ma dzAM NaM ka ro yi/ dzhwa? phe khaM/ b+hi se Na pa Na ba b+ha'i/ ti naM b+he la/ e a i/ hi hi/ ri ri/ sid+d+ha dzaM ga
50b7(rgyud 'grel): li/ ra'i? rak+Shi dza yis swAhA// //dug gis zin pa 'am sprul gyis rmug pa la/ /rna bar glu len chu bzlas byin pa yis/ /skad cig gcig la dug nad sel bar 'gyur/ /da ni bskyed rim rdzogs rim 'di ltar bsgom/ /bde chen nam
51a1(rgyud 'grel): mkhar saM ste haM yig gis/ /zla ba'i thig le dkar la gangs ltar bsal/ /nam mkha' i dbyangs nas bdud rtsi'i 'od zer ni/ /dkar ser 'dzags te khong stong lus stong dag /rkang la zhugs pa'i phyi nang dug rnams ni/ /rdzogs pa'i
51a2(rgyud 'grel): rim pas sel 'gyur the tshom med/ /zla ches dkar po thig les brgyan pa ni/ /sems nyid bdud rtsi'i dbus su dkar mar ltar/ /snying ga'i kha sbyor? pad dbus sbyor byed na/ /de yis phyi nang dug sel byang chub sgrub/ /phyi yi dug rnams sel pa'i sman sbyor ni//
51a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan mo'i sman ni srang gcig 'o mar bskol/ /dug sen rnams la btang bas dug 'dren no/ /mtshan mo ma dang sprul dmig thang bskol te/ /lo dug sbyor du ka rnams ni sel 'gyur/ /rig pa 'dis ni ras la lan bdun bzlas/ /dug can nad pa de yis bkab?
51a4(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /de nas chu yi snod la rkang lag bcug /sngags 'di bzlas shing brab cing gdab/ /oM na ma sha pa raM na/ sha ba ri ku ma ra ka naM/ khu khur/ sa ra sar/ pa tra pra b+hi shud+d+ha/ b+ha raM swahA/ /de ltar bzlas shing byang chub sems bsgom mo/ /gdams
51a5(rgyud 'grel): ngag 'di bstan dge pa'i rtsab 'dis//gang thob de yis 'gro drug sems can thams cad kyi/ /nyon mongs sgrib bdag cing byang chub sems/ /dri med mkha' ltar phyag rgya chen po thob par shog /dug sel bsgom pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon a raM
51a6(rgyud 'grel): gis mdzad pa rdzogs sho?// //rgya gar skad du / a dwa ya ni ri ka b+ha ba na kra maM/ bod skad du/ gnyis med kyi rtsa bsgom pa'i rim pa/ gnyis med bde chen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi glong? dkyil du/ /myos par dbyings su rin chen stor
51a7(rgyud 'grel): kye ma rigs nyams ngo mtshar che/ /mnyam nyid gnas su gnyis med 'gyur/ /bdag gis de ni ma rtogs pas/ /ni la band+has mtshams su 'joms/ /bdag gis de ni ma rtogs pas/ /dge sbyong gis ni mtshams su 'joms/ /gnyis md sems ni gnyis med
51b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur/ /mkha' yi bdag nyid mgul nas 'khyud/ /bdag gzhan rje ba'i khyad par byas/ /gnyen 'dun thams cad brlag par bya/ /da ni bdag gis ma rtogs pas/ /ni la khatsb+has? mtshams su 'joms/ /de ni bdag gis ma rtogs pas/ /dge sbyod gis ni mtshams su
51b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzoms/ /gzhon nu lo ni bcu gnyis ma/ /ci yang bdag gis rtogs pa med/ /rnal 'byor kun gyi byed gnas pas/ /'phyon ma dang ni 'dra bar byas/ /de ni bdag gis ma rtogs pas/ /ni la khandas?  mtshams su 'joms/ /dung dang gser dang dngul dag kyang//
51b3(rgyud 'grel): gcig kyang bdag la dgos pa med/ /bdag nyid 'thad pa'i grogs dang 'grogs/ /he ru ka la 'khyud pa yis/ /bdag gi rgyal srid ngo mtshar che/ /nam mkha' i deng tsor? chags pa la/ /sus kyang ma mthong ngo mtshar che/ /rnal 'byor ma brgyad dga' zhing 'khyud//
51b4(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka dang 'khyud nas gnas/ /gnyis med kyi rtsa bsgom pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon nag po nas rgyud pa/ slob dpon ni la khand+has mdzad pa rdzogs sho?// //rgya gar skad du / suk+Sha?  yo gi nA ma/ bod skad du/ pra ba'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba/
51b5(rgyud 'grel): dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyim du khyim bdag rnal 'byor pa/ /gsang 'khyud gnyis med bsgom par bya/ /'jigs pa can gyi rnam rtog 'di/ /khyod kyis 'di kun sba bar gyis/ /tshad kyang gzung du med pa la/ /de yi rigs kyang rtogs pa med//
51b6(rgyud 'grel): sa mu dra yi dge spyod ni/ /sa gsum grags pas khyab par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid myos pa'i cha lugs kyis/ /dug lnga khrus shing dag par 'gyur/ /'jigs pa can gyi rnam rtog 'di/ /nang du mnan nas bsad par gyis/ /rigs kyi nga rgyal spang byas nas/ /dge sbyong
51b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis smras pa yin/ /dbang po sna tshogs mthong 'gyur kyang/ /dus kyi pho nyas dran pa yis/ /ci phyir bdag nyid 'gro 'od byed/ /mdza' gnyis bral na don rnams grub/ /'dzigs pa can gyi rnam rtog 'di/ /sems 'di mnan nas spang bar gyis/ /rnal 'byor
52a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam rtog gcod pa yis/ /su mu dra dag dngos med 'gyur/ /phro ba'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa yis so/ /bdag nyid gnyis med grub pa thob/ /phra ba'i rnal 'byor gyi nyams len zhes bya ba/ slob dpon sa mu dres mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //
52a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ bA ? an+ta ra a mri ta ka lnga nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyi nang bdud rtsi'i bcud len zhes bya ba/ rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyun chad bdud rtsis gsang ba bcud len gyis/ /nyams len thabs dang de yi sman sbyor dang/ /nyams su blangs
52a3(rgyud 'grel): na tshe rang grub pa thob/ /de phyir bdag nyid bya ra'i nyams len bshad/ /rnal 'byor phyi yi nyams len byed na ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis rang lus dag par byas/ /rnam snang mi bskyod rin chen 'byung ldan la/ 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa rnams/ /rang gi lus
52a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas nyams len shes pa med/ /mA ma kI yi ? btus nyams len bshad/ /rnam snang blangs la rdo rje'i chu yis dkrug /bcir nas snod kyi nang du thun phyed bzhag /byin brlabs mchod bya rlung med sa ru brdung/ /rlung nad can la bu ram sbyar bar bya/ /bad kan
52a5(rgyud 'grel): can la tsha ba gsum dang sbyar/ /dri med rnam snod btsir nas grib skam bya/ /zhib par btags nas mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar/ /mi bskyod pa yis sbrus nas bza' btung bya/ /sha dang 'o ma za zhing chang rnams spang/ /rnam snang nyams len bdag nyid b+hya ris
52a6(rgyud 'grel): smras/ /mi skyod skol nas mar dang kha ra sbyar/ /grangs par byas nas rnal 'byor btung bar bya/ /chang dang bud med spangs nas zla drug grub/ /mi skyod bcud len b+hya ris smra bar byed/ /rin chen 'byung ldan g+hand+hi dngul chu dang/ /ra yi 'o ma sprad dang b+hi ta sta/ /zhib
52a7(rgyud 'grel): par btags nas ka ra la sogs sbyar/ /mar khu bton nas rnal 'byor lus la byugs/ /sman rnams gtong dus khengs pa'i dus su btang/ /gzhan dang mi 'dra b+ha ri stobs skyes/ /dbyar zla gsum la don yod grub pa yi/ /a rur dang ? tsha sbyar la bza' //
52b1(rgyud 'grel): ston gsum ga ra a ru ra sbyar nas/ /rnal 'byor pa ni lto stong dag la ?/ /dgun gsum 'bras bu gsum dang sbyar la bza' / /dpyid gsum mar sbrang 'bras bu gsum sbyar bza' / /don yon grub pa'i rnal 'byor bcud len pas/ /nad rnams sel cing don
52b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams grub par byed/ /shing mngar sbrang mar 'od dpag med pa 'bras bu gsum/ /gcod zhe dang sbyar zos na nad rnams sel/ /cis kyang rnal 'byor bla ma'i zhal la ltos/ /'od dpag med kyi bcud len b+hya ris smas/ /zla ba drug nas rnal 'byor ru rta
52b3(rgyud 'grel): skol la btang/ /dkar gsum mngar gsum rten dbang chu skol btang/ /mdor na ci dgos kha zas rim gyis spangs/ /brag la sbyar nas b+hya ris brtan par bya/ /kha zas rgyun chad bshad nas gsang bshad par bya/ /snying ga'i dbus nas yi dam lha nyid ni//
52b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje phag mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ldan/ /sems dpa' i skyel krung bdud rtsi bum pa 'dzin/ /ngag du hUM brjod snying ga gyen la bzlogs/ /yum gyi 'od kyis dkar nag mtshams su bcad/ /oM A:hUM brjod zhal nas bdud rtsi 'dzags/ /dkar nag bcad pa'i
52b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshams nas 'bab pa yin/ /rang lus khong stong zho ltar gang bar bsam/ /de ni ting 'dzin sems dpa' bdag gis smras/ /mdun gyi mkha' pa ye shes sems dpa' ste/ /yid kyis dran nas de yi 'od kyis ni/ /rang gi smin mtshams yan chad thod pa can//
52b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems dpas oM A:hUM brjod pas/ /thed pa'i bdud rtsi 'dzags te rtsa spubs zhugs/ /bum pa'i 'og tu ra 'bar bdud rtsi bluys/ /de nas 'dres pas lus na bdud rtsis gang/ /gnyis med de yi stobs kyis chu ser sogs/ /gsang ba'i gnas
52b7(rgyud 'grel): nas mar la 'dzags par bsam/ /de nas ma shar yang la bdud rtsis rang lus gang/ /slar yang rnal 'byor thod pa'i bcad 'phro las/ /bdud rtsi sor gcig lung nas gang bltar bsam mo/ /gal te rnal 'byor rlung khams skyes na ni/ /snying ga'i bum pa mar gyis
53a1(rgyud 'grel): gang bar bsam/ /mkhris pas skya rims tshad nad 'bab nad la/ /ga bur chu bzhin nang lus bsil bar bsam/ /rnal 'byor gra? ba'i nad ni na gyur na/ /drod sman rnams kyis stobs ni bsgom par bya/ /sgoms kyang skyon h+riM yig
53a2(rgyud 'grel): blo ldan bzla/ /b+hya ri bdag gis gsang ba'i bcud len smras/ /brtan pa'i sems kyis rnal 'byor nyid kyis bsgrubs/ /nyams su myong ba'i yon tan nad rnams sel/ /zla drug shes rab blo 'phel rang bzhin skye/ /slob dpon b+hya ris gsungs pa'i phyi nang gi
53a3(rgyud 'grel): bcud len gyi gdams pa rdzogs sho?// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta ratna pa las rang 'gyur du mdzad nas/ bshad rgyud kyi gdams pa bar ma chad par gsungs pa'o// //phyag rgya chen po brda'i brgyud pa'i glu zhes bya ba
53a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs/ /rgya gar skad du/ mahA mu dra bri gI ti/ bod skad du / phyag rgya chen po brda'i brgyud pa/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro dang/ /skyabs gnas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gyad kyi lus la dngul gyi ya lnga gyon pa kun gyis blta bar
53a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzes/ /ta la'i mgo bcad rtsa ba de la myu gu skye mi 'gyur/ /ro ni sa yi 'og nas kaM ka'i skad kyis 'byin par nus/ /gang ga sgrol ba'i rgyal pa 'di la gces spras bya bar rigs/ /skyes bu seng ge'i gsob mthong ba ni skal bar ldan/ /ging pa rang
53a6(rgyud 'grel): gis byed pa dar gyi srin bu snying re rje/ /ji ltar bros kyang grib ma 'di la gzugs kyis thar pa med/ /spu gri'i so la chags pa'i sbrang rtsi lngags na phung bar nges/ /rdo yi mi 'di srin mo'i gling du skral kyang mi dga' med/ /gnyen po phyir 'phel 'dab chags skye
53a7(rgyud 'grel): ga go cha bzang/ /rin chen gter gyi thang kar nyal ba'i dbul mo snying re rje/ /shing rta brel ba'i rgyu ni 'khor lo'i sgrom du chud pas lan/ /rgyal po'i rjes gnang thob pa'i mi de gshed ma la mi 'jigs/ /rnga yab lag na thogs bzhin 'ja' tri dug sprang phyir
53b1(rgyud 'grel): mi skrod/ /'brug gi sgra med rma bya'i mngal du sgo nga chags mi 'gyur/ /ma ga d+ha ru dngul chu 'thungs pa des ni gang ga brgal/ /li khri kha ru chud pa'i gsil pa thams cad mtshal du 'bab/ /gzeb nas thon nas gshed ma'i lag du 'gro bar ma byed cig/ lho ru
53b2(rgyud 'grel): rkun mo'i snying sha zol drang srong rgyal mtshan phyi ru phud/ /ro la gser gyi phreng ba btags pa de'i gan du 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /sman mchog bsil mngar mi btsong mi na lus kyis btung bar bya/ /glang po rgyu shwe lcags kyus phrogs pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che ba yin//
53b3(rgyud 'grel): gdan sar bton pa'i rgyal bu'i lag nas tshangs pa'i skud pa da long zhig /dmus long mig gis do lo ci 'dra'i lan ni thebs par mi 'gyur ro/ /dgos 'dod sna tshogs 'byung ba'i nor bu'i nus pa su la blangs pa yin/ /skom pa'i phyir ni lan tshwa'i chu rgod ?  thub
53b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mi de ltas ngan yin/ /dug las skyes pa'i srin bu 'di yis da khos man ngag bstan nas yong/ /mu da ag la btab pa'i gzugs de g+hand+ha log tu shes par byos/ /ku ru kul+la'i gnas su sgrol mas gsungs so// //
53b5(rgyud 'grel): sgyu rtsal lus la med pa'i mi yis gyad kyi spyod pa dor ba rung/ /dri ma can gyi lus kyis tshangs pa'i sgo lnga nam yang mthong mi 'gyur/ /chu srin kha ru gru chud ded dpon 'di yi spyod pa da ltos dang/ /mu tig phreng ba pad+ma'i skud pas zla ba'i dbus su skyu bar bya/ /
53b6(rgyud 'grel): shul dkar u shugs la tshogs 'gron pa'i don ni nyi ma rgas pas shor/ /de mthong bdud ni mig phyis phyogs bzhir gad mo rtag skad 'tsher/ /mkha' la 'phur ba'i nus pa bangs pa'i dus der skams/ /mkhregs lam thur gzhol grud de shing rta
53b7(rgyud 'grel): brel ba gang gi stobs las byung/ /dug sprul ske bcad nus pa med pa rnal 'byor pa yis gzigs/ /rnyog ma'i chu la bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor 'char bar rab tu dka' / /rkang pa chag pa'i sma dkris mgo la 'ching ba'i mi de 'ja' tri yin/ /rdzab las
54a1(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa bkrus nas 'do li'i steng du 'dzegs pa bzang/ /rus sbal khog pa pha lam rdzas kyi rdo rjes bcag pa ngo mtshar che/ /ma gi ta yod sa la brang 'gros blta bar mi nus so/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i chu ni ro dang lhan cig 'grogs
54a2(rgyud 'grel): pa min/ /nagS la me mched phyogs bzhi'i rlung ni grogs su 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo lha sras la ni skyo bar 'gyur ma yin/ /ka ma ru ru smyon pa'i chu la su yis 'thung bar nus/ /so ma btang ba'i rdza ni chu la skol bar mi bya'o/ /stag ni ri mo yod pa lan
54a3(rgyud 'grel): te rtag tu dgra dang 'grogs/ /b+hand+ha med par gser 'gyur rtsi mchog rang dgar shes pa min/ /chung dus mi 'dzin bco lnga'i zla ba rgyas pa 'di la sgra gcan dbang/ /bu shi'i ma bu mthong ba'i 'gro ba bzang mo mya ngan re ma/ /zhing bas chu lung rten la sa bon
54a4(rgyud 'grel): skyon med gdab par bya/ /dar mchog dug la blud pa'i ral gri 'di la brdeg sa yod/ /smyon pa'i shul du 'brangs na snying gar ye ge sna tshogs 'char/ /mi 'gyur mkha' la lding ba'i bya g+h+ri 'di la gdams pa yod/ /byang phyogs kha ba can du phyin na 'gro la
54a5(rgyud 'grel): phan par 'gyur/ /dpal 'bras dpung rang 'byung gi rtsar 'jam dpal gyis gsungs pa'o// //yi ge'i phreng ba nyi zla'i bar du dpa' bo'i spyan gyis blta bar gyis/ /rma bya'i mdongs kyi kha dog nam bris 'di yi mkhan po su zhig yin//
54a6(rgyud 'grel): khab len rdo yi phyogs der lcags bran rgyug ste de la rig byed med/ /glang po'i mgo la rwa med chag gis dogs pa'i sdug bsngal skye mi 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i gzeb du chud pa'i mi de thar ram sde mig yid la bgyis/ /ging ba'i las byas sgyu ma'i dge slong
54a7(rgyud 'grel): la ni ltung bas gos mi 'gyur/ /wa dang glang po bud ba sha za seng ge smyon pa'i spyod 'gros ltos/ /skyon gyis mgos dngul chu ta rus mthung bar byed/ /gcig cig gcig la gcig pa nyid du shes par gyis/ /gzan du pha lam sgrug pa'i byed gA yin su
54b1(rgyud 'grel): yis? mthong bar 'gyur/ /mtshan ldan lus la sgyu rtsal ma sbyangs gyad du 'gyur ma yin/ /lnga ti'i dral drungs yun ring na chu nyid drag par 'gyur/ /dang la ? gris lce chod de rus khyod kyi kha nas rig byed thon/ /'khri shing lo 'bras smin cing lci bas rgyas su ma
54b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jug cig/ rtsal gsum lus la rdzogs pa'i seng ge 'di la yang cung zad med/ /dgun 'brum tshal nas gram pa snyag po'i spre'u snying re rje/ /chu nang rdo bor cha? na de dus zla ba gud du song ba med/ /dur ba gzeb kyi ri bong 'di yi spyod 'gros blta bar bya/ /rdo
54b3(rgyud 'grel): yi mi la ngan du smras dang bsngags pa khyad par yod dam ci/ /lha rdzas shel la me chu gnyis ka 'byung ba ngo mtshar che/ /gal nang zas la rgyug pa'i sems can de ni snying rje'i yul/ /gyad kyis khrid kyang 'khor lo dang bral shing rtas lam mi chod/ /rkang
54b4(rgyud 'grel): la khong dril bud pa'i mi de blo sems bde/ /las su 'phangs pas zil gyis mi skyug go la phyir mi 'bod/ /dal ba'i dbang med rdza mkhan 'khor po srub thad chod na bde/ /skyon gyis ma gos utpal chu nang skyes pa rang sar shog /gshed mas gzung
54b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ltas ngan mi de rgyab du mig mi blta/ /dud 'gro'i rgyal po'i gtsug gi nor bu'i thog ma gnas 'ongs/ /ri bo bya rkang du spyan ras gzigs kyis gsungs pa'o// //tsandan chus bkrus lus kyi sprin med mkha' la gza' bral nyi ma
54b6(rgyud 'grel): ltos/ /srin mo'i phang du bu shor nye zho med par log pa'i mi de gang/ /nam zhig byi ba'i dug ngang ma bral thar pa thob mi 'gyur/ /lag pa re rer me long gnyis phyar byad de gang la lta ba yin/ /stod la mnan pa'i seng ge'i gam du spos kyi glang po
54b7(rgyud 'grel): ga chad du/ /mchil lham steng du rkang bzhag sa stengs thams cad de dus ko bas g.yogs/ /'khor los sgyur rgyal gang du gshegs pa'i lam du rin chen gzhan rnams 'brang/ /pa ta ming gis bslus te bsngo ba nyan dus de dus de cha gces pa dor//
55a1(rgyud 'grel): bu ram tshal mthong rkang la khong bsgril grol ba'i glang po sdong pa min/ /'dzam bu chu po'i gser la mu tig gis sbras btsun mos btsongs na rin thang che/ /rlan can shing la rtso? bas srub pa'i mi de blun po yin/ /bye
55a2(rgyud 'grel): phrug lus la khrab chags de dus rma bya'i gnod yun ran/ /'gro bar 'khar gzhod nang gi rus spal tshi chad 'gyur/ /gcig la gcig rten bya/ shog pa med kyang gser sprul mkha' la 'phung/ /shis ? yon rgya mtsho'i phyir mi 'byung//
55a3(rgyud 'grel): b+ha yi drung du myu gu sa bon bcad kyi rjes la bzang bar 'gyur/ /dmus long lag na me long phyar pa 'di la btsun mo bltas kyi dga' / /snum gyis rtsos pa'i ras la tshon gyi rtsi ni chags mi 'gyur/ /ti tsha byugs pa'i rdza ni so btang da ni bskol
55a4(rgyud 'grel): bas chog /mkhas pa yis ni stag gi chang mthong de nas 'byol/ /rtsi mchog gser 'gyur brlabs pa'i drin can brjed par bya ba min/ /tshes gcig zla ba mi chung bco lnga'i dus na skyes pa med/ /bus pa g.yang khang song ba ma yi spyod 'gros ltos/ /mig
55a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di mgo la dges pas phyung gi bza' bar mi bya'o/ /sha chags mi phyung dus su gser gyi ral gri da byung cig /rngo yi mi la 'dran dus de tshe snying la yi ge sna tshogs 'jug /gar mkhan spyod pa 'di yis man ngag thams cad bstan nas song/ /byang phyogs
55a6(rgyud 'grel): bar ta ni ru phyin na 'grol phan par 'gyur/ /'byung po'i grong khyer tri stag tshang du/ phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa'o// //gyad dang bsgrags pa'i mi de shul du rtso ra'i yang bral/ /ma tshig rdza la la cha mi 'go tsandan ma la sro bar bya/ /rtsa ba
55a7(rgyud 'grel): bral ba'i sdong po lo 'dab rgyas kyang don la skam po yin/ /gser gyi rtsa'u mkha' la phyar ba 'di la glang po smyon pa 'bros/ /til mar rtse la dngul chu'i rgyun 'dzag 'di la seng ge bltas kyis dga' / /ging bsrog la mkhas pa'i sgyu ma'i skyes bu sdig mi sog/
55b1(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod nang du lce spyad ra dang brang pa phyir mi ldog/ /sgeg mo rgyan gyis spras pa me long lta ba rab tu brtson/ /rdo yi mi la su nye kho yi dgra bo gang yin khyod kyis smros/ /pad+ma lag sar lag du thogs la dus mdza' i nam mkha' ltos/ /ka la ping+ga'i skra gdangs
55b2(rgyud 'grel): gter gyi steng du sgrogs na snyan/ /wa chu ma zad par du chu thags 'khor lo 'di la gdad dbang med/ /gling gcig dag tu 'khor los sgyur rgyal gnyis su tshogs ba min/ /mkha' la nyi ma shar dus mun pa gung du yib bam ci/ /rin chen dngul gyi me long
55b3(rgyud 'grel): g.ya' ma dag par ci ru rung/ /ma ga d+ha ru btsos pa'i ras ni kha dog gzhan pas gsal/ /rgyal po'i gam nas gshed ma'i phyogs su 'gro ba ltas ngan yin/ /mo gsham bu yi mdza' sde gang yin de yi bud med su/ /gzo yi sngon du thog mar zhun
55b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyongs gtong ba'i gser mkhan thabs la mkhas/ /mngal du mtshas? pa'i glang po che ba drug pa rgum 'brum mi 'dod la/ /rgyal po blta zhing pa rtse ba'i sems kyis spyan nas mchi ma yang yang 'dzag /dus mdza' i nam mkha' 'di la shar lho phyogs
55b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshams gang gis shes par 'gyur/ /yin par shes pa'i blo yis mon mo'i dug gi nus pa med par byed/ /zla ba bco lnga ma rgyas par du rus sbal la skyes sgo nga smin mi 'gyur/ /rkun po mdzod khad? nang du rgyal po'i nyul mos bzung ba de ci sems/ /mig
55b6(rgyud 'grel): gi dbang po btsum nas mthong byed snying gi dbus su sad nas lta/ /brag la byung pa'i seng ge'i skad kyis chos rnams ma lus bstan nas song/ /rtsi mchog gser 'gyur shes pa'i mi de rlom sems khong du da chud cig /lang tad rtse ru gshin rje gshed kyis gsungs
55b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /gyad? kyi rgyu rtsal 'di la dri ma'i zas gnod mkhas pas spang par bya/ /chu bo bzhi 'bab rgya mtsho phyir mi ldud pa ngo mtshar che ba yin/ /skyed du 'dzom pa'i glang po seng ge'i 'o ma 'thungs pas su yis thub par 'gyur/ /rlan bral rus sbal rgya mtsho mthod ? de
56a1(rgyud 'grel): dus gzhan mi dran/ /sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i sbyin gtong las byung 'bras bu gang du smin par 'gyur/ /ma drug bu'i phyogs der tshangs dbang khyab 'dug rnams kyi cod pan 'dud/ /seng ge'i gi dbus na yi ge a yod pa de ltos dang
56a2(rgyud 'grel): kye/ /'ja' tri rin chen mchan du bcug nas tshes bzang drag por 'jog /dug sbrul spang du byung tshe do gal yod par spang par bya/ /me long g.ya' dag gzugs brnyan 'char gyis rgyab du min/ /ka ta ri las thar nas dod du zhugs pa'i mi de shin tu blun/ /
56a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya las grol nas 'dab chags rma bya rjes su zlog mi 'gyur/ /yan lag nang du bskums pa'i phyi ru dgra dang bral ba'i rus spal thabs la mkhas/ /rtsi mchog spri yang 'thungs pa'i sprul sha zos na bcud du 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho'i gling du ma phyin nor bu la ni blun
56a4(rgyud 'grel): pos cing mi mthong/ /bsang pas khrag don? chu yi nang 'dug sha yi phyir mi 'brang/ /khab du byon pa'i btsun mos sngar gyi spyod pa dor bar bya/ /bu ram chu yis ras kyi dri ma rnams ni gting nas 'don par byed/ /gangs kyi ri yi snum ma zos na'o ma mar du 'gyur/ /
56a5(rgyud 'grel): stag 'di ded pas mi zin bsngad kyi steng nas dgug par bya/ /prarti? ka na gser 'gyur rtsi yi lo ma me ru 'bud/ /chu snod 'bum du zla ba 'bum char de dus zla ba gcig las med/ /byis pa ma mthong tshe pang du rgyug pas a lu bor/ /yibs med pa'i gser lar
56a6(rgyud 'grel): yod ka 'ji'i? rdol snong/ /srin mo'i ral gri kyang kyis thogs pa de la pha rol 'jigs/ /nam mkha' gos su rgyan na snying gi dkyil du nyi ma 'char/ /rta mchog thur du rgyug pa skyes bu 'di yis gdams ngag bstan nas song/ /mdzes sdug rma bya'i thul pa phud
56a7(rgyud 'grel): na de yis thar pa thob par 'gyur/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la kha sarbA Ni sa gsungs so// //gyad kyis ma rgyugs? phra mo'i bang la rgyal po bltas kyi dga' / /tshos ma yis ni skyon med ras la kha dog tha dad ci 'dod shes/ /nyi ma mun par mthong ba'i
56b1(rgyud 'grel): mi de'i mig? de cis lan da 'og khyod kyis smros/ /phru gu ma dran sbrang rtsi mthong ba'i don la gnyid mi 'ong/ /khyu mchog 'og tu zhon nas seng ge'i 'o ma da 'thung zhig /mdzes mas g.yos pa'i zas la dug mthong bzhin du ma 'thung dang/ /bus pa dang ni rgan
56b2(rgyud 'grel): po? nang zla ba 'di la so sor mthong bar 'gyur/ /nam mkhas btson du bzung ba'i skyes bu 'di la gud na bros sa med/ /skad gsang mthon po'i sgra yis ye shes 'char dus khyod kyis dris/ /shel sgong g.ya' dag gang gi steng du bzhag pa de yi mdog
56b3(rgyud 'grel): du 'gyur/ /'dul spyod mkhan gyi gan du bu ra mtshal nas bros pa'i glang po 'ja' twi yin/ /sprul gyi tshad mthong len mkhan tsandan la ni ser sna skye mi 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i bka' rtags gnang pa'i mi de su la'ang du mi 'jigs/ /bud ba'i sgra
56b4(rgyud 'grel): la phag rgod nyan pa 'di ni phyag rgya che/ /rgyal mtshan rtsa mo'i nor bu 'di la mchod dang dgos 'dod 'byung bar 'gyur/ /phabs kyis gang la reg pa'i chan ni rlum du 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /btsun mo'i 'dza' sder gyur pa ma gsangs bshed ma'i
56b5(rgyud 'grel): lag du 'gro /dpag chen skyes bus gnam du mnga' 'phangs 'di ni su yi mgo la phog /rin po ches spras btsun mo'i skul rgyan gyi spud pa gnad mi 'gyur/ /sprin med mkha' la shar ba'i gza' skor phyogs der rgyal mo gar khyod kyis phyor/ /
56b6(rgyud 'grel): spre'u'i sder mo ? pa'i ru sbal lan tshwa'i chu la lto 'gal med/ /'tshal med sa la rtsol pa'i las rnams sdong lnga pa yin te gsar med phyir/ /smyug ma'i rtse la 'bras bu chags tshe nges ni rtsa brlag par gdon ma za/ /sgra rnams snying gi dbus na nyan ?
56b7(rgyud 'grel): phag rgod 'di yi sbyong 'phros khyod kyis ltos/ /rkyal ma 'byongs pa'i skyes bus rgya mtsho'i nang du 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /sa le sbram ni mtshur gyis gos tshe sngar gyi kha dog 'dor bar byed/ /seng ge blung bus chos rnams ma lus bstan nas song ba ngo mtshar?
57a1(rgyud 'grel): tshe?/ /mun pa'i rum? du me long la byed kyi gzugs brnyan 'char mi 'gyur/ /klu sgrub kyi phug par sgrib pa rnam par sel bas gsungs pa'o// //skom pas chu dang mgul ba skams pa'i glang po chu dang
57a2(rgyud 'grel): phrad pas gzhan mi sems/ /til mar gyis bskus skra la me shor de dus sgeg mo bya gzhan dor/ /lus la lcags dbyug bsnun kyang rdo yi mi la mi dga' i rtog pa skye mi 'gyur/ /mnyan pa dgras des rtsad po'i 'gram du gru dang phrad pa de ci sems//
57a3(rgyud 'grel): seng ge'i 'o ma rin chen snod las phal gyis thub mi 'gyur/ /thabs 'khyar mi de gang du blo ldan gyis zin de dus sems ngal sos/ /sgeg mo yid 'phrog rmi lam bud med gang nas 'ongs nas gang du song/ /lan tshwa chu la thim pas gzugs
57a4(rgyud 'grel): med ro yi dngos po stor mi 'gyur/ /sgo nga'i nad nas byung ba'i bye phrug mkha' la blta ba de ci sems/ /gling bzhi'i bya ba byas kyang nyi zla gnyis la skyo ngas dar cig med/ /rin chen bai DUrya dang 'ching bu khyod kyis brje bar ma byed cig /rma bya btsan
57a5(rgyud 'grel): dug za ba bya gzhan rnams kyi thun mongs ma yin no/ /ru spal rlan la skyes kyang rgya mtsho mthong na de dus rab tu dga' / /bor ba'i phyi sgrogs? la ni lto 'gro chags pa'i blo mi skye/ /thabs la mkhas pa'i ded dpon rgya mtsho'i lam srang mkha' la 'tshol bar
57a6(rgyud 'grel): byed/ /lus la rmo? ba yod pa'i ri dags gcig pur sdod la ltos/ /dgun 'brum chang gis gzi tshe btsun mo'i drung mi 'gro/ /mtshur gyis spangs pa'i ras ni kha dog bsgyur bar shes/ /'o ma'i chu rgyun 'di la su 'thung mi de skal bar ldan par shes/ /sgor
57a7(rgyud 'grel): skyes tshad du bskyur nas phrug gu mi gso 'dab chags khu byug drung/ /don gnyis mi byed gser 'gyur rtsi 'di shes pa'i dgos pa de dus stor/ /lang tsho bcu drug lon pa'i bu mo de yis bde ba smra ma shes/ /dug sprul wag dang glang po'i spyod 'gros khyod gyis
57b1(rgyud 'grel): da ltos shig /chu yis chu ded bsdad dbang med de de la dal bar gang gis mthong/ /smyon pa'i lag nas ral gri 'brel ba'i mi de dpa' bo yin/ /seng ge'i gsob mthong tshe na de dus snying la yi ge sna tshogs 'char/ /gri skor mkhan po de yis da res
57b2(rgyud 'grel): man ngag thams cad bstan nas song/ /dpal gyi ri la yi ge bsubs nas thabs des bden pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /o Dyan? tshan rdo li'i gling du dpal rang byung gi rgyal mos gsungs pa'o// //bil ba'i gang bu de ni gyang kyis brdabs
57b3(rgyud 'grel): na 'jig par gdon mi za/ /pha bang dred dang sha dag byed ba'i dgos pa gang yin khyod kyis smos/ /gang char 'thungs pa'i glang po smyon pa rang sar bzhag na bsrun/ /sman pa'i dag la mi nyan nang pa gang gis gso bar nus ma yin/ /seng ge'i 'o ma 'thungs
57b4(rgyud 'grel): chen chu la? 'byar rtsi byugs na bcud du 'gyur/ /dug tshor zas la skyes bu chags pa'i blo ni skye mi 'gyur/ /lce sbyang mig la nyin mtshan med de de yis dor bya spangs pa yin/ /nom pa lus la med pa'i skyes bu gcer bu pa la dgra mi 'ong/ /dur khrod dbus kyi
57b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo yi mi de sha za'i yang bral nas 'dug/ chu shing snying po rnyed pa'i mi de skyes bu su yis mthong bar 'gyur/ /gter mdzod dbyig gis khengs tsho de dus ded dpon blo sems bde bar snang/ /dbul pos nor bu rgyal po'i phyag du phul ba'i 'di ni ngo mtshar che//
57b6(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu rtsol ba med pa'i pi wang la ni sgra skad 'byung mi 'gyur/ /rdzings la gnas pa'i bya rog 'di la 'phur sa gud na med/ /mgo la mig phyung snying gi dkyil du sbas na phyi rol yi ger 'gyur/ /sems can rus sbal mig 'di btsum na
57b7(rgyud 'grel): gsal bas dbye bar 'phangs pa yin/ /sgyu ma'i gter mdzod 'di la mkhan po chags pa'i blo ni skye mi 'gyur/ /gser 'gyur rtsi yi rig byed 'di ni kun la mi ston mkhan po'i snying la sped/ /chu 'khyags khyad rom du gyur zhu tshe chu rang yin tog bar gyis/ /
58a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la 'chang ba'i 'ja' yin ma? po su yin 'di yi kha dog su yis bris/ /chu la chu bzhag gnyis su mi snang gang gis 'byed par nus pa mkhas/ /mkha' lding 'dab gshog rgyas pa'i ro de su yis 'phur bar
58a2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /gang che gzings kyi thag pa brtul tshe de tshe ded dpon dgra gnyen gnyis dang bral/ /'khor lo'i rgyug phyogs grib ma'i mtshams las 'da' mi 'gyur/ /mun rum nang du me bus 'od ni thog mar rang la 'char bar 'gyur/ /sgom du seng ge'i
58a3(rgyud 'grel): snyed khrag 'thungs pa'i mi de su yi rig rgyud yin/ /jag rtsed mkhan po de yi man ngag thams cad bstan nas song/ /gru gnyis sna la rtog pa bzhag pa'i mi de 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /lho phyogs ka ma ru ru lha mo mi ri tses gsungs pa'o// //
58a4(rgyud 'grel): gser gling yid la bcangs pa'i ded dpon rda? rdo'i khrod du gdod mi 'gyur/ /rdo yi shul du 'brang ba'i khyi yi spyod 'gros 'di la khyod kyis yang yang ltos/ /tshong khang du tshogs 'gron po thad kar mi 'grogs rang rang gud du 'gro /nor bu'i phung
58a5(rgyud 'grel): po mthong tshe rus spal la ni gces par 'dzin pa'i blo mi skye/ /klu mchog rnams kyi mgo bo ji snyed glang gzer skye ba'i rten/ /nang gi 'du ba gang yin drang srong gis ni phyi nas shes/ /rgyal po'i dkor mdzod brkus pa mi smra 'chab pas kha
58a6(rgyud 'grel): chags? bsdams?/ /rnal chu mthong tshe thag pa sprul du 'dzin pa'i 'khrul pa ldog /sbrang rtsi'i ro mchog myong ba'i rnga mo rtsa yi zhen pa bral/ /sa yi 'og tu rno yi dar blud spu gri sba bar phangs pa yin/ /nyi zla gza' skar rnams ni rgya mtsho dang ba'i dang
58a7(rgyud 'grel): du 'chad/ /khri snyan lpags pa gyon pa'i mi des bgegs rnams bran du khol bar 'gyur/ /phyogs bzhir co do bshed mas zin pa'i mi de de dus gang la chags/ /skyes bu 'dza' bos bslus pa'i mi de khong du yid ches 'jig /shing gi skyes
58b1(rgyud 'grel): bus glang po'i mgo bcad de yi sdig pa gang du smin/ /mdongs rgyas pa yi rma bya dregs pas myos pa 'di ni ting 'dzin bzang/ /rgyal sras 'khrungs pa'i btsun mo la ni de dus lha rnams re ba che/ /na ga ra yi yi ge chu la bris pa su yis
58b2(rgyud 'grel): lhogs par 'gyur/ /lhung bzeng khengs na rigs ngan bzhag la nga ni seng ge'i bu dang sbrag /ci yang mi dgos shing skogs gar gyi sdom gyi spyad 'gros khyod kyis ltos/ /gser 'gyur rtsi shes dbul bar gnas pa'i mi de su yi rigs
58b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyud yin/ /ru sbal spu yi kha dog ci 'dra da res khyod kyis mo gsham bu la dris/ /me long nang gi byang de gzugs brnyan yin gyis rtog pa bral/ /gser 'di bzang po yin min ra 'di ka 'jigs gsal bar 'dug /gang la brgyab pa
58b4(rgyud 'grel): mi sdug chod pa lha dbang lag gi sta ri rno/ /mchil lham lag na thogs na dus der lham gyi dgos pa ster/ dra ba dbang po'i gzhu yis chos rnams ma lus bstan nas song/ /mu tig phreng ba lto ru zo zhig 'di yis don gnyis 'grub
58b5(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /sing+ga la'i tshal du kun tu bzang pos gsungs pa'o// //byang gyi dpral ba'i nor bu ma mthong gzo rig mkhan pos bstan dus rnyed/ /chu bya'i phru gu 'di la sgo nga'i nang du rgya mtsho'i snang ba 'char bar 'gyur
58b6(rgyud 'grel): tsandan me yis tshig pa'i rma la sman du de nyid bzang ba yin/ /shing rnams thams cad grib ma'i ngo bor gcig pas 'di la tha dad med/ /spos kyi glang po ste ka zos pa seng ge'i gdong du blta/ /'dab bzang rgyal po'i mchu la rtsi yod chu bo'i
58b7(rgyud 'grel): nang gi 'o ma 'du/ /bsad cing rtse ba'i mi de nor la chags pa'i blo mi skye/ /sngags kyis zin pa'i ha la sman rnams kun gyi mchog du 'gyur/ /rdo yi mi yi rig byed 'di la ltos dang ngo mtshar che ba yin/ /dug mda' snying la phog pa'i mi de su
59a1(rgyud 'grel): yis sos par 'gyur/ /sen mo'i bar du seng ldeng tsher ma zug pa'i mi de ting 'dzin bzang/ /mi ro mkha' la lta ba'i snying la ci sems khyod kyis da smros dang/ /skom du smyon chu 'thungs pa 'di yis rgyal po'i 'khor
59a2(rgyud 'grel): mi 'ong/ /nam mkha' i nu ma la ni 'dod pa de bzhos shig /nor bu rin chen gang nas rnyed pa'i dus der dbul dang bral/ /gcig tu gyur pas ri rab drung du bla bya'i mdongs mi gsal/ /skyes bu bshed mas btang ba'i blo sems 'di la blta bar bya//
59a3(rgyud 'grel): dud 'gro'i khong du gser 'gyur rtsi zos rtswa gzhan dag dang khyad par med/ /do thag thams cad cer gyi phur pa 'di yis bzung ba yin/ /stobs ldan ded dpon gyis ni glang po'i rgyab du nga khol cig /srin po'i kha nas rlung gis bskyod pa'i me ni rdo rje'i
59a4(rgyud 'grel): gdan la 'bar bar byed/ /'di yis gdol pa'i grong rnams tshig par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /rnam pa du mar gyur kyang gar mkhan lus su gcig pa yin/ /gril nas lam du dum pa dngul chu'i thigs pas khengs pa'i tshe/ /de dus 'khor lo'i steng du
59a5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo rnams ni gzi ru chug /rgya mtsho rba rlabs 'khrugs dus thabs ldan rus sbal gting du 'bros/ /glang po'i mgul gyi dril bu 'di yis man ngag thams cad bstan nas song/ /sman gyi nags der drang srong gis ni dor bya rnyed mi 'gyur/ /dur khrod
59a6(rgyud 'grel): u tsa lar badzra bA ra his gsungs pa'o// //gter gyi nang du gter chud de dus mkha' la 'ja' tshon sna tshogs 'char/ /mthong dus de tshe khyod kyis khong du gzhu yi srad bu da phung cig /rang gis bcag pa'i gser la ka 'ji'i dgos pa mi
59a7(rgyud 'grel): bdog go /mthong snang dgra ru rad pa gter bsrungs? mkhan po mel ce rab tu brtson/ /rgyal pos mtshor ba la dur ba bseb du bdud rtsi'i bum pa rang gis btung/ /sbrang rgod lto ru zos nas 'bras bu med par 'dod pa de ni shin tu blun/ /rdzings la gnas
59b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ded dpon 'dod rlung byung ba de dus rgyal mtshan 'phyar/ /bu ram shun pa 'di la yang yang bshus na mngar ba'i snying po rnyed mi 'gyur/ /rmi lam du ni gter gyi bum pa rnyed pa de la sad nas blun po du/ /gzan la bcum pa rgya khra 'di yis man
59b2(rgyud 'grel): dag thams cad bstan nas song/ /gter mdzod rnyed pa'i mi des mdza' bo shi ba'i mya ngan dus deng brjed/ /sha chags mis deng skyal shes skyes bu ga gA'i phyogs su 'bros/ /rus sbal rgyab kyi ri mo sus bris 'di yi mkhan po gang yin lo/ /ded dpon
59b3(rgyud 'grel): kha la mi nyan blo chung skal med nor bu rba? dor len/ /nya btang ba yi skyar mod? dus mkha' la dgra yi 'jigs pa bral/ /rig byed gnod par mthong ba'i skal med 'og rang sar zhog /khab len rdo 'di nam zhig btsun mo'i dgra ru ldang bas sa yi 'og tu
59b4(rgyud 'grel): sbos/ /gnang du mtshon ? dus der ri dags khyu nas bgar/ /nor bu gling las rdo bcil bas mi rnyed a rangs rin po che/ /mkha' la rgyu skar gang yin lta na seng ge'i g.yang gzhi gon/ /gser 'gyur rtsi po ston pa'i drin can gang gis mnyes par
59b5(rgyud 'grel): byed par nus/ /thabs gzhan ma mchis rdza chag dum bur bza' btung slong na dgyes/ /chu ye ro rnams rgya mtsho chen po der ni tha dad med de gcig /ro la mtshon gyis bsnun kyang de la ma dga' i rtog pa med/ /g.yul don ma sprod chen glang po'i mchu la ral gri? ?
59b6(rgyud 'grel): ri brag bar du sdod pa'i gcan zan seng ge 'di la gdams pa yod/ /zo chu 'khor lo 'di yis man ngag thams cad dus der bstan/ /srin mo'i sog pa mgul du thogs nam mkha' la 'phir? bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje gdan du mi g.ye pas gsungs pa'o// //
59b7(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegs pa lung gi brgyud pa /yi dam gyi lhas bstan pa/ /'dzam bu'i gling du sngan chad ma grags pa'o/ /sangs rgyas gnyis pa ltar grags pa/ /bla ma rgya gar nag gu'i zhal snga nas/ bod kyi bande zha ma lo tsA bas byin brlabs kyi gnas mchog ding
60a1(rgyud 'grel): ? bsgyur te/ /bla ma byang chub sems dpa' kun dga' la gtad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ mahA mu dra u ba badzra gu hya gI ta/ bod skad du/ phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag rdo rje gsang ba'i glu/ /bcom ldan
60a2(rgyud 'grel): 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kye 'o rgyal po'i rigs brgyud bu yis 'dzin 'gyur gyis/ /gser 'gyur rtsi yi rigs byed mtshang gis rtogs/ /rgya mtsho'i lam rgyus rig ldan ded dpon mkhas/ /khri snyan mig gis nor bu?
60a3(rgyud 'grel): nus pa lta/ /ril bu grub pas bram ze'i bya ba rdzogs/ /gangs la bab pa'i chul dri ma med/ /mu tra las bton gzugs rnams tha mi dang/ /gser la dngul gyi ra med sa le sbram/ /mkhan gzos ma byas bse ru bshags pa'i gzugs/ /rdzings?
60a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi thag pa lu gu brgyud du sbrel/ /ma ga d+ha pa skor mdzod bu la 'bogs/ /mnga' bdag tshig la btsun mo zur mi g.yo/ /mtshang shes dka' pha ma yin sgyu ma'i 'phrul/ /sbrang rgod 'thungs pa'i nus pas yun mi thogs/ /ka 'dzim dgos rang
60a5(rgyud 'grel): gis bsags pa'i gser/ /dmus long mig phyed yul rnams rang ngos zin/ /rin chen gser gyi skud pa khab shul 'grim/ /gling las skyol ba'i ded dpon the tshom bral/ /drang srong gi ni gso rig mtshang rnams go /zla ba mthong ba'i ri bong snyems
60a6(rgyud 'grel): las grol/ /lam nor ngo shes de dus gnyid du ldog /ga bur nus pa tshad pa'i steng du rgyug /nor bu lus la btags na bdu ba 'byang/ /lto 'gros dri tshor ma gi ta la 'bros/ /phyugs bdag mthong bas u ma cod pan bkrol/ /rma bya'i phrug gu dang
60a7(rgyud 'grel): po'i tshang mi 'dod/ /ded dpon gling lon nor la zhe mi gdung/ /mdza' bo'i brtse gdung grogs kyis bslus tshe zhig /ngal bar mi 'dug gser mtshon rnyed pa'i mi/ /ded dpon rgan po'i gling don gzhan gyi phyed/ /zur ma mig nas gton pa'i nyag thag gnyen
60b1(rgyud 'grel): rba las 'byol ba'i gru pa yan lag 'brel/ /nor bu'i 'od la rlung gis gnod mi 'gyur/ /nags la gnas pa'i glang po rang dbang thob/ /'chi ba'i dus der rgyal srid cung zhig bya/ /gdan sar phyung ba'i lha sras rgyal srid thob/ /dri ma dag pa'i
60b2(rgyud 'grel): gser bum gdan? mdzes/ /khong gzer bral ba'i ded dpon la ltos dang/ /gar chang 'thungs ba'i gyad kyi ya nga stor/ /rlom sems mi skye rgyal ngo shes pa'i mi/ /dad pa rkyen gyis skul ba bu shi'i ma/ /khri mon nang du gser sgrog ci zhig bya/ /
60b3(rgyud 'grel): brdzings kyi steng du ded dpon mig pas gces/ /gling las blangs pa'i nor bu gces spras tho/ /brdzings kyi gzo tshar ded dpon shol mi thebs/ /tsha grang gnyis ka sel ba seng ge'i spu/ /bza' btung mi dran dgun chu 'thungs ba'i sprul/ /so btang bum
60b4(rgyud 'grel): par gser gyi snod kyang btub/ /ri brag par gyi seng ge zla mi snyag /khyu mchog thong mkhan zhing gi mdza' mi mthong/ /gcig pur gnas pa'i bse ru sdug bsngal bral/ /drang srong rgyal mtshan ma gon bsrung sdom med/ /'gro bar ma chad gling las bod
60b5(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur/ /snyod ba brtse ba'i spre'u snying re rje/ /'dab gshog rgyal pa'i bru gu nang nas 'phur/ /skyug nad can des zas kyi 'khri ba chod/ /rab tu byung tsho bya ba dman pa 'dor/ /ri dags nad pa khyu nas 'gar na bde/ /rigs ngan bu mos 'jol
60b6(rgyud 'grel): sgeg spangs nas 'dug /dur bsrungs mi la 'dza' bos ci zhig bya/ /rab zhug ma bcas dpa' bos g.yul mi ldogs/ /ljon shing grib la dub pa'i sems ngal sos/ /rgyan gyis spras pa'i btsun mos gzhan yid 'phrog /'dod dgu'i 'byung gnas
60b7(rgyud 'grel): rin chen gter gyi sgrom/ /thabs la? mi re dzA la 'bar ba'i nad/ /dpon la mi brten rig byed tshar pa'i mi/ /rang gi mtheb mdzub gzhan gyi lag pa min/ /gar yang bde ba lang tsho rgyas pa'i lus/ /mthong bas chog pa rtsi mchog gser 'gyur gzo/ /
61a1(rgyud 'grel): khyim la mi dga' bu mo'i blo mi 'phrogs/ /o rgyan? dur khrod srin mo khros pa'i sa/ /thub pa'i bzhugs sa mi nub rdo rje'i gdan/ /dgos pa'i rkyen tshogs ka lingka yi gnas/ /rgya mtsho'i pas mthar sprul gyi dug mi 'byung/
61a2(rgyud 'grel): rin chen rdzong la 'jigs pa'i yang bral/ /g.yo sgyu spangs pa ma ga d+ha pa'i mi/ /smra bar mi phod btsun mo snol gyi mtshang/ /gdeng la dar thogs gcan zan seng ge'i bu/ /mthur gzhol lam du shing rta 'gro bar brtson/ /mil tse'i bar
61a3(rgyud 'grel): med bu gcig pa yi ma/ /rgya mtsho'i lam rgyags deng dpon nyams la dris/ /gso ras char bsrungs gling lon khom par gces/ /gzings kyi cha rkyen ded dpon kho tshags byed/ /yul gyi 'khri ba nyag thag bcad dus zhig /'dod pa'i rlung
61a4(rgyud 'grel): byung ded dpon blo sems bde/ gling don ma grub ded dpon phyir mi ldog /'gyur ba med pa rgyal pos gsungs pa'i tshig /sprang tshang 'bebs dus yid la go cha byed/ /gar chang blud pa'i glang po 'cham pa'i rtags/ /mig gser mthong pa'i
61a5(rgyud 'grel): las mis bde sdug spangs/ /dar gyi srin 'bu kha chu zags pas phung/ /de ni gzhan gyis ma lan rang la skyes/ /tshang la nyes sgyon yod pa ma yin no/ /ma rig stobs kyis kha chu mang du skyug /rang nyid phung bar bas kyis gzhan du min//
61a6(rgyud 'grel): lcags bsregs gzhi me tshogs rgyus ma bskyed/ /'byar rtsi ngo shes chad du brtse ba glen/ /smig rgyu chung 'thong ri dags snying re rje/ /thig le ma yal rgya khol dal mi 'gyur/ /ber ka gnyis phog mi de ci ru rung/ /gter gyi bdag po mi re rigs
61a7(rgyud 'grel): ngan bu?/ /dud pas mi 'jigs rtsi med sbrang ma'i tshang/ /'chi bdag kha ru ma chud skye 'gro grang/ /lus la 'byung bam 'khyugs rnga yi mi/ /ming nas bos pas shi ba ldog gam ci/ /mthong snang dgra ru red pa dug sprul mig /khyod la shing los gnang pa skyal
61b1(rgyud 'grel): ba med/ /brag ca'i sgra la bus pa snyan sdug rtsis/ /rmi lam gter rnyed sad tshe mya ngan byed/ /gyod khengs longs pa'i sbyang khu rang la rmug /'phags pa'i rigs can dgra la bu ru blta/ /gnod pa bskyal dus slar la gces par 'dzin/ /phan
61b2(rgyud 'grel): lan ma brtags skye 'gro rnams kyis med/ /khyi khros rdol 'cha' ba snying rje'i yul/ /rtswa me dum? du bsad dus du ba 'chang/ /mthong snang log pa'i yi dags bde ba stor/ /lus la rang dbang ma thong sdug bsngal brten/ /tshe mdza' i
61b3(rgyud 'grel): rings pas 'phung ba dmyal ba'i lus/ /'di la bde ba'i bar mtshams 'dug gam ci/ /sa bon ma rul n+ya grol lo 'bras rgyu/ /ded dpon snying khrag 'thungs pa skal bar ldan/ /thigs pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho ngo mtshar che/ /nam mkha' 
61b4(rgyud 'grel): mthong bas dbyibs kyi phyogs 'dzin zhig /yud tsam 'thud pas bskal pa 'dzad par ltos/ /rgyus skud lam sna khrid pa phag rgod spu/ /khri snyan lpags pa ma gon drang srong min/ /gru pa yan lag brel pa rang gi ched/ /'dab bshog rgyas
61b5(rgyud 'grel): tshe tshad na 'dug kyang mkha' / /yid bzhin nor bu'i dgos pa gang yin ltos/ /me tog las byung gang bu dus su smin/ /bum pa bzang po dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i snod/ /mar gyi rgyu ni 'o ma yin par nges/ /rnyed par mi 'gyur ser po dor ba'i
61b6(rgyud 'grel): gser/ /nyi ma'i zer gyis mun pa'i gya rum 'joms/ /gser du snang ba'i dngul chu gzhan du min/ /chu la chu bzhag tha dad mi snang ngo/ /mar la mar bzhag de bzhin nyid du bas/ /mdza' then nar gnyis su gang gis byed/ /rgya mtsho'i rlangs pa sprin gyi
61b7(rgyud 'grel): ngo bor gcig /mkha' la lcags dbyug shul la khyad par med/ /rtsi len pa yi sbrang ma la ltos dang/ /glang po'i rgyab khal grog ma'i lto ru mdzad/ /rgyal po'i sku la dri mas gang tshe 'gos/ /phra rab rdul gyi nus pa ngo mtshar che/ /mkhas pa'i gang ni
62a1(rgyud 'grel): rim pa bzhin du tshar/ /thabs ldan zhing pa rags sna mchu ? bsring/ /khyod kyi yung ba 'gags pa phyir sol cig /'dus pa'i kham shing 'bras bu la ltos dang/ /tsandan sdong po sprul gyi skyabs gnas sa/ /chu thigs rgya
62a2(rgyud 'grel): mchor bor ba skams mi 'gyur/ /rgyan rnams 'byung ba zhun sbyongs tshar ba'i gser/ /bu tshis mi dran rgya mtsho'i gru zhig mi/ /sgra mi snyan pa nor la zhe mi gdung/ /gling don mi gnyen ded dpon ci ru rung/ /su zhig bde 'dod rgyab kyi khung tshe bor/ /
62a3(rgyud 'grel): dmus long phye ba'i mi la drin gzo rig /rba 'khor phyogs nas bzlog pa'i ded dpon bkur/ /mun rum nang du mkha' la zla ba gces/ /'dam nas 'don pa'i mi la su zhig rgol/ /gling bran ded dpon spyi bor long zhig dang/ /shar nas na bun
62a4(rgyud 'grel): utpal chu la med/ /thad kar mi gnas mkha' la shar ba'i 'ja'/ /rdzeng gi chu ni phig par gyur tshe 'dzad/ /chu ni thur gzhol gyen la bzlog mi 'gyur/ /'gro don mi mdzad thub pa ni phyir 'da' / /smig rgyu'i klung la chu yi 'du shes dor/ /bden
62a5(rgyud 'grel): ba ma yin rmi lam gter rnyed dus/ /'phrul gyi bu mo 'di la ma chags shig /mtshar can bshed mas zin pa'i sems de ltos/ /gser dang gres ma sgrog gi ngo bor mnyam/ /ma zos bu ram mthor bas mdar mi 'gyur/ /ma sgrogs zho yi dang
62a6(rgyud 'grel): nas mar mi rnyed/ /ma 'thungs ga bur tshad pa sel lam ci/ /mchog gi nor bu sba bar bya ba min/ /rdub po'i lag tu sta re'i nus pa stor/ /phol 'bras rma la dgos par mthong ba su/ /chu shing snying po rnyed pa'i mi de gang/ /gser med pa yi
62a7(rgyud 'grel): las ka dgos pa med/ /mthong bzhin du ni dong du 'gro mi rigs/ /dug chu 'thung 'phro mchad bde mi 'gyur/ /ha la song ba'i sman mar ci ru rung/ /dus de nyid du sbrang chang 'thungs pas gzi/ /'gro dus phung po rnyi yi gzan len byas/ /rmongs pa
62b1(rgyud 'grel): srin mos cod pan bcings la dga' / /mchil pas zin pas nya yi bde ba stor/ /'chi 'dod nad la drang srong dag mi nyan/ /de ni gnod pa'i kha zas brtan la dga' / /phan pa'i sman la gces pa'i 'du shes bor/ /'du ba bskyed pa'i spyod lam
62b2(rgyud 'grel): ched du byed/ /sman la nus pa med ces rmongs pa smra/ /mi grub khas blangs rgyal po'i bka' chad gnas/ /bshal rjes mi bsrung rang la gnod par bas/ /nor bu'i nus pa thal bas byibs che stor/ /seng ge'i 'o ma rdza yi nang du min/ /tshad med
62b3(rgyud 'grel): du ba'i bus pa sha re chad/ /bskyen 'phro bcad par mi rigs pan pa'i sman/ /stong log mi bya rin chen gling gi mi/ /'gal du mi rung 'khor los sgyur rgyal gnya'/ /mtshur med gser gyi dngul chu lcags mi 'gyur/ /rang nyams ma lon gyad
62b4(rgyud 'grel): la bsngo mi rigs/ /'bras bu smin pas snyug ma'i rtsa ba brlag /phyugs bdag ling ga mchod pa'i dri mas khyad/ /'khrul pa'i rgyal po 'bangs kyi g.yog du rgas/ /ngo mtshar che ba gser mchog gser 'gyur rtsi/ /mdongs la lta ba'i rma bya dgu?
62b5(rgyud 'grel): nas 'chi/ /dug gi chu ni btung bar bya ba min/ /bram ze chang gi gzi bcos byas dus lad/ /mig gi rin la ci btub soms dang kye/ /rgyus med tshor ldo lus la bar kA phog /gzo yi rig byed tshong la gzhug pa min/ /stag gi ri mo bkra bas gyod la
62b6(rgyud 'grel): gtugs/ /lus la rlung mkhris phyi nas zhugs pa min/ /rtsal gsum rdzogs pas 'phung ba seng ge'i lus/ /dom gyi sdug bsngal sbrang rtsi rnyed dus blang/ /tshod dus dbus su don stor don mi 'grub/ /bse ru 'tshol ba'i mi de sdug bsngal che/ /dgos pas
62b7(rgyud 'grel): na ba'i khor na dug yod min/ /klu mchog mgo bo de nyid sdug bsngal brten/ /dri za'i bu ni rgyud mangs skra yis bcings/ /sprad ma'i tshang ni rtsi mangs sogs pas phung/ /thar lam 'dod pas khyi yi snying phyung cig /lcags kyu dang bral glang po bde bar
63a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /rgyal po'i zhabs tog bsngo bgrangs byas che yal/ /bya yi phrug gu'i gcas 'dzin dags pa dang/ /dngul chu snod du chags? par gyur ta re/ /srin du me khyer dregs pas rgyal rin med/ /na tsho'i phrug gu smra ma
63a2(rgyud 'grel): shes pas 'tshengs/ /sbrang tshang mthong ba'i don mig mkha' la blta/ /de dus zim bu ma myong sdug bsngal rgyu/ /kha brag lam du rgyas med mi de 'tshom/ /chu klung mu ran sdong gru nyal ba'i spas/ /sbrang rtsi myos pas rnga mong gyod la gtugs/ /
63a3(rgyud 'grel): bag mas ltad mo ma mthong tshong dus dbus/ /sos bzhin bsten na sman mchog dug du 'gyur/ /don gcig mi 'grub gnyis 'dzin can gyi blo/ /khyim las ma 'phags ded dpon gling mi lon/ /brtag pa'i 'tshang med nor bu dbyig la
63a4(rgyud 'grel): brdar/ /stod la mnan pa'i sbre'u rkang lag brel/ /nang ngos ma zin bcos ka khro log bsgyur/ /ded dpon mdzod mthong khyim bdag rdang de ldang/ /seng ge'i mgo bo mthur gyi phyir mi 'brang/ /mkha' lding bshog rdzogs tshang la mig
63a5(rgyud 'grel): mi blta/ /zla bo mthong dus bse ru gung du gag /grong las 'grims pa'i lce sbyang lus sems bde/ /dgra yi sdug bsngal bral ba gcer bu'i lus/ /'gag gi rig byed ba so'i gzo la gnod/ /ma he'i sgyid 'khyol 'gro lam thur gzhol?
63a6(rgyud 'grel): bde/ /mkhas pas mi chun blun pos sbyangs pa'i glang/ /lto ru dug zos zhu rjes bde mi 'gyur/ /rmongs ba'i dag la nyan pas 'tshengs pa gang/ /thar nas btson rar snyeg pa snying rje'i yul/ /lu gu brgyud kyi khong sgril gcad par dka' //
63a7(rgyud 'grel): lha yi zhe sdang skyes rtsub 'gyur tshal/ /dge slong 'dugs btsun mo'i khrod ma yin/ /zhags pas thebs dus spre'u nags dang bral/ /sun bzhin dang du len pa sde pa'i dpon/ /gser mgar 'gul du rang gi rgyan ma thogs/ /bran mos rnyed kyang ?
63b1(rgyud 'grel): bu rje bos 'khyer/ /na so rgas pa'i ded dpon gling mi lon/ /bu yis brdungs kyang tsha bo gces par 'dzin/ /dur khrod nang du seng ge'i rtsal mi 'byongs/ /wa dom spyod pas sder chags zil mi non?/ /grum pa dang 'grogs snying stobs nyams ?
63b2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /byi mos mig 'brongs pha yi yul mi zin/ /gangs dang bral bas khyi yis mche ba gnyer/ /khra yis ded pa'i skyar mo nya yis lan/ /dri ma mi chags lhung bzed stong pa'i snod/ /'khor lo'i sgrom gyis shing rta dal mi ster/ /rgyal po
63b3(rgyud 'grel): dmangs spyod su yi mig star mdzos/ /rtsi la chags pa'i sgrang ma dung pas 'tshal/ /pad+ma'i steng na 'phrul gyi bum pa mdzas/ /rdul gyis ma gos g.ya' med dngos pa ni/ /skyon dang bral ba'i 'od zer ra ba can/ /lung thag ma btags nyi zla'i
63b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyan gyis smras/ /rnyed par dka' phyir btsong par phangs pa yin/ /pad+ma'i wa ba thur la kha mi 'bye/ /tsandan chu ni skyon bral snod du blug /dngul gzhong ma phyis rgyal po'i gsang mi 'dren/ /mkhar ma'i sbyang du so ba blug mi bya/ /chu bo bzhi 'bab rgya mtsho
63b5(rgyud 'grel): ngoms mi 'gyur/ /ded dpon rnyed dus gling don bsgrub par bya/ /bzhi mdo'i tshong 'di gzings kyi 'gros la gnod/ /tshes gsum zla ba rgas pa'i dus la bsnyen/ /chu gang 'khor mas ded dpon don thabs bcog /khri mon kha ru lta yi sras mo phyur/ /
63b6(rgyud 'grel): gling la rtog pa'i tshong pa'i blo mi brten/ /dug sbrul gtsug gi nor bu blang mi bya/ /gyang phrug rtsal sbyong sems de dor cig dang/ /btsun mo'i bsrungs mtshon ma la btsal ba min/ /thar pa 'dod na 'tshal gyi thig le bsrubs/ /'dam yod chu la rnyog
63b7(rgyud 'grel): pas dangs mi 'gyur/ /khyi rgod mthong dus mi skrog rang bcom skyud/ /dri ba'i grong khyer lta bar bya ba min/ /grog ma'i spyod pa bor na nges par bde/ /til gyi me tog mi btog bcad par phangs/ /shing lo'i steng na dur bsrungs yan lag dal/ /
64a1(rgyud 'grel): bud med khyim gyis sun pa de la ltos/ /stobs kyis 'khrul pa'i 'khor lo'i gsheg pa bral/ /rtsi yis zin pa'i lcags 'di gsar du 'gyur/ /gser ? sa bon yongs su bsdom bya/ /nam pa'i dang la shar b+ho phyogs
64a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshams med/ /dar gyi chos kyis shel sgong kha dog bsgyur/ /mdog dbyibs tha dang sprin gyi yal sa mkha' / /mo gsham bu yi bag ma ngas ma mthong/ /karSha ba Nis dung gi kha dog mtshon/ /nam mkha' bskyod par byed pa'i ma ma su/ /'jig
64a3(rgyud 'grel): chags bskal pas nam mkha' i g.yo mi 'gyur/ /dkar nag mtshon gyis mkha' la gos pa min /nam gi cha nas nam mkha' yod pa min/ /nam mkha' gang nas blangs pa khyod kyis smros/ /'ja' yi kha dog rgyang nas 'od du gsal/ /gang
64a4(rgyud 'grel): du phyin nas btsal bas ma rnyed do/ /yod med gnyis su smra ba gang gis nus/ /lcags kyi tho ba gang gis phig pa yin/ /dra ba dbang po'i gzhu 'di mkha' la yal/ sngal ba'i spu yi la ba su la yod/ /grag ca'i sgra 'di gang gi kha nas brjod//
64a5(rgyud 'grel): chu zla tshol ba'i spre'u snying re rje/ /rku ba'i nang 'di ci yis brus pa yin/ /mkha' la 'ja' shar chos rnams bstan nas song/ /nam mkha' 'phel du ma song ltos dang kye/ /e ma nub par kyang ni gyur ma yin/ /chags pa'i rten sa gang la byas par 'gyur//
64a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di yi rgyu rkyen ci la byas pa yin/ /phan tshun tha dad med par ngo mtshar che/ /kye 'o sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i 'du shes stor/ /don byed mi nus rmi lam nor gyi bseb/ /rdo yi mi rig byed gang du song/ /glang po'i mgo la rwa med chag dog bral/ /chu shing
64a7(rgyud 'grel): snying po phyi nang gnyis kar med/ /dug sprul ma bltas sgo nga blang mi rung/ /drang srong nad kyi grogs dang gnyen po soms/ /ded dpon bu ni yab la gling rgyus 'di/ /gru chen la gnod dgra rnams phyi ru sel/ /dgos pa'i rkyen dang mi 'bral cher drims/ /nya
64b1(rgyud 'grel): sprul ? ni nor nyen che bas brtag /'gro mgon gyis kyang nam mkha' i mu ma gzigs/ /dmyal ba'i lus la tsha grang go skabs med/ /kha dog bsgyur zin mtshur du sbrangs na ldang/ /gso ras thal khung 'jug pa dri ma med/ /'khri shing la 'bras smin par
64b2(rgyud 'grel): gyur che bsog /gal nang zas len de dus nyid du 'phung/ /tshong khang nang gi mgron po snga rim 'gyes/ /srin gyi kha chus rang nyid 'ching bar 'gyur/ /rtswa yi sgron me mched par rab tu rkyen/ /rgya mtsho sgrol ba'i gru la zag lhan gces/ /dregs pas myos
64b3(rgyud 'grel): par mi 'gyur nad pa'i lus/ /rang srog ster ba'i drang srong lan lon cig /phan pa'i sman mar 'bor bar bya ba min/ /rgya mtsho'i spu ba yal ba'i rjes mi blta/ /gdan sa ma spangs rgyal pos chos mi 'grus/ /khyim dor nags su 'dug pa'i mi de bde/ /dom
64b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi snying khrag ma 'thung kha la ltos/ /me tog rtsi yis sgrang ma dal mi ster/ /bu ram mur pa'i lkug ma kha rog 'dug /gling la dbang ba'i rgyal po bu dang 'grogs/ /'khor los btsal ba'i lam la zhugs par bya/ /khang bzang rin chen spang du mi
64b5(rgyud 'grel): rung ngo/ /dri ma can gyi zas skom mi brten cing/ /khyim bdag dpa' bo phyi ru mi skrad dro/ /tshe 'di'i che thabs bshig pa dur bsrungs mi/ /gdol pa'i mgul du rin chen rgyan mi 'dogs/ /yab kyi spyod lam snyag pa ded dpon bu/ /smyon pa'i spyod pa
64b6(rgyud 'grel): gzags btang bral nas 'dug /lkug ma'i gsang tshig kha ru mi 'don no/ /nye ba dgrar gyur blo gros dri yul zhig / gzugs kyi rtsol sgrub mi byed long ba'i grogs/ /phyag dar khrod pa thong gshol nyo mi 'gyur/ /nang pa chu skyug gang ga la mi blto/ /
64b7(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi 'gar ba bya ba gzhan mi bsgrub/ /dar chen dar zab phag rdzi gon mi 'gyur/ /tshong spyod mi nus smyug ma mkhan gyi khyim/ /smra mkhas thabs ldan ne tsho khyu nas 'byol/ /'phyengs pa'i glang po bur shing bres mi snyag /gser sgrog bcug kyang
65a1(rgyud 'grel): 'cham 'gros byed mi nus/ /ded dpon bu ni bre srang la mi blta/ /gling don khar ton shi yang khyim mi 'dug /chos ? 'dus chen? yang gzings la snyag /'dod pa'i rlung ni re gsor dag gis 'gugs/ /ji srid nor bu ma lon
65a2(rgyud 'grel): phyir mi 'byung/ /brag las skyes pa'i chu bya mtsho la snyag /nags kyi byi phra dgun gyi rtsam sogs/ /gdon gyis brlabs tshe don de lam du stor/ /nyal rnong ba'i skyar mo dgra la 'byol/ /gcig tu mi gnas stag mo grus ma'i tshang/ /'gron po lam
65a3(rgyud 'grel): zhugs gser? rgyal phyir mi 'khur/ /gtso ba'i gsang gros khrom du brjod mi 'gyur/ /sgrag par mi byed ? mdzod brkus pa'i mi/ /bram ze'i rig byed bu las gzhan du min/ /yon dor? mi ster rtsi mchog gser 'gyur thabs/ /mtshan dpes rab
65a4(rgyud 'grel): spras 'khor los sgyur rgyal lus/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs la yan lag drug cur ldan/ /thub pa'i thugs ni yon tan kun gyi mdzod/ /nor bu rin chen dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i rten/ /rgyal po'i shul sna gser gyi 'khor los 'dren/ /gin dza'i me
65a5(rgyud 'grel): tog rlung gis bskyod par sla/ /dus su smin ba'i pad+ma kha dog gsal/ /'byung ba'i dgra rnams bcom pa rdo rje'i sku/ /grangs par rkyen pa bus ba chung ba'i lto/ /rgas dang bral ba dngul chu 'thungs pa'i lus/ /sman mchog gsil mngar thun la che mi
65a6(rgyud 'grel): dgos/ /ci smras don du 'gyur ba drang srong tshig /gling las glangs pa'i me tog dgos med min/ /dge slong tshig la gtam gyi don mi 'byung/ /sman gyi gnas su dug gi skye drungs 'gags/ /'phrul gyi me long phyi nang gnyis kar gsal/ /mang du
65a7(rgyud 'grel): brtsegs kyang gzugs brnyan 'grib mi 'gyur/ /phug pa yod bzhin zang thal yul mi 'gag /sgyu rtsal 'byongs pa'i gyad ni phyi phyar rem/ /smig rgyu'i mtshang shes chu yi 'du shes zhig /shing lam yod tshen du ba 'byung/ /kha rlangs sgron mer gyur pa
65b1(rgyud 'grel): me khyer yin/ /ri brag par na smig rgyu yod ma yin/ /nya rgyas zla ba nyi ma'i 'od dang bral/ /reg bya gzugs kyis stong pa khol ma'i nang/ /snga ltas shar ba'i bu mo btsun mo 'gyur/ /bi rtsi 'thungs pa'i mig la mtshan mo med/ /lha khang sgo phye de dus sku
65b2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs mthong/ /phyugs rdzi'i lag brda gang+gA'i phyogs su byed/ /sbrang rtsis gsings pa'i tshang 'thungs lus po sbrid/ /bshor la bsigs pa'i sbo ga gting mi 'dzul/ /'chod rdo btags pa'i gzings la g.yo ldeg med/ /dngul gyi me
65b3(rgyud 'grel): long phyis na gsal bar 'gyur/ /zhal ta tshud pa'i mi de sngar spyod 'dor/ /phyogs mtshams kun tu 'phur kyang nyal sa tshang/ /thob? khengs dus de tshe sbyang thag 'dren/ /sha chags mis zin de yi shes pa ltos/ /'phrin yig legs par mthong
65b4(rgyud 'grel): dus sems ngal sos/ /mi 'gyur mkha' la ldeng ba'i gshog pa brel/ /dregs par gzo ba'i bzhin de khong du chud/ /byang chub shing du thub pa'i spyod lam bde/ /zhus la bab pa'i gser 'gang yengs dang bral/ /g.yul du dul ba'i glang po
65b5(rgyud 'grel): ltos dang kye/ /'ba' yis non pa'i ri bong can mi mthong/ /khog rtses bkab pa'i me yi dud pa subs/ /sbra gzo tshar dus mkhan po yang yang lta/ /brti ka na grogs po mdza' dus 'bral/ /sman gyi tshong pa'i 'gro phyogs ltos shig dang/ /
65b6(rgyud 'grel): rgun 'brum thal ma mi sbud phyogs bzhir brdal/ /bya ba zin pa'i rdza spyad phyi chis min/ /skyed med nad pa sman gzhan bsten par rigs/ /mkhas pa glang po drag dal gnyis su sbyong/ /bus pa mi sad zhun mar sbyin mi bya/ /phag gi lce yi kha mngar
65b7(rgyud 'grel): spangs nas bdug /bram ze skud pa 'khal ba ltos shig dang/ /rba klong 'khrug dus thabs ldan 'phyong rdo 'dogs/ /su zhig bde 'dod sbrang ma'i spyod pa bor/ /rgyal khrims chos tshe blon po'i rtsol ba zhig /nor bu non pa'i ded dpon sems las
66a1(rgyud 'grel): bral/ /rgyal po'i bu mo gzhan gyi rgyan mi lta/ /sdong dum ma bsal shing rta 'gror mi btub/ /sman gyi lo 'bras drang srong bu la ston/ /btso ma'i 'od la gser mkhan mdog mi 'don/ /spu gri til la dang blung mig mi 'dod/ /
66a2(rgyud 'grel): bu yis srid zin rgyal po'i bya ba rdzogs/ /dug tshor mi de lhag ma za mi 'gyur/ /bram ze'i rig byed slob dus bya gzhan 'dod/ /brtsa med bsrub ma bskor bar mi bya'o/ /rgyal po 'chi dus khrims yig la ma blta/ /nor pa'i lam du 'dab par
66a3(rgyud 'grel): mi rigs so/ /nag tshur mi dgos 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser/ /pad+ma 'dam gyi skyon dang bral nas 'dug /dgra med rang dbang thob pa seng ge'i ba/ /gnya' shing bkrol ba'i ma he gar dgar 'gro /ram zhugs pa'i gser ni gu lang ma/ /tshar ma
66a4(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa'i shul de gru ba min/ /cor sgo byed pa'i mi de srog mi 'dod/ /she sgo zho yis 'grangs pa la ltos shig /gso ras lnga pas bsdams pa grags pas 'chings/ /sgra nyan pa'i phag rgod gdams pa ston/ /ngan smras stong tshig khyad med
66a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo yi mi/ /smig rgyu'i klung na chu thigs yod ma yin/ /skye dang 'ching mo gsham bus ma byas/ /mdog dbyibs tha dang chu bran rgya mtshor grol/ /nam mkha' la ni dbus dang mu ma mchis/ /ro gnyis mthong ba'i ka ka mkha' la lding/ /stobs
66a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan seng ge srog gi mel tshe stor/ /kye 'o smyon pa'i sos skos soms dang kye/ /lce sbyang mig 'di ngo mtshar che ba yin/ /ma la ya na tsandan me ru 'bud/ /seng ge gangs dang bral bar mi bya'o/ /sman pa'i rgyal po gso rig lung dang 'grogs/ /mkhan
66a7(rgyud 'grel): pos legs gsungs dge slong gis mi gtong/ /dpa' bo g.yul du 'jug tshe go mi 'bud/ /'gro ba bzang mos nye ba so sor 'dzin/ /g.yeng ba med pa dur khrod dbus kyi mi/ /dur khrod mi yis lus ngag tha mal spangs?/ /lto rgyab shugs las
66b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bdur khrod mi/ /dur khrod mi la khram kha mchu me/ /dgos ? mdun du bsgrub ? dur khrod mi/ /glang po'i 'bras bram pa'i bseb ma yin/ /me chu'i dgral tshod yod byar mi rung/ /zhing pas sa yi mdog la lung rigs sbyor/ /rgyal po'i
66b2(rgyud 'grel): zhabs nas bteg tshe bka' la 'dogs/ /kye'o stag tshang yod pa'i sar mi 'gro /rgyal po'i bka' btags thob dus dgra dang bral/ /na tsha med pa'i dus de bde bar gnas/ /bzang ngan gnyis la zas kyis mchun med/ /mya ngan gdungs
66b3(rgyud 'grel): pas shi ba'i bu de mthong/ /brdzun spangs drang srong dag gi phrin las grub/ /gyad la ral gri btags te rgyal po mnyes/ /nags kyi sgrang ma 'gi hang dri la snom/ /ma gi ta la bsil drod nus pa tshang/ /rtse sbyong mthungs pas lus kyi zo mdog bde/ /
66b4(rgyud 'grel): til chang ltor grong rig pa ngan gyis khyogs/ /yid bzhin nor bu kun gyis lta bar mdzes/ /rgyal po la ni su zhig rgol bar nus/ /bu gcig pa la ma srid gdung sems ldan/ /zhus tshe 'gron la bos pa gang mi 'ong/ /bar du 'ong dus bu la a ma dag
