66b5(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' dangs pa'i dang la dri ma med/ /tshegs med gnad khros rig byed gser 'gyur rtsi/ /glang po ma mthong phag pa'i lus dbyibs ltos/ /dman pa'i las la mi zhugs rgyal po'i lugs/ /pe da'i 'bras bu sa bon dus su 'grub/ /rma bya'i
66b6(rgyud 'grel): mdongs la 'bri mkhan yod ma yin/ /thub dbang lag gi rdo rje bskyod mi nus/ /'dam nas bton pa'i utpal ltos dang kye/ /bde ba dang ldan ser skyar gnyid log dus/ /rang kha thon pa 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser/ /khyag rum rang bzhin chu
66b7(rgyud 'grel): yi ngo bo yin/ /sbal pa'i spu yi la ba gsar rnying bral/ /'dam gyi rkyen gyis pad+ma kha dog drungs/ /thabs kyis chun tshe de dus dgra de shes/ /rgyal mo ka ra'i gzugs la tha dad med/ /chu nyid rgya mtsho rgya mtsho'i dang nyid chu/ /rtsi yis
67a1(rgyud 'grel): zin pa'i mi de ri bo 'gul/ /rba rlabs che 'bring rtsang po'i dbyings la thim/ /mun pa dag par byed pa mar me'i 'od/ /zhag mig pa la nyi ma mun par sros/ /smad 'tshong bu de su yi rigs rgyud yin/ /dur khrod lce
67a2(rgyud 'grel): spyang tshang la mngon zhen med/ /gdon gyis brlabs pa'i gtam de sna tshogs smra/ /byis pa'i rang bzhin gcig tu 'dug mi 'gyur/ /nags kyi ri dags shing 'bru'i phyogs ris spangs/ /lha rdzas rin chen nus pa su yis byin/ /nor bu
67a3(rgyud 'grel): rin chen thog mar gang nas 'ongs/ /yid bzhin nor bus dgos 'dod ster ma myong/ /mchog gi nor bu'i rin thang smos kyang kye/ /nor bu'i bdag po dbul ba'i sdug bsngal bral/ /phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag /rdo rje gsang ba'i mgur
67a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal sa ra ha'i zhal nas gsungs pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la shI la dang/ bod kyi bande lo tsA ba zha ma ston pa seng ge rgyal pos bsgyur cing zhus te
67a5(rgyud 'grel): gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du / sh+rI badzra DA ki ni gI twa ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dur
67a6(rgyud 'grel): khrod chen po ha ha sgrogs pa zhes bya ba na/ /las kyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis/ rgyal bu dung phud 'dzin zhes bya ba/ skye ba bdun pa cig la tshe'i bar gcod byas nas/ de'i sha khrag la tshogs kyi 'khor ? byas te/ ye shes kyi mkha' 
67a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma rnams spyan drangs pas/ de'i dus su ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma dbyings kyi gtso mo nyi shu rtsa gcig gis/ snying gtam gros su btab cing rtogs pa mgur du gzhengs pa las/ dang la mkha' 'gro ma tam? mgur ? pa/ /hUM
67b1(rgyud 'grel): nags kyi glang po yan 'dod na/ /'ching pa'i sgrogs las bros byas te/ /lcags kyu 'dzin pa dgra ru lta/ /'bras chang rol ma chags par/ /rin chen rgyan rnams bor bar bya/ /glu len sgra la yid mi gtad/ /dpung gi ru dpon mi bya ba?
67b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po'i zhon pa spang bar bya/ /mchu la ral gri mi skyon bar/ /pho brang nang nas byol byas te/ /nags kyi mdza' la 'bros par bya gsungs// //mkha' 'gro ma nor bu'i mdangs kyis mgur bzhengs pa/ /
67b3(rgyud 'grel): hUM 'du ba pa/ so ba'i drang srong la/ /nad kyi gnyen po dri bar bya/ /ded dpon nor bu len pa la/ /gling don sgrub pa'i zhu ba 'bul/ /dkor mdzod 'dzin pa'i rgyal po la/ /yid dang mthun pa'i nor bu nyo/ /skya ba 'dzin pa'i rig byed la/ /chu bo
67b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ba'i grogs su btsal/ /bsam 'phel yid bzhin nor bu la/ /dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i gsol ba gdab gsung ngo// //mkha' 'gro ma rgyan gyi rgyal mos mgur bzhengs pa/ /hUM rgyal po'i bka' 'og chud pa'i mis/ /
67b5(rgyud 'grel): zhing sa bshin la so nam bya/ /ded dpon snying khrag 'thungs nas ni/ /so btang rdza la las rnams bcol/ /gangs kyi zhun chu khol ma btung/ /nyi zla'i thig le zed byas te/ /chang 'thungs pa yi sems de ltos/ /rab gnas tshar pa'i gzugs
67b6(rgyud 'grel): brnyan brtan/ /de nas lha khang sgo phye ste/ /nyin mtshan rab tu blta bar bya gsung/ /mkha' 'gro ma b+hi na sas mgur bzhengs pa/ hUM gling bran nor bu mi btsong bar/ /spal pa'i kha la phrin las bcol/ /rkun mo'i snying sha zos nas kyang/ /
67b7(rgyud 'grel): mi yi bu mo mi brnyad? par/ /nam mkha' i 'o ma skyugs nas ni/ /dpag bsam ljon shing bskyed pa gces/ /so mtshams mkhar gyi rtse la nyal/ /mel 'tshe byed pa'i gcan zan gso gsung/ /mkha' 'gro ma dpal gyi bzang mos mgur bzhengs pa//
68a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM lcags rnams gser du bsgyur ba'i phyir/ /rin chen rnam lnga lugs su blugs/ /'byung ba lnga ni dbugs su gzhug /nam mkha' i 'ja' tshon bzung bar bya/ /'khor los sgyur rgyal spyan drangs la/ /spyan gzigs dgyes
68a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rol mo dbul/ /dbu la nor bu thod du bcing/ /yi ge gsum gyis gtan la dbab/ /nam mkha' i sprin tshogs rab bsdus te/ /'byung ba'i tsha grang 'thab pa'i sgras/ /sbrang char dal bu phab nas kyang/ /bcud kyi lo tog rgyas par bya
68a3(rgyud 'grel): gsung/ /mkha' 'gro ma ti ma las mgur bzhengs pa/ /hUM dri za bu mo gzung bya ste/ /rin chen sna lnga'i rgyan btags la/ /ljon shing rmang nas sgul pa yis/ /gangs dkar rtse nas 'ju bar byed/ /chu bo gyen la ldog pa yis/ /nam mkha' i bu mo 'gu
68a4(rgyud 'grel): bar byed/ /chu bran rgya mtshor slebs pa yis/ /rlangs pa mkha' la phur bar byed/ /kha dog du ma'i lho sprin gyis/ /nam mkha' i dang du yal bar 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /mkha' 'gro ma bde ba'i rdo rjes mgur bzhengs pa/ hUM mkha' la
68a5(rgyud 'grel): 'ja' tsho na gsal la stong/ /chos gcig zla ba skyed du 'phel/ /dge mas rmi lam smra ma shes/ /bu ram gzugs ni ro gcig nyid/ /gzhon nu'i bde ba po ma shes/ /shel gyi kha dog gdan gyis bsgyur/ /nyi ma'i 'od kyis skar tshogs
68a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gribs/ /kyi ser rlung gis bar snang dangs/ /pad+ma 'dam gyi nang na gsal/ /rgya mtsho'i gnyer ma ngo mtshar che gsung/ /mkha' 'gro ma ye shes rdo rjes mgur bzhengs pa/ hUM nam mkha' i mtshon pa ci la btags/ /bu shi'i a ma semS las
68a7(rgyud 'grel): bral/ /bya ba zin pa'i skyes bu dang/ /bram ze skud pa mkha' la ltos/ /'dzam bu'i gser dang bse ru ltar/ /mdangs ldan me tog ji bzhin nam/ /rgya mtsho'i dbyings dang 'dra ba'i don/ /dpal gyi be'u mdzes par mdzod gsung/ /mkha' gro ma bde
68b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mdangs kyis mgur bzhengs pa/ hUM ri rab chen po'i rtser phyin te/ /ri bran ma lus blta bar bya/ /gi ling sgrog du bcug pa la/ /phyogs mtshams kun tu rgyug par bya/ /bung bas rtsi bcud kun sdud de/ /ro rnams gcig tu sre bar byed/ /dwa
68b2(rgyud 'grel): phrug ma dang phrad pa yis/ /the tshom dri ma sel bar byed/ /skyes bus nam mkha' i dbyings mthong bas/ /phyogs su 'dzin pa 'jig par 'gyur/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i gter thob pas/ /rmongs pa'i dbul ba sel bar byed/ ces gsungs so/ /mkha' 
68b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma phra min stag gdong mas mgur bzhengs pa/ /hUM lhangs kyis 'bod pa de ci sems/ /gcer gyis bltas pa gang la yengs/ /nam mkha' ji ltar gsal bar 'gyur/ /mar me 'di yi rtog pa gang/ /chu bur zhig pa'i rjes mi rnyed/ /rmi
68b4(rgyud 'grel): lam rtog pa bsad bas stong/ /lder rtse'i sgo nga gang la chags/ /bu shi'i a ma'i gces 'dzin su/ /chu bo'i bro blag ro drug gang/ /lkug mes smras pa'i tshig de ci zhes gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma dpal gyi bzang mos mgur bzhengs pa/ hUM kyi ser rlung gi pha
68b5(rgyud 'grel): yul gang/ /lag bskor mig gis ma lus bcom/ /bu chung 'di yis gces 'dzin bor/ /shing gi skyes bu ngal dub spangs/ /gling las nor bu len ma shes/ /gsil ba'i sman ni za bzhin sun/ /gdon gyis brlabs pas dbang med smyo/ /glang po chu
68b6(rgyud 'grel): la dor mi blta/ /seng ge'i bu ni 'jigs dang bral zhes gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma nor bu'i mig gis mgur bzhengs pa/ hUM gyad kyi nor bu su la blangs/ /sa bon bzhin du myu gu 'khrungs/ /ljon shing 'bras bu rim gyis smon/ /pa la kA la lo 'bras med/ /
68b7(rgyud 'grel): zhel gyi sgron me rang gsal nyid/ /dmus long rgyal pos mtshan dpe mthong/ /nam mkha' srid gsum dbang du bsdus/ /rin chen gling nas rdo spangs/ /zhes gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma sprin gyi shugs can gyis mgur bzhengs pa/ hUM nam mkha' 'byung
69a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ma bzung ste/ /'byung bzhis nam mkha' 'da' ma nus/ /sna tshogs gzugs brnyan gser yin te/ /nyi ma'i 'od la mun pa med/ /'o mas chu dang mar ma phye/ /'jig chags bskal pa drug cu yis/ /nam mkha' 
69a2(rgyud 'grel): la ni gnod ma skyal/ /'khor los sgyur rgyal sems dpa' che/ /sems can kun la nye ring med/ /rdo yis gzugs skus bsdigs mdzub phyar/ /khyod dang ? ru 'byed ma shes/ /me shel grang mo me nyid yin gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma thong phreng rtsal gyis
69a3(rgyud 'grel): mgur bzhengs pa/ hUM dangs pa'i chu la rlung gis bskyod/ /chab rom gzugs kyi rnam par shar/ /nam mkha' i phyogs 'dzin lung bas byas/ /gzugs med gzugs kyi ngo bor snang/ /nyi ma'i 'od la sprin gyis bsgribs/ /srid gsum mun rum
69a4(rgyud 'grel): chen por 'gyur/ /chu ba rnyogs pas gzugs brnyan subs/ /mig gis mig nyid ma mthong bar/ /klu rgyal gtsug gi nor bu bzhin/ /rang gi srog ni rang gis bcad/ /ces gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma dpal gyi rdo rjes mgur bzhengs pa/ hUM
69a5(rgyud 'grel): grib mas gzugs nyid mi gtong na/ /dug zos zhu rjes ci ru 'gyur/ /byi la'i dug ni dran pas gung/ /nam mkha' btsad bzhag dus su smin/ /sa bon 'phel stobs rab tu che/ /smin pas 'phung ba smyug ma'i 'bru/ /bsags pas bcing ba bud pa'i rtse//
69a6(rgyud 'grel): yod pas sbyangs pa dmangs pa'i nor/ /rang gis bslus pa srin gyi kha/ /rang la smin ma sdig pA du zheS gsung ngo/ mkha' 'gro ma tshogs kyi rje mos mgur bzhengs pa/ glang ni zla bo rnyed pas nyes/ /mgo to ma bde ba sdug bsngal yin/ glang po gser
69a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi sgrog la dga' / /dmyal ba'i lus la bde ba med/ /yi dags bkres shing skom pas gdungs/ /khra yis ded pa'i byi'u dang/ /ma he'i rdzi'u sems khral che/ /bu shi'i mya ngan yid la bcags/ /rang sogs dor pa'i dpa' bo blun//
69b1(rgyud 'grel): mi ? bo'i sos skos soms dang kyi/ /gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma dkar mos mgur gzhengs pa/ hUM gdan sar bton pa'i rgyal bu yis/ /grogs po mi gnyis khrid byas te/ /'dab ma bzhi pa'i lde mig gis/ /khor yug sdom pa'i lcags
69b2(rgyud 'grel): phye la/ /nyin mtshan gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /res ches sbyang khung bshig nas ni/ /rgyal po'i dkor mdzod kha phye la/ /yid bzhin nor bu blta bar bya/ /lcags kyu 'dzin pa'i skyes bu yis/ /nor bu rin chen blangs nas kyang/ /mchan khung
69b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su sba bar bya/ /khrus byas rgyal mtshan rtsel phyar/ /dgos 'dod 'byung phyir gsol ba gdab/ ces gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma nyi zla'i mig can gyis mgur bzhengs pa/ hUM mkha' la nyi zla shar ba yis/ /mun pa ma spangs? snang
69b4(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /gser 'gyur rtsi yi mkhan po 'am/ /g.ya' dang bral ba'i me long bzhin/ /sgron ma thogs pas mun pa bral/ /chu yi gzugs brnyan ? pas stong/ /ka la ku tra? ming yin te/ /nam mkha' mthong bas ji ltar rigs/ /
69b5(rgyud 'grel): tshad pas gdungs pas chab rom zhu/ /na bun kyi ser rlung gis phyags zhes gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma mig ngan mas mgur bzhengs pa/ /hUM me long zad nas gzugs brnyan 'gags/ /mtsho la dang zhig 'gro lam stongs/ /gnyid sad skyes bus yul
69b6(rgyud 'grel): ma mthong/ /skar tshogs nyi ma'i zer gyis non/ /mkha' la gzugs shar khol ma'i nang/ /khong du chad 'thungs nyam dbral/ /mchu rlung gis srid gsum stongs zhes gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma bud ba'i mchu can gyis mgur bzhengs pa/ hUM
69b7(rgyud 'grel): nags kyi glang po smo? bas 'tshengs/ /ri dags dman mas g.yeng ba spangs/ /dur bsrungs mi la so nam med/ /ne tsho smra ma shes pas 'tshengs/ /mi gtsang khrod nas utpal 'khrungs/ /sha pa'i ?  ni bog na bde/ /khur po med na 'jigs dang
70a1(rgyud 'grel): bral/ /nor med mi yis mel tshe spangs/ /nags kyi me ni rlung gis spor/ /lus ngag bkol pas 'tsho ba rnyed ces gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma nam mkha' dbang phyug mas mgur bzhengs pa/ mkha' la 'gyur bzhi'i nyi ring
70a2(rgyud 'grel): med/ /rmi lam nor la zhen chags med/ /btso ma'i gser la dri ma med/ /glang po rwa med chag dogs med/ /gling lon ded dpon 'dod sems med/ /me dpung dkyil na srog chags med/ /mo gsham bu la yang rtsal med/ /spal? pa'i kha la smra
70a3(rgyud 'grel): brjod med/ /me long nang na gzugs brnyan med/ /mkha' la bya 'phur rten sa med ces gsungs so/ /mkha' 'gro ma brda'i mgur chung/ /gsang mdzod 'phrul gyi rgya/ /khyad par du gyur pa'i rgyud la/ zham lo tsa bas bsgyur ba'o/ /rdzogs sho// //
70a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badzra DA ki ni gI ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ mkha' 'gro ma'i brda'i mgur zhes bya ba/ rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas rtogs pa'i lta ba'i brda' bstan pa/ gser gyi ral gri til ngar ldan
70a5(rgyud 'grel): pa da phyung la/ /bung bas me tog rtsi bcud ma lus myang bar gyis/ /chu ban sna tshogs rgya mtshor gcig go lan tshwa'i ro/ /me long bzhin ni byad yin gung du ma sems cig /chu yi zla ba 'di la byis pa ltad mo byed/ /bu ram gzugs 'di tha dad
70a6(rgyud 'grel): snang yang mngar ba'i ro/ /nam mkha' gzugs su mthong ba'i byis pa snying re rje/ /ri bo rlung gis bskyod du med pa shin tu gces?/ /ta la'i sdong po bregs na mgo rtsa gnyis ka skam/ /nam mkha' i kha dog rkyen gyis 'gyur ba ngo mtshar che/ /'dab chags
70a7(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la gnas kyang grib ma sa la rgyu/ /shel gyi skang bu'i mar me 'de? la dri ma med/ /rmi lam sang pa'i skyes bu 'di ni blo sems bde/ /gzings la gnas pa'i bya rog gang bder 'gro par gyis/ /khang stong nang gi khyi rkun 'di
70b1(rgyud 'grel): ni ltad mor che/ /shel la tshon gyis bskus kyang gting nas 'gyur ba med/ /rang gis gser la ka 'jis brdar mi dgos/ /ded dpon lam rgyus can dang 'grogs na nor bu lon/ /drang srong nags la chung pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che/ /ku sha rlung gis
70b2(rgyud 'grel): rgul ba'i rtsa ba e re 'khrul/ /gded med gyad kyi spyod pa byed pa snying re rje/ /sman dug 'dres pa 'di yis gnyis ka'i nus pa nyams/ /glang po'i gzugs brnyan 'di la khal gyi nus pa med/ /rin chen snod du bzhag nas 'tsho ba grong du
70b3(rgyud 'grel): slang ngo/ /nam mkha' gos su gyon nas 'byung ba gnas su thim/ /khur bar chu blugs skyes bu de yis smra ma shes/ /rgyal po'i rjes gnang thob pa gshed ma la mi 'jigs/ /ral gri'i 'khor los mtshon cha gang yin btub par byed/ /'dab ma
70b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dang ldan pa'i sems can mkha' la 'gro /a ma mthong ba'i byis pas gzhan gyis 'khrid du med/ /sa bon rgyu 'bras gnyis kyi nus pa mkha' la skams/ /nyi ma mkha' la shar ba'i rgyu skar zil gyis gnon/ /snying phyung de nas yan
70b5(rgyud 'grel): lag g.yob par ga la nus/ /mtho yor mi ru shes pas de tshe 'jigs dang bral/ /sbrul nag mtshon gyis zin na dug gi gnod pa bral/ /rtsi yi rgyal pos 'bru rnams bcud du sgyur bar byed/ /rgyal bu pha dgos bzang po 'di la rtsol ba med//
70b6(rgyud 'grel): dbul po rin chen gling du sna tshogs thabs kyis zhugs/ /'thor rlung chen pos stong gsum 'jig rten g.yeng bar byed/ /dus mdza' i me yis srid gsum bsreg par the tshom med/ /bskal ba'i chu yis snod bcud ma lus gzhi nas 'khru zhes
70b7(rgyud 'grel): gsung ngo// //blta ba'i brda rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur/ /bam po dang po/ /sangs rgyas mkha' gros ting 'dzin nyams kyi brda bstan pa/ drod bsher ldan pa de tshes bon gdab pa'i dus/ /sa bon bskyed
71a1(rgyud 'grel): med btag pas myu gu bskyed du sla/ /gyen thur lam la chu bo 'bab par 'gyur/ /nags tshal khrod du shing rta 'dren pa'i skyes bu blun/ /rin chen sna bdun ldan na 'khor los sgyur rgyal rgyu/ /so ma btang ba'i
71a2(rgyud 'grel): rdza ni chu la reg pas 'jig /seng ge'i 'o ma snod ngan nang du blug mi bya/ /dbul po'i lus 'di dal bar mi bzhag cis kyang bskol/ /sna tshogs rgyu las sgra snyan 'byung ba ngo mtshar che/ /zhun sbyong legs pa'i rin chen 'di ni bskol na
71a3(rgyud 'grel): bde/ /so mtshams bsrung ba'i skyes bu 'di la dngul chu blud/ /nad kyis gdungs par gyur na thur ma gtad par bya/ /nor bu rin chen rgyal mtshan rtse la phyar nas kyang/ /mchod pa byas na dgos 'dod sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ /a ma
71a4(rgyud 'grel): srin mos khyer ba 'di ni dran gyis la/ /skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas seng ge'i gsob gon nas/ /nyi zla'i steng du dpa' bo'i gdong la blta bar bya/ /rgyal po'i rkun mo gang yin de ni brtsad bcad nas/ /gyad kyi nor bu 'di ni thabs kyis btsal
71a5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /glang chen smyon pa mi rtse yan du bcug pas bsrun/ chu yi rnyog ma ma brgul bzhag pas rim gyis dangs/ /bya ba zin pa'i skyes bu 'di ni blo sems bde/ /lan tshwa'i rdog po 'di la chu yi thigs pa gzan/ /chab rom nyi mas
71a6(rgyud 'grel): gdungs pa 'di ni chu ru 'gro /dug la sngags kyis btab pa 'di ni sman gyi mchog /spu ba chu yin 'di la tha dad yod ma yin/ /sprin rnams gtor ba'i rlung po 'di la nan tan bskyed/ /gsal bya gsal byed med pa'i sgron me bde ba che//
71a7(rgyud 'grel): chu bo che dang rtag tu 'grogs pa shin tu gces/ /'gro ba bzang mo'i mya ngan 'di ni yid la zhog /nam mkha' yid can 'di ni shar gyi phyogs su 'gro zhes bsgom pa'i brda/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur bam po gnyis pa'o// //
71b1(rgyud 'grel): ta'i kyi sgron me bum pa'i nang du sba bar bya/ /tshes gcig zla ba 'di ni bskyed du rim gyis 'phel/ /'gro ba bzang po rang gi phru gu gso ba mkhas/ /'dab chags sgo nga'i ched du gab pa 'di la ltos/ /chu lud 'jom pa'i 'bras bu myur du smin/ /'tsho
71b2(rgyud 'grel): byed mkhas pa sman gyi nus pa sna tshogs brten/ /nags kyi me la rkyen rnams sna tshogs grogs su 'ong/ /gzhon nu ma yi bde ba khyod kyis sna nus sam/ /nam mkha' i ri mo 'di la gces par ma 'dzin cig /kyi ser 'di yis chu yi sdub dbyings su 'das//
71b3(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i sgon me dus rnams kun tu sbar bar bya/ /dngul gyi me long 'di ni yengs pa med par phyi/ /ri rab mthon po'i rtse la phyin pa 'di ci sems/ /bud rtsis myos pa 'di yis ci smras smyon pa'i tshig /nad rnams 'byin pa'i sman mchog kran du gyur ba
71b4(rgyud 'grel): yod/ /pad+ma'i rtsi bcud 'thungs pa'i bung ba phyir mi lta/ /shel gyi mchod rten ma mthong bar du blta ba gces/ /sgron me lag na thogs pa'i skyes bu snang lam bde/ /khong du seng ge'i snying gis rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur/ /gser 'gyur rtsa yis
71b5(rgyud 'grel): dngos po bzang ngan med par 'joms/ /chu bo chen po zhon nas nam mkha' i bya lam snyag /chu bo'i rgyun chad de dus rang thag 'khor mi nus/ /'khor lo'i srub thag chad pa'i rdza mkhan blo sems bde/ /sprin gyis nam mkha' i ngang las byung zhing de ru dangs/ /
71b6(rgyud 'grel): bltas kyi bltas kyi nam mkha' 'di ni mthong ba 'gags/ /nyams kyi brda mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur/ bam po gsum pa// //skyes bu nad kyis zin pa'i blo sems dran gyis la/ /dur khrod wa mo 'di yi spyod 'gros blta bar bya/ /nags
71b7(rgyud 'grel): tshal khrod na ri dags dman ma gnas pa ltos/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo 'di ni lu la'ang 'jigs pa med/ /rdo yi mi la 'drin par nus pa ngo mtshar che/ /nags na gnas pa'i spri'u 'di yi spyod ba 'am/ /yang na rgyal bu gzhon nu 'di la blta bar bya/ /
72a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la rgyu ba'i bya bran 'di 'dra ci yi phyir/ /'bru yi mdzod du bkres pas nyen pa snying re rje/ phye ma leb kyi spyod pa 'di 'dra su yis phod/ /dong gi btson 'di thar dam yid la bya bar rigs/ sdug bsngal rgyan du
72a2(rgyud 'grel): mthor ba'i glang po sgrog la dga' / /'tsho yi nang nas smig rgyu snyag pa'i ri dags snying re rje/ /rin chen gling nas stong ldab byed pa'i ded dpon blun/ /nam mkha' i rlung dang 'grogs pa phyogs bzhir kun tu rgyug /glang chen shugs kyis rag ma
72a3(rgyud 'grel): tshongs la khyi sha zo/ /smyon pa'i rjes 'brengs nas nam mkhas sman mcho ster/ /nags la gnas pa'i ri dags 'di ni yan par khye/ /'dab chags mkha' la rgyu ba 'di yi rkang rjes stes so/ /ral gri lag ni thogs pa'i mi de gang phrad gsod/ ?
72a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi spyod pa 'di la sems can ? khyi phag gnyis kyis bram ze'i gsar tshig rlung la bskur/ /mi mgo skam po la ni shing gi skyes bu dga' / gi ling sgrog dang bral nas kun tu rgyug par rigs/ /kha ba'i nus pa mtsho la gnas par
72a5(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur ro/ /shing lo rlung gis khyer ba 'di yis rtsad mchod/ /nyi zla bur gyur na skar ma'i tshogs dang 'grogs/ gru pa 'di yis kya ba'i nyar bya bar rigs/ /dug 'di rma bya'i zas yin gzhan rnams 'phur? bar byed/ /'dab gshog
72a6(rgyud 'grel): med par mkha' la 'gro ba dor bar bya/ /spyod pa'i brda mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur/ bam po bzhi pa// /shel sgong yongs su dag na 'od zer nang nas 'char/ /nam mkha' i gter la sbyod pa'i skyes bu dbul dang bram/ /snying gi
72a7(rgyud 'grel): dbus su pad+ma'i ge sar smin par bla/ /drod tshad ldan pa'i 'o ma rtsol bas mar du 'gyur/ /stong pa'i snod 'di nam chag tshen nam mkha' 'dres/ /'ja' tshon dus kyi mkha' la yal ba rnyed mi 'gyur/ /nam mkha' i cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'di 'dra
72b1(rgyud 'grel): ngo mtshar che/ /'khor los sgyur rgyal sna tshogs gnas nas bsdu ba mdzad/ /rgun 'brum 'bras bu bsgul bas mi smin gzhag na smin/ /nor bu yon tan sus byin 'di yi bsam pa ci/ /nyi zla mkha' la 'char ba 'di la rnam rtog med/ /stong
72b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i cho 'phrul 'di yis lo tog 'bras bu smin/ /nam mkha' i dbyings 'di sna tshogs ston pa gang gi rkyen/ /chu snod du ma'i zla ba'i gzugs brnyan shes par gyis/ /'bras bu'i brda mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur/ bam po lnga pa// //
72b3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma'i brda bam po lnga pa zhes bya ba/ gsang mdzod na shog dril bu gnas pa las/ dbyings kyi gtso mo rnams kyis bka' bgros nas/ rje dam pa rgya gar la gnang/ slad kyis ding ri bla 'khor du zham lo tsA bas bsgyur nas/
72b4(rgyud 'grel): bla ma byang chub sems dpa' kun dga' la gtad pa yin no/ /khyad par gyi brgyud pa chen po brgyad las/ brda skor rnam pa bzhi rdzogs sho// //thugs gsang ba'i do ha zhes bya ba bzhugs so// /* /rgya gar skad du/ tsit+ta gu hya
72b5(rgyud 'grel): do ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ thugs kyi gsang ba glur blangs pa zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ bram ze chen po sa ra has thugs kyi rtogs pa mgur du bzhengs pa/ kye 'o 'khor 'das kun gyi rtsa ba sems kyi
72b6(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin te/ /rtogs nas sgom du med kyi ma bcos lhug par zhog /rang la bzhag nas gzhan la 'tshol ba a re 'khrul/ /'di yin 'di min med do thams cad gnyug ma'i dang zhes gsungs so/ /klu sgrub kyis gsungs pa/ rtogs nas
72b7(rgyud 'grel): gang gis 'ching bar nus pa khyod kyis smros/ /'ching ba gang yin de ni ye nas grol ba nyid/ /gang la bcings dang 'ching bar bya ba ma grub na/ /nags la gnas pa'i glang po gang bder rgyug du chug gsung/ /pradz+nyA pha las smras pa/ rtogs dang
73a1(rgyud 'grel): ma rtogs gnyis kyi bar na su 'dug pa/ /de ni nga yin gzhan du ci yang yong ma yin/ /de la gang mthong de ni bde chen rang byung ste/ /thams cad thams cad de nyid yin par shes par bya/ gsung ngo/ /zhi ba 'chos
73a2(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa/ mnyam nyid dbyings las mi g.yo cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston/ /chu bran sna tshogs rgya mtshor gcig go lan tshwa'i ro/ /du ma ro gcig 'di la tha dad yod ma yin/ /thams cad thams cad gcug ma'i ro yis khyab na bde gsung ngo//
73a3(rgyud 'grel): blo gros brtan pas gsungs pa/ gza' rgyal mkha' la shar bas rgyu skar zil non ltar/ /gnyis med ye shes chen pos rtog tshogs nyams par byas/ /'dis ni 'khor pa'i sa bon ma lus bcom brin gyis/ /da ni mya ngan 'das pa
73a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du mchol cig gsungs /dag gi dbang phyug gis gsungs pa/ snang srid chos dbyings pho brang na/ /rig pa'i ye shes lham me ba/ /bde gsal stong pa'i gnang la bzhugs/ /'dod yon sna tshogs mchod pa 'bul/ /dgag sgrub
73a5(rgyud 'grel): med par rol du gsol zhes gsung ngo/ /rdo rje dril bu pas gsungs pa/ sems kyi de nyid mthong 'dod cing/ /bdag gzhan 'dod pa bsgrub 'dod pas/ /spyi bo'i nor bu mchod par bya/ /dngos grub thams cad de las 'byung gsung/ sha ka
73a6(rgyud 'grel): ras gsungs pa/ dri med shel sgong ngag pa gcig /tshon gyi rkyen gyis sna tshogs 'char/ /bar snang khams su 'jog shes na/ /gtan gyi bde bde las 'byung gsung ngo/ /shAn+ti bas gsungs pa/ gnas na zhog la 'gron thong/ /gnyer
73a7(rgyud 'grel): ka ma byed phan du chug /ched du gad 'dzin 'khrul pa yin/ /gzings la 'phur ba'i bya rog lhos gsung ngo/ /barbi? pas gsungs pa/ gang gang mthong ba de de nyid/ /dran pa'i rtsi dang ma bral bar/ /ci rigs par ni nyams su long/ /gser
73b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur rtsi yi mkhan po ltos gsung/ /ye shes zhabs kyis gsungs pa/ /snying chung skyes bus yan lag g.yob par mi nus bzhin/ /sems nyid rtsa ba bral na rtog pas bcing du med/ /dug gi sngags can dug nyid sman du 'gyur ba bzhin//
73b2(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang ldan pas nyon? mongs nyid ni byang chub rgyu gsung ngo/ /shAn+ta de bas gsungs pa/ 'khor 'das gnyis kyi rtsa ba la/ /byang sems rnam gnyis sdong po rgyu/ /'di phyi gnyis kyi me tog shar/ /bdag gzhan gnyis kyi 'bras bu smin
73b3(rgyud 'grel): gsung ngo/ /ye shes snying pos gsungs pa/ shing gi snying po bral pa bzhin/ /sems kyi de nyid btsal gyi stor/ /sgyu mkhan ri mo dzo? bzhin du/ /sna tshogs snang la nges bzung med gsung ngo/ /ni ru pas gsungs pa/ mar me rang gsal gcig pur
73b4(rgyud 'grel): zhog /chu dang rlangs na tha dad min/ /bya yi rjes la btsal mi dgos/ /gnyid sad skyes bu blo sems bde gsung ngo/ /rtog ce pas gsungs pa/ gang la nges shes skyes pas rtsa ba zin/ /de las lhag pa'i ngo sprod gzhan yod min/ /snang dang srid
73b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshes rnams thams cad la/ /bla mar ma gyur pa ni yod ma yin gsung ngo/ /nag po zhabs kyis gsungs pa/ me tog sna tshogs du ma'i ro/ /bung bas gcig tu sdud pa ltar/ /chos rnams sna tshogs du ma'i ro/ /rtogs dang ldan pas gcig
73b6(rgyud 'grel): tu bsdus/ /ro ni skye ba med pa'i ro/ /myong ni ngos gzung med par myong gsung ngo/ /nA ga b+hu su kas gsungs pa/ myong ba med pa'i nyams myong la/ /blo dang bral bas nyams blangs/ /rtogs su med par gtan la phab/ /thob du med par mngon du
73b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur gsungs so /lU yI bas gsungs pa/ /gnyug ma'i shes pa 'gyur med mngon du gyur nas kyang/ /rtsol bas sangs rgyas logs su tshol ba ral ba ste/ /glang po rnyed nas glong bo'i rjes tshal ji bzhin no/ /da ni sangs rgyas med par shes pas 'dod
74a1(rgyud 'grel): blo bral gsung ngo/ /kraSh+Ni pas gsungs pa/ /ngos bzung med par ngo sprad pas/ /stong nyid dang du nyams su myong/ /dran pa'i mel tshe? srung mkhas pas/ /'khrul pa'i rkun mos glags ma rnyed /rgyun chad med par nyams
74a2(rgyud 'grel): blangs pas/ /'du 'bral med par mngon du gyur gsung ngo/ /in+d+ra po d+hi sa gsungs pa/ skyes bu gnyid log 'khrul pas non gyur kyang/ /gnyid sad dus na 'khrul pa yul na med/ /de bzhin ma rtogs 'khor bar sdug bsngal kyang/ /rtogs
74a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan la 'khor ba'i yul sa med gsung ngo/ /ratna kIrtis? gsungs pa/ nyi ma'i 'od zer kun nas rgyas pa'i dra bcan/ /mun pa'i tshogs rnams 'joms mdzad ngo mtshar che/ /rtogs ldan bla ma thugs rje'i 'od zer dra ba can/ /gdul bya'i
74a4(rgyud 'grel): blo yi mun sel 'di na ngo tshar che gsung ngo/ /kau ka tas gsungs pa/ dbang bzhis smin pa'i bu la nyams kyi gdams pa yong/ /thos bas sgro 'dogs chod la tshig gi gdams pa yod/ /bla mas thugs la btags la gnad kyi gdams pa
74a5(rgyud 'grel): yod/ /'khrul pa gong du bshig la 'tshang gi gdams pa yong gsung ngo/ /sa ha dzas gsungs pa/ bu nyon khyod kyis nam mkha' i dkyil du ltos/ /lho sprin mi gda' 'di ni nam mkha' i cho 'phrul yin/ /'ja' tshon 'di la bden par ma 'dzin par//
74a6(rgyud 'grel): chu bo chen po'i rgyun la zhon la shar du rgyug gsung ngo/ /glang chen gos kyis gsungs pa/ rtsi yi rgyal pos 'bru rnams bcud du 'gyur pa bzhin/ /nyams myong rtsi yis snang srid bde ba chen por 'bar/ /gang gang mthong pa de skye med spros dang bral//
74a7(rgyud 'grel): 'di la ngos 'dzin med pas stong pa btsal? mi dgos gsung ngo/ /b+ha su d+ha ris gsungs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad bde bar gshegs/ /snang ba thams cad chos kyi sku/ /'dod yon thams cad sems kyi rgyan/ /rtog tshogs thams cad ye
74b1(rgyud 'grel): shes che zhes? gsung ngo/ /he ru ka pas gsungs pa/ lus la ye shes chen po gnas/ /bla ma'i kha las gsal bar rtogs/ /gzhan gyis brjod min gzug? ma'i don/ /'di ni ma bcos rang 'byung ba'o gsung ngo/ /ka na ko tis gsungs pa/ srid pa'i
74b2(rgyud 'grel): me yis dngos po thams cad bsreg pa ltar/ /rtogs pa'i me yis bdag tu 'dzin pa bsregs nas kyang/ /'khor ba'i bud shing ma lus gtan nas 'joms par byed/ /de nas 'gro ba'i don du ci bder gshegs pa yin gsung ngo/ /nyi
74b3(rgyud 'grel): ma'i rtsal kyis gsungs pa/ sna tshogs sems kyi tsho 'phrul te/ /sems ni 'di zhes mtshon du med/ /de phyir 'khor 'das rtsa ba bral/ /de nyid chos skur shes par gyis gsung ngo/ /rin chen rdo rjes gsungs pa/ nges shes las
74b4(rgyud 'grel): ni don mthong 'gyur/ /mos gus las ni byin brlabs 'byung/ /brtson 'grus kyis ni dgos pa 'grub gsung ngo/ /twe'u tra pas gsungs pa / rig pa khong nas ma sod na/ /'di zhes bstan pas rtogs mi 'gyur/ /mi gnad can gyi snang ba
74b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ thog mar rang rgyud gsal bar bya gsung ngo/ /yan lag med pa'i rdo rjes gsungs pa/ mthong ba mngon du ma gyur na/ /mig gi dbang pos yul mthong bzhin/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu mi 'byung pas/ /gomS par bya ba shin tu gces
74b6(rgyud 'grel): gsung ngo/ /jeb? ri pas gsungs pa/ sku gsum phyi rol yul na med/ /rig pa'i ye shes dangs pa las/ /gzugs brnyan cam du cang nas 'char/ /rnam par rtog pas rnyog mi bya gsung ngo/ /gu d+ha?  ri pas gsungs pa/ snang srid ye gol
74b7(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbyings/ /phyag rgya chen po spangs thob med/ /nam mkha' i bya yis gar ma phyin/ /byis pa'i rtsol ba sha? thang chang ces gsung ngo/ /la ba'i na? bza' can? gyis gsungs pa/ gang duAng ma mthong long ba'i mig /ci yang mi sems gnyi mug dang/
75a1(rgyud 'grel): gang du ma phyin 'phye bo'i bgros/ /ci yang ma thob dbul mo'i gter gsung ngo/ /DoM b+hi he ru kas gsungs pa/ srid zhi mnyam nyid spros bral la /rtsal sgrub byed pa sha thang chad/ /yul sems gnyis med zang
75a2(rgyud 'grel): thal la/ /tha dang 'dzin pa nyon re mongs/ /bdag gzhan gnyis med chos sku la/ /bzang ngan 'dzin pa snying re rje gsung ngo/ /nyi ma sbas pas gsungs pa/ /yul la bltas pas skye ba med/ /sems la bltas pas spros dang bral//
75a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med don 'di blo las 'das/ /ngas ni ci yang ma she so gsung ngo/ /gu Na tis gsungs pa/ ma skyes mi g.yo nam mkha' i dang/ /gzugs brnyan sna tshogs cho 'phrul te/ /snyems med rig pa rang sar zhog /chos kyis
75a4(rgyud 'grel): bcings pa snying rdo rje gsung ngo/ /pad+ma'i rdo rjes gsungs pa/ /bya ba thams cad yongs btang ste/ /sems kyi glang po rang sar zhog /gnyis med ye shes btsal du med/ /thams cad thams cad de de nyid gsung ngo/ /tai lo pas gsungs pa/
75a5(rgyud 'grel): kun gzhi zang thal zhabs phyung la/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa dbyings su sgyur/ /yid kyi rnam shes stod la non/ /sgo lnga rang grol lhug par zhog gsung ngo/ /shes rab 'byung gnas kyis gsungs pa/ spros dang bral la rtog pas 'ching mi nus/ /sgyu mar
75a6(rgyud 'grel): mthong la yul gyis 'ching mi nus/ /zhe 'dod bral la spyod pas 'ching mi nus/ /sangs rgyas 'dod la 'khor bas 'ching mi nas gsung ngo/ /dz+nyA na sh+rIs gsungs pa/ rtsa ba bral ba'i sdong bu bzhin/ /nga yi sems nyid nam mkhar stor/ 'khrul snang
75a7(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar dgyes dgyes mdzod/ /drin nam mkha' i rnal 'byor yin gsung ngo/ /bar he tas gsungs pa/ /ki ka mkha' la lding po bzhin/ /'khor 'dis ro mnyam dbyings su grol/ /de dang dogs pa kun bral te/ /bde ba chen po nam mkha' i ngang gsung ngo//
75b1(rgyud 'grel): kA ma sh+ris gsungs pa/ lus med? lum kyi nang na gnas/ /rten med mkha' la bya bzhin rgyu /dmigs med smra bsam yul las 'das/ /'gyur med rang byung ye shes chi gsung ngo/ /mi thub zla bas gsungs la/ sgron mes zla ba chol ba bzhin//
75b2(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa de nyid ma rtog pa/ /nam mkhas nam mkha' chol ba bzhin/ /mi rtog pa nyid glo las 'das gsung ngo/ /dzrA land+ha ras gsungs pa/ ye shes med na mthong ba tshe/ /rtog pa med na gsal ba che/ /zhen pa med na bde ba cha /gang duAng mi gnas pa che
75b3(rgyud 'grel): gsung ngo/ /me tri ka mA las gsungs pa/ sems nyid gzhi stong rtsa ba bral/ /las kyis 'ching bar mi nus te/ /dngos por zhen pas de ltar min/ /de ltar rtag tu rang sems ltos gsung ngo/ /pad+ma badzras gsungs pa/ nam mkha' i dbyings kyi b+ha ga ru//
75b4(rgyud 'grel): rig pa'i rdo rje gsor nas kyang/ /gnyis med dang du sbyar byas nas/ /bde chen lhan cig skyes pa 'char gsung ngo/ /klu'i byang chub kyis gsungs pa/ mkha' la rlung 'phyo srab kyis zung/ /khang stong khyi yi spyod pa ltos/ /nam mkha' i a ma sus mthong ba
75b5(rgyud 'grel): bu ni pang du rgyug par nges gsungs ngo/ /'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis gsungs pa/ rin chen gling du byin na dbul dang bral/ /bla ma'i bka' drin thob na 'khrul ba zhig /sems kyi de nyid mthong na 'khor ba med/ /byang sems nang du 'byongs na
75b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro don 'byung gsungs ngo/ /rA dzA ha tis gsungs pa / rtogs na gzhan don mi byed pa/ /de ni sa yi gter bsrungs bzhin/ /'di na tshogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /thugs rjes sems can mi 'dzin nam gsung ngo/ /bzang po dpal gyis gsungs
75b7(rgyud 'grel): pa /bdag dang sems can dbyer med kyang/ /'gro ba las kyis sdug bsngal bas/ /rgyun chad med pa'i thugs rjes yis/ /'gro ba'i don la rol du gsol gsung ngo/ /li'i bzang pos gsungs pa/ rang la yod kyang ngo ma shes/ /dbul mo
76a1(rgyud 'grel): gter gyis bslus pa bzhin/ /de nyid ma mthong sems can la/ /thugs rjes sgrod me gdag du gsol gsung ngo/ /rnal 'byor mi 'du te mas gsungs la/ chab dang chab ro mtha? dang min/ /snang dang stong pa dbyer ma phyed//
76a2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' dang rgyud la bye brag med/ /sems dang sems byung de bzhin no gsung ngo/ /shing lo mas gsungs pa/ brag ca'i sgra 'di su yis smras/ /me long gzugs brnyan su yis bris/ /rmi lam ltar mo gang du gyes/ /gang na'ang med do sems
76a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi dang gsung ngo/ /dur khrod mas gsungs pa/ kun bzhi dag pa chos dbyings yin/ /yin ngos shes pa ye shes yin/ /bdag 'dzin zhig na rtsa bral yin/ /sgo lnga rang grol lam khyer yin gsung ngo/ /gcer bu mas gsungs pa/ rang
76a4(rgyud 'grel): grol blo dang bral ba la/ /mi bcos sgo gsum lhug par zhog /mi zhen dgag sgrub med par zhog /mi g.yo mnyam nyid chen por bzhag gsung ngo/ /ro langs mas gsungs pa/ /ma yengs sgom du med pa la/ /nyams su len na mkhas pa
76a5(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /sna tshogs rjes med chen po ru/ /lam du khyer na grol ba yin gsungs/ /mahA sid+d+his gsungs pa/ ma bsgom ma bsgom blo ma bsgom/ /blo bsgom rtog pa'i 'khrul 'khor yin/ /rtog pas 'khor bar 'ching ba ste/ /blo dang bral la
76a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgom du med gsung ngo/ /dri med mas gsungs pa/ sems nyid ye stong ye bral la/ /skye med bsgoms pas ci zhig bya/ /sems byung rang shar rang grol lo/ /rtog pa spangs pas ci zhig bya gsung ngo/ /blo gros dbyangs mas gsungs pa/
76a7(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i ye shes kun la khyab/ /ye grol chen mo mchog gi lam/ /mi g.yo mi 'gyur bsam las 'das/ /rtog med rang rig ye shes chi gsung ngo/ /bdag med mas gsungs pa/ nam mkha' nam mkha' mnyam nyid che/ /nyi ma nyi ma ye ?
76b1(rgyud 'grel): chu bo chu bo rgyun chang med/ /'ja' tshon rang grol bde ba che gsung ngo/ /gsal byed mas gsungs pa/ go ru med pa'i don rtogs na/ /brjod du med pa'i gleng gzhi 'byung/ /bsam du med pa'i don bsgoms na/ /thog du med pa'i 'bras bu
76b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung gsung ngo/ /bye ma lung pas gsungs pa/ gnyis med bde chen don gyi mchog /rang la yod pas gzhan du tshol/ /mi shes rtsol bas sgra phyir 'brangs/ /'khrul pa'i sems can snying re rje gsung ngo/ /rdo rje gcig mas gsungs pa/ stong nyid
76b3(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i glegs bam la/ /rang rig ye shes yi ger bris/ /sna tshogs thabs kyi gdams pa bkod/ /rgyun chad med pa'i bstan pa sgrogs gsung ngo/ /sngo sangs mas gsungs pa/ mi 'gyur nam mkha' i rdo rje la/ /g.yo 'gul 'byung ba'i tshe 'phrul
76b4(rgyud 'grel): shar/ /sna tshogs skye 'gro'i bya ba byas/ /rang grol nam mkha' i dbyings su yal gsungs ngo/ /gri skor mas gsungs pa/ ming dang bral ba'i ming mang pos/ /der 'dzin zhig pa'i blo bral po/ /yongs su grol ba'i byar med po/ /ye yin chen por
76b5(rgyud 'grel): rtogs par gyis gsung ngo/ /lam skyes mas gsungs pa/ dmigs bya dmigs byad mdza' spangs te/ /ting 'dzin rten dang bral ba la/ /chu bo chen po'i rgyun bzhin du/ /ma yengs nyams su blang bar bya gsung ngo/ /bshes gnyen mas gsungs
76b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ nam mkha' i bya lam rjes med bzhin/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa rjes med yin/ /rang rgyud 'dzin pa med gyur na/ /mi dge bcus kyang 'ching mi nus gsung ngo/ /ro zan mas gsungs pa/ gser 'gyur rtsi dang phrad pa bzhin/ /snang srid bde stong ngor
76b7(rgyud 'grel): shar bas/ /dngos por 'dzin pa kun las grol/ /snang srid spros bral ye shes che gsung ngo/ /padmo sh+ris gsungs pa/ gnyug ma lhan cig skyes pa de/ /bsam bsgom blo yis ma bcos na/ /chos sku gzhan nas btsal mi dgos/ /rang chas 
77a1(rgyud 'grel): yin no lhug par zhog gsung ngo/ /pad+ma'i rgyal mos gsungs pa/ rang rig ye shes 'di rnyed na/ /bskal pa'i mun pa sgron me bzhin/ /las kyi 'khrul pa gtan nas bcom/ /skyes bu gnyid sad ji bzhin no gsung ngo//
77a2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma dkar mos gsungs pa/ las zin skyes bu de ci sems/ /bram ze skud pa mkha' la ltos/ /nam mkha' gang gis za bar nus/ /khyod dang nga la tha dad med gsung ngo/ /lha sras dpal gzher gyis gsungs pa/ stong nyid snying rje'i snying
77a3(rgyud 'grel): po can/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i shul yin te/ /gol sa med par gsungs pas na/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan par bya/ /gsung ngo/ /rdo rje bde bas gsungs pa/ mi g.yo bsam gtan rgya chen po/ /g.yo 'gul sna tshogs kun gyi gzhi//
77a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yo dang mi g.yo dbyer med pas/ /bsgom dang mi bsgom 'di la med gsung ngo/ /ye shes zhabs kyis gsungs pa/ gang du chos rnams ma mthong ba/ /de yis chos kun mthong ba ste/ /mthong bya mthong byed kun las 'das/ /rang rig ye shes
77a5(rgyud 'grel): chen po yin gsung ngo/ /g+ha g+ha dpal gyis gsungs pa/ gang du mthong tshor myong ba kun/ /de de'i ngo bos stod shes na/ /'dod yon sems kyi rgyan yin te/ /'ching bar mi 'gyur grol bar 'gyur gsung ngo/ /las kyi 'byung gnas kyis gsungs pa/
77a6(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi ye shes gang mthong ba/ /chos kyi de nyid rtogs 'gyur te/ /chos rtogs pas ni bde ba thob gsung ngo/ /rgyan gyi rgyal mos gsungs pa/ dbyibs dang bral ba'i mdog med po/ /ming dang bral ba'i don med do/ /sna tshogs rig pa'i
77a7(rgyud 'grel): bsam med po/ /spangs pa med pa'i thob med po gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma la bcan gyis gsungs pa/ dmigs med ye shes chen po 'di/ /tshig gis mtshon par mi nus te/ /bla ma'i dus thams brten pa las/ /gzhan gyis rtogs pa ma yin no//
77b1(rgyud 'grel): gsung ngo/ /thig le dag pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba/ grub thob pho mo brgyad cu'i rtogs pa brjod pa/ mkha' 'gro mas yi ger btab ste/ gsang mdzod na gnas pa las/ dbyings kyi gtso mo rnams kyis bka' bgros nas/ rje dam pa rgya gar la gnang
77b2(rgyud 'grel): ba/ zha ma lo tsA bas legs par bsgyur ba'o// //rdzogs sho// //bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal sras mi yi seng ge yis/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi gsang tshig brtol/ /grub thob nyams gyi rtogs
77b3(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams/ /bka' rgya bkrol te gtang rgya byas/ /Arya de bas thugs kyi rtogs pa mgur du bzhengs pa/ kye 'o phung po lha yi ngo bor gnas/ /bum pa'i dbang bskur rang la rdzogs/ /sgra stong brag ca lta bur rtogs/ /gsang pa'i dbang la
77b4(rgyud 'grel): bltos mi dgos/ /nyams myong bde chen khong nas sang/ /shes rab ye shes dbang dang ldan/ /chos rnams nam mkha' lta bur rtogs/ /bzhi pa'i dbang gis don dang ldan gsung ngo/ /nA gU rdzu nas gsungs pa/ kye 'o rtsa ba bral ba'i sems nyid
77b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di/ chos rnams kun gyi rtsab yin/ /de las 'khor 'das sdong po gyes/ /bde sdug gnyis kyi lo 'dab rgyas/ /sna tshogs las kyi 'bras bu smin gsung ngo/ /mar pas gsungs pa/ kye ha sna tshogs snang la ngos bzung med/ /'di zhes mtshon pa'i
77b6(rgyud 'grel): tshig dang bral/ /mi g.yo mi sems sems chen po/ /bla dags tsam du brjod par zad/ /'di la don du bzung du med gsung ngo/ /rdo rje dril bu pas gsungs pa/ kye 'o dbang ldan pad+ma'i dbus na bde ba'i ye shes gnas/ /thabs kyi sbyor bas
77b7(rgyud 'grel): spros bral lhan cig skyes pa 'char/ /bde gshegs thugs kyi gdams pas nam mkha' i khams dang mnyam/ /'di ni gsang sngags thabs kyi gnad do ngo mtshar che gsung ngo/ /lU yi pas smras pa/ phung po'i dbus na gnyug ma'i ye shes me
78a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig po/ /srog dang rtsol bas bskyod na bde ba'i ye shes 'bar/ /bdag 'dzin sreg pa'i me 'di rlung gis sbar bar bya/ /bde chen mchog 'di nam mkha' i khams su mi shong ngo gsung ngo/ /shAn+ta de bas gsungs pa/ kye'o
78a2(rgyud 'grel): sems ni ye shes chen po ste/ /'di las gud na sangs rgyas med/ /sems kyi de nyid shes gyur na/ /'khor ba rang grol mya ngan 'das gsung ngo/ /b+hi sa pas gsungs pa/ kye 'o 'gro ba sna tshogs las kyis bcings/ /las kyi de nyid shes gyur
78a3(rgyud 'grel): na/ /bcings pa med de grol ba med/ /sgyu mkhan ri mo ji bzhin gsung ngo/ /g.yog po ljon pa can gyis gsungs pa/ kye 'o he ru ka dpal rdo rje'i sku/ /rnal 'byor ma ni las kyi yum/ /sna tshogs snang ba mchog gi zhing/ /'gro ba lha dang
78a4(rgyud 'grel): lha mo ste/ /'di ni 'khor ba'i ming yang med gsung ngo/ /a ba d+hU tI pas gsungs pa/ bshis kyi stong nyid 'o ma'i mtsho/ /thabs kyis rol pa srub ma'i shing/ /dang rtson she mas rtsel byas nas/ /sku gsum mar gyi gong bu 'grel
78a5(rgyud 'grel): gsung ngo/ /dur khrod dbang phyug gis smras pa/ mthong du med do sems kyi don/ /bsam du med do gnyug ma'i ngang/ /dgag sgrub med pa smyon pa'i lus/ /btsal du med pa gyad kyi nor gsung ngo/ /ye shes skyong gis smras pa/ kye 'o snang
78a6(rgyud 'grel): stong dbyer med lhan cig skyes/ /rig stong dbyer med lhan cig skyes/ /gnyis med ye shes lhan cig skyes/ /rgyu 'bras dbyer med lhan cig skyes/ /'di la tha dad? pas ma mthong gsung ngo/ /li la'i zhabs kyis gsungs pa/ sna tshogs
78a7(rgyud 'grel): snang ba rang gi sems/ /sems ni sems kyi rang bzhin bral/ /thig le chen po chos kyi sku/ /'di las mi spro gzhi la bzhag gsung ngo/ /nyi ma sbas pas gsungs pa/ lus la ye shes chen por gnas/ /bde ba drod kyis sbar pas bya//
78b1(rgyud 'grel): las kyi rtsi bur sreg par byed/ /bla ma'i bka' las shes par bya gsung ngo/ /sa 'dzin zhabs kyis gsungs pa/ lus kyi 'khor lo bzhi 'khor bas /srid rtsa'i sdong po gcod par byed/ /rtsa yi rgyal po spangs pa yis/ /thar pa'i srog shing
78b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzugs par byed/ /bde chen nam mkha' i pa bzhes pas/ /lhan cig skyes pa ston par byed gsung ngo/ /pa ni sas smas pa /nyi zla stong la mnan pa yis/ /las kyi phreng thag gcod par byed/ /spu gri glang la bskor ba yis/ /bya bran nam mkha' i
78b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyings su skrod/ /bya ba zin pa'i skyes bu de/ /a ma'i pang du rgyug par byed/ gsung ngo/ /phyogs kyi glang pos smras pa/ rig pa'i sgron me spar pa yis/ /log rtog mun pa rab bsal te/ /gzhan gyi sde pa kun bcom nas/ /rang
78b4(rgyud 'grel): gi mtshan nyid mtshan du med gsung ngo/ /dpa' bo dril bu'i zhabs kyis smras pa/ dga' pa'i ye shes spar ba yis/ /gnyug ma'i lhan cig skyes pa rtogs/ /'khor 'das gnyis po gzhi las grol/ /gsang sngags thabs kyis khyad
78b5(rgyud 'grel): par 'phags gsung ngo/ /li la'i bzang pos smras pa/ lkug pa'i kha dang rus sbal mig /gzhon nu ma ya bde pa'am/ /khur bar chu blugs ji bzhin du/ /mtshon du 'dug pa dangs? ma mthong gsung ngo/ /nA ga po d+his gsungs pa/ gnyis
78b6(rgyud 'grel): med spros bral nam mkha' i ngang/ /ming med ye shes bde chen po/ /bsam mer brjod pa'i mdza' las 'das/ /'gyur med chos sku ngo mtshar che/ /gsung ngo/ /tog rtse pas gsungs pa/ ltos shig nam mkha' i dkyil du ltos/ /ma mthong ba ni de
78b7(rgyud 'grel): mthong yin/ /sdod cig rgya mtsho'i gting du sdod/ /mi g.yo ba ni dgongs pa yin/ /zung cig bar snang rlung po zung/ /ngos bzung med na stong pa yin gsung ngo/ /nag po zhabs kyis gsungs pa/ lam gyi de nyid mthong goms na/ /'chi ba'i 'od
79a1(rgyud 'grel): gsal gdon mi za/ /las kyi 'phen pa nam mkha' khyer/ /dus der chos nyid ma bu phrar gsung ngo/ /b+hi na zhabs kyis smras pa /snang stong thabs dang shes rab la/ /bla ma'i ngo sprod brda yis rol/ /rig pa'i ye
79a2(rgyud 'grel): shes khong nas sad/ /bde chen ldan cig skyes pa rtogs gsung ngo/ /pad+ma'i myu gus smras pa/ sna tshogs snang ba las kyi phyag rgya ste/ /der 'dzin stong pa chos kyi phyag rgya yin/ /gnyis med dang las mi 'da' dam tshig ste /der 'dzin blo dang
79a3(rgyud 'grel): bral na phyag rgya che gsung ngo/ /mtsho skyes rdo rjes smras pa/ lte ba mkha' dbyings gru gsum du/ /rig pa'i lha mo'i skur gsal te/ /'od zer spro bsdus 'gro don byed/ /sku gsum gzhan nas btsal mi dgos gsung ngo/ /gu d+ha ri pas
79a4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa/ ye shes rdo rjes nam mkha' i mdog /sna tshogs 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul ston/ /dmigs pa med par kun la khyab/ /'du 'bral med par rang la rdzogs/ /ma rtsal lhun gyis grub pa'i don gsungs so/ /tai lo pas gsungs pa/ kye'o
79a5(rgyud 'grel): stos shag yul la ltos/ /snang ba sna tshogs rig pa'i rtsal/ /'dod yon sna tshogs sems kyi rgyan/ /bde sdug sna tshogs gnyug ma'i rtsal/ /gar yang ma phyin nam mkha' i bya/ /snang ba sna tshogs gzigs mor che gsung ngo/ /nA ro pas
79a6(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa/ spyi gtsug pad+ma'i gdan steng su/ /mtshan ldan bla ma'i spyan snga ru/ /rtsa dar dkar gyi lam la 'gro shes na/ /mtshams med lnga po byed kyang grol/ /gsang sngags thabs kyi khyad par yin gsung ngo/ /kriSh+Na pas smras pa/ rtse
79a7(rgyud 'grel): gsum gsal pa'i me long la/ /sems kyi rgyal po blta shes na/ /'khrul pa'i yul gyis mi phrogs te/ /gnyug ma'i rdzong la nges par gnas gsung ngo/ /b+ha du las smras pa /ka ra yul la bcings pa yis/ /rtog pa'i 'gyu ba gcod par byed//
79b1(rgyud 'grel): lta stangs snga phyi rjes pa yis/ /bying rgod thun skyon sel par byed/ /gnyen po'i rtsol pa bshig pa yis/ /gnyug ma rang la 'khor bar byed gsung ngo/ /Dom+bi he ru kas smras pa/ las kyi phyag rgya las byung pa'i/ /dga' bzhi'i ye shes phyag rgya che//
79b2(rgyud 'grel): snang ba zag med spros dang bral/ /gnyug ma don gyi ye shes mthong gsung ngo/ /ka na pas smras pa/ sems nyid spros dang bral pa nam mkha' i dang/ /rgya mtsho shel dang me tog bzhin/ /sang? de rjen ne sa le ba/ /dran du med cing yongs su med/ /ci
79b3(rgyud 'grel): rigs tsam du goms par 'gyis/ /gsung ngo/ /band+ha badzras smras pa/ gnyis md ye shes chen po 'di/ /bstan du yod de mtshon du med/ /goms su yod de bsgom du med/ /myong du yod de brjod du med/ gsung ngo/ /kam+ba las smras pa/ snang
79b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ngo bo stong pa'i ror/ /spong cig yul la yengs pa'i tshe/ /bde ba'i ngo bo gsal ba'i ror/ /sdor cig sems la bltas pa'i tshe/ /rtogs pa'i ngo bor nyams kyi ror/ /spor? cig chags sdang skyes pa'i tshe/ /gsung ngo/ /pradz+nyA pa las smras pa/
79b5(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs sna tshogs de de nyid/ /dgag pa med cing bsgrub pa med/ /dran pa'i rtsi dang ma bral bar/ /spang blang med par rol du gsol gsung ngo/ /dpa' bo rdo rjes smras pa/ sems kyi thig le yi ge'i dbyibs/ /rlung gis bskyod de mkha' la 'phur//
79b6(rgyud 'grel): las kyi sgo bzhi 'gags nas kyang/ /bde chen gnas su 'pho bar byed/ gsung ngo/ /shI btas smras pa/ dug sprul bsad la glang chen gtsong/ /bya ni mkha' la sbar bar bya/ /btsun mo lha sras yul phyung la/ /rgyal po bcom na nges par
79b7(rgyud 'grel): grol gsung ngo/ /gnyis med spas pas smras pa/ yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /spyi bo'i bla ma legs mchod na/ /'dod pa thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /bya ba mang pos ci zhig bya gsung ngo/ /in+d+ra bo d+his smras pa/ sna tshogs yul gyi
80a1(rgyud 'grel): snang ba 'di/ /rig pa ye shes rgyan yin pas/ /mi spang de bzhin nyid du rol/ /'ching bar mi 'gyur grol ba'i lam gsung ngo/ /ka pa tsa ris smras pa/ chu bo spu bsu chud pa bzhin/ /sna tshogs de bzhin nyid du 'dus/ /rgya
80a2(rgyud 'grel): mtsho lan tshwa'i ro bzhin du/ /du ma ro gcig bde bar 'bar/ /nags kyi me la rlung bzhin du/ /rkyen ngan sna tshogs lam gyi grogs gsung ngo/ /ku la ma ris smras pa/ gzhi ma bcos chos dbyibs pho bring du/ /lam rig pa'i ye shes
80a3(rgyud 'grel): lham me ba/ /de bde gsal stong pa'i ngang gyis rdeg/ don chos sku gnyis med kyi ngang du grol gsung ngo/ /ratna bo d+his smras pa/ ma bcos rnal ma'i shes pa de/ /mi bsgom de bzhin nyid du bzhag /bcos pa thams cad blo yin te//
80a4(rgyud 'grel): blo las grol na thar pa'i lam gsung ngo/ /pad+ma badzras smras pa/ gang gis sems kyi don mthong na/ /rtsa ba bral ba'i sdong bu bzhin/ /sna tshogs snang bas 'ching mi nus/ /sems kyi de nyid yin phyir ro/ /gsung ngo/ /ram pha
80a5(rgyud 'grel): las smras pa/ gang du rtogs pa blo yin la/ /gang du bsgoms pa rtog pa ste/ /gang du spyod kyang bcos ma nyid/ /ji ltar bsgrubs kyang 'dod pa'i lam/ /'di kun gyis pa'i rtsed mo yin/ /mkhas pa rnams la ci yang med/ gsung ngo//
80a6(rgyud 'grel): klu'i byang chub kyis smras pa/ yi ge gsum gyi sbyor ba yis/ /rlung gi de nyid shes gyur na/ /sems kyi de nyid rtogs par 'gyur/ /sems rtogs? pas ni bde ba che/ /gsung/ /karma badzras smras pa/ 'khrul pa'i rtsa ba mchog ?
80a7(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi 'khrul 'khor mi 'jig ste/ /bcos ma'i theg pa snying re rje/ /rtsa ba bral ba'i don mthong na/ /las kyi 'khrul 'khor gzhi la 'jig /gsung ngo/ /zla ba gras pas smras pa/ yod dam med pa'i mdza' spangs te//
80b1(rgyud 'grel): dbus kyi don la mi gnas par/ /bsgom du med pa'i ngang la zhog /thob du med pa'i 'bras bu 'byung gsung ngo/ /sa da pas smras pa/ lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes 'di/ /khyod kyis smos dang ji ltar yin/ /ma myong shes na myong ba'i mchog/
80b2(rgyud 'grel): mi btsal de bzhin nyid du bzhag gsung ngo/ /su ka ra sid+d+his smras pa/ gang la zhen pa'i blo de thong/ /rtog pa gnyis ni mtshungs par sgrob/ /rtog dang bral na bsgom du med/ /bsam du med pa ji ltar dran gsung ngo/ /ye shes rdo rjes smras pa/
80b3(rgyud 'grel): kun bzhi dag pa'i dbyings nas rig pa'i nyi ma shar/ /rgya mtsho nor bu'i gling nas yid bzhin nor bu lon/ /'gro ba'i ma rig ling tog shes rab thur mas phye/ /'khor pa'i chu bo bzhi las thabs ldan bla mas bsgral gsung ngo//
80b4(rgyud 'grel): mtsho skyes rdo rjes smras pa/ dpe yi ye shes mtshon du mang/ /don gyi ye shes bsgom du med/ /thabs kyi man ngag smra du med/ /bla ma'i drin lan 'khor thabs med/ /gsung ngo/ /ri tri tas gsungs pa/ mtshon gyi 'khor los
80b5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs rnams kun gyi dngos po gtsad?/ /thos pa'i 'khor los log rtog blo yi spros pa gcod/ /nyams kyi 'khor los gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa'i snang ba gcod/ /rtogs pa'i 'khor los 'khor 'das gnyis kyi re dogs gcod gsung ngo//
80b6(rgyud 'grel): grub thob lnga bcu'i rtogs pa brjod pa/ thig le 'od kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba/ mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang mdzod nas phyung ste/ rje dam pa rgya gar rin po che la gnang ba/ zha ma lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o/ /rdzogs sho// //
80b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen po rin chen brda' man ngag ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /*/ /rgya gar skad du/ mahA mu drA ratnA b+hi gI ta u pa de sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyag rgya chen po rin po che brdo'i man ngag ces bya ba/ dpal 'khor lo bde mchog la phyag 
81a1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /u rgyan tshan do'i gling du/ mkha' 'gro ma dpal gyi yon tan gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod par/ u duM ba ra'i ge sar chu 'dam las mi 'khrung/ /skyug nang can de zas kyi zhen pa bral nas 'dug /gaM gA las thar
81a2(rgyud 'grel): mi de sems ngal skam las so/ /bshes med dgras gtser ba de phyogs bzhir mgon skyabs tshol/ /sku ya'i 'bras bu 'di ni 'phel stobs rab tu che gsung ngo/ /shar phyogs bde ldan gyi phug par mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje nyi ma'i mig gis rtogs
81a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i brda brjod pa/ 'gro ba chu la gru dang rdzings kyis sgrol/ /'khor lo pa brgyan pa'i shing rta sa lam gcod/ /so btang bum pas chu nang skol ma 'jigs/ /dang po'i skas sdang yang thog steng du bskyal/ /zhun thar 'byongs pa'i dang gyis
81a4(rgyud 'grel): sha rus bcad gsung ngo/ /klu sgrubs sbyor gyi phur par/ mkha' 'gro ma gser gyi bum 'dzin mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ nam mkha' dang ni stong gsum dbyer ma byed/ /gshog gcig bya yis mkha' la 'phur ma nus/ /mgo dang sug pe lus
81a5(rgyud 'grel): po go gcig 'gyur/ /rdo yo gzugs 'dra'i khyag pa'i ngo bo chu/ /me long dang na gzugs brnyan tha dad med ces gsung ngo/ /'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan d+ha ka gnas pa'i sar/ /mkha' 'gro ma kaM ka khrag ldag mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ /chang gis
81a6(rgyud 'grel): drod par rtol bas sngar snang 'jig /'khor los sgyur rgyal bya ba gzhan mi byed/ /dbul mo gtong ngo shes tshe sngar spyod 'chor/ /gling don grub pa'i ded dpon bde bar gnas gsung ngo/ /grong khyer chen po rdo 'jog tu mkha' 'gro ma shA na glog gi gzhag pa
81a7(rgyud 'grel): can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ sna tshogs phyag rgya thal mo rang yin med/ /tshi? lus rkang mar sha rus khrag la brten/ /nyi ma'i 'od kyis skar ma'i 'od zer bcom/ /chu 'dzin nang du me shel nus pa brlag gsung ngo/ /dur khrod chen po u tsa
81b1(rgyud 'grel): sa'i? lhong/ /mkha' 'gro ma sha za dung 'bud mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ sprin lding ba la brten nas yod ma yin/ /mkha' la byung pa'i rlung ni ngo pos stong/ /brag ca'i skad 'di gzhan gyi sgra la brten/ /smyon pa'i sems ni gzugs
81b2(rgyud 'grel): gtad bral bshug? gsung ngo/ /re me ri 'bar ba'i khar mkha' 'gro ma glog gi ral pa can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ rtog bral bu chung gser bor bod ba len/ /dus la bab pa'i myu gus sa sran 'bigs/ /mtshon gyi dri mchu yis dag tshe gsal//
81b3(rgyud 'grel): bsam pas 'grub pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i lus gsung ngo/ /rgyal po'i khab seng skya'i byang du /mkha' 'gro ma'i rgya mtsho mdangs len mas tegs? pa'i brnga brjod pa/ mchil lham gyis ni rkang pa'i mi mthun skye ba/ /ri gzar sbab ni m sded drag tu
81b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phar/ /gi gA 'chu klung bar mchams med par 'brel/ /lce? spyang mig la mun pas sgrib? mi nus gsung ngo/ /rdo rje gdan gyi byang chub chen po'i rdzir/ /mkha' 'gro ma bde ldan mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ mgo gnyis spyi mas cig gis dug zos
81b5(rgyud 'grel): 'chi/ /rma can gcig gis sbal pa'i tshang rnams 'drul/ /mig skyon ma byad zla ba gnyis su snang/ /grib ma dgra ru mthong bas skyabs gnas rnyed mi 'gyur gsung ngo/ mtsho kun d+ha le dud skyong gi gnas su/ /mkha' 'gro ma rma ba'i mdongs can gyis
81b6(rgyud 'grel): stogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ /? mo nya med bya gzhan gyis mi 'tshe/ /dug ga nus pa sngags kyis zin dus stong/ /rma bya sman por 'jol sgeg rang la blta/ /mgo bcad ta la'i shul der myu gu stongs gsung ngo/ /byang chub shing gi rtsar mkha' 'gro ma
81b7(rgyud 'grel): dga' ldan gser gyi 'od can mos rtogs pa'i brnga brjod pa/ tol mar nang nas bton pa'i so ras me yi rgyu/ /sgyu ma'i bu yis rgyal po'i gdung me sabs/ /ri dags lte ba'i dri ni rgyu nyid dra/ /mdza' bos bsdus? che grogs la yid ches stor
82a1(rgyud 'grel): gsung ngo/ /phyag rgya chen po brda'i man dag las/ /rgyan rnam par bkod pa'i dum bu/ /mkha' 'gro ma mdangs ldan gser gyi ral pa can gyis bsdus so/ /dpal ldan gru 'dzin gyi ri bo la/ mkha' 'gro ma 'khor lo
82a2(rgyud 'grel): gdong gis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ drang srong gdan du ku sha bzang bas rtswa gzhan spang/ /zhing pa sa bon nam zin dus su sems ngal so/ /rlung gis ma bskyod mar me rang khang gsal/ /yid gcugs bu dang bral na gzhan mi dran gsung ngo/
82a3(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan nor bu'i gling du/ mkha' 'gro ma nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ /skye bo blo chung don de rang gi sa/ /dam dum bcings pa'i khong 'khril grol na bde/ /dngul dkar me long 'phrul gyi gdan la 'phyi/ /'phong gi slob?
82a4(rgyud 'grel): dpon gam nas rgyad du bsring gsung ngo/ /lho phyogs a su ra'i phug par/ /mkha' 'gro ma nor bu'i spyan ldan mas rtogs pa'i brnga brjod pa/ khar gzhong nang gi rus sbal nyi ma'i 'od la dga' / /gser la byas pa'i rgyan ni gser nyid
82a5(rgyud 'grel): yin/ 'ben la mnga' brdeg dpag chen gzhan mi dran/ /bu dam gzugs rnams ro la tha mi dad gsung ngo/ /nags tshal dra ba can gyi mthongs su mkha' 'gro ma ba ti ro zan mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ chu shel zla ba yang ngo cig la 'phel
82a6(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la 'ja' yi kha dog ngo bos dben/ /gzhon nu'i bded sus kyang brjod ma shes/ /til mar gyis slung ral gris bcang tshad 'gyel/ /grong khyer ser skya'i ljongs su mkha' 'gro ma bur sna khyung gshog can gyis rtogs pa'i brda
82a7(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa/ khur bar chu blugs khor gi gtam rnams 'gags/ /sgyu ma'i ltad mo yang dag ma yin no/ /dbul mo gter dang phrang che sngar rtog bral/ /lan tshwa'i rdog po chu bo nyid la thim gsung ngo/ /dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal du mkha' 'gro ma nyi ma'i
82b1(rgyud 'grel): phreng bas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ wa yi skad la seng ge sdang skrag skyes/ /btsun mo rin chen bran mo la mi 'jigs/ /dgra ru bu langs mdza' bo su la bya/ /lkug ma'i rmi lam khar mi 'don par 'dug gsung ngo/ /lho phyogs dpal gyi ri la
82b2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma gtsug na mu tig 'chang gis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ /bag ma dang ni smyon pa'i spyod pa 'jol/ /rgya mtshoi chu la nya ni rang byon tshud/ /rgya skyegs ri lame shor rlung rnams grogs/ /chu rkyan 'babs na ni ro gcig
82b3(rgyud 'grel): go gsung ngo/ /ma kA d+ha rgyal po'i khab du mkha' 'gro ma bdud rtsi bum 'dzin mas rtogs pa'i brdo brjod pa/ lce sbyad ro la chags pa'i blo na skye mi 'gyur/ /dgos pa'i dus las khra yi rtsal ni gzhan du min/ /wa yi 'gro 'dug dur khrod nad
82b4(rgyud 'grel): du gzhol ba yin/ /bu chung dang ni me long seng ge ltos/ /gsung ngo/ /shar phyogs 'bri ka la shi la'i gtsug lag du /mkha' 'gro mtshe ldan rgyan mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ chu tshad dus su lag ko ras zin//nyi ma'i snying po mun
82b5(rgyud 'grel): pas gos ma yin/ /lag pa chad pa'i bzo mkhan bya ba gdug /dkar nag yi ges mkha' la gos pa min gsung ngo/ /klu gtsug na rin chen gyi yul du/ /mkha' 'gro ma seng ge'i gdong can mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ sgo nga mkha' la
82b6(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa'i chang yang de nyid do/ /khug rta'i sgum bus la rnams kyang min/ /nam mkha' i kha dog ma 'gags rnam par dag /nu bun sa la langs nas mkha' la thim gsung ngo/ /shing 'dzam bu brik+Sha'i grib ma la mkha' 'gro ma 'byung gnas rin chen mas rtogs
82b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i brnga brjod pa/ chu bo sna tshogs rgya mtshor tha dad min/ /ma dros chu ni gting nas g.yo 'bul bral/ /chu dang zla ba'i rang bzhin so sor steng ngo/ /rlan dang rba rlabs rgya mtsho las ma 'das/ gsung ngo/ /phyag rgya rin po che brnga'i man dag las/
83a1(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer dra ba'i dum bu mkha' 'gro ma dpal ldan dbang gi rgyal mos bsdus pa ste gnyis pa'o// //bde ldan rin chen gling du mkha' 'gro ma zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ rmu rgod
83a2(rgyud 'grel): dul ba'i spyod pa gzhan pas g.yung/ /'bru yi chang rgod bram ze'i btung ba min/ /lcags kyus zin pa'i glang po rang dbang med/ /g.ya' ma phyis pa'i me las bzhin mi 'dod/ /rgyud med gzhu la su yis mda' srid nas gsung ngo/ /thad bzang
83a3(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi bya skyibs can du/ /mkha' 'gro ma rgya mtsho mig gis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ tshol zangs nang du sbrang rtsi'i g.yos mi bya/ /smin pa'i sa bon ser dang ldan la gdag /bud med snol 'tshang khyod la smra mi phod/ /rdzas ma tshogs pa'i
83a4(rgyud 'grel): srub mas me mi thon/ /til sbyang zhabs med nang du til mi ldugs gsung ngo/ /nub phyogs pA kA'i tshal du mkha' 'gro ma bi za gzugs 'phrog mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ /dug sprul mar blo ldan skye bo 'dzur/ /rin chen gling 'dod deng
83a5(rgyud 'grel): dpon gzhan gyis min/ /da 'og sman pa la snyan nad pa rang bzo spang/ /lo stong mun pa sgron me gzhon nus sel/ /mkhas pa'i dus spal tshed ma'i khrod rnams spong/ /gsung ngo/ /grong khyer skyid pa'i 'byung gnas su mkha' 'gro ma kI rti thog
83a6(rgyud 'grel): mdza' can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ stobs ldan kyang spyod 'phye bos byar mi rung/ /chu dran rnams ni rgya mtsho'i nang du 'bab/ rdon pa gling bu ri dags ngos der 'bung/ /me shel 'od ni ras kyi bal la tsha/ /zangs kyi mdog ni gser
83a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur rtsi yis 'gyur/ /gsung ngo/ /dur khrod so sa'i gling du mkha' 'gro ma bde ba'i 'od can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ /zlum ril me tog ljon shing grib las skyes/ khab len rdo yis lcags rnams dbang du sdud/ /tshod pa rang gi rigs
83b1(rgyud 'grel): la 'jug par 'gyur/ /spre'u'i rten ni 'bras bu can gyi nags/ /gru btsas len pa rgya mtsho sgrol la brtson gsung ngo/ /shing tsi tra ba la'i grib ma la mkha' 'gro ma blo gros gser gyi gdub can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ /chu mthong rus
83b2(rgyud 'grel): spal skam la bdod mi rigs/ /dug mnga' rmil le lo byas pas 'phung/ /phag gis gtsang tsog med par kha ru bcug /dur khrod nang du lce spyad rol brel/ /ri yi sul la seng ge 'jigs pa med gsung ngo/ /rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
83b3(rgyud 'grel): du mkha' 'grom bde ba bzang mos rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ bung ba rtsi 'jib utpal mdog mi nyams/ /char ni rdo sol mi yi grogs yin no/ /mun pa'i dmag rum nyi zla'i 'od kyis sel/ /'bru rnams skye ba tsha sgo med pa'i zhing/ /'khor lo med pa'i
83b4(rgyud 'grel): shing rtas 'gro ma shes/ gsung ngo/ /phyag rgya chen po brda'i man ngag las/ ye shes rnam par gzigs pa'i dum bu/ mkha' 'gro ma su ka pha las bsdus pa ste gsum pa'o// //ri bo bya rkang gi steng du mkha' 'gro ma
83b5(rgyud 'grel): bum pa'i lto can byis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ rigs ngan bu mo rgyal po'i khab du min/ /sprang ma ga bur la 'byol ngan skyugs dri la 'du/ /bram ze gso sbyong dus su bya gzhan dor/ sgeg mo rgyan gyis spras tshe rab tu dga' / /
83b6(rgyud 'grel): tsan dan dri la lto 'gro mchog tu gdung gsung/ /rgyal po'i khab yangs pa can du mkha' 'gro ma gtsug na nor bus rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ mi gtsang lud ni 'bras kyi zhing la phan/ nad gzir skyes bu g.yo med sman pa bsten/ /rigs ldan
83b7(rgyud 'grel): ded dpon 'khor la bu bzhin brtse/ /chu phran gling la nor bu yod ma yin/ /sbrang ma rtsi yi nus pa grogs kyis 'gyur/ gsung/ /d+harma g+ha na ra dza chos kyi mdzod du mkha' 'gro ma 'bar ma dpal gyi phreng mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ 'dzam bu'i gser
84a1(rgyud 'grel): la 'gar bas 'dod dgu bsgyur/ /phye le ba nya dang bung ba lcags kyus phung/ /gso bya'i dus der nad pas le lo spang/ /ma yis bu la brtse ba'i sems mi gtong/ /rin chen gling du khrid pa'i ded dpon nam nyes par bya gsung ngo/
84a2(rgyud 'grel): klu'i rgyal po e na la'i gnas su mkha' 'gro ma khyung gi gdod pa can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ dug sbrul che ba gdags pa'i rgyan ma yin/ /bde dang bral ba btson rar chung pa'i mi/ /ha la'i me tog 'char ba'i dor ma 'thu/ /bang
84a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzod rku ba'i mi de bag yod ldan/ /btud pas gdungs pa'i mi de smig rgyu snyug? gsung/ /phyag rgya rin po che brda'i man ngag las/ sems rnam par dag pa'i dum bu/ /mkha' 'gro ma khyung gdong mas bsdus pa ste bzhi pa'o// //
84a4(rgyud 'grel): bya rgod phung po ra ri la mkha' 'gro ma gser bya rgyal mos rtogs pa'i brnga' brjod pa/ /'dam gyi skyong gis pad+ma la mi gos/ /gshog ru rgyas tshe bye phrug tshad nas 'phur/ /tsan dan mthong ba'i sprul gyis le lo bor/ /'dod pa'i gnas
84a5(rgyud 'grel): der zo chu chu rgyun bsring/ /? chim mas zin pas nya yi bde ba stor gsung/ /'gyur po'i grong khyer bi ma la kar mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje 'dam skyes mas rtogs pa'i rda brjod pa /zhing la chu lud rim gyis bsten/ /pha laM gyis ni mi phigS
84a6(rgyud 'grel): med/ 'byor lam reg utpal 'dab/ /rgya mtsho'i chul rigs phyed med/ /mun pas ma zin nyi ma'i 'od gsung/ shar phyogs zangs kyi dung rgyad kyi nang du/ /mkha' 'gro ma dpal ldan 'jigs med mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/
84a7(rgyud 'grel): nags la brten bca' drang srong rgyab du shing la gon/ /gangs la gnas pa yi seng ge yang bral nas 'dug /khyung phrug gshog ru rgyas tshe rten med mkha' la lding/ /sa 'dzin myu gus 'bras bu rang chas 'grub/ /gdol pa'i bu de 'tshod yang rang
84b1(rgyud 'grel): mthong zhig gsung/ shar phyogs ka ma ru 'phags pa rang 'byung gi mar? mkha' 'gro ma 'khor lo shugs 'chang mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ bram ze'i skud pa thog mar bsgrims nas glod/ /gso ras mkhan mos zla ba bcings nas
84b2(rgyud 'grel): glong/ zhun la bab pa'i gser mkhar yangs dang bral/ /gdan gyi steng du rgyal pos bag gzhi phab/ /dmus long mig phye snang ba gzigs mor tshe gsung ngo/ /mchod rten dpal dbyangs kyi rtsar mkha' 'gro ma gtum mo gser mig mas
84b3(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ rmi lam sdug bsngal sad pa'i dus der dag /mang po'i khrod der mi ngo shes pa nyung/ /rgyu yis ma skyes nam mkha' gdod nas dag /til mar ngar btags dar gyung snum gyis 'phyi/ /mda' ru ltor bros
84b4(rgyud 'grel): sa bzhag ser du mthong gsung/ /byang phyogs 'dam bu'i khrod du bde ldan 'od kyi gnas su/ /mkha' 'gro ma nyi ma'i gshog pa can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ bram ze'i rig byed gsang tshig bu la ston/ /rgyal po'i pho brang rigs
84b5(rgyud 'grel): ngan gyis na mthong/ /srang ga'i kham por bya ba zin nas 'dug /dug gsum dag na dmus lang bris mkhan med/ /nor bu'i brtag pa blun pos shes pa min gsung ngo/ /rdzing bu pad+ma'i mdangs can gyi 'gram du mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje bu snyems mas rtogs
84b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i brda brjod pa /ra med gser la rtog pas bzo mi nus/ /rin chen gling na gram gseg gyo dum med/ /dus kyi rkyen gyis pad+ma rgyas par 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i lus na ma bkrus dri ma dag gsung ngo/ /da ni ko sha'i gling du mkha' 'gro ma
84b7(rgyud 'grel): rin chen thod 'dzin? mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ dgra med mi la su skyel bya mi dgos/ /ka la bka' i gshog ru sgo dar rgyas/ /pad+ma'i kha ni nyi ma'i zer gyis 'byed/ /chu dang rlan ni gnyis su mi nang ngo gsung ngo/ /seng g+ha la'i cha la du mkha' 
85a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma nyi ma'i zhags pa can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ rmi lam ltad mo su yis byas pa yin/ /bram chab med pa'i phu mo brjed ngas che/ /skyed bsrungs la brtson 'bras bu mi len blun/ /nam mkha' i
85a2(rgyud 'grel): tshu ni smin pa'i dgun 'brum 'bar gsung/ dur khrod chen po sgra sgrogs su mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje dung can mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ lha khang nang du dmus lod ltad mo nub/ /ji srid shing yod bar du de srid me/ /sos ka'o? chab rom
85a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhi la sdod mi srid/ /sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'phrul la rtog pa bral/ /ni dbu'i yon tan sus kyang byin pa med/ /bskal pa ma zhig nyi zla'i 'od mi 'gag /khod sran ma byang gyad la rgyu rtsal med/ /rgya mtshod pa'i chu thigs skam mi 'gyur gsung
85a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal sh+rI na len+d+ra'i gtsug lag khang du mkha' 'gro ma rin chen 'od gsal mas rtogs pa'i brnga brjod pa/ smyon pa'i mig gis nya dang stong mi mthong/ /rlan med sbyin la 'byar pa'i nus pa med/ /skyes bu med pa'i lcags kyus glang mi
85a5(rgyud 'grel): zin/ /thod le kor phyis nam mkha' mtshon mi nus gsung ngo/ /phyag rgya chen po brda'i man ngag las/ dpal gyi thugs rnam par bkod pa'i dum bu/ mkha' 'gro ma rin chen gcig mas bsdus pa ste/ lnga ba'o// //
85a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho gser gyi gling du mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje bu gcig mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ shing rta dang ni 'khor lo 'bral mi bya/ /dug sprul dgra ru sgo nga ldan par 'gyur/ /'jam bu chu bo'i gser ni dngul gyis sdang/ /glang po dul tshe snying la yi
85a7(rgyud 'grel): ge 'jug gsung/ /nub phyogs bi ra'i tshal du mkha' 'gro ma sha za dpal 'dzin mas rtogs pa'i brnga brjod pa/ ge sar steng du 'dab ma gdan du gding/ /thar pa 'dod pas bya ba 'jug mig la blta/ /stobs dang ldan pas gser 'gyur rtsi
85b1(rgyud 'grel): mchog ni/ /dzwi ring banda'i drin las rab tu rnyed gsung ngo/ /dur khrod rab dga' i nang du mkha' 'gro ma nor bu'i 'od can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ grang ba'i nad la ga bur bsten mi bya/ /tshangs pa'i yi ge smra ru ma gtub po/ /gi paM zad pa'i glang
85b2(rgyud 'grel): po sgra? ?/ /dngul chu'i nus pa lha dbang mig la phan gsung/ /shar phyogs kha sarba paNi'i gtsug lag khang du/ mkha' 'gro ma bu ta ngo zan mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ sprul sngags shes pa'i nad la dug mi tshugs/ /'chi ba'i dus der
85b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal srid ci zhig bya/ /sna khrid med pa'i long pa gang du 'gro /phag gis glang po mtshon te ma mtshon gsung ngo/ /dur khrod ma hA kA la'i dbus su/ mkha' 'gro ma dpal gyi phreng ba can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ rmi lam ltad mo rang gi
85b4(rgyud 'grel): sems la byas/ /me ni spra pa dag la rab tu 'bar/ /yi ge gcig gis rig byed kun la 'jug /rig byed kun gyis yi ge gcig ma shes gsung ngo/ /bA ra Na sir mkha' 'gro ma dpal ldan dung 'bud mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ sngo
85b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dang ni gser 'gyur rtsi mi 'dra/ /nya rgyas zla bas shel la chu rgyun 'dzag /spu ba'i chu rgyun rgya mtshor rang la thim/ /mkhas pa ba lang skyong ba drag shul 'dir gsung ngo/ /chu mig mnga' chu khron pa skyes pa'i rtsar mkha' 'gro ma 'bar ma gser dril
85b6(rgyud 'grel): can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ ri brag pas mdza' dben pa'i gnas ma yin/ /rgyal po pho brang tshong 'dus rab tu 'gol/ /byed na me long rgyab du blta mi bya/ /snab che byi ba'i yi ge snying gis klag gsung ngo/ /glang po ljongs kyi grong khyer du
85b7(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma khrag sna rgyal mos rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ nam mkha' i yid can mkha' las 'phags ma nus/ /drang srong rgyal mtshan thar pa'i lam ma yin/ dkyil 'khor gyis kyang mya ngan las mi 'da' / /'bras bu mchog ni smyon pa'i sems las
86a1(rgyud 'grel): btsal gsung ngo/ /byang phyogs sman gyi na gsu mkha' 'gro ma gtsug na rgyan grol mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ phag rgod mgo bo rdog pas mnan pa'i mi/ /skyes bu de yis gdams ngag thams cad bstan//
86a2(rgyud 'grel): ded dpon bu yis nam mkha' i yi ge klags/ /grogs dag 'di yi zhabs la 'dud par rigs gsung/ dpal 'bras spungs su mkha' 'gro ma dpal ldan gru 'dzin mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ /rdza yi 'khor lo srub thag ma then par/ /
86a3(rgyud 'grel): nor bu rin chen 'di la mchod par bya/ /glang po smon pa 'tshong pa'i mi de mkhas/ /gter mthong nas ni 'byol bar mai bya'o gsung/ /mchod rten rnam dag gi rtsar/ /dpal rang byung gi rgyal mos rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ /kye 'o bu rnams
86a4(rgyud 'grel): seng ge'i 'o ma 'thung/ /phan pa'i sman mar phyi ru ma skyug cig /snying gi dbus su nyi ma shar nas su/ /mun pa'i tshogs rnams rab tu 'joms par 'gyur gsung ngo/ /phyag rgya chen po brda'i man dag las/ /las rnam par grol ba'i
86a5(rgyud 'grel): dum bu /mkha' 'gro ma dpal ldan pad+ma'i spyan gyis bsdus pa ste/ dum bu drug pa'o// //le phran lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa/ /phyag rgya chen po rin po che brda'i man ngag /rje dam pa la mkha' 'gro mis gtad de/
86a6(rgyud 'grel): zha ma lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o/ /rdzogs ho// shub+haM //rgya gar skad du/ DA ki ni badzra gu hya gI ti nA ma/ bod skad du/ mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gsang ba'i glu zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal lha mo bdag med ma la
86a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /u dum+ba ra'i utpal rgyun du 'khrungs pa dkon/ /g.yul ngo mi ldogs gyang kyi dgos pa stor/ /nor bu'i gling nas stong 'dab byed nus sam/ /'khor lo'i rtsibs la zhon pa'i skyes bu brel/ /chu bo chen po'i rgyun
86b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di bcad mi nus/ /lcags kyi pha bong gyen la 'dril bar dka' / /nyi zla'i 'khor lo rlung gis bzlog mi nus/ /mig ser nad kyis btab na dud yang ser/ /byang blta'i phug par nyi zla'i 'od mi 'char/ /skyes bu rang srog dor ba'i dpa' bo
86b2(rgyud 'grel): blun/ /dug 'di srog gi bdud yin mngar yang dor/ /rba la 'byol ba'i mnyen ba bya bta' bskyed/ /nad la phan pa'i sman ni kha yang bza' / /puN+Da? ri ka'i sa bon ma mthod ngam/ /lha sras bzod pa chen kun gyis 'khur/ /tshod dus 'gron
86b3(rgyud 'grel): po 'brel med tshogs kyi 'gyes/ /sbrang ma rtsi bcud mang bas sdug bsngal bskyed/ /? nam mkha' lan byed pa'i skyes bu blun/ /sgyu ma'i yul la mkhan po chags mi skye/ /brag cha'i sgra 'di stong smrar? smra mi byed/ /rmi lam bde sdug
86b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni sang pas stong/ /phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgun las/ brul tsho dang po'o?// //ya ma mthong ba'i bu chung gzhan la yid mi 'chor/ /skyes bu skrom gyis gdung pa kha zas gzhan mi 'dod/ /mkha' la 'brug sgra bsgrags
86b5(rgyud 'grel): pas dus kyi yid ches byas/ /khyim bdag khe mthong las la ngal pa med/ /nad kyis nyen pa'i mi ni dpyad la dga' / /ded dpon nor bu 'dod phyir rtsol ba byed/ /nye zho med pa'i tshang tshol khug rta sgrim/ /drang srong rigs ldan ya nga'i kha zas spong/ /dor
86b6(rgyud 'grel): sdebs mthun pa'i glang po rol du bde/ /dge slong gzhon nu'i bsam pa dran gyis la/ /til dang ldan pa'i gri thogs kun tu rgyu /mar me'i 'od la btsal thabs legs su gyis/ /gdan ser bton pa'i rgyal bu 'di la ltos/ /bung bas rtsi bcung ma las
86b7(rgyud 'grel): ro gcig bsdud/ /gyad ni dpung bzhir bcas te dgra dpung 'joms/ /rgol pa'i mi ldog stobs ldan ci'i phyir/ /gsang tshig mi sgrub blun po gros mi dbang/ /bka' bzhin mi bsgrub rgyal pos gshed ma spong/ /srog gol dgra la bzod par mi rung bsre/
87a1(rgyud 'grel): rig byed mkhan po'i rgyud ni shi yang slob/ /khrims la gnas pa'i rgyal po sems rgya bskyed/ /phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las/ brul tsho gnyis pa'o// //yid bzhin nor bu khur du
87a2(rgyud 'grel): khur nas kyang/ /stobs dang ldan pa'i glang po zhon byas te/ /bdud rtsi gangs kyi zhun ma btung bar ba/ /chu bo sgrol ba'i gru la zag lhan gdab/ /sgo lnga mdangs dang ldan pa'i gzugs brnyan ltos/ /srog dang bral ba'i skyes bu de ci sems//
87a3(rgyud 'grel): mkhan bzos ma byas bse du'i gzugs la blta/ /btso bsreg ma byas sa bon myu gu'i rgyu/ /bram ze skud pa mkhal ba'i drung du sdong/ /na bun 'thibs so 'di ni rlung gis gtor/ /glang chen smon pa 'di ni lcags su gzhug /bud bas me tog
87a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsi thob phyir mi blta/ /mkha' la 'ja' tshon skyon bral rang sar yal/ /'grul pos chu sgrol gru yi gces 'dzin zhig /mthong byed mig dang bral bas yul rnams 'gags/ /rgyal po'i bka' la brnyas mchad pa'i gnas/ /mthon
87a5(rgyud 'grel): po'i rtse ni lhung ba'i gnas yin gtsobs?/ /'dab gshog ya 'gal gyis ni 'phur mi nus/ /nam mkha' i cho 'phrul skye 'gro'i dpal du shar/ /mkha' las char rgyun bab pas rtsi thog 'khrungs/ /deng dpon rgan po'i gling don gzhan gyi phyed//
87a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las/ brul tsho gsum pa'o// //sdig mas tshig tu smras pa med/ /chu shel zla ba su yis byas/ /nam mkha' i cho 'phrul sna tshogs ngo mtshar che/ /nam mkha' i dbyibs dang kha dog su yis mthong/ /
87a7(rgyud 'grel): par snang dangs pa'i nus pa gang gi mthu/ /na bun 'di la ngos bzung 'dug gam ci/ /rna dbang sgra la zin pa'i ri dags blun/ /dbang po yul gyis non pa'i ri dags ltos/ /gnyen po 'phrig dang ldan pa'i sha ba ltos/ /chu yi zla ba ma rgul gzhag
87b1(rgyud 'grel): na drungs/ /til gyi mar me gsal mdangs ngar dang ldan/ /rmi lam bde ba'i mnyams ni sad pas stong/ /rgyal pos sa srungs ral gris rgol ba 'joms/ /khro bo'i gzugs brnyan 'di yis byis pa bsdigs/ /gnam lcags thog gi shugs
87b2(rgyud 'grel): la sra snyi med/ /chu yi zla ba 'di la yid mi gtang/ /'ja' tshon ngo bos stong pas spang blang med/ /na bun mkha' la yal pa'i byung sa ltos/ /dngos med mun pa khyab pa'i nam mkha' las/ /sna tshogs mdangs dang ldan pa'i lho sprin 'thibs//
87b3(rgyud 'grel): char rgyun du mas 'gro ba'i lo tog rgyas/ /phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las/ /brul tsho bzhi pa'o// //myu gu mgo rtsa gnyis su gyes kyang gcig gi stobs/ /chu nang zla ba cha med nam mkha' i cho 'phrul yin/ /ga bur
87b4(rgyud 'grel): nus pa 'di yis sman dug byas pa med/ /chab rom snang yang chu las gung na grub pa med/ /na bun 'di yi rang bzhin cha med gzung bas stong/ /me long nang du gzugs med rkyen shar snang ba tsam/ /mog sham bu yi pha ma khyod kyis mthong
87b5(rgyud 'grel): dam ci/ /skad cig 'di la dus gsum khong nas dag pa yin/ /li tsa byi yis smras pa khyod kyis ji ltar go /a lu ngo shes byis pa de dus brid du med/ /'a rtsi ba la'i mtshang rtogs nas ni 'jigs mi dgos/ /nor bu lag du lon pa'i
87b6(rgyud 'grel): deng dpon dbul dang bral/ /shel gyi rang bzhin mi 'gyur tshon gyis bcos su med/ /nam mkha' ma grub phyir na sprin gyis gang la sgrib/ /gser la gzugs brnyan du ma byas kyang gser nyid yin/ /grib ma gzugs las byung bar shes pas
87b7(rgyud 'grel): ? blang med/ /drang srong rnams kyi rig pas sman dug dbyer ma phyed/ /dbul mo gter dang phrad tshe bcol ba'i las mi byed/ /nam mkha' nam mkha' bstan pas nam mkha' phyi nang 'dres/ /spang blang med pa'i nam mkha' la ni 'byung bzhi shar//
88a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bzhi'i rtsal du 'gro ba gso bskyed byas/ /phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las/ /la bzla ba'i brul cho ste lnga pa'o// //zhing pa brtson 'grus ldan pa la/ /lus ngag
88a2(rgyud 'grel): las la dug pa med/ /mtshan dpes brgyan pa 'khor los sgyur/ /gdan sar gdon pa'i bya ba gces/ /lha yi bu mo yid 'ong ma/ /sgyu ma cim du brtse bar bya/ /mdud rtse lta? la dang blud de/ /nam mkha' i dbug par bya//
88a3(rgyud 'grel): them skas gdang bu bzhi la dbab/ /gzhin dus byis pa zas kyis skol/ /gangs kyi thogs pa mi spo bar/ /dpyad thag 'dren po'i thag pa bzung/ /rlung gis mkha' la spar nas kyang/ /chu gram yur ba bzung por bya/
88a4(rgyud 'grel): chab rom smin pa rdo ye mi/ /skye dang 'chi bas bslu mi shes/ /des ni mchog gi nor bu'i gter/ /rma bya'i zas ni btsan dug nyid/ /me yis tshig la mo nyid sman/ /'dod can rnams kyi don du ni/ /thabs kyi khyad par gzhan
88a5(rgyud 'grel): las 'phags/ /phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las/ rtsa ba'i de nyid bstan pa ste/ brul? tshe drug pa'o// //rnam par shes par mkha' i gzugs/ /srid dang zhi ba'i byed pas so/ /srid pas gzugs su bzung bas
88a6(rgyud 'grel): 'ching/ /zhibs der 'dzin spros dang bral/ /srid pas dbus su bcug pa yis/ /lhan cig skyes pa 'dzin par byed/ /rtsa gsum 'khor lo bzhi sogs kyi/ /lus rnams kun la khyab par gnas/ /'gyur dang 'jug dang gnas
88a7(rgyud 'grel): dang gsum/ /yi ge gsum gyi sbyor ba yis/ /dgu brgya bcu gcig grangs them nas/ /rtog pa rlung gis za bar byed/ /mi rtog lnga po shar ba yis/ /las kyi rmad rdo lnga po btsam/ /'od gsal ba yi don mthong nas/ /bar do'i grong khyer/
88b1(rgyud 'grel): 'joms par byed/ /phyag rgya chen pa brda'i mgur las/ rlung gi de nyid bshad pa ste/ brul tsho bdun pa'o// //phyag rgya chen po brda'i man ngag las/ /mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gsang ba'i mgur/ /brul tsho bdun du bstan
88b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// //mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang mdzod na gnas pa las/ /dbyings kyi gtso mo rnams kyis bka' bgros nas/ /ka ma la shI la la gtad/ zha ma lo tsA ba ston pa seng ge rgyal pos bsgyur ba'o// rdzogs ho// //
88b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mkha' 'gro byin brlabs rtogs pa'i brda/ /til ni sgron mes gsal bar byed/ /sngags kyis btab pa'i sman bzhin du/ /rma bya'i zas ni gzhan gyis min/ /tsan dan ri dags lte ba'i dri/ /chu yi rlabs
88b4(rgyud 'grel): ni rgya mtsho nyid/ /gsal ba'i rang bzhin ras dkar 'dra/ /ri bo bskyod par mi nus pas/ /gangs ri chu las gzhan me de/ /dri dang skrog skya tha dang min/ /nyi zla'i yon tan gsal ba yin/ /bya yi rjes ni tshol byed/ /nam mkha' rtog
88b5(rgyud 'grel): ge'i spyod yul min/ /maN+Dal phyogs cha rab? tu snyoms/ /ro langs bya sar dkon de bzhin/ /dpe med ngo mtshar nor bu shel/ /zhes rngon pa chen po sa ra has/ ka ma la shI la la lta ba'i brda bstan pa'o// //
88b6(rgyud 'grel): dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mkha' 'gros byin brlabs bsgom pa'i brda/ /tshang tshid nags kyi dur khrod du/ /bdag med ma dang phrad byas la/ /nyi shar pa yi bsam pa yis/ /las drin pa yi skyes bu bzhin/ /skye bo'i nor bu mchod
88b7(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang/ /khang pa stong pa'i khyi bzhin du/ /sman pa'i don stong nam mkhar khyed/ /chu po chen po rgyun 'bab bzhin/ / drang srong ku sha'i stong du bzhal /mar me rlung dang bral ba bzhin/ /dngul dkar me long phyi bar bya/ /yid 'ong bral ba'i ma 
89a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du/ /rus sbal 'khar gzhod nyi ma la/ /rtsal ldan 'phod sleb brtson pa ste/ /mda' mkhan yid ni gcig tu gtong/ /gdams pa'i gtsor ni nges par grol/ /gser las byas pa'i rgyan bzhin du/ /bu ram
89a2(rgyud 'grel): rol myang bar bya/ zhes rngon pa chen pos/ ka ma la shI la la bsgom pa'i brda bstan pa'o// //dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mkha' 'gro byin brlabs sbyod pa'i brda/ /bag ma 'am skyon pa'i tshul bzung ste/ /glang po btsongs
89a3(rgyud 'grel): la phag rgod bsang/ /nya ni rgya mtshor yangs pa che/ /nags rnams me yis rab tu bsreg /res 'ga' mgyogs pa'i rta la zhon/ /gri gug rnon po'i mtshon gyis ni/ /lce spyad dur khrod rnam par rol/ /spyan gzigs zas la rtag tu spyad/ /
89a4(rgyud 'grel): khra yi rtsal ni nges par drag /wa ni dur khrod rnam par rol/ /chang 'thungs pa yis yul mthong 'dra/ /me tog sgyu ma bud ba ste /bu chung se ge me long 'dra/ /stag ni 'jigs pa med par rgyu/ /sgron me rtag tu thogs byas te/ /glang po zhon la kun tu rgyug/
89a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes rngon pa chen pos / ka ma la shI la la spyod pa'i brda bstan pa'o// //dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mkha' 'gro byin brlabs 'bras bu'i brda/ /gser padmo'i dkyil nas 'khrungs/ /shel gyi 'od zer nang nas bshad/ /rma bya'i ri mo su yis
89a6(rgyud 'grel): bris/ /'ja' tshon nam mkha' i cho 'phrul yin/ /rtog med re ba nor bu bskad/ /'dab gshog med par 'phur mi nus/ /gtsug stan me ni rtsol bas 'byin/ /shing ni rang gis rang la bsreg /gser gyi kha dog 'tshur gyis 'don/ /dgra med mi ni
89a7(rgyud 'grel): zon dang bral/ /gnyid sang skyes bu de ci sems/ /byis pa a lus 'brid pa ltos/ /nam mkha' nam mkha' nam mkha' i dang/ /chu bran rgya mtsho'i dbyings su 'dres/ /nam mkha' i cho 'phrul ngo mtshar che/ /chu zla du ma yod ma yin/ zhes rngon pa bas/ ka ma shI la
89b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu'i brda bstan pa'o// //dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mkha' 'gros byin brlabs yam gyi brda/ /sdom ni tshad las mi 'da' bar/ /ri bong 'di yi spyod 'gros ltos/ /khra yi rtsal yangs pa med/ /rtag tu 'khor lo'i rtse la
89b2(rgyud 'grel): zhon/ /rdza mkhan bu la yangs pa med/ /ral gri til ngar ldan pa gces/ /me la rlung gis bskyod pa yis/ /tshang tshing nags kyi dur khrod bsreg /bram ze skud pa 'khal la ltos/ /bya ba zin pa'i skyes bu mchog /snying phyud de ni mi ro yin/ /mar
89b3(rgyud 'grel): me rlung gis ma bskyod par/ /'khor lo'i srub thag bcad par bya/ /sprin med mkha' la nyi shar bzhin/ /lho sprin rlung gis brda bar bya/ /'ja' tshon 'di yis byis pa bslus/ /so mtshams mkhar gyi bdag po ltos/ /rin chen gter gyi me la/
89b4(rgyud 'grel): tshe gyis/ /nam mkhas nam mkha' 'grol bar nges/ /zhes sngon pa chen pos ka ma la shI la lam gyi brda bstan pa'o// //dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mkha' 'gros byin brlabs nyams kyi brda/ /dkar po'i zla ba rim pa ste/ /'ja'
89b5(rgyud 'grel): tshon nam mkha' nyid la mdzes/ /gzhon nus smras pa ci ste go /chus bkang nas ni smrar mi btub/ /khug rna dang pa'i rnam pa bzhin/ /dbul mo gter ldan ngo mtshar che/ /lan tshwa chu bo nyid la thim/ /bya ni mkha' las 'da' mi nus/ /dgras bslus
