89b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyen la'ang yid mi gtong/ /ral gri dar ldan ngo mtshar che/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo 'jigs mi byed/ /wa yis seng ge skrag pa min/ /bya ni mkha' la rtsol bsgrub med/ /mkha' dang cho 'phrul tha dad min/ /nam mkha' gang gis za bar nus/ /chu ni
89b7(rgyud 'grel): ma rnyogs bzhag na dangs/ /'di nyid yin dang ma yin zhes/ /sus byas su yis go ba su/ /zhes rngon ba ba chen pos/ ka ma la shI la nyams kyi brda bstan pa'o// //dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mkha' 'gros byin
90a1(rgyud 'grel): brlabs gnad kyi brda/ /seng ge glang chen phag rgod bsad/ /rtsa ba bral ba'i sdong po bzhin/ /nags kyi ri dags gal la tshud/ /gzings kyi bya rog gar bder mthong/ /dangs pa'i chur ni gzugs brnyan bzhin/ mkha' la
90a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshon gyis bkur mi nus/ /ri bo rlung gis bsgul ba min/ /rgya mtsho chen po gting mi g.yo/ /snying phyung de ni skal bar ldan/ /seng ge'i gsob la byis pa 'jigs/ /bung ba'i spyod pa yid kyis ltos/ /bu shi'i mya ngan sems la zhog/ sgron me
90a3(rgyud 'grel): lag tu thogs pa'i mi/ /kun gyi sna la 'gro bar gyis/ /de nas nam mkha' i phyi nang 'dre/ zhes gsungs te / rngon pa ba chen pos/ ka ma la shI la gnad kyi gdams pa bstan pa'o/ /rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ tsadte gu hya
90a4(rgyud 'grel): gam+b+hi rA tha gI ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ sems kyi gsang ba zab don brda'i glur blangs pa zhes bya ba/ sha ba ri dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kye 'o chu dang 'o ma so sor nam mkha' i mthongs su bsres pa rtog med dang pa'i mchu des bsdus nas song/ /'dab
90a5(rgyud 'grel): chags 'ug pa'i mig gis sna tshogs mun pa'i khrod na snang ba so sor mthong ba phyi rol min/ /'dab chags ne cos nyi ma'i 'od la rtsi shing nags khrod mthong la dga' zhing rtse la lhag par chags/ /rma bya dug gi lo ma zos pas spu sdug lhag bar mdzes pa'i
90a6(rgyud 'grel): kha dog mdongs ni su yis bris/ /sgeg mo gzhan gyi dri ma dag pa'i mdong can me long blta la rab tu brtson pa shes par gyis/ /srin po'i gling las thar ba'i ded dpon dri za'i grong mthong de la gnas bcas don chen 'grub pa mtshar/ /drang srong chu
90a7(rgyud 'grel): yi zla ba blta zhing nyi zla'i phreng ba 'gred la brtson pa gtsang sbra lhag par che/ /rgyal bos dgra thabs kyis ni bkug ste/ bcings nas bsad pas srid dang bcas pa thob ste g.yon can min/ /ging ba srog gcod mkhas pa nyin bzhin srog gcod
90b1(rgyud 'grel): de la sdig pas mi gos gshin rje gshed/ /rdzi bo thabs mkhas lcags kyus stobs ldan glang po'i kha lo ji ltar 'dod bzhin sgyur ba phyi rol min/ /mig 'phrul mkhan pos nyi zla brkus te mun khung nang du spas bas ? skar thams cad
90b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang du 'dus/ /tshangs pa'i ril ba chus bkang mi 'dzag dag byed rgyud du 'chang ba shes na rten 'brel che ba yin/ /dpyid dus me tog mgul chad lhung ba shing thog ro ldan 'gyur bar re ba'i ? de 'dza'? yin/ /rdza sob btang snod der
90b3(rgyud 'grel): chu blugs mi 'dzag yin pas me nang bcug la ti tsha mkhas bar bya/ /khug rta skom yangs nang 'bab pa'i chu ni mi mthung nam mkha' i chang rgyun 'dzed par shes par bya/ /lkugs par sdod pa'i mi des khab len rdo yis lcags phye bsdus bas rgya
90b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshor zla ba gza' yis gzung/ /dus mdza' i mdud rtser 'bab ba'i tshangs pa'i dngul chu de la gzugs mdzes brten pa'i rgyal po lhag par dga' / /zo chun 'khor los khron pa'i chu rnams gyen du drangs pas mchog gi lo tog smin pa e ma'o/ /
90b5(rgyud 'grel): zab mo brda'i glu gsang ba'i bdud rtsi zhes bya ba rdzogs sho// //sha ba re dbang phyug gis dam pa la gsungs pa/ dam pa'i zhal snga nas zha ma lo tsA bas gtan la phab ste/ dpal ding ri mkhan pa'i khrod du bsgyur ba'o// //
90b6(rgyud 'grel): bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal nas/ gang gis ma rtogs pa yis rtogs pa'i spyod pa mi bya ste/ /byas na rgyal po'i khrims la dmangs kyis gnod pa byas pa bzhin/ /rtogs pa rnams kyis ma rtogs pa yi spyod
90b7(rgyud 'grel): pa mi bya ste/ /byas na glang chen dag ni 'dam du byed ba 'dra gsung ngo/ /slob dpon sa ra ha'i zhal nas/ /kye'o grogs dag lhan cig skyes pa ste/ /gzhan nas rnyed min zhal la dris/ /don dam gzhan gyi ngo bo de rtogs na/ /yid ni gar 'ching rlung yang
91a1(rgyud 'grel): chad pa med gsung ngo/ /slob dpon tog tse pa'i zhal nas/ tha mal shes pa snying gi dbus su sad/ /tshogs drug dag na bde chen rgyun mi 'chad/ /brtags pa thams cad don med g.yeng ba'i rgyu/ /rgom du med pas gnyug ma'i ? la zhag
91a2(rgyud 'grel): gsung ngo/ /slob dpon sa man ta badzra'i zhal nas/ phyag rgya chen po rang la lhun gyis grub pa ste/ mi bsam mi rig 'bad pa med pa rang gis zhog /chad pa med sngon du nyams myong rang gis rig /rtag par ? 'gyur mngon zhen med par ? du 'jug
91a3(rgyud 'grel): gsung ngo/ /slob dpon ka na pa'i zhal nas/ shing rta'i 'khor lo gcig dang mi ldan 'gro bar mi nus bzhin/ /sbyin sogs 'bad pa byas kyang bla ma'i man ngag med na dngos grub dam pa med/ /bya rgod rtsal rdzogs 'dab mar bcad pa dag ni mkha' la
91a4(rgyud 'grel): spyod cing rgyug/ skal bzang rnal 'byor dam pa rnams ni dbang dang byin brlabs dam pa'i 'og tu chud cing bde gsung ngo/ /kampa la'i zhal nas/ zab cing rgya che rgya mtsho nor bus gang ba la/ /klu yi rgyal po rnams kye mnga' mdzod ngo mtshar che/
91a5(rgyud 'grel): snang grags thams cad ye nas chos sku yin pa la/ /rtogs dang nyams smyong ldan pas mnga' mdzod ngo mtshar che gsung ngo/ /slob dpon lU yI ba'i zhal nas/ /khyi rgod rab tu mi srun sna la sbrang rtsi byugs na phyogs rnams kun tu za bar byed/ /blo
91a6(rgyud 'grel): dman skal ba dman pa'i gang zag rnams la dbang dang gdams dag byin pas rang rgyud bsreg /glang chen dpa' la brtan pa'i sna la ras gri bskur bas dgra dpung 'joms/ /skal bzang blo ldan skye med rtogs pa rnams kyis thug phrad dag gi rnam
91a7(rgyud 'grel): rtog 'joms gsung ngo/ /slob dpon te lo pa'i zhal nas/ ri rab gser gyi ngos la bya gnas pa/ /bya ya rang bzhin bor nas gser du snang/ /mkhas pa gang gis skyes ba med rtogs na/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin por nas bde ba che gsung ngo/ /te lo
91b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zhal nas/ bdag nyid gdod ma nyid nas sangs rgyas yin pa la/ /ma rtogs dbang gis sangs rgyas nyid du ma mthong ngo/ /gnyis med gang gis rtogs pa de ni phyag rgya che/ /rtogs pa'i yul na mthong ba med cing rtogs pa med gsung ngo//
91b2(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon shes rab bzang po'i zhal nas/ byis pa chung du gsol nas gyad kyi stobs dang ldan pa bzhin/ /blo chung rnams kyang bla ma'i gdam ngag dag gis bde pos theg? pa che/ /rlung mkhris pad kan 'dus pa'i nang rnams sman gyis sel
91b3(rgyud 'grel): ba ltar/ /nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa'i nad rnams bla ma'i gdams ngag dag gis skad cig nyid la bsreg gsung ngo/ /slob dpon nA ro pa'i zhal nas/ 'khor los sgyur rgyal dpung gi tshogs rnams kyis/ /gling? rnams kun la dbang sbyar bzhin//
91b4(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig skyes pa'i ro rnyed pas/ /'khor bdag la dbang sgyur ngo mtshar che gsung ngo/ /slob dpon Dom+bi ba chung pa'i zhal nas/ gser 'gyur rtsi yi nus pa yis/ /lcags rnams gser du 'gyur ba bzhin/ /rin chen dbang gi nus pa yis/ /nyon
91b5(rgyud 'grel): mongs ye shes gnyis med 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /slob dpon dza ba ri pa'i zhal nas/ skye med rtogs kyang nyams myong bral/ /de yang srin mo'i lag tu bu khyer 'dra/ /nyams su myong yang gnas lugs ma rtogs na/ /de yang glang chen lcags
91b6(rgyud 'grel): kyus phrogs pa 'dra zhes gsung ngo/ /slob dpon ba su d+ha ra'i zhal nas/ gang gis ma rtogs par du ro? 'di 'bras chan dag dang khyad par che/ /de bzhin ma rtogs par du sangs rgyas sems can khyad par btags/ /rtogs pa'i dus na 'khor bdag kyang
91b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas che/ /de phyir rtogs dang ma rtogs dag kyang dbye par dka' bas khyad med do zhes gsung ngo/ /slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po'i zhal nas/ bya ba gtong ba man ngag yin/ /zhe 'dod med na rtogs pa yin/ /bsgrub bya med na spyod pa yin/ /
92a1(rgyud 'grel): smra brjod med na nyams myong yin/ /blang dor med na 'bras bu yin/ gsung ngo/ /slob dpon Dompi he ru ka'i zhal nas/ rtogs pa yid bzhin nor bu la/ /nyams su myong bas mdog phyung la/ /spyod pa'i nus pas
92a2(rgyud 'grel): dgos 'dod 'byung/ /ro snyoms ldan pa rnams kyis 'grub gsung ngo/ /slob dpon a ba d+hU tI'i zhal nas/ /thabs dang shes rab an+dza la/ /bla ma'i chu bo'i rgyun gyis rab tu brgyal/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i dpag bsam shing dag la/ /
92a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu lhun grub rang la rdzogs par 'byung gsung ngo/ /slob dpon dA ri ka pa'i zhal nas/ /rang la bde chen yod kyang ma rtogs 'khrul pas bsgribs/ /bde chen gsal bar 'dod na tshogs gnyis bsag par bya/ /tshogs gnyis ma bsags
92a4(rgyud 'grel): bskal pa brgya ru 'bad byas kyang/ /don med don dang mi ldan bde chen rtogs mi 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /slob dpon nag po zhabs kyi zhal nas/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas ngo bo gcig /de yi rang bzhin byang chub sems/ /rtogs par 'dod na ji
92a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin zhog /goms par byas na mngon du 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /slob dpon gcer bu ltung bzed kyi zhal nas/ bla ma dag las dang por rang gi sems rtogs bya/ /de nas chos rnams kun dang tha dad med byas la/ gnyis med goms phyir dur
92a6(rgyud 'grel): khrod gnas su 'dug nas ni/ /mnyam par bzhag nas smyon pa'i brtul zhugs dag gis spyad ces gsung ngo/ /slob dpon ro langs bde'i zhal nas/ /rta dang glang po rgya mtsho 'dra na rab tu bde/ /spre'u chu yi ri mo 'dran spro bar 'gyur/ /chu bo nyi ma sman dang 'dra na
92a7(rgyud 'grel): dbyer mi phyed/ /gcu gcig pud mig dang 'khor lo lta bur 'bras bu thob gsung ngo/ /slob dpon ram pha la'i zhal nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa'i mchog /rang gis rtogs par gnas pas na/ /gnyug ma'i sems kyis rtogs pa gang/ /sangs rgyas tham
92b1(rgyud 'grel): cad des mthong yin zhes gsung ngo/ /slob dpon ku ku ri pa'i zhal nas/ dbyer med sa la gnas na kun kyang bskal pa bzang/ /rgya mtsho'i gting du phyin na dbul dang bral?/ /ral gri lag tu thogs na longs spyod che/ /phyogs med sa la phyin na gnyen dang
92b2(rgyud 'grel): phrad ces gsung ngo/ /slob dpon spyod pa mthu stobs can gyi zhal nas/ rnal 'byor rnams la gang snang thams cad gdams pa ste/ /mthong las de yi skye med rtogs pas slob dpon mchog/ byas pa kun gyi skye med rtogs phyir thabs yin te/ /dga' 
92b3(rgyud 'grel): dang mi dga' bral na skyes bu de la gnyis med 'byung zhes gsung ngo/ /slob dpon ku mA ra tri ta'i zhal nas/ gang gis bla ma'i gdams pa la/ /dbang blangs lhan cig skyes pa yi/ /ro yis kun la khyab byas te/ /skye med rgyas 'debs rdo rje 'dzin//
92b4(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs shar bas dbyer med rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes gsung ngo/ /slob dpon b+ha ti pa'i zhal nas/ chos rnams kun kyang rang gi sems dang gnyis med sbyor/ /rtogs pa'i nyams myong des don gdams pa'i don bral na/ /nor bu 'ching bu ngag la
92b5(rgyud 'grel): bde chen min/ /chos de rnams dang ldan na re dogs med par rang sar zhog gsung ngo/ /slob dpon lus med rdo rje'i zhal nas/ sems ma gdungs na bde ba che/ /zhe 'dod med na ro snyoms yin/ /'bad dang bral na bsgom pa'i mchog/ gnyis snang bral na
92b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes gsung ngo/ /rgyal po in+d+ra bo d+hi'i zhal nas/ dus kyi sna rtse bdag byin brlabs dang ma ldan na/ /phyi dang nang du spyod pa byas kyang sangs mi rgya/ /bde ba rang chas snang ba dag dang khyad par med/ /zhen ba btang bas nyams su
92b7(rgyud 'grel): myong ba mchog thob 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /slob dpon pad+ma badzra'i zhal nas/ gar yang ma bltas dbus su ltos/ /mchog dang bral na dga' ba che/ /sngags rig bsang ba ltos spyod na/ /rnal 'byor rtags kyis bsgyur bar bya zhes gsungs so/ /lta lcam
93a1(rgyud 'grel): lakshmi ka ra'i zhal nas/ dbang bo blo ldan rtogs pa bskyed/ /gnyis pa nags su sna rtse bsgom/ /nyams su myong ba skyes pa na/ /? pa'i khyad par rtogs par bya/ /zhes gsung ngo/ /slob dpon padmo zhabs kyi zhal nas/
93a2(rgyud 'grel): gang gang lhan cig skyes pa de/ /glang po che yi mig bzhin du/ /gzer rim? skyes na zug rdur? 'gyur/ /glod ni zhen med bsam gnyan mchog gsung ngo/ /slob dpon snying po zhabs kyi zhal nas/ chu rgyun gnas pa'i nyams bstan nas/ /spyod pa'i
93a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas kyis 'gro bar bya/ /bla ma dam pa'i gdams dag gis/ /chags sdang rtog pa zhi bar bya gsung ngo/ /slob dpon rdo rje zhabs kyi zhal nas/ bde'i bde 'o gnas med bde/ /'dod pa med pa'i rang bzhin bde/ /brtags pa thams cad der
93a4(rgyud 'grel): shes bde/ /bsgrubs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas bde zhes gsung ngo/ /slob dpon dril bu zhabs kyi zhal nas/ ral ra sa d+hU tI gsum/ /bdag byin brlabs phyir bcing bar bya/ /bla ma sems dang snang ba gsum/ /rtogs pa bskyed phyir mkhas pas
93a5(rgyud 'grel): brten gsung ngo/ /slob dpon mdung can lkug pa'i zhal nas/ dgag bsgrub bral ba'i sku bzhi dbyer mi phyed/ /gza' gtad med ba'i chos rnams rtsa ba gcig /ma yengs pa yi sangs rgyas kun gyi lam/ /phyogs cha med na rnal 'byor kun gyi mchog
93a6(rgyud 'grel): ces gsung ngo/ /slob dpon ku ti b+hi ra pa'i zhal nas/ sangs rgyas mchod sogs rnams la don mi 'byung/ /'dod dang rtsol ba yod na sangs mi rgya/ /byin brlabs bla ma'i dag gis nyams myong 'phel/ /bla ma'i man dag cha las gzhan gyis min zhes
93a7(rgyud 'grel): gsung ngo/ /slob dpon mi pham ral pa can gyi zhal nas/ rje btsun dam pa bsten na de nyid 'thob/ /nags tshal mthongs su bsgoms na dben pa 'thob/ /chos rnams sems su rtogs na mi mthun med/ /nam mkha' i 'o ma 'thungs na tshim par 'gyur zhes gsung ngo
93b1(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon zhi ba'i dbang phyug gi zhal nas/ bde ba stong ba mdza' dang bral rtogs na/ /dpag bsam shing la brten pas nyes bral te/ /mtsho las skyes bus rgyal bas 'gro shes na/ /bram ze pha dang ma las bu skye 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /rnal 'byor
93b2(rgyud 'grel): ma d+harma'i zhal nas/ go cha chen po gon nas kyang/ /nor bu lta bu'i snying stobs kyis/ /rang gi sems la chu btang ste/ /mi ro'i khog par nges zhugs nas/ /skye ba bdun pa'i sha zos na/ /nam mkha' la ni bya bzhin zhes gsung ngo/ /slob dpon mai tri
93b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zhal nas/ /bde dang stong pa dbyer med snying ka pad+ma dag la rdzogs/ /skye med yid la byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab bde ba chen po'i sems/ /snang grags thams cad ro mnyam gsum du rnal 'byor pa yis spyad/ /rjes su bdag gis byin brlabs shar
93b4(rgyud 'grel): bas dbyer med rdzogs sangs rgyas gsung ngo/ /rnal 'byor ma g+ha g+ha'i zhal nas/ yul la ma blta sems la ? ma blta zhig /zhe 'dod ma byed bya ba ma byed cig /dogs pa ma 'cha nyams pa ma byed par/ /gnyug ma'i shes pa gang dga' nyid du
93b5(rgyud 'grel): thong zhes gsung ngo/ /sbu su ku'i zhal nas/ bya ba 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyid du zad/ /bya ba btang ba'i rnal 'byor sems rtogs byed/ /gang du 'ang mi gnas rtag chad mdza' las 'das/ /bsgom du med pas bsam gyis mi khyab nyid ces gsung ngo//
93b6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ma kaM ka ra'i zhal nas/ gnyis med shes pa chu la chu bzhag 'dra/ /rang bzhin ma slad glang po lta bur zhog /nyams myong spre'u gang ltar byung yang rung/ /rtogs pa'i nam mkha' ji ltar khyab par bya zhes gsung ngo/ /dpal o Di ya nar tshogs
93b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor byas pa'i dus su/ rnal 'byor pa grub pa thob pa bzhi bcus rdo rje'i mgur bzhengs pa / nyams kyi man ngag /thig le gser gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba rdzogs sho// //*/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i 'byam glu ring mo zhes bya ba gnyis bzhugs so
94a1(rgyud 'grel): na mo ratna gu ru/ dur khrod chen po'i bsil ba'i tshal du/ mkha' 'gro ma bde ba'i ro zan mas/ dbyings kyi gtso mo rnams la tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ rjes la kun tshang 'phra men gyi snod bkang ba drangs te/ rtogs par
94a2(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa mgur re zhus pas/ dang po la mkha' 'gro ma nyi zla gser gyi thor cog can gyis rtogs pa brjod de mgur bzhengs pa/ kye 'o ma bcos rnal 'byor shes pa la/ /des shes skyes na sangs rgyas yin/ /dkar dmar yul gyi snang ba 'di/ /brda du gon
94a3(rgyud 'grel): bla ma yin gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma ral pa'i thor cog can gyis rtogs par brjod pa/ kye 'o gnyis su med na 'ching grol med/ /ngos zung med na sgrib pa med/ /rang bzhin med na chags sdang med/ /bran du med na yongs su med gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma rlung gi bshog pa
94a4(rgyud 'grel): can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa/ kye 'o chos rnams gzhi med rmi lam 'dra/ /snang par rkyen skyes gzugs brnyan 'dra/ /rang 'byung rang zhi spu ba 'dra/ /rtsa bral chen po nam mkha' 'dra zhes gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma nyi zla'i thod phreng can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa/ kye
94a5(rgyud 'grel): 'o de nyid nyams su myong ba'i skyes bu gang/ /bde chen nam mkha' i khams su mi shong ngo/ /'di la mtshon du 'dug gam khyod kyis smros/ /nga yis ci yang mthong ba med par mthong gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma la ba'i gos can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa/ /kye'o pad+ma'i ge sar
94a6(rgyud 'grel): snying gi dbus su sad/ /gsal ba'i me tog 'dam gyi dri ma bral/ /dri dang kha dog ldan pa gang gis rkyen/ /'di la dgags dang sgrubs pa yod dam ci gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma me kha las rtogs pa brjod pa/ /kye 'o nam mkha' las byung cho 'phrul ni/ /nam mkha' 
94a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi byas pa'i phyir/ /nam mkha' i dang du rang byung ste/ /'di la skyon du ma 'dzin cig gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma ye shes rdo rjes rtogs pa brjod pa/ /kye 'o bla ma'i drin gyis bde chen mchog rnyed nas/ /thabs gzhan rtan pa rmongs pa shes par bya/ /'di las
94b1(rgyud 'grel): gud du gyur pa'i bde lam zhig /gzhan nas rnyed par sus kyang nus pa med gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma ye shes rdo rjes rtogs pa brjod pa/ /kye 'o sna tshogs snang ba'i cho 'phrul 'di/ /dran pa'i gzugs brnyan yin shes shing/ /dran pa rang ngos stong shes na/ /
94b2(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyi bde ba btsal mi dgos/ /mkha' 'gro ma srid pa'i rgyal mos rtogs pa brjod pa/ /kye 'o rang rig rgyal po 'di mthong na/ /thams cad thams cad thar pa'i lam/ /rang rig nyid ni ma rtogs na/ /grol ba nam yang yod ma yin gsung ngo/ /mkha' gro ma pad+ma
94b3(rgyud 'grel): zhabs kyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ /kye 'o yod med mdza' dang bral pa la/ /gang gis brtags dbyad bya bar nus/ /dran med blo dang bral ba la/ /gang gis bsam zhing bsgom par nus zhes gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis rtogs pa brjod pa/ /
94b4(rgyud 'grel): kye 'o stong nyid rig pa'i rtsal dang ldan/ /skye med skye ba'i cho 'phrul ston/ /dgag sgrub med do rang sar grol/ /'di la bya rgyu ngas ma rnyed gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma seng ge'i gdong pa can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa/ /kye'o yod do byas na ngos bzung med/ /med do byas na
94b5(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs 'char/ /yod med mkha' las 'das pa las/ /'di zhes nga yis mtshon mi nus gsung/ /mkha' 'gro ma gzi brjid kyi rgyal mos rtogs pa brjod pa/ /dran du med nam yengs shig /yengs pas 'khor ba rmi lam 'dra/ /rtogs pa skyes bu gnyis
94b6(rgyud 'grel): sad 'dra/ /ngas ni 'khor ba ma mthong ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma dpal gyi bzang mos rtogs pa brjod pa/ /kye'o snang srid 'di ni phyag rgya che/ /'dod yon 'di ni dangs pa'i sa/ /gnyug ma'i don la 'du 'bral med/ /bde chen thang la rgyug tu gsol gsung ngo/ /
94b7(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma dpal gyi 'od zer gyis rtogs pa brjod pa/ /kye 'o mnyug ma don gyis gter mdzod na/ /dgos 'dod sems nyid nor bu yod/ /lde mig bla ma dam pa 'dzin/ /rjes su 'jug pa spro lags sam gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma bzang mos rtogs pa brjod pa//
95a1(rgyud 'grel): ltos shig rang gi sems la ltos/ /bltas pas ma rnyed rtsa ba stor/ /yal ga ji ltar dgyeS dgyes mdzod/ /nga ni rtogs pa rang grol yid gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje bde mas rtogs pa brjod pa/ /'gre rnams las kyis
95a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul gyur kyang/ /bde ba rang las gzhan med de/ /bskyar de rang gi don de ltos/ /yid ni las las thar bar 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /bdag nyid chen po nyi ma'i dbang phyug gis rtogs pa brjod pa/ /nyi ma stong gi gzi brjid kyis/ /snang srid
95a3(rgyud 'grel): gsal zhing bsreg pa ltar/ /gnyis med ye shes chen po yis/ /chos rnams gsal zhing 'joms par byed gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma lha dpal gyi ye shes kyis rtogs pa brjod pa/ /kye 'o nga ni mi skye mi 'jig ste/ /'gyur med ye shes rdo rje
95a4(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /nga las byung ba'i chos rnams kun/ /nga yi ngo bor mnyam du grol gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma stag gi gdong pa can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa/ /kye 'o mi skye mi 'gag bsam las 'das/ /'di zhes mtshon pa'i tshig dang bral/ /ye grol chen po
95a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi lam/ /bsam du med do rang sar zhog gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhi ba bzang mos rtogs pa brjod pa/ /kye 'o sems kyi de nyid smra ru med/ /gshis kyi de nyid bsam du med/ /chos kyi de nyid ngos bzung med/ /lam gyi de nyid bsgom du med gsung ngo//
95a6(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma g+ha g+ha dpal gyis rtogs pa brjod pa/ /kye 'o bu khyod ci sems de la ltos/ /spros dang bral ba mthong du med/ /bsam du med pa su zhig bsgom/ /'di lam brtsol gzhi la zhog gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma ye shes dbang phyug gis rtogs pa brjod pa//
95a7(rgyud 'grel): gang gis de nyid ma mthong na/ /lus ngag dge ba'i las spyad kyang/ /bde chen mchog dang mi phrad de/ /gnas skabs tsam gyis bde bar gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma bde ba'i rdo rjes rtogs par brjod pa/ /kye 'o gang gis mthong dang thos pa dang/ /dran dang tsher ba'i
95b1(rgyud 'grel): bye brag kun/ /yid kyi ye shes dangs pa la/ /gzugs brnyan tsam du shar ba las/ /gzhi la ma grub ngo bos stong gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma lha nyi ma'i rta can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa/ /gang gis ma mthong de mthong na/ /yid ni rang grol ches kyi sku/ /rlung gi
95b2(rgyud 'grel): rta pho shul du lus/ /sems kyi mi po mkha' la 'gro gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma pad+ma'i myu gus rtogs pa brjod pa/ /'gro ba yid kyi phreng bas bcings/ /yid bsad phreng thag bcad pa yis/ /dug sbrul mtshon gyis gtses pa bzhin/ /'di yis phan gnod
95b3(rgyud 'grel): byas pa med gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma dbyings kyi rgyal mos rtogs pa brjod pa/ /kye 'o nam mkha' yongs su dangs mtshon gyis bsgyur du med/ /rtogs dang ldan pa'i skyes bu las kyis bcing du med/ /gdeng med gyad kyis sbyod pa byed pa 'di/ /seng ge'i lpags pa
95b4(rgyud 'grel): wa yis gon pa 'dra gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma zla ba'i gdong can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa/ /kye 'o ye shes chen po mchog gi lam/ /ma bgrod de bzhin nyid kyis/ /ma bsgrubs lhun gyis grub pa'i don/ /e ma rnal 'byor skal bar bzang gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma 'bad
95b5(rgyud 'grel): ma glog gi phred ba can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa/ /ltas kyis ma mthong nga'i? mig /bsam gyis ma dran nga yi sems/ /smras kyis ma brjod nga yi lce/ /'bgrod kyang ma phyin nga'i lam gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma shel gyi thor tshugs can gyi mngon par rtogs pa/ /mi sgom
95b6(rgyud 'grel): rnal ma'i shes pa la/ /dran pas bzung dang ma bzung med/ /mi spyod sgo gsum lhug pa la/ /ched dang dgag dang sgrub pa med gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma nyi ma'i rgyal ma so rtogs pa brjod pa/ /kye 'o rang byung bde chen ye shes 'di/ /ma rtogs smra bar mi
95b7(rgyud 'grel): nus te/ /rtogs nas brjod du ga la yod/ /myong ba smrar med lkug pa'i kha gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma seng ge'i mdangs can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa/ /kho la ma blta nga la ltos/ /da ni ye shes chen po yin/ /kho na nga? yi sprul pa yin/ /gnyis med ye shes blo
96a1(rgyud 'grel): las 'das gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma khrag gi gdong pa can gyis rtogs par brjod pa/ /kye 'o dran dang ma dran so mtshams su/ /yid kyi shes pa bsam las 'dis/ /bla ma'i zhal las shes par gyis/ /gzhan gyis rtogs
96a2(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ma yin gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro ma dpal gyi sgron mes rtogs pa brjod pa/ /kye 'o gang phyir yid kyi ye shes 'dis/ /khyod kyis bltas pas ji ltar mthong/ /brtags pas rtogs par mi 'gyur te/ /mi rtsal de bzhin nyid du bzhag gsung ngo//
96a3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma snang gsal gyi rgyal mos rtogs par brjod pa/ /'gro ba las kyis 'jur bus bcings/ /bram ze skud pa 'khal pa bzhin/ /yid kyis 'jur bu glod par bya/ /las la grol na 'ching ba med gsung ngo/ /ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma sum cu rtsa
96a4(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i rtogs par brjod pa/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang mdzod na gnas pa las/ dbyings kyis bka' bgros nas/ rje dam pa rgya gar la snang ba'o/ /zha ma lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o/ /rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/
96a5(rgyud 'grel): DA ki ni ta la gI ti na nA ma/ bod skad du/ mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jam glu zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag med ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /u rgyan gyi gnas mkha' 'gro ma'i gling/ /dur khrod chen po rgyu skar dpal gyi rol par/ mkha' 'gro ma su ka ma hA sid+d+his
96a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs 'khor mdzad pa'i dus su/ /rnal 'byor pa ka ma la sh+ris/ rang gi de kho na nyid kyi ye shes gnyug ma'i don de rtogs shing khor du chung pa la gdengs thob cing /nyams kyi rtsal phyogs med du shar ba'i stobs kyis/ /gnyis med kyi ye shes/ 
96a7(rgyud 'grel): chen po de/ /mtshon tshig gi rta la bskyon te / tshogs kyi thal du mgur bzhengs pa las/ ye shes dang las grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams dgyes te/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la sprin gyi phung po bzhin gtibs nas/ rnal 'byor pa la snying gtam gsang
96b1(rgyud 'grel): chib? tu sbran te/ mgur bzhengs pa / kye 'o stobs ldan rigs kyi bu/ /yang dag don grub rdo rje'i rtsal/ /sbyangs pa'i las sad skal ba can/ /yon tan dbang phyug gter gyi bdag /dngos grub gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i lus/ /mi yi khyu mchog
96b2(rgyud 'grel): chogs kyi rje/ /khyod rgyu'i chos nyid rkyen gyis gsol/ /sbyangs pa'i las 'phro dum bur 'thung/ /yon tan yid bzhin nor bu brnyes/ /'od gsal chen po'i mdongs la gnas/ /sgyu ma tsam du 'gro don mdzad/ /dpe med nam mkha' i rnal 'byor pa//
96b3(rgyud 'grel): khyod la bskul ba mi 'tshal gyis/ /'on kyang ded kyi glu la nyon/ /spyir skye 'gro'i sems can las kyis 'khrul/ /sdug bsngal gyi gnas na longs spyod byed/ /'di ma bzod brtsebs sha la bab/ /nga khyod kyi thugs rjes mi dgongs na/ /'gro
96b4(rgyud 'grel): drug gi ba ma ji ltar byed/ /khyod phan sems bskyed cig rnal 'byor pa/ /lar rig pa'i khye chung yengs la dga' / /'khrul pa'i snang ba bltad mo che/ /gzung 'dzin rkun mo mgo lo rgod/ /yid gnyis kyi shes pa tsam tsam mang/ /gnyen po'i mel
96b5(rgyud 'grel): tse snying rus chung/ /shes bzhin gyi dran pa sgo cha lhod/ /sems nyid kyi nor bu 'chong nyen yod/ /khyod yul la ma yengs rnal 'byor pa/ /gzhi 'gyur med nam mkha' i btsun mo la/ /nyon mongs dug lnga'i khong sran zhugs/ /gzung 'dzin gyi 'god
96b6(rgyud 'grel): po spun dgu gnod/ /bzang ngan rkyen rtog gi 'khrul phyir 'breng/ /chags sdang gi spyod lam ma legs pas/ /gzung 'dzin gyi nad ro gting nas ldang/ /rang lus kyi bde ba stor nas 'dug /'khrul pa'i sems can snying re rje/ /khyod 'gro don gyis
96b7(rgyud 'grel): shig rnal 'byor pa/ /lar yid kyi ye shes co lu chung/ /sgo lnga'i rdzun la nyan nyan nas/ /rigs drug g.yang la skyur nyen gda' / /khyod gnyis 'dzin shig cig rnal 'byor ba/ /'gyu byed kyi dran rtog blo rgod po/ /kun gzhi dbyings kyi pho brang du/ /
97a1(rgyud 'grel): ma bcos car nyal mi byed par/ /'dod yon sgyu ma'i slu brid la/ /jug lnga'i grogs dang 'grogs nas rtse/ /yul chags sdang gnyis la yengs pa yis/ /ngan 'gro yi g.yang du ltung nyen yod/ /dbang po sgo lnga'i sgo
97a2(rgyud 'grel): sdoms la/ /yid kyi khye chung btson du zung/ /bde gsal stong pa'i mal du bsnyol?/ /khyed yengs su 'gro'o rnal 'byor pa/ /skye rga na 'chi chu bo la/ /rkyal med kyi blun po rtse la dga' / /dal 'byor gyi gru bo yod bzhin du/ /rje bla ma'i mnyan pa mi bsten
97a3(rgyud 'grel): par/ las mi dge'i rba la stom rtsol byed/ /sdug bsngal gyi rbal gnyen pos byol/ /zhen chags kyi 'dam la ma lus par/ /thar pa'i skam sar ci snyogs gyis/ /khyod zhen 'dod thod cig rnal 'byor pa/ /'dod pa dug gi sdong po la/ /spang blang
97a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyi yal ga gyis/ /zhen pa'i lo mdab? phyogs bcur rgyas/ /rtsol sgrub kyi me tog mkha' la 'phur/ /sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu thur la brul/ /snying med kyi spre'u bsgrubs kyi za/ /'khor ba'i nags su 'chi nyen yod /sna tshogs zhen med kyi skyes bu
97a5(rgyud 'grel): yis/ gdang 'gyur ba med pa'i mtshon thogs te/ /'dod pa'i sdong po rmad? nas bsgyel/ /dug lnga'i 'bras bu sngo bskams khyer/ /dug 'chi byed kyi nus pa zad par gyis/ /khyod zhe 'dod spongs shig rnal 'byor pa/ /ri dags dgra yis phung ba de/ /
97a6(rgyud 'grel): snyan grags tshang du bsgrubs pas lan/ /stod smad brag ca lta bu la/ /phyogs 'dzin ma byed rnal 'byor pa/ /glang chen lcags skyus zin pa de/ /rgun chang ro la chags bas lan/ /'dod yon lan tshwa'i chu rgod la/ /zhen pa ma che rnal 'byor pa/ /rma
97a7(rgyud 'grel): bya gung nas shi ba de/ /sbu thog rgyan du mthong bas lan/ /'byung bzhi mi gtsang phung po la/ /rang mthong ma che rnal 'byor pa/ /sbrang ma 'dam du chud pa de/ /bsung can dri la chags pas lan/ /nye du gnas skabs 'brel pa las/ /brtse gdung ma
97b1(rgyud 'grel): byed rnal 'byor pa/ /phye leb me yis tshig pa de/ /zhun mar mdangs la chags pas lan/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i yul snang la/ /der 'dzin ma byed rnal 'byor pa/ /mdab chags snyil zin pa de/ /'dod yon zas phyir 'brangs pas lan/ /zhen pa lcags kyu'i
97b2(rgyud 'grel): kha zas la/ /ltogs 'dod ma byed rnal 'byor pa/ /kun gzhi dag pa'i me long la/ /tshogs drug rig pa'i phyi bdar byas/ /yul drug gsal ba'i gzugs brnyan shar/ /ma rtogs byis pas dngos por gzung/ /chags sdang gnyis kyi bde
97b3(rgyud 'grel): sdug myong/ /kun gzhi ma bcos chos kyi dbyings/ /tshogs drug ma 'gags der 'dzin med/ /yul drug gsal la ngo bos stong/ /dngos 'dzin byis pa ga chad du/ /mkhas pa rang snang deng 'dzin bral/ /khyod der 'dzin shig cig rnal 'byor
97b4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ gzhi ngos zung med pa'i nam mkha' la/ /nyon mongs dug lnga'i lho sprin 'thibs/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa'i 'brug sgra bsgrags/ /sna tshogs las kyi char rgyun phab/ /zhen chags 'khor ba'i mdam? rdzab g.yos/ /'gro drug sdug bsngal gyi rtsi thog
97b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas/ /lhag mthong rig pa'i nyi ma yis/ /dbyings kyi nyi ma gsal btab ste/ /mnyam rjes dran pa'i kyi ser gyis /dran rtog gi lho sprin dbyings su bdas/ /bdag 'dzin gyi 'brug sgra rang sar yal/ /las kyi char rgyun rtsa ba bral/ /zhen 'dzin gyi 'dam rdzab nyi mas
97b6(rgyud 'grel): bskams/ /rigs drug gis sa bon skam la yar/ /sdug bsngal gyi lo tog sngo bskams khyed/ /khyed the tshom ma byed rnal 'byor pa/ /mtshan ldan gyi rgyal bu blon pos rkus/ /bshes med kyi yul du sbrang dring 'khyams/ /lhang dang h+ral h+ral gyi 'tsho ba brten//
97b7(rgyud 'grel): rang gzhan gnyis kas ngo ma shes/ /mtshan mkhan gyi bram zis rigs brgyud rtogs/ /blo gros blon po'i bu la dris/ /gnas lugs rig pa'i rje la gtad/ /tshogs gnyis dag pa'i khru nas bton/ /gdams pa yid bzhin nor bus brgyan/ /
98a1(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa rin chen gyi khri la bzhag /dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi rgyal sa bzung/ /khyod bla ma brten cig rnal 'byor pa/ /rten med yid kyi ri dags de/ /las dbang par do'i thang la 'khyams/ /zhen chags smig rgyu'i chul gdungs
98a2(rgyud 'grel): ris drug 'khor ba'i mdza' la shi/ ri klungs sha khrag rjes kyis bkang/ /brten med kyi rig pa mkha' la chings/ /tshogs drug gi rkyen kha ma 'dri ma bar/ /'od gsal chen po'i thang la rgyug /'dod yon smig rgyu'i chu bo la/ /der 'dzin gyi zhen
98a3(rgyud 'grel): ba ma byed par/ /zhen 'dod kyi gdung ba nang du chod/ /rigS drug gi rkyen kha ma 'grim par/ /mnyam med chen po'i dbyings su nyol/ /yid bsam du med pa'i gnyug ma la/ /dran pa yengs med kyi mda' mkhan gyis/ /ma bcos gnyug ma'i ngo bor bsrad//
98a4(rgyud 'grel): re dogs gnyis kyi mgo rtsa bregs/ /dga' bzhi'i dbyas su dril nas kyang/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i mde 'u bcug /thabs shes rab gnyis kyi ltong gtod de/ /skad cig bzhi yi sgro bskyon nas/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa'i phyogs su 'phangs/ /gti mug phag rgod
98a5(rgyud 'grel): snying la gzer/ /gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi srog rtsa bcad/ /'khor ba'i gnas su nga? mi rgyug /khyod btsan sa zung cig rnal 'byor pa/ /yul rang snang zhen med du shar ba'i tshe/ /'dod yon lam gyi gros su 'gro/ pad+ma'i kha dog 'dam na gsal/ /nyams rig
98a6(rgyud 'grel): gang dgang skyongs shig rnal 'byor pa/ /chos bden med khong du chud pa'i tshe/ /srog rtsol zung 'jug chen po'i yin/ /glang po'i gser sgrog glod na bde/ /'bad rtsol zhog cig rnal 'byor pa/ /mnyam nyid rig pa'i rta pho de/ /gzung 'dzin gyi sgrog tu ma
98a7(rgyud 'grel): chud par/ /bdag gzhan du 'dzin pa'i srab kha glod/ /phyogs med kyi thang la gang bder rgyugs/ /nyams shugs byung du rdol ba'i smyon pa de/ /gnyen pos lcags su ma gzhug par/ /tshul 'chos kyi khyim nas sgor phyung la/ /gar bde'i gnas su yan du chug /
98b1(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa nam mkha' i khyud chen de/ /grub mdza' i gzan la ma chags shing/ /'khrul pa'i g.yang la ma bred par/ /phyogs med kyi mdza' la lding? du chug /'bras bu yid bzhin nor bu de/ /de dgos kyi dri ma ma chags shing/ /yid smon gyi gling la ma lus par//
98b2(rgyud 'grel): dgos 'dod kyi gsol ba re ma la thob/ /'gyur med kyi btsan sa zin nas kyang/ /thugs rje'i 'od zer phyogs med gyis/ /'gro drug gi pha ma byed pa ru/ /sngon dam bcas go cha gon pa de/ /da dus la bab po sa mA yA/ /zhes gsungs te/ bskul
98b3(rgyud 'grel): ba chen po'i sgras/ /bskal pa'i 'brug bzhin du bsgrags te/ /nam gyi mdza' dang mnyam du mi snang bar dngos so/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i 'byam glu ring mo zhes bya ba rdzogs sho// //khyad par gyi brgyud pa brgyad las/ /don skor rnam pa bzhi
98b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byam glu dang bcas pa'o/ /'di bris dge ba'i rtsa ba yis /rnam mkhyen go 'phang thob par shog/ / */ /phyag rgya chen po rin po che dbang gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba dur khrod rgyu skad dpal gyi rol pas bstan pa bzhugs so// //
98b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du /mahA mu drA ratna gI ta tsakra nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyag rgya chen po rin po che dbang gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag med ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gser la ra med dka' 'ji'i rdol rtogs par 'gyur/ /'dra men?
98b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni tshong 'dus dag tu rgyug par 'gyur/ /gser zol skor zhing 'khor nas gnas po'i lag tu 'babs pa yin/ /'phra men ma ni ma bsten 'gyur te rten 'brel thams cad su yis bsgrigs/ /ded dpon mkhas pa grong dang gling phran tshong spangs rin chen
98b7(rgyud 'grel): gling nas nor bu len/ /phyi bdar byas tsha rgyal mtshan rtse la mchod pas dgos 'dod 'byung/ /rin chen gsum ngo shes pa'i ded dpon 'dzam bu'i gling na dkon/ /srang la zhal che bcol bas che chung med par gcod de brtsod dang bral/ /'gron po lam
99a1(rgyud 'grel): zhugs par gyi grong dang grong khyer mi sul bgod nas don 'grub pa/ /gi ling rta pho mgyogs kyang lcag gis brabs na de bas mgyogs par 'gyur/ /ltas ngan chen po byed pa'i mi de su yi rigs brgyud yin/ /dmigs med
99a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs sogs byed pa rgya mtsho chen po mkhas/ /bya yi tshogs la mda''phangs gang la phog pa de dag 'gum/ /ri mtsho tsan dan gsum gyis bya glang sprul gsum skyabs 'og bcug pa shes lags sam/ /ras yug dkar por tshur nas bton nas tshos
99a3(rgyud 'grel): ma'i lag tu btang bas gang 'dod 'byung/ /mdzub bsgreng srin 'theb mdzub 'theb nang du 'dzub mo bcug cing mkha' la bsgreng ba'i don ldan brdar shes bar chad med/ /bung ba khri snyan phyi ba gsum gyis shes rab gsum li? sbyor ba ngo mtshar che/ /
99a4(rgyud 'grel): 'du ba gso byed sman pa'i rgyal po mnyes pa yis/ /rin chen bdun sbyor po gtsug bshad btang nas na?/ /sha rus khrag sogs smin cing lus kyi 'byung ba rtas par byed/ /tshangs pa chen po'i gsung dbyangs khyod kyis snyan par gyis/ /seng ge'i 'o ma btsun mos bzhos pa'i bcud mchog ngo mtshar can/ /'di ni gang gis 'thungs dang lce la reg pa tsam gyis ni/ /rtsa gral rlung zin thig le gros pa'i nus mthu 'byung/ /u ma de pa len pa'i glu de mchog tu mnyan pa yin pas gson/ /snang pa thob nas dben ba'i
99a5(rgyud 'grel): sa phyogs der ni rang gi gnas btsal la/ /rgyan gyis sgras shing mdzes ldan bdag med yum gyi zhabs la 'dud/ /gtan gyi bde ba blangs pa nam mkha' rdo rje grong du gzhug /srid pa'i rgyal mo len pa'i glu la yid gtang bya bar rigs/ /rang 'byung shel gyi mchod
99a6(rgyud 'grel): rten skyon bral yengs? dag pa la/ /snang srid gsal byed 'phrul gyi me long phyis te blta bar bya/ /mo gsham bu yis bden pa mthong ba'i don de gang yin khyod kyis smos/ /khyab 'jug chen po rang gis blangs pa'i blu pa yid brtan byed/ /? khang dag na dri mas dri
99b1(rgyud 'grel): ma ma lus dag par byed/ /med bzhin snang ba mkha' la bris pa'i 'ja' ltar gzugs sku rnam gnyis gang zhig yon/ /sbrang rgor zos? pa'i rtsa la byan brlabs rgyas par byed/ /skyug nad can dang rma dkris gnyis la chags pa'i zhen pa cang g+ga''am/ /dri dang
99b2(rgyud 'grel): sgog pa dbyer ma phyed par snang ba gzugs brnyan 'di 'dra rtogs lags sam/ /chu zla bzhin du snang la rang bzhin med pa mig gi rnam shes nyams su myong bas gzigs/ /'byung ba 'khrugs pa'i nad la sman pa rnams kyis drod tshad 'dzin/ /bshal rjes mi
99b3(rgyud 'grel): bsrung rtag tu bsrung ba ma lags sam/ /gnam lcags sa la babs na gang la babs pa'i yul de 'jig par byed/ /mkha' la 'brug gi sgra? bsgrags dbyar dbun shan 'dad de yis phyed par 'gyur/ /sprul pa'i dge slong mkhas pa 'gro 'chag nyal
99b4(rgyud 'grel): du ston kyang skyo dub med/ /gser gyi ril brten pa'i bya? yang de yi mdog tu 'gyur/ /snang? yang de gzhin skyid pa'i sgyu ma mkhan dang rtag tu 'grogs/ /zhing po'i lo rtog rten 'brel rab tu 'dzom pas 'bras bu ston rnams sdud/ /mchod sdong nyi zla nor bus
99b5(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa med bzhin 'gro ba'i don la brtson/ /so btang? bum par chu bskyed mi 'chag snod kyi bya ba byed/ /ka la bi ka'i sgra bzhin tshangs pa'i gsung gis bag chags sgrib pa 'dag? /rlung gi ta la dun pa'i srab kyis mkha' la btags la dbul mo'i khyim
99b6(rgyud 'grel): du gzhug /lo zla 'das pa'i ma bu phrad bzhin des pa'i shes pa skye/ /nya dang chu las 'byung ba gos su gon pas zhen pa cang gda' 'am/ /me long shel bzhin khong ras gsal stong byas pa med pa lta pa mchog /dangs ma'i chu la bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gsal
99b7(rgyud 'grel): dangs phyed par snang/ /'gron po lam zhugs nye ring med par phyin nas 'dod pa'i mi dang phrad/ /rgyal po'i khrims la 'bangs kyis dam tshig ces par bsrungs pa legs/ /rma bya'i zas su btsan dug zos pas stobs su 'gyur ba ngo mtshar che/ /rin chen
100a1(rgyud 'grel): gser de sa la gnas kyang 'od zer mkha' la 'char/ /bag ma bung ba seng ge smyon pa bzhi po spyod pa 'dzol/ /rlung dang yi ge rnam shes gsum po 'grogs la tshangs pa'i mthong lam snyogs/ /sa 'gus mchod
100a2(rgyud 'grel): spod btsugs pa'i sa der klu yi 'jigs pa mi bdog go /rin po che la rtogs med kyang gsol ba btab na dgos 'dod 'byung/ /mkha' la sprin tshogs 'dus nas char gyis 'gro don mdzad/ /rgyal gu rgyal sar bzhag nas 'bangs rnams kun
100a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis khur bar byed/ /mkha' la nyi ma shar ba'i mun pa'i tshogs la gdang ? med mod kyis/ /nyi zla ngos bzung chu bo gyen la zlog pa grangs pas gangs dkar rtse nas zhu ba ngo mtshar che/ /ma gad+ha? ru rdo rje'i gdan du bsdang pa'i rgyal ba sprul pa'i ?
100a4(rgyud 'grel): de su yin lo/ /drang srong rnams ni kham gyis zas lam brten bsam gtan thun gyis 'tsho/ /rdo rje gdan la dbang po bstan pas nam mkha' i bsgrub bya med par rtogs/ /myong zhing smra ma nus pa'i bcu drug lon pa'i bde ba su la bslangs/ /mkha' la shar
100a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rgyu skad rnams kyis nam zla dus bzhi'i drod chad 'dzin/ /bzhin gyi dri ma sel ba'i me long 'di la sgeg mos gces par 'dzin/ /rgyal po'i khang bzang dag na btsun mo 'dod yon rtag tu spyod byang de la zhen po med/ /gang gis 'joms par mi nus pha lam
100a6(rgyud 'grel): rdzas kyi rdo rje yin/ /drang srong rnams kyis tshe yi rig 'dzin grub pa gang gi stobs las byung/ /brtsog pa'i chos zang snying po por nas rin chen snod mdzes tshol ba thabs la mkhas/ /rdo yi skyes bu srin me'i gling la nyam dmig? gang mi rtog /nam mkha' i
100a7(rgyud 'grel): mdzod la longs spyod nus na dbul pa'i sdug bsngal bral/ /dmyal ba la sogs rigs drug dag la bde gshegs sku gdung 'brul/ /dug la sngags kyis thebs pas 'du ba'i nad rnams thams cad 'joms/ /mkha' la nyi ma shar ba skor ma la sogs
100b1(rgyud 'grel): snang gzhan zil gyis mnan pas nam mkha' i dkyil ltar mthong/ /ka ra na bcings chu yi 'gro 'ong chad nas gzhon nu me long blta zhing nam mkha' i dkyil ? 'dug /rab rib mig ser sol bas dung la ser por mthong ba'i 'khrul pa dus der zhig /gshed mas khrid
100b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mi de ? nas dpa' 'dzangs de yi lag tu cang 'gro 'am/ /nam mkha' dag pa'i 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i gzugs su bris pa gang na med/ /nam zhig mu ge'i dus su bu sha zos kyang de la chags pa cang skye 'am/ /bla ma'i dus thabs brten pas yin min
100b3(rgyud 'grel): rten 'brel thams cad rtogs/ /rdo yi mi la sdom pa dam tshig phog kyang bsrung dang nyams pa'i rig byed med/ /rtog bral ro de gang la mi 'jigs nus mthu su yis byin pa yin/ /dangs pa'i mkha' la gza' dang rgyu skar byung shes drang srong mkhas pa yin//
100b4(rgyud 'grel): ri dags drang srong lta bu gcig pur 'dug pa'i mi nges bden pa myur du thob/ /'byung ba gyes bas dngul chu mkha' la 'phur bar gang nas 'ongs/ /rnyog ma'i dri ma can gyi chu la nor bu bcug pa'i stobs kyis dangs par 'gyur/ /bde gshegs bems po
100b5(rgyud 'grel): ltar snang sman dang sman chu stegs dang zab pa de mchod kyis/ /rtog med 'byung bas 'gro drug 'dod pa dus su bskod pa ngo mtshar che/ /rin chen gling du phyin nas sa rngo btsal med ci snyed thams cad rin po che/ /mkha' la sprin gyis 'khrigs na nyi ma'i 'od zer
100b6(rgyud 'grel): snang ba min/ /gang gdugs lam de gsal na chu de 'dod pa'i gnas su 'gro /kha brag lam na 'dug pa'i mi de grogs kyi rkyen gyis gar 'gro'i cha yang med/ /nor bu rin chen len pa'i tshong pa sgugs la de dang sbrag /rdo yi mi la rmi lam ci zhig dris kyang lan de
100b7(rgyud 'grel): 'ong des med/ /na tsha sdug bsngal che dus rtsa ba de rang yin te thabs gzhan med/ /snang ba'i gzugs rnams bsdigs su byung yang de nyid snying rje'i yul te logs na med/ /gshog gnyis rgyas pa'i rnal des nam mkha' gar byas rkyen gnyis dbang du bsdus/
101a1(rgyud 'grel): gangs dkar rtsel nyam pa med pa'i seng ge rtsal gsum rdzogs/ /sgo gnyis khyim spangs bsam gtan thun gyi zla brten nam mkha' mdzod du byas/ /lce dang 'theb mo gnyis ka brags la seng ge bu dang sbrag /nam zhig 'brug
101a2(rgyud 'grel): la zhon nas 'jig rten gsal bar byed/ /lam tshwa'i rgya mtshor chu rnams ro gcig tha dad med/ /rgya mtsho dangs pa'i nang na gza' skar gzugs brnyan snang ba su yis bzhag /byang lta'i phug pas nyi ma ma mthong gang gis lan/ /dgos 'dod
101a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba'i nor bu'i nus pa su la blangs zhes gsungs so/ /mchog gi brgyud pa las byung ba zab mo'i don to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag med ma'i brda/ /rin po che dbang gi 'khor lo gsal ba zhes bya ba/ /dur khrod rgyu skar dpal gyi rol par gsungS
101a4(rgyud 'grel): pa rdzogs sho/ /dbang gtso bor bstan pa'o/ /rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid snang ba zhes bya ba grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i glu bzhugs so/ /rgya gar skad du/ yo ga sarbatat+tA?/ u mu tri A lo ka nA ma bi ka la
101a5(rgyud 'grel): badzra bI? ta/ bod skad du/ rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid snang ba zhes bya ba grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i mgur/ /bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyu sems can las 'bras bu sangs rgyas thob par byed pa'i lam tshogs gnyis las
101a6(rgyud 'grel): phyir gyur pa med la/ bsod nams tshogs kyi mthar thug ni chos kyi 'khor lo'o/ /de bskor pa'i gnas ni skye bos bgrod ba'i dka' pa'i sa phyogs /'byung bo ro langs rgyu ba'i srang/ 'jig rten gyi mi ma yin rgyu ba'i sa/ mthong ba tsam gyis bdud pa/
101a7(rgyud 'grel): sdu ldang zhing srin po kyi g.ya' ba las kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i gnas/ dur khrod chen po brgyad du rtogs pa mthar phyin pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams dang /chos nyid skye ba med pa la blo 'byongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams rab tu tshogs nas/ rang rang gi rgyad? la don dam
101b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bden pa 'jug pa'i yul nges pa'i shes pa gang la skyes pa dang/ gnyug ma don gyi lhan cig skyes pa rang la gnas pa'i ye shes do gang la sprad pa dang/ rtogs pa gang gi sgo nas shar ba de tshogs kyi mchod ba byin gyis brlob pa la nyams myong gi
101b2(rgyud 'grel): mgur bzhes pa/ gnas de dang de na gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma su ka ta bskal pa bzang mo la sogs pa rnams kyis/ mi bsnyel ba'i gzungs kyis phyi rabs kyi don du yi ge ris su dkar shog la btab pa 'di rnams so/ /dka' thub mthar phyin pa lU yI
101b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zhal snga nas/ tshe 'di'i che thabs 'khor ba'i rgyu/ /bya ba ma mang thar lam 'gag /'dod pa'i blo bral bya ba'i yul/ /sa phyogs de na byang chub nye/ zhes gsungs ngo/ /bde ba'i mdangs ldan ma/ /sh+rI su ka'o zhal snga nas/ 'jig rten bya ba bdud
101b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi yul/ /tshe 'di'i blo log 'phags pa'i lam/ 'dod pa'i dug sprul gtsos pa yis/ /rjes ni sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur zhes so/ /nor bu gling pa la li ta badzra'i zhal snga nas/ ting 'dzin shes rab dri ma sel/ /rang rig ye shes 'od gsal sku/ /
101b5(rgyud 'grel): bde pa thob byed dbang gi lam/ /mngon du gyur tshe rtog pa grol zhes gsung ngo/ /'dod chags lam du slar pa mo tsan+d+ra bi ma la'i zhal snga nas/ shes rab rno par ting 'dzin gyis/ /ma mthong 'khor ba'i sgrog mi chod/ /rin chen dbang gi nus pa yis//
101b6(rgyud 'grel): zag pa bde chen nyid du 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /nus pa'i mthar thug birya pa'i zhal snga nas / 'dam bral pad+ma skam pa bzhin/ /dug lnga med na ye shes 'gag /'dod yon lam khyer s lam 'dums/ /spangs nas grol 'dod dman pa'i lam
101b7(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsung ngo /zang zing gi sbyin bdag mo ru ru su ka'i zhal snga nas/ drang srong shes rab mig can gyis/ /nad gzhi lus kyi zungs su bsgyur/ /de bzhin thabs dang ldan pa yis/ /dug lngas ye shes bskyed par byed/ /ces gsung ngo/ /'gro ba'i mgon po
102a1(rgyud 'grel): klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas/ /rmi lam rang bzhin med pa bzhin/ /chos rnams rang gi ngo bos stong/ /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /don la grub pa ma yin no zhes gsung ngo/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes thugs su chud pa'i dz+nyA na
102a2(rgyud 'grel): d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas/ ngo bos stong pa snang ba'i mtshang/ /gang la rang bzhin med pa yi/ /brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid/ /zung 'jug ma mthong grol mi nus zhes gsungs ngo/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug sa ra ha'i? zhal snga nas/ snga nas ma dran rdo rje'i gdan/ /
102a3(rgyud 'grel): smra bar ma nus yid 'pham sa/ /'od gsal 'gro 'ong med pa'i bdag /gnyis snang grol ba phyag rgya che zhes gsung ngo/ /rdo rje bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor ma a nu ki ra'i zhal snga nas/ dangs ma snang stong rkyen dang bral/ /tsho bas drug yul du ma bcad pa'i//
102a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro 'ang med pa gnyug ma'i dang/ /dran brjed mtshams su sems ngal sos zhes gsung ngo/ /ri khrod dbang phyug sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas/ 'khrul pa rkyen snang glo bur ba/ /dus gsum skye 'jig gis stong pa/ /gzhi lam grub do mtshar yul/ /de
102a5(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba ni grol ba'i yul zhes gsung ngo/ /skyabs kyi sbyin bdag mo su ka b+ha 'u yi zhal snga nas/ /dran rig rnam par rtog pa ni/ /ma rig pa yi stobs las 'byung/ /sna tshogs med shar ngo bos stong/ /rtsa bral nam mkha' i rjes thob can zhes gsung ngo//
102a6(rgyud 'grel): mi las 'das pa Arya de ba'i zhal snga nas/ /'od gsal gdod nas dag ba'i dang/ /mdza' bzhi las ni rnam grol ba'i/ /rang gnas rtsa ba 'dus ma byas/ /spros bral 'di ni gzigs mor che zhes gsung ngo/ /dran pa cig pa'i rnal 'byor ma b+ha su
102a7(rgyud 'grel): ri ka'i zhal snga nas/ kun la khyab pa 'od gsal dang/ /'gro 'od med pa'i bdag nyid can/ /spros bral dus rnams thams cad pa/ /chos sku 'gro ba mi 'dor ro zhes gsung ngo/ /smra ba'i seng ge ka la a le ba'i zhal snga nas/ grub mdza' i lta ba ming du
102b1(rgyud 'grel): brjod/ /ming rnams rnam par rtog pa ste/ /de nyid stong pa chos kyi sku/ /ming las grol ba phyag rgya che zhes gsung ngo/ /rtse gcig gis rnal 'byor ma ka ri d+ha ri ma'i zhal snga nas/ /bde gshegs btsun mo ming med ma/ /nam mkha' i 'o ma rab 'thungs nas/ /
102b2(rgyud 'grel): smra bsam blo yi yul las 'das/ /gnyis snang za zhing nam mkha' 'jo/ /de mthor bas ni grol bar 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /blo gros mi zad pa shAta de ba'i zhal snga nas/ /tshe 'di'i blo log thar pa'i lam/ /snang phyir ma 'brer 'khrul ba grol/ /
102b3(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum chag chog gnad kyi mtshang/ /dri med rang snang phyag rgya che zhes gsung ngo/ /chos kyi sbyin bdag mo a nu ta ri'i zhal snga nas/ go cha 'jig rten pa yi sgrong/ /ma grol 'phags lam zin mi 'gyur/ /de srid bde ba dang mi 'phrad/ /rang snang dag tshe
102b4(rgyud 'grel): zhing khams 'char zhes gsung ngo/ /brtul zhugs thar phyin Dom+bi? pa'i zhal snga nas/ /dmigs pas ched du ma gzung ba'i/ /shes pa yul las ma 'phros pa/ /bde gsal mi rtog dri ma med/ /dangs ma yid 'bral phyag rgya che zhes gsung ngo/ /'dod pa la blo
102b5(rgyud 'grel): log pa rnal 'byor ma dz+nyA na bi ma la'i zhal snga nas/ /sgom blo'i 'dun pa dri ma ste/ /rig pa so la bzhag pa yi/ /ma byas shes pa skyon las grol/ /'dzin rtog dmigs pa'i steng du ni/ /spros bral 'char bar mi 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /shes rab spyan ldan ka
102b6(rgyud 'grel): ma la'i zhal snga nas/ /dngos don rang rig ye shes kyi/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i nyams myong ni/ /tshig gi spyod yul ma yin te/ /brda yis mtshan pa seng ge'i gsung ngo/ /bdag med kyi sgra sgrogs? sam? pad+ma d+ha nu'i zhal snga nas/ gnyug ma ngo bo nyid kyis gshis/ /
102b7(rgyud 'grel): blo yi yul na gnas pa min/ /mtshon du long la ngos bzung bral/ /yang dag bla ma'i brda las rig ces gsung ngo/ /'khrul pa'i sgrog khrol ba b+hin pa'i zhal snga nas/ ji ltar chu zla'i dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /snang ba'i rang mtshang ngo bos stong/ /dngos por 'dzin
103a1(rgyud 'grel): pa 'khrul pa ste/ /der 'dzin grol bas phyag rgya che zhes gsung ngo/ /sdom pa'i tshul khrims can me kha la'i zhal snga nas/ ji ltar dri za'i grong khyer bzhin/ /chos rnams rang bzhin rtags na dben/ /bden zad rdzun zad yi
103a2(rgyud 'grel): ge zad/ /tshig gi lam chang blo las 'das zhes gsungs ngo/ /sbas pa'i rnal 'byor go rak+Sha'i zhal snga nas/ /rtogs pa yid bzhin nor bu la/ /goms 'dris byis ba dang byas pa yis/ /brtan pa thob pa mdog phyin te/ /de tshe dgos 'dod sngon du
103a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /'khor pa'i yid phyung pa mo kum las su rya'i zhal snga nas/ rang snang sbrin rum ma dangs na/ /dpal gyi be'u'i 'od mi gsal/ /rnam rtog rgyab du ma bsrings na/ /ye shes nye ru mi 'dod do zhes gsung ngo/ /rlung la dbang phyug pa tso bo ri ka'i zhal snga nas/ zung 'jug gnas pa'i yi ge ni/ /'gros kyi rnam shes pa ge sel/ /nyams myong gsal bas bdag 'dzin zhig /'di yis nyams kyis 'phen len 'jig ces gsung ngo/ /dpal mi'i seng ge'i spyod pa can a
103a4(rgyud 'grel): nu ka ri'i zhal snga nas/ /bde chen chos dang sprul pa yi/ /'khor lo gsum gyi lte ba la/ /gnas pa'i yi ge bde gshegs kyi/ /ma lus kun gyi sku gsung thugs zhes gsung ngo/ /brda la rang ngo mthong pa na du ba'i zhal snga nas / snying gi
103a5(rgyud 'grel): dbus su ngo sgrad pa'o/ /bla mas bsten pa mchog gi don/ /lhun phrub rang po shes pa ni/ /gnad de nges pa'i shes pas mthong zhes gsung ngo/ /dge ba'i chos sdud tshul khrims can b+ha tsa la'i zhal snga nas/ gzhi rdzogs rang 'byung ye shes su/
103a6(rgyud 'grel): tshom mi rkyen la rag mi las/ /rang rig 'od gsal dngos po'i gshis/ /rten 'brel gang gis thabs kyis rig ces gsung ngo/ /lung rig gter gyi dbang phyug ti ba'i zhal snga nas/ bla ma'i gsung gis mdongs pa gsal/ /de mthong ming gi sde
103b1(rgyud 'grel): snod la/ bltas che gdams bar ma gyur pa'i/ /yi ge gcig kyang bor du med ces gsung ngo/ /gsal ba'i mdangs ldan ma kar ma li ka'i zhal snga nas/ nam mkha' dbyings kyi glegs bam la/ /dkar dmar sna tshogs yi ge rnams/ /rnam rtog 'khrul
103b2(rgyud 'grel): pa blo yi chos/ /don la glegs bam yi ges stong zhes gsung ngo/ /bde ba lam khyer thabs la byed pa dan ti ba'i zhal snga nas/ nang gros phyi yi rkyen zhu bas/ /rtsol ba ma byas dang gis su/ /khams 'dus rang la gnas pa yis/ /ye shes
103b3(rgyud 'grel): shar bas las las grol zhes gsung ngo/ /bde ba lam du slong ban ka ra'i zhal sngo nas/ /rmi lam dbang gi sgo nga ru/ /grol lam bskyed rdzogs 'dab bshog rgyas/ /mos gus dad pas sbubs phye bas/ /ma rig 'khrul pa'i rgya las grol
103b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsung ngo/ /rtogs pa byin brlabs las shar ba tsa ra'i zhal snga nas/ mchog gi nor bu rin po che/ /snying la bcangs pa'i brtse gdung gis/ /dpal gyi gter mdzad yongs su 'gengs/ /grogs dag nor bu'i gces 'dzin gyis zhes
103b5(rgyud 'grel): gsung ngo/ /sems can gyi don byed tshul can b+hi ka la'i zhal snga nas/ ded dpon med par rgya mtsho yi/ /mchog gi gling don mi 'grub bzhin/ /yon tan du mas rab brgyan kyang/ /bla ma med par srid mthar min zhes gsung ngo/ /rtogs pa shing gzo
103b6(rgyud 'grel): la shar ga ba ga ba'i zhal snga nas/ dngos rnams sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te/ /bden med ltos dang 'khrul pa 'jig /'khor ba'i mtshang mthong rang bzhin med/ /spang bya ma rnyed gnyen po stor zhes gsung ngo/ /bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes khong du chud pa mo rdzu nu ta
103b7(rgyud 'grel): ri'i zhal snga nas/ /'khor ba ma grub gzhi yis stong/ /myang 'das ma grub blo yis stong/ /sa lam ma grub bden pas stong/ /'bras bu ma grub yul gyis stong zhes gsung ngo/ /re dogs kyi dri ma bral pa ka na ba'i zhal snga nas/ /gzhi med rtsa ba bral ba
104a1(rgyud 'grel): yis/ chos rnams 'dod nas stong pa las/ /'khor ba gang yin myang 'das ci/ /'bras bu ma mthong nyams len grol zhes gsung ngo/ /sems la dmigs pa'i rnal 'byor ma gad ro'i zhal snga nas/ ji ltar chu shing sdod
104a2(rgyud 'grel): po la/ /nam zhig snying po yod gyur tshe/ /de yi dus su gsal ba las/ /'bras bu gzhan du mthong pa min zhes gsung ngo/ /ye shes kyi spyan dang ldan pa ka na da'i zhal snga nas/ phyi rol sa yi byin brlabs min/ /nang du rig pa dangs las 'byung/ /'dzin
104a3(rgyud 'grel): ba chad pas nyams myong 'bar/ /rig pa dangs pa'i stobs las ni/ /sgyu rtsal sna tshogs 'char bar 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa badzra sid+d+ha'i? zhal snga nas/ /man shel ma dag phyi rol rkyan/ /mi 'jug g.ya'
104a4(rgyud 'grel): dag ngos der ni/ /sna tshogs dar gyi kha dog len/ /sems pa'i las kyang de bzhin no zhes gsung ngo/ /de kho na nyid snang ba rdo rje'i mgur las/ /ma rig pa sgo nga'i sbubs rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// //
104a5(rgyud 'grel): yi ge lam du 'khyer pa ta ka na'i zhal snga nas/ mdza' bzhi las ni grol ba yi/ /sangs rgyas skye 'gag dri ma bral/ /rnam par rtog med bde gsal dang/ /gnyis snang bral ba phyag rgya che/ /zhes gsung ngo/ /rtog pa rang grol gyi rnal 'byor ma hu lu ka'i
104a6(rgyud 'grel): zhal snga nas/ gang gis ma bcos ma bslad pa/ /dbyer med dbyings su gcig pa yi/ /chos kyi sku yis kun la khyab/ /rnam rtog gis bcings mngon mi 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /bden pa gzigs pa tai lo pa'i zhal snga nas/ dran rtog tha mal shes pa ni//
104a7(rgyud 'grel): 'ching ba mdza' dag nyon mongs 'gyur/ /dran rig ldang rlung bde ba bcad/ /de tshe shes pa yul mi bso zhes gsung ngo/ /chu bo rgyun gyi rnal 'byor pa ma ti la'i zhal snga nas/ lha yi lus kyis tha mal gyi/ /rtog pa yang ni bden par byed/ /rlung gi ngag la bde ba yis//
104b1(rgyud 'grel): yid kyi tha mal rtog pa spong zhes gsung ngo/ /bla ma'i byin brlabs zhugs pa nA ro pa'i zhal snga nas/ dpal ldan yon tan kun gyi gzhi/ /'di med par ni rnyed mi 'gyur/ /mos gus med par byin brlabs la/ /'jug pa'i yul med smin mi 'gyur zhes gsung ngo//
104b2(rgyud 'grel): gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa karma ka ri'i zhal snga nas/ rang gi don du chos kyi sku/ /gzhan gyi don du gzugs sku gnyis/ /bla ma'i dus thabs brten las byung/ /'di med mchog gi dngos grub stor zhes gsung ngo/ /nus pa la
104b3(rgyud 'grel): thugs rjes brgyan pa sa la'i pa'i zhal snga nas/ byams pa snying rje byang chub sems/ /'di med byang chub mchog gi lam/ /nam du yang ni phrang mi 'gyur/ /grogs dag gces pa dor mi bya zhes gsung ngo/ /bde ba'i gos kyis dros pa ta dza a ling
104b4(rgyud 'grel): gi zhal snga nas/ /phan bde'i sa bon bskrun pa'i gzhi/ /byams pa'i sa bon snying rje'i chu/ /bangs pa'i ser la byang sems kyi/ /myu gu skye 'gyur gzhan du min zhes gsung ngo/ /spros bral sgra 'gros la shar ba tsa ta la'i zhal snga nas / rno la dang? chags
104b5(rgyud 'grel): drag po'i mig /gsal dangs phyar bas bying rmugs sel/ /rtog pa chod rjes chos nyid kyis/ /rang ngo rjes kyi shes pa zin zhes gsung ngo/ /tshe 'di'i so chos zhig pa a nu si ra ra'i zhal snga nas/ res gsor brje ba dum bu'i bgros/ /lta stangs 'jog 'dor rnam
104b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis/ /rjes pas nang phrang ngos bzung bral/ /des gnyug ma yi rang ngo mthong zhes gsung ngo/ /dpa' gdeng lam du khyer ba b+hi te'i zhal snga nas/ lhan cig skyes pa seng ge'i gsang/ /smra bsam blo yi yul ma yin/ /ma skyes mi 'gag 'od gsal
104b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rang rig spros bral phyag rgya che zhes gsung ngo/ /zab mo'i chos la bzod pa ru ba ta'i zhal snga nas/ gnyug ma rang la gnas pa yi/ /ye shes khu ba 'thungs pa'i ros/ /myos pa kyang kyi spyod lam 'dzin/ /gdeng ldan 'khor ba'i g.ya' dang bral
105a1(rgyud 'grel): shes gsungs so/ /mi'i khyu mchog ta kho na ti pa'i zhal snga nas/ sna tshogs rkyen las shar ba yi/ /snang ba'i chos rnams stong pa las/ /ma 'das rang gi ngo bos dben/ /gnyis med de ni phyag rgya che zhes gsung ngo/ /gtsang rmed rab ?
105a2(rgyud 'grel): gi spyod pa can big ma'i zhal snga nas/ /dngos po sna tshogs sems nyid do/ /snang ba las ni gzhan 'gyur pa'i/ /phyi rol don ni yod ma yin/ /chu bo'i mthong snang de yis shes zhes gsung ngo/ /bdag nyid chen po a lu ka'i zhal snga nas/ gdol pa'i lag na mtshon
105a3(rgyud 'grel): thogs bzhin/ /tsandA? la yi rtog pa 'joms/ /bde gsal pheng gis bzung pa yis/ /dri med dangs ma sems la 'phel zhes gsung ngo/ /khong? gi sgra sgrogs ma b+hi tu ra'i zhal snga nas/ bung ba'i sgra skad phed gi dbyangs/ /dpal gyi be'u'i nang na sgrogs/ /
105a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di yis bzung 'dzin rtog pa 'jom/ /sems pa'i 'od zer yid pham byed ces gsung ngo/ /lta stangs lam du khyer ba la bya de ba'i zhal snga nas/ /srid gsum mi g.yo ye shes kyi/ /skye ba'i zhing ni bcing ba'i bdan/ /phra rags gcod pa kar na/ /
105a5(rgyud 'grel): dpal gyis rdo rje'i mig las 'khrungs zhes gsung ngo/ /cho ga'i brtson 'grus can su ka ma li'i zhal snga nas/ g.yas su mnyam par bzhag nas ni/ /de yi thugs rjes g.yon du bzung/ /mdun du rnam par lta pa ni/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ces gsung ngo/ /mi
105a6(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa'i mdangs der ldan pa ratna a ling gi zhal snga nas/ thabs kyis ma chun shes rab kyis/ /lam mi 'dod de shes rab kyis/ /ma zin thabs kyang de bzhin no/ /gnyis 'joms mkha' ldid gshog pa 'dra zhes gsung do/ /sbyangs pa'i las ?
105a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zhal snga nas/ thabs kyi gzhu la shes rab mnga' / /ma bral dad pas bskul pa yi/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags pas/ /dam pa gnyis ni thob par byed ces gsung ngo/ /'gyu ba bstod la gnon pa kaM pa la'i zhal snga nas/ rig pa sor
105b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhag rgyal ba 'dzin/ /dar med rlung gis 'pho rgod 'dul/ /shes pa gzengs smad rma bya'i mig /don gyi gnad rig der 'dzin pas/ /dam pa gnyis ni thob par byed ces gsung ngo/ /nga rgyal lam du slong ba mo ku ma si ta mo'i zhal snga nas/ mdun du
105b2(rgyud 'grel): zug pas rtsa ba zin/ /blug pa'i lta stangs rkyen mi g.yo/ /mthong mthod rma byas gzhan snang 'gags/ /shes pa chog tshugs mi rdog lam zhes gsung ngo/ /bsod nams kyi tshogs lam du khyer ba'i DA? kis ma'i zhal snga nas/ dus med zhabs la
105b3(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen bkur ba'i/ /rnam par smin pa skar mnga' bzhin/ /ma rig mun sel sprin bral lam/ /der ni dpal gyi be'u mthong zhes gsung ngo/ /sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa b+ha ri d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas/ mchog gi nor bu rin po che/ /yid la dran pa tsam gyis kyang//
105b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i rgyun chags rab bcom nas/ /bla med byang chub thob par byed ces gsung ngo/ /'khrul pa rkyen thog tu grol ba b+ha do de ba'i zhal snga nas/ rtog pa thug phrad yul mi dmigs/ /shes pa soms 'gul pa sel/ /rig pa yul rjes mi 'brang ba'o/ /tsheg?
105b5(rgyud 'grel): chod ye shes skye ba'i rten zhes gsung/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes khang du chud pa mo su ri saM g+ha pa'i zhal snga nas/ dran snang tshig chod so ma'i rtsal/ /'khrul pa'i snang ba thug phrang sel/ /dmigs med rten bral 'dzin pa'i rten/ /rig pa song? bzhag rgyal ba
105b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin ces gsung ngo/ /'dod pa'i blo log tanda pa'i zhal snga nas/ bsgrub pa 'dod blo mi zhuD pa'i/ /dmigs med 'khor gsum dag pa'i lam/ /'bras bu re ltos bdud kyi yul/ /mchog don spu ris med pas 'grub ces gsung ngo/ /sgyu lus kyi rnal 'byor ma kun
105b7(rgyud 'grel): d+ha la'i zhal snga nas/ 'khrul 'khor las dang shing gi mi/ /bya pa rnams las 'dod pa med/ /de bzhin 'dod pa'i blo bral pa/ /'dzin med skyes pa 'phags pa'i lam zhes gsung ngo/ /nam mkha' lam du khyer ba ku ku ri pa'i zhal snga nas/ nam mkha' i bdud rtsi byung ba yis/ /
106a1(rgyud 'grel): grub mdza' i 'dod pa ji snyed tshim/ /ma bcos rnal ma'i steng du ni/ /rig pa mdung tshugs 'dzin rtog grol zhes gsung ngo/ /yongs su mthar phyin pa'i brtson 'grus can badzra bim la'i zhal snga nas/ shes pa tha mal yul mi
106a2(rgyud 'grel): dmigs/ /gnyug ma'i ngo bo 'dzin rtog mer/ /zhen men rang grol ngo bo gshis/ /rnal 'byor ma yi gzigs mo sa zhes gsung ngo/ /rnal 'byor bsu ka d+ha nu'i zhal snga nas/ 'gron bu'i spyan gyis dri med 'dzin/ /snang ba bcud la bor ba yis/ /rang
106a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid nyams myong 'gyur med gsal/ /ngo bo mthong tshe rang snang grol zhes gsung ngo/ /'od gsal rang ngo phrad pa d+harma b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas/ sems nyid 'od gsal dngos po'i don/ /rang bzhin ngo bos sangs rgyas rgyu/ /dmigs med gdod nas dag pa yi//
106a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes de mthong ma rig sel zhes gsung ngo/ /du ma ro gcig gi rnal 'byor pa b+ha ta li'i zhal snga nas/ ngo bo spros bral dri ma med/ /'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas/ /shel sgong 'dam gyis gos pa bzhin/ /glo bur 'khrul pa'i rtogs pas 'gribs
106a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsung ngo/ /mnyam gzhag dangs pa ma ti ba'i zhal snga nas/ snying gi dbus su dran pa'i gling/ /pha wang mig gis rab tu 'dzin/ /yul snang mi dmigs phra rags 'gags/ /ma bcos rang lugs spros bral lam zhes gsung ngo/ /yon tan mngon par grub
106a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bsam gtan dang ldan pa ma a re ta la'i zhal snga nas/ ka ra na bcings lcags sgrog gis/ /srid pa gsum po g.yo mi 'gyur/ /rgyal po btson du gzung ba yis/ /'bangs rnams 'phra bar mi nus so zhes gsung ngo/ /yul snang sgyu mar ngos
106a7(rgyud 'grel): zin pa a b+hi ta'i zhal snga nas/ rus sbal mig gis rnam rtog bcad/ /de dus chos rnams nam mkha' i ngang/ /rjes thob yul snang rang bzhin med/ /bden med mthong bas 'khrul pa grol zhes gsung ngo/ /ting 'dzin zas kyis 'tsho ba'i rnal 'byor
106b1(rgyud 'grel): ma tsan+d+ra bi ma la'i zhal snga nas/ gyen gyi lta stangs tshangs pa'i gsang/ /dbang po rang snang phyag rgya che/ /chos nyid ngo bo thabs kyis zin/ /spros bral 'char ba yi ge'i gnad ces gsung ngo/ /gzhan don la bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba sa ha la'i zhal snga
106b2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /pha dang ma ru ma gyur pa'i/ /srid pa gsum na sems can med/ /bde med 'khor par gnas pa la/ /snying rje mi skye smyon pa yin zhes gsung ngo/ /sgrub pa lhur 'dzin mo ru rus ka'i zhal snga nas/ spros bral 'chang ba gsang gi gnang/ /
106b3(rgyud 'grel): 'phags lam gzhung ni byang chub sems/ /gzhan don lhur blangs rang don rdzogs/ /'di la dngos grub nye bar gnas zhes gsung ngo/ /rtsa rlung las su rung ba ni la pa'i zhal snga nas/ dran rtog 'od gsal la bcings pas/ /rang rig ye shes
106b4(rgyud 'grel): lnga yi mdangs/ /sa chu me rlung nam mkha' yi/ /snang ba rgyu lam 'bras bu'i rtags zhes gsung ngo/ /mi g.yo pa'i bsam gtan dz+nyA na d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas/ dangs ma'i 'od zer du bar snang/ /smig rgyu ltar snang bde pa'i 'od/ /gsal ba srin bu 
106b5(rgyud 'grel): me khyer 'od/ /mi rtog 'od zer mkha' ltar snang zhes gsung ngo/ /de kho na nyid rab tu snang ba rdo rje'i mgur las gser gyi nyi ma rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag in+d+ra po
106b6(rgyud 'grel): d+hi'i zhal snga nas/ 'dod chags kyis ni bde ba 'dzin/ /zhe sdang gis ni gsal ba spor/ /gti mug gis ni mi rtog 'bebs/ /nga rgyal phrag dog yon tan rgyu zhes gsung ngo/ /lha'i rgyal po de bar mi'i zhal snga nas/ grong khyer rnams kyi mi gtsang
106b7(rgyud 'grel): lung/ /zhing la 'bru rnams bskyed par byed/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor rgyud la ni/ /nyon mongs kyis ni ye shes 'phel/ /snang ba rang grol de ltos dang zhes gsung ngo/ /gsang sbyod mthar phyin me go ba'i zhal snga nas/ /mchog gi dngos grub sbas pa'i
107a1(rgyud 'grel): lam/ ma gsang bgegs chen skye bar 'gyur/ /gang 'dir mngon sum med pa'i gzugs/ /rtogs pa gong du 'phel bar 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /nyin mtshams med pa lce sbyar gi spyod pa can a nu sh+rI'i zhal snga nas//
107a2(rgyud 'grel): lha yi thig le ma bstan par/ /phyag rgya'i 'od zer phyir mi spro/ /rigs ngan gdol ba'i spyod lam gyis/ /bdud rtsi 'thungs na bcud du 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /na phal rtogs pa shar ba ko ta ri tog tse ba'i zhal snga nas/ rtog pa spang bar mi bya'o/ /mi mthun
107a3(rgyud 'grel): lam du bslang ba yis/ /'gal ba'i rgyan rnams grogs su 'char/ /thabs 'dis gnyen po'i bya ba stor zhes gsung ngo/ /e baM gi glu len pa de ba su ka'i zhal snga nas/ ji ltar nags la mched pa'i me/ /rlung gis rab tu sber ba ltar/ /brtan pa thob pa'i rnal
107a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor la/ /de tshe rkyen ngan grogs su 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /sems can don byed kyi bsam gtan dang ldan pa d+ha ra ni'i zhal snga nas/ yid kyi yul du gyur pa yi/ /blo snang ri mo subs pa'i rjes/ /dran pas ma gos spu ris gral/ /dangs ma'i ye shes
107a5(rgyud 'grel): 'char ba'i sa zhes gsung ngo/ /dus skad cig mas 'das pa rtogs pa shar ba dza land+ha ra'i zhal snga nas/ mi rtog spros bral 'dus ma byas/ /rang bzhin med pas skye 'gag bral/ /gnyis snang grol ba'i de nyid ni/ /gnyug ma lhan cig skyes pa'i
107a6(rgyud 'grel): dang? zhes gsung ngo/ /dga' ba'i mdangs ldan ma pi ka su ri'i zhal snga nas/ ma bcos shes rab 'byung ba'i sa/ /gnyis snang rkyen dang bral ba'i dbus/ /mtshan ma rang sar grol ba de?/ /bran pa rjed mtshams su ma bu phrad ces gsung/ /bya ba'i rnal 'byor
107a7(rgyud 'grel): par ? pa'i zhal snga nas/ dngos rnams sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te/ /phug khrus tshe 'di'i mngon zhen bzlog/ bden 'dzin grol ba 'khrul lam chad/ /nges ni ye shes 'bar bar byed ces gsung ngo/ /phrag dog lam du slong ba mo dza ki ri'i zhal snga nas/
107b1(rgyud 'grel): ngal pa don med tshe 'di'i ched/ /rtsol sgrub tshi chad sdug bsngal rgyu/ /don dam spyod lam ma spangs pa'i/ /'khrul pa ldog par mi 'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo/ /'ching ba las grol ba d+harmA pa'i zhal snga nas/ chos rnams ngo bo gzhi rtsa bral/ /gnyug ma
107b2(rgyud 'grel): ? rtog pa yi/ /'dam gyis ma gos dangs pa'i dang/ /gnas lugs snang stong rkyen dang bral zhes gsung ngo/ /thos pa shes rab can dzo ki a ling gi zhal snga nas/ sna tshogs rang bzhin med pa'i gshis/ /der ni gzhi lam 'bras gsum mnyam/ /
107b3(rgyud 'grel): snang ba med pa'i chos nyid ni/ /de ni snang ba rang gis bstan ces gsung ngo/ /thugs rje'i rgyan dang ldan pa gser gling pa'i zhal snga nas/ 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster ba yi/ /yid bzhin nor 'dra byang chub sems/ /sangs rgyas ma bcos lhun grub sku/ /'gro ba
107b4(rgyud 'grel): kun la rang bzhin gnas zhes gsung ngo/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes khong du chud pa pad+ma bi ma la'i zhal snga nas/ rtogs pa'i bum pa bzang po nas/ /ched 'dzin rtsol pa ma byas pa'i/ /chos kyi sku dang gzugs sku gnyis/ /rang gzhan don du dang gis 'byung
107b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsung ngo/ /dran pa so la 'jog pa d+hoka ri pa'i zhal snga nas/ rkyen phyir mi 'brang tshangs pa'i spyan/ /dran pa sor bzhag der 'dzin bral/ /yengs pa'i shes pas yul mi 'dzin/ /ka ra na bcings pa'i ba'i stan gsung ngo/ /'od gsal gyi rnal
107b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma karma sid+d+hi'i zhal snga nas / 'jig rten gsum bdag gyen la blta/ /rdo rje gtsug tor spros bral dang/ /dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya che/ /dbang po rang snang de ltos dang zhas gsung ngo/ /rgyud rnam pa bzhi yis grol bas ga dza'i zhal snga nas/
107b7(rgyud 'grel): thos pas grol ba tshig gi gnang/ /mthong pas tshog pa don gyi gnad/ /'dra men ma zhugs sing ge'i gsang/ /ru dra'i sel med smin rjes grol zhes gsung ngo/ /bsam pa'i shes pa can sa li ta su ka'i zhal snga nas/ snang la rang bzhin med pa'i sgra/ /snying la
108a1(rgyud 'grel): zhen pa 'khrul pa 'jig /sgyu ma'i mtshang rig bden 'dzin bral/ /gser lar med 'dod dgur bsgyur zhes gsung ngo/ /grub chen brgyad ldan me di na'i zhal snga nas/ byas pa don med sdug bsngal gyi/ /khung bor bde 'dod thar
108a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lam/ /sgrub pa nan tan dngos grub rgyu/ /yun du bsrings na mngon du 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /ngag rnam par dben pa'i rnal 'byor ma a nu ki ri'i zhal snga nas/ rtsol sgrub mi chad 'bras bu stor/ /chu la thug srub thon mi bya/ /gser mtshon mthong
108a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sa la ni/ /ngal dub spangs na mngon du 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /rtogs pa'i ye shes dbang nyams las shar ba g+ha d+ha pa'i zhal snga nas/ ma bcos zla ba ches pa'i spyan/ /rnam pa'i lta stangs spros dang bral/ /'jam pa'i rlung bzung gnyug ma'i dang//
108a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rgyud la 'chang bar byed ces gsung ngo/ /bde chen zung 'jug gi rnal 'byor ma su ni d+ha di'i zhal snga nas/ zhun thang 'byongs pas 'phro rgod 'dul/ /nges ni dangs gsal dri med 'dzin/ /phra rags mi mthong zla tshes mig /yul snang ma gzigs 'dzin
108a5(rgyud 'grel): rtog bral zhes gsung ngo/ /bden pa gzigs pa a dzu ba'i zhal snga nas/ bla mas ngo sprad gnyug ma'i don/ /rgyud la 'jug pa byin brlabs mthu/ /rtogs na yon tan kun gyi gzhi/ /'di yis sa lam 'khor los stung zhes gsung ngo/ /bsgom pa'i shes rab sh+rI
108a6(rgyud 'grel): a pa ka'i zhal snga nas/ khyung ni ma yi me drod kyis/ /shin tu sgo nga rgyas par byed/ /dbugs kyang rgya las grol la khang/ /bya phrug nam 'phang gcod par 'gyur/ zhes gsung ngo/ /rtog pa mkha' 'gro brda las byung ba ka ba la'i zhal snga nas/ ji ltar dra ba dbang
108a7(rgyud 'grel): po'i gzhu/ /mkha' la shar ba 'byung pa'i dangs/ /snang la rang bzhin med pa'i bdag /'di yis chos rnams rang mchan bsten ces gsung ngo/ /sems la dbang thob pa'i rnal 'byor ma b+hi nu ka ri'i zhal snga nas/ sna tshogs snang ba dngos po'i chos/ /rang rig ngo bo rnam par
108b1(rgyud 'grel): dben/ /ji ltar chu nang zla ba bzhin/ /khong du chud pas 'khrul pa 'jig ces gsung ngo/ /lta stangs lam du 'khyer ba kun d+ha ri'i zhal snga nas/ rno ngar chags pa khyab 'jug mig /rkyen la gzigs pa gnyis snang 'joms/ /yul snang ma mthong
108b2(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' dbyings/ /der 'dzin grol bas spros dang bral zhes gsung ngo/ /snang ba sgyu mar 'byongs pa legs smin ka ra'i zhal snga nas/ ku ma ri yi rnam pa la/ /ma gnyis mtshungs par bsnol mang blta/ /steng dang 'og gi rnam pa ni/ /de dus gang yang
108b3(rgyud 'grel): mthang mi 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /thos pas mdza' chod pa k+Sha na'i zhal snga nas/ nges pa'i don mthong sgro 'dogs chod/ /mos gus phyin ci ma log pa'i/ /blo la khams rnams dang gis 'du/ /gcig la yon tan kun mdza' yas/ zhes gsung ngo/ /
108b4(rgyud 'grel): rang gi skyon bcud pa la mkhas pa mo su ka b+hi ru'i zhal snga nas/ thos dang sgom dang bsam pa'i mdza' / /rig pa bsnyems dang bral bas 'bad/ /de la rgyu ni yid ches te/ /rtsa ba mes gus mchog las byung zhes gsung ngo/ /rang gnas kyi ye shes ngos
108b5(rgyud 'grel): zin pa ku li ba'i zhal snga nas/ sor bzhag dus gsum chig chod kyi/ /snang phyir mi 'brang dus gsum grol/ /rnal ma'i rang khang spros bral 'dzin/ /ma bcos pa ni chos kyi sku zhes gsung ngo/ /ched du mi 'dzin smyon lta bu'i rnal 'byor ma dz+nyA na b+hi nu'i
108b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal snga nas/ rma bya rgya ru chud pa bzhin/ /rig pa sol bzhag pa yis/ /bde ba bsal ba sgrog tu 'jug /rnam rtog rlung gis bskyong mi 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /rtogs pa'i ye shes dbang nyams la shar pa dza ya na ti'i zhal snga nas/ ma yengs rig pa dran
108b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rtsis/ /spyod 'gros bzhi la bzung pa yis/ /bden bzang? ba don gyi gsang/ /mthong bas 'khrul pa yul la 'jig ces gsung ngo/ /ka ki dung 'bung ma a u da ra'i zhal snga nas/ mchog don dran pa la ma chags/ /yengs pa'i sems la de nyid stong//
109a1(rgyud 'grel): gang la rang bzhin med pa yi/ /mtshang brjed 'khrul pa'i dri ma 'go /zhes gsung ngo/ /rtogs pa glegs bam bltas pa la shar ba rtsa ba ri'i zhal snga nas/ yi ge bzhi yi bka' rgyud khrol/ /thub pa'i spyod lam rnam gsum gyis//
109a2(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs lung gi brgyud pa zin/ /gnad rig gsang pa'i gter mdzod rtol zhes gsung ngo/ /sems 'jug par byed pa la mkhas pa mo ku la tsanda'i zhal snga nas/ bdag med don mthong yul nges der/ /chos rnams ma lus zad pa'i sa/ /
109a3(rgyud 'grel): rig byed 'dzin pa bram ze'i bu/ /gsang tshig pha yi gsung las rnyed ces gsung ngo/ /phra rags gcad pas tsam pa ka'i zhal snga nas/ rtsa dang rlung ngang rig byed gsum/ /shes pa lung khyer spros bral gyis/ /steng du bcings pa gsang gi gsang/ /
109a4(rgyud 'grel): gshig rjes bde gsal mi rtog 'char zhes gsung ngo/ /snying rje'i mdangs ldan ma sh+rI sid+d+ha'i zhal snga nas / bde dang stong pa gsal ba'i nyams/ /rtogs pa'i g.yo 'gul las grol ba/ /rig pa tshig tshugs lam khyer gyi/ /lta stangs dor shul spros bral
109a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ zhes gsung ngo/ /'gro rnams gzigs pa'i ri'i zhal snga nas/ gnyis med gnyis su snang ba yi/ /blo de 'khrul pa'i snang ba ste/ /'di yis srid pa'i nyid mtshams sbyor/ /snang pa rang grol de ltos dang zhes gsung ngo/ /zung 'jug gi rnal 'byor ma d+ha ri
109a6(rgyud 'grel): su ka'i zhal snga nas/ ma dag dri ma can gyi blo/ /nya byis 'od kyi snang ba la/ /dngul 'dzin shes pa skyes pa'i tshe/ /nya phyis dbul gyis stong par byos zhes gsung ngo/ /de kho na nyid rab tu snang ba rdo rje'i mgur las/ ye shes kyi mdangs rnam par dangs pa zhes
109a7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //spu ris yid la mi byed gtum ma la'i zhal snga nas/ yul gyis ma bslad so ma'i dang/ /mdzod sbu'i bar na dbang po dangs/ /snang ba rang grol yi ge mig /'di yis yid la byed pa 'jig/
109b1(rgyud 'grel): ces gsung ngo/ /myur du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i thabs la mkhas pa me ti ta'i zhal snga nas/ yul gyi gsal cha ma 'gags la/ /shes pa der 'dzin bral ba can/ /rtog pa'i 'phan la rnam grol ba/ /smin ma'i mtshams na rab tu gnas
109b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsung ngo/ /snang ba dpe char shar ba me kha la'i zhal snga nas/ lam la gang phan rten 'brel 'gros/ /'di la gdams ngag yul gyis ston/ /tshogs drug dpe char shar ba yi/ /rtogs pa'i rkyen bskul snang bas byed ces gsung ngo/ /chos kyi
109b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyings kyi ye shes thugs su chud pa mo b+hi ma la si ti'i zhal snga nas/ lam gyi grogs su 'gyur ba ni/ /gcig tu nges pa ma yin te/ /rtogs pa'i rten du gang gyur pa/ /de ni las kyi phyag rgya yin zhes gsung ngo/ /dmigs med nyams su myong ba ka li ba'i zhal snga nas/
109b4(rgyud 'grel): mnyam bzhag mi bskyar gshig rjes blta/ /dmigs bral shes pa 'dzin las grol/ /de tshe dus kyi rjes mi 'brang/ /rnam rtog chos nyid dang du grol zhes gsung ngo/ /gti mug lam slongs pa mo b+ha la ta'i zhal snga nas/ bying rgod bya ras ma slebs pa'i/ /
109b5(rgyud 'grel): gsal dangs phyed pa'i 'phro la gshig /rjes srong pa ni bsgom gyi gnang/ /'di yis phra rags dri ma sems zhes gsung ngo/ /brda la go ba longs pa ka na pa'i zhal snga nas/ rtsa ba rang ngo brda yis rtogs/ /nges pa bla ma'i gsung las skyes/ /don mthong bas ni sgro
109b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dogs tshod/ /mkha' 'gro mthu yis bar tshong sel zhes gsung ngo/ /rang gi tshig rgyun tu byed pa'i smon lam la gnas pa mo lo ha ri su ka'i zhal snga nas/ yang dag don la yi ge med/ /smra bsam brjod pa'i yul las 'das/ /bla ma'i brda thabs che ba yis/ /rtags
109b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'char sgo 'byed par 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /rtogs pa gru gzo las bkan ti ba'i zhal snga nas/ dmigs pa ma bcas blo rten zhig /mtshan ma rang grol sgom dang bral/ /'dzin med spros bral rnam rtog nub/ /nyams len grol bas grol ba thob ces gsung ngo//
110a1(rgyud 'grel): sems rnam par dben pa'i rnal 'byor ma sh+ri ma nu da'i zhal snga nas/ blo rtog ma zhugs tha mal gyi/ /shes pa de nyid gnyug ma yi/ /rang? kha bcas bslad dang bral ba/ /khang?  ma du mdo sgom dang bral gsung ngo//
110a2(rgyud 'grel): rang rig blo rten dang bral ba dbu pa ri'i zhal snga nas/ chos rnams gzhi yis stong ba'i sar/ /shes pa yul med blo rten shig /dbyings der rtogs pa'i rtsa ba bral/ /yid la mi byed blo las 'das/ zhes gsung ngo/ /gnyis med ye shes kyi rnal
110a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma ki? karha ri'i zhal snga nas/ thog ma tha ma dbus mi dmigs/ /rig pa mkha' lding rten mi tshol/ /rtsa bral nam mkha' i rjes thob can/ /bsam med nyams myong dmigs dang bral/ zhes gsung ngo/ /rnam rtog gzhi med du mthong ba u ti
110a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zhal snga nas/ chos rnams gzhi med skye 'gag grol/ /rtog bral blo yis ma gos pa/ /dri med mtshan ma rang sar dengs/ /rig pa gcer pu de ltos dang zhes gsung ngo/ /sems kyi don dang rjes su 'brel bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi mdzod 'dzin ma sh+ri?  si
110a5(rgyud 'grel): mu pa'i zhal snga nas/ rig pa bsgrims nas glod pa yi/ /dang der phra rags rtog pa yal/ /spu ris med pa dran med dbyings/ /dri med ye shes 'char ba'i sa zhes gsung ngo/ /gnyug ma srangs su chud pa kaM pa la'i zhal snga nas/ yul gyi gsal chim
110a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gags pa'i/ /shes pa der 'dzin bral pa'i gnas/ /rtog pa'i yal sa sna yi rtse/ /ma yengs srangs der ye shes 'char zhes gsung ngo/ /smon lam la gnas pa mo na du ti'i zhal snga nas/ ma skyes pa la 'chi ba med/ /chos rnams rang gi ngo bos dben/ /ma?
110a7(rgyud 'grel): dran pa la rjed pa med/ /blo yi mdza' grol yid byed bral zhes gsung ngo/ /ngo sprad gnad la phog pa d+ha ka ri'i zhal? snga nas/ yid la mi byed gnyug ma'i lam/ /spu ris ma dmigs rtog pa char/ /blo rten dri me srid la dag /rnam rtog chos nyid dang du grol zhes gsung ngo//
110b1(rgyud 'grel): chos brgyad dang bral ba mo sh+rI? d+ha na'i zhal snga nas/ sna tshogs yul snang gzhi med du/ /phug khrus 'khrul pa yul las ldog/ yengs med nam mkha' mdung thugs? kyi/ /srangs der rtog pa skye lam chad gsung ngo/ /rtog pa'i dri ma dag pa sa ba ka ra pa'i zhal
110b2(rgyud 'grel): snga nas/ rtog pa grol ba'i rjes thob ni/ /yid kyi spu ris ngos bzung bral/ /dmigs med ngang der blo mdza' grol/ /gnyug ma ngos bzung med par sangs zhes gsung ngo/ /'khrul pa'i sgrog grol ba mo su ka si ti'i zhal snga nas/ tshogs drug yul du ma
110b3(rgyud 'grel): spyad pa'i/ /dran med mya ngan 'das ba'i lam/ /rnam par mi rtog chos kyi dbyings/ /yid dang bral bas phyag rgya che zhes gsung ngo/ /chags sdang grol ba sarba b+ha ka la'i zhal snga nas/ bzung 'dzin lam gyis pon gyi/ /de nyid skye ba med pa'i dang//
110b4(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams rtsa bral gzhi yis stong/ /gnyis snang grol bas 'khor 'das med/ ces gsung ngo/ /sangs rgyas zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'i smon lam la gnas pa mo badzra ha lu'i zhal snga nas/ rig ba bsgrims nas glod pa yis/ /dang der yin
110b5(rgyud 'grel): 'pham sems dal sos/ /rtog pa chos nyid dang du brol/ /de yis ye shes lnga rdzogs byed ces gsung ngo/ /gdams pa lha ya gsan pa kaM pa la'i zhal snga nas/ rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin ni/ /ngo bo chos sgur grol gyur kyang/ /skye bos mthong
110b6(rgyud 'grel): bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rang gsal thabs kyis chod pa? ni/ /bla ma dus thabs brten pas rig ces gsung ngo/ /rtog bral ro'i spyod pa can pu tra la'i zhal snga nas/ 'jig rten bde sdug skyes pa'i rgyu/ /de ni las yin sems la bsags/ /de yi ngo bo yid kyis
110b7(rgyud 'grel): las/ rig pa sems nyid gdong nas dag /ces gsung ngo/ /las kyi sa bon bsregs ba su ka to'i zhal lnga nas /yengs na gnas pa'i bar du ni/ /rig pa so zin dran pa 'khyim/ /ngo bo 'dzin rtog las grol ba/ /blo yi snang ba gzhi rtsa bral gsung ngo/ /
111a1(rgyud 'grel): ha ha ha'i gang rgyangs? can a ha ri'i zhal snga nas/ 'khor ba spangs pa'i pha rol na/ /mya ngan 'das pa yod ma yin/ /'khor ba rang bzhin med pa yi/ /mtshang de mya ngan 'das pa'o zhes gsung ngo/ /'gro ba thugs rjes 'dzin
111a2(rgyud 'grel): pa nA ga po d+hi'i zhal snga nas/ ngo bo ci yang snang ba ste/ /rang bzhin cing yang ma yin/ /mtshan nyid gzhi rtsa bral ba can/ /skye med ngo bo nyid ltos dang zhes gsung ngo/ /las dang 'jug pa'i stobs dang ldan pa mo shI si ti'i zhal snga nas/ dran
111a3(rgyud 'grel): nas brjod pa'i mtshams de na/ /blo dang bral ba'i ye shes gnas/ /rkyen bral dbus na rab tu 'ging/ /de mthong na ni grol bar 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /bden 'dzin mi rten ma dbang na'i zhal snga nas/ yul snang dkar dmar sna tshogs la/ /rkyen
111a4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pha rol na/ /don de yod pa ma yin no/ /zhes gsung ngo/ /blo'i mdza' grol ba ra ha ma'i zhal snga nas/ ma skyes dngos gzhi rtsa ba bral/ /gzhi med blo 'das de kho na/ /dran med dbyings na gnas pa ni/ /dangs ma rkyen gyis bslang mi bya zhes gsung ngo/ /
111a5(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs pa mi sdung par byed pa'i stobs dang ldan pa mo ta di la'i zhal snga nas/ tshogs drug ji ltar shar gyur kyang/ /bden 'dzin bcad pas bag chags zhi/ /'khrul pa'i rgyu grol las mi sogs/ /'khor ba rang sar grol bar 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /
111a6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo rdo rje a ka ra'i zhal snga nas/ 'khor bar skye ba'i rgyu de las/ /de ni nyon mongs pas bskyed de/ /nyon mongs yid yin gzhi rtsa bral/ /de mthong srid pa'i 'khor lo 'jig /ces gsung ngo/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi 'od nang ldan pa mo sh+rI pa ra na'i zhal sa? nas/
111b1(rgyud 'grel): skye med dang la sna tshogs shar/ /shar ba de nyid skye med las/ /ma 'das chu dang 'khyab pa bzhin/ /dbyer med rtogs na phyag rgya che zhes gsung ngo/ /snang ba'i rang mtshan gzigs pa la lan ta'i zhal snga nas /gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong pa ste/ /rang bzhin
111b2(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i chos rnams la/ /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /rmi lam du yang ma mthong ngo/ /zhes gsung ngo/ /mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa mo ta pa sa ri'i zhal snga nas/ ma dang sring mo'i pu mo yi/ /tha dad sgo nas bos pa'i ming/ /'gro ba bzang mo'i ngo bo
111b3(rgyud 'grel): was/ /ma gyur pa 'di ngo mtshar yul zhes gsung ngo/ /rtsol ba dang bral pa sa mu dra'i zhal snga nas/ mthun 'jug bkrol ba'i rjes de la/ /snang pa rtsa bral mtshan ma grol/ /'dzin med rang gi blo rten zhig /ma byas shes pa de ltos shig ces gsung ngo/ /bdud
