111b4(rgyud 'grel): dang gzhan smra bar byed pas mi tshungs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa mo/ /bi ma si ta'i zhal snga nas/ 'jig rten sna tshogs las las byung/ /sna tshogs rang gi ngo bos stong/ /rgya mtsho nang gi gza' skar bzhin/ /bden par 'dzin pa 'khrul pa'i blo/ /zhes gsung
111b5(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams rang bzhin med par shes pa bya tri pa'i zhal snga nas/ nyams su myong bas ngos bzung bral/ /sems nyid rtsa bral deng ngos zin/ /sna tshogs snang la rang bzhin med/ /chos rnams gzhi med der ngos zin/ zhes gsung ngo/ /rnam par rtog pa 'bigS
111b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa mo rat na sid+d+hi'i zhal snga nas / gzugs ni dri za'i grong khyer 'dra/ /sgra rnams brag ca'i rnam pa can/ /yid ni rmi lam 'phar ma bzhin/ /rang bzhin gang yang ma mthong ngo zhes gsung ngo/ /thabs las mi mnga' ba'i ye shes can
111b7(rgyud 'grel): dz+nya na ki'i zhal snga nas/ dmigs pas bzung ba yid kyi las/ /gshig pas dangs ma gsal bar 'gyur/ /dper na 'phrul gyi me long bzhin/ /blo 'dzin dri ma brten mi bya zhes gsung ngo/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa la rang bzhin gyis goms pa'i rnal 'byor ma ?
112a1(rgyud 'grel): pa sa ri'i zhal snga nas/ lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni/ /gang gi rgyud la skyes pa'i tshe/ /nyams su myong pa brjod mi nus/ /brda yis mtshon pa thabs kyi gnad ces gsung ngo/ /ye shes kyi mdzod 'dzin ma si ra nu si'i
112a2(rgyud 'grel): zhal snga nas/ rig pa bsgrims nas glong pa yis/ /ngang der phra rags rtog pa yal/ /spu? ris med pa dran med dbyings/ /dri med ye shes 'bar ba'i sa zhes gsung ngo/ /dpal gyi mdzod 'dzin ma ra si ni'i zhal snga nas/ gnyug ma rgyud la skyes pa
112a3(rgyud 'grel): yis/ shes pa 'di 'dra brjod mi shes/ /chos rnams ngo bos dben pa yis/ /gshis de blo yi yul ma yin zhes gsung ngo/ /de kho na nyid rab tu snang ba rdo rje'i mgur las/ gzhug ma rang gi ngo bo gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ bzhi pa'o// //
112a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gyi bya ba btang zhing rgyal rigs dman pa'i sa bzung ba dA ri ka'i zhal snga nas/ 'di ltar 'di la sems gnas pa/ /de ni mnyam par bzhag pa'o/ /blo ldan dpa' bos 'dus byas dang/ /'dus ma byas kyi gnad la blta zhes gsung ngo//
112a5(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje'i dpal ldan li ta pu ki'i zhal snga nas/ kye ma mtshan ma'i 'du shes ni /gshig nas mtshan med la gnas na/ /de yis chos rnams ma lus pa /stong pa rab tu shes par 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /'jig rten gyi bya ba gnas su btang
112a6(rgyud 'grel): ba u na la na'i zhal snga nas/ gdong nas ma skyes rang gi sems/ /'od gsal ba yi rang bzhin can/ /kye ma don dam byang chub sems/ /nam mkha' dang mtshungs 'dus ma byas zhes gsung ngo/ /bde ba'i 'byung gnas ma sh+ri la li ta'i zhal snga nas/
112a7(rgyud 'grel): sgyu ma'i rta dang glang po ltar/ /snang ba'i dus na ngo pos stong/ /kye ma rnam rtog gis btags pa'i/ /zhen yul de nyid gzhi yis stong zhes gsung ngo/ /sgrol ma'i byin brlabs zhugs pa kaM pa la'i zhal snga nas/ dang po shes bya rnam rtog tu/ /ma shes
112b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba stongs mi 'gyur/ /ngo bo gzhi med rtsa ba bral/ /'di la rang bzhin yod ma yin zhes gsung ngo/ /dad pa'i stobs ma su ka ratna'i zhal snga nas/ chu shing gi ni snying po bzhin/ /chos rnams snying po med pa can/ /bdag med rtogs pa don gyi mchog/
112b2(rgyud 'grel): de mthong srid pa srul por byed ces gsung ngo/ /brda la shes rab kyi mig byed pa ka na ye na ba'i zhal snga nas /kye ma rang bzhin ma bcos pa'i/ /shes pa rang skya mi 'gyur ro/ /ma byas shes pa so ma ni/ /gnyen po ma bral lhug par gnas zhes gsung ngo//
112b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho'i mdangs len ma dz+nyA na sid+d+hi'i zhal snga nas /shes pa rten med bdag po bral/ /gcer pu blo yis ma gos pa/ /shes pa rang kha skye 'gag grol/ /rtog pa ma gos dri ma med ces gsung ngo/ /rtogs pa phyag rgya ma la shar ba a nanha'i?  zhal snga nas/
112b4(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams rang bzhin dngos med la/ /don de byis pas mi shes pas/ /rang bzhin skye ba med pa'i bdag /bla ma'i gsung las nges mthong 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /dpal gyi 'od zer 'jam pa la'i zhal snga nas / skye med mtshan ma'i dngos po yis/ /'du
112b5(rgyud 'grel): shes rnam par grol 'gyur na/ /phyi dang nang gi skye mched la/ /kun tu sbyor par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsung ngo/ /dbang la rtogs pa shar ba u ti ku pa ti'i zhal snga nas/ gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang/ /'du byed rnam par shes pa ni/ /rang gi
112b6(rgyud 'grel): ngo bos rnam par dben/ /gzhi med rtsa bral de ltos dang/ /bden pa rang 'dzin gzhi la 'jig ces gsung ngo/ /shes rab 'byung gnas ma sh+rI du ka ri'i zhal snga nas/ glo bur rkyen las skyes pa yi/ /dran rig rtog pa bden pa stong/ /'gro 'ong med pa'i 'od
112b7(rgyud 'grel): gsal la/ /'di la 'khor 'das yong re kan zhes gsung ngo/ /bdag med pas byin gyis brlabs pa sa go la pa'i zhal snga nas /dpal ldan thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /ye shes me long de ltos dang/ /'das dang ma 'ongs de ltar gyi/ /chos rnams stong par?
113a1(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /bde ba'i stobs dang ldan ma sing+ga srid da'i zhal snga nas/ kye ma yongs su skyo ba'i yid/ /ma skyes bla med mchog gi lam/ /rnyed par gyur pa ma yin pas/ /'khor pa las ni yid dbyung bya/ zhes
113a2(rgyud 'grel): gsung ngo/ /kha sarpa Ni pa bskor ba byas pas dbugs phyin pa na ri ba'i zhal snga nas/ bla ma'i brda las des snyed pas/ /des ni chos rnams stong par rig /byis bas med pa'i chos la rtog /des ni las las grol mi 'gyur/ zhes gsung ngo/ /
113a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i dug sel ma d+harma la ge'o zhal snga nas/ dngos po yi ni mtshad rig pas/ /dngos med yongs su shes par 'gyur/ /chos rnams sgyu ma'i rang bzhin las/ /ma 'das bden par 'dzin pas 'khrul zhes gsung ngo/ /'od gsal nang phrad pa tsan+ti
113a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i zhal snga nas/ 'od gsal 'gro 'ong med pa yi/ /bsam med bsgom dang bral ba ni/ /gnyug ma srang su chud pa las/ /'char 'gyur gzhan gyi sbyod yul min zhes gsung ngo/ /nor bu spyan ldan ma b+ha ra a ra li'i zhal snga nas/ sna rtser yid bcings
113a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas kyi gsang/ /ma yengs mi rtog skye ba'i sa/ /ka ran yis bde rlung bzung/ /bde chen thig le gnas par byed/ /ces gsung ngo/ /zag med bde ba la rgyal ba sh+rIk+Shu ti'i zhal snga nas/ bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du/ gser gyis rgyal ba'i mchod pa
113a6(rgyud 'grel): gub/ bla ma'i ba spu khung gcig la/ /sku mnyed song ba khyad par 'phags zhes gsung ngo/ /thugs rje'i 'od zer can su ka d+ha na'i zhal snga nas/ bsod nams til dang ri rab khyad/ /su zhig thar pa'i grong mchog 'dod/ /bla ma gtsug tu bkur bar bya/ /
113a7(rgyud 'grel): 'di brjed mchog gi dngos grub yal zhes gsung ngo/ /ma rig sgo nga'i dbugs 'byed pa'i a li ba'i zhal snga nas/ snang ba gzugs kyi ngo bos stong/ /chos rnams sgyu mar blo thag bcad/ /bden 'dzin rgyud la brten mi bya/ /grub mdza' i blta ba 'dod pa spang/ /
113b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsung ngo/ /brtson 'grus kyi stobs ldan ma ri d+ha ru'i zhal snga nas/ gang la mngon par zhen pa yi/ /blo de thod cig bdud yin no/ /gnyis snang shes pa grol gyur na/ /'khrul chos nyid dang du dangs zhes gsung ngo/ /brda? las don mthong bas 'khrul
113b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgrog gcad pa su ta la li pa'i zhal snga nas/ nyon mongs gnyen por ma song ba'i/ /chos kyis sangs lam rnyed ma yin/ /kye ma rgyud dang ma 'brel pa'i/ /blta sgom ming yin ci cir rung zhes gsung ngo/ /bsod nams kyi rgyan ldan su ri ka ri'i
113b3(rgyud 'grel): zhal snga nas/ ma bcos rnal ma'i thig le ni/ /snying la brten nas 'khrul pa 'jig /shes pa rkyen gyis mi bslad do/ /yul gyi rjes su 'brangs gyur na/ /khro bo'i rig pa rten par byed ces gsung ngo/ /dur khrod kyi keng rus mthong ba la rtogs pa shar ba kum+ba
113b4(rgyud 'grel): ri ba'i zhal snga nas/ ji ltar lha dbang brgya byin gyi/ /ming de gang la 'ongs btsal kyang/ /phyogs rnams kun nas mi rnyed ltar/ /lus la bdag kyang de bzhin no zhes gsung ngo/ /zab mo dpal gyi 'od ldan ma'i zhal snga nas/ rmi lam du yang yod pa ru/ /ma
113b5(rgyud 'grel): mthong btsal pas ma rnyed pa/ /byang chub lam yin brtag par rigs/ /bdag med sgoms dang rnal 'byor pa zhes gsung/ /lus la bdag kyang de bzhin no zhes gsung ngo/ /zab mo dpal gyi 'od ldan ma'i zhal snga nas/ /rmi lam du yang yod pa ru/ /ma/
113b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ stong nyid rig pa'i rang bzhin du/ /'dug pa nus pa'i rtsal yin te/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes zhes gsung ngo/ /thar pa'i lam ston ma dz+nyA na badzra'i zhal snga nas/ me long lta bu'i ye shes zung/ /rig dang stong pa gnyis med las/ /ma 'das pa nyid ye
113b7(rgyud 'grel): shes yin/ /gsal ba so sor rtog pa la/ /rtsal ni bya ba grub pa'o zhes gsung ngo/ /rtsa rlung las su rung ba baM pa i pa'i zhal snga nas/ chos rnams rang bzhin ngo bos stong/ /gang gis rmi lam lta bur shes/ /de la 'ching ba mdza' dag bla la/ /skye dang 'chi
114a1(rgyud 'grel): ba mi mthong ngo zhes bsung ngo/ /rtogs pa'i dpal dang ldan pa ma pa su d+hi re'i zhal snga nas/ stong pa dag kyang ma mthong ba'i/ /mig des dngos po'i gnas thabs mthong/ /'khrul snang dag pa'i dus der ni/ /sku gsum zhing
114a2(rgyud 'grel): khams 'char bar 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /gnas ngan len dang bral ba ke du a la pa'i zhal snga nas/ ji ltar deng dpon rgya mtsho las/ /ma phyin gling don mi 'grub ltar/ /'khor ba'i blo sna ma log par/ /thang pa'i lam rnyed ma yin zhes gsung ngo/
114a3(rgyud 'grel): legs pa'i 'byung nas ma su ka ku la'i zhal snga nas/ byis pa tshe 'di mig bltas nas/ /'jig rten che thabs bsgrub pa ni/ /phyi ma rnam smin sogs pa'i rgyu/ /rang mgo rang gis 'tshogs par bas zhes gsung ngo/ /rtog pa khyad par 'phags pa
114a4(rgyud 'grel): ka na pa'i zhal snga nas/ chos rnams dngos po med pa yi/ /ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes ni/ /gdod ma nas ni rang bzhin gyis/ /rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin can zhes gsung ngo/ /dpa' mo blo gros bzang mo b+ha ga d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas/ ma skyes ma
114a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gags yi ge med/ /mtshan ma med cing mtshan nyid med/ /rjes su mi mthong mi dmigs pa/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub mthong zhes gsung ngo/ /gsag spyang sngon du song pa'i rten las 'phro can tsa du ra ki pa'i zhal snga nas/ snang stong skye ba
114a6(rgyud 'grel): med pa yis/ /rkyen dang bral ba'i shes pa ni/ /blos ma byas kyi rang kha ste/ /ma bcos rnal ma spros dang bral zhes gsung ngo/ /pad+ma 'od ldan ma su d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas/ 'di la b+ha ga dang chad la sogs/ /grub mdza' i lta bas reg mi nus/ /blo 'das sma
114a7(rgyud 'grel): bar ma yul ma yin/ /yi ges stong pas ming las grol zhes gsung ngo/ /mthong lam ye shes rgyud la shar ba'i man pa'i zhal snga nas/ chos rnams dngos po med pa las/ /byung ba ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /ltos dang skal ldan rigs kyi bu/ /mthong na mchog gi
114b1(rgyud 'grel): skal bar ldan zhes gsung ngo/ /bde ba'i 'od 'joms sh+rI sa pa ri'i zhal snga nas/ nges par yang dag brtan gyur pa/ 'di ni lam gyi dam pa ste/ /spangs pa mthar thug sangs rgyas kyi/ /ye shes bla med yongs rdzogs byed ces gsung ngo/ /ma dang pa snang
114b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur nus pa kan pa'i zhal snga nas /skye bo 'khru pa'i ngo gang la/ /'khor ba rang rgyud pa ru snang/ /de ni 'phags pa'i snang ba la/ /sgyu ma tsam du rab tu gzigs zhes gsung ngo/ /bzang mo dge ba'i 'od ldan su ka d+ha ri'i zhal snga nas/ rnal 'byor
114b3(rgyud 'grel): ba yi snang ba la/ /bden brdzun gnyis snang grol ba yis/ /'khor ba mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ gzod nas zhi zhing dag ba'i dbyings zhes gsung ngo/ /gnyid kyi sgrib pa dag pa o da rtsing ba'i zhal snga nas/ mkha' la zla ba chu nang du/ /nam du yang ni
114b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phos pa med/ /chu zla rang gi ngo bos stod/ /chos rnams dar shes 'khrul pa 'jig ces gsung ngo/ /rid pa'i rgyal mo a su d+ha la'i zhal snga nas/ yod pa dang ni med pa yi/ /blo 'dzin de ni dri ma ste/ /rnal 'byor mdza' gnyis rnam spangs la/
114b5(rgyud 'grel): dbus la gnas par mi bya'o zhes gsung ngo/ /de kho na nyid rab tu snang ba rdo rje'i mgur las/ snying gi me long rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ lnga pa'o// //drod kyi ye shes thob pa po d+hi bi ba'i zhal snga nas/
114b6(rgyud 'grel): skye bo 'khrul pa ma khebs pas/ /gzung 'dzin gnyis su lta ba'o/ /sems byung de yi khams kyis ni/ /mtshan nyid bzung bas log rtog khegs zhes gsung ngo/ /shes rab kyi stobs ldan ma d+hi ra d+ha la'i zhal snga nas/ rtog pas bzung bas skyem med? kyi
114b7(rgyud 'grel): ? dbye dbang po rnam lnga shar/ /de yis yul la zhugs gyur pas/ /dug lnga skyes nas las bsags pas/ /srid pa'i 'khor lo grub par byas zhes gsung ngo/ /'jigs pa lnga dang bral ba seng ge ba'i zhal snga nas/ ji ltar mun pa'i rgya ? ni/ /skad
115a1(rgyud 'grel): byed nyi mas gsal ba ltar/ /spros med lhan cig skyes pa yis/ /dang der chos rnams dag par 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /byin brlabs kyi dpal ldan ma su ka ta'i zhal snga nas/ chu 'dzin dag ni nam mkha' la/ /dangs tshe gud
115a2(rgyud 'grel): na yib min ltar/ /mtshan ma rang sar grol ba yi/ /dbyings na 'khor ba yod ma yin zhes gsung ngo/ /gnyis 'dzin mdud pa khrol ba ki la la ki'i zhal snga nas/ bdag tu 'dzin pa 'khor ba'i rgyu/ /bdag 'dzin nyon mongs zhing yin te/ /bdag 'dzin
115a3(rgyud 'grel): las kyi sa bon no/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa 'khrul pa'i lam zhes gsung ngo/ /dpa' mo shes rab bzang mo dz+nyA na li ta ri'i zhal snga nas/ bdag 'dzin rtog pa'i gzhi yin te/ /bdag 'dzin rnam rtog ma mo yin/ /bdag 'dzin bag chags snod yin phyir//
115a4(rgyud 'grel): ma spangs mya ngan 'das mi thob ces gsung ngo/ /'khor ba'i bde ba la snying rje'i gnas su gzigs pa tsand+ha la pa'i zhal snga nas/ 'di ltar chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid yin te/ /sgyu ma lta bur shes par bya/ /rmi lam smig rgyu brag ca
115a5(rgyud 'grel): dngos zhes gsung ngo/ /gyad kyi stobs ldan ma d+ha ra ma ha'i zhal snga nas/ mig yod sprul pa chu zla dang/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan las ma 'das/ /nam mkha' lta bur shes gyur na/ /dus gsum mi dmigs spros bral 'char zhes gsung ngo/ /mkha' 'gro'i
115a6(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs zhugs pa dza la si pa'i zhal snga nas/ 'dzin bral rig pa nyams las grol/ /phyag rgya chen po blo bral la/ /brtags na 'khrul la bsams na ldang/ /bsgoms na 'chal la btsal na 'jig gsung ngo/ /bkra shis dpal 'dzin ma bim la si ti'i
115a7(rgyud 'grel): zhal spa nas/ dpyad na stong la reg pa 'gag /snang dang stong pa'i rkyen dang bral/ /brjod du med pa'i chag tu brjod/ /chos rnams ming med yi ge bral/ /tshig gi lam las 'das bcan zhes gsung ngo/ /nor bu'i 'od ldan ma su ka d+ha ri'i zhal snga nas/ mtshan ma
115b1(rgyud 'grel): rang zhi skye 'gag bral/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /bsam yid bral ba de ltos dang/ /'di ni ngo mtshar gzigs mor che/ /zhes gsung ngo/ /rtogs pa'i mthar phyin karma badzra'i zhal snga nas/ blos byas bsam gtan gzugs brnyan te/ /rtog pa
115b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid 'bru 'khrul pa'i mthar/ /bsgoms na yod lam bsgoms med/ /de ni rkyen la rag lus so zhes gsung ngo/ /pad+ma'i mdangs ldan ma b+ha su ka ri'i zhal snga nas/ don gyi lhan cig skyes pa yi/ /phyogs su gang zhen nye mi nus/ /rang bzhin gnyug ma'i bsam
115b3(rgyud 'grel): gtan ni/ /rang la babs pas rgyun mi 'chad ces gsung ngo/ /gnyis snang gi dri ma dag pa pad+ma badzra'i zhal snga nas/ 'khor ba thog ma med pa ru/ /yang nas yang du 'khyam pa'i rgyu/ /byis pas rtog pa don du bzung/ /des ni srid pa dri ba btags zhes gsung ngo//
115b4(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa mo dz+nyA nas ga'i zhal snga nas/ chos rnams rang bzhin spros dang bral/ /gang yang yod pa ma yin te/ /smig rgyu chu yis dben pa bzhin/ /chos rnams der shes grol bar 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /yi ge bdun pas nyon mongs kyi dug
115b5(rgyud 'grel): thon pa a nanda badzra'i zhal snga nas/ rlung sems 'od gsal bcings pas/ gnyug ma srangs su chud par byed/ /rig pa yul gyi rjes mi 'brang/ /phyi rol chags zhen bzlog par 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /bzang mo dang pa'i stobs can ma su ni bi ka'i zhal
115b6(rgyud 'grel): snga nas/ rig dbye 'phur dum bu'i gnad/ /lta stangs 'jog 'dor res gsor gyis/ /mi rtog ldengs ka bslad nas ni/ /tha mal mngon zhen ldog par byed ces gsung ngo/ /bla ma'i brda las don gyi dngo shes pa bsu d+ha ri'i zhal snga nas/ kye ma mthong bar
115b7(rgyud 'grel): dka' ba'i chos/ /phra zhing zhi ba'i bdag nyid can/ /chos rnams dmigs su med pa la/ /yi ger 'jug pa nus ma yin zhes gsung ngo/ /rdzu 'phrul dpal ldan ma su ka ra ki'i zhal snga nas/ yid la byed pa dang bral ba/ /der 'dzin rtog med bdu shes
116a1(rgyud 'grel): grol/ /bdag ces bya ba gang yang btsal/ /ngo bo stong bas yi rnyed do zhes gsung ngo/ /rtog pa rkyen thog tu khel pa pradz+nyA pha la'i zhal snga nas/ dngos 'dzin grol na bde ba che/ /thabs kyis mchog tu gyur pa'i sman/ /'khor bo'i nad
116a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'joms par byed/ /'di las lhag pa'i sems yod min zhes gsung ngo/ /ye shes kyi 'khyung gnas ma sh+rI a li ti'i zhal snga nas/ ji srid gces 'dzin ma zhig par/ /'ching ba'i rgyu dang bral ba min/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa grol ba dang/ /
116a3(rgyud 'grel): srid pa'i 'khor lo 'jig par 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /'bras bu rang chas su gzigs pa tsarya ba'i zhal snga nas/ skye ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa/ /kun gyi rang bzhin 'gro 'od med/ /rtog med spros bral yang dag mdza' / /'dus ma byas shing lhun gyis
116a4(rgyud 'grel): grub zhes gsung ngo/ /tshul khrims kyi rgyan dang ldan ma si g+haM d+ha'i zhal snga nas/ tshig gis gtan la mi 'bebs te/ /bla ma'i brda las nges mthong bya/ /nyams su myong la ngos bzung bral/ /'di ni rnal 'byor ma yi yul zhes gsung ngo/ /rtsa ba'i don dbang bzhi
116a5(rgyud 'grel): las rnyed pa a ba d+hu tI'i zhal snga nas/ mi mthun lam du bslar ba yis/ /'gal ba'i rkyen rnams grogs su 'gyur/ /'dis ni sna tshogs lam du slongs/ /bgegs sol snang ba rang sar grol zhes gsung ngo/ /zla ba'i 'od zer ma g+ha ma li ti'i
116a6(rgyud 'grel): zhal snga nas/ nam mkha' mdud tshugs bsam gtan mkhar/ /rig pa sor bzhag gnad kyi mtshang/ /bde gsal rgyun mi 'chad par byed/ /yul la yengs par mi bya'o zhes gsung ngo/ /rten 'brel gyi 'gros la byang ba kriSh+Na ba'i zhal snga nas/
116a7(rgyud 'grel): kye ma ngo bo nyid kyis zab/ /gzugs kyi rang bzhin de ltos dang/ /stong pa'i mtshan nyid gsal 'gyur gyis/ /gzugs kyi mtshang mthong de nyid shes zhes gsung ngo/ /lha'i rgyan ldan pa ra pa ki ri'i zhal snga nas/ de rig mya ngan 'das rtogs ?
116b1(rgyud 'grel): dngos po med la dngos po ru/ /'dzin pa'i dmigs pa can rnams la/ /thar pa nam yang yod ma yin zhes gsung ngo/ /spros bral gyi ye shes ngos zin pa ko sha pa'i zhal snga nas/ chos rnams thams cad ngo bos stong/ /bden zad brdzun zad
116b2(rgyud 'grel): yi ge zad/ /don zad nam mkha' i rang bzhin can/ /bsam tu ma btub bsgom las grol zhes gsung ngo/ /dpal gyi 'od 'dzin mar ta na li ti'i zhal snga nas/ rtog bral yul gyi rjes mi 'brang/ /snang ba had pos der 'dzin grol/ /sor bzhag tshogs
116b3(rgyud 'grel): drug lhug pa'i dang/ /bsgom blo 'dun pa dri ma yin zhes gsung ngo/ /mos gus kyi rgyud smin pa Arya siM ga'i zhal snga nas/ chos rnams ma lus rnam kun ni/ /rjod byed tshig dang brjod bya'i don/ /rnam pa gnyis kyis stong gyur pas/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i
116b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid can/ /zhes gsung ngo/ /bzod pa'i stobs ldan ma na ta ra'i zhal snga nas/ tshogs drug yul gyi snang ba ni/ /sna tshogs rkyen gyi snang ba ste/ /rkyen snang sgyu ma las ma 'das/ /rang bzhin med de ngo mtshar yul zhes gsung ngo/ /
116b5(rgyud 'grel): dngos rnams bden med du gzigs par ta na badzra'i zhal snga nas/ ji srid 'bras bu 'dod pa'i blo/ /ma grol mya ngan las mi 'da' / /gang gis mthar thug ngos zin pa'i/ /blo de nyid ni rnam rtog go zhes gsung ngo/ /dpal gyi 'od zer sh+rad+d+ha na'i
116b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal snga nas/ mchog tu 'dzin pa'i dri ma ste/ /lam gyi bdud du shes par bya/ /re ba med pa'i snying dkyil na/ /bla med nor bu rin chen gnas zhes gsung ngo/ /gnyen po'i 'phrang chod pa dza ra na'i zhal snga nas/ dpa' bo blo gros ldan pa yis//
116b7(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi rang bzhin zhi ba ru/ /shes tshe ring du mi thogs par/ /srid pa'i 'khor lo 'jig par byed ces gsung ngo/ /bde ba'i mdangs ldan ma sh+rI ka su ta'i zhal snga nas/ 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/ /thub pa'i gsung gi sde snod rnams/ /rnam
117a1(rgyud 'grel): grangs tha dad don gcig par/ /bla ma'i brda las rab tu bslang zhes gsung ngo/ /go yul rjes la khel pa ra tri ta'i zhal snga nas/ yid lam byas dangs ma'i dang/ /gang yang ma skyes gnyug ma'i gshis/ /ma bcos rnal
117a2(rgyud 'grel): ma chos kyi sku/ /bdag med gnyis bsdus chos kyis stong/ zhes bsung ngo/ /byin brlabs kyi 'byung gnas ma su ri su ka'i zhal snga nas/ mtshang? mthong ched 'dzin blo mi 'char/ /chos rnams bden pa zad pa ru/ /mthong ba'i dus der bden pa grol/ /des
117a3(rgyud 'grel): ni srid pa h+rul por byed ces gsung ngo/ /re dogs shigs pa tsan dra go mi'i zhal snga nas/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis steng pa ste/ /chu shing bzhin du snying po med/ /khams rnams rang gi ngo bos dben/ /chu yi spu ba lta bu'o zhes gsung ngo/ /bde ba'i stobs ldan
117a4(rgyud 'grel): ma b+ha ra'i zhal snga nas/ smig rgyu bzhin du skye mched rnams/ /rang bzhin ma grub ngo bos stong/ /snang ba rang sar grol ba'i mtshang/ /de nyid ltos dang rnal 'byor pa zhes gsung ngo/ /'bras bu la sgrub blo bral ba a shog ra'i zhal snga nas/ rtog pa btsal bas
117a5(rgyud 'grel): mi rtog pa/ /nam du yang ni mi rnyed/ /chol ba'i dus nyid rtog pa las/ /ma 'das dran pa'i spu ris so zhes gsung ngo/ /dpal gyi 'od ldan ma su ka to'i zhal snga nas/ kye ma rtog pa'i rang bzhin ni/ /rang bzhin ngo bos stong gyur ba/ /de tshe rtog pa sa spangs
117a6(rgyud 'grel): bar/ rang bzhin gyis ni grol bar 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /sh+ri tsan+d+ra pa'i zhal snga nas/ mi rtog 'dod pa'i blo de nyid/ /ngo bo rtog pa'i bdag nyid de/ /rtog dang mi rtog gnyis med pa/ /de ni rtsa ba'i don yin no zhes gsung ngo/ /rnal 'byor pa thams
117a7(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi de kho na nyid rab tu snang ba grub pa thob pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i mgur las/ dpal gyi 'od zer rnam par shar ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ drug pa'o// //nyams myong tshogs drug gis bskor ba b+hu ta'i zhal snga nas/ phyag rgya che
117b1(rgyud 'grel): la bsgom du med/ /blo yi mdun pa mi brten te/ /bsgom pa bdag po la btod cig ces gsung ngo/ /bde ba'i 'od zer can sing+ga la'i zhal snga nas/ mi bsgom shes pa de ltos dang/ /skye 'gag 'phel 'grib med pa yi/ /ma byas pa ye shes pa ni//
117b2(rgyud 'grel): de mtshar ltad mo'i yul yin no zhes gsung ngo/ /rig pa dangs pa la rten 'brel gyi gnas gzigs pa dzai ta ri'i zhal snga nas/ ji ltar rgyal po rigs ran gyi/ /spyod pa byas na gya ba bzhin/ /sgrub pa po ni don med pa'i/ /sbyor ba gzhi dang bcas la spang
117b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsung ngo/ /rtogs pa'i 'byung gnas ma ma d+ha ro ha'i zhal snga nas/ zil dngar bcud len sman gyi mchog /skyugs na nad du 'gyur ba bzhin/ /sgom nyams mu tshor smras pa na/ /yongs su yal bar 'gyur ba yin zhes gsung ngo/ /bying rmugs rno ngar
117b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis bsal ba b+hi ta ka ma'i zhal snga nas/ snang ba stong pa'i ngo bo ru/ /grol par mthong ba'i mig de ni/ /dri ma med pa'i ngo bo'i rtsal/ /de ni rtog pa'i gdeng yin no zhes gsung ngo/ /dbang phyug gi stobs dang ldan ma bu ga d+ha la'i zhal snga nas/ stong pa'i
117b5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin 'gag med du/ /'char ba gang gis shes 'gyur ba/ /blo ldan de ni skal ba bzang/ /las grol med na thar bar byed ces gsung ngo/ /stong nyid rang gi ngo bo rjes la zin pa ratna dza la'i zhal snga nas/ skyes la ma 'gags gsal ba yi/ /shes pa skad
117b6(rgyud 'grel): cig dang po la/ /yul dang sgo nga phrad pa bzhin/ /de nyid rtags pas rang bzhin med ces gsung ngo/ /bde ba'i dangs ma a dzu li'i zhal snga nas/ stong pa nyid kyi yongs su 'dzin/ /rig pa spros bral 'dus byas min/ /rtog med sems kyi ngo bo la/ /'khor dang
117b7(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan 'das ma grub ces gsung ngo/ /lta ba ming las grol bas grub mdza' i 'dod pa zhig pa b+ha tra pa'i zhal snga nas/ sna rtser yid bcings 'gyur ba dangs/ /yul snang ma mthong der 'dzin bral/ /dus gsum yid la ma byas ba'i/ /de tshe dan pa'i ri mo
118a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig ces gsung ngo/ /bde ba'i mdangs ldan ma si ri d+hi na'i zhal snga nas/ shes pa mdung tshugs spros pa zhi/ /de yis rtogs pa'i 'gro 'ong chad/ /'di ltar dbang po rang snang gi /yul na bsam med bsgom dang bral gsung ngo/ /
118a2(rgyud 'grel): rlung sems lta stangs kyis 'ching ba kun tu ru'i zhal snga nas/ thar lam dgra med mi 'od bas/ /bsgrub pa rkyen khar gtang mi bya/ /las mdza' ma log rab tu gces/ /grogs ni chags sdang skye ba'i rgyu zhes gsung ngo/ /thugs rjes dpal gyi sgron ma
118a3(rgyud 'grel): su ka pa'i zhal snga nas/ ri dags sman ma ji bzhin du/ /u pa gcig pur gnas par bya/ /skye bo'i dbus su rtogs pa 'grib/ /mchog gi don gnyer bas mthar song zhes gsung ngo/ /gnyen po stobs su gyur pas nyon mongs pa la btsan chod kyi thog
118a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzis byed pa dzaM bu ta'i zhal snga nas/ kye ma 'jig rten tsha thabs ni/ /thar lam sgrub pa'i mi mthun phyogs/ /klu mchog rnams kyi mgo bo ni/ /de snyed sdug bsngal rten yin bzhin zhes gsung ngo/ /stobs ldan rgyal mo sUryA kha d+ha'i zhal snga nas/ dngos po'i
118a5(rgyud 'grel): zhen chags 'khor ba'i rgyu/ /zhen med mya ngan 'das pa'i lam/ /'dod pa'i blo yis thar pa 'dor/ /'dod pa dang bral bde ba'i mchog/ ces gsung ngo/ /nyon mongs par rang sar grol bas 'khrul pa'i sgrog chod pa dzi na mi tra'i zhal snga nas/ phra rags chod pa
118a6(rgyud 'grel): seng ge'i mig /'di yi nang na mi rtog pa'i/ /rang rig ye shes dri med gnas/ /mig ni gzum par mi bya'o/ zhes gsung ngo/ /byin brlabs kyi 'od zer can b+ha nu d+ha ri'i zhal snga nas/ dri med dngos 'dzin bcings pa'i gnang/ /rlung sems 'od gsal la
118a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa/ /bde chen rgyal po mchog gi lam/ /'di ni thabs kyi rgyal mo yin zhes gsung ngo/ /yul snang brda ru shar bas don gyi gnad rig pa so na sh+rI'i zhal snga nas/ nges pa'i shes pa ma skyes par/ /bden pa mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ /bsnyems sal
118b1(rgyud 'grel): dbu 'phrig dag pa'i dbyig /mchog tu gces pa'i gter yin no/ /zhes gsung ngo/ /dbyings kyi gtso mo dz+nyA na ro ha'i zhal snga nas/ rnal 'byor des shes gces 'dzin bya/ /som nyi bdud kyi byin brlabs so/ /the tshom gyis ni dngos grub 'dor/ /yid ches yon tan
118b2(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi gzhi/ zhes gsung ngo/ /rig pa so la bzhag pas bde gsal rgyun mi mchad pa dza ba ri pa'i zhal snga nas/ ka ra na bcings yon tan gyis/ /rig pa srungs su chud pa yis/ /yul gyi gsal cha ma 'gags pa/ /der 'dzin shes pa grol bar byed ces
118b3(rgyud 'grel): gsung/ /dpal mo pad+ma kha d+ha'i zhal snga nas/ des ni phra rags rtogs pa spong/ /bde rlung rig pa thogs babs su/ /'dzin par byed pa'i gnang 'di la/ /lta stangs so ma brdze ba gces gsung ngo/ /spros bral ye shes tshogs bsags pa las byung bash+rI sa
118b4(rgyud 'grel): ga ra'i zhal snga nas/ rtog pa bsal nas mi rtog pa/ /rgyud la 'gal na 'khrul pa ste/ /rtog pa med na ye shes la/ /skye ba'i thabs med ye shes 'gag /ces gsung ngo/ /bzang mo nor bu'i 'od ldan ma b+hi ga si'i zhal lnga nas/ rtog pa gang skye mi dmigs
118b5(rgyud 'grel): ?/ spyad pas shes rab bsu 'gyur/ /thabs des rnam par rtog pa'i rtsal/ /ye shes chen por 'char bar byed/ ces gsung ngo/ /ngo sprod cig car phog pas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa de nyid du thob pa sU rya sh+rI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas/ snying rje'i mda' med stong
118b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzhus/ /rgyud la myong ba mi skye ste/ /thabs dang bral ba'i shes rab ni/ /go ba'i yul du ltung bar 'gyur/ zhes gsung ngo/ /dpal gyi 'byung gnas sa la dza d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas/ gzhu med snying rje'i mnga' yis kyang/ /don byed nus pa ma yin te/ /shes
118b7(rgyud 'grel): rab dang bral thabs kyis ni/ /lag tu lon pa ma yin no zhes gsung ngo/ /shes pa bden med du slongs pas 'khrul pa'i rkyen las grol ba/ sh+rI ta ri'i zhal snga nas/ thub pa'i spyan gyis rlung sems bcings/ /snang ba ma dmigs der 'dzin grol/ /de tshe shing?
119a1(rgyud 'grel): yul mi phrogs/ /dus gsum tshig chod? 'gro 'od med ces gsung ngo/ /bde chen rgyal mo su la kha d+ha'i zhal snga nas/ mi g.yo rtse gcig dang ba'i dang/ /rtog pa rang grol chos kyi sku/ /rig pa gcer bu sgribs g.yogs bral//
119a2(rgyud 'grel): shes pa rang lugs phyag rgya che zhes gsung ngo/ /'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i rtsis 'bras bu la 'dod blo bral ba g+hu d+he ri pa'i zhal snga nas/ sku bzhi thob tu mi ster ba'i/ /bgegs de 'dod pa'i blo yin no/ /'di yod sgribs pa mi 'dag pas/ /zhing khamS
119a3(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo/ /dpal gyi sgron me su ka tsand+ha'i zhal snga nas/ 'dod pa'i blo bral bde chen gyis/ /dus nges sdug bsngal bral bar byed/ /'dod pa'i blo rnams log pa yis/ /zag pa 'dam rdzab skam par 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /nges
119a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i shes pas the tshom gyi dri ma sel ba sh+rI pa ra na'i zhal snga nas/ kun la khyab pa chos kyi sku/ /rang bzhin ma skyes ma 'gags pa'i/ /spros dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid de/ /ye shes dang gnas su rgyun chad med ces gsung ngo/ /bde ba'i 'od 'dzin ma b+ha nu
119a5(rgyud 'grel): ro ha'i zhal snga mas / nam mkha' i dang can gdod nas dag/ mdza' bzhi las ni rnam par grol/ /'das dang ma 'ongs de ltar gyi/ /dus kyis ma bsdus phyag rgya che zhes gsung ngo/ /nyon mongs pa rang thog tu grol bas gnyen po'i byar zhig pa sa re d+hi pa'i
119a6(rgyud 'grel): zhal snga nas/ /shes pa rang can de ltos dang/ /nam mkha' i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ rig pa dri med lam gyi mchog /thig le grol na rnam par mthong zhes gsung ngo/ /bde ba'i sgron ma la d+ha li'i zhal snga nas/ sems la ye shes skye 'gyur ba//
119a7(rgyud 'grel): rig pa drung? ? khro bo'i spyan ni/ /sor bzhag rnam rtog rlung mi bskyod/ /rten 'brel gyis ni yang dag 'grub ces gsung ngo/ /nyams myong snang ba las grol bas sgom thun 'jog zhig pa nA ga badzra'i zhal snga nas/ bla ma'i byin brlabs ma zhugs pa'i/ /rgyud la
119b1(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa 'char ba min/ /nges pa'i shes pa ma skyes par/ /de nyid zab mo'i don mi mthong zhes gsung ngo/ /'bar ba'i gtso mo a ma ka pa li'i zhal snga nas/ gnyug ma ra su ma chud pa'i/ /rten 'brel che ba bla ma'i brda/ /'di la nges pa stong ba na/ /
119b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshon byed yi ge nang du 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /dus gsum skye 'gag gis stong pa'i rig pas rnam rtog rang sar dengs pa pad+ma badzra'i zhal snga nas/ bden par mthong 'khrul pa'i blo/ /yang dag bden pa de shig cig /'di yis blo mdza' i lta ba grol/ /des ni
119b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis snang mi gnas so/ /zhes gsung ngo/ /legs pa'i dpa' mo si ri ti ra'i zhal snga nas/ rten 'brel rtsa ba byin pa yis/ /'khor ba'i sa bon mi gnas te/ /ma rig pa nas rga shi'i bar/ /rten cing 'brel pas 'khor ba steng zhes gsung ngo/ /spros bral
119b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi don bral bas bzung bas rjes la yul rjes mi 'brel ba badzra dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas/ tha mal rnam rtog nub pa yi/ /rten la thabs kyi lam mi dgos/ /'khrul pa dag pa'i shes pa la/ /'di la lta ba dgos pa min zhes gsung ngo/ /dpal gyi rgyal po
119b5(rgyud 'grel): su ka ra li'i zhal snga nas/ rtog pa'i spu ris spangs pa yis/ /shes pa la ni bsgom mi dgos/ /rang snang grol bar gyur pa la/ /sgrub pa nyams su blang mi dgos zhes gsung ngo/ /yul snang sgyu mar ngos zin pas shes? pa la dang 'dzin zhig pa bi ma la gNi?
119b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal snga nas/ tshogs drug yul lam 'phros pa/ /dus gsum reng sar grol bar 'gyur/ /bde chen go 'phang mchog 'dod pas/ /rtse gcig gtan las 'da' mi bya zhes gsung ngo/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi 'od zer can pad+ma wa ti'i zhal snga nas/ yengs na de
119b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid mthong mi 'gyur/ /ma yengs pa ni thabs kyi gnang/ /bde gsal stong pa'i rang bzhin can/ /'di yis rab tu rtsed par byed ces gsung ngo/ /brda don khong du chud pas 'khrul pa yul tho tu tshed pa gi rti dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas/ lo lo'i 'khrul snang gol?
120a1(rgyud 'grel): khyer dang/ /'dres pa 'dis ni thar pa'i lam/ /dus gsum na yang rnyed pa med/ /brtags na 'khrul pa gzhi yod min/ zhes gsung ngo/ /dpal gyi bde ster ma sa ri d+ha ri'i zhal snga nas/ 'di ni rang snang glo bur ba/ /rtsa bral
120a2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin med pa yi /mtshar de ltos dang rnal 'byor pa/ /de mthong 'khrul pa 'jig par 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rab tu snang ba rdo rje'i mgur las/ mi zad pa'i rin po che'i gter mdzod rnam par rdol ba
120a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //mi mthun pa lam du blang bas 'gal rkyen grogs su shar ba sh+rI badzwa ba lo'i zhal snga nas/ 'khor ba pa la bde ba med/ /chu yi gnyer ma ji bzhin du/ /sdug bsngal cig phyir cig gis slab//
120a4(rgyud 'grel): tshe 'di ci byas sdug bsngal rgyu zhes gsung ngo/ /bde ba'i ros myos ma b+hu ga la ma'i zhal snga nas/ lta ru med pa de mthong na/ /bzung du med pa'i don zin te/ /des ni rtsol ba'i nang las grol/ /bde chen rgya ba thob par byed ces gsung ngo/ /rtog pa snga
120a5(rgyud 'grel): phyis long ma brtags pas ma bsgoms pas shes pa spros bral du gyur pa dz+nyA na tsa kra'i zhal snga nas/ rtogs na yon tan ma rtogs skyon/ /gang gis gos par mi 'gyur ba'i/ /rang 'byung ye shes 'dus ma byas/ /gnyis med shes bya dngos po'i
120a6(rgyud 'grel): gshis zhes gsung ngo/ /nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa b+ha nu ta ri'i zhal snga nas/ rtog pa 'dzin pa'i nyer len byed/ /des ni srid pa'i 'khor lor bcug /chos rnams thams cad stong pa ru/ /ma rig pa yis bdag tu bzung zhes gsung ngo//
120a7(rgyud 'grel): don gyi gnad rig pas 'dzin rtog grol ba pradz+nyA tsaNdra'i zhal snga nas/ gnyug ma don gyi lhan cig skyes/ /ma bcos rnal ma rang kha la/ /dran pa'i spu ris brten mi bya/ /blo dpyang zhugs na rtog pa'i gzhi zhes gsung ngo/ /'khrul pa'i sgros las grol ba mo su
120b1(rgyud 'grel): ka le'i zhal snga nas/ las dang nyon mongs bag chags kyis/ /rten de grub pa ma yin te/ /'khor ba bzhi med rang grol la/ /mya ngan 'das pa ji ltar bsgrub ces gsung ngo/ /'khrul pa'i sgrog chad pa las ye shes shar ba sh+rI ratna ma ti'i zhal snga nas/ chos
120b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams gzhi med rang gi ngo bos stong/ /don dam kun rdzob gang gis gnyis su phye /'khor 'das rmi lam nyid du 'ang med gyur na/ /grub mdza' zhig pa'i lta ba ji ltar smra zhes gsung ngo/ /brda'i go ba longs pa mor li d+ha ri'i zhal snga nas/ spros pa med cing skye ba med//
120b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par mi rtog ma bcos pa/ /snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin te/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor rtogs zhes gsung ngo/ /snang ba'i mtshang mthong bas shes pa rkyen dang bral ba ka mo do'i zhal snga nas/ sna tshogs snang ba'i bzung 'dzin te/ /ma bcos ltan
120b4(rgyud 'grel): cig skyes pa yi/ /ngo bo bas? ni ma 'das te/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can zhes gsung ngo/ /bzang mo don gyi dpal 'dzin ma g+ha dzu d+ha ri'i zhal snga nas/ rags pa'i dngos por snang ba kun/ /stong pa nyid kyi rang ba zhin te/ /cer cer snang ba'i dus nyid du//
120b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen po mthong nas yod ces gsung ngo/ /gnyug ma'i rang ngo mthong bas rtog pas bcing du med pa rA dza me tog ha li'i zhal snga nas/ dang po 'di ltar snang ba kun/ /phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo ste/ /rang bzhin med pa'i bdag nyid can/ /chu zla'i dkyil
120b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ji bzhin no zhes gsung ngo/ /zag med bde ba'i dangs ldan ma ru ka li'i zhal snga nas/ mtshon byed dpe yi lhan skyes kyis/ /mtshon bya don gyi lhan skyes rtogs/ /des ni 'gro 'od med pa'i bdag /sems nyid gnyug ma'i rang bzhin no zhes gsung ngo/ /zag
120b7(rgyud 'grel): med kyi shes pa yul kyis ma phrogs pa sh+rI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas/ snang ba'i bla mas dngos rnams gdams par bstan/ /sngar 'dris mi de mthong bas ngo shes bzhin/ /bla ma'i ngo spros gnad la zug pa yis/ /chos rnams rang bzhin skye ba med par rig ces gsung ngo//
121a1(rgyud 'grel): rang rig 'od gsal gyi mdangs can ma gang ga le'i zhal snga nas/ dbang po drug gi spyod yul du/ /gang gang snang ba'i dngos po la/ /rang bzhin bden pas dben pa'i phyir/ /stong nyid ci phyir mi gzigs shes gsung ngo/ /tshe 'di'i
121a2(rgyud 'grel): zhen pa log pa tsan+d+ra sing nga'i zhal snga nas/ bla ma'i byin brlabs zhugs pa'i mthus/ /a'e? baM snying gi dkyil du zhu/ /de yis snang ba'i dngos po 'di/ /rtog pa skye med dang du 'jug ces gsung ngo/ /dpa' mo ye shes kyi mdangs 'phrog ma b+ha ga d+ha ra'i zhal
121a3(rgyud 'grel): snga nas/ tshogs drug yul snang sgyu ma la/ /ngos zin 'khrul pa yul la ldog /gzhi med rang gis stong pa'i mtshang/ /mthong bas bag chags gnas su 'joms zhes gsung ngo/ /rang gi bde sdug khyad du bsad nas gzhan don 'dzin pa pradz+nyA pa pa'i zhal snga nas/
121a4(rgyud 'grel): rjes la gnyen po bya ra gshig /bde ba'i rol chags pa na /sgom pa nyams kyi 'ching ba ste/ /lha ni bdud du babs par 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /bzang mo dpal gyi 'od zer can ? ro ha'i zhal snga nas/ re ba dang ni dgoS pa yi/ /mtshan ma'i chos la rtog
121a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /nyams su ma myong skyon yin pas/ /gnyis med rtsi yis zin par bya/ /rang snang rang sar grol bar bya zhes gsung ngo/ /snang ba'i mtshang gis gnyug ma'i ngo bo mthong ba de ba sh+rI sU rya'ai? zhal snga nas/ gang zag lam pa'i rgyud la ni/ /re dogs gnyis su byung gyur
121a6(rgyud 'grel): na/ lta ba ma rtogs skyon yin pas/ /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /rang gi sems su blo thag bcang ces gsung ngo/ /dpa' mo lha'i sgrol ma b+ha ga dzu lu'i zhal snga nas/ blang bya dor bya gnyis byung na/ /spyod pa goms par ma byas pa'i/ /ro ma snyoms pa'i skyon
121a7(rgyud 'grel): yin pas/ /rin chen sems las phyir gyur pa'i/ /'khor 'das med par shes par bya zhes gsung ngo/ /shes pa rkyen dang bral bas rtog pas mi 'ching ba da na sh+rI rA dza'i zhal snga nas/ 'phags lam 'grong pa'i dus der ni/ /bsgom bya sgom byed gnyis byung na/ /nas?
121b1(rgyud 'grel): lugs dza? yas ma zin pa'i/ /rkyen gyi dri ma 'thas pa yin/ /sems ngo skye med shes par bya zhes gsung ngo/ /spros brol gyi rgyan dang ldan pa b+ha ba de pa'i zhal snga nas/ mchog gi 'bras bu re gyur na/ /ma rtogs skyon gyis gol ba min/ /kye ma gang la re ba de'i/ /
121b2(rgyud 'grel): ma spangs dri ma mi 'dag pas/ /re ba med pa bde ba'i mchog ces gsung ngo/ /phrin las kyis gdul bya'i re ba bsgong pa badzra ra? smi'i zhal snga nas/ snang ba la na chigs gyur na/ /lam khyer ma shes skyon yin pas/ /bden brdzun dngos po'i chos la blta/ /gang
121b3(rgyud 'grel): la mngon par zhen pa ni/ /'ching ba'i rgyu de por de sgrim zhes gsung ngo/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgya can ratna kha d+ha'i zhal snga nas/ lam du mthong ba'i rtogs rnams la/ /bdag brod re bas sngon bsu nas/ /dmigs me rtsi yis ma zin pa'i/ /blo bral ma dag
121b4(rgyud 'grel): skyon yin pas/ /shes pa'i thug thag bcad par bya zhes gsung ngo/ /thos pa'i mdza' tshig gi thog tu chang pa tsan+d+ra h+ri da'i zhal snga nas/ 'khor ba sdug bsngal du mthong bas/ /dogs pas skyon gol ba de/ /yul ma 'byongs pa'i skyon yin pas/ /mkhas pas
121b5(rgyud 'grel): dogs pa spangs pa na/ /bde ba'i tshang du chud pa yin zhes gsung ngo/ /'khrul pa chos nyid du shar ba mo ha ra d+ha na'i zhal snga nas / brtsol ba med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/ /ngos bzung bral ba'i nyams myong bskyang/ /bying rgod la sogs byung gyur kyang/ /de yi skyon
121b6(rgyud 'grel): ngo shes byas la/ /kho na nyid la glong la gzhag /ces gsung ngo/ /don gyi gnad rigs pas bsam pa'i mdza' chod pa badzra d+hi li bi'i zhal snga nas / kye ma kye ma tha mal gyi/ /ma bcos shes pa ngos bzung dang/ /rang gi rang bzhin nyid la blta/ /'di yi dus
121b7(rgyud 'grel): su? rang snang ge? /chos la rtags dbyang spang bar bya zhes gsung ngo/ /'dod pa'i blo log mar sa b+hi'i zhal snga nas/ cir snang ngo pos rang grol bas/ /nyon mongs bag chags kyis mi 'go /chos dang sems su ro mnyam pas/ /sna tshogs gzugs med rtsa bral du/ /?
122a1(rgyud 'grel): bas smon pa lta bu'o zhes gsung ngo/ /byin brlabs kyi nyams 'bar bas bsgom thog babs su 'char bar smi sUrya'i zhal snga nas / thams cad sgyu ma las ma 'das/ /rang bzhin med pa'i mtshang go pas/ /nang gi phyi rol byin
122a2(rgyud 'grel): brlabs nas/ /mtsho la 'khyag dar zhig pa bzhin/ /snang ba rang sar grol bar 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /rig pa snyems las grol ba mo/ /b+ha ga da nu'i zhal snga nas/ 'khor 'das ro gcig rtogs pa las/ /des ni gnyis 'dzin shes pa grol/ /'bad
122a3(rgyud 'grel): rtsol med par gdul bya yi/ /don 'byung yid bzhin nor bu ltar/ /'bras bu rang la rnyed par 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /tshe 'di'i rtsis bshig pas ci byas chos su song bar ta na pa li pa'i zhal snga nas / gzhi la gnas pa'i 'bras bu ni/ /e ma rang 'byung bsam
122a4(rgyud 'grel): mi khyab/ /rang sems skye med ngo shes pas/ /sku gnyis bsgrub pa'i 'dun ma grol/ /thob bya'i 'bras bu phyi nang med ces gsung ngo/ /nyon mongs pa rang thog tu brnyil ba mo ra b+hi na da'i zhal snga nas / 'di ni gzugs can ma yin pas/ /dus gsum 'gyur ba
122a5(rgyud 'grel): med par gnas/ /'khor ba dang ni myang 'das kyi/ /chos rnams phyag rgya chen po las/ /ma 'das kun la khyab pa'i bdag ces gsung ngo/ /lta stangs kyi gzengs smad pas 'jam rlung thog babs su zin pa gi rti si pa'i zhal snga nas / gdod nas stong zhing bdag med
122a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ rin chen sems ni phyag rgya che/ /rgyu las ma byung skye 'jig med/ /ma skyes ngo bo de mthong bas/ /'khor ba'i thog mdza' chod par 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /dus gsum rang sar grol ba me b+ha ga ta'i zhal snga nas/ sems nyid do gsal ngo pos dben//
122a7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dang ni sems can gyi/ /khyad par yod pa ma yin te/ /mar me dang ni 'od bzhin no/ /'di shes 'khor 'das 'dzin? rtog bral/ zhes gsung ngo/ /rtog pa byin brlabs las 'khrungs pa tsan+d+ra pradz+nyA'i zhal snga nas/ yid la mi byed don 'di la/ /
122b1(rgyud 'grel): skye dang 'gag dang 'gro 'ong med/ /rang snang ba ni rang gi sems /tha dad par ni mi rtog go /gnyis 'dzin bral na phyag rgya che zhes gsung ngo/ /rtog pa las grol ba ra b+hi na'i zhal snga nas/ stong pa nyid la bden pa yi/ /blor 'jog bdag 'dzin mdud par 'gyur//
122b2(rgyud 'grel): byed mkhan ngos zin 'khrul pa 'jig /de ni gnad kyi gdams pa yin zhes gsung ngo/ /ngo sprod kyi gnad la nges pa'i shes pa skyed pa ratna bo d+ha'i zhal snga nas / rtogs pa'i don la mchog 'dzin spang/ /'dag par dka' ba'i dri ma ni/ /ngo bo mthong ba'i rang nyid de/
122b3(rgyud 'grel): mdza' dang bral ba lta ba yin zhes gsung ngo/ /dbang gi nyams kyi gzi ba mo b+ha tsa la'i zhal snga nas / glo bur rkyen las skyes pa yi/ /dran rig rnam par rtog pa ni/ /de nyid ngo bo gzhi med de/ /rang bzhin ma skyes pa yi gzhi/ /de mthong 'khrul pa'i snang ba 'jig
122b4(rgyud 'grel): ces gsung ngo/ /'od gsal gyi rang ngo mkha' 'gro ma'i brda las phrad pa kand+ha ri'i zhal snga nas / rnam par rtog ba chos nyid du/ /ma shes dbyings kyi ye shes ni/ /mtsha? ma mthong bas ngos mi zin/ /e ma de nyid ltos dang kye zhes gsung ngo/ /mi rtag pa'i gnyid
122b5(rgyud 'grel): logs? sing+ga d+ha na'i zhal snga nas/ de nyid ngo bo 'dus ma byas/ /'gro 'ong med pa'i bdag nyid can/ /sgros pa nyer zhi 'od gsal dang/ /gnod nas dag pa de ltos dang zhes gsung ngo/ /gnyis snang gi shes pa grol ba bIrya dza la'i zhal snga nas / ma skyes mi
122b6(rgyud 'grel): skye skye ba med/ /stong nyid las byung skye ba med/ /skya med skye ba'i ngo bos stong/ /rgyu rkyen byed pa po ma grub ces gsung ngo/ /bde ba'i ro myos pa mo g+ha dzu li'i zhal snga nas / skye med dbyings las shar ba yi/ /chos rnams skye ba med pa'i bdag /rang bzhin
122b7(rgyud 'grel): las ni ma 'das te/ /dngos rnams skye ba med pa'o zhes gsung ngo/ /dge ba'i dpal 'dzin bi la ta'i zhal snga nas/ bya ba btang ba'i skyes bu bde/ /'jig rten pa la sdug bsngal du/ /ma song ba yi dngos po gang/ /de ni 'phags pas gzigs mi 'gyur zhes gsung ngo//
123a1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi de kho na nyid rab tu snang ba grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i mgur las dpal gyi be'u'i bcud rnam par 'thigs pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //snang rgyud la nges shes skyes pa sardza
123a2(rgyud 'grel): na'i zhal snga nas/ las kyi phyag rgya mtshon byed de/ /chos kyi phyag rgya sgom pa'i lam/ /phyag rgya chen po 'bras bu ste/ /dam tshig phyag rgya phrin las so zhes gsung ngo/ /seng ge'i rtsal dang ldan pa sid+d+ha na'i zhal snga nas / mtshon byed med na don mi mthong//
123a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom bya med na lam dang bral/ /'bras bu med na bsgrubs nas ci/ /phrin las med na dgos pa stor zhes gsung ngo/ /don rgyud la sgro 'dogs chod pa de ba sha ri'i zhal snga nas/ bde ba nyams myong dga' ba ste/ /'dzin grol nyams myong mchog
123a4(rgyud 'grel): tu dga' / /bde stong dbye ru med pa ni/ /lhan cig skye ba'i dga' pa'o/ /nyams las grol na dga' bral lo zhes gsung ngo/ /bde ba'i 'od zer can bi ma la d+ha'i zhal snga nas/ myong bas lus sems rnal du gsol/ /zhen med nyams myong 'dzin pa grol//
123a5(rgyud 'grel): spros bral stong pa bde ba'i nyams/ /shes pa der 'dzin bral ba can zhes gsung ngo/ /byin brlabs kyi brgyad pas bar chod sel pa sh+rI sa ra ba'i zhal snga nas / rang gnas rtsa ba 'dus ma byas/ /skad cig ma yi mtshang gis rig /to la skyes shes pa
123a6(rgyud 'grel): snga phyi bral/ /der ni gnyis snang mdud pa grol zhes gsung ngo/ /bzang mo nor bu'i 'od ldan ma d+ha na la'i zhal sngo nas / dran rig rnam par rtog pa ni/ /dmigs pa med par ma chod na/ /bag chags gnas pa'i rten mi 'jig /mtshan ma rang grol de ltos shig
123a7(rgyud 'grel): gsung ngo/ /blo rten ma bcas pas mtshan ma rang sar grol ba ga dzu d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga/ /sgyu ma lta bur mtshan nyid med/ /gang la rang bzhin med pa ni/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid gcig ces gsung ngo/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi 'od
123b1(rgyud 'grel): zer can ratni ta'i zhal snga nas/ chos rnams sgyu ma'i ngo bo la/ /rang bzhin yid la ma yin kyang/ /lam du 'khrul pa ma bsal na/ /sgyu mar mthong pa grol ba min/ /sgyu mas sgyu ma 'ching bar 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /dus gsum ma dmigs pas rtog ba chang ?
123b2(rgyud 'grel): tha rind+ha pa'i zhal snga nas/ chun rjes bshig po shes rab lam/ /chos nyid spros bral 'char ba'i sa/ /rig bsgrim slod thabs kyi mtshang/ /ma rig bsgom gyis gnod mi rtogs zhes gsung ngo/ /dpal gyi bde ster ma su ka ri'i zhal snga nas/ ma chun gnad
123b3(rgyud 'grel): du chung mi 'gyur/ /ma shigs rjes kyi ngos mi zin/ /ma bsgrims log shes cher mi chod/ /ma slong sbros bral 'char pa'i lam zhes gsung ngo/ /rtsa ba gzhi med mthong bas gnyis 'dzin grol bag gad+ha? ri'i zhal snga nas/ chos rnams ming du shes par gyis//
123b4(rgyud 'grel): de yis bden par 'dzin pa grol/ /gnas lugs gzhi med mthong bar gyis/ /'di yis brag pa'i brug? rdu grol zhes gsung ngo/ /dpal gyi sgron ma ka na li'i zhal snga nas/ 'khor ba'i rang mtshan mthong bar gyis/ /de yi myang 'das 'dod pa grol/ /dran rig
123b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes ngo bo mthong/ /'di yis sangs rgyas bsgrub blo 'jig ces gsung ngo/ /'dod pa yid la zhig pas zag med kyi bde ba 'bar ba sh+rI sUrya'i zhal snga nas / ji ltar til gyi 'bru gu la/ /mar gyis khyab par gnas mod kyang/ /skam la ma btsun khu ba med//
123b6(rgyud 'grel): til gyi mar gyis don mi nus zhes gsung ngo/ /bum 'dzin ma d+ha na ru'i zhal snga nas / rigS drug 'khor ba'i sems can la/ /bde gshegs snying po yod gyur kyang/ /ma bsgrubs grol ba thob mi 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /rnam rtog gzhi med du mthong bas/ /gnyen po'i
123b7(rgyud 'grel): ? las grol ba su ga de pa'i zhal snga nas/ rig pa mdung khyer sgom gyi gnad/ /ma bsgoms shes pa gnyug ma'i dang/ /bsgoms dang ma bsgoms gnyis med pas/ /shes pa zung 'jug ngo mtshar che zhes gsung ngo/ /bde ba'i mdangs ldan ma b+ha a ra d+h+ra'i? zhal snga
124a1(rgyud 'grel): nas/ shes pa mdza' bral lta ba'i gnang/ /tha mal shes pa blo rtog bral/ /ma bcos pa ni chos kyi sku/ /bsgrub blo zhig pa ngo mtshar che zhes gsung ngo/ /lam la gang phan grogs su ston shes pas snang ba dpe char shar ba b+ha na
124a2(rgyud 'grel): sUrya'i zhal snga nas /ji ltar sol ba'i sdong po? la/ /lo 'bras me tog mi 'byung ltar/ /de bzhin dang pa med pa la/ /yon tan nor bu 'byung mi 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /ye shes spyan ldan ras ma d+ha na'i zhal snga nas /mngal du 'phyes pa'i glang po yis/ /'dam
124a3(rgyud 'grel): bu'i tshal du mi rtol ltar/ /rang bzhin brtson 'grus mi ldan pas/ /thar pa'i grong khyer phyin mi 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /seng ge'i lta stangs la rig pa dangs pa da ra ca'i zhal snga nas/ ji ltar rmi lam sgyu ma bzhin/ /kun rdzob snang ba'i rang bzhin stong/ /dri
124a4(rgyud 'grel): za'i grong khyer ji bzhin du/ /skye dang gnas pa de bzhin no zhes gsung ngo/ /lta'i mnga' 'phrog ma man? la'i zhal snga nas / 'di dag yang dag ma yin pas/ /khams gsum ngo bos rnam par dben/ /chos rnams don du ma grub pas/ /rang bzhin dag pa ngo
124a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshar che zhes gsung ngo/ /dran pa'i rtsal ngo bo skyes pa tsaN+Da li'i zhal snga nas/ chos rnams rang bzhin rnam par dag /rgyu med 'khor ba mthong mi 'gyur/ /ma mthong mya ngan 'das pa'i gnad/ /de rtogs nas ni grol ba thob/ /e ma mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i
124a6(rgyud 'grel): gnad ces gsung ngo/ /'bar ba'i gtso mo b+ha? nu ti ri'i? zhal snga nas / blo yi mdza' bral gnyug ma'i dang/ /sgom dang bsgom bya las grol te/ /phyag rgya che la sgom du med/ /ma byas shes pa rang dang chas/ /rig pa rten med nam mkha' 'dra zhes gsung ngo/ /shes pa
124a7(rgyud 'grel): yul la ma 'bros pas rtog pa chad pa a su ra d+ha'i zhal snga nas/ rtogs pa mthar phyin 'bras bu'i sa/ /re dogs gol ba dbyangs su dag /don rtogs rnal 'byor nyam ? bral/ /'khor ba rang grol ngo mtshar che/ zhes gsung ngo/ /ye shes kyi spyan ldan ma b+ha nu ha ri'i zhal snga
124b1(rgyud 'grel): nas/ bden gnyis ngo bo tha mi dad/ /snang stong gnyis med zung du 'jug / snang stong grol ba'i rnal 'byor pa/ /'khor 'das med pa ngo mtshar che zhes gsung ngo/ /rtsa ba'i gnad kyis rang ngo brda las phrad pa g+ha tsa li pa'i zhal snga nas / nges pa'i
124b2(rgyud 'grel): shes pa skyes pa la/ /the tshom som nyi yid gnyis bral/ /ye shes rgyun chad med pa la/ /skad cig ma yi chos mi gnas zhes gsung ngo/ /dpal gyi 'od 'jo ma su ka d+ha na'i zhal snga nas/ bar do med pa'i chos nyid la/ /'gro dang 'ong ba'i chos mi gnas/
124b3(rgyud 'grel): blo dang bral ba'i ye shes la/ /'khrul pa'i dri ma rnam par dag ces gsung ngo/ /shes pas so la bzhag pas 'khrul pa'i snang ba la sgrog chad pa tsand+he pa'i zhal snga nas/ rtsi yis zin pa'i lcags bzhin du/ /ngo bo gser du 'gyur ba bzhin/ /bde gsal mi
124b4(rgyud 'grel): rtogs zin pas/ /dran rig ye shes nyid du 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /dbyings kyi gtso mo b+ha ta ha'i zhal snga nas/ /gang tshe gnad kyi ngo bor rig /de dus ma rig mun pa dangs/ /gang du 'khrul pa'i snang ba dag /de ni sku gsum zhing zhes shes gsung ngo/ /A li kA li'i
124b5(rgyud 'grel): gnad kyis bka' rgyud kyi don grol ba sho sa ri pa'i zhal snga nas/ gang la gter gyi khron yong na/ /de la chags pa'i blo 'byung gis/ /gter med pa la chags blo med/ /so bya nags kyi khrod ma? snyag ces gsung ngo/ /rdzu 'phrul rgyan dang ldan pa'i
124b6(rgyud 'grel): than mo'i zhal snga nas/ rtsi med sprar ma bde bar gnas/ /nya btang skyar mo sams ngal sos/ /chog med blo ni dbul po yin zhes gsung ngo/ /dka' thub kyi srangs tshar pas 'phags pa'i brgyud pa zin pa ratna de ba'i zhal snga nas/ rgyu yi rnal 'byor rkyen las byol//
124b7(rgyud 'grel): lam pa'i rnal 'byor rkyen dang bral/ /'bras bu'i rnal 'byor rkyen thog 'bab/ /rtogs pa'i rkyen du gang ma song zhes gsung ngo/ /thugs rje'i 'od ldan ma su ri d+ha na'i zhal snga nas/ rgya mtsho nad gi sems can la/ /chu srin zas su ma gyur gang/ /de bzhin brtan pa thob pa pa/
125a1(rgyud 'grel): gro gsum gyur gang yang med/ /ces gsung ngo/ /'khrul pa ngos zin pas tshogs drug rtog pa'i rkyen bskul du shar ba a mo g+ha tsanda'i zhal snga nas/ lta med lta dang bral ba la/ /lta ba 'di yin ji ltar sku/ /gzhon nu ma yi bde ba bzhin//
125a2(rgyud 'grel): nyams myong brjod par nus ma yin zhes gsung ngo/ /bde ba'i stobs ldan ma sa na la'i zhal snga nas / gang gis khur bar chu blugs na/ /smra brjod nus pa ma yin no/ /don gyi rtsi 'thungs rnal 'byor pas/ /phyag rgya chen po brjod mi shes zhes gsung ngo/ /gnad
125a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi rang mtshang go bas rig pa'i rtsal 'byongs pa su ka dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas/ chu rnams thams cad rgya mtsho ru/ /lan tshwa'i ro ru gcig pa ltar/ /gdams pa'i gnad kyi ngo sprod du/ /chos rnams don gcig go par 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /sems la dbang
125a4(rgyud 'grel): thob par ru d+ha ra'i? zhal snga nas/ mig seng? gyis ni gzir pa yi/ /sa gzhi gser du mthong ba bzhin/ /de ltar don gyi rtsi mthungs pas/ /cir snang gdams par mthong bar 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /ye shes gshig rjes la ngos zin pa bi ma de pa'i zhal snga nas
125a5(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu bdud kyis khyer ba ni/ /de tshe bdag bstod gzhan la smod/ /rmongs pa'i grub mdza' mngon zhen can/ /'di ni lta ba'i bdud yin no/ /zhes gsung ngo/ /dpa' mo khyung bya'i ldem ru can pa li nga'i zhal snga nas/ mkhas pas khas len spang bar bya//
125a6(rgyud 'grel): thos pas rang rgyud dul ba ni/ /'di yi yon tan dgos pa stor/ /rig byed mthar phyin zhi zhing dul zhes gsung ngo/ /sna rtsed yid bcings par 'gyur ba srad su chud par ? tsan+d+ra'i zhal snga nas/ ji ltar yol bas bcang ba'i rgyab/ /bum pa la sogs ni mngon
125a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /de ltar 'dod pa'i mig btsum pas/ /zag pa phyi ru mthong mi 'gyur zhes gsung ngo/ /yid 'phrog rma bya'i lde ru can b+ha ga su na'i zhal snga nas / gang du gnyis 'dzin grol ba'i tshe/ /de dus 'khrul pa rang sar dag /chos nyid snang bshad ba la/ /bden pa
125b1(rgyud 'grel): mthong zhes rab tu brjod ces gsung ngo/ /ngo sprod gnad la phog pa'i phyag rgya chen po thog babs su shar ba mo dzir de ba'i zhal snga nas/ blo mdza' ma mthong lta ba ni/ /shes bya mu las grol bas zhig / snang stong rkyen dang bral ba las/ /skye ba med pa'i phyag rgya bcings
125b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsung ngo/ /bde ldan ma dung gi thor cog can ba ta mi'i zhal snga nas/ 'dzin blo thong la rtog pa chod/ /chos rnams gzhi ru mnyam pa la/ /brgyad dang bral ba rnal 'byor yin/ /ye shes sku ni las las grol zhes gsung ngo/ /ngo sprod gcig gi thog tu chos
125b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kun gyi don rig pa g+ha dzu de ba'i zhal snga nas/ ji ltar dbang po dangs pa'i mig /long na gzugs rnams mi mthong bzhin/ /de ltar 'dod pa'i blo med na/ /sgrib pas mthong bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo/ /gtum mo 'brug gi glag pa can bi ta la'i zhal snga nas/
125b4(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig gzugs med bar du ni/ /de la grib ma 'ong ba bzhin/ /de ltar 'dod pa'i blo yong phyir/ /sgrib pa spongs par 'gyur ma yin/ /grogs dag 'dod pa'i blo dang bral zhes gsung ngo/ /nyams kyi man ngag mar me cig nas cig tu spal ba'i lugs/ /de kho na
125b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid rnal du mtshon pa la/ /bdud rtsi'i chang rnam par phab pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //rgyal sras mi'i seng ge rje? dam pa rgya gar rin po che'i zhal snga nas/ rang 'gyur du mdzad pa / phyag rgya chen po dum bu khrigs/ /tshig tu nyung la
125b6(rgyud 'grel): don du 'gril/ /nyams myong skyes pa rdo rje'i mgur/ /ma rig mun sel sgron mo 'di/ /skal ldan mig gi dbang po yis/ /lta bas mi ngoms blos mi 'khyud/ /sgro 'dogs glags pa tsam gyis chod/ /a ma do re mtshar rdzogs sho// //
125b7(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad kyi don du gyur cig/ /phyag rgya chen po gser phreng zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /*/ /rgya gar skad du / mahA mu dra ka na ka mA le nA ma / bod skad du/ phyag rgya chen po gser phreng zhes bya ba/ bla ma dam pa rnams la
126a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /ljon shing me tog 'dab rgyas 'bras bu mngar mang zhing/ /chos ldan rgyal pos stong gsum zhing dul rgyan gyis mdzes/ nam mkha' i nyi zla'i gar dang rgyu skar gar dang bcas/ /klu rgyal spyi bo nor bu rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan//
126a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzes ldan yid 'phrog skyes bu mu tig pra yis spras?/ /mtshan ldan sangs rgyas lha mi 'khor gyi tshogs na gsal/ /nor bu rin chen yon tan mang ldan yang/ /ded dpon dang bral rgya mtshor bgrod mi nus/ /thos mang sde snod yon tan kun ldan yang/ /byin
126a3(rgyud 'grel): brlabs dang bral skye med don mi rtogs/ /dbyar gyi dus na sngo rnams skye 'gyur kyang/ /zhing lam btab lo tog 'byung min ltar/ /'gro drug sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin yang/ /ma bsgoms rnam grol ye shes don mi mthong/ /mig yong
126a4(rgyud 'grel): the tshom lam gyi 'drul chad de/ /'dod pa'i yul du phyin par 'gyur min ltar/ /yid ches ma gyur the tshom blo can gyis/ /bde chen byang chub go 'phang rnyed mi 'gyur/ /bsgom dang mi bsgom rtog pa blo yi yul/ /bsgom min snyam bral yengs su med
126a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sa/ /yid la mi byed phyag rgya chen po'i lam/ /kye 'o bya bral skye med blo las 'das/ /gsal stong 'od rig chos nyid ye shes sgron/ /bde stong zag med bde chen rgyal po la/ /snang stong rtog med chos nyid spyan pa yis/ /e ma ngo mtshar chos
126a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid bden pa mthong/ /sgyu ma 'od gsal chos sku 'od drang zhing/ /sgyu lus 'od gsal chos sku'i snang ba bzung/ /gnyis med lhan skyes chos nyid ? phrad kyis/ /kye ma bla ma sangs rgyas e sangs rgyas// //nA ga sa ra parya pa/ /sa
126a7(rgyud 'grel): wa sa ra ka ma ya/ /shI ti b+hu su b+hi ba pa/ /de ki u na min pa/ /bu dbri? tsa tra b+ha tra pa/ /Arya me ka ka ru pa/ /ra bi di ko kobd+ho li/ /b+ha ga bi ra ni lo pa'i/ /kaM ka ko ki a na ta/ /tsan+d+ra sarba ko ta li/ /b+ha de ka na kaM b+ha li/ /DoM b+hi he ru dA ri ka/ kaSh+Ni nA ga pra b+hA ka /ku ku
126b1(rgyud 'grel): tsa nu g+haN+Da pa// //gang gis mi rtogs rtog pa'i spyod pa mi bya ste/ /byas na rgyal po'i khrims la dmangs kyis gnod pa bzhin/ /rtogs pa rnams kyis ma rtogs spyod pa mi bya ste/ /byas na glang chen brtan pa 'dam du tshud pa bzhin/ /kye'o grogs
126b2(rgyud 'grel): dag lhan cig skyes pa de/ /gzhan nas mi rnyed bla ma'i zhal la dris/ /don dam zhal gyi ngo bo de rtogs na/ /yid ni 'chi med rlung yang chad pa med/ /chos nyid 'od gsal bde chen gyi/ /zag med mya ngan 'das kyi sku/ /gang gis ma rtogs rtogs med lam/ /bstan
126b3(rgyud 'grel): par mi nus snying po'i mchog /bdag lus rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /thar lam srog gcod phyi nang gi /rdul med rdul tshon la sogs kyi/ /dkyil 'khor 'bad rtsol ci yang med/ /bde stong gnyis med nyams myong bla ma yi/ /byin brlabs sgron me?
126b4(rgyud 'grel): chos nyid rang byung la/ /ma rtogs mi rtogs bsgom du med pa la/ /'di dang 'di zhes smrar med lkugs par spyod/ /gang nas ma 'ongs gang yang ni/ /mi 'gro skye med gnyug ma'i lam/ /chos nyid byang chub tshes sku yi/ /nyi ma ma rig mun dang bral/ /dus
126b5(rgyud 'grel): sbal lta bur 'khor ba yi/ /skyon gyis ma gos gdod nas dag /sgron ma mun bral bla ma yi/ /drin gyis ye shes nyi ma bde/ /ma blta bltas pas mthong ba med/ /ma rtog rtog dpyod yul min gyis/ /ma sems bsam du ci yang med/ /ma re re dogs
126b6(rgyud 'grel): yul las 'das/ /bltas pas mthong ba'i yul mi phyin/ /bsgom pa bla ma'i byin brlabs kyis/ /chos nyid don mthong ci yang ni/ /mi sems ngos bzung med par grol/ /bya ba btang ba'i skyes bu la/ /bya bral byar med bzung 'dzin med/ /re dogs dang
126b7(rgyud 'grel): bral nyams len la/ /mi rtog bsgom du ci yang med/ /e ma ngo mtshar chos nyid bden pa mthong/ /e ma byin brlabs nyams myong sgron ma 'bar/ /e ma bla ma'i dad gus yengs pa med/ /e ma 'bras bu rang gsol byin brlabs gsal/ /rang rig gdon
127a1(rgyud 'grel): ma ma skyes pa/ /stong pa ma bcos lhun gyis grub/ /sems nyid rang rig rang gsal gyi/ /nor bu gsal dangs go mi 'gags/ /bsgom dang mi bsgom rtog bcas kyis/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal rnyed mi 'gyur/ /bsgom
127a2(rgyud 'grel): med yengs su med pa la/ /ma bcos yengs med lhug pa nyid/ /rang rig lhan cig skyes pa yi/ /chos nyid bde chen smrar med la/ /bdag gzhan bde sdug blo las 'das/ /chos nyid bden mthong chos sku'i klong/ /rang rig rang gis rtogs pa la/ /
127a3(rgyud 'grel): chu khams gser dang nam mkha' bzhin/ /sangs rgyas sems can 'khor 'das dag /sbang blar tha dad ci yang med/ /dug gsum rang grol ches kyi sgron ma yi/ /rtsa rlung bde stong gnyis med la/ /tha ma la rnam rtog dngos por 'dzin pa ye/ /chags sdang
127a4(rgyud 'grel): mdud pa rang sar bzung 'dzin grol/ /ye shes lus can chos nyid gsal dangs la/ /mdza' bral brten med dmigs su mang pa'i phyir/ /'khrul dang ma 'khrul 'khrul gzhi 'khrul pa yi/ /rtsa ba skye med bya bral dang du chad/ /'ja' tshon lta bu sgyu ma'i sku/ /
127a5(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig phyag rgya zhen med kyi/ /dbang po rang snang thug phrad kyis/ /chos nyid bden pa mthong pa yin/ /zag med bde chen ches nyid nyi ma yi/ /las kyi phyag rgya chos nyid ye shes sgron/ /skye med byang chub kun rtog bral pa yi/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bde
127a6(rgyud 'grel): chen klong du sad/ /bdag lus rgyal pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /dpa' po mkha' 'gro chos kyis ni/ /phyag rgya rtsa rlung byang chub sems/ /gnyug ma dmigs su ci yang med/ /sems nyid bde stong chos nyid kyi/ /don rtogs phyag rgya chen po'i lam/ /dmigs bya
127a7(rgyud 'grel): dmigs byed dmigs med la/ /cing? yang bsam du med pa nyid/ /bdag med seng ge'i sgra sgrogs kyis/ /steng nyid ting 'dzin sgron ma yis/ /bde sdug rtag chad la sogs kyi/ /sgrib pa ma lus sel bar byed/ /dge dang mi dge'i las rnams ni/ /'dzin med
127b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyug ma'i ngang du yal/ /chos nyid bde ba chen po'i sku/ /rang rig gnyis med ngang du 'phrod/ /pi waM sgra bzhin dam tshig gi /sgron ma bral na bde med phyir/ /dam tshig nyi ma ye shes kyi/ /nyi ma chos nyid nyi ma mthong/ /dbang bzhi bsgrod pas lam bzhi mthong
127b2(rgyud 'grel): sku bzhi phyag rgya bzhi du grol/ /thabs ldan zung 'jug rdo rje'i sku/ /bdag lus rgyal ba'i ngang du rdzogs/ /bag chags ye shes rang grol la/ /rtag chad spang blang sgro skur ci yang med/ /gdod nas dag pa chos nyid gnyug ma la/ /sgrib byed bying rgod re dogs ci
127b3(rgyud 'grel): yang med/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rang rig 'od gsal la/ /dran pas gzung dang bzung 'dzin ci yang med/ /nyon mongs rang dangs rnam rtog chos sku la/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas btsal du ci yang med/ /gser 'gyur rtsi ltar khams gsum nyid/ /bde
127b4(rgyud 'grel): chen chos nyid rol gang ba/ /don dam 'khor ba kun thob? dag /mdza' bral chos nyid dbu ma'i lam/ /gtsang dang mi gtsang rtog pa yi/ /sle sha bzung 'dzin 'khor ba'i chos/ /'khrul pas bde chen mthong pa med/ /ma mthong rnal 'byor de mi rnyed/ /tha mal
127b5(rgyud 'grel): shes pa snying gi dbus su sang?/ /tshogs drug dag na bde brgyan mi 'chad/ /brtags pa thams cad don med sdug bsngal rgyu/ /bsgom du med pas gnyug ma'i dang la zhog /phyag rgya chen po rang la lhun gyis grub pa ste/ /mi bsam mi rig 'bad pa med pa'i
127b6(rgyud 'grel): ngang la zhog /char? pa ? sngon du nyams myong rang gis myong/ /rtag par mi 'gyur mngon zhen med pa zung du 'jug /shing rta'i 'khor lo gnyis dang mi ldan gang yang 'gro ba mi nus ltar/ /sbyin sogs 'bad pa byas kyang bla ma mi ldan dngos grub dam pa min /
127b7(rgyud 'grel): bya rgod? rtsal rdzogs 'dab mar bcas pa dag gis nam mkha' gcod cing rgyu/ /skal bzang rnams ni dbang dang byin brlabs gdams pa khong du chod pas bde/ /rgya mtsho zab cing rgya che dag gi nang na nor bus gang ba la/ /klu yi rgyal po rnams kyis mnga' ? gang?
128a1(rgyud 'grel): yin de ni ngo mtshar che/ /snang grags thams cad ye nas chos sku 'gyur med yin pa la/ /rtogs dang nyams myong ldan pa'i rnal 'byor rnams kyis longs spyod ngo mtshar che/ /gser 'gyur rtsi yi nus pa yis/ /lcags
128a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams gser du bsgyur ba ltar/ /rin chen dbang gi nus pa yis/ /nyon mongs ye shes gnyis med bskyur/ /rtogs pa yid bzhin nor bu la/ /nyams su myong ba'i mdog phyung bas/ /spyod pa'i nus pas dgos 'dod 'byung/ ro snyoms ldan brtsams
128a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis 'grub/ /rang la bde chen yod kyang ma rtogs 'khrul pas bsgribs/ /de bsal 'dod pas bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsag bya/ /tshogs gnyis ma bsags bskol pa brgya ru 'bad byas kyang/ /bla ma mi ldan bde ba chen po
128a4(rgyud 'grel): rtogs mi 'gyur/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas ngo bo gcig /de yi rang bzhin rang gis sems/ /rtogs par 'dod na ji bzhin zhog /goms par byas na mngon sum 'gyur/ /bla ma ngag las dang po rang gi sems rtogs bya/ /de nas chos rnams
128a5(rgyud 'grel): kun dang tha dad med byas la/ /gnyis med rtogs shing dur khrod gnas su 'dug nas ni/ /nyams rtogs smyon pa'i brtul zhugs ngang gis spyad/ /rta dang glang po rgya mtsho 'dran mnyam nyid bde/ /spre'u chu yi ri mo bris pa 'dra na spros par 'gyur/ /chu bo
128a6(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma sman dang 'dran? dbyer mi phyed/ /gtsug phud dmigs dang 'khor los sgyur rgyal lta bu 'thob/ /sa la gnas pa kun kyang bskal pa bzang/ /rgya mtsho'i gting du phyin na dbul dang bral/ /ral gri lag na thogs na longs spyod che/ /phyogs med
128a7(rgyud 'grel): sa la phyin na gnyen dang phrad/ /sems ma gdungs na lta ba che/ /zhan pa med na ro snyoms yin/ /'bad pa brab na bsgom pa'i mchog /gnyis snang bral na rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /la la ra sa d+h+ru tI gsum/ /rang byin rlob cing bcing bar bya/ /bla ma sems
128b1(rgyud 'grel): dang snang ba gsum/ /rtogs pa bskyed phyir bsten par bya/ /phyag rgya chen po gser phreng las/ /tshogs 'khor dang po byin brlabs shugs byung gi le'u ste dang po'o// //lU yI dza lan b+hi rba pa/ ka ma in+d+ra kha ra b+ha/ /paM ku na tha g+ho ra kha/ /
128b2(rgyud 'grel): to ka b+he Ni bi na si/ /g+hu na an dzo kaM tha ri/ /d+ha bu ta ba po te le/ /o tra sa ka na tri yi/ /kaM ka sa na ga na si/ /tsa ba su ku si ya? li/ /su ta d+harma gu ru na/ /ra hu ku su ku ma dri/ /la kha d+ha kha pa ra bu/ /d+ho pi Da Ne ra ba/ /tsa ma d+ha kha snying po ba/ /khyi rgod mi srun
128b3(rgyud 'grel): sna la sbrang rtsi bskus na phyogs rnams kun tu za bar byed/ /blo dman skal pa med pa'i gang zag dag la gdams pa byin na rang rgyud sreg /glang chen brtan pa dpa' ba' i sna la ral gri skur na dgra dpung thams cad 'joms/ /skal bzang blo ldan skye med
128b4(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa'i snang ba thug phrad dag gis rnam rtog 'joms/ /skye med rtogs kyang nyams su myong bral na/ /de yang srin po'i lag na bu khyer 'dra/ /nyams su myong yang gnas lugs ma rtogs na/ /glang chen sna la lcags kyu brgyab pa 'dra/ /sangs rgyas mchod
128b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs rnams la don mi 'byung/ /'dod dang rtsol ba yod na sangs mi rgyas/ /byin brlabs bla ma'i ngang gis nyams myong 'phel/ blo yi cha la yin gyis don ma yin/ /gang yang ma lta dbus su ltos/ /mchog dang dga' bral bde ba che/ /sngags rigs gsang pa
128b6(rgyud 'grel): smyon spyod nas/ /rnal 'byor rtags kyis bsgyur bar bya/ /dus kyi sna rtse bdag byin brlabs ldan na/ /phyi dang nang gi spyod pa dag gis sangs mi rgya/ /bde ba rab rgyas snang ba dag dang khyad med na/ /zhen pa btang bas nyams myong mchog thob 'gyur/ /rje btsun
128b7(rgyud 'grel): dam pa bsten na de nyid mthong/ /nags tshal mthongs su bsgoms na dben pa 'thob/ /chos rnams sems su rtogs na mi mthun med/ /nam mkha' i 'o ma 'thungs na tshim par 'gyur/ /bde dang stong pa mdza' bral nyid rtogs na/ /dpag bsam shing rten pa yis
129a1(rgyud 'grel): mnyen byas te/ /mtsho las skyes bu rgyal bas 'gro shes na/ /bram ze pha dang ma las bu skye 'gyur/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis/ /bzung 'dzin chags sdang rang sang chad/ /rmi lam sgyu 'dra zhen med kyis//
129a2(rgyud 'grel): nyams myong gsal snang go ma 'gags/ /gsal lo gsal lo bde chen gyi/ /bla ma byang chub lam mkhan gsal/ /gnyis med chos nyid gsal dangs kyi/ /nyams myong gnyug mi'i dang du gsal/ /bde'o bla ma bde chen bde/ /bde bar mi 'dzin
129a3(rgyud 'grel): cir yang mi rtog bde/ /bzung 'dzin dang grol 'dzin pa rang dangs bde/ /bya bral skyes bu byar med blo 'das bde/ /stong ngo stong ngo tha mal lus/ /sgyu lus zhen med dbyings su stong/ /zung 'jug skye med dang du stong/ /rang rig lhan skyes sku ru stong//
129a4(rgyud 'grel): rig go rig go rang gi sems/ /cing yang mi 'dzin rtog med rig /gar yang ma spyod smra med rig /rtog spyod yul las 'das par rig /mi rtog rtog med rtog spyod yul las 'das/ /mi sems bsam med bsam du rtsi yang med/ /rtan dang brtan med
129a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro 'ong gnas dang bral/ /'khor 'das bde sdug bde chen klong du sad/ /ma bcas yongs med rang bzhin lhug pa la/ /sems byung rgyun chad 'od gsal 'gro 'od bral/ /snang ba smrar med slob dpon yongs su med/ /chos nyid dang gsal rig pa chos sbyang
129a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phrod/ /sems nyid ma mthong ci yang med/ /da ltar ltar med bstan du med/ /ma yengs ma yengs med yongs su med/ /bsgom med bsgom du med pa yin/ /bral lo bral lo 'khor 'das bral/ /bde chen chos nyid klong du bral/ /rig pa smrar med dang du bril//
129a7(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa zhen med dbyings su bral/ /bya ba byar med skam sar gnas/ /e ma chos nyid chos nyid mthong/ /kye ma sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas/ /kye'o byang chub go 'phang thog /e ma ngo mtshar 'chi rgyu med/ /snang srid mi bden gdong nas brdzun/ /dgra thun ye shes 'khrul
129b1(rgyud 'grel): snang yin/ /byas pa thams cad don med sdug bsngal dang/ /chags sdang bral na sangs rgyas yin/ /byas pa thams cad don med sdug bsngal rgyu/ /byar med bde'o rnal 'byor rtsol med bde/ /cil bsams kyang dgos 'dod mi 'byung bas/ /bsam du med pa gnyug
129b2(rgyud 'grel): ma'i dang la bde/ /sems nyid bde chen thig le'i sku/ /bde stong dbyer med sems kyi rgyun/ /nam mkha' lta bur brjod med kyis/ /chos nyid bltar med bstan du med/ /e ma ngo mtshar bla ma'i sku/ /stong nyid spros bral rtog med dang/ /snang stong
129b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyer med stong pa'i dbyings/ /chos sku skye med rgyun du ldan/ /snang sems sangs rgyas sems can dag /nyi ma dang ni 'od? bzhin du/ /spangs thob las grol zhe 'dod med/ /gang la med pa de sangs rgyas/ /shes bya snang ba rang bzhin bral/ /shes pa
129b4(rgyud 'grel): gsal la rtog med de/ /sems nyid bde chen zag med la/ /yengs med bsgom du ci yang med/ /sems nyid bla ma sangs rgyas sku/ /snang sems 'dus byas dge ba'i gzhi/ /chos sku ngan song ting 'dzin lam/ /nga rgyal gnyis med byang sems ldan/ /chos nyid ma bcos
129b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba yi/ /thog mdza' re dogs mnyam dang bral/ /bsgom bya sgom byed blang dor spangs/ /'bras bu rang gsal rang gi mchog /rang rig lhan cig skyes kyi sku/ /ngo bo rig pa rang gsal gyi/ /'gro drug sangs rgyas snying po la/ /dam tshig rtog med rgyan dang ldan//
129b6(rgyud 'grel): snang sems chos nyid chos kyi ni/ /sku can mnyam bral rtog med kyi/ /dag pa'i sgyu lus byang chub lam/ /zung 'jug skye med bde 'gro'i rgyan/ /snang sems rang rig bde chen spros dang bral/ /sgyu ma rtsa rlung rlung sems brjod du med/ /rmi lam 'od gsal bde chen zung 'jug la//
129b7(rgyud 'grel): sku gzhi ye shes gsal snang go ma 'gags/ /bltar med ba lta ru med pa yi/ /rang sems rnam dag bla mar snang/ /snang ba stong pa bde chen sku/ /bde stong dbyer med byin brlabs rgyan/ /sems nyid ltar med blo 'das gyi/ /rtsa ni gsal stong mkha' 'gro'i gsang/ /snang
130a1(rgyud 'grel): ba stong nyid bde chen sku/ /snang stong dbyer med mkha' 'gro'i rgyan/ /bya bral rtogs med rlung sems kyi/ /snang ba stod pa spros dang bral/ /stong nyid bde chen brjod du med/ /bde stong mdza' bral rlung gi rgyan/ /rang sems bde chen byang
130a2(rgyud 'grel): chub sems/ /zag med bde chen chos kyi sku/ /snang ba 'od gsal stong pa'i klong/ /bde stong ye shes byang chub rgyan/ /snang ba rmi lam bden pas stong/ /gzung 'dzin chags sdang 'khrul snang yul/ /btags ba chu shing snying po med/ /zhen med gang snang
130a3(rgyud 'grel): lam gyi rgyan/ /gang nas ma 'ongs gar yang ni/ /mi 'gro mi rtog sems nyid la/ /bltar med bstan du med pa yi/ /chos nyid ngo bo mthong gi rgyan/ /'khor bsdug bsngal bde med kyang/ /bla ma'i byin brlabs ngo sprod lam/ /bying rgong bsgom pa nyams kyi dgra/
130a4(rgyud 'grel): rang rig 'od gsal mthong gi rgyan/ /nyams myong bya bral blo 'das kyi/ /bsgom pa dmigs brtags bzung 'dzin bral/ /cir yang rtog med lhun grub la/ /re dogs dgag bsgrub rang grol rgyan/ /ye shes lus can stong pa nyid/ /snying rje rgyan ldan zung
130a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jug lam/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med phyir/ /bde chen phyag rgya chen po'i sku/ /bde'o shugs byung zhen med kyi/ /blo 'das nyams myong gnyug? ma'i klong/ /bsgom med yongs su med pa yi/ /chos nyid ye shes rgyan ldan bde/ /gang yang mi rtog cing mi sems/ /
130a6(rgyud 'grel): gang? yang mi 'dzin rtog dpyod bral/ /byar med rig pa dang gsal ba/ /bcas bcos mi bya rang grol rgyan/ /bde'o ci bder rtog med nyams/ /stong ngo chos nyid blo 'das dang/ /spyod ro snyoms shugs byung lam/ /grol lo re dogs rang grol rgyan/ /cir yang mdo
130a7(rgyud 'grel): snang srid yul/ /gar yang stong ngos 'dzin sems/ /rtog dpyod med do 'khor 'das lam/ /mi bsgom mi dpyad gnyug ma'i rgyan/ /chu rgyun gnas pa'i nyams bstan na/ /spyod pa bags kyis 'gro bar bya/ /bla ma dam pa'i gdams dag gis/ /chags sdang
130b1(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa zhi bar byed/ /phyag rgya chen po gser phred las/ /tshegs 'khor gnyis pa bsgom don nyams kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //ti lo na do b+ha su tra/ /gos can d+hA ta'i ram ya/ /spyod pa ra tri mai tri pa/ /b+ho ta legs sbyin pad+ma
130b2(rgyud 'grel): zhabs/ /badzra d+harma phro? gi ni/ /kah+na me kha mahA la/ /ra ri raM ka ka so ri/ /'bar ba tsandi si ru pa/ /dz+nyA na badzra me lha pa/ /DoM pi b+ha ta ri bo ?/ /ka ma kri ta pra dz+nyA ru/ /badzra ka na na ma se/ /ho ra si ti ka ro? na/ /b+hu ti ta mo ta 'bras na// //
130b3(rgyud 'grel): ri rab gser gyi ngos la bya gnas pa/ /bya yi rang bzhin bor nas gser du snang/ /mkhas pa dag gis skye ba med rtogs ni/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin 'tshams bde ba che/ /bdag nyi gdod ma nyid nas sangs rgyas yin pa la/ /rnam rtog dbang gis sangs
130b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas nyid ni ngas ma mthong/ /rtogs pa'i dus na mthong ba med de thos pa med/ /gnyis med gang gis rtogs pa de ni rgyag rgya che/ /byis pa chung ngu ma yis gsos pas stobs dang ldan pa bzhin/ /blo chung dag kyang bla ma'i gdams par rim gyis theg pa che/ /rlung
130b5(rgyud 'grel): mkhris bad kan 'dus pa'i nad kun sman gyi nus pas sel ba ltar/ /nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa'i nad rab thams cad bla ma'i gdams pas sreg /long ba'i tshogs kun mig ldan gyi/ /skyes bus 'khrid par byed pa ltar/ /ye shes lam stong bla ma yi/ /spyan
130b6(rgyud 'grel): pas byang chub 'khrid par byed/ /'khor los sgyur rgyal dbung gi tshogs/ /gling rnams kun la dbang byed bzhin/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ro rnyed nas/ /'khor ba dbang bskyur bde ba che/ /rigs ldan rigs mchog rigs kyi dbang/ /bla ma mkha' 'gro chos nyid grogs/ /lha?
130b7(rgyud 'grel): spyod bsgom don lhan cig skyes/ /dpe don ye shes bden pa mthong/ /las can rnal 'byor dbang gi lam/ /sku gsum chos nyid 'od gsal che/ /sems nyid gsal dngos sgyu ma'i sku/ /rnam grol phyag rgya zung du 'jug /'gro drug skyes pa sdom gsum rkyan/ /lha sgom snod?
131a1(rgyud 'grel): ba zhen med skas/ /rang lus bde chen ngo bor rig /dgag sgrub spang blang nyams dang bral/ /de dogs dang gsal bla ma'i drin/ /bdag ma rtogs pa'i gong nas 'bras chan dag dang ro 'di khyad bar che/ /rtogs nas mngar
131a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'bras chan dag rul ba yi ro 'di khyad par med/ /de bzhin ma rtogs dus na 'khor ba dag dang sangs rgyas tha dad brtags/ /rtogs pa'i dus na 'khor bdag ni ye nas sangs rgyas chen po'i sku/ /bya ba btang na man ngag yin/ /zhe 'dod med na rtogs
131a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yin/ /bde ba dngos med bsgom pa yin/ /bsgrub bya med na spyod pa yin/ /thabs dang shes rab ya dzan lta/ /bla ma chu yi rgyun gyis rab tu khyab/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i dpag bsam shing dag pa/ /'bras bu lhun grub dang la rab tu rdzogs/ /sangs rgyas kun
131a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi sdom pa'i mchog /rang yid rtog la mi gnas pas/ /gnyug ma'i sems kyis gang rtogs pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad des mthong yin/ /rnal 'byor pa yis gang thos thams cad dam pa ste/ /mthong ba de yis skye med rtogs phyir slob dpon mchog/
131a5(rgyud 'grel): byas pa kun gyis gnyis med gsal phyir thabs yin te/ /dge sdig 'bras bu skyes bu de la gnyis mi 'gyur/ /gang las bla ma dam pa las/ /dbang las lhan cig skyes pa yi/ /ro yis kun la khyab pa ste/ /skye med rgyas thebs rdo rje 'dzin/ /bde dang stong pa
131a6(rgyud 'grel): dbyer med snying ga pad+ma dag la rdzogs/ /skye med yid la byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab bde chen sems/ /snang grags thams cad ngo snyoms rnam gsum rnal 'byor rnams kyis spyod/ /rje btsun dag gi byin brlabs shar bas dbyer med rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /
131a7(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams kun dang rang gi sems rnams du mar spyod/ /rtogs pa thams cad nyams myong gdams pa don bral na/ /nor bu 'ching bu dag la rang bzhin du bde na/ /chos rnams de dang ldan na re dogs med pas rang bde zhig /dang po blo ldan rtogs pa bskyed/ /gnyis
131b1(rgyud 'grel): pa nags su sna rtse bsgoms/ /nyams su myong ba skyes pa na/ /spyod pas khyad par 'gro bar bya/ /gang gang lhan cig skyes pa de/ /glang po che yi mig bzhin du/ /gzer re bskyed nas zug rdu 'byung/ /glod na zhen med bsam gtan mchog /bde'o bde'o gnas med bde//
131b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa med pa'i rang bzhin bde/ /brtags pa thams cad der shes bde/ /bsgrub pa med pa'i sangs rgyas bde/ /go cha chen po bgos nas kyang/ /nor bu lta bu'i snying stobs kyis/ /rang gi sems la grub gtad na/ /mi ro'i khog bar bde chen zhugs/ /gang
131b3(rgyud 'grel): gis gang du gang las nis/ /rtog cing dpyod pa'i blo las ni/ /dngos 'dzin gdon gyis dbang song phyir/ /cir yang mi 'dzin blo gros mchog /snang ba chos nyid nyi ma la/ /bzung 'dzin khri mon smag du tshud/ /sems nyid rang gsal chos sku nyid/ /ma rig mun
131b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dra bas bstums/ /gnyis med bde chen bla ma'i drin/ /shugs byung zhen dral nyams kyi klong/ /rang grol rang bzhin spyod pa'i 'gros/ /re dogs las grol chos kyi sku/ /skye med kun rtogs spangs pa yis/ /byang chub las chen rtog dang bral/ /me rtog
131b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin med blo las 'das/ /gang du btsal yang rtog med dang/ /rang bzhin dri med thabs dang shes rab kyi/ /rang bzhin sems gang las ni sangs rgyas kyi/ /yon tan rin chen rin thang med kyi mdzod/ /dam chos nyi ma bla ma'i drin gyis bltos/ /'khrul
131b6(rgyud 'grel): bcas bdan las 'des pa yi/ /nyon mongs 'ching ba gcod mdzad kyi/ /chos nyid bden pa mnga' brnyes pa'i/ /bshes gnyen skye med 'od gsal mthong/ /shes rab mig bral dngos po yi/ /gdon 'dzoms bdag gzhan gang chen sku/ /cir yang rtog med bya bral
131b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi/ nyams myong ye shes sgron ma gsal/ /gang gis dngos rang dngos med du/ /'dzin te mar me lta bu du/ /blo yi yul min spang ka'i phyir/ /blo 'das bas bcos rgya mdud zhig /thabs bral shes rab sgron ma nyid/ /nam mkha' me tog shes rab lam/ /de ?
132a1(rgyud 'grel): ru ltar don med kyi/ /spung bya mdza' 'dzin blo dang bral/ /gang gis gnyis med don rtogs na/ /chos nyid ma mthong chos sku yi/ /chos nyid nyi ma yongs su med/ /de nyid phyag du chen po yin/ /shes dang shes bya las grol gyi//
132a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor 'das stong nyid 'od gsal ba/ /bltar med bstan du med pa yi/ /blo 'das shes rab sgron ma nyid/ /snying rje rgyun ldan gru rdzings kyi/ /'gro rnams 'khor ba bzod med kyi/ /sdug bsngal mtsho tshan po las/ /ma lus sgrol mdzad thabs kyi skas//
132a3(rgyud 'grel): snang sems gnyis mod thabs dang ni/ /shes rab dbyer med byang chub lam/ /chu dang 'o ma lta bu ru/ /ro mnyam nyams myong dbyer mi byed/ /yod med bzung 'dzin mtshan nyid dang/ /mtshon bya dang bzhin dri legs so/ /gnyis med ye shes chos nyid sgron//
132a4(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang/ /'gro rnams bde sdug skyon yon gzhi/ /nam mkha' la ni sprin bzhin du/ /ma lus sems can thams cad la/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur gnas/ /dgag sgrub ri dogs las grol? gyi/ /nyams myong bltar med
132a5(rgyud 'grel): bstan du med/ /yang dag don gyi de nyid la/ /yang dag don mthong rnam par grol/ /ris drug sdug bsngal sems kyi ni/ /snang ba nyams myong bde chen la/ /snang b mthun snang med pa ru/ /bla ma'i drin mthong rnal byor grol/ /don chen nyi ma byang chub kyi//
132a6(rgyud 'grel): chos nyid ye shes spyan pa yi/ /nyams myong sgron la thams cad kyi/ /bde chen smrar med don mthong bde/ /kun rtog 'ching ba gcod mdzad kyi/ /bla ma'i drin thob zhen med nyams/ /gang gis bya ra ma byed bar/ /gnas pas 'khor bar bde mi rnyed/ /sgra don
132a7(rgyud 'grel): 'brel med thos nas ni/ /shes rab yul las 'das pa'i phyir/ /bla ma'i drin gyis sems dang ni/ /nor bu rin chen yon tan ldan/ /dad gus yengs med dam tshig gi /sgron ma bdag lus rgyal ba'i mdzod/ /bde chen yon tan 'byung gi gnas/ /bltar med don mthong
132b1(rgyud 'grel): ngo mtshar che/ /gang nas ma 'ong gang yang ni/ /'gro 'ongs las grol gnyug ma yi/ /nyams myong smrang med gnyug ma yi/ /nyams myong smra med yengs su med/ /bsgom pa 'bral med blo las 'das/ /chos nyid 'od gsal dag pa'i sems/ /byang
132b2(rgyud 'grel): chub gsal snang chos kyi dbyings/ /bde chen ye shes spu can gyi/ /sems kyi nor bu dri med rnyed/ /ma blta bde chen mthong du med/ /ma rtogs nyams myong blo las 'das/ /ma sems rtog pa chos nyid klong/ /cir yang bya bral yengs su med/ /di ring mchog
132b3(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa'i nyams myong rin po che/ /brtags pa ma yin gnyug ma yengs su med pa'i dang/ /yengs med gzugs kyis bdag 'dzin dngos po 'joms mdzad pa'i/ /gnas lugs dge sdig spang blang ci yang bsam du med/ /dmigs med yid la mi
132b4(rgyud 'grel): byed dran pa yi/ /kun rtog 'ching ba gcod mdzad ye shes sgron/ /rgyu ba chos nyid chos sku'i glong du chad/ /ma bsgoms dmus long mthong ba'i yul min phyir/ /bsgom pa bdud rtsi'i ro tshor bla ma'i drin/ /byin brlabs brgyud pa gnyug ma'i
132b5(rgyud 'grel): nyams myong la/ /bde ba'i ngo ? ngos bzung ci yang med/ /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /rtog med rtog dpyod yul las 'das/ /bsgom dang bsgom ba cir yang med/ /mi 'dzin 'dzin rtog 'khrul pa spangs/ /chos kyi spyan can chos kyi ni//
132b6(rgyud 'grel): glu can chos kyi sgron ma yis/ /tshogs gnyis chos kyi rnga bo che/ /byang chub lam chen chos kyi dung/ /bdag med 'od gsal sgra sgrogs dus/ /nor bu rin chen 'dod 'jo'i ba/ /'chi med bdud rtsi bcud kyi len/ /ljon shing me tog 'bras ldan gyi//
132b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtshor ri rab bum ba bzang/ /nam mkha' nyi zla glu gar brtso/ /mngon sum dang ni rjes dpag gis/ /brtags pa don shes don mthong gi /yid ches nges dang bcas pa yi/ /sngar 'dris ma bung? ma tshig 'jal/ /chos dang chos min mnyam nyid las/ /
133a1(rgyud 'grel): tha dad 'gro rnams brdzun blo yis/ /thar pa'i srog gcod tshe 'di yi/ /rnam rtog thar med chu srin kha/ /snying rje dang ni stong pa nyid/ /ya bral tha dad don mi mthong/ /stong dang snying rje 'byer med lam/ /'khor ba mya ngan
