133a2(rgyud 'grel): 'das mi gnas/ /zhen pa'i blo can rtag ba yi/ /yul gyi rgya mdud su mi 'dod/ /'dod yon lhan cig skyes pa yi/ /bde ba'i ros gang skye med lam/ /rang bzhin dge ba'i sems nyid ni/ /gnyug ma'i bde chen mngon sum gyi/ /lhan skyes ngo tshor
133a3(rgyud 'grel): brjod med na/ /rtags kyis de nyid don mi rnyed/ /bde chen 'khor 'das rtog pa yi/ /blo can rmongs rnams 'ching ba'i phyir/ /gang dang gang du bltas gyur kyang/ /de nyid blo yi yul las 'das/ /rang rig bde chen mtshon du med pa'i lam/ /lhan
133a4(rgyud 'grel): cig skyes pa'i yid can gnyug ma'i ro/ /bla ma'i drin rtogs skye med bsgom pa yi/ /nyams las don mthong skye med ngo mtshar che/ /'gro rnams 'ching byed las la ni/ /rnam grol don shes rang rig gi /sems rtogs mya ngan 'das kyi mchog /de
133a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid spros pa'i yul dang bral/ /sems nyid nor bu rin chen mdzod/ /'khor 'das srid zhi mya ngan 'das/ /dge sdig sa pon bag chags rtsa/ /thar lam byang chub rnyed kyi sku/ /rang sems chos nyid nam mkha' yi/ /grong du grol na 'gro rnams kun//
133a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag ye shes nyi ma ste/ /rnam grol byang chub gzhan dga' med/ /'gro rnams bde chen ros? gang yang/ /thabs bral de nyid don mi mthong/ /thabs ldan bya bral skyes bu la/ /'chi med 'gro 'ong yul las 'das/ /gang gang 'dzin de dngos
133a7(rgyud 'grel): po yi/ /gdon gyi dbang gyur rmongs rnams la/ /'ching las thar lam med pa'i phyir/ /thar pa'i lam ston 'dzin med ltos/ /rlung gi rta zhon rtog bcas yid kyi bu/ /bzung 'dzin sgrang ma 'dod yon rjes su snyeg /gang snyegs bde med 'khor ba'i 'khrul
133b1(rgyud 'grel): bcad de/ /ye shes byang chub rtsa rlung chas nyid zung/ /gang gang rigs 'dzin rtog pa yi/ /dbang song 'dod yon ltad mo nyid/ /bdag gzhan ltos med mthong ba las/ /rang rgyud ma mthong 'dod mi tshim/ /dngos med dngos dang bral ba yi/ /chos rnams dngos
133b2(rgyud 'grel): dang dngos min phyir/ /gang dang gang du 'dzin de nyid/ /blo yi yul yin 'dzin rtog phyir/ /stong dang stong nyid 'bras bu rung/ /dngos por 'dzin pa'i gdon chen gyis/ /gzhan dbang bran ltar ma bkol na/ /gang la gnas pa de mi mthong ngo/ /mos pa'i blo ldan
133b3(rgyud 'grel): gus pa'i blo gros mchog /las kyi mtshams sbyor bag chags rtsa ba can/ /yid kyi lus can chos nyid don mthong gi /gzhan don nor bu dpag bsam shing ltar mthong/ /ting 'dzin bying rgod las grol rtog pa yi/ /rlung gi mi bskyod rtog med chos kyi ni//
133b4(rgyud 'grel): sku can bla ma chos nyid sku yi/ /ri bo nyis ma rig mun bral mdzod/ /'gro la brtse ba'i blo can thugs rje yi/ /rgya mtsho mi g.yo dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /thugs rje'i mnga' bdag thugs kyi dkor mdzad nas/ /ye shes sgron ma byang chub pa lam mkhan mdzod//
133b5(rgyud 'grel): me tog 'bras ldan 'gyur med dpag bsam shing/ /'chi med bdud rtsi'i ros gang ku sA li/ /bdag med bde chen spros bral rtsed mo yi/ /'gyur med don ston dngos po'i gdon 'joms mdzod/ /skye med 'od gsal stong nyid 'od 'phro yi/ /nor bu rin chen
133b6(rgyud 'grel): yon tan kun ldan gyis/ /dpal ldan dpal gyi 'byung gnas A tsIrya/ /gnyis med spros bral stong nyid sgra sgrogs mdzad/ /bde chen bde ba'i 'byung gnas sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang/ /mi 'jigs seng ge 'jigs bral ma hA paN+Di ta/ /bum pa me
133b7(rgyud 'grel): tog bcud ldan sgrang rtsi len bzhin du/ /rang bzhin rtog med blo 'das sgron ma'i don ston mdzod/ /bsod nams mchog gis brkyan pa yi/ /nam mkha' i yon tan mi zad gter/ /sangs rgyas ye shes d+harma bzhi/ /d+hU taM byang chub chos thob mdzod/ /sgyu?  med sgro
134a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan nam mkha' lta bu yi/ /chos rnams stong nyid 'od gsal 'dus ma byas/ /mdza' bral bdag med spros bral chos sku yi/ /tshogs ldan nyi mas ye shes don rtogs shog /rang bzhin lhan skyes 'gro rnams lhan skyes 'gro rnams lhan
134a2(rgyud 'grel): cig skyes kyi sku/ /chos rnams rnam dag mya ngan 'das kyi dbyings/ /rnam rtog dang bral tshogs gnyis lhun grub sangs rgyas spyan/ /tshogs rje tshogs kyi bdag po chos nyid don mthong shog /sangs rgyas kun sdom bcom ldan mkha' 'gro ma yi sdom//
134a3(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i 'byung gnas bde chen nyi ma bde ba kun gyi dpal/ /bla ma'i gsang mdzod gdams dag snying po don gyi gsang ldan mdzod/ /bde chen bdag med bde chen po'i tshogs dang ldan gyur cig /srid dang zhi ba rnam dag ni/ /ro mnyam dkyil 'khor
134a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan gyi gtso/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo tshogs kyi mchog /tshogs rje tshogs bdag dpal ldan shog /gnyis med 'dzin dang bral ba yi/ /chos rnams dngos med stong pa nyid/ /chos nyid 'od gsal tshogs kyi ni/ /'khor lo byang chub don mthong shog/
134a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom bya sgom byed dmigs pa yi/ /kun rtog 'ching ba gcod mdzad kyi/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo tshogs kyi ni/ /byams mgon rgyun dang ldan par shog /zhi ba'i blo gros bdag med mya ngan 'das kyi dbyings/ /ji srid bde chen byang chub mchog gi sems/ /snying
134a6(rgyud 'grel): rje'i rgyun ldan gsang sngags snying po don gyi bcud/ /sgyu ma byang chub lam chen sangs rgyas byang chub 'od/ /dngos dang dngos med brtan g.yo gnyis dang gnyis 'dzin gyi/ /lam stong khyab bdag bcom ldan mi yi seng+ge ni/ /sangs rgyas grong khyer tshogs
134a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lo'i grong mchog tu/ /byang chub sgron ma ye shes sgron ma'i 'od ldan zhing/ /sems can rnam dag gdong nas sangs rgyas rang bzhin yang/ /ris drug rmongs rnams ma rig mun pa'i sprin tshogs kyis/ /yang dag lam bral bde gshegs nyi ma
134b1(rgyud 'grel): nub rnams la/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo ye shes 'od 'bar me bo che/ /chos rnams rang bzhin spros bral mya ngan las 'das pa'i/ /chos nyid bde chen byang chub lam gyi rtsa ba can/ /gnyis med 'od gsal ma nyams zag med myang 'das kyi/ /bde spyod
134b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro mgon thugs kyis 'dzin par shog /ma rig mun gsal ye shes nyi ma'i byang chub 'od/ /dpal ldan chos kyi byang chub chos kyi sgron ma yi/ /ye shes byang chub bshas gnyen At+ma ta kri ni/ /chos kyi blo gros chos nyid gzungs kyis 'dzin par shog/
134b3(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i blo can yon tan kun gyi gnyen gcig po/ /thugs rje'i rtsa brtan mi yi seng ge byams pa yi/ /ljon shing bshes gnyen nor bu rin po che/ /mi zad gter chen grib la skyod par shog /dpal ldan 'jig rten srid gsum yon tan kun gyi gtso/ /mi
134b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog rgyal po lha dang lha min kun gyi ni/ /gtsug gi nor bu yon tan kun ldan dam pa'i rje/ /zhing skyes nor bu rin chen rgyan dang ldan par shog /rnam rtog las grol bcom ldan lhun grub chos kyi ni/ /sman pa nyon mongs zug rdu 'byin mdzad 'gro ba yi//
134b5(rgyud 'grel): mgon gyur rje btsun las can las las grub pa yi/ /las kyi nyon mongs zug rdu mi zad dbyung du gsol/ /bde gshegs nyi ma chos nyid chos kyi spyan can gyis/ /zla ba'i 'od zer dri med shel gong dangs gsal gyi/ /bla ma'i bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'chi med
134b6(rgyud 'grel): sgron ma yis/ /sngags skyes 'khor ba'i dri ma ma lus dag par mdzod/ /dpa' khyod thugs rjes 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus sel mdzad sgron pa'i pha/ /dpal ldan dri med thabs dang shes rab bdag gzhan phan pa'i rgyud gyur pa/ /rgyud ldan bla ma
134b7(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs med dpa' bo yon tan kun gyi gter gyur pa/ /srid mtsho las sgrol 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rgyun gcod pa chen rol mdzad pa/ /dpal ldan rgyal ba'i tshogs kyi mchod pa chos kyi spyan dang ldan pa'i bu/ /tshogs rje tshogs kyi mchod pa srid
135a1(rgyud 'grel): mtsho ma lus skems byed bu/ /bde gshegs mchod pa dpag bsam shing chen yon tan kun gyi rgyan lta bu/ /mkha' 'gro'i gsang tshig sangs rgyas skye med tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i bu/ /ma ma ma gcig bcom
135a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan yum gyur tshogs kyi 'khor lo bde chen ma/ /gnyis med byang chub lam mkhan tshogs 'khor bdag med chos kyi spyan can ma/ /gang zhig gang gi drin gyis bdag blo'i padmo kha 'byod nyi ma'i 'od/ /mthong thos dran gyi sgron ma ma rig mun
135a3(rgyud 'grel): sel ye shes byang chub sgron/ /rnal 'byor nyams myong mkhas pa rtogs tshang spel legs mu tig rin chen phreng/ /'gro drug nor bu rin chen yon tan med kyi dus/ /bde gshegs chos kyi spyan mnga' sangs rgyas sras po yon tan rin chen gdung
135a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud ldan/ /yid la mi byed phyag rgya chen po byang chub lam gyis bag chags rtsa ba 'chang/ /chos nyid chos kyi don ldan chos mchog lam chen yid 'od gser gyi phreng bar ldan/ /gnyis med ye shes las byung khyab bdag 'gro mgon nor bu rin chen
135a5(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi mdzod/ /don yod lugs gzigs sde snod rnam grol don mthong rnam dag thugs de'i dgongs pa nyid/ /gang gi drin gyis ma mthong mthong phyir mthong pa'i lam ltar bde chen don mthong zhing/ /the tshom blo bral yid ches sgron ma byang
135a6(rgyud 'grel): chub gsal dangs dri med rtog dang bral/ /gnyug ma'i nyams myong zhen med chos nyid 'od gsal nyi mas ma rig mun pa sangs/ /'dir 'phrad smon lam mtshams sbyor bag chags kyi rtsa bcan/ /bsam pa'i sdong po rnams mdzes bsgrub pa'i me
135a7(rgyud 'grel): tog 'bras ldan gyi/ /byang chub ljon shing las 'bras yid ches bsil grib la/ /sngar 'dris mi dang phrad bzhin smon lam ma pu cis mi 'jal/ /phyag rgya chen po gser 'phreng las/ /tshogs 'khor gsum pa gnyis med yid ches rang gsal gyi
135b1(rgyud 'grel): le'u ste gsum pa'o// //phyag rgya chen po rdo rje'i glu /rin po che gser phreng zhes bya ba/ /grub pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang/ /paN+Di ta mang pos gsungs pa rnams/ /rje btsun mnga' bdag mai tri pas/ /gzhung gcig tu bsdebs pa'i
135b2(rgyud 'grel): gdams pa rdzogs ho// //paN+Di ta de nyid dang/ /lotsA ba mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA le kha nA ma/ bod skad du/ /shes rab kyi phrin yig ces bya ba/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rje
135b3(rgyud 'grel): btsun spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ /lha mo sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nyid gsum gyi rin chen rnam par dag gyur pa/ /gsang las shin tu gsang gyur mkha' dang mtshungs par snang/ /lha mo kun 'gro bde ba mchog gi sa gzhir gyur/ /shes rab
135b4(rgyud 'grel): don dam gyur pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas go 'phang grub don thob pa'i rgyur gyur cing/ /yid bzhin nor dang bum pa bzang po ltar snang ba/ /de nyid shin tu gsang ba'i phra ni yig mnyan 'os ?/ /de nyid don gyi go 'phang bshad sbyar spring bar bya/ /de
135b5(rgyud 'grel): nas sgrub po la phan phyir/ /shes rab phrin yig par? rdo rjes/ /gsang las shin tu gsang gyur pa/ /de kho na nyid rab gsal bya/ /sa ste dag pa kun grol ba/ /nam mkha' lta bur skye ba med/ /rang rig tsam gyis shes bya dang/ /mchog tu dga' ba
135b6(rgyud 'grel): byed pa mo/ /mtshan ma med cing snang ba med/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs/ /chos dbyings rang bzhin zhes bya ba/ /mchog tu dri ma med pa'i gnas/ /mtshan min thams cad yang dag spangs/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /
135b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag med dri ma med pa'i gzhi/ /rdo rje gsum byung dri ma med/ /'dod pa'i don gyi gnas gyur pa/ /yid bzhin nor bu bzhin du 'byung/ /lha yi dpag bsam shing lta bu/ /mchod pa mchog gi gnas gyur pa/ /de na gnas pa'i lha mo des/ /shes rab lha
136a1(rgyud 'grel): mo bla na med/ /rdor gsum mi byed sbyor ba yis/ /de kho na nyid pad+mar ldan/ /nang gi gnas kyi rang bzhin gyis/ /mchog tu dga' ba byed ma la/ /dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin gyis/ /'bad de yang dag mkhyen
136a2(rgyud 'grel): bar gsol/ /rba rlabs med cing snang ba med/ /rang gi lus la gnas gyur kyang/ /'bar ba chen mo de srid kyi/ /dus gsum bdag gis ma shes so/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can ma/ /rang bzhin med bas mdzes pa ste/ /skye ba med
136a3(rgyud 'grel): pas kun rtogs pas/ /thams cad du ni khyab byed ma/ /'dod pa yon tan bzang sngar ldan/ /lus dang lus la kun tu gnas/ /dmyal ba la sogs thams cad la/ /gsang ba'i spyod pas rol pa ste/ /mdog dang yan lag rnam
136a4(rgyud 'grel): par spangs/ /gsang las shin tu gsang gyur 'di/ /dpal ldan bde chen zhal snga yi/ /bka' drin gyis ni bdag gis rtogs/ /dri ma med cing khyab pa mo/ /rang rig mtshan nyid gcig bu ste/ /skye ba med la rtogs bya'i phyir/ /ji bzhin du ni rnam
136a5(rgyud 'grel): par gnas/ /dngos dang dngos med mchog 'dzin pa/ /zad par bya phyir ji bzhin gnas/ /bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis/ /dge ma de bzhin shes nas ni/ /yang dag gus dang bcas pa yis/ /nus pa ji bzhin sgom pa'ang byas/ /de ltar na
136a6(rgyud 'grel): yang da? bar du/ /gcig tu mi 'gro ci yi phyir/ /yang na bdag la skal med dam/ /ji ste bdag gi sems rgyud la/ /yang dag pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /ji skad gsungs bzhin mi gnas sam/ /rang gi rang bzhin gyis dag pa/ /mngon par byang chub byas pa mo//
136a7(rgyud 'grel): phung lnga rdo rje gsum sogs la/ /ji bzhin yang dag gnas pa yi/ /slob dpon dpal ldan zhal snga nas/ /snying rjer zhugs pa'i thugs kyis ni/ /'bde de bzhin rtogs bya'i phyir/ /yang dag ji bzhin bdag la gsungs/ /dpal ldan bde chen mgon
136b1(rgyud 'grel): po yis/ /khyod kyi dngos la bdag blo bskyed/ /bka' lung stsal cing gnas pas na/ /de la 'dir ni the tshom med/ /de nyid gsal bar shes nas su/ /nyin dang mtshan du bsgom byas kyang/ /gang phyir bden par gsal ba ru/ /mi snang bas de stong
136b2(rgyud 'grel): dam ci/ /yid bzhin nor bu mkha' mtshungs pas/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs so lo/ /de ltar gsungs pa'i tshig de dag /bden pa dang ni mi bden yin/ /mkha' mtshungs gang yin bden pa ste/ /gang zhig shes nas bsgom gyur kyang//
136b3(rgyud 'grel): gang dngos gsal bar mi ston pas/ /yid bzhin nor mtshungs brdzun pa yin/ /bdag gis khyod ni don dam gyis/ /kun tu 'char bar shes pa ste/ /de ltar na yang mi dmigs pas/ /sgyu mtshogs kyis gzugs 'dzin yin/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas
136b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis don dam du/ /nges par skyon dang yon tan dag /grogs 'dus pa las ji bzhin 'gyur/ /gsungs pa'i dag de bzhin 'gyur/ /gsungs pa'i dag de bden pa ste/ /shes rab bden par smra ba khyod/ /gang gis rtogs pa'i rang bzhin yang/ /bdag med bzhi yang 'das pa yis//
136b5(rgyud 'grel): de dang mtshungs par de gnas so/ /bzang mo dri ma me 'bar ma/ /'on kyang gang gis bdag shes nas/ /yun rings dus su rnam dpyad kyang/ mi dmigs pa de gang du yib/ /mchog tu dga' bar byed pa'i gzugs/ /mngon par byang chub byed pa'o/ /ye shes
136b6(rgyud 'grel): sgron ma'i snang ba ni/ /phyogs bcur gsal bar bteg nas su/ /dri dang phreng sogs na bza' dang/ /bza' bca' ston mo de bzhin gzhan/ /gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rgyun mi 'chad par rtag tu ni/ /bdag gi shes rab bsten gyur kyang//
136b7(rgyud 'grel): skad cig kyang ni 'gyur ba med/ /mngon rtogs dri med 'jug pa po/ /de bzhin nyid shes dgra pa yis/ /khyod kyi dam tshig spyod pa ni/ /byang chub lam ni ston pa po/ /rgyud las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin/ /rgyun tu bar chad med par ni/ /'dod yon
137a1(rgyud 'grel): lnga po bsten pa yis/ /bdag gis byis pa nas bzung ste/ /shin tu bdag nyid rig pa yis/ /bsten pa dang ni bsgoms gyur pas/ /dge ba yi ni sa gzhi khyod/ /bdag la ci phyir yid mi rton/ /sems gnyis
137a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i bud med la/ /su zhig yid ni rton byed ces/ /yang dag mgon pos gsungs pa gang/ /de ni bden par nye bar gnas/ /sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las/ /bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags/ /rnam pa du mas phan btags pas//
137a3(rgyud 'grel): gang gis rnam kun bsten byas shing/ /khams gsum ma lus par bltas kyang/ /mi snang gcig pu gang na gnas/ /khyod kyis gnad ni dran med par/ /byis pa gang gis khyod bsgoms na/ /de rnams don med 'phung 'gyur zhing/ /byang
137a4(rgyud 'grel): chub rgyur khyod gnas pa min/ /gnad ni legs par shes ldan pa/ /gang gis khyod ni bsgoms gyur na/ /byang chub snying po'i bar du yang/ /de rnams sangs rgyas bya phyir gnas/ /bzang mo khyod dngos shes gyur nas/ /gang gis ma bsgoms
137a5(rgyud 'grel): de la yang/ /grogs mos lag pa bsdams te song/ /rigs ngan dang ni mthong pa'ang rung/ /gnad shes ni na mdzer gyur nas/ /bzang mo nang duAng snang byed cing/ /lan 'ga' ang mdzad pa'i do med cing/ /mo rabs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni/ /
137a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshang brtol na ni nges pa ru/ /skye bo de yi gdong gi ni/ /pad+ma lta zhing dbang du 'gyur/ /chos 'brang can gyi skye bo yang/ /'jug pa lam ni 'di nyid/ /chig tsam chad pa byas na yang/ /'chi ba na yang 'gyur ba med/ /gnyi ga dag pa'i rigs las byung//
137a7(rgyud 'grel): chos 'brang can du skyes pa yin/ /bya ba dang ni bya min dang/ /snod dang snod min 'dir khyad med/ /khyed la bdag gis rnam kun tu/ /mchod byas lan 'ga' ang mi lta bas/ /shes rab khyod kyi rigs spyod yul/ /da ltar bdag gis khong du
137b1(rgyud 'grel): chud/ bud med rnams kyi rang bzhin ni/ /shin tu 'phyar la g.yo ba yin/ /mchu rkan la sogs skam pa ste/ /'tshang 'bru mang pos ci zhig bya/ /khyod ni nyin dang mtshan dag dang/ /skad cig gcig kyang ma g.yengs par/ /bsgom na skad cig nyid
137b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni/ /bla na med pa'i gnas thob byed/ /gang gis nye bar bsgoms pa yis/ /sangs rgyas go 'phang rgyu yin pa'i/ /khyod kyi spyod pa 'di lta bu/ /ji skad gsungs bzhin sngar ma shes/ /mang po ? ba ci zhig dgos/ /yid brtan rung pa 'ga' yang
137b3(rgyud 'grel): med/ 'gyod dang gnyid dang rmugs pa yis/ /rmongs pas khyod na mi shes na/ /khyod kyi rang gi rang bzhin gang/ /gsal ba ru ni de smros shing /rdor gsum sa bon las byung bas/ /gsum gyis? bskyed par the tshom med/ /'dod chags zhe sdang
137b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs dri mas/ /sems can thams cad rmongs pas na/ /bye ba du ma'i nang nas kyang/ /gang gis khyod shes su yang med/ /med du smra ba ci zhig dgos/ /smad 'tshong g.yon can gyis bskor bzhin/ /don dam du ni grub med pas/ /sgyu ma mchog gi
137b5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs 'dzin ma/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med par/ /rmongs pas khyod ni ma shes te/ /bza' dang btung sogs chags pa yis/ /srid pa'i btson rang lhung bar 'gyur/ /de la shin tu chags pa yis/ /'byor ster khyod ni brjed par 'gyur/ /phyag
137b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya'i chags la 'jug pa yis/ /rgyal 'gyur rdo rje can mchog ma/ /bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin las/ /bzang mo khyod kyi rang bzhin no/ /ji ltar yang dag gnas pa bzhin/ /thams cad bdag gis shes par 'gyur/ /khyod kyi rang bzhin ma lus pa/ /thams cad
137b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis shes pas na/ /rmi lam na yang bslu mi nus/ /de bas bdag la blo gtod cig /khyod kyi lam ni gcig pu nyid/ /mkhas pas chog bzhin sbyangs te/ /gang bzhugs sangs rgyas nyid 'brang par/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis yang dag bstan/ /zab mo de yang
138a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis ni/ /ji srid sgyang ba ma byas pa/ /de srid khyod kyi lus reg las/ /byung ba'i bde ba rnyed ma yin/ /gti mug 'obs kyis 'khrigs pa dang/ /zhe sdang gi ni sdong dum ldang/ /'dod chags chor ma nyam da bas/
138a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub lam ni bgrod par dka' / /phung po'i shing ni thog mdza' med/ /'dod yon yal ga gyen 'grengs pas/ /nam mkha' i mthongs ni g.yogs pas na/ /lam de dam por bkag ste gnas/ /phung po nyon mongs de bzhin du/ /'chi bdag lha
138a3(rgyud 'grel): bdud tshom po pa/ /sdang pa mang pos bskor nas su/ /rnam rtog chen po las byung ba'i/ /srid pa'i rtsa dang lcug ma dang/ /rdo rgyal la sogs ldan pa'i nags/ /shin tu rgya chen brgal dka' bar/ /phung po'i shing rta brten nas su/ /gti mug
138a4(rgyud 'grel): 'obs ni brgal dkar gnas/ /kun rtog rtswa dang ldum sogs pa'i/ /skyibs su 'bad de? yib par byed/ /lha bdud la sogs tshom po pa/ /de lta bu yi phyogs na gnas/ /yang dag lam zhugs 'gron po dag /sems kyi nor bu 'phrog pa yis/ /
138a5(rgyud 'grel): rab tu sdang bas 'joms par byed/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi mdzod po che/ /yon tan nor gyis yongs bkang ba/ /byang chub lam la gnas pa yi/ /mel? tshe ba yis de mthong nas/ /ye shes rdo rje sta re ni/ /so ni rnon por bdar pa yis/ /byang
138a6(rgyud 'grel): chub kyi ni lam 'gog pa'i/ /phung po shing ni kun bcad nas/ /cho ga bzhin du gtubs nas su/ /yid kyi shing de las byung ba'i/ /nyon mongs sdom dum tsher mar bcas/ /bdag med me la bsreg par bya/ /nga rgyal rdo yi tshogs de ni/ /shes rab
138a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes phye mar bya/ /gti mug 'o bas ni 'khrigs pa dag /byang sems rgyun mi 'chad pas dgang/ /yang dag lam zhugs 'gron po la/ /'tshe byed 'dul bar dka' ba yi/ /'chi bdag bdud sogs chom po pa/ /bcom pas de dang de 'bros 'gyur/ /
138b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub lam ni yangs pa na/ /byang chub 'gegs bya'i phyir gnas pa/ /phyogs bcur gnas pa'i sdang ba rnams/ /thabs kyi lus ni dri med pas/ /shes rab ral gri rnon po yis/ /'bad pas de dag bcom nas su/ /lam bzang de? ru zhugs nas ni/ /
138b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad der ni ci dgar 'gro /byang chub lam ni sbyangs pa yis/ /kun tu shin tu dri med pas/ /rmad byung bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /grogs mo khyod ni sbyangs pas na/ /rang bzhin dri med dag cing zhi/ /rang rig bdag med mnyam pa nyid/ /'dod pa'i
138b3(rgyud 'grel): don gyi 'bras ster ba/ /go 'phang bla med thob par 'gyur/ /khyod kyi rang bzhin ro myangs na/ /'di ni 'di 'dra zhes bya ba/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang brjod mi nas/ /rang rig skye ba med pa nyid/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa/ /dbang po las 'das
138b4(rgyud 'grel): gang yin 'thob/ /mchog tu dga' pa las byung dag /shin tu rnyed dka' go 'phang ni/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bla na med/ /mya ngan 'das gnas zhes bya ba/ /mngon par byang chub byed pa'o/ /bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin ni/ /nyin dang mtshan du bsgom pa yi//
138b5(rgyud 'grel): chos cig gis ni thob par 'gyur/ /shin tu gus pas bsgom pa las/ /gzhan du de ni thob pa min/ /de ni rang bzhin dag pa ste/ /dus kun du ni 'dus ma byas/ /rtag dang chad pa rnam par spangs/ /thabs dang shes rab dri ma med/ /skye ba med par
138b6(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa yis/ /sems can kun la yang dag gnas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bsam mi khyab/ /bla na med par de shes bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas de ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni thob byed pa'o/ /de ltar sems dang sems byung gi /don gyi rang bzhin rtogs
138b7(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /rdo rje dri med gsum sbyor ba/ /ji ste shes nas rnam bsgoms na/ /ye shes rdo rje rab sbyor gyis/ /des ni grogs mo 'grub par 'gyur/ /dngos dang dngos med las 'das pas/ /nam mkha' lta bur khyab pa ste/ /dri med zhi ba thabs bcas par/ /brten
139a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya zhes 'dren pas brjod/ /thabs dang bral na khyod kyi min/ /thabs kyang khyod dang bral na min/ /de gnyis phan tshun bral ba yis/ /'grub pa nam yang yod ma yin/ /thabs dang yang dag ldan pa ru/ /mdza' mo khyod
139a2(rgyud 'grel): ni ji bzhin 'gyur/ /bdag gi kun tu shes zin na/ /de las gzhan pa ci smrar yod/ /bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin ni/ /bdag gi byang chub snying po'i bar/ /sangs rgyas nyid du brtan bgyid na/ /de bas bdag la drin gyis g.yogs/ /dpal ldan
139a3(rgyud 'grel): bde chen zhal snga nas/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas nyid bya'i rgyu/ /thabs dang yang dag ldan pa yi/ /blo gros chen mo khyod la ni/ /pad+ma rdo rjes nges par ni/ /sangs rgyas kyis zhes ji skad du/ /springs pa de bzhin grogs mo mchog /thabs dang bcas
139a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya dgos par/ /dpal ldan bde chen rdo rje can/ /de skad phrin brdzangs de bzhin du/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyu nyid du/ /khyod kyis de ltar myur du gyis/ /bdag la ji bzhin gsal po ru/ /phrin las skad cig myur du skur/ /khyod kyis spangs
139a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'am brjed dam? pa/ /bdag gi tshe 'di gnas mi byed/ /bying? dang rgod pa spangs nas su/ /dus kun nyin dang mtshan du ni/ /rgyun du bar chad med pa ru/ /skad cig skad cig khyod dran pas/ /dngos grub don kun bdag la byin/ /gal te
139a6(rgyud 'grel): de ltar ma gyur na/ /de tshe bdag ni rgya phag pas/ /ji ltar byed pa ltos shig dang/ /ji bzhin rgyud kyi de nyid kyi/ /thag pa yis ni bcings nas su/ /yang dag pa yi khyim du ni/ /dge mas kun nas bcug nas ni/ /skye pa med par rtogs pa yi /sems
139a7(rgyud 'grel): dang sems byung rang bzhin gyis/ /'bad de? bsrung ba byas nas su/ /de nyid sangs rgyas sa mchog du/ /thabs kyi lcags sgrog gis bcings te/ /ye shes rdo rje'i gzer btab la/ /bdag med ? bzhag nas ni/ /de nas bdag gis bsgrub par bya

139b6(rgyud 'grel): po/ shes rab phrin yig la 'bad de?/ /skyes bu gang gis de rig nas/ /'bad de rnam par bsgoms pas na/ /de ni rdo rje 'dzin dngos 'gyur/ /shes rab kyi phrin yig slob dpon chen por bla rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs sho// // paN+Di? chen po shAn+tNa? b+ha
139b7(rgyud 'grel): dra dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gol lhas btsas kis bsgyur cir zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rnal 'byor pa'i rtog pa'i bgegs sel ba zhes bya ba / rje btsun bla ma rnams dang dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ci phyir zhen?
140a1(rgyud 'grel): gang gis gang la gang ltar bsgom/ /rtags dang yon tan par chad bgegs skyon bsal/ /de dag shes nas goms pas byang chub 'thob/ /ma thos mi shes mi 'grub yang na 'byangs/ /dang po ci phyir bsgom pa
140a2(rgyud 'grel): bzung 'dzin gnyis/ /ma spangs ji bzhin ma bsgoms rnal 'byor pas/ /phyag 'tshal mchod bshags sbyin pa mang byas kyang/ /bsod nams 'phel yang ye shes rdzogs mi 'gyur/ /gnyis pa gang gis rnal 'byor dang ldan pa/ /theb mang
140a3(rgyud 'grel): btsun zhing dam tshig sdom gnas shing/ /mchod dang sbyin mos byang chub sems ldan pa/ /de ni theg chen gsang ba'i snod yin sgom/ /gsum pa gang la zhen rang gi sems/ /ji bzhin ma bcos yi nas rnam dag cing/ /spros bral yod
140a4(rgyud 'grel): med rtag chad mdza' spangs pa/ /de la g.yeng pa med par rtag tu gnas/ /bzhi pa gang ltar sgom pa bsgom bya dang/ /sgom pa gnyis med rang gi ngo bo la/ /ci yang med la cir yang snang gsal bar/ /bying rmugs spros pa'i rtog
