140a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du 'gro 'dod na/ /gnod sbyin gzhan dang gzhan du 'gro 'dod de/ /rnal 'byor sems la zhugs nas gnas gzhan 'phen/ /gal te rnal 'byor bsgom zhing gnas bzung bas/ /smra bcad par skabs nang du gzhan 'jug dang/ /phyir byung
140b1(rgyud 'grel): khengs grags 'dod skom zas nor tshol/ /yi dags 'dod sred can gdon de sems zhugs/ /gal te rnal 'byor sems 'khrugs 'thab 'dod cing/ /'khor la gshe dang gzhan la spyo byed na/ /'byung po'i bdag po ya ba shon pa/ /sgrub pa de
140b2(rgyud 'grel): yi snying la zhugs pa yin/ /gal te rnal 'byor 'phres shing nyal la dga' / /zas skom sred cing bzlas la mi brtson na/ /lto 'phye nyal brtson snyoms byed ces bya ba/ /rnal'byor sems la zhugs nas gnas par byed/ /gal te rnal 'byor
140b3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi longs spyod rkyen/ /yo byang srung zhing so? 'dzugs srungs ma sgo/ /gsog phyir 'dod tshol gzhan du gtong 'dod na/ /gnod sbyin nor bsrungs zhes bya sems la zhugs/ /gal te rnal 'byor pa ma spun tshogs la/ /chags nas smon lam
140b4(rgyud 'grel): rim 'gros srung byed na/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i bag chags ma byang bas/ /nyon mongs ma spangs byang chub ring bar 'gyur/ /gal te rnal 'byor gza' skar 'jug phod dang/ /dus dang lo zla bzang ngan rtsi byed na/ /dbyer med mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal
140b5(rgyud 'grel): bas na/ /byang chub thob par rab tu dka' bar 'gyur/ /gal te rnal 'byor thos mang rtogs che zhing/ /bsgom brtson bsnyems pas bdag bstod gzhan smod na/ /nyon mongs ma spangs nga rgyal 'phel 'gyur bas/ /phyir yang lhung zhing byang
140b6(rgyud 'grel): chub ring bar 'gyur/ /gal de rnal 'byor bdag la gzhan dag gis/ /sngon dang da ltar ma 'ongs gnod byed ces/ /zhe sdang skyes nas rig sngags gsod gtong na/ /zhe sdang dbang gis byang chub ring bar 'gyur/ /gal te bdag la gzhan gyis mchod
140b7(rgyud 'grel): bkur zhing/ /bsngags pa mang brjod bstod la sems dga' na/ /'gro'i phyogs char gyur te chags sems kyis/ /byang chub lam la 'dis gyang ring bar 'gyur/ /gal te rnal 'byor 'khor mang 'du long dag /rgyal po lta bur mang por brten na ni/ /khyed
141a1(rgyud 'grel): grags yin pas bsgom pa g.yeng ba'i rgyu/ /byang chub lam las shin tu ring bar 'gyur/ /brgyad pa skyon gsal thabs ni rnal 'byor pa/ /sems la bar chad mtshan ma de byung na/ /'di ltar bsams nas
141a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan rtog gsal bar bya/ /chos su ci snang sems las gzhan med cing/ /sems kyi rang bzhin chos nyid ngo bo la/ /bzang ngan spong len 'dod sred byams sdang sogs/ /rtog dang rtog pa'i dbang gis bgegs byung na/ /sems la
141a3(rgyud 'grel): bltas na gang yang mi snang bas/ /snang med sems rtog mtshan ma ga la yod/ /bdag rtog mtshan mar sems la bzung nyes pas/ /rtog pa thams cad spangs shing rtog med gnas/ /rtog pa med pa la yang gnas pa med/ /de ltar ring
141a4(rgyud 'grel): du gnas na rtog bgegs ni/ /myur bar zhi gnas ji bzhin bsgom pa las/ /bar chad sems kyi rtog pa 'byung mi 'gyur/ /byang chub 'bras bu myur du thob par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pa'i rtog pa'i bgegs sel ba zhes bya ba/ dngos grub
141a5(rgyud 'grel): mnyes pa'i slob dpon mkhas pa chen po/ /sangs rgyas gsang ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byis pa'i rjes su byis pa 'breng/ /byis pas byis pa 'jig 'gyur
141a6(rgyud 'grel): bas/ 'dir byis pa grol bar bya ba'i phyir/ /zhes pa 'chad par bsams so/ /byis 'ching lam du dkyer ba bshad/ /de la 'dul ba don yod par grub pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor pa chen po'i rgyud las/ gang gi rmongs pa 'ching 'gyur zhing/ /du
141a7(rgyud 'grel): 'bod mthar ni des 'gyur ba/ /de nyid kyis ni grol 'gyur zhing/ /shes rab stobs kyis bde ba thob/ /ces gsungs pa'i don mkhas pas mngon du bsten par bya ste/ /gang de la mchog du rsdoms par bya ba yin pas/ /thog mar rgyud brtag par bya'o
141b1(rgyud 'grel): de la cha mnyam pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa yun ring por skye par mi 'byung yang dngos po des de la 'dod chags la sogs pa mi 'byung ba ma yin no/ /nyon mongs pa chung ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dngos po chen po dang/ /
141b2(rgyud 'grel): mang po dang lhag pa dang phrad cing mngon du gyur pa la ni nyon mongs pa bul bar skye la/ /'bring dang chung du la ni shin tu cha phra ba'o/ /gang zag 'dod chags spyad pa ni chags pa'i dngos po chung du dang/ /ngan pa la yang chags pa chen por 'gyur na/ /de las
141b3(rgyud 'grel): ldog pa la lta ci smos te/ yun ring du chags pa'o/ /dbang po mnyen pa dang/ de bzhin du 'jam pa dang /mi blang ba dang/ lus ngag gis gzhan la tho 'tsham pa ma yin pa dang/ dbral bar dka' ba dang/ dman pa la mos pa dang/ sgro ring ba dang/
141b4(rgyud 'grel): de la 'du ba dang/ yid mi bde ba mang ba dang/ /kun dga' ba mang ba dang/ khro gnyer med pa dang/ mdog gsal ba dang/ 'dzum pa sngon du gtong ba dang/ sha rtsi dmar zhing 'gro ba ma gyogs pa dang /'khun ngur smra zhing mi brtan pa'i bsam
141b5(rgyud 'grel): pa sna tshogs rgyu ba'o/ /zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i gang zag ni sha rtsi nag cing stobs che ba / drang por 'gro zhing brlang por smra ba/ thams cad mnar sems dang ldan pa/ /zhe sdang ba'i dngos po chung du la khong khro ba kun nas dkris pa stag po dang
141b6(rgyud 'grel): mang po skyed par byed na/ 'bring dang chen po la lta smos ci dgos te / yun ring du gnas par byed do/ /dbang po mi gnyen mi 'jam/ gzhan la tho 'tsham / dbral bar sla/ yid 'byung ba sla/ mu cor smra/ spyi brtol che/ mi mos pa med/ las
141b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi mdza' dam brtan/ brtul zhugs dam brtan/ /yid? mi bde ba mang/ 'khrug pa mang/ bzlog dka' / gnod bzhin du gnas/ khrod nyer dang ldan/ gzhin gyi mdog mi gsal ba'o/ /gti mug dang ldan pa'i gang zag ni rmongs par 'gyur ba'i dngos po
142a1(rgyud 'grel): chung du la yang gti mug gis kun nas dkris pa stug po dang/ mang po skyed par byed na gzhan lta ci smos te/ yun ring du gnas par byed do/ /dbang po ngal ba dang / blun pa dang/ zhan pa dang/ lus kyi las kyi mdza' lhod pa dang
142a2(rgyud 'grel): ngag gi las kyi mdza' lhod pa dang/ nyes pas sems dpa' dang/ nyes par sna/ nyes par byas pa'i las byed/ le lo tsha/ sgrub mi phod/ smra ba zhan/ yid mi 'jug /brjod pas shes bzhin du mi skyed/ log par 'dzin/ dbral ba
142a3(rgyud 'grel): dka' / yid 'byung bar dka' / /dman pa la mos/ glen dig slugs/ lag pas brda byed/ legs par gsungs pa dang/ nyes par bshad pa'i chos rnams kyis don kun shes par mi nus/ rkyen kyis srogs /gzhan gyis phrogs/
142a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi dring la 'jog /sha mdog nges pa med/ dal bar rgyu ba'o/ /gang zag nga rgyal dang ldan pa ni/ khengs par gyur pa'i dngos po chung du la yang nga rgyal gyi rgyu kun nas dkris pa stug po dang/ mang po skye bar byed na/ 'bring dang chen po
142a5(rgyud 'grel): la lta ci smos te/ /yun ring du gnas par byed do/ /dbang po rkod pa dang/ dbang po 'dam bu ltar mtho/ khengs lus cher brgyan pa la sbyor pa'o rjes su brtson/ /brtsan? ngag tu smra zhing mi 'dud/ pham nye du bla ma lta bu dag la dus gsum du rkyen du
142a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bab pa'i mchod pa mi byed/ lus mi 'dud/ gsod por smra ba dang/ phyag 'tshal mngon du ldang thal mo sbyar zhing 'dud par byed pa'i ngang tshul can ma yin pa dang/ /bdag nyid kun tu 'dzin/ bdag bstod gzhan la smod/ rnyed pa dang /bkur
142a7(rgyud 'grel): bsti 'dod/ grags pa 'dod/ tham thom gyi snod gyur/ dbral cing yid 'byung ba dka' / rgya chen po la mi mos/ snying rje chung/ bdag dang sems can dang/ srog dang gso ba dang gang zag tu lta ba shas che/ khro gtum che 'khrug pa dang ldan pa
142b1(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ de lta bu dang mthun pa'i ni nga rgyal gyi rtags so/ /phrag dog dang ldan pa'i gang zag ni sha mdog sngo nag pa/ 'dus pa'i yul med par rgyu pa/ gzhan la gnod par smra zhing/ nges pa med pa'i bsam pa sna tshogs rgyu pa'o/ /zhes gsungs
142b2(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di dag nges par slob dpon gyis brtags la gdams par bya'o/ /de yang gsungs pa/ sreg bcad bdar ba'i gser bzhin du/ /yongs su brtags te nga yi dka' / /blang bar bya yis gus phyir min/ /zhes gsungs pas/ dngos su sgrol ba la
142b3(rgyud 'grel): bsam gyi mi khyab par 'dod pa dang/ rgyu ma dag pa la bsam gyis mi khyab par 'dod pa dang/ phyogs tsam la bsam gyis mi khyab par 'dod pa dang/ rab tu thal ba bsam gyis mi khyab par 'dod pa ste/ 'di dag ni rmongs pa rnams kyi ngan rtags
142b4(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ mkhas pas kun tu spangs par bya ba yin no/ /blang bar bya ba ni mchog tu gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ de yang gsang ba bsam gyis mi khub pa dang/ bzod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ thabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ 'pho ba
142b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang drug go /gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni bla ma'i gdams pa'o/ /bzod pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa ni/ dug lnga spas pa'i lam du khyer ba'o/ /gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs
142b6(rgyud 'grel): pa kha tsag kyang dug lngar 'dus mos kyi dgongs pa can yin no/ /dug lnga lam du ji ltar 'khyer na/ gcig gi stong nyid gang yin la/ de ni kun gyi stong nyid yin/ zhes gsungs pas 'dod chags kyi stong nyid ji lta ba bzhin du zhe sdang la sogs pa'o/ /de la
142b7(rgyud 'grel): phyi nang gi gzugs la sogs pa yid du 'ong ba cig la chags pa skyes pa de yang kha dog la sogs par ma grub pas na brtag pa'i mthal bsal pa'o/ /rlung rjes su dpag pa las shes pa de bzhin du/ shes rig ma 'gags pa'i sgo nas chad pa ma yin no/ /de
143a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyi bar de gnyis ka'i bdag nyid can gyi dngos po yang yod pa ma yin te/ de bas na bzhi pa ni rjes thob kyi shes pas dpag par bya ba'i de nyid dus su spros pa ci yang yod pa ma yin no/ /de la 'dod chags ma spangs rnam par dag
143a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ zhe sdang la sogs pa la smras te/ de ni phan tshun spangs te 'gal ba ma yin no/ /chos kyi dbyings rtogs pas ma lus pa'i yul dug med par byas so/ /zhes gsungs ngo/ /sngar smos pa ltar stong pa nyid ni kun tu sbyar bar bya la/ /dug lnga'i btsal
143a3(rgyud 'grel): thabs ni zhe sdang btsal ba bzhin du kun tu blta bar bya'o/ /de la nang bar ldang ba'i dus su di ring ni bdag gi zhe sdang gi dngos po bdag gi skyes pa 'am/ phas rgol ba'am/ gzhan dag phan tshun 'thab pa 'am/ zhe sdang skyes pa gang yang rung ste/
143a4(rgyud 'grel): de dag mchog gi dngos grub 'thob par byed pa'i yan lag yin pas zhe sdang ci byung tshor bar shog bar smon lam btab la nam tshor ba'i dus su zhe sdang de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab par bya'o/ /gal te de'i nyin par zhe sdang ma byung na sngar dag nyid zhe sdang
143a5(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa 'am/ phan tshun sdang ba dang/ gzhan gyi phan tshun zhe sdang skyes pa la dran pa bskyed la de nyid rang bzhin med par bya'o/ /de ltar nang gcig bzhin du smon lam btab la bya'o/ /de ltar byas pas zhe sdang gi dug gi mi tshug par bya'o/ /zhe sdang
143a6(rgyud 'grel): skyes so cog lam du shes tsam na/ /dug gzhan la yang de bzhin du shes par bya ste/ zhe sdang yid kyi gang zag gi zhe sdang yid dam du byas pas de las su rung ba dang/ 'dod chags la sogs pa la sla bar 'ong pa de bzhin du gang gi zheng che ba de thog mar
143a7(rgyud 'grel): yi dam du bya'o/ /de nas gzhan la sbyar ba ni snga ma bzhin no/ /cha mnyam pa dang/ nyon mongs pa chung bas kyang thog mar gang yang rung ba cig yi dam du byas la/ de las su rung ba dang rim gyi spo bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ las dang po'i gang zag gi
143b1(rgyud 'grel): gcig la mchog tu ma gdis na/ dug lnga mad du 'byung bas yid gtong snying mi 'dod de/ gzhug lhod pa skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag ni sngon du bstan par mi bya ste/ nam sgom pa'i dus su gzod gar la de gdams pa zhes pa sngon du bstan pa'i don de ni de nyid
143b2(rgyud 'grel): yi dam du gdams pa'o/ /dug ldas 'jigs pa brtul nas mi 'jigs pa la zhug pa 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba'o/ /snod shin tu bzang ba la gdams par bya'i/ /snod ngan tshig tsam la brtan nas bag med du spyod pa la ni ma yin no/ /thams cad
143b3(rgyud 'grel): bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni/ gtor ma dang ni bzlas pa dang/ /dkyil 'khor me dang chu'i yi las/ /phyag rgya gdugs sogs mchod pa dang/ /phyag dang bskor ba bya ba dang/ /lug ma'am? bris pa la sogs dang/ /gsung rab bri sogs rtsom pa dang//
143b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dus su rnal 'byor pas/ /thams cad rang bzhin rtog med bya/ /gnyid ni bag med mi log ste/ /ji ltar pad+ma kha zum pa/ /grib mas non pas zum pa ste/ /grib sel stobs kyis rgyas pa ltar/ /gsal pa 'das nas ma rig pa/ /sa 'thug gyur
143b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i stobs kyis te/ /dbugs dag me long dkyil 'dus ltar/ /rim gyis bsdus te ma rig pa/ /shes rab kyis ni sbyar byas nas/ /cig shos la ni nges 'dus pa/ /ma goms pa las yid mi 'byung/ /goms pas yid gnyis med pa ni//
143b6(rgyud 'grel): rab tu 'bad pa'i sems goms yin/ /gsang ba 'dus pa las/ /'pho ba'i dus su bas mi khyab/ /las kyi shugs kyis 'pho ba dang/ /rnal 'byor lceb pa'i man ngag go /bsgom bya smig rgyu la sogs la/ /mthong 'og de nyid gnas pa dang/ /rang
143b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyis sgrub rdo rje'i lus/ /bdun gyi 'pho ba spangs nas su/ /srid mi 'jug ste mdza' gnyis spang/ /sbyor sems sngon du btang ba yis/ /mthong nas ldang 'gyur mi 'jug byed/ /'da' bar mi 'gyur mchog grub pa'o/ /rkang pa dang ni kha dang le/ /
144a1(rgyud 'grel): snying kha spyi gtsug mig rnams te/ /rlung ni gang nas 'pho 'gyur ba/ /rim pa bzhin du skye zhing 'thob/ /dmyal ba yi dags byol song dang/ /mi dang lha dang ye shes so/ /de nas sgo gzhan dgag byas la/ /mi gnas rlung ni
144a2(rgyud 'grel): phul bar bya/ /bla ba'i zhal la gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin lceb pa 'ang zhal la gnas/ /rnal 'byor mi shes gong zag gis /mi dang lha yi skye ba ru/ /blang ba'i sems ni rtse gcig bya/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i nang nas kyang/ /'chi ka'i sems ni gtso yin
144a3(rgyud 'grel): pas/ gang ltar bsams pa de ltar 'gyur/ zhes gsungs so/ /'o na sdig pa can yang de ltar 'gyur ram zhe na/ mi 'gyur te/ sdig che las kyis bskal nas ni/ /man ngag 'dod dang mi 'phreng/ /gal te phrad kyang glad gzer dang/ /smyo 'bog sogs
144a4(rgyud 'grel): pas mi dran no/ /'o na tshogs bsags pa la 'da' ka'i sems med kyang bde 'gro ru skye bo zhe na/ /tshogs dum bsags kyang 'chi kar sems ngan skyes na rgyal po ma skyes dgra lta bu'o/ /de bas na 'da' ka ma'i bsam kyis mi khyab pa la/ /shin
144a5(rgyud 'grel): tu 'bad par bya'o/ /'bras bu bsam gyi khyab pa ni/ sku yang ye shes te/ gser ni mi gtsang nang du bcug gyur kyang/ /'bar ba'i rang bzhin nam yang mi 'bri ltar/ /des pa gang zhig 'jig rten chos spyad kyang/ /bsam pa'i rang bzhin
144a6(rgyud 'grel): nam yang de mi spong/ /zhes gsungs pas gzugs skus 'gro ba'i don byed ba na yang 'jig rten gyi bya ba ngan pa dang bral ba'o/ /de ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu thams cad du gnyis su med pa kho na yin zhing/ dug lnga shin tu btsal par bya ba yin
144a7(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas phyin ci log la goms pa'i dbang gis shes rab dang bral nas log pa'i shes rab rgyu bas dben pa ru gnas te/ mi rtog pa'i nus pa rnyed nas tshogs kyi bseb du phyin kyang zhe sdang la sogs pa gang byung yang
144b1(rgyud 'grel): dran pa dang mi 'bral zhing gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gro na dus la bab pa'o/ /yang na kun tu rgyu nyid bya ste /gnas gcig tu yun ring du gnas par mi bya ste/ mi dang khyi 'dra bas khyi yang rang gi gnas na stobs che la/ yul gzhan du dul bar 'gyur ro//
144b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du mi yang rang gi gnas na nyon mongs pa dul bar dka' ste/ yul gzhan du nyon mongs pa thul bar smra bas kun tu rgyu'i tshul la gnas par bya'o/ /gang zhig bdag gis byas bsod kyis/ /kun kyang 'tsho ba med par shog /gang gi
144b3(rgyud 'grel): lam nas 'gro ba yis/ /sangs rgyas nyid du grub par shog /dug lnga sbas pa'i lam mchog tu gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ yo ga lak+Sha Na sa tya/
144b4(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ rnal 'byor gyi mtshan nyid bden pa/ rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs bcu dus kun gyi sangs rgyas dang/ /chos dang dge 'dun tshogs bcas la/ /thal sbyar gus pas phyag 'tshal nas/ /rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i man ngag 'di//
144b5(rgyud 'grel): rin chen sna tshogs tshogs pa ltar/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams sgrol ba'i phyir/ /mdor sdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /nam gyi cha smad gnyid las sad/ /bdag ma gtogs pa'i sems can la/ /thog ma nyid du snying rje sgom/ /de nas bdag nyid la ltas nas//
144b6(rgyud 'grel): ding gi nyin zhag 'di la ni/ /slong po'i sems can dag la ni/ /ci srid 'ongs kyang ser sna yi/ /dri mas mi gos nyid du bya/ /gal te bslab pa las 'gal ba'i/ /yid la rgyu ba phra mo yang/ /bsam pa nyid du mi bya na/ /ngag dang lus kyi sgros ci dgos/ /bdag
144b7(rgyud 'grel): la de? ring khro ba dang/ /brdeg pa la sogs 'byung bar shog /des kyang 'khrug par mi bya yi/ /le lo byung na shes bzhin gyis/ /mgo la me 'bar bzhin du dor/ /bdag gi 'gre 'am nyal 'dug rung/ /spyod lam ji ltar gnas 'dug kyang/ /yid ni lha'i nga rgyal dang
145a1(rgyud 'grel): skad cig tsam yang mi 'bral bar/ /rang nyid yin par rtag tu bsam/ /'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa yi/ /shes dang shes bya bdag gis ni/ /di ring nyid nas bdag gis brtag /bstod dang smad pa grags ma grags
145a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dag ji ltar zer yang ni/ /de nyid brag ca lta bur dang/ /'on pa lta bu bdag gis bya/ /chags pa'i gzugs sgra dri ro reg /'dod yon lnga la gang du yang/ /rnam shes 'phro ba'i yul byung yang/ /dag du ma thon bar du bzlog /gzugs su
145a3(rgyud 'grel): snang rnams sku nyid yin/ /sgra rnams gsung du bdag nyid brtag /sems can byang chub rgyu yin phyir/ /de yi shes pa ye shes yin/ /sems can ji ltar mthong gyur kyang/ /de dag nyid la blo phyag bya/ /'di dag nyid la brten nas bdag/
145a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub pas na/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa yin/ /mang po tshogs par gyur pa na/ /ro dang dud khrod 'du shes skyed/ /grong du 'jug par byed pa na/ /btson ra khri mon 'du shes bskyed/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'gro ba na/ /ngan
145a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro nad dang 'ching ba dang/ /g.yangs sa chen po'i 'du shes skyed/ /gal te bud med tshogs mthong na/ /mi gtsang rdzas ni sum cu dang/ /'khor ba'i lam 'dren yin par bsam/ /nye du pha ma bu tsha rnams/ /de la chags spangs btang snyoms
145a6(rgyud 'grel): sam/ dgra rnams mthong na 'di dag gi /bzod rdzogs byang chub yin par bsam/ /bdag gi longs spyod rdzas la yang/ /'dir ni brtsod ba'i rgyu dang ni/ /phyi mar ngan 'gror khrid par bsam/ /bdag la bstod pa brjod na yang/ /'di ni nga rgyal 'phel
145a7(rgyud 'grel): byed pas/ /ngan 'gror khrid par byed pa yin/ /gal te smod pa byung na yang/ /'di la bzod bsgom byang chub yang/ /mtshan ma rdzogs par rab tu bsam/ /gnas la zhen pa byung gyur na/ /rmi lam grong khyer ji bzhin du/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu
145b1(rgyud 'grel): sgom/ /bdag gis deng gis nyin zhag la/ /ngag las bzlas brjod kha don bya/ /klag sogs bslab las mi 'gal bar/ /di ring bdag gis smra bar bya/ /lus kyi g.yo ba thams cad kyang/ /mchod dang skor ba la sogs pa/ /ral so don yod nyid du
145b2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ rnam rtog gnyen por ma sdams na/ tshig du brjod pas ci zhig 'grub/ /de bas rnam pa thams cad du/ /gnyen po'i dpung tshogs bskyed nas ni/ /nyon mongs rnams ni dpyis phyin bya/ /bza' btung zhim po za ba'i tshe/ /rol zhen pa spang bya zhing/ /
145b3(rgyud 'grel): mi gtsang rgyu las byung ba dang/ /tha mar mi gtsang 'gyur bar bsam/ /reg bya 'jam po tshor ba'i tshe/ /reg bya ji bzhin yin par bsam/ /'dir mang smos pa ci zhig dgos/ /gang du nyon mongs 'phel ba yi/ /khyim pa'ang rab tu byung yang rung/ /
145b4(rgyud 'grel): de dag rab tu spang bya zhing/ /nyon mongs rnam par mi 'phel ba'i/ /sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gang yang rung/ /do dag brten pa mig ltar bya/ /bdag ni di ring nas brtsams te/ /byang chub snying por mchis bar du/ /rtag tu rab tu byung ba dang/ /
145b5(rgyud 'grel): tshangs par spyod pa nyid du bya/ /nyin mtshan dus las ma yol bar/ /thun mtshams gsum du bsgom par bya/ /srog dang rtsol ba bkag pa dang/ /rlung med pa yi mar me ltar/ /rtag tu spros bral bsgom par bya/ /de nas ldang tshe nga rgyal gyis/ /mtshan dang dpe
145b6(rgyud 'grel): byad skur ldan pa'i/ /lha yi nga rgyal brtan por bsam/ /mtshan mo'i thun la bab pa'i tsho/ /bde gshegs ji ltar gzims pa ltar/ /'jig rten rtogs spangs bdag nyid nyal/ /mdor na chos rnams thams cad kun/ /rmi lam lta bur brtag par bya/ /
145b7(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor bsgom rnams gtsor bya'i/ /lus dag dge ba btsor mi bya/ /chos spyod rnam bcu la sogs la/ /nyon mongs pas ni ma yengs par/ /bsgrims nas bdag gis 'bad pas bsgrub/ /rtag tu 'chi bsam ma chags slos/ /dngos po ci la'ang ma chags par/
146a1(rgyud 'grel): spyod lam ji ltar gnas kyang bsgom/ /bsod nams sems can kun la bsngo/ /byang chub bzang po bdag gis ni/ /rnal 'byor bsgom pa brtsams pa yi/ /dge ba zla zer dri med des/ /bdag dang 'gro ba ma lus pas/ /
146a2(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang 'grub shog /rnal 'byor gyis mtshan nyid bden pa/ /mkhas pa chen po dpal byang chub bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA tatshha gi b+ho shi pA ri ka thA nA ma/ bod skad du/
146a3(rgyud 'grel): shes rab brtsam pa dus kyis gtam zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde chen 'khor lo zag med spros pa rgyas pa'i sku dang chos/ tshogs pa'i zhing dang dngos grub rtsa ba rnams la phyag 'tshal te/ /gal te
146a4(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa'i dus min gyi/ /yin pa'i rtags dang ldan dus dag tu bzod med brtsams/ /slob dpon slob ma tshol ba dang/ /rin chen rnyed par sgrub pa dang/ /slob ma don drin slar ldon dang/ /dbang skur med par slar 'dod dang/ /
146a5(rgyud 'grel): re ba'i gos kyis 'gro ba dang/ /lci ba'i zas kyis 'tsho ba dang/ /mi byed rnyed sogs rtsod pa dang/ /drag pos gzhan zil gnon 'dod dang/ /sku gzugs brtsod pas 'jig pa dang/ /mig can 'gran zlas brtsod gyur dang/ /dge slong gnas la
146a6(rgyud 'grel): brtsod pa dang/ /grub mdza' skur bas sun 'byin dang/ /'gro rnams spyod pa lta ba dang/ /mkha' 'gro 'bras bur 'pho ba dang/ /rin chen grags pa 'das pa dang/ /mi rnams g.yo sgyus 'tsho ba dang/ /shing rnams g.yab mos g.yob pa dang/ /ri
146a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams cho nges 'debs pa dang/ /chu rnams me yi 'od 'byin dang/ /skal ba can ma grags min brjod/ /rtsod rtags nyi shu rdzogs pa yis/ /bram ze mo yi mar me 'dra/ /kye lha dang drang srong 'tsho ba'i dus 'das bsam/ /snying rjes dman pa rjes 'dzin
146b1(rgyud 'grel): zla 'byung dus/ /skyabs su 'gro ba dam pa'i rten 'brel na/ /'chi ba'i dus tshe sdug bsngal sogs 'byung 'gyur/ /kye skye ba bzang thob skyes ngan bud med kyis/ /lus dang ngag yid sdom pa mchog gsum la/ /brtse ldan dmigs med 'brel pa mi gnas pa/ /dam
146b2(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur tshul bral na nges par 'ching/ /kye dngos grub nye bar rnyed pa ma btsal na/ /rang gi bde chen 'bad pas rtogs mi 'gyur/ /'od gsal ma rnyed nyon mongs lam mi 'gyur/ /ngag dang mi ldan chos nyid rgyas gdab bral/ /dben pa bral bas nges
146b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byin rnyed mi 'gyur/ /brtul zhugs brtun te ma byas gsal mi rnyed/ /sems kyi mel tshe bral bas mchog thob min/ /dbang po ma g.yeng skye ba rnal 'byor rnams/ /'dod pas ma g.yeng bya ba la mi 'jug /man ngag 'gro lam g.yeng gnyid ma ldog/
146b4(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'i brgyud bam bskam 'bras ma gcad/ /kye ma rtag tu phyi nang mnyam par blta/ /dus ni yun thung 'di la ma rdzogs na/ /dus su 'gyur ba'i dus rab rnyed mi 'gyur/ /de bas brtson 'grus dus la bab kyis byos/ /rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bram ze ste//
146b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod la rab chags b+ha b+hi ti/ /ngoms med nyams bral le lo sha /da ni dus 'das nyi ma 'dra/ /bdag gis gdams pa 'di bris pas/ /rim gyis lam la rtsol 'gyur shog /shes rab brtsam pa dus kyi gtam zhes bya ba/ pang+ga la'i mkhas pa
146b6(rgyud 'grel): dpal nges par sbyangs pa dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes bram ze b+ha lo la gdams pa rdzogs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ sa mA d+hi saM b+ha ra pa ri brta/ bod skad du/ ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs kyi le'u/ 'jig rten mgon po
146b7(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang po snying rje'i stobs las byung/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems brtan bya/ /srid pa'i longs spyod bde ma chags/ /yongs su 'dzin la rgyab kyis phyogs/ /dad sogs nor ni phun sum tshogs/ /bla ma sangs rgyas dang mnyam gus/ /nges
147a1(rgyud 'grel): bstan dam tshig spyod pa ni/ /yongs su bskyad la rab tu brtson/ /bum pa gsang ba'i dbang skur ba/ /bla ma'i drin gyis yongs su thob/ /lus ngag sems ni rnam dag pa'i/ /bsgrub pa po de dngos grub snod/ /ting 'dzin yan
147a2(rgyud 'grel): lag las byung ba'i/ /tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs pa las/ /myur du dngos grub thob 'gyur ba/ /de ltar gsang sngags tshul gnas yin/ /ting 'dzin yan lag nyams gyur cing/ /de yi mi mthun phyogs gnas na/ /skyib bye ba stong gis kyang//
147a3(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin rab tu grub mi 'gyur/ /ting nge 'dzin ni rab grub phyir/ /gsang sngags spyod gnas rnal 'byor pas/ /de las gzhan pa'i sems spangs te/ /g.yengs med brtson bas 'bad par bya/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag dang/ /mi mthun
147a4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs gang des bya'i phyir/ /ting 'dzin yan lag mi mthun phyogs/ /de ni mdor bsdus nas bshad bya/ /tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang/ /longs spyod rnams la bltos med nyid/ /bzod ldan dam bca' brtan pa dang/ /skye bo
147a5(rgyud 'grel): 'du 'dzi rnam par spong/ /lus dang ngag yid las rnams la/ /shes bzhin dang ni ldan pa dad/ /sangs rgyas skur 'dogs dran pa yi/ /lus kyi rjes dran yang dag ldan/ /dus bar du ni gang bya ba'i/ /rjes dran de la brtan pa dang/ /sgrib pa lnga
147a6(rgyud 'grel): ni spang ba dang/ /zas kyi tshod rig spyod lam dan/ /'jig rten chos ni thams cad la/ /rtag tu sems ni btad snyoms dang/ /yo byad bsnyungs? 'di yan lag ste/ /go bzlog ba ni mi mthun phyogs/ /ting nge 'dzin tshogs le'u bkod ba'i bsod
147a7(rgyud 'grel): nams nges/ /'gro bas ting 'dzin rdo rje lta bu thob par shog /ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs kyi le'u/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang/
147b1(rgyud 'grel): zhu? chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab ba'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ lo ka a ti ta sapta ka bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yan lag bdud pa'i cho ga /sangs
147b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag gnas phyag byed phyag rnams ni/ /gang tshe tha dad mi dmigs pa/ /de 'dir sngags pa'i phyag yin te/ /rdo rje phyag ces brjod pa yin//
147b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod gnas mchod byed pa rnams/ /gang tshe sna tshogs mi dmigs pa/ /de che mchod pa chen po ste/ /rdo rje mchod ba zhes brjod/ /bshags bya ? chags byed bshags pa rnams/ /gad ? rnal 'byor pas ma mthong/ /rang bzhir dag par
147b4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag mthong/ /de 'dir bshags pa'i mchog yin no/ /rjes yi rang bya thams cad dang/ /bdag dang rjes su yi rang ba/ /rnal 'byor ba yis mnyam par mthong/ /rjes su yi rang dam pa yin/ /sgyu mas sprul pa'i sangs rgyas la/ /sgyu? las sdul pa'i
147b5(rgyud 'grel): lus can phyir/ /brag ca lta bu'i chos rnams ni/ /bstan par yang dag skul 'debs pa/ /sprul ba dag dang mtshungs bar ni/ /thal mo sbyar nas skul byed cing/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor mnyam par mthong/ /bskul bar byed pa'i mchog tu 'dod/ /mya ngan
147b6(rgyud 'grel): 'das bzhed sangs rgyas rnams/ /'khor bar sprul ba bzhin du ni/ /sems can sprul pa'i don gyi phyir/ /bzhugs par gsol 'debs de nyid rigs/ /'jig rten 'das pa nyid kyi phyir/ /de 'dir gsol 'debs mchog tu 'dod/ /dmigs pa
147b7(rgyud 'grel): can du 'jug pa nyid/ /thams cad 'jig rten pa nyid yin/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub mi 'dra la/ /de nyid rig ba sa rmi 'drar rig /rmi 'dra'i srid par gnas pa yin/ /sems can rnams la phan btags pas/ /chos dbyings bzhin du dpag med par/ /dge ba
148a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad yongs bsdos na/ /de 'dir bsngo ba dam pa ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bsngags/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i yan lag bdun pa'i tshog slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes gyis/ /
148a2(rgyud 'grel): dpal bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta de nyid dang lo tsA ba shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur ro// //rgya gar skad du/ su ga ta shA sa na ratna b+hi hir dra nA ma/ bod skad du/ bde
148a3(rgyud 'grel): bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa rin po che'i gru bo zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /brtse ldan rtag bcas lung gi phyug /smra mkhas skyo ba med yid thul/ /sbyangs sdom dbang po rab zhi ba'i/ /bla ma la btud nges
148a4(rgyud 'grel): bstan bshad/ /shin tu rnyed dka' i dal ba sbrin 'dra las 'bras rjes 'brel sdug bsngal can/ /gnas la rab dang 'gro la brtse dang chos rab rnam byed brtson 'grus dang/ /gus bas mchog gsol cho ga bzang ldan mnyam par 'jog brtson legs bsdor
148a5(rgyud 'grel): bcas/ /bsam bya rnal 'byor mchog spyod srid zhi'i rgya mtsho sgrol ba'i gru/ /rus sbal gyis ni gnya' shing dang/ /yungs 'bru khab kyi bu gar dang/ /rtsig ngos la ni sran 'bras ltar/ /dal ba shin tu rnyed kar gsungs/ /gang phyir lus can
148a6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi las/ /rgyun ltar thur tu ltung phyir dang/ /der yang mi dge 'bel phyir dang/ /min yang legs sbyang bya dka' i phyir/ /rten 'di thob dka' de bzhin du/ /ji tsam rnyed dka' de tsam gyis/ /snying po med pa'i lus 'di las/ /snying po dam pa
148a7(rgyud 'grel): btsal bar bya/ /de phyir bdag la legs 'dod bas/ /skyes bu'i don bsgrub bya ba'i phyir/ /rgya mtshor byed bas rnyed pa yi/ /gru bo lta bur lus 'di spyad/ /srog 'di 'dus byas yin phyir dang/ /mi gdod phyir dang rkyen mang phyir/ /de bzhin snying po
148b1(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i phyir/ /'chi bdag gis bdag myur ? nges/ /lus dang longs spyod sdug pa yi/ /mdza' rnams rjes 'brang mi 'gyur zhing/ /mgon med gcig bu gyi nar ni/ /'jig rten pha rol 'dod bar byed/ /re zhig tshe rabs 'ga' lta zhig/
148b2(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs mi 'gyur gdeng thob pa'ang/ /bdag la yong yi mi snang na/ /ci phyir bdag yid bde bar 'dug /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /tshe 'di'i dgos pa khyad bsad cing/ /mgo la me shor bsgrim pa bzhin/ /mkhas pa slad ma'i don
148b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub bya/ /mthong dang rma mthong myong ba yi/ /rnam smin rgyu mthun dbang gi las/ /mngar skyur kha la rang rgyu bzhin/ /slu med las 'bras 'brel bar 'dod/ /mkha' ltar 'gag med sems nyid la/ /sna tshogs bag chags sprin tshogs 'khrigs/ /
148b4(rgyud 'grel): ? 'gyur char gyi rgyun 'bab pas/ /rjes myong lo tog smin par byed/ /chos kun rten cing 'bral 'byung zhing/ /rten med da yi rten yin te/ /brten pa'i rgyu 'bras gshis yin phyir/ /dkar gnas las 'bras 'brel pa nyid/ /slu med so sor des phyir
148b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ chung las che nyid 'byung phyir dang/ /sngon byung da dung myong 'gyur phyir/ /blo ldan blang dor 'bad par rigs/ /de ltar las de dang de'i?/ /'bras bu sdug bsngal bsam yas kyis/ /skye dgu kun tu gdud ba yang/ /me lce yis ni so mal bzhin//
148b6(rgyud 'grel): de ni 'du byed 'gyur ba dang/ /sdug bsngal gyi yang sdug bsngal sogs/ /skye rgan dang rgud dang 'chi/ /phrad bral bsrung dka' tshol la sogs/ /ji ltar bkra shis rna nag dang/ /dri ma? zhim dang mi gtsang bzhin/ /sdug bsngal nye bar len pa la/ /lhan
148b7(rgyud 'grel): skyes rtag tu 'brel ba yin/ /rmongs rnams sdug bsngal gyis skras bzhin/ /de yi rgyu la dga' mgur spyod/ /mi gang nang la dug bzhin du/ /shes pas gnyis spong de mkhas pa/ /bskal med rnyed dka' i dal ba legs rnyed brag dum u dum wa ra bzhin
149a1(rgyud 'grel): gang thob srog 'di 'ang rtag tu mi rung ri gzar khrod kyi klung rgyun 'dra/ /lus can rnams kyi dkar gnag las kyang sa bon dang ni lo tog mtshungs/ /'di dag tu ni sdug bsngal gdung pa'ang me 'bos 'bar ba'i me
149a2(rgyud 'grel): lte bzhin/ /zhes bya ba ni bsam par bya ba'i gnas bzhi'i chos mdor bsdu ba'o// /skyabs gsum thar pa las 'bras la /rab dang mngon 'dod yid ches dang/ /rnyog med yid gzhungs rnam par nges/ /gus
149a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor the tshom med par rgyu /yon tan shes pa nyid dang de/ /cig shos skyon mthong yid 'byung bcas/ /rtags myong khong du chud gyur la/ /rten nas dad pa thob par 'gyur/ /bya ba kun sngon 'gro phyir dang/ /byed pa yi ni rgyu nyid phyir/ /sa bon tshig
149a4(rgyud 'grel): las myu gu bzhin/ /chos kun spro ba med la min/ /'di na gang la rab dang yod/ /de yis dngos gang bsgrub dka' ba/ /de yang gzhan gyis bya sla bas/ /rab tu sla bas 'grub bar 'gyur/ /sems can chos dang chos nyid la/ /brtse rtogs mtshan
149a5(rgyud 'grel): ma med snying rje/ /mi bzod mngon du byed rtog med/ /don shes dri ma zad sbyor rgyu/ /gnyen tshogs sdug bsngal mthong dran dang/ /gang zag chos bdag med nyid dang/ /rigs lud man ngag gi phye bas/ /mthong phyir gzhan zhugs brtse ba
149a6(rgyud 'grel): skye/ sku gnyis lhun gyis 'grub pa'i rgyu/ /rin chen sems kyi rgyu phyir dang/ /ji ltar khab la khab len bzhin/ /'gro ba bsdud par byed phyir te/ /de bzhin de yi khyad par gyis/ /rgyal sras mdzad pa khyad par phyir/ /sman shing ljon pa lta
149a7(rgyud 'grel): bu yi/ /phun tshogs snying rje bskyed par byos/ sgyu mas sprul pa'i grong khyer du/ /skyes bu de dag dga' dang gdung/ /yul dus rnam kun shin tu ba/ /snang mtshungs don ma grub rtogs shes/ /ma 'gags mu mthar thug min dang/ /skye ba med las
149b1(rgyud 'grel): skye phyir ni/ /snang 'gyur gang skyes skye med dang/ /rten 'brel rtsa ba zang phyir stod/ /de la gang snang la sogs phyir/ /'khor ba'o de nyid de che der/ /spyad na mkha' ltar dben pa ni/ /rang bzhin mya ngan 'das par brjod/ /de ni mi rtogs rtogs dka' 
149b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ rtogs na nges par grol 'gyur phyir/ /rab zab zab cing ngo mtshar phyir/ /mkhas pas 'dzin pa rnam par gzhig /'bras bu bzang rnams mthong nyid dang/ /'grub pa 'bad ba la reg phyir/ /rgyun 'brel goms pas don thob shes//
149b3(rgyud 'grel): bsam brtson phyir mi ldog brtson 'grus/ /gzhan skyon 'di yi yon tan rig /gnyid sogs snyoms bral zhum med dang/ /thabs sbyangs snying brtan brtul phod dpa' / /skal ldan spro ba rnam par 'phel/ /rlung mang rnam g.yo mi 'byung bzhin/ /brtson
149b4(rgyud 'grel): bral legs spyad ga la yod/ /spro ldan skad cig nyid la yang/ /ri rab thal bar brlag sems bskyed/ /kye ma ho gzhan du yid brtan med/ /nying mtshams tshe na long med de/ /gson tsho 'ang?  bsil khang mar me bzhin/ /ci phyir bdag blo dal bar gnas/ /
149b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid padmo dmar gsal rab dga' 'dri med dad pa'i nyi zer 'bar pas rnam phye ba /mdza' yas 'gro la brtse ba'i chab brlan rjes chags utpal mig gi rdzi rab dkrugs nas ni/ /sna tshogs snang sems shes bya'i dkyil 'khor rten cing 'brel 'byung rang
149b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin stong pa nyid rig dang/ /srid pa'i dgra tshogs skyon mang gis skrag phang du sbral? 'od brtson pa bzhin du brtson par bya/ /zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i gnas bzhi'i chos mdor bsdu ba'o// //srid zhi'i skyon yon dran byas nas/ /bdag dang
149b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi don bsgrub phyir/ /yid bzhin nor la gyi dor bzhin/ /de nas dngos grub mchog gsol bya/ /gang phyir bskal pa brgya phrag du/ /'bad kyang phyogs tsam mi rnyed pa/ /gang gi drin gyis bde chen nyid/ /skad cig nyid la thob byed phyir/ /rgyun gyi rnal 'byor
150a1(rgyud 'grel): cho ga yis/ /ji bzhin mngon du byas nas su/ /re ba nyid dang gdung ba dang/ /gus pas rten gnyid gsol ba btab/ /gang tshe lhar bcas bla ma yi/ /byin brlabs snying la gang babs pa/ /de tshe shel ltar dang ba yi/ /sems thob
150a2(rgyud 'grel): spro bas non par 'gyur/ /rnam dag gsum gyis bsgyur byas nas/ /'od gsal gyis ni dri mer bya/ /zung du 'jug pas ye shes te/ /dbang gyur sbyor? bas phrin las bsgrub/ /lha dang sngags dang ting 'dzin nyid/ /snang grags dran pa nyid med nyid/ /sna
150a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bral ba kun snang zhing/ /gang snang gzhan gyi dbang can no/ /'di dag lus ngag yid rim bzhin/ /khri ma 'khru bar byed phyir dang/ /mchog byed ro gcig byed pa'i phyir ro/ /don bsgrub byed phyir rnam par bzhag /bdag nyid rtogs par byed phyir dang/ /
150a4(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pas grol phyir grol ba nyid/ /gzhan don rnam par 'phrul pa'i phyir/ /lam 'di theg gzhan las khyad 'phags/ /rnal 'byor chen po rang gi sems/ /dri med rab dang sim byed phyir/ /mkha' dang zla 'od bden mthong zhing/ /mi rtog 'od gsal
150a5(rgyud 'grel): bde chen brjod/ /sgyu ma nyid dang de snang dang/ /de bdag ji bzhin chos rnams kun/ /sems yin de nyid 'od gsal phyir/ /blo mchog rnam par mi rtog go /rang bzhin kun tu ma 'gags shing/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rang snang ba/ /kun khyab rnyog pa med mtshan
150a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ bskal bzang 'od gsal ting 'dzin bshad/ /mchog mthong phyir dang rdul med dang/ /dngos bral dngos la mngon chub phyir/ /chags bral zag pa med rab zhi/ /sim gyur bde ba chen por 'dod/ /de ltar 'di skyes dge ba yang/ /mtshan ma med
150a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid rgya che nyid/ /stong nyid snying rjer bcas sems kyis/ /mchog spyod sku gnyis legs bsngo bya/ /rmi lam yul gyi 'du byed bzhin/ /gang phyir gang du gang gis gang/ /ji ltar bsgrub pa mi dmigs phyir/ /dge ba mtshan ma med par gsungs/ /dmigs
150b1(rgyud 'grel): med dmigs par rab gsal ba/ /ngo bo ngo bo med rjes 'brel/ /rnam lnga yan lag snang ba'i gzhi/ /rgyal sras rnams kyi tshogs rab yin/ /gang zhig chos shes gang zag shes/ /shes rab thabs bcas chags bral chags/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'das bsngo
150b2(rgyud 'grel): ba/ bdag nyid chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad/ /gang snying cod pan chu skyes dmar rgyas lha mchog gis mtshan rdzogs sangs stong ldan mgon pos brgyan/ /phyi nang gsang bdag dri med ye shes lhan cig skyes rol 'od kyi sbyor bas rnam par brtsen/ /sprin khral mkha' 
150b3(rgyud 'grel): dang zla rgyas zer ltar dag cing rab gsal bde chen yid rab sim pa dang/ /gang skyes dge tshogs rin chen mnga' de'ang brtse ba'i gzhus bskyod 'gro la yongs su 'phen de dpa' bo/ /zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor du bya ba'i gnas bzhi'i chos mdor bsdu ba'o// //
150b4(rgyud 'grel): srid mtsho rab gnas nyon mongs chu srin kha gdangs gnas/ /sdug bsngal brlabs 'khrug gting mdza' med mngon 'jigs pa dang/ /zhi ba 'ching bu'i mtsho chen dkar 'khyil gnyis ka las/ /sgrol byed bstan pa rin chen gru mchog bzang 'di yin/ /
150b5(rgyud 'grel): legs sbyar bdag blo rab dang dga' i ba dang/ /snying brtses yid gzhungs 'bang byas dge ba 'dis/ /'gro rnams sngon gyi rgyal bas ma bsgral ba/ /de dag legs sgrol ded dpon mchog bdag gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa rin po che'i bru bo zhes bya
150b6(rgyud 'grel): ba grub pa brnyes pa'i paN+Di ta chen po a ji ta mi tra guptas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta dza ga ta mi ananda dang bud+d+ha sh+rI dz+nyA na dang lo tsA ba byams pa dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI band+ha bi mu ka ta
150b7(rgyud 'grel): shAstra/ bod skad du/ dpal 'ching ba rnam grol gyi bstan bcos/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig ma rtogs rtogs dkar rtogs na de nyid dus/ /'ching ba mi bzang shin tu grol dka' grol 'gyur ba/ /bdag dang gzhan
151a1(rgyud 'grel): don phun tshogs rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lam/ /ngo mtshar de ni 'gro ba bsgral phyir bdag gis bshad/ /gyad kyi dor bu la sogs bzhin/ /snying po de ni gzhan min gnas/ /gang phyir thams cad rang gi rang/ /'ching dang grol
151a2(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/ /'di na 'ching ba gang yang med/ /'ching ba gang yin de grol ba'o/ /de ni stong dang rten 'brel 'jug /de phyir 'phongs pas mi rtogs so/ /dman dang log pa'i bshes gnyen gyis/ /zin gyur bsod nams brtson 'grus zhan/ /
151a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs stobs blo gros chung ba yi/ /skye bo rnams kyis rtogs dka' o/ /rtogs ldan snying brtse man ngag mkhas/ /bshes gnyen dam pa btsal bar bya/ /da ni sogs lus longs spyod sogs/ /rnam kun dri med gus pas bsten/ /ji srid bdag sems
151a4(rgyud 'grel): brtan gyur pa/ /de srid lus dang grib ma bzhin/ /de yi rjes su bstan pa ni/ /rten 'brel stong nyid bdud rtsi'i chu/ /skom pas gdungs la chu bsil bzhin/ /dga' 'gu mi bzad dang bas btung/ /lam gzhan phun tshogs nges 'byung min/ /de shes ?
151a5(rgyud 'grel): dang shes rab yin/ /de ni chos sgo kun gyi sgo/ /rtogs dka' rtogs byed dam pa'i lam/ /ji ltar rten 'brel tsam nyid phyir/ /de ni ji ltar stong ma yin/ /gang phyir stong pa nyid yin na/ /de ni mkha' ltar 'gag med phyir/ /ci phyir rten cing 'brel mi 'gyur//
151a6(rgyud 'grel): de phyir de gnyis gnyis ma yin/ /de la rten 'brel ji lta bu/ /de yi steng nyid gang zhe na/ /nyon cig 'di ltar snang ba'i dngos/ /dbang po'i gzhu ltar rab gsol ba/ /sna tshogs bde dang sdug bsngal sogs/ /'di dag rang 'byung rgyu med min/ /rgyu
151a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan ma yin ma nges min/ /mngar sgyur kha la rang rgyu yin/ /sems nyid rten cing 'brel bar 'byung/ /ji ltar mkha' la sbrin bzhin no/ /kye ma srid pa'i nags tshal du/ /sdug bsngal 'bras cher lhags shing/ /nyes par spyad pa'i yal gcan/ /
151b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'i me tog rab gsal ba'o/ /de rgyu chags sdang tshul min sdong/ /bdag tu lta ba'i rtse brtan te/ /mi shes bag chags bcas drong gsher/ /sa chen 'byung ba las bskyed pa'o/ /mkha' la snod kyi 'jig rten ltar/ /e ma'o rten med rten gyur pa//
151b2(rgyud 'grel): rten 'brel brten pa rnams kyi mchog /re zhig rten ni ma grub na/ /brten pa ji ltar rnam gzhag rung/ /bdag med de lta bden min na/ /des bskyed chags sogs las rnams sogs/ /gang du ji ltar nges par bya/ /de ma grub na sdug bsngal gang//
151b3(rgyud 'grel): dmyong nyid kyang su zhig brjod/ /ji ltar sdod pa'i rtsa phyung na/ /bcad pa'i bya ba grub pa ltar/ /gzhir gyur bdag rtogs rnams bzlog pas/ /mkhas pa de bzhin srid pa zhig /bsregs bcad brdar bas gser sogs bzhin/ /'di ltar bdag dang
151b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan pa zhes/ /bya ba ji ltar rten dang gnas/ /ngo bo mtshan nyid brtag bar byos/ /de la lus ngag rlung dang yid/ /phyi nang bar sogs 'di dag mi /nam yang rten byed gnas gyur pa/ /sus kyang nges par mi nus so/ /gang phyir bdag de snang rung na/ /
151b5(rgyud 'grel): dmigs gyur dmigs pa med pa'i phyir/ /mi snang sems dang sems min smos/ /sems ni rang bzhin stong bdag nyid/ /sems min mi rtag rten 'brel bdag /rnam par dpyad na spros med do/ /rtag pa bya ba 'gal ba'i phyir/ /gdan? ci 'dra
151b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag bstan byos/ /mdor na 'dir mang smra mi bya/ /bdag de rang gi sgo gsum las/ /gzhan na 'dir gnod ci zhig byas/ /mtshon gyis rma ltar nyes pa yang/ /byis pa rnams kyi rang brtags dang/ /log sred skye bo'i brtsod bar zod/ /gzhan min bdag
151b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam dpyad na/ /ji ltar gang zhig bdag tu 'gyur/ /de min de rten de gnas gang/ /gang yang 'di dag de rten dang/ /de gnas phyogs kyang rnam dpyad kyis/ /tshul 'das bdag dngos bdag mtshan nyid/ /sgyu ltar legs grub bstan pa yin/ /ltos shig tshul
152a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di chu shing 'dra/ dag ni drag ca mkha' 'dra yid/ /rdul tsam dmigs pa yod min na/ /'di la ji ltar bdag tu brtag/ phyi ni phyi rol nang yang gzhan/ /des na bar yang de bdag min/ /gang yang de ni dkar sogs dang/ /ring dang
152a2(rgyud 'grel): thung dang sbom dang phra/ /'thugs dang srab ces bya la sogs/ /mtshan nyid nges par nas ma yin/ /ci ste shing la 'khril shing bzhin/ /de ni kun gzhi 'am bag chags la/ /brten de mi mngon gnas she na/ /snang dang mi snang rnam dpyad dang/ /de nyid
152a3(rgyud 'grel): sems dang sems min zhes/ /sngar bzhin brtag pa mtshungs par 'gyur/ /'on te sems ni gang yin pa/ /de nyid bdag ces bya zhe na/ /sems ni dmigs med 'od gsal phyir/ /da ni bdag de bdag med 'gyur/ /e ma'o shin tu rtogs
152a4(rgyud 'grel): dka' i gnas/ /e ma'o e ma shin tu rmad/ /e ma'o mkhas pas shes par rung/ /e ma'o shes bral shes pa'i dbyings/ /de ltar 'gro ba 'di na bdag /med kyang nga dang nga yi zhes/ /gzung dang 'dzin pas brlabs pa yi/ /skye bo smyos pa 'di
152a5(rgyud 'grel): dag tsa/ /'on kyang 'jig rten log pas mig /bsgribs nas bzung dang 'dzin pa ni/ /ji ltar snang ba ji bzhin gzhag /snang la snang ltar rab chags srid/ /sdug bsngal 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyu/ /bdag cag de las 'da' min nam/ /gal te bdag
152a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid ma grub kyang/ /de 'dzin nyid bden zhe na/ /'di nyid e ma'o 'gro kun gyi/ /log par 'ching ba mi zad pas/ /mgo la me shor bsgrim pa bzhin/ /rings par myur du ldog par bya/ /grogs dag 'di ltar mngon sum du/ /yang dag rigs pa'i
152a7(rgyud 'grel): mig nyid kyis/ /bdag de ma grub des na 'dir/ /gzhan zhes bya ba'ang yod min na/ /yu bu thams cad nga snyam dang/ /da'o mnyam dang gzhan mnyam dang/ /gzhan gyi'o zhes log rtog pa/ /'di dag ji ltar gang du dogs/ /dper na smi lam bu zhi ba
152b1(rgyud 'grel): ? nyid med na de shi yang/ /bden par yod pa ma yin pa/ /de bzhin yu bu'i 'dzin pa yang/ /e ma'o shin tu ngo mtshar gnas/ /gang zhig gcig nyid rtogs pa yis/ /thams cad rnam par grol 'gyur ba/ /'di la the tshom su zhig skrag /'khor dang mya
152b2(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'das pa'i chos/ /phung po khams dang skye mched sogs/ /theg gsum theg gsum nges 'byung lam/ /ma lus bdag min bdag gis min/ /bdag med stong pa'i mtshan nyid de/ /med phyir med la med nyid du/ /tshul bzhin nges par byas pa la/ /
152b3(rgyud 'grel): kye ma khyod la skyon ci yod/ /gang gang bdag dang bdag gi zhes/ /'dzin pa'i 'ching ba thams cad kyang/ /phyi min nang min bar yang min/ /de bzhin lus dag yod ma yin/ /de dag las min der gnas min/ /de bzhin chags dang sdang sogs kyi/ /
152b4(rgyud 'grel): ma lus yid la byed pa yang/ /dpyad na re zhig gang la gang/ /gang du gang gis chags pa dang/ /sdang bar 'gyur ba'ang gal yod/ /gzugs sdug sgra snyan dri zhim dang/ /ro mngar reg 'jam yid bde'i rkyen/ /'di dag gang gis de shes la//
152b5(rgyud 'grel): ci zhig phan brtags 'brel pa yod/ /de shes pas kyang de dag la/ /chags dang rab tu chags 'gyur gang/ /de ni phyi nang bar dag dang/ /lus sogs dngos po gang zhig yin/ /de min de las de brten dang/ /skyes dang gnas dang 'gag
152b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba/ /sgyu ma yi ni rta glang ltar/ /don du grub pa yong ma yin/ /gang gis bdag la brnyas sogs dang/ /smad sogs brdeg sogs byas pa'i rgyu/ /sdang dang rab sdang sems 'byung ba/ /'di 'ang sngar bzhin bdag sems dang/ /?
152b7(rgyud 'grel): yang pha rol de yi sems/ /mkha' 'dra mtshan ma med pa yin/ /de bzhin gzhan de'i dag nyid dang/ /lus ni dri sgra shing lta bu/ /yin na sgyu mas sgyu ma yi/ /rgyal ltar des 'dir bdag gnod gang/ /bdag gi ? de bzhin dag dang lus/ /de?
153a1(rgyud 'grel): ltar lus can thams cad kyi'ang/ /mtshungs phyir 'di dag skye ba dang/ /gnas dang 'gag 'gyur mi dmigs so/ /gang phyir phan tshun 'brel med phyir/ /dpyad na thams cad spros med phyir/ /yul dus rnam kun
153a2(rgyud 'grel): dri med phyir/ /mkha' la 'phur ba'i bya rjes bzhin/ /de ltar stong pa'i spyod yul 'dir/ /rmi lam dgra dang 'tha' bzhin du/ /gang la gang zhig ji ltar chags/ /de bzhin sdang ba 'ang gang du dogs/ /pha dang ma dang chung ma bu/ /gnyen dang bshes
153a3(rgyud 'grel): pa de bzhin sgra/ /sgyu ma ji bzhin de bzhin pas/ /'dzin pa thams cad gzhig par bya/ /de nyid kyis na chags sogs kyis/ /las byed de yang ji lta bu/ /yang yang shes rab brtan po yis/ /mkhas pas sngar bzhin rtag par byos/ /de phyir
153a4(rgyud 'grel): bde dang sdug bsngal yang/ /bem pos rnam par myong min la/ /rig la dngos po yod min te/ /thog med dus nas log sbyangs pa/ /'khrul pas 'dzin pa nyi tshe ba/ /de yang dngos po med pa nyid/ /de ltar med la med nyid du/ /blo bzang rnams kyis
153a5(rgyud 'grel): goms byas na/ /brnyos pas gnyen la dgra bzhin du/ /mi bzad 'ching bas bcings pa de/ /sbrul mdud rang gis grol ba bzhin/ /nges par rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ /rnam grol rnam grol las byung ba'i/ /'bras bu lhun gyi grub pa gang/ /don gnyis
153a6(rgyud 'grel): phun tshogs ngo mtshar ba/ /de ni bum pa bzang po bzhin// //dpal 'ching ba rnam grol gyi bstan bcos/ /rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po grub pa brnyes pa'i dpal ni ska lang+gas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor gyi dbang
153a7(rgyud 'grel): phyug chen po sh+rI dza ga ta mi twA nAn+ta'i zhal snga nas/ kha? che'i paN+Di ta chen po bud+d+ha sh+rI b+ha dras gtan la phab nas/ bod kyi lo chung gnubs tshul khrims shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ bi shud+d+ha darsha na tsarya u ba de sha rnA? ma/
153b1(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ lta spyod rnam dag gi man ngag ces bya ba/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rmi lam lta bur phyi rol min/ /sgyu ma lta bur bden don med/ /nam mkha' lta bur mtshan nyid bral/ /chos kun rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o//
153b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro 'ong gnas med byang chub sems/ /rgya chen sems can don la mkhas/ /tshogs gnyis dbyer med lam gyi mchog /stong nyid snying rje'i snying po sgom/ /lta sbyong rnam dag gi man ngag ces bya ba/ ba che'i rigs kyi paN+Di ta chen po dpal chos kyi rje shAkya
153b3(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// /mkhas pa chen po de nyid kyi spyan sngar lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyi khro phu bzang lung du bsgyur ba'o// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ tsit+ta ratna bi sho d+hA nAM
153b4(rgyud 'grel): marga laM/ bod skad du/ sems rin po che sbyar ba'i lam 'bras/ rje btsun mi pham mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnyed dka' i dal 'byor myur du 'jig /las dang de 'bras sdug bsngal yin/ /de spong shes rab snying rje bsgom/ /skyes gsum lam gyis/
153b5(rgyud 'grel): don gsum 'thob/ /dam pa gsum gyis bsod nams bsags/ /rgya chen thabs kyis yang dag spel/ /shes rab zab mos rnam dag bya/ /zung 'jug bsngo bas rgyas gdab po/ /kha che'i rigs las bal yul du sku 'khrungs pa'i paN+Di ta chen po dpal lnga
153b6(rgyud 'grel): rig pa'i mchog bud+d+ha sh+rI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa/ sems rin po che sbrang ba'i lam 'bras zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //mkhas pa chen po de nyid kyi spyan sngar lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bal yul yaM 'gal gyi gtsug lag khang du
153b7(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ band+ha bi muk+to pa de sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'ching ba rnam grol gyi man ngag ces bya ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kye 'o gang gis 'ching bar byed pa'i rgyu/ /de nyid grol bar
154a1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i lam/ /'di na 'ching ba gang yang med/ /'ching ba gang yin pas grol pa'o/ /'dod chags bde ba chen por dag /zhe sdang 'od gsal me lce 'bar/ /gti mug rnam par mi tog nyid/ /dug gsum sku gsum lhun gyis
154a2(rgyud 'grel): grub/ 'ching ba rnam grel gyi man ngag ces bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug sh+rI dza ga ta mi twa ananda'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug de nyid kyi sngar lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bal yul
154a3(rgyud 'grel): bu lang gser khang du bsgyur pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ /sid+d+his? ? ni rnal ta sad ? rnal/ bod skad du/ grub pa dam pa'i lam nges pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kha sad+d+ha? Ni 'jig rten dpal/
154a4(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje chen po ston pa'i mthus/ /gdul dpa' i rang sems 'dul ba la/ /snying po bla med rnam gsum thob/ /kyi ma'o 'dzam gling skye bo nyon/ /'gro pa'i gshes gnyen 'di skad smra/ /gang zhig 'ching bar byed pa'i rgyu/ /de nyid grol bar byed pa'i lam//
154a5(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal rgya mtsho sgol ba'i gru/ /thub pa'i bstan pa rin po che/ /de yi ngo bo lam dang thabs/ /bshes gnyan kun dga' i gdams pa yin/ /e ma'o/ /mi lus rin chen rnyed par dka' / /rnyed dka' i ngal 'byor sprin ltar g.yo/ /'khor ba thams
154a6(rgyud 'grel): cad sdug bsngal te/ /rang sems mya ngan 'das pa yin/ /rgya mtshor bying pas rnyed pa'i gru/ /chu rgyun drag po'i dpa' 'dang ni/ /dus can sprul gyi tshang bzhin dang/ /ston gyi nam mkha' i ba'i gung bzhin no/ /longs spyod ci 'dra khyim gyi sgra/ /bshes pa'i ci 'dra tshor?
154a7(rgyud 'grel): khang mi/ /rang lus ci 'dra sprul gyi lpags/ /tshe srog ci 'dra ri gzar chu/ /kye mdo mi rtag srin po yi/ /khang chud ma gyur de srid par/ /grogs dag srid pa ru bzlog la/ sgrim par gyis shig bzhin bzang dag /sgyu ma'i grong khyer yangs pa na/ /rmi lam skyes
154b1(rgyud 'grel): bu longs spyod pa/ /sems nyid brten cing 'brel par 'byung/ /snang sems de ltar shes par bya/ /ltos shig lus ni chu shing 'dra/ /dag ni brag cha mkha' 'dra yid/ /rdul tsam dmigs pa yod min na/ /bu dag gang la su zhig 'ching/ /yu bu thams cad
154b2(rgyud 'grel): nga snyam dang/ /nga'o snyam dang gzhan snyam dang/ /gzhan gyi'o zhes log rtog pa/ /'di dag ji ltar gang du dogs/ /ji ltar rmi lam bu shi ba/ /bu nyid med na de shi yang/ /bden par yod pa ma yin pa/ /de bzhin yu bu'i 'dzin pa yang/ /chos kun rmi
154b3(rgyud 'grel): lam 'dra ba'i phyir/ /zas gos nor dang grogs bshes dgra /sna tshogs snang ba 'di dag kun/ /sgyu ma yi ni rta glang bzhin/ /gang shar sor bzhag dran pa yin/ /dran pa rang grol bral ba ste/ /bral ba ro mnyam lhun gyis grub/ /snying po'i gsel lam
154b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa gsum/ a'i thi/ mi tra dzo kis mdzad pa paN+Di ta de nyid dang lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur pa'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ swa citsDa yo gi gaN+DA? ka to ba de she/ bod skad du /rnal 'byor pa rang gi sems
154b5(rgyud 'grel): mdud pa 'grol ba'i man ngag/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /e ma'o/ gdod nas ma skyes pa/ /'khor dang 'das pa'i byed rgyu can/ /gzhan min rang gi snying dbus gnas/ /bla ma'i zhal las shes
154b6(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /kye 'o gzhin bzang ngal nyon/ /gang gis 'ching par byed pa'i rgyu/ /de nyid grol par byed pa'i lam/ /'di na 'ching ba gang yang med/ /rmi lam grong khyer yangs pa na/ /sgyu ma'i skyes bu long spyod pa/ /longs spyod dus na thongs?  spyod med/ /snang
154b7(rgyud 'grel): sems de ltar shes par bya/ /sna tshogs snar pa rang gi sems/ /de ni sprul pa'i tshogs 'dus bzhin/ /rang sems dbang po'i gzhu 'dra ba/ /gnyug ma 'od gsal lhun gyi grub/ /gang shar thams cad de yin te/ /de ni gang duAng ma shar ba'o/ /de phyir gang
155a1(rgyud 'grel): skyes de ma skyes/ /ma skyes pa nyid skye ba'i tshul/ /me long gzugs dang po waM sgra/ /dge slong sprul pa rdzu 'phrul bzhin/ /yod dang med dang skye 'gag dang/ /'gro 'od?  ngo mtshan nyid rtogs par gyis/ /skyes yi ni rta glung ltar//
155a2(rgyud 'grel): snang brten cing 'brel yang 'phyung?/ /de nyid ston gyi mkha' bzhin du/ /'od gsal chos gsum sbyar bar bya/ /e ma'o/ rnal 'byor rgyal po che/ /e ma'o ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /e ? ma spangs lhun gyis grub/ /e? ma'o e ma'o bde ba che/ /ma
155a3(rgyud 'grel): rtog 'gro la rang dbang du/ /snying rje chen po'i dbang gis ni/ /dmigs med rnam kun yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /bsod nams ye shes phun tshogs 'gyur/ /rang gi sems kyi mdud pa 'grol pa'i gdams pa rdzogs so// //
155a4(rgyud 'grel): bla ma ma tri e nan+ta zhes bya ba spas pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid bod yul kha ba can gyi mthil bkra shis kyi tshong dus chen po 'gung mo rin po che'i gling du byon pa'i tshe/ /mdo sngags kyi bdag po chen po/ /rgya/ 'brel la/ lo/ dro/ gshen drug gis zhus pa'i
155a5(rgyud 'grel): don du gsungs pa/ /phyag rgya chen po tshig chod kyi do ha/ /gnubs lo ? bas bsgyur pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI sapta ? ga mA rag bi ni shtsa ya/ bod skad du/ dpal rnal 'byor bdun gyi lam rnam par nges pa/ bcom ldan 'das
155a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal te/ /de yi zhal gyi bka' drin gyis/ /bdul dka' i rang sems 'dul ba la/ /snying po'i man ngag rnam bdun thob/ /kye'o gzhin bzang de la nyon/ /thog med 'khor ba'i 'khor lo
155a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dir/ /khyed cag gang gi 'khor gyur pa/ /e ma'o de nyid de'i rgyu/ /gdod nas rnam grol rang gi sems/ /gang phyir thams cad rang gi dang/ /'ching dang grol bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/ /'di na 'ching ba gang yang med/ /'ching ba gang yin de grol ba'o/ /grol ba'i
155b1(rgyud 'grel): lam ni mkhas par rig /kye kye i ma'o e ma'o/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho sgrol ba'i gru/ /rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che/ /'di yi ngo bo byang chub sems/ /de yi ngo bo stong pa nyid/ /de dbyer med pa lam yin no/ /'grub pa tshad med thams kyi bdag /bskul
155b2(rgyud 'grel): ba bsgyur ba spro ba ?/ /dran dang bral ba lhun gyis grub/ /gnyug ma 'od gsal byang chub sems/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med kyi/ /srid la chags med bskul par bya/ /phyi nad gsang ba'i rnam dag gis/ /snang sems ye shes bsgyur bar bya//
155b3(rgyud 'grel): rten 'brel sbyor nyid snying rje yis/ /'khor 'das 'gro ba'i don rab spro/ /gang shar sor bzhag dran pa yin/ /dran pa rang grol bral ba ste/ /bral ba ro mnyam lhun gyis grub/ /gang shad ngo bo ma bcos pa/ /gnyug ma'i de nyid yul dbang gis/ /sna tshogs
155b4(rgyud 'grel): 'grub? tha stong pa ni/ /sems nyid zab mo'i 'od gsal yin/ /'od gsal gang yin te yi ro/ /brtse chen rab 'byams byang chub sems/ /de yi 'bras bu rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug zhab?/ /bla ma'i mthu yis 'dzam gling gi/
155b5(rgyud 'grel): mig byin grogs po'i ming can la/ /ngal so'i man ngag rnam pa bdun/ /dpal rnal 'byor rnam pa bdun gyi lam rnam par nges pa/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po sh+rI dza ga ta mi tra a na n+ta'i? thugs kyi 'khor lo dam pa/ /bkra shis kyi tshong dus chen po dpal
155b6(rgyud 'grel): mgur mo rin po che'i gling du/ dge pa'i bshes gnyen chen po/ /rgya/ 'bre/ lam/ lo/ dro/ gshen/ drug gi don du mdzad pa'i bstan bcos/ de kho na nyid rnal du mtshon pa'i man ngag rdzogs so// //mi tra dzo kis mdzad pa de nyid dang khro phub
155b7(rgyud 'grel): yis bsgyur pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ /sa mA d+he a b+hi Sha ka/ bod skad du/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang bskur ba/ dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur? ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gad zhig dpal ldan bdud bzhi'i dgra bcom byang chub mchod/
156a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang nyid brnyes nas/ thugs rjes mi bsnyal lus can gzhan yang zhi ba bla med lam bzang du/ /smin mdzad dbang stsol sa gsum bdag po spyan ras gzigs dbang la btud de/ /skal ldan ting 'dzin ye shes sems spyod rnam
156a2(rgyud 'grel): ngag dbang bskur cho ga bshad// //yid 'ong gnas su bde ba yi/ /rkyen tshogs dam tshig kun ldan pas/ /snying rje chen po mdun bzhag la/ /gus pas sngon du gsol ba gdab/ /'dom gang srid 'phags nam mkhar ni/ /thub pa chen po 'khor
156a3(rgyud 'grel): los sgyur/ /bde chen yum dang lhan cig skyes/ /dpag med sras bcas bsgom par bya/ /sna tshogs dngos kun mchod pa'i sprin/ /kun tu bzang spyod ji bzhin du/ /mchod byas sdig pa bsal nas su/ /rnam dag dbang bskur de rjes nod/ /lha dang bdag
156a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas rnam gsum du/ /rdo rje 'bru gsum mngon bsams la/ /dad dang thugs rje dam mchog gis/ /kha dog rim gsum 'od gzer dbyung/ /sku mchog snying po oM las 'od zer dkar po dang/ /gsung rgyun dri med A(rgyud 'grel): las de bzhin dmar
156a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'od/ /rnam dag thugs bdag hUM las rnam 'phros rab sngo ser/ /bdag lus ngag yid gnas gsum la reg dri gsum sel/ /de rjes bdud rtsi dkar dmar sngo/ /dag byed rnam gsum man ngag bzhin/ /de 'og ye shes rnam gsum bag/
156a6(rgyud 'grel): mthar ni gnyis med zhi ba'o/ /shin tu gsang ba bde pa che/ /thig le gsum rgyun sbyor ba ni/ /de rjes blo gros chen pos bsgom/ /dbang bskur nas ni gshegs par rol/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bskur rdzogs so/ //
156a7(rgyud 'grel): paN+Di tu de nyid dang/ gdubs lo ? bas bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ra wa sha mA na/ bod skad du/ pha rol dbang du bya ba/ /'phags pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shin tu snying
156b1(rgyud 'grel): rjes non pa'i yid/ /lus can mya ngan 'das pa la/ /bsam pa thag pas 'gron gnyer ba/ /de yis pha rol bsdu pa bshad/ /nam langs mun pas slebs pa dang/ /gnyis du nye dang sad pa'i dus/ /dga' dang gdung ba bskyes pa nas/ /de yi cha
156b2(rgyud 'grel): ga spyan ras gzigs/ /bdag gis lus gang lta yin te/ /dag ni yi ge bzhi nyid do/ /rnam par rtog dang mi rtog sems/ /snying rje ? dang stong pa nyid/ /mig gnyis nyi zla 'bar ba dang/ /lce steng a ka'i phreng pas brgyan/ /lte ba me thab 'khyil pa'i
156b3(rgyud 'grel): dbus/ /dpal ldan 'dod pa'i lha mo yi/ /mi gang dbang du bya ba de'i/ /smin phrag snying? dang lte ba'i dbus/ /dga' dang dad dang gdung ba nyin/ /thig le padmo a yi gzugs/ /byams pa yi ge a yi rgyan/ /bdag gi sprul pa las skyes ngag/
156b4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu mi bzod snying rje can dga' pa'i blta bas rnam par bzhu/ /btang snyoms tshad mod blo gros che/ /yi ge lnga brjod padmo ba byed/ /oM ? h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dzaM hUM(rgyud 'grel): 'bum phrag lnga rab ma yongs dang/ lhag bsam bar chad spangs bsnyen bsgrub//
156b5(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs ring bsrel? sku khrus sogs/ /brtse ldan rnams kyis sngags chung bcas/ /me tog dmar pos gdod bkrus la/ /lce dkyil sgrang rtsi ldan bsngags brjod/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): lo ga nA thA ma hA ka ru Ni ka ho sa ma haM/ che ge mo'i tsit+ta mahA tsa
156b6(rgyud 'grel): la tsel pra tsal pra tsa la dza:dza:dza:blo gros bzang po snying rjes myos gyur pa/ /skye bo 'di dag thabs gang 'phrin las kyis/ /bde bar rung na bdag cing gyur sla'o zhes/ /nyin mtshan rtag tu yid byed mi 'bral na/ /rnal 'byor rgyal po rtags pa
156b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dis?/ /zhag gsum drug ? dgu nyid na/ /lcags kyus bzhus pa'i yal ga ltar/ /gdon mi za bar de dbang 'gyur/ /pha rol dbang du bya ba gtsubs lo tsA bas bsgyur pa'o// //bkra shis bde legs dang ldan par gyur ci// 
157a1(rgyud 'grel): rin po che khong? ye'i? dbang gi man ngag gi rim pa shes bya ba dbang po'i? slobs? 'gyur po'i dbang pos mdzad pa bzhugs/ /*/ /rgya gar skad du/ ratna tsakra a b+hiShe ka u ba de sha kra ma/ bod skad du/ rin po che 'khor lo'i dbang gi man ngag
157a2(rgyud 'grel): gi rim pa/ dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde chen po/ /dkyil 'khor sgyu ma la gnas shing/ /dang po gnyis gsum bzhi pa yi/ /man ngag rdzogs la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /mthong ba'i chos la sa rab non/ /dbang
157a3(rgyud 'grel): dang man ngag 'brel bcas pa'i/ /rgyud rnams kun la rab 'jug pa/ /in+d+ra b+hu ti bdag gi bshad/ /thabs dang shes rab la sogs rgyud/ /phyi nang sbas dang mthar thug pa'i/ /dbang gi rim pa ngo bo ru/ /rdo rje bdag pos yang dag bshad/ /de bas
157a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud kun dbang yin pas/ /man ngag can gyis shes par bya/ /rgyud kyi tshig la rab goms shing/ /smra pa'i tshig la ma rmongs kyang/ /dbang dang man ngag ma thob pa/ /de dag ngal ba don med yin/ /dbang dang man ngag 'dod pa yis/ /rang srog lus
157a5(rgyud 'grel): dang rdzas rnams kyis/ /bla ma slob dpon mnyes byas la/ /thabs la mkhas pas 'dod pa blang/ /man ngag thob pa'i skyes bus kyang/ /srog lus btang bar phangs pa ltar/ /man ngag dam pa de bas phangs/ /de bas btsal thabs mkhas par bya/ /bla ma'i
157a6(rgyud 'grel): drin lan mi shes shing/ /man ngag phyal bar sbal ba dang/ /thos nas mi mos mi bsgom na/ /mthong ba'i chos la dmyal tshogs 'tsheng/ /bla ma'i drin lan mi brjed cing/ /man ngag btsal ba'i thabs mkhas pa/ /mos shing bsam gtan mchog gzhol ba/ /rgyal
157a7(rgyud 'grel): sras kun gyi nang ? mchog /dbang bsgyur rim pa yang dag pa'i/ /gnas dang dus dang slob dpon dang/ /slob ma dang ni gleng gzhi dang/ /dkyil 'khor dag dang der 'jug rim/ /dbang bskur rim dang rnam grangs pa/ /bskur ba'i gnas dang thabs dag dang/ /sgrib byar?
157b1(rgyud 'grel): tshar? dang? non dang/ /de 'brel man ngag rim pa dang/ /rtags dag dang ni brda dang dang/ /rdzas dag dang yang dgos pa'i don/ /nus pa'i tshad dang 'bras bu ste/ /rnam pa nyi shus mngon par brjod/ /de dag kun gyi mtshan nyid dang/ /bum pa'i dbang dang gsang ba'i
157b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang/ /gsum pa shes rab ye shes dbang/ /de ltar de bzhin yang bzhas? bshad/ /rgyud rnams kun gyi tshig don rnams/ /ma lus 'dir ni 'dus pa yin/ /dang por bum dbang gleng gzhi nas/ /yang dag brtsams te bdag gis bshad/ /kye 'o shAkya seng+ge la/

158a1(rgyud 'grel): glegs bam mchod rten bla ma sogs/ /de kun spyan sngar bum dbang ni/ /bskur du rung bar bde gshegs gsungs/ /de dag so so'i cho ga'i rim/ /so so'i rgyud las gsal bar bya/ /rdul tshon la sogs byed pa'i tshe/ /sa ni dag par

160b2(rgyud 'grel): yang na 'bras bzhi brtan byed pa'o/ /rgyud las gsungs pa'i yon tan ni/ /bsam yas ji snyed bstan pa kun/ /dbang gi 'bras rab yin par gsungs/ /'bras bu yong dang rgyu 'byung ste/ /dbang thob rgyu ni yon yin te/ /ji ltar rgyud las gsungs pa
160b3(rgyud 'grel): yin/ las kyi dang por dbang bya ba/ /dang po'i dbang du gsungs pa yin/ /gnyis pa gsang ba bshad bya ste/ /kye'o ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dod chags chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /'khor rnams bsdu pa rnams mdzad nas/ /yul gyi gsang ba'i

160b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags skyes pa zhes grags ba la/ /smre sha can dang mthu chen dang/ /gang mkhan btso glag mkhan la sogs/ /so so'i rgyud las grags pa yi/ /ji ltar rigs kyi rjes mthun pa'i/ /shes rgyud sbyangs shing yon tan ldan/ /byin gyis brlabs
160b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas bya ste/ /sangs rgyas gtso bo'i yum du bzung/ /bum pa'i dbang rnams rdzogs pa dang/ /rag ta 'bab pa'i dus dang ni/ /bla ma yum gyis gnad ba ni/ /gnyis pa'i dus su rnam par brtag /slob dpon rnam pa gsum du shes/ /dang po thabs
160b7(rgyud 'grel): mchog yab kyis te/ /gnyis pa gsang ba'i gsungs ma la'o/ /gsum pa gnyis su med pas bya'o/ /slob ma bum dbang rdzogs pa dang/ /snying po bzlas pas byed pa dang/ /brtul zhugs dam tshig 'dod pas bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor lus su 
161a1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa dang/ /dkyil 'khor b+ha gar bstan pa'o/ /de yang lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang/ /lha yi mtshan nyid shes bya ste/ /lus ni 'od ma gang thu bzhi pa'o/ /yang na gru bzhi 'byung ba bzhi/ /sted 'og g.yas g.yon sgo
161a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'o/ /tshon sna kha dog sna lnga'o/ /yang na bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga/ /rtsa ni thig ge rang bzhin te/ /ka ba brgyad ni rkang brgyad do/ /yan lag rta babs mtshan nyid de/ /so sen? ba spu twar? brgyad/ /snying ni dbus kyi lte ba ste/ /rgyud gang dang ni rjes mthun
161a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyar/ /lha yi phung po lnga gtso bo/ /'byung ba lha mor shes par bya/ /khams dang skye mched mang po kun/ /sems dpa' sems mar rab tu grags/ /bud med dkyil 'khor du gsungs te/ /b+ha ga gzhal yas brtsegs par bstan/ /de la bzung ba'i tshe
161a4(rgyud 'grel): go dang/ /sbyang dang brtan dang byin brlabs dang/ /rgyan dang ldan zhing bdugs pas bdug /phyi nang khrus byas lha rnams dbab/ /tshogs kyi 'khor los mchod byas la/ /lta ru nye bar brtag par bya/ /de la char yang drang bar bya'o/ /de la 'jug pa'i
161a5(rgyud 'grel): rim pa yang/ /bum ba'i bya ba yang bya ste/ /yol bas bar du bcad nas ni/ /gsol gdab de yi ngo yang dag pa/ /me tog byin te drangs nas su/ /dkyil 'khor bskor nas phyag gsum btsal/ /nang gi dam tshig brtul zhugs sbyin/ /de bzhin dbeb pa yang
161a6(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /me tog dor te mthong ba dra/ /lha dang chos kyi tshig phye ste/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bstan/ /legs par mthong ba'i 'og tu ni/ mdun na gnas pa de nyid la/ /gsang ba'i dbang gis sbyor byas te/ /dam tshig 'khor lo drug rim gyis//
161a7(rgyud 'grel): khu ba phyung ste dbang bskur bya/ /dkar dmar sgal? ba phred ba'i dbang/ /shukra? zhes te chu yi dbang/ /tshangs sgor mi bskyod ? rgyan dbang/ /lce yi rdo rje de rdo rje/ /rdor bum hUM sgra dril bu'i dbang/ /a 'o su kha ming gi dbang/ /dam tshig lces len brtul zhugs dbang
161b1(rgyud 'grel): blta bar mi bya lung bstan dbang/ /longs spyod rtsal sbyar phyir mi ldog /bde bas bde thob dbugs dbyung ba'o/ /'di kun gsang bar bstan pas ne/ /gsang ba'i dbang zhes bstan pa yin/ /gsang ba la yang gsum du ste/ /phyi dang nang dang sbas pa'o//
161b2(rgyud 'grel): ga bur tsan dan bcu phyed bcas/ /sbom po dang ni dbang mo'i rtses/ /slob ma'i kha ru dbab pa'i phyi'o/ /slob ma'i dus nyid mnan byas te/ /kha yi thad kar gnyis sbyar nas/ /ra ga a ta ra 'bab pa/ /be'u 'drar rdo rje bzhi ba'i thabs/ /bung 'drar pad+ma
161b3(rgyud 'grel): ltes len pa/ /shes rab nang gi gsang ba'i dbang/ /slob ma rang gi lte ba can/ /rdo rje pad+ma 'dus pas gsungs/ /rdul dang mun pa snying stobs te/ /'og sgo'i kha ru rab 'bab pa/ /sbas pa'i gsang ba'i dbang du gsungs/ /gsang ba'i dbang la
161b4(rgyud 'grel): yang bzhi ste/ /rdo rje dang ni pad+ma nas/ /dri med chu 'bab bum pa'i dbang/ /yang na gong gi rim de nyid/ /zla ba nyi ma lce la reg /de ni gsang ba gnyis la ste/ /bde chen lam sbyangs gsum pa'o/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa/ /ye shes chen po bzhi
161b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de nas ngag gi lam yin te/ /lce yi pad+ma zhes bya ba/ /phyi dang nang dang sbas pa'i lce'o/ /byi yi pad+ma dag gi lam/ /nang du tsit+tad de shes bya/ /sbas pa lte ba'i pad+ma la'o/ /thabs ni gtso gzungs slob mar bcas/ /lus ngag sems la dri med cing/ /
161b6(rgyud 'grel): don mi phyed mthun pa yin/ /dag gi sgrib pa de byang nas/ /ngag ni shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ /sangs rgyas sa ni dang po non/ bde? yi man ngag gsang ba'o/ /dgongs pa'i don dang des don dang /ji bzhin med dang spas pa yi/ /don rnams nges par bstan par bya/ /
161b7(rgyud 'grel): slob ma bkri ba'i don bstan bya/ /de ni ma hA ye ga yin/ /thabs dang shes rab rtags sbyar/ /nang gi sbas pa'i dag brda dang/ /sbyor ba yi ni brda rnams dang/ /rim gyis mkha' 'gro'i brda skad stan/ /sbom pos khro mo mnan pa ni/ /lag brda 'dri na shes par bya
162a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzas ni zla ba nyi ma dang/ /bcu phyed rdzas kyi rnam pa yis/ /longs spyod bya yi dor mi bya'o/ /ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad kun/ /gtso bzungs zhal du thim pa las /sku yis dbus su thim pa dang/ /bde ba'i 'bru tshogs
162a2(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba'i rgyun/ /rdo rje'i lam nas padmor 'khyil /shu kra rak+ta 'dres pa ni/ /yab yum bde ba'i dang du gsal/ /ji ltar chu la chu bzhag ltar/ /thim pas sems gyur dgongs pa'i don/ /nus pa'i tshad kyang de bzhin du/ /ji snyed dag gi dri ma 'khru/ /
162a3(rgyud 'grel): bud+d+ha'i sar sgrib shin tu dag shes rab thabs kyi nga rgyal byed/ /chos kun ro gcig shes par nus/ /sangs rgyas sa ni mngon du thob/ /thabs kyi phyag rgyas phung po 'joms/ /nyon mongs shes rab ma yin te/ /'chi bdag gnyis su med pa yis/ /sems
162a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phros pas ni lta yi bdud/ /'joms pa gsang ba'i nus pa'i tshang/ /thabs ni skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras/ /shes rab dri med 'bras bur bshad/ rgyu mthun khu ba'i ro bo yin/ /lces len rnam par smin par gsungs/ /yab yum mnyes par mchod bya ba/ /dbang
162a5(rgyud 'grel): thob pa yi rgyu yin no/ de nas gsum pa bshad bya ste/ /kye'o dpal ldan 'dus sogs las/ /sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i che/ /'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams /sngags dang dus dang rgyal ba las /bslang ste sbas pa'i don bstan pa/ /de lta bu yi gler
162a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhi'o/ /lus kyi ngo bo dgom pa las/ /byang chub sems kyi gnas bcas pa/ /bde ba'i stan yang gnas su bshad/ /dus ni dbang gnyis rdzogs pa dang/ /bla mas gnang dang rig mar ldan/ /de yi slob dpon phyi dang nang/ /phyi yi bla ma'o nang rig ma/ /slob ma dbang
162a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis rdzogs pa dang/ /sgab? pa'i don la yid mos dang/ /nye ba'i snying po zlos pas bya'o/ /gnyis pa gsum pa bzhi pa la/ /glegs bam la sogs bya ba min/ /tshe 'phos pa'ang de bzhin min/ /sems kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog /de la bzung pa
162b1(rgyud 'grel): gnang ba yin/ /rig ma bzung dang sta gon dang/ /sbyang dang sems bskyed byin brlabs dang/ /dbang bskur bla mas bya ba yin/ /lo grangs bcu gnyis bcu brug dang/ /nyi shu nyi shu lnga lon pa/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i bu mo dang/ /srid mo grogs mo ma yin te//
162b2(rgyud 'grel): de sems sbyang ba mchog yin no/ /yang na lha yi lung bstan pa'i/ /zhing skyes ma ni rung ba yin/ /sngags skyes bzlas dang sgom ldan pa'i/ /rnal 'byor ma ni so so med/ /dkyil 'khor lhar bcas sngon dang 'dra/ /sbas pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi po la/ /
162b3(rgyud 'grel): rtsa yi 'dab ma gnas nas su/ /pad+ma'i snang 'dra'i yi ge rnams/ /rgyud las gsungs pa brtag par bya/ /g.yas dang g.yon dang dbu ma yi/ /rtsa gsum mtshan nyid shes bya ste/ /dkyil 'khor sbyor ba mchog yin no/ /me tog bkram pa'i maN+Dal du//
162b4(rgyud 'grel): ga bur la sogs dris byugs te/ /chos gos rgyan chas ldan par bya/ /de la tshogs kyi ston mo dbul/ /chang yang drang ba byas nas ni/ /rang yang mos pa'i lha ru bsgom/ /'khor lo bzhi yang de dang 'dra/ /rdo rje padmo rnam gnyis kyang/ /rgyud las
162b5(rgyud 'grel): byung bci bzhin du/ /bla mas byin brlabs tshul bzhin bya/ /'jug pa'i tshul ni dben pa ru/ /yol bas bar du bcad nas ni/ /'jug par gsol ba gdab par bya/ /de yang bkab nas drab bar bya/ /brtul zhugs sdom pa byin pa dang/ /ye shes
162b6(rgyud 'grel): dbab pa de byas te/ /bud med rnams ni kun la yang/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed de/ /bskor ba lan gsum byas nas ni/ /yid kyi me tog gtor nas kyang/ /mos pas phyag kyang btsal bar bya/ /shes rab spyan dang sangs rgyas spyan/ /phye ste
162b7(rgyud 'grel): mchan dad dpe byad ni/ /mar me'i 'od la bston par bya/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang por bstan/ /de nas sems kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /'khor lo rnam bzhi legs par bstan/ /dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i 'og tu ni/ /dbang gi rim pa brtsam par bya/ /chags pa'i
163a1(rgyud 'grel): glu dang dga' ba'i gar/ /rol pa'i brda rnams mtshon bar bya/ /chags pa'i mtshan nyid phreng pa'i dbang/ /chu 'byung mtshan khrus chu yi dbang/ /bag tsum skra bzung dbu rgyan dbang/ /pad+mar rdor bcug rdo rje'i dbang/ /de gnyis bskyod
163a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dril bu'i dbang/ /dam tshig ha skad ming gi dbang/ /de dag brtan pa sar 'byung ba/ /bltas pas dga' ba rdo rje yi/ /brtul zhugs dbang du de brjod do/ /bgad pa dril bu'i brtul zhugs so/ /'khyud pa dam tshig phyag rgya yin/ /kha phrad pa ni dbugs
163a3(rgyud 'grel): phyung ba/ /ku tsha gnyem lung bstan yin/ /pad+mar btsum byas phyir mi ldog /de yang gsum pa la yang gsum/ /phyi dang nang dang sbas pa'o/ /shes rab ye shes dbang zhes bya/ /rig ma gtang ba'i rim ba ni/ /phyi rol shes rab ye shes yin/ /
163a4(rgyud 'grel): shes rab la brten bde ba yi/ /ye shes skye phyir de skad do/ /shes rab rang sems ye shes las/ /bde ba 'gog pa bde chen po 'am/ /shes rab 'khor lo'i rtsa lam du/ /bde ba'i ye shes 'bab bas na/ /bde ba myong ba nang gi bshad/ /
163a5(rgyud 'grel): dmigs su med pa'i shes rab las/ /skad cig ye shes byung nas ni/ /sems dang lus kyi bde thob pa/ /sbas pa shes rab ye shes so/ /'di la yang ni dbang bzhi tshang/ /lha sbyin brda phrad la sogs pa/ /bum pa'i dbang du 'dod pa yin/ /bad dang
163a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje phrad sogs pa/ /gsum pa gsang ba'i dbang yin no/ /zhu ste bde ba babs pa ni/ /gsum pa yi ni gsum pa yi/ /dga' byed bde byed bzhi par 'dod/ /de ni gsum pa'i rnam grangs yin/ /bskur ba'i gnas ni snying la ste/ /sems kyis
163a7(rgyud 'grel): len par byed pas so/ /bud med sgyu ma la brten te/ /bde de dang po sems kyis myong/ /de 'og lus kyis myong ba yin/ /skal ba med pa'i sems can la/ /rtsa 'gog pas na cha shas myong/ /des mtshon bde ba rnyed pa dang/ /thun dang zhag dang lo yi
163b1(rgyud 'grel): bar/ ji srid bskal ba'i bar du ni/ /sangs rgyas bde chen thob par 'gyur/ /bde gshegs yon tan bsam yas thob/ /thabs kyi dam pa mchog yin no/ /sems kyi sgrib pa kun byang ste/ /thams cad kun mkhyen ye shes ldan/ /sangs rgyas
163b2(rgyud 'grel): sa gnyis nan pa ste/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa zhes zer/ /de dang 'brel pa'i man ngag ni/ /sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ /sems kyi rig pas brtan gyur na/ /bzung 'dzin gnyis kyi lam 'gog pas/ /las kyi mdud pa grol bar 'gyur/ /byang
163b3(rgyud 'grel): chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis/ /bsod nams rlung las bskyod pa na/ /ye shes chen po 'bar byas te/ /bde chen gnas nas zhu nas su/ /'khor lo bzhi la 'bab pa na/ /dga' ba rnam bzhi rim par bskyed/ /til gyi 'bru bzhin bdes gang ba/ /bde ba
163b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i sku zhes bya/ /de yi las kun byed pa ni/ /rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag lnga'i/ /rlung bcu'i rtsol bas byed pa yin/ /de lta'i tshul du bstan pa ni/ /steng gi sgo la brten pa yi/ /man ngag rim pa de la bstan/ /yang na de la brten pa ni/ /dang por
163b5(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi de nyid bslab/ /de nas rlung dang 'dres pa yi/ /sngags kyi de nyid bslab par bya/ /rlung dang sngags ni rab sbyor bas/ /dbugs kyi 'byung 'jug mtshan nyid can/ /rdo rje'i bzlas pa bslab par bya/ /de yi sems kyis dmigs pa dang/ /sgyu ma lta
163b6(rgyud 'grel): bu'i ting 'dzin nas/ /'od gsal ba yi gnas thob nas/ /gnyis med ye shes thob 'gyur ba'i/ /steng gi man ngag bslab par bya/ /'og gi sgo la brten pa ni/ /rdo rje pad+mar sbyor ba las/ /bskyod pa'i rlung gis drod bskul bas/ /sra ma ka ni bde bskyod de/ /
163b7(rgyud 'grel): shukra su ka'i rang bzhin can/ /'khor lo bzhi la brgyud nas kyang/ /bde bskyod gnas su sbrul 'khyud de/ /gsang ba'i padmor ma spros par/ /til 'bru lta bur gang ba ni/ /bde ba ji srid bskal pa'i bar/ /rab tu dga' ba'i bde bas myong/ /ye shes chen pos gnas pa'i
164a1(rgyud 'grel): tshe/ sangs rgyas sems can thams cad dang/ /mtshan mar btags pa thams cad kun/ /bde chen nyid las gzhan ma yin/ /bde chen nyid las gzhan pa'i chos/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyis ma brnyes ?/ rang sems las su rung ba'i rtags//
164a2(rgyud 'grel): byi yi yul la snang ba ni/ /dang por smig rgyu lta bu dang/ /gnyis pa ? ba lta bu dang/ /gsum pa glog gi rnam pa dang/ /bzhi pa mar me lta bu dang/ /lnga pa nam mkha' dra ba'o/ /rlung dang rtsa dang 'khor lo dang/ /skad cig dga' bzhi'i rnam pa kun/ /ngag
164a3(rgyud 'grel): brda ji ltar grags pas brjod/ /sbom po phra mo mnyam sbyar ba/ /dbang gsum thob pa'i lag brda yin/ /gsum pa yi ni rdzas dag ni/ /rang dang rig tu bcas pa yi/ /dri chen chu dang rak+ta dang/ /ga bur mang sai? shes sogs rdzas/ /'jigs pa med par
164a4(rgyud 'grel): bza' bar bya/ /bud med rnams ni spyad bar bya/ /de yi ? chugs lta sgra ni mnyan/ /dri dag kyang ni bsnam par bya/ /gsang ba'i pad+mar tsum pa bya/ /glang po'i lag pas g.yan pa blang/ /dung gi phur pas gdab pa dang/ /'da' 'da' ya bcu bzung
164a5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /mdor ? la snang ba'i rdzas/ /de kun dgongs pa bstan pa yang/ /sprul pa chos dang longs spyod dang/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo bzhi/ /mgrin dang gsang ba'i 'khor lo gnyis/ /sbas pa yin te rnam pa dug /lte ba snying ? dang ni/ /spyi bo dag

164b1(rgyud 'grel): spyod shes rab la/ /chos dang bde chen thabs su bshad/ /kA li thabs la A li ni/ /shes rab de phyir 'khor lo bzhi/ /shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba dang/ /thabs la thabs kyi sbyor ba dang/ /shes rab shes rab sbyor ba dang/ /thabs la shes rab

164b3(rgyud 'grel): sems su bshad/ /gsang ba bde skyong sbabs su ni/ /sangs rgyas rin chen gab rtse la/ /dbus su mi shigs yi ge ha/ /re'u mig lnga bcu'i yi ge ni/ /kA li rnams la A lis bskor/ /'byung bzhi'i yi ge grwa na gnas/ /bde bskyed pa yi yi ger

164b5(rgyud 'grel): phrag g.yas phyung nas/ /bde chen 'khor lor phyin nas bzhu/ /bdud rtsi 'grog ste sngar lam du/ /longs spyod chos dang sprul pa yi/ /'og rnams la brtan yig rnams gsos/ /spu yi nyag mkhri yi che/ /lte ba'i dbus nas 'gro dang 'ong/ /mgrin
164b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'khor lor song nas su/ /lha rnams kun gyi sems bzhu nas/ /bde skyod gnas su phyin pa dang/ /A li kA li la thim ste/ /kA li 'byung ba'i yi ge la/ /'byung ba lha la thim pa dang/ /ma spros bar du bde chen sku/ /pad+mar spros nas longs spyod
164b7(rgyud 'grel): sku/ phyogs bcur spros pas sprul sku yin/ /slar 'dus chos kyi sku ru gsal/ /de ni gsum pa'i dgongs pa'i don/ /nus pa'i tshad kyang de bzhin te/ /des ni sems kyi dri ma 'khyu?/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sgrib bdag/ phyag rgya bstan pa'i las dang ni/ /bde skyed 
165a1(rgyud 'grel): thob par nus pa yin/ /'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin pa ste/ /rang gi rig pas rig pa 'dzin/ /bde chen nyon mongs bdud bcom ste/ /longs spyod gnas su phung po'i bdud/ /d+harma tsakrar lha bdud bcom/ /sprul par 'chi bdag
165a2(rgyud 'grel): bdud bcom ste/ /dga' bzhis bdud bzhi rnam par 'joms/ /dam tshig 'khor lor phung po 'joms/ /pad+mar rdor bcug nyon mongs 'joms/ /rdo rje pang bskyod lha bdud 'joms/ /bde ba 'babs pas 'che bdag 'joms/ /bde chen rnam

165a5(rgyud 'grel): yang/ 'bras bu dga' ba bzhi skyed byed/ /lha sbyin brda phrad bum pa'i dbang/ /de yi 'bras bu dga' ba bskyed/ /bag tsum skra bzung dbu rgyan dbang/ /de yi 'bras bu rab dga' skyed/ /pad+mar rdor bcug rdo rje'i dbang/ /de yi 'bras bu

165a7(rgyud 'grel): pas na/ /shes rab ye shes dbang zhes grags/ /rim pa tha ma bshad bya ste/ /kye 'o dpal ldan 'dus sogs par/ /'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /gsang ba'i yi ge mthong ba yi/ /skal pa bdag gcig med ces dus/ /ston pas
165b1(rgyud 'grel): yi ge rnam dag ces/ /yi ge las dben mtshan nyid gsungs/ /bzhi pa'i gleng bzhir shes par bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes ni/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs la gnas/ /chos kun sems la gnas bcas te/ /sems ni ye nas
165b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag bde phyir chos kun rnam par dag /de ni gnas gyi bla mar gsungs/ /dus gsum gcig ste/ byang med cing/ /gang du dus gsum dbyer med pa/ /de ni blang dor med pa'i dus/ /mchog ni bla mod? de rang gsungs/ /slob dpon ma mthong sems nyid
165b3(rgyud 'grel): mthong/ /rang sems bla mar snang ba'i phyir/ /kun gyi slob dpon skal pa bzang/ /gnyis med slob dpon dam pa'o/ /'gro kun dbyings las skyes pas na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i spun yin te/ /bsam gyis mi khyab yul slob pa/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyi dam
165b4(rgyud 'grel): par bshad/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems/ /bla na med par thugs chud pa/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes gang/ /de ni dkyil 'khor snying por gsungs/ /'di yi gzhung thos mig phye ba/ /dkyil 'khor mthong ba don rtogs yin/ /rtogs nas goms
165b5(rgyud 'grel): byed 'jug pa ste/ /mngon du gyur pa dngos grub yin/ /gnyis med ye shes dbang 'gyur bas/ /mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba la/ /ji ltar 'dod par dbang sgyur pas/ /rig pa rang dbang mchog tu bshad/ /'di dbang thob pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ /bsgyur ba'i dbang
165b6(rgyud 'grel): ? thogs pa med/ /ji snyed theg pa rab 'byams gyis/ /dbang bskur rnam grangs ji snyed kun/ /gsang ba'i dbang du gsungs pa ste/ /yang dag pa yi grangs las 'das/ /mnyam pa ye shes chen po nyid/ /gcig dang du ma las grol phyir/ /gnas dang gnas
165b7(rgyud 'grel): ? dmigs dbye med/ /sgo gsum dbye ba du la tsam med/ /gnyis med ye shes chen po las/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba mi 'gog phyir/ /thabs dang thabs byung thabs bsam yas/ /thabs kyi nang na mchog tu gsungs/ /rang rig ye shes rgyal ba nyid/ /khams gsum
166a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba nyid yin phyir/ /'di la sgrib dang mi sgrib ces/ /mnyam pa'i rgyal pos yongs ma gsungs/ /sgrib pa nyid ni byang chub la/ /'khor ba nyid ni mya ngan 'das/ /dbye ba med pa'i sa mchog gis/ /sa yi khyad
