187b3(rgyud 'grel): tshags? pa 'di las gzhan du 'gal ba'i rang bzhin du snang ba 'di de nyid dang bcas pa bde ba chen por bla ma'i man ngag gis yang dang yang du mched pa brtsams zhing goms par bya'i zhes pa ni grub pa'i mdza' o/ /de la shes rab kyi
187b4(rgyud 'grel): yan lag dang yang dag par 'dus pa na/ lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba chen po la bstan par byas pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de shes rab kyi yan lag tu gnas pa'i phyir na/ de ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo zhes bshad do/ /yang gang zhig
187b5(rgyud 'grel): bstan par byas pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba chen po mnyam par bzhag pa'i yid kyis ji ltar nus par yan lag thams cad la so sor khyab par bzhog ste/ rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang de'i ngo bor byed pa de ni shes rab ye shes ltar
187b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med cing brjod pa las 'das pa bde ba chen po tsam du snang ba 'dis na 'di yang sems kyi dbang bskur ba nyi dang/ /bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no zhes pa 'di yis ston cing rig par byed zhes par sems so/ /'di ltar blta bar bya ba gang yin pa
187b7(rgyud 'grel): de ni bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor du blta bar bya ba gang yin pa'i dam tshig ste/ 'di ji lta ba bzhin bsgom par bya ba yin no/ /de thams cad ni sgrub pa'i thabs dang bcas par kye'i rdo rje las gsungs pa bzhin du bdag gi bla ma
188a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog gis gsal por bkod cing gsungs pas 'dir ni rgyas par mi byed do/ /'di thams cad ni shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i bla mas slob ma la shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i dus kyi gnas skabs
188a2(rgyud 'grel): na de lta bur brda des rab tu yang dag par dmigs te/ de skad du ye shes chen po phra mo ni zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsungs pas/ de kho na nyid du rab tu rtogs par bya ba yin no zhes par dgongs so/ /shes rab ye shes dbang bskur
188a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ mtshon bya mtshon byed dbye ba ni/ /gsum brjod nges par 'di rtogs la/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis rigs pa zung/ /dpal ldan 'dus par yongs gsal ba/ /de snyed gnas pa 'di rnams ni/ /de nyid phyag rgya'i rjes 'brang phyir/ /rgyud
188a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du yang rjes 'brangs pa'o/ /dpal ldan 'dus dang kye'i rdo rjer/ /bzhi pa phye bar brjod pa dang/ /de bzhin 'dir ni dbang bskur nyid/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis rigs pas long/ /rgyud gnyis po yi rjes 'brangs nas/ /rgyud kyi dam
188a5(rgyud 'grel): tshig di yis kyang/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma rgyud du/ /gsungs pa thams cad shes par bya'o/ /bzhi pa'i dbye ba gang yin pa/ /lung dang rigs pa phyi rol rnams/ /rgya ches pa yis bdag 'jigs nas/ /de ? gzhan ste 'dod ma bris/
188a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas rnams de dang de rnams la/ /mkhas pas der ni rab bltas nas/ /lung dang rigs pa ldan pa yis/ /de la sun ni dbyung par bya'o/ /de nyid 'dir ni mngon par brjod pa dang/ dbang bskur mchog gi bsod nams gang thob pa//
188a7(rgyud 'grel): de yis rgyal ba bzang po dpal sbas dang/ /'gro 'di ma lus rgyal ba nyid gyur cig /mkhas pa du ma'i dbang bskur nges brjod 'di/ /skye bo dbang bskur phyin ci log zhen pa/ /de bzlog don du bdag gis 'di bsgrub pa'i/ /dge bas de dag?
188b1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag dbang thob shog /dbang gi don nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon rgyal ba bzang po dpal sbas pa zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //ra lag rgyad gi gtsug lag khang du rgyu gar gyi mkhan po a
188b2(rgyud 'grel): ba d+hU tI pa'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod gyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya brtson 'grus kyis bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // */ /rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung pa bsdus pa dang/ ltung pa sbom po dang/ rdo rje theg pa'i ltung ba'i snye ma
188b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba dang da yang spom po'i ltung ba brgyad dang bcas pa bzhugs/ / */ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra yA na mU la pa ti saM gra ha/ bod skad du/ rdo rje theg la rtse ba'i ltung ba bsdus pa/ thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun dang
188b4(rgyud 'grel): bla ma yi/ /zhabs kyi pad+mar rab btud/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi ni/ /rgyud las gsungs pa bshad par bya/ /gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /dngos grub slob dpon rjes 'brang gsungs/ /de bas de la bsnyad pa ni/ /rtsa ba'i ltung pa dang por
188b5(rgyud 'grel): bshad/ /bde gshegs bka' las 'das pa ni/ /ltung ba gnyis pa yin par gsungs/ /khros bas rdo rje spun gyi ni/ /nyes pa brjod pa gsum pa yin/ /sems can rnams la byams pa spong/ /bzhi pa yin par rgyal pas gsungs su?//
188b6(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi rtsa ba byang chub sems/ /de spong ba ni lnga pa yin/ /rang dam gzhan gyi grub pa'i mdza' / /chos la smod pa drug pa yin/ /yongs su ma smin sems can la/ /gsang ba sgrog pa bdun pa yin/ /phung po sangs rgyas lnga bdag nyid/ /smod par
188b7(rgyud 'grel): byed pa brgyad pa yin/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i chos rnams la/ /som nyi za ba dgu ba yin/ /gdug la rtag tu byams ldan pa/ /byed pa de ni bcu bar 'dod/ /chad sogs ma yin chos? rnams la/ /brtags pa las ni bcu gcig pa/ /sems can dang
189a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa yi/ /sems sun 'byin pa bcu gnyis pa/ /dam tshig ji bzhin rnyed pa dang /mi bsten pa de bcu gsum pa/ /shes rab rang bzhin bud med la/ /smod par byed pa bcu bzhi pa/ /'di dag rnam par spangs
189a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /sngags pas dngos grub nye bar 'thob/ /gzhan du dam tshig las nyams na/ /nyams pas bdud kyi bzung 'gyur te/ /de nas sdug bsngal myong 'gyur zhing/ /thur du bltas te dmyal bar 'gro/ /de bas nga rgyal bcom nas ni/ /rang
189a3(rgyud 'grel): gi 'khrul pa shes byas la/ /ci 'byor pa yis bla ma la/ /thub pa'i spyan sngar mchod byas nas/ /gsum la skyabs 'gro nas brtsams te/ /byang chub sems sogs sdom bdag /gal te bdag la phan 'dod na/ /sngags pas 'bad de
189a4(rgyud 'grel): blang bar bya/ /rdo rje theg? pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba bsdus pa slob dpon chen po rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ s+thU la pat ti/ bod skad du/ ltung ba sbom po/ thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/
189a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dang bla ma yin/ /zhabs kyi pad+mar rab bdud de/ /rnal 'byor sdom par gang gsungs pa'i/ /ltung ba sgom po bshad par bya/ /rnal 'byor gang zhig rig ma ni/ /dam tshig med pa'ang stobs kyis spyod/ /de la 'phya bar byed pa yang//
189a6(rgyud 'grel): de yi ltung ba dang por gsungs/ /rgyud las me gsungs rim nyid kyis/ /gang zhig bdud rtsi bsten pa yang/ /de la ngan 'gror ltung ba yi/ /ltung ba gnyis par 'gyur ba yin/ /rmongs pa gang zhig tshogs 'khor lo/ /rtsod par sangs rgyas kyis gsungs
189a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /dam tshig la ni ? gang byed/ /de la gsum par 'gyur ba yin/ /gsang pa'i chos ni gang gsungs pa/ /blo ngan gsang bar mi byed na/ /rmongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa de la/ /sbom po'i ltung ba bzhi par 'gyur/ /dad ldan chos la 'dri ba
189b1(rgyud 'grel): na/ chos nyid gzhan du ston pa ni/ /de la sbom por bshad pa yi/ /ltung ba lnga par rgyal bas gsungs/ /nyan thos theg pa can dag dang/ /zhag bdun du ni lhan cig gnas/ /sbom por grags pa de la ni/ /drug pa rab tu 'gyur ba yid/ /yang dag de nyid
189b2(rgyud 'grel): nga rgyal byed/ /gang zhig de nyid nga rgyal byed/ /rmongs pa'i sems ldan de la ni/ /sgom po zhes bya bdun pa yin/ /gang zhig snod min sems can la /phyi yis chos mos de la yang/ /gsang pa'i chos ni yang dag ston/ /de la sbom po brgyad par 'gyur/
189b3(rgyud 'grel): blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /'di dag spang bar bya ba ste/ /gal te byung na cho ga bzhin no/ /bshags na dmyal bar mi 'gro'o/ /thabs ni 'di dag nyid kyis ni/ /bsnyen par bshags par mi byed na/ /bla mas slob min de bzhin du/ /rdo rje'i
189b4(rgyud 'grel): spun gyi tshogs kyis kyang/ /ltung ba bsdus pa byas pa las/ /bdag gis bsod nams gang thob pa/ /'gro kun ltung bas mi gos shing/ /dam tshig snod du 'gyur bar shog /ltung ba sbom por bsdus pa/ /slob dpon rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa
189b5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// // */ /rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa'i ltung ba'i mtshan nyid gzhan bshad pa yang brjod par bya ste/ rang lha blang dor ltung ba mig /de nyid dus 'das ri bong can/ /lha gzhan dga' ba yon tan no/ /rig byed dngos la
189b6(rgyud 'grel): zhen pa yin/ /ma rdzogs rdzogs byed mnga' yin no/ /'jig rten chos phyir dbang po yin/ /khyad du gsod pa yang ni ri/ /gong med tshul ston bkra shis so/ / phrin las ma rdzogs gza' zhes grags/ /don med gnas pa phyogs yin no/ /brtse ba gtong ba ?
189b7(rgyud 'grel): po ste/ /dman pa'i spyod pa nyi ma'o/ /zang zing rtogs pa yan lag go /yongs su mi 'dzin sa zhes grags/ /rang spyod 'dor pa chos zhes grags/ /ltung ba bco lnga pa rdzogs so// //bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dam pa nyer bsten cig
190a1(rgyud 'grel): shos min/ /snod dang ldan pa rnam par brtag /'dod phyir gzhan la gnod pa spong/ /dkon mchog la sogs nor la min/ /gzhan don skad cig yal mi dor/ /byang chub min par dge mi 'jug /rnam shes 'pho
190a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i de nyid mkhas/ /gzhan du yan lag nyes pa'o/ /yan lag gi nyes pa bdun pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra yA na s+thU la pa ti/ bod skad du/ rdo rje theg pa'i sbom po'i ltung pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 
190a3(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma'i zhabs kyi pad+ma la/ /kun nas dang bas phyag 'tshal te/ /sbom po'i ltung ba rnam pa brgyad/ /rgyud du gsungs pa bri bar bya/ /shes rab stobs kyis len pa dang/ /de yi bdud rtsi stobs kyis len/ /snod min la ni
190a4(rgyud 'grel): mi gsang dang/ /tshogs kyi nang du brtsod pa dang/ /dang ldan pa gzhan chos ston dang/ /nyan thos nang du zhag bdun gnas/ /brdzun gyis rnal 'byor nga rgyal byed/ /dad pa med la chos ston pa/ /'di rnams sbom po'i ltung ba brgyad/ /rtsa ltung sbom
190a5(rgyud 'grel): po'i rim pa dag /cho ga yis ni shes bya zhing/ /nyams par gyur na bshags par bya/ /rdo rje theg pa'i sbom po'i ltung ba/ /slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma ka ra ba rma? dang/
190a6(rgyud 'grel): zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /slad kyis/ rgya gar gyi mkhan pa bla ma rje btsun paN+Ti ta chen po ma Ni ka sh+rI dz+nyA na'i zhal ? nas dang/ chag lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong chos rje dpal gyis
190a7(rgyud 'grel): zhus te ngag bar bgyis so// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra lA na mU lang? ti/ bod skad du/ rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun nas dang bas bla ma yi/ /zhabs gyi pad+ma la btud de//
190b1(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi ni/ /rgyud las gsungs pa bshad par bya/ /gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /dngos grub slob dpon rjes 'brangs gsungs/ /de bas de la brnyas pa ni/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba dang por bshad/ /bde gshegs bka' las
190b2(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa ni/ /ltung ba gnyis pa yin par bshad/ /rdo rje spun la khros pas ni/ /nyes pa brjod pa gsum pa yin/ /sems can rnams la byams pa spong/ /bzhi pa yin par rgyal bar gsungs/ /chos kyi rtsa ba byang chub sems/ /de spong ba ni
190b3(rgyud 'grel): lnga ba yin/ /rang ngam? gzhan gyi grub pa'i mdza' / /chos la smod pa drug pa yin/ /yongs su ma smin sems can la/ /gsang ba sgrog pa bdun pa yin/ /phung po sangs rgyas lnga bdag nyid/ /de la smod byed brgyad pa yin/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i chos
190b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams la/ /som nyid za ba dgu pa yin/ /gdug la brtag tu byams ldan par/ /byed pa de ni bcu par 'dod/ /ming sogs bral ba'i chos rnams la/ /der rtog pa ni bcu gcig pa/ /sems can dad dang ldan pa yi/ /sems sun 'byin pa bcu
190b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa/ /dam tshig las ni ji bzhin rnye/ /mi brten pa de bcu gsum pa/ /shes rab rang bzhin bud med la/ /smad par byed pa bcu bzhi pa/ /sngags pas 'di dag spangs na ni/ /dngos grub nges par 'thob par 'gyur/ /gzhan du dam tshig las
190b6(rgyud 'grel): nyams na/ /nyams pas bdud kyis bzung bar 'gyur/ /de nas sdug bsngal myong 'gyur zhing/ /thur du bltas te dmyal bar 'gro /de bas nga rgyal bcom nas ni/ /bdag nyid ma 'khrul shes par bya/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bla ma la/ /ci 'byor pa
190b7(rgyud 'grel): yis mchod par bya/ /gsum la skyabs su 'gro nas brtsams te/ /byang chub sems sogs sdom pa ni/ /gal te bdag la phan 'dod na/ /sngags pas 'bad de bzung bar bya/ /rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba rdzogs so// //
191a1(rgyud 'grel): yan lag dam tshig ces bya ba/ /dam tshig dang ni mi ldan pa'i/ /rig ma bsten par dga' ba dang/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lor brtsod pa dang/ /gsang ba'i chos ni ston pa dang/ /sems can dad dang ldan pa la/ /
191a2(rgyud 'grel): dam chos gzhan du ston pa dang/ /nyan thos ngag tu rlom byed pa'i/ /nang du zhag bdun gnas pa dang/ /sbyor ba nges par ma byas par/ /skal min gsang ba ston pa dang/ /gang zhig phyag rgya mi mkhas la /lus kyi phyag rgya ston pa dang//
191a3(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen sogs dag par ma byas par/ /dkyil 'khor las la 'jug pa dang/ /sdom pa gnyis kyi bcas pa la/ /dgos pa med par 'da' ba ni/ /kha na ma tho bcas 'gyur te/ /sngags pa de yi dam tshig zad/ /zad pas 'grub par mi
191a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur zhing/ /bdud dang sdug bsngal mang du 'phel/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /nyin re zhing ni bzla bar bya/ /yan lag gi dam tshig ces bya brdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra yA na pat+ti many+dza ri nA ma/ bod
191a5(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ rdo rje theg pa'i ltung ba'i snye ma zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i sdom pa 'dzin pa la/ /ltung ba'i sde mtshan rnam pa gnyis te/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba bshad pa dang/
191a6(rgyud 'grel): sgom pa'i ltung bar bshad pa'o/ /de la bla ma la ma gus pa dang / bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' las 'das pa dang / zhe sngar gis rdo rje spun la skyon 'bru ba dang / byams pa gtong ba dang/ byang chub kyi sems gtong ba dang /
191a7(rgyud 'grel): theg pa gsum la smod pa dang/ yongs su ma smin pa la gsang ba sgrogs pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid phung po lnga la smod pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin med par rnam par dag pa la the tshom za ba dang/ gdugs pa
191b1(rgyud 'grel): la byams pa dad ldan pa dang/ thog ma dang/ tha ma dang/ dbus kyi chos thams cad stong pa la thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus su rtog pa dang/ dang ldan gyi sems sun 'byin pa dang/ ji ltar rnyed pa'i dam tshig mi bsten pa dang/ bud med la smod pa
191b2(rgyud 'grel): ste rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi'o/ /de la stobs kyi rnal 'byor ma len pa dang/ stobs kyis de'i byang chub kyi sems len pa dang/ gsang ba mi sbed pa dang/ dam tshig la brtsod pa dang/ dad pa dang ldan pa la phyin ci log gi chos ston pa dang/
191b3(rgyud 'grel): nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang lhan cig zhag bdun du gnas pa dang /rnal 'byor mi shes par rnal 'byor par mngon pa'i nga rgyal byed pa dang/ mi dad pa la chos ston pa ste/ sbom po'i ltung ba brgyad do/ //
191b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' i bslab pa la gnas pas rnam pa thams cad du yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /rdo rje theg pa'i ltung ba'i snye ma zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po a b+hyA ka ra guptas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //ma ga d+ha'i
191b5(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pa chen po de nyid dang / mang du thos pa'i dge slong bsod snyoms pa sangs rgyas grags pas/ na len+d+rar bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra A na mU la bat+ti prit+ti/
191b6(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi pa'i 'grel pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyan thos kyi lus dag gtso bor gyur pa'i spang bya bdun gyi mtshan nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' i snying rje gtso
191b7(rgyud 'grel): bor gyur pa'i spang bya bcu'i mtshan nyid dang/ gsang sngags rnal 'byor chen po'i thabs dang shes rab zung du 'jug pa gtso bor gyur pa'i spang bya bcu bzhi'i mtshan nyid de/ de la gnyis ni gzhung gzhan rnams las gsal bas 'dir ma bshad do//
192a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags rnal 'byor chen po'i rnam par thar pa la bltos te bstan pa la/ /spyir thob par bya ba dang /mngon par rtogs pa'i bye brag dang/ bsrung pa'i tshul lo/ /de la gnyis ni rtsa ba'i rgyud dang/ bshad
192a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyud ngag las gsal bas 'dir logs shig du ma brjod do/ /bsrung ba'i tshul la gnyis te/ dam tshig dang sdom pa'o/ /de nyid ni dam bca' ba'i yul dang/ spong pa'i bye brag gis te/ 'di skad du/ sdom pa sangs rgyas thams
192a3(rgyud 'grel): cad de/ e waM la ni rab tu bzhugs/ /rgyu yis yul las mi 'da' bas/ /dam tshig ces ni bshad pa yin zhes gsungs so/ /de bas na dbang bzhi'i bya brag gis dam tshig kyang bzhi ste/ sgra ji bzhin pa dang sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pa
192a4(rgyud 'grel): dung dgongs pa can dang/ mthar thug pa'i bye brag gis so/ /de dag kyang mdor bsdu na rigs kyi dam tshig dang / rtsa ba dang/ knyes pa spom po'o/ /rigs kyi la gnyis te / spyi dang/ khyad par ro/ /rtsa ba la gsum ste/ dbang gsum
192a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi dbye bas so/ /sbom po la gsum ste/ lus la sogs pa'i bye brag gis so de la sdom pa'i tshul khrims la sogs pa'i sdom pa gsum la gnas na sangs rgyas nyid dam rdo rje 'chang chen po 'thob bo zhes 'byung la/ de yang rdo rje
192a6(rgyud 'grel): rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa'i skabs nas ji skad du/ byang chub sems 'dzin gyur nas ni/ /lta gzhan la ni mi mos pas/ /dkon mchog gsum la dang pa dang/ /de la gzhol zhing 'bab pa yis/ /gsod dang rkun dang 'khrig pa dang/ /
192a7(rgyud 'grel): brdzun dang chang ni rnam par spang/ /khyim? pa'i tshul du gnas pas kyang/ /rig sngags rgyal po rtag tu bsgrub/ /gal te der ni rab byung na/ /sdom pa gsum la gnas par 'gyur/ /so sor thar dang byang chub sems/ /rig 'dzin rang gi
192b1(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa'o zhes gsungs pas/ /de'i don la 'jug par bya ste / 'dir de dag dang mi 'gal ba ni ye shes kyi bye brag gis te/ rang bzhin pa'i chos bzhi mi spyad cing/ /bcas pa la de bzhin nyid kyi can gyis shes pas spyod cing/ /don chen
192b2(rgyud 'grel): po yod pa'i phyir dang/ /shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa la ni dngos po la 'gal ba med pas nyes byas la sogs par mi bzhag go /de ltar rtsa ba'i dam tshig bstan pa la spyir btang ba ni gang la gnod pa dang/ gang gi bar du gcod pa
192b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ gang dri ma can du byas pa ste dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum dang / dngos grub gnyis dang/ rang gi rgyud dang / go rim bzhin no/ /de la dngos bzhi ni gnyi ga'i bar du gcod cing ngan song gsum du ltung bar byed do/ /? ni gnyi
192b4(rgyud 'grel): ga'i bar du gcod cing ngan song gsum du ltung yang / sdug bsngal drag po la sogs pa ma yin pa dang / 'bring gis ni gnyi ga'i bar du gcod kyang ngan song du ltur ba'i rgyu de khyad par du mi byed pa dang/ chung dus ni 'jig rten pa'i
192b5(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub kyi bar du gcod do/ /yang sbyir 'gro ba ni nyon mongs pa drug pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang 'brel pa'o/ /yang gnyis te/ lhan cig skyes pa dang/ kun tu brtags pa'o/ /yang bdun te/ sbyor ba dang/ dngos bzhi dang/
192b6(rgyud 'grel): nyes byas dang/ nyes pa med pa dang/ phyogs dang mthun pa dang / bslab par bya ba dang / dri ma las ldang pa'o/ /ldang pa la bdun te / dbang dang / tshogs dang/ bsnyen bsgrub dang / tshogs pa'i mthu dang / bzlas pa dang/
192b7(rgyud 'grel): sems sun 'byin pa dang/ tha mal ba la bshags pa'o/ /da ni gzhud la 'jug par bya ste / slob dpon la ni brnyas pa dang zhes smos pa la gang las dbang bskur mchog thob pa med pa dang / slob dpon gyis de nyid bstan pa dang
193a1(rgyud 'grel): der 'du shes pa dang/ /nyon mongs pa dang 'brel pa'i sems dang/ lus ngag yid kyi sbyor ba byas pa dang/ go pa 'am khyad par can gyis nyon mongs bskyed pa dang/ rang bzhin du gnas pa dang/ dbang
193a2(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa dang/ rmi lam yin pa dang / yan lag brgyad kyis ni dngos bzhi yin la/ sbyor ba ni ji srid ma rdzogs pa de srid do/ /gzhan mched? ba la yan lag gtso bo yod pa ni nyes pa chen pa'i/ /'bring dang chung du yod pa la ni nyes pa 'bring
193a3(rgyud 'grel): dang chung du'o/ /gsum po lta bu'i gnas skabs su ni nyes pa med do/ /gnyis dang shan 'dra ba ni phyogs dang mthun pa'o/ /slob dpon thams cad la rdo rje sems dpar blta'o/ /zhes pa ni bslab par bya pa'o/ /rtsa ba ni dbang gis ldang ngo/ /tshogs dang
193a4(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen bsgrub ma gtogs pa bzhis ni 'dra ba las ldang ngo/ /gong ma gnyis kyis ni 'bring las ldang ngo/ /tha ma gnyis kyis ni chung du las ldang ngo/ /de bzhin du gzhan rnams la yang ci rigs par shes par bya'o/ /bde gshegs bka' las 'das
193a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang zhes smos pa las/ 'dir ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' dang/ rdo rje 'chang gi bka' thams cad kyang gdul bya'i ched du yin la/ de yang 'gro ba'i don tu ste/ de bas na gang zag bdag grol ba'i dbang du byas pas thams cad kyang der
193a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dus so/ /rdo rje 'chang gi bka' yang bzhi ste/ las kyi bye brag thams cad bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' dang/ bsrung bar bya ba dang/ bsgrub pa'i thabs dang/ 'bras bu'o/ /de las 'das pa ni gnyis te/ log par spyod pa dang/ log par ston
193a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de dag kyang dgag sgrub kyi bye brag gis rnam pa bzhi'o/ /de la yan lag ni thun mong ba gsum dang/ nyon mongs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang/ yul khyad par can dang/ der 'du shes pa dang/ log par spyod pa'i sbyor ba byas pa dang/ nges pa
193b1(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa ste brgyad kyis dngos bzhi'o/ /ston pa'i phyogs la tha ma'i gor go bar gyur pa gzhug go /ldang ba ni tshogs pa'i mthu man chad bzhis dngos gzhi las ldang ngo/ /shes rab gsum dang/ nyon mongs pa'i sems dang/ yul de gong ma lta bu
193b2(rgyud 'grel): yin pa dang/ der 'du shes pa dang sbyor ba byas pa dang/ go ba'am nyon mongs pa khyad par can bskyed pa dang/ dgongs pa ma yin pa ste dgus dngos gzhir 'gyur ro/ /de ni tshogs kyi 'khor los ldang ngo/ /gzhan ni snga ma bzhin no/ /chom kun gyi
193b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas kyi grogs stobs can lta bur rdo rje spun kun la lta'o/ /zhes pa ni bslab par bya ba'o/ /byams pa chen po spong ba dang zhes pa la sems can shin tu sdug bsngal dang ldan pa la btang snyoms dang ldan pa dang/ /der 'du shes pa dang/ bgrod du rung
193b4(rgyud 'grel): ba na yod par mthong pa 'am ma thos pa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i sems dang/ /thun mongs pa gsum dang/ bdag la mthu yod pa dang/ dgongs pa ma yin pa dang/ bde ba'i sbyor ba 'dor ba ste bcus dngos gzhir 'gyur ro/ /tshogs pa'i mthu
193b5(rgyud 'grel): man chad bzhis de las ldang ngo/ /sems can thams cad la pha ma la sogs pa dang/ bdag nyid kyi bar du 'du shes bskyed par bya'o zhes pa ni bslab par bya ba'o/ /byang chub sems ni 'dor ba dang zhes pa ni dngos por 'dzin pa dang zhen pa ste/
193b6(rgyud 'grel): spong ba'i gdams ngag mi tshol ba dang/ gnyen po mi bsten pa dang/ yang dang yang du 'dor ba dang/ de'i dbang gi nyes pa la sbyor ba'o/ /yan lag gi grangs ni snga ma bzhin no/ /bde ba'i sbyor ba dor ba zhes pa ni/ sdug bsngal dang bral ba'i spyod
193b7(rgyud 'grel): pa 'dor ba zhes bzhag /ldang ba ni snga ma bzhin no/ /ma rgal ba bsgral bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bslab par bya ba'o/ /lha'i bdag nyid phung po smod zhes pa ni/ ltar mi sgom pa dang/ 'bral bar 'dod pa dang/ de las gzhan du bsgom
194a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /yan lag ni thun mong ba bzhi dang / yul de dang de lta bu yin pa dang/ der 'du shes pa dang/ gong ma gsum gang yang rung ba ste/ bdun gyis dngos bzhi'o/ /ldang ba ni bsnyen grub kyis so/ /lus la
194a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs pa bsam par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni bslab par bya ba'o/ /theg pa gsum la smod pa dang zhes bya ba dang/ gnyi ga dang /rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dang /gsang ba'i theg pa gsum po rnal 'byor ma dang/ thabs dang zung
194a3(rgyud 'grel): du 'jug pa'o/ /smod pa ni gzhung bzhin ma smos pa'o/ /thun mong bzhi dang / yul khyad par can dang/ der 'du shes pa dang/ mi mthun pa'i sbyor ba byas pa dang/ yang dag pa'i sbyor ba log pa ste brgyad kyis dngos gzhi'o/ /tshogs pa'i mthu man
194a4(rgyud 'grel): chad bzhis ldang ngo/ /med na mi 'byung 'byung ba'i lam gsum du shes par bya'o/ /zhes pa ni bslab par bya'o/ /yang dag chos la yid gnyis za zhes pa la bsrung pa dang/ sgrub pa dang/ thob pa don dam pa'i rang bzhin la yid gnyis za ba ste/
194a5(rgyud 'grel): thun mongs pa bzhi dang/ don dam pa dag pa dang 'brel ba dang /der 'du shes pa dang/ med dam snyam pa'i blo gnyis dang / 'di lam dad pa dang gtang snyoms su dor ba ste dgus dngos gzhi'o/ /ldang ba ni snga ma bzhin no/ /chos thams cad la tshul
194a6(rgyud 'grel): gcig kho nas shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni slab par bya ba'o/ /chos la gnyis su 'byed pa zhes pa ni chos rnal 'byor chen po la sogs pa'i grub pa'i mdza' las grags pa'i skyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i cha shin tu phra ba phyi rol pa'i grub pa'i mthar 'chad
194a7(rgyud 'grel): cing 'dzin pa 'am/ sangs rgyas pa'i grub pa'i mdza' la bzang ngan 'byed pa 'am ston pa ste/ thun mong pa bzhi dang/ yul khyad par can dang /der 'du shes pa dang/ mi mthun pa'i sbyor ba byas pa dang/ gzhan gyis go ba dang/ dgongs pa ma yin pa ste
194b1(rgyud 'grel): dgus dngos gzhir 'gyur ro/ /tshogs pa'i mthu man chad bzhis ldang ngo/ /lam la bye brag med par bslab par bya zhing bden par smra bar bya ba'o/ /gdug la byams dang chags bral dang zhes pa la/ 'dir sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'jig par byed pa dang
194b2(rgyud 'grel): sun 'byin pa ste/ stobs dang ldan pa dang/ bcos bcom pa'o/ /de dag chos dang zang zing gi 'brel pa dang bral bar bya ba ste/ gi? las gzhan du byed pa ni nyes pa'o/ /thun mong pa bzhi dang/ yul khyad par can dang de ltar 'du shes pa dang/ sbyor ba byas
194b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ dgongs pa ma yin pa dang/ gzhan gyis go ba ste dgus dngos gzhi'o/ /ldang ba ni snga ma bzhin no/ /rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa / 'bad pas bsad par bya ba yin zhes pa ni bslab par bya pa'o//
194b4(rgyud 'grel): chags bral ba ni snying rje dang bral ba'o/ /skal min gsang ba ston pa dang zhes 'byung ba la thun mong pa bzhi dang /rung bar ma byas pa'i yul dang/ der 'du shes pa dang/ ngag gi sbyor ba byas pa dang/ dbang dang 'brel zhing zab pa dang/ rgya che ba
194b5(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa dang/ dgongs pa ma yin pa dang/ go ba ste bcas dngos gzhi'o/ /ldang ba ni snga ma bzhin no/ /'di na gsang ba'i snod dkon par blta'o zhes pa ni bslab par bya ba'o/ /dang ldan sems ni sun 'byin dang zhes 'byung ba la thun mong ba bzhi dang/
194b6(rgyud 'grel): yul rung bar gyur ba dang/ der 'du shes pa dang / dgongs pa ma yin pa dang/ ngag gi sbyor ba byas pa dang/ ngag gi sbyor ba byas pa dang/ go ba ste dgus dngos gzhi'o/ /ldang ba ni snga ma bzhin no/ /chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad tshim par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bslab
194b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba'o/ /dam tshig las ni ji bzhin rnyed mi bsten zhes bya ba ni thun mong bzhi dang/ rdzas khyad par can dang / der 'du shes pa dang /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dus dang / dgongs pa ma yin pa dang /gzhan gyis go ba ste dgus dngos bzhi'o/ /ldang?
195a1(rgyud 'grel): pa ni tshogs kyi 'khor los so/ /spyod pa thams cad dang mthun par bya'o zhes pa ni bslab par bya pa'o/ /shes rab rang bzhin can smod pa zhes bya ba ni dam tshig dus su rung ba gzungs su byas pa 'am yon tan dang ldan pa'o//
195a2(rgyud 'grel): smod pa ni skyon brjod pa'o/ /thun mongs pa bzhi dang/ yul khyad par can dang/ der 'du shes pa dang / sbyor ba byas pa dang/ gang yang rung bas go bar byas pa dang /dgongs pa ma yin pa ste dgus dngos gzhi'o/ /ldang ba ni bsnyen
195a3(rgyud 'grel): sgrub la sogs pas so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs par bya'o zhes pa ni bslab par bya ba'o/ /de dag kyang bsdu na gsum du 'du ste/ byang chub sems 'dod bde gshegs bka' 'das dang/ /byams
195a4(rgyud 'grel): spong? theg gsum smod dang chos yid gnyis thugs kye'o/ /slob dpon brnyas dang lha nyid phung po smod/ /dam tshig ma sten shes rab smod pa rnams/ /sku'i 'o? mi bsngags brjod dang dang ldan sems sun 'byin/ /gdug la chags bral chos
195a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis gsang ba ston/ /gsung gi'o/ /gzhan yang rtsa ba'i dngos gzhi'i yan lag mtshang ba las/ sbom po la sogs pa gsum gyi bye brag gis rnam pa du mar 'gyur ba bstan pa las/ /'dir de dang mi 'dra pa'i nyes pa sbom por bstan par bya?
195a6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /dam tshig dang ni mi ldan pa'i/ /rig ma bsten par dga' ba dang/ /zhes 'byung ba la thun mong ba bzhi dang/ /yul dam tshig med pa dang/ der 'du shes pa dang/ sbyor ba byas pa dang/ nyams su myong ba ste brgyad kyis dngos gzhir 'gyur ro//
195a7(rgyud 'grel): ldang ba ni gnyen sgrub man chad kyis so/ /ma'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o zhes pa ni bslab par bya ba'o/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lor brtsod pa dang zhes pa ni thun mong ba bzhi dang / bla ma 'am rdo rje spun gyi tshogs pa dang / sgrub pa 'am/ dam tshig
195b1(rgyud 'grel): gi dkyil 'khor phyi nang du zhugs pa'i dus dang/ der 'du shes pa dang/ dag gi sbyor ba byas pa dang/ dgongs pa ma yin pa ste bcus dngos gzhir 'gyur ro/ /ldang ba ni rigs kyis so/ /bag yod par bya zhes pa ni bslab par bya pa'o/ /sems
195b2(rgyud 'grel): can dad dang ldan pa la/ dam chos gzhan du ston pa dang/ zhes bya ba la thun mong ba bzhi dang/ sems can snod du gyur pa dang/ der 'du shes pa dang/ gzhan ston pa'i dag gis sbyor ba byas pa dang/ go ba dang/ dgongs pa ma yin pa
195b3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ dgus dngos gzhir 'gyur ro/ /ldang ba ni bzlas pa la sogs pas so/ /bden par smra bar bya'o zhes pa ni bslab par bya ba'o/ /nyan thos dag tu rlom byed pa'i/ /nang du zhag bdun gnas pa dang/ /zhes pa la 'dir skur? ba 'dengs pa dang/
195b4(rgyud 'grel): mi mos pa yin par bzung ngo/ /zhag bdun nam drug tu 'gron par du gnas shing rang gi spyad pa mi byed pa na lung dang yul chos nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de las 'das pa ni dus kyi sgrub par tshad pa'i phyir ro/ /kha cig ni yon tan bdun dang ldan
195b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor can zhag gcig kyang gnas par mi bya'o zhes 'chad do/ /de yang 'di lta ste/ dkyil 'khor tshogs dad sbyin bsreg dang/ /mchod dang gtor ma go rim dang/ /de nyid dang ni bdun du bstan/ /zhes 'gyur ba'i rnal 'byor pa'o//
195b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dir yang thun mong pa bzhi dang/ yul khyad par can dang/ der 'du shes pa dang/ zhag bdun bzlas pa dang/ dgongs pa ma yin pa ste brgyad kyis dngos bzhir 'gyur ro/ /ldang ba ni tshogs kyi 'khor los so/ /gcig pur gnas par/ /
195b7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o zhes pa ni bslab par bya ba'o/ /sbyor pa don par ma byas pa'i/ /skal min gsang ba sgrog pa dang zhes pa ni dam tshig thob kyang phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa dang/ de dang mi ldan pa la bya'o/ /thun mong ba bzhi dang/ yul khyad par can
196a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ der 'du shes pa dang / dbang dang 'brel pa'i gsang pa dang/ dag gi sbyor ba byas pa dang/? go ba dang dgongs pa ma yin pa ste bcus 'gyur ro/ /ldang ba ni bzlas pa la sogs pas so/ /brgyad brtags
196a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /zhes pa ni slab par bya'o/ /gang zhig phyag rgya mi ma las pas/ /lus kyi phyag rgya ston pa dang zhes pa la/ /thun mong pa bzhi dang / deng 'du shes pa dang/ dgongs pa ma yin pa dang/ mthong ba ste/
196a3(rgyud 'grel): brgyad kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro/ /ldang ba ni gnyen sgrub kyis so/ /shin tu sba bar bya'o zhes pa ni bslab par bya ba'o/ /bsnyen sogs dag par ma byas par/ /dkyil 'khor las la 'jug pa dang zhes pa la/ thun mong pa bzhi dang/ dag par
196a4(rgyud 'grel): ma byas pa dang/ der 'du shes pa dang/ dgongs pa ma yin pa dang/ sbyor ba dang zhugs pa ste / dgus dngos gzhir 'gyur ro/ /ldang ba ni bsnyen sgrub kyis so/ /mtshan ma thob nas 'jug par bya'o zhes pa ni bslab par bya ba'o/ /sdom
196a5(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis kyi bcas pa las /dgos pa med par 'da' ba dang/ zhes pa la thun mong pa bzhi dang/ ltung ba'i yul yin pa dang /der 'du shes pa dang /dgongs pa ma yin pa dang/ sbyor ba dang/ de dag las 'das pa ste dgus
196a6(rgyud 'grel): dngos gzhir 'gyur ro/ /ldang ba ni bzlas pa la sogs pas so/ /sdom pa gsum la gnas par bya'o// //bla ma lnga bcu pa'i nyes pa ni ci rigs par bcu bzhi pa'i nang du 'dus par rig par bya'o// //
196a7(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon chen po dpal lak+Sh+nI? ka ra'i zhal nas mdzad pa / rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs so// //rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i rgya cher 'grel bzhugs /slob dpon chen po snying po zhal kyis mdzad/ /
196b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badzra yA na mu la pa tiTThi? ka / bod skad du/ rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sku gsum sprul/ /sku rnams 'dul?
196b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rgyal po dang/ 'phags dang zab pa'i don ston dang / rna brgyud thob pa'i slob dpon ni/ /bcu gnyis tshogs la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /rin chen lta bu'i rgyud chen las/ /gzhi me lta bur bzhag nas ni/ /rgyud rnams kun las btus
196b3(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang/ /bsgrub pa'i don du bshad par bya/ /de la dam tshig nyams dang ma nyams dang/ bskang pa'i cho ga gsum du bstan/ /rdo rje slob dpon dam tshig ni/ /nyams pa'i dag 'bring gsum dang dgu / ngan sems bcas nas slob
196b4(rgyud 'grel): dpon la/ /tshig rtsub mtshon phyung brgyab nas ni/ /yun ring mthol bshags mi byed pa/ /nyams pa che ste 'bring gi ni/ /mtshon phyung la sogs brgyab nas su/ /cung zhig mthol bshags mi byed pa/ /'bring yin tha ma nyams pa ni/ /
196b5(rgyud 'grel): ngan sems sgo nas bshags nas su/ /mthol bshags mi byed zla ba'i bar/ /tha ma yin te gsum ga la/ /sems dang dngos dang sogs pa la/ /bzlog nas ches cher 'khrul pa dang/ /go mnyam pa ni mtsho skyes gsung/ /yang
196b6(rgyud 'grel): na dgu yi rab kyi rab/ /bsam pa gong rdzogs slob dpon grongs/ /lo ru bshags pa mi byed pa/ /'bring ni gong bzhin rdzogs nas su/ /lo phyed bshags pa mi byed pa/ /tha ma zla bar mi bshags pa'o/ /slob dpon ma grongs gsum pa
196b7(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs/ /lo ru mi bshags 'bring gi bab/ /'bring gi lo phyed tha ma ni/ /zla ba gcig gi tha ma'i bar/ /gnyis po rdzogs nas lo dus su/ /'bring ni lo phyed du ni bstan/ /tha ma zla gcig gnas pa'o/ /slob dpon gnyis su bstan pa la/ /rdo rje 
197a1(rgyud 'grel): slob dang slob dpon tsam/ /lus ngag yid gsum byin brlab pa'i/ /rdo rje slob dpon de la ni/ /thams cad brtsi bar bya ba yin/ /bstan bcos slob dpon dgu yin ni/ /tha ma tsam mam yang na ni/ /yan lag mgo
197a2(rgyud 'grel): mnyam tsam du dpyad/ /rdo rje slob dpon gsum du ste/ /rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gnyis/ /dgu ga brtsi par bya ba yin/ /phyag rgya drug pa man chad do/ /las kyi slob dpon gsum pa yin/ /rtsa ba man ngag gnyis po yang/ /rtsa ba man ngag
197a3(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa ni/ /man ngag pas ni rtsa ba che/ /man ngag gis ni man ngag che ba dang/ /rtsa ba chung na go mnyam mo/ /man ngag gis ni man ngag shin tu che/ /gong ma de las bzlog ste bstan/ /lung ston pa yi slob dpon ni/ /phyag rgya nyid dang go mnyam
197a4(rgyud 'grel): mo/ /slob dpon gyi rtsa ba'i dam tshig go /sbun gyi dam tshig nyams pa la/ /rab 'bring bsdus rgyas dgu dang gsum/ /rab kyi yang rab nyams pa ni/ /bsam ngan mtshon dbyug bsnun nas su/ /shi nas lo ru mi bshags pa/ /yang rab yin
197a5(rgyud 'grel): te rab kyi 'bring/ /lo phyed du ni shes par bya/ /rab kyi tha ma zla ba gsum/ /'bring gi rab ni dam tshig ni/ /zla ba gcig tu shes par bya/ /'bring? gi 'bring ni zla ba phyed/ /'bring gi tha ma zhag gcig go /tha ma'i dam tshig nyams pa ni/ /
197a6(rgyud 'grel): tshig rtsub smras nas zla gcig tu/ /mthol bshags mi byed tha ma'i rab/ /'bring ni zla phyed shes par bya/ /tha ma zhag gcig yan chad do/ /gsum du phye ste bstan pa ni/ /mtshon dbyug la sogs brgyab nas su/ /shi nas cung zhig
197a7(rgyud 'grel): mi bshags pa/ /de ni rab yin 'bring gi ni/ /mtshon phyung brgyab nas ma shi bar/ /tha ma tshig rtsub smras nas ni/ /zhag dus mthol bshags mi byed pa/ /rdo rje spun gyi dam tshig nyams pa'i tshad do// //
197b1(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs bka' las 'das pa yi/ /dam tshig nyams pa'i tshang bstan pa/ /dam tshig sa ya 'bum sde yang/ /bde gshegs bka' ru 'dus pa yin/ /'di ni khyab che khyad par ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon byed pas su/ /slob dang 'gro ba'i
197b2(rgyud 'grel): don du yang/ /cho ga tshul bzhin ma gyur pa/ /lo ru byed na rab kyi rab zla dgur byed na 'bring yin no/ /zla drug tha mar shes par bya/ /'bring gi rab ni zla ba gsum/ /'bring gi 'bring ni zla gcig go /'bring gi tha ma zla phyed do/ /tha ma'i rab ni
197b3(rgyud 'grel): zhag gcig go /khengs grags 'dod pa'i dbang gyur nas/ /cho ga thams cad 'khrul pa 'am/ /'bring ni cho ga phyed 'khrul pa/ /tha ma cho ga gcig 'khrul pa /de rnams rgyu yi rim pa yang/ /'khrul pa'i cho ga rgyun byed la/ /shin tu
197b4(rgyud 'grel): che bar gyur pa yin/ /bshags pa yun ring mi byed pa/ /bshags la brtson na de la smad/ /'khrul pa'i cho ga rgyun tu ni/ /mi byed gcig gnyis de la smad/ /che chung yod na de las bstong/ /de ltar rab 'bring dgu? gsum
197b5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ mkhas pas brtags nas shes par bya/ /yang na sgrub dang slob dpon gnyis ka yang/ /bde gshegs bka' 'di khyab che bas/ /dod mo dbang bskur byas nas su/ /dbang dang dam tshig mi shes dang/ /snod min bstan par
197b6(rgyud 'grel): mi bya la/ /dbang la sogs pa ston pa dang/ /yi dam lha ni brjed nas su/ /slar yang len par mi byed dang/ /thun mtshams bsgom par mi byed dang/ /zas dang gtor ma'i rnal 'byor dang/ /phyi nang sbyin bsreg rnal
197b7(rgyud 'grel): 'byor dang/ /snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang/ /mchod pa'i dus kyis 'khor lo sogs/ /yi dam lha dang slob dpon gyis/ /mdun du dam bca' byas nas ni/ /spangs dang ma bshags brjod pa rnams/ /rdo rje dril bu phreng ba
198a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum/ /ming bcang rab gnas ma byas dang/ /rgyu dang tshad sogs 'khrul pa dang/ /'tshong dang 'go dang gte 'dzug dang/ /rab gnas byas ? shes par bya/ /ma byas pa la chung du 'ong/ /po ti glegs bam la
198a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs dang/ /kha DwAM la sogs phyag mtshan rnams/ /gong bzhin rab gnas byas pa dang/ /ma byas pa ni che chung ngo/ /khyad par sgrub ba po yin ni/ /rdor dril la sogs thams cad kun/ /gtso bo la sogs mtshong? byas la/ /chos
198a3(rgyud 'grel): mthun yid 'ong gzung bar bya/ /so sor thar dang byang chub sems/ /rig 'dzin nang gi sdom pa gsum/ /gnyis ni rig 'dzin rten yang yin/ /yang na rig 'dzin nang du 'dus/ /mi dge la sogs bcu po yang/ /gsum du 'dus
198a4(rgyud 'grel): te khyad par ni/ /spang ba dang ni mi spang dang/ /dngos dang bsam pa dus dang ni/ /gnas skabs dang ni rnal 'byor gyi/ /blo yi khyad par rim pa yis/ /shes par de ni ma byas na/ /byas na yang ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /ma byas na yang ltung bar
198a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /de bas slob dpon la gus bas/ /man ngag gis ni shes par bya/ /chos spyod la sogs bcu po yang/ /man ngag bsgom pa ma shes na/ /mdor na bka' yi chos rnams kun/ /thams cad chos tshul bzhin shes bya/ /de ltar
198a6(rgyud 'grel): mi shes dam tshig nyams/ /sku dang me tog dman pa dang/ /slob dpon la sogs grib ma la/ /'gom dang rdzi bar byed pa dang/ /dbang dang rdzi bar mi byed kyi/ /bar gyi dam tshig de dag kun/ /lo dus len la chen por 'gyur/ /lo
198a7(rgyud 'grel): phyed lon na 'bring du 'gyur/ /tha ma zla gcig shes par bya/ /bde gshegs bka' yis dam tshig go /sems can rnams la byams pa yi/ /sems spangs pas ni dam tshig nyams/ /de yi rab 'bring bstan pa ni/ /zhing dag pa yi gang zag
198b1(rgyud 'grel): la/ khros dang byams sems spangs nas ni/ /mtshon dbyug la sogs bsnun nas ni/ /lo ru bshags pa mi byed pa/ /rab kyi rab yin 'bring gi ni/ /de phyed du ni shes par bya/ /tha ma yin ni zla gcig go /zhing ma dag pa'i gang zag la/ /gong
198b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin byas nas lo ru ni/ /mi bshags pa ni 'bring gi rab/ /'bring gi lo phyed tha ma ni/ /zla ba gcig tu shes par bya/ /sems can la sogs gzhan po la/ /gong bzhin byas na lo ru ni/ /mi bshags pa ni tha ma'i rab/ /'bring ni lo phyed
198b3(rgyud 'grel): tha ma gcig /zhing dag pa yi gang zag la/ /nyin gcig mang por rdung byed la/ /rab kyi yin te 'bring gi ni/ /ma dag pa yi gang zag la/ /tha ma sems can phal pa la/ /mang po rnams ni brdung byed pa/ /de las mang nyung 'khrul pa dang//
198b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dang dngos dang sogs pa rnams/ /slob dpon zhal nas shes par bya/ /dag dang ma dag gang zag dang/ /sems can gzhan la sogs pa la/ /lus ngag yid gsum gdungs nas ni/ /'chil thug pa'i sems can la/ /nyin ?
198b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ni dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhis mi skyong na/ /dam tshig nyams te gong ma bzhin/ /slob dpon zhal nas shes par bya/ /byams sems spangs pa'i dam tshig go /chos kyi rtsa ba byang chub sems /de spong dam tshig nyams pa ni//
198b6(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig rab 'bring tshad bstan pa/ /sngags kyi rnal 'byor sems ba skyed nas/ /slar log nyan thos sems bskyed la/ /zhugs nas lo ru gnas pa yin/ /bshags pa mi byed rab yin no/ /'bring gi lo phyed tha ma ni/ /zla ba gcig tu shes
198b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /zla phyed zhag bdun zhag gcig ni/ /tha ma yi ni rab 'bring gsum/ /gong ma de ni 'bring gi yin/ /rab ni mu stegs sems su ni/ /zhugs nas lo gcig lo phyed dag /zla gcig tha ma'i rab yin no/ /sems spangs pa yi dam tshig go /
199a1(rgyud 'grel): rang dang gzhan gyis grub pa'i mdza' / /chos la smos pa'i dam tshig gi /rab 'bring gi ni tshad bstan? ?/ /chos skal? smon nas? lo du ni//mi bshags pa ni rab yin no/ /'bring ni lo phyed tha ma ni/ /zla ba gcig tu
199a2(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya/ /rgyun tu smod cing mi bshags pa/ /lo dang lo phyed zla ba dang/ /rab kyi rab 'bring gsum yin no/ /gong ma 'brel yin tha ma ni/ /zla phyed zhag gcig zhag bdun ni/ /tha ma yin ni rab 'bring gsum/ /chos la smod pa'i dam
199a3(rgyud 'grel): tshig go/ /yongs su ma smin sems can la/ /gsang ba sgrog 'di dam tshig ni/ /rab 'bring gi ni tshad bstan pa/ /ma smin pa la gnyis yod de/ /dbang bskur de ni ma byas dang/ /glen pa lkug pa gyur pa gnyis/ /de lta bu yi gdan ga la/ /man
199a4(rgyud 'grel): ngag gsang ba bstan nas kyang/ /lo yi dus su mi bshags pa/ /'bring gi rab yin 'bring gi lo/ /phyed 'bring yin te tha ma ni/ /zla ba gcig tu shes par bya/ /de 'dra'i gang zag mang po la/ /yang nas yang du sgrog pa ni/ /lo gcig lo phyed
199a5(rgyud 'grel): zla phyed ni/ /rab kyi rab 'bring gsum yin no/ /mi zab chos su gyur pa yi/ /lo gcig tu ni gnas pa dang/ /tha ma'i rab yin tha ma yi/ /lo phye zla gcig gnyis po yin/ /yang na zab pa'i don rnams la/ /zla phyed zhag bdun zhag cing?
199a6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ tha ma yi ni rab 'bring gsum/ /yang na de gsum 'khrul ka yi/ /slob dpon mkhas pa'i shes par bya/ /gsang ba sgrogs pa'i dam tshig go /phung po sangs rgyas mnga' bdag la/ /brnyas par byed pa'i dam tshig ni/ /rab 'bring tha ma'i tshad
199a7(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa/ /phung po lha yi nga rgyal du/ /ma shes shes nas spangs pa ni/ /bshags pa mi byed lor lon pa/ /'bring gi rab yin 'bring gi ni/ /lo phyed tha ma zla ba gcig /zla phyed zhag bdun zhag gcig ni/ /mdza' ma'i rab 'bring gsum
199b1(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /ma shes steng du yang nas yang/ /smod par byed cing gdung ba ni/ /lo gcig lo phyed zla gcig ni/ /rab kyi 'bring yin gsum yin no/ /phung po brnyas byed dam tshig go /rang bzhin dag pa'i chos rnams la/ /som nyi zla ba'i dam tshig ni//
199b2(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba rlung gi man ngag la/ /lan cig dka' ba la sogs kyi/ /zab mo'i don la lo dus su/ /the tshom za zhing mi bshags pa/ /rab kyi rab yin 'bring gi ni/ /tha ma zla ba lo gcig go /lhan cig bka' bca' ma gtogs pa'i/ /lhag ma rnams la
199b3(rgyud 'grel): the tshom ni/ /lo dus zla ba 'bring gi rab/ /lhag ma gnyis po gong bzhin bya/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin las/ /lha yis rnal 'byor gnyis dang ni/ /mi shes phyi nang thun mong gsum/ /yang na gong ma gnyis po yi/ /zla phyed zhag bdun zhag gcig
199b4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ tha yi rab 'bring gsum yin no/ /som nyi za pa'i dam tshig go /gdug la rtag tu byams ldan par/ /byed pa'i dam tshig nyams pa ni/ /gdugs ces bya ba'i slob dpon ni/ /rdo rje spun dang rnal 'byor gyi/ /dgrar gyur bstan pa 'jig pa dang/ /
199b5(rgyud 'grel): de la sogs pa byed pa rnams/ /gdug pa zhes ni bya ba yin/ /de lta bu yi gdug pa ni/ /mthol bshags mi byed lo ru ni/ /gnas pas rab kyi rab yin no/ /lhag ma gnyis po gong bzhin no/ /slob dpon ma gtogs rdo rje spun/ /'bring gi
199b6(rgyud 'grel): rab 'bring gsum yin no/ /gnyis po ma gtogs lhag ma ni/ /tha ma'i rab 'bring gsum yin no/ /yang na de rnams gsum ga la/ /zhag grangs brtsis ni gong bzhin no/ /gdug la byams pa'i dam tshig go /ming sogs bral ba'i chos rnams la//
199b7(rgyud 'grel): rtogs par byed pa'i dam tshig ni/ /chos rnams spros dang bral ba la/ lo gcig rtog par 'dzin pa dang/ /gzhan yang de la sbyor byed pa'i/ /bshags par mi byed pa yi mi/ /lhag ma gnyis ni gong bzhin no/ /gzhan la mi sbyor rang tsam ni/ /lo nas zla
200a1(rgyud 'grel): bar 'bring gi ni/ /rab 'bring du ni shes par bya/ /dngos por ma bzung tshol 'dod pa/ de bzhin lo nas zla ba'i bar/ /tha ma'i rab 'bring gsum yin no/ /rtog 'dzin byed pa'i dam tshig go /sems can dad dang ldan
200a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /sems sun 'byin pa'i dam tshig ni/ /dad dang ldan pa'i gang zag rnams/ /zab mo'i chos las bzlog nas ni/ /mu stegs chos la sbyor byas pa/ /lo nas zla ba'i bar tu ni/ /rab kyi rab 'bring gsum yin no/ /zab mo'i don lam
200a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlog nas ni/ /nyan thos sheg par sbyor byed pa/ /'bring rab gsum yin no bzhin tshad/ /zab mo'i don las bzlog nas ni/ /pha rol phyin par sbyor byed pa/ /tha ma'i rab 'bring gsum yin no/ /yang na pha rol theg pa bzlog nas ni/ /mu
200a4(rgyud 'grel): stegs theg par sbyor byed pa/ /'bring yin nyan thos bzlog byed pa/ /tha ma yin ta gsang sngags ni/ /rab yin yang na mang po rnams/ /bzlog byed pa ni rab yin te/ /nyung du 'bring yin tha ma ni/ /sems sun 'byin pa'i dam tshig go/
200a5(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig rnams la ji bzhin snyed/ /mi bsten dam tshig nyams pa'i tshad/ /rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi /dam tshig nyin mtshan mi bsngo dang/ /spyod pa la sogs lnga po lnga/ /dang du blangs nas mi bsten pa/ /lo nas zla ba'i bar du ni/ /mi
200a6(rgyud 'grel): bshags rab kyi gsum yin no/ /rtse ba dang du mi len par/ /'jog par 'bring gi gsum yin no/ /yan lag mi len tha ma gsum/ /yang na zla phyed zhag bdun du/ /zhag gcig pa ni 'bring gi gsum/ /nyin mtshan gcig la tha ma'i gsum//
200a7(rgyud 'grel): mi bsten pa yis dam tshig go /bud med shes rab rang bzhin can/ /smod par byed pa'i dam tshig ni/ /dper na ba lang ko ba las/ /sgras mtshon par du slob pa bzhin/ /bud med shes rab sgyu ma can/ /las kyi phyag rgya mtshan ldan la/ /brten
200b1(rgyud 'grel): nas de las lobs gyur na/ /yid kyi lha mo la brten na/ /de nas gtum mo nyid la brten/ /de nas shes rab dga' ma la/ /lhan cig dga' pa'i bar du ni/ /brten nas shes rab rim par bskyed/ /de nas phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'thob/ /de ltar
200b2(rgyud 'grel): bud med shes rab la/ /smod cing spong bar byed pa ni/ /lo dus lon na rab kyi rab/ /phyed dang zla? gcig gnyis su bstan/ /de lta'i shes rab rang bzhin la/ /rnal 'byor lam pa smod na ni/ /'bring gi gsum dang bstan pa yin/ /mtshan dang mi ldan
200b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad le/ /rgyun tu smod cing mi bshags pa/ /lo dus lon na tha ma'i rab/ /phyed dang zla gcig gnyis su bstan/ /shes rab smod pa'i dam tshig go /rtsa ba'i dam tshig rab 'bring gi nyams pa'i tshad bstan pa'o/ /yan lag dam tshig
200b4(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa ni/ /rnal 'byor sngags pas sngags pa ni/ /nan gyis len pa gsum du bstan/ /gzhan gyi bud med len pa dang/ /rang gi rnal 'byor ma gnyis la/ /chags pa'i don du 'jug pa dang/ /byin gyis brlab par mi byed par/ /tha mal spyod
200b5(rgyud 'grel): pas 'jug pa dang/ /rtags dang mi ldan 'jug pa ni/ /rnal 'byor chags pa'i lam pas ni/ /dang po chags pa 'dul ba dang/ /zab mo'i don la 'jug bya'i phyir/ /shin tu chags pa cher ldan la/ /bde gshegs rgyal bas bstan
200b6(rgyud 'grel): pa yin/ /rnal 'byor grol pa'i lam pa la/ /gong ma de bzhin ma bstan te/ /las dang rnal 'byor dus su ni/ /yid kyi lta mo gzugs mdzes ma/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo 'am spyod dus su/ /mos pas de bsam dam tshig yin/ /rtags ldan brtan pa thob
200b7(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /mchog gi dngos grub myur 'dod pas/ /rnal 'byor ma yis lung bstan nas/ /mi de lta la sogs pa yis/ /zhag gcig zla gcig zhag drug tu/ /bsnyen pas mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /chags med rnal 'byor mos pa yi/ /skad cig shes/ 
201a1(rgyud 'grel): rab la brten nas/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de don bya ba'i rim pa ni/ /sa la gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /kho na nyid la brten pa yin/ /de ltar mi shes 'khrul par spyod/ /rgyun tu spyod? cing lo dus su//
201a2(rgyud 'grel): mi bshags de ni me yin no/ /de bas nyung bar gyur pa ni/ /'bring nyid du ni shes par bya/ /thabs gcig spyod pa tha ma yin/ /man gyis len pa'i dam tshig go /ma gsungs pa yi rig ma la/ /sngags pas bdud rtsi thog byed ni/ /bla ma rdo
201a3(rgyud 'grel): rje slob dpon gyis/ /man ngag rna par ma brgyud par/ /nan gyis brtags nas tshul 'chos pa/ /rgyun tu byed cing lo dus su/ /mi bshags pa ni rab yin no/ /de bas nyung ba 'bring yin te/ /gcig tsam byed pa tha ma yin/ /ma thob pa yi
201a4(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dam tshig go /bstan la thab mo brtsod byed pa/ /dbang skur man ngag zab mo dang/ /slob dpon gcig par ma gyur la/ /mi zang tshogs la bshad pa yin/ /dus su brtsod nas mtshon dbyugs ni/ /'das
201a5(rgyud 'grel): nas cung zhig mi bshags pa/ /rab kyi yin te 'bring gi ni/ /mtshon dbyug 'dres nas yun thung ba/ /tha ma tshig rtsub shin tu thub/ /shi bar gyur na slob dpon gyis/ /'bring po man chad brtsi bar bya/ /tshogs kyi dam tshig nyams pa'o//
201a6(rgyud 'grel): gsang chos yan lag shes gyur kyang/ /gzhan la mi ston shis ngan ni/ /snod du gyur pa'i gang zag la/ /man ngag shes bzhin mi ston na/ /snod gyur mang la mi ston rab/ /nyung la mi ston tha ma gcig /yang na dus kyi gsum po ni//
201a7(rgyud 'grel): gong ma bzhin du shes par bya/ /lung mi ston pa'i dam tshig /dad pa'i sems can chos kyis rgyu/ /gzhan gyi gdams byed byang chub sems/ /theg chen snod du gyur pa la/ /gus pas chos ni dri byed pa/ /lan mi 'debs te yi ge'i gdam//
201b1(rgyud 'grel): byed ba rab yin 'bring gi ni/ /lung ma bstan pa'i gtam byed cing/ /tha ma nyan thos kyi ni gtam/ /dus gsum gong bzhin shes par bya/ /log par ston pa'i dam tshig go /nyan thos nang du zhag bdun 'dug /theg pa chen po'i chos la
201b2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ thos par gyur nas skur pa yi/ /nang du zhag bdun 'dug nas ni/ /spangs nas spong byed lo dus su/ /mi bshags pa ni rab yin no/ /zhag gsum du ni gcig ni tha/ /de gnyis su ni gang bzhin/ /yang na rigs 'drang? gyur pa la/ /
201b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis po man chang brtsi bar bya/ /zhag bdun nyal pa'i dam tshig go? /rnal 'byor ye shes mi shes par/ /da ni sngags pa yin zhes zer/ /rnal 'byor med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /tshig tsam 'ga' yi nga rgyal gyis/ /sngags pas khas
201b4(rgyud 'grel): 'chos yang gsu yang/ /lo dus mi bshags rab yin no/ /de pas nyung ltar shin tu nyung/ /gnyis po yin par shes par bya/ /mi shes pa yi dam tshig go /snod min pa yi sems can la/ /phyi yi chos bshad yin pa la/ /gsang
201b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i chos rnams 'chad pa ni/ /phyi tsam bstan pa'i gang zag la/ /gsang ba'i man ngag ston pa ni/ /yang yang ston dang mang la ston/ /lo dus ma bshags rab yin no/ /gnyis po gong bzhin shes par bya/ /dam tshig de rnams kun la yang//
201b6(rgyud 'grel): dus dang bsam pa dngos po kun/ /che chung byung bar gyur pa dang/ /mnyam par gyur dang mched rnams/ /mkhas pas brtags nas cho ga ni/ /che chung stong dang smod par bya/ /de ltar ma shes gsum dang dgu /mu de bzung nas lhag kyang bzang/ /
201b7(rgyud 'grel): de rnams ni dam tshig nyams pa'i chad bstan pa'o// //ma nyams pa'i tshad bstan pa ni/ /gong ma de rnams ma byung dang/ /yang na slob dpon dkon mchog dang/ /rdo rje spun dang sdug pa yi/ /sems can rnams kyi don du ni
202a1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu ma gyur 'bring gi ni/ /de dag man chod byung nas yang/ /nyams par mi 'gyur bde gshegs gsung/ /lus la phan par gyur nas kyang/ /ting 'dzin grogs su gyur pa ni/ /nyes par mi 'gyur bde
202a2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs gsung/ /sems can 'dul bar gyur pa dang/ /sems can drang pa'i don du yang/ /nyams par mi 'gyur bde gshegs gsung/ /de rnams shes rab zab mo dang/ /slob dpon zhal gyi man ngag la/ /brten nas gnang? bkag
202a3(rgyud 'grel): rim pa ni/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis shes par bya/ /dam tshig ma nyams pa'i tshad bstan pa'o// //da ni dam tshig nyams pa bskang ba'i cho ga bstan te/ /cho ga yang ni dgu ru shes par bya/ /rab kyis lo gcig la bsgoms la//
202a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs 'khor bcu gnyis phrag bzhi dang/ /sbyin sreg bdun brgya nyi shu dang/ /gtor ma bdun brgya nyi shu dang/ /de dus rdo rje slob dpon dang/ /rdo rje mched kyang spyan drangs la/ /rdo rje slob dpon bkrongs gyur na/ /gzugs bya yang na
202a5(rgyud 'grel): mchil lham gos/ /de rten yang na ming gi yi ges bskyed/ /'od zer 'phros nas slob dpon gyis/ /rnam shes bkugs nas de la gzung/ /yi dam lha 'am mi bskyod pa'i/ /gzugs su bltas la de la ni/ /skyed rim thun re byed pa dang//
202a6(rgyud 'grel): bzlas brjod 'bum phrag gsum gyis ni/ /yi ge 'khor lo'i 'od zer gyis/ /bdag dang slob dpon gnyis ka yi/ /lus ngag yid kyi sgrib pa sbyang/ /sbyin sreg gis kyang de bzhin sbyang/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa yis/ /
202a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo 'du 'phro sbyang ba bya/ /'khor lo 'du 'phros mchod pa'o/ /gtor ma dang pos sbyang mchod dang/ /bar mas bkrung zhing sbol ba dang/ /tha mas gnod pa mi byed cing/ /bshags pa rgyan bya 'dus pas kyi?// /dge rtse la sogs
202b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang bya/ /de ltar byas na slob dpon la/ /slar yang sdom pa gsum blangs la/ /dkyil 'khor 'jug cing dbang bskur blang/ /slob dpon med 'gyur rdo rje spun/ /mkhas pa nyid la blang bar bya/ /de med yi dam lha la blang/ /de ltar
202b2(rgyud 'grel): byas na? dag 'gyur te/ /dngos grub kyang ni thob par 'gyur/ /'bring dang tha ma gnyis po yang/ /phyed phyed 'dres phyed shes par bya/ /'bring gi rab ni zla a gcig /lta bsgoms sbyin sreg sum cu dang/ /gtor ma sum cu phrag gnyis dang//
202b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs 'khor gsum dang bzlas brjod ni/ /sum khri bshags pa thun mtshams su/ /'bring gi 'bring ni nyi shu ru/ /tshogs gnyis bzlas brjod nyi khri bya/ /'bring gi tha ma bcu ru sbyin sreg bya/ /gtor ma bcu dang bzlas brjod khri/ /de dag
202b4(rgyud 'grel): cho ga byed pa yang/ /slob dpon la sogs ma tshogs kyang/ /rnal 'byor gnyis kyis por len bya/ /tha ma'i rab 'bring zhag bdun du/ /sbyin sreg gtor ma bdun dang bzlas brjod stong/ /tshogs 'khor gcig dang bshags pa mthun//
202b5(rgyud 'grel): tha ma'i 'bring ni zhag gsum du/ /sbyin sreg gtor ma gsum dang mchod pa brtsam/ /bzlas brjod lnga brgya bshags pa bya/ /tha ma'i tha ma zhag gcig tu/ /gtor ma sbyin sreg re re dang/ /bzlas brjod brgya dang bshags pa bya/ /de ltar byas
202b6(rgyud 'grel): pas dag par 'gyur/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo ma 'byor pas/ /sbyin sreg gcig phul bskang ba yin/ /rab kyi gsum gyi sbyin sreg ni/ /sum khri khri nyi khri ru bya/ /'bring gi gsum gyi sbyin sreg ni/ /lnga stong stong dang lnga brgya bya/ /tha ma gsum gyi sbyin
202b7(rgyud 'grel): bsreg ni/ /brgya dang lnga bcu nyi shu lnga/ /de ltar byas pas dag par 'gyur/ /sbyin sreg ma byas rnal 'byor pas /bzlas brjod kyis ni bya bar gsungs/ gsum gyi rab 'bring gsum gsum ste/ /bye ba bdud 'bum sum 'bum dang/ /'bum dang bdun
203a1(rgyud 'grel): khri sum khri dang/ /khri dang bdun stong sum stong dang/ /stong dang bdun brgya sum brgya dang/ /de ltar byas pas dag par 'gyur/ /de ltar mi 'grub rnal 'byor pas/ /gtor ma chen po'i cho gas kyang/ /sbyin sreg
203a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du bstan nas su/ /nyams pa dag ste skongs par 'gyur/ /sbyin sreg bzlas brjod gtor ma las/ /byung ba'i dngos grub gsum gyis ni/ /dam tshig nyams par skongs par 'gyur/ /thun mongs dngos grub grub nas kyang//
203a3(rgyud 'grel): brgyud pas mchog kyang 'grub par gsungs/ /bsgom pa las byung dngos grub kyi/ /dam tshig nyams pa skongs gyur na/ /dngos grub gnyis ka thob par 'gyur/ /lhag ma rnams kyi cho ga ni/ /slob dpon rab gsum phar bor nas/ /
203a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bring gi gsum gyi rab tu bstan/ /tha ma gsum gyi 'bring du bstan/ /tha ma rab kyi sbyin sreg gcig /'bring gi gtor ma 'am bzlas brjod bya/ /tha mas bla ma'i mchod pa bya/ /bla ma'i mchod pa'i man ngag kyang/ /maN+Dal gsum mas
203a5(rgyud 'grel): /cig byas la/ /maN+Dal mthar phyin mdzes pa la/ /me tog mdzes ldan mchod pa bsag /lus tshags bgos pas pus btsugs nas/ /bdun dang bcu dang bcu gnyis dang/ /bya ba cho ga gzhan dang mthun/ /khyad par bdag gi sdig
203a6(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ 'od zer dra bas bsdus nas ni/ /phyung nas gdan gyi pad stengs su/ /bla ma yi dam dkon mchog dang/ /bdag gi 'od zer 'khrul 'khor dang/ /sdig pa spyod zhing bshags pa bya/ /yang na sgyu ma lta bu'i sems/ /de bzhin byas
203a7(rgyud 'grel): pas dag par 'gyur/ /yan lag cho ga bstan pa ni/ /rtsa ba'i tha ma gsum po dang/ /go rim bzhin du shes par bya/ /khyad par cho ga stan pa ni/ /rdo rje spun ni bkug gyur nas/ /sgrib spyod lha ru bskyed pa la/ /mchod pa la sogs gong bzhin no//
203b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin 'gyur na 'ang gong bzhin/ /bde bshegs bka' 'das dus su na/ /gong du nyams pa de lan/ /sbyang pa la sogs tu? ba dang/ /rigs kyi lha ? phyag mtshan nam/ /A li kA li phreng pa ni/ /bstims nas gong bzhin shes par bya/ /sems can
203b2(rgyud 'grel): byams sems dam tshig la/ /gang du spabs pa de bkug nas/ /dngos dang bsam pa gnyis kas su/ /sbyang ba la sogs gong bzhin bya/ /byang sems spang ? yang/ /phyi nang yang mi gnyis su bstan/ /phyi ni gong bzhin nang gi ni/ /'phab ra ka tar ma
203b3(rgyud 'grel): zin pa'o/ /de yi sbyang ba la sogs kun/ /snying ga gong 'og la bstims nas/ /rang gi po ti kho na la/ /gzhan gyis po ti'am dngos de nyid/ /bsams dang dngos la sogs pa ni/ /gong ma bzhin du shes par bya/ /de 'og slar yang smin par bya//
203b4(rgyud 'grel): yang na yi dam lha sogs la/ /gong bzhin khyad par dag gis spyad/ /phung po lha ru bsam nas ni/ /nang mchod nang gi sbyin sreg ni/ /bsam te sbyad pa'i cho ga bya/ /rang bzhin chos kyi gnas de ru/ /the tshom za ba'i de nyid la/ /rang bzhin de nyid
203b5(rgyud 'grel): bsams nas su/ /de nyid lha 'am thig le 'am/ /yig 'bru gtum mo la sogs la/ /rtsad mchod la sogs gong bzhin? bya/ /sems can gdugs pa sbyangs pa dang/ /bla ma spun la mchod par bya/ /stong pa'i don la mos pa dang/ /bla ma yi ni dbu steng
203b6(rgyud 'grel): du/ chos sku'i rtags dang gtsug tor la/ /khyad par mchod par bya ba'o/ /sems can dad ldan bkug nas ni/ /sbyang ba la sogs byas nas kyang/ /dkyil 'khor sgrub cing dbang bskur dang/ /man ngag zab mo'i don bstan pa/ /lhang dmigs mchod
203b7(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs bya/ /dam tshig thams cad dran nas kyang/ /thams cad ltar dmigs khyad par ni/ /spyad par bya ba la sogs la/ /rigs lnga yab yum bsams nas ni/ /mchod cing sbyang bar bya ba yin/ /shes rab thams cad bkug nas ni/ /sbyang ?
204a1(rgyud 'grel): byas la lha mor dmigs/ /mchod pa sna tshogs khyad par bsam/ /bdag po dang bcas gzugs? pa la/ /sbyar? pa la sogs ? bzhin bya/ /? bzhin pa bzlog /mal ba la sogs pa byin brlab la/ /lha yi
204a2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor bltas nas ni/ /phan tshun mchod pas tshim par bya/ /tha mal lce 'di sbyangs nas su/ /rdo rje lce ru? byin brlabs la/ /gang bshad legs bab nas pa ni/ /sbyang dang lha bsam la sogs bya/ /khyad par rdo rje 'od zer las/ /
204a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas shing mchod? pas tshim par bya/ /bstan bya nyid kyang bkug nas ni/ /gse zhing sbyar pa'i cho ga bya/ /rnal 'byor spun rnams bkug nas ni/ /sbyang ba la sogs gong bzhin no/ /snod ldan sems can bkub nas ni/ /sbyang ba la sogs bya
204a4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ gsang ba dngos dang bsam pa yis/ /bstan la sogs pa bya ba'o/ /dang ldan kun la gong bzhin no/ /sbyang ba la sogs dngos dang bsam/ /gnyis ka'i thabs gyis bstan pa yin/ /nyan thos la sogs spyod pa dang/ /bdag nyid sbyang
204a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba'o/ /rnal 'byor lha la nan tan bya'o/ /nga rgyal la sogs spyad pa'o/ /de ltar cho ga byas nas ni/ /dam tshig nyams pa bskongs nas kyang/ /dngos grub rnam gnyis thob par gsungs/ /las dang po yi gang zag la/ /rtog pa sna tshogs
204a6(rgyud 'grel): dkur gyur pas/ /rig 'dzin sa ni ma thob par/ /dam tshig nyams pa 'byung 'gyur pas/ /bskang pa'i cho ga ma byas na/ /ngan song gsum dang rdo rje yi/ /dmyal ba dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/ /bskal pa grangs med gnas nas ni/ /de nas
204a7(rgyud 'grel): bskal bar tsha grang myong/ /de nas byol song yi dags su/ /yun ring gnas nas brgya lam na/ /sems can glan lkugs la sogs su/ /yun ring gnas nas tha mar ni/ /sngon gyi dge ba'i sa bon gyis/ /bde gshegs thugs rjes phrad pa dang
204b1(rgyud 'grel): de ru dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /slar yang thun la ltung bar 'gyur /ma nyams gyen du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /da bas nan tan cher bskyed cing/ /dam tshigs la 'bum sde ni/ /lung rgyud kun la'ang gsal bas na/ /shes rab can gyis blang
204b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /'di ni blangs na dod du gsungs/ /theg pa chen po smod pa dang/ /khyad par gsang sngags smod pa ni/ /bskal pa mthal yi bar du yang/ /lce la phur bus 'debs shing khro chu ldung/ /de bas gsang sngags 'di la smad par
204b3(rgyud 'grel): mi bya'o/ /rgyud rnams kun dang mi 'gal tsam du ni/ /dper na sa gzhi lta bu'i dam tshig 'di/ /sgrub dang slob dpon rnams la bstan pas su/ /myu gu lta bu'i sangs rgyas grub par shog /rin chen phug gi yang gter du/ /snying pos
204b4(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig nyams pa la/ /bskang pa'i cho ga mi shes pas/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi nad kyis btab/ /de la slob dpon chen pos su/ /rdo rje'i stong glu'i gshags pa yis/ /mkha' 'gro ma la bshags nas kyang/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyud kun tu//
204b5(rgyud 'grel): cho ga zab mo sbas pa la/ /yang nas yang du gsol btab pas /mkha' 'gro ma yis chos bstan te/ /de ni slob dpon chen po yis/ /bdag gi rna bar brgyud pa 'di/ /phyi nas rnal 'byor don chen du/ /bdag gis rim par bkod pa
204b6(rgyud 'grel): yang/ bde gshegs mkha' 'gros bzod par bzhes/ /slob dpon chen po snying po zhabs kyis mdzad pa/ slob dpon b+ha? bi pa'i gdams ngag mngon par bkod pa rdzogs so// // */ /rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa pa'i
204b7(rgyud 'grel): ? bi? rgya cher 'grel pa bzhugs / mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad/ / */ /rgya gar skad du / ? la pa ti DI? ka / bod skad du/ rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa/ 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ltung ba 
205a1(rgyud 'grel): bcu bzhi po ni dkyus su bsdebs pa bdun te/ /bdun po de dag la ltung ba'i ngo bo bdun dang/ rgyu bdun dang/ dngos po bcu bzhi zung bral na bcu bzhi po tshan tshan gsum mo/ /de la ltung ba dang po dang gnyis pa'i ngo
205a2(rgyud 'grel): po dang rgyud gcig ste/ bla ma la brnyas pa nyid bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' las 'das pa ste/ de yang/ bla ma dang ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /tha dad par ni mi brtag go /zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /des na rdo rje 'dzin pa dang/ /bla ma tha mi dad
205a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir ltung ba gnyis ngo bo dang rgyu gcig go /brnyas pa'i yul bla ma de yang thun mong gi lam 'khor ba yid la byas pa 'di las blo log pa byas pa shes shing byas pa gzo ba la brten nas byams pa dang snying rje brtan par
205a4(rgyud 'grel): byas pa de gnyis kyi stobs las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems brtan par byas 'jug pa'i sdom pa dang ldan pas mi mthun pa'i phyogs/ /snying rje med cing khro la gdug /khebs? shing chags la ma bsdams dang/ /spyoms dang
205a5(rgyud 'grel): bcas par mi bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pas thun mong gi lam gyi mi mthun pa de rnams las log nas/ thun mong ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid dbang bzhi'i sgo nas lta ba dang/ spyod pa dang/ sgom ba gsum gyi man ngag dang ldan pa de yang
205a6(rgyud 'grel): dang yang du/ goms par byas pas yon tan dang/ brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan/ /bzod ldan drang la g.yo sgyu med/ /sngags dang rgyud gyi sbyor pa shes/ /snying rje ldan zhing bstan bcos mkhas?/ /de nyid bcu ni yongs su shes/ /dkyil
205a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor 'dri ba'i las la mkhas/ /sngags bshad pa yi spyod pa shes/ /rab tu zhi dang dbang po dul zhes bya bas de ltar yon tan bcu bzhi dang ldan pa lta ba rnam gnyis grub par gnas pa'i don dang/ /nges par grub pa'i thabs lnga dang//
205b1(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa rnam pa gnyis dang/ dbang rnam pa bzhi'i man ngag dang ldang pa'i grub pa'i tshig gi nyams dang ldan pa'i bla ma zhes bya ba ste/ /de lta bu'i bla ma dam pa nye bar bsten pa'i sgo nas/ slob ma de rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems
205b2(rgyud 'grel): brtan par bya ba dang/ /'jug sems kyi sdom pa dang ldan par bya ste/ 'og nas mnyam par bzhag pas bla ma la/ /ci 'byor pa yis mchod byas la/ /gsum la skyabs 'gro nas brtsams te/ /byang chub sems sogs sdom pa ni/ /gal te
205b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag la phan 'dod na/ /sngags pas 'bad de bzung bar bya/ /zhes gsungs pas / bla ma des dang po 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs yid la bya ba dang / skyabs su 'gro ba dang byams pa dang snying rje'i sgo nas byang chub tu sems brtan par byas 'jug
205b4(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi sdom pa dang ldan pa la dbang bzhi snod du bsgrubs nas lta spyod sgom pa gsum gyi man ngag dang ldan par bsgrub pa de'i phyir ro/ /de nas sngags sogs sbyin pa yis/ /dam chos snod du byas nas so zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /de bla ma
205b5(rgyud 'grel): la rag las pas/ dngos grub slob dpon rjes 'brang zhes/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid gsungs par/ /shes nas dngos po thams cad kyis/ /bla ma yongs su mnyes par bya zhes bya ba de lta bu'i bla ma des dus rtag tu phun sum tshogs pa mdza' dag
205b6(rgyud 'grel): gi 'byung gnas/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho nas 'byin byed dngos grub thams cad kyi ngag las sa yin pas de'i phyir / gdan bstan pa dang ldang ba dang/ /don gyi bya ba sogs bsnyen bskur zhes pa dang / bla ma las ni dngos grub dang /mtho
205b7(rgyud 'grel): ris dang ni thang pa thob ces pa nas mdun du dul bas 'dug par bya zhes bya ba'i bar du bya ba mdza' dag dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis ma yengs par bya ba'i tshul gyis bla ma bsten par bya'o/ /de lta bu'i bla ma la brnyas na sangs rgyas thams cad
206a1(rgyud 'grel): la brnyas pa ste/ de 'dra'i mgon la bsam bcas pas/ /slob mar gyur nas brnyas na ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad brnyas nas ni/ /des ni rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob ces pa nas der ni gnas pa yang
206a2(rgyud 'grel): dag bshad ces bya ba'i bar dang/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che/ /dge pa yongs su mi spyoms pa/ /nam yang smad par mi bya'o/ /zhes pa de ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba kun gyi ngo bo nyid do/ /sbyor ba la sogs
206a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ni phal cher bla ma gser gling pa la sogs pa'i bshad pa las shes par bya'o/ /ltung ba de gnyis kyis rgyu ni bla ma grub pa thob pa'i tshig gi nyams dang bral ba rnams dang phrad pa'i dbang gis lam gyi snod du ma bsgrubs par dbang
206a4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa byas kyang/ /rtsa ba ma brtan pa'i dbang gis nges par 'dren ma nus zhing/ nges pa med pa'i phyir bla ma gtso bor mi byed/ /de'i phyir slob dpon brnyas pa la sogs pa thams cad 'byung ste/ de ni log par bstan cing
206a5(rgyud 'grel): sgrubs pa zhes bya ste/ sngon du 'gro ba'i sbyang ba gang yang med par dbang dang bskyed rdzogs kyi man ngag bsten du zin kyang rtsa ba med pa'i dbang gis myur du 'jig la nges par chung ngo/ /de bas na de gnyis ni bka' 'das dang gnyis kyi
206a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyu yin pas na/ dz+nyA na sid+d+hi las/ rang nyid kyis lam ma mthong bas/ /ji lta bzhin du gzhan dag 'dren/ /long ba gnyis ni 'grogs gyur na/ /gnyis ka lhung bar the tshom med ces? pa dang/ yang sdig pa can gyi lam de yis/ /bgrod pa
206a7(rgyud 'grel): nyams pa thob par 'gyur zhes pas bla ma dam pa la brten par bya'o/ /spyan? la nyes pa brjod pa dang / byams pa spong pa gnyis ltung ba'i ngo bo gcig la de 'byung pa'i rgyu yang gcig ste/ de'i rgyu ni sngon? du ? mi ? gi lam sbyangs snying rje
206b1(rgyud 'grel): ma sbyangs pas sems can la phan 'dogs pa dang gces par 'dzin pa'i glo? med la / /de'i dbang gis gnod cing smod pa la sogs pa'i rkyen phra mo mi bzod de/ /de'i phyir spun la nyes pa brjod cing sems can la byams pa spong ba des de gnyis
206b2(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo gcig ste gzhan la gnod par 'drangs so/ /byang chub sems spong dang grub pa'i mdza' smod pa gnyis rgyu dang ngo bo gcig ste/ rgyu ni byams pa dang snying rje'i stobs kyi byang chub kyi sems brtan par ma byas par blangs su zin yang mi brtan te/ /
206b3(rgyud 'grel): de yang thams cad la ni lhag pa'i gnas/ /gang du thams cad 'jig pa ste/ /bskal pa bye ba stong du yang/ /yang dag skyed pa'i dge ba che/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa yi/ /bsod nams tshogs ni gsags pas so/ /bskal pa bye bas 'byung ba ni
206b4(rgyud 'grel): skad cig nyid la rnam par 'jig /de bas don de bsrungs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs zhes 'byung bas/ /byang chub sems de spangs ba dang/ /spangs pa'i tshad dang/ de'i nyes pa'o/ /spangs pa ni gsum ste/ bla ma la brten nas
206b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ spun la brten nas dang/ sems can la brten nas spong pa'o/ /tshad ni rten gsum po de la brten nas nyon mongs pa'i bsam pas g.yo sgyu la sogs pas nyid tshan cha ci rigs par 'das pa'o/ /dge pa'i rtsa ba rtsed nas 'byin pa ni nyes
206b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ gzhan gyi byang chub kyi sems kyi bar chang byas na yang nyes pa che bar shes par bya'o/ /de la rang gi theg pa ni theg pa chen po gnyis so/ /gzhan ni nyan thos kyi'o/ /smod pa ni gong ma ltar mi sbyong zhing smod pa ste /rang mig nas shing gzhan mi
206b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzud pa'o/ /gsang ba sgrogs pa dang phung bo smod pa gnyis rgyu dang ngo bo gcig ste/ rim gyis ma sbyangs pa'i phyir snod du ma gyur pa la gsang ba'i don grub par gnas pa'i don lta ba rnam pa gnyis la sogs pa bstan pas / phung po lha yi bdag nyid la sogs
207a1(rgyud 'grel): pa skyed pa'i go rim spong pas rgyu dang ngo bo gcig go /de yang lha yi gzugs ni bsgoms pa la/ /sems kyi brtson pa dag la ni/ /glegs bam tsam yang bstan pa ni/ /sbyin par mi bya shes bya ste/ /rdo rje ye shes rab
207a2(rgyud 'grel): spong pas/ /rmongs pa dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de yi dmyal ba'i rgyur gyur pas/ /mi de 'ang dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de dang bdag gzhan 'phung ba ni/ /'byung bar nges par bsrungs par bya zhes so/ /chos la yid gnyis za ba dang//
207a3(rgyud 'grel): sdug la byams sems gnyis rgyu dang ngo bo gcig ste/ /de yang sems can thams cad rang bzhin dag pa 'od gsal dang zung 'jug gi rang bzhin du gcig pa la/ de gnyis la the tshom za ste/ 'khor ba dang zhi ba'i phyag rgya chen po zung du ma
207a4(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa'i dbang gis gdugs pa can de gnod cing dmod pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi rkyen du byung ba la rdeg pa la sogs pa drag shul gyi sbyor bas phan pa ma yin par bsgrubs pas rgyu dang ngo bo gcig go /ming sogs bral ba'i chos la der rtog
207a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /dang ldan sems sun 'byin pa rgyu dang ngo bo gcig ste/ ming la sogs pa bral ba ni grub pa'i gnas pa'i don nam mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin 'od gsal ba la dngos po dang mtshan mar brtags pa'i rgyus de la dad pa'i sems can dbang
207a6(rgyud 'grel): po rab dang ldan pa rnams sun 'byin te / ma zhugs pa la mi 'jug la zhugs pa bzlog cing brtan par mi byed pas so/ /dam tshig mi bsten pa dang shes rab smod pa gnyis kyang / bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i dam tshig mi sten pa ni shes rab smod
207a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyu yin te/ de la spong pa nyid de spong ba'i rgyu'o/ /des na dang por bla ma grub pa thob pa'i tshig gi nyams dang ldan pa brtags la legs par blang gi gzhan du ni ma yin no/ /des na /bla ma dang ni slob ma dag /mtshungs par dam tshig nyams gyur pas//
207b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' pos dang por slob dpon dang/ /slob ma'i 'brel pa brtags par bya zhes pas so/ /de ltar ltung ba de rnams las 'das pa na nyes pa bstan pa ni slob dpon la smod pa de zhes pa ni mtshon pa'i don te/ /ltung ba gzhan la nyes pa 'dra par?  shes
207b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba'i lci yang ni yod de / de'i nyes pa ni yams dang zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcang pa gcig go /rgyal po me dang zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig go /de'i phyir na ma yang chigs su bcad pa gsum mo/ /gal te bsam pa'i sgo nas nyams na bla
207b3(rgyud 'grel): ma'i spyan sngar maN+Dal la sogs pas mchod la nyes pa ming gis bshags te phyis bsdam zhing bla ma la sangs rgyas kyi blo nyis 'gyur du bslab ste /de'i phan yon bstan pa'i phyir bla ma la ni zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig go /de bzhin du
207b4(rgyud 'grel): ltung ba lhag ma rnams kyang bsam pa'i bye brag gis bskad par bya'o/ /des na /dang por bla ma legs par brtag cing legs par bsten la de nas snod du sgrub par gsol ba gdab/ /nges kyang rjes su brtse ba'i sgo nas snod du bsgrubs te/ dang po
207b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs dang /lha dang bla ma la brten du gzhugs so/ /de nas thun mong ba'i skyabs 'gro la brten la/ so sor thar pa'i sdom pa brtan du gzhug /de nas khyad par gyi skyabs 'gro la brten nas byang chub kyi sems brtan du
207b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhug /de nas 'jug pa'i sdom pa lags par byin la dbang bzhi'i sgo nas lta spyod sgom gsum gyi rtogs pa sgrub bo/ /de nas rtogs pa dang mthun pa'i lam la sbyar te/ de yang dang po bskyed pa'i rim pa dang sbyar te/ de yang bskyed pa'i rim pa'i
207b7(rgyud 'grel): dus su bla ma dang lha tha mi dad pa la tshogs bsags pas ltung ba dang po brgyu spangs/ /go rim de rnams dbang po rab kyi chos thams cad zung 'jug tu rtogs pa sgrub pa'i thabs su shes par bya'o/ /'bring dang tha mas tha ma la pa'i rtog pa bzlog pa'i thabs su
208a1(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya pa'i phyir byin ci ma log pas ltung ba gnyis pa dang bdun pa dang brgya ? dang drug pa dang bcu gnyis pa'i ? snying rje byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa dang thun mong ma/
208a2(rgyud 'grel): yin pa'i lam rnal 'byor dang bdag dang gnas bsrung pas ltung ba gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang lnga pa dang dgu pa dang bcu pa'i rgyu spangs/ de nas rdzogs pa'i ? la brten nas chos thams cad 'od gsal du rtogs pa bsgrubs nas bdud rtsi lnga la
208a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i dam tshig brten pas bcu gsum pa dang bcu bzhi pa dang bcu gcig pa'i rgyu spangs / yang na lha la gsang ba dang shes rab dang bzhi pa spangs pas bcu bzhi pa dang bcu gsum pa'i rgyu spangs?/ de ltar na bcu bzhi po rnams mnyam
208a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhag gi las kyi rim pa la 'dus pas rjes kyis kyang de'i bdag nyid du bya dgos pa'i nges pa bskyed cing brtan par bya'o/ /dngos bzhi'i dbang du byas nas ltung ba re re la ltung pa'i ngos 'dzin dang/ rkyen gang gis byung ba dang / nyes pa dang /tshul
208a5(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar mi 'byin pa'i thabs so/ /bde gshegs bka' ni 'khor ba'i nyes pa nas byas shes dang/ byas gzo dang / byams dang snying rje dang 'jug pa'i sdom pa'i bar du bar? brten par bya ba dang/ khyad par can dbang rnams pa bzhis snod du bspungs nas lta
208a6(rgyud 'grel): ba la sogs pa'i man ngag ni bde gshegs kyi bka' o/ /'das pa ni ma gus pa dang /bag med pa dang / mi shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa mang pa'i dbang gis so/ /nges na bla ma'i spyan sngar dam bcas pa brtan par mi byed par nyin mtshan gyi
208a7(rgyud 'grel): cha 'das pa ni ltung ba'o/ /rkyen ni ma dang po la sogs pa bzhi'o/ /nyes pa ni sngar yams dang zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi ste/ bla ma'i skabs su bka' las 'das pa dang shes rab smod pa zhes re re la sbyar/ /mi 'gyur? pa'i thabs ni bla mas bstan
208b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lam dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis mar me dang chu'i rgyun ltar yid la bya'o/ /spun ni sbyor ba gcig pa dang de las gzhan pa dang sems can mdza' dag go /nyes la brjod pa'i yul la brda phrad cing nyin mtshan gyi sum cha 'das na ltung
208b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /rkyen ni yul gsum po gang yang dung bas sems dang mthun par ma byas pa dang/ mi byed pa'i dbang gis zhe sdang dang phrag dog gam nyon mongs pa gang yang dung ba dang mtshungs par khro ba'o/ /mi 'byin pa'i thabs ni khro ba'i rkyen nye bar
208b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i tshe byas pa shes pa la sogs pa byams pa yid la bya ba dang/ yang na chos thams cad skye med du yid la bya pa'o /byams pa ni byas pa shes pa'i sgo nas sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa'o/ /spong ba ni phan pa ma
208b4(rgyud 'grel): yin par bsgrubs pas nyin mtshan gyi cha 'das na ltung ba'o/ /rkyen ni gong ma ltar yul gsum la brten nas bdag gi bsam pa dang mthun par mi byed pa dang/ /ma byas pa'i dbang gis phan pa ma yin pa sgrub cing spong pa'o/ /mi 'byung
208b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thabs ni rkyen nye bar gnas pa'i dus su de la ched du gtang pa'i tshul gyis byams pa yid la bya ba 'am zung du 'jug pa shes par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi sems ni sems can gyi don du rdo rje 'chang 'dod pa'o/ /de spong ba ni yul gyi dbang
208b6(rgyud 'grel): gis gsum ste/ /bla ma dang rdo rje spun dang sems can la g.yo sgyu spyad pas yon tan thob par bya snyam? pa dang/ don dor bar nyin mtshan gyi cha 'das pa'o/ rkyen ni snga ma ltar ro/ /mi 'byin pa'i thabs ni mi mthun pa'i rkyen nye bar gnas pa'i
208b7(rgyud 'grel): dus su phan yon dang nyes dmigs shes pas byang chub kyi sems bsgom par bya'o/ /yang na skye ba med pa yid la bya'o/ /rang gi grub pa'i mdza' ni theg pa chen po rnam pa gnyis so/ /gzhan gyi ni nyan thos dang bse ru'o/ /he badzra 'dus pa'i le'u ltar rim 
209a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis mi sbyong bar smod pas nyin mtshan 'das pa'o/ /rkyen ni bla ma dam tshig nyams dang bral ba rnams dang/ phrad pas lam rim gyis spyod pa rnams la smod cing khro ba'o/ /mi 'byin pa'i thabs ni blo rim gyis brlabs pas
209a2(rgyud 'grel): theg pa gcig tu shes par bya'o/ /yongs su ma smin pa ni lam rim gyis ma sbyangs pa'o/ /gsang ba ni grub pa gnas pa'i don nam mkha' dang 'dra bar lta ba gnyis so/ /sgrogs pa ni lus dag gi sbyor bas nyin mtshan 'das na'o/ /rkyen ni ma
209a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs pa dang phrad pa'i dbang gis so/ /mi 'byin pa'i thabs ni yul de lta bu dang brad pa na blo'i bye brag gris nas de dang mthun par bya'o/ /phung po smod pa ni bskyed pa'i go rim mdza' dag bzung ngo/ /smod pa ni de bsgom par nyin mtshan 'das na'o//
209a4(rgyud 'grel): rkyen ni zab mo ston pa'i lung dang yongs su 'dzin pa ngan pa las so/ /mi 'byin pa'i thabs ni lha sgom pa'o/ /rang gzhin dag pa ni lta ba gnyis so/ /som nyi za ba ni de gnyis kyi rtogs pa ma skyes pa'o/ /de'i bdag nyid du rtogs pa med par nyin
209a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan 'das na'o/ /rkyen bla ma dam pa dang bral bas dngos por lta ba'i dbang gis so/ /mi 'byin pa'i thabs ni bla ma dam pa'i dag la brten nas lta ba goms par bya'o/ /gdag pa can ni mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams so/ /bdag la gnod pa'i
209a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang gis zhe sdang gis bslad nas phan pa ma yin pa drag po byed pas nyin mtshan 'das na'o/ /rkyen ni nyes par byas pa'i dbang gis so/ /mi 'byin pa'i habs ni bzod pa bsgom pa ste bdud phyir bzlog pa'i lung las shes par bya'o/ /ming
209a7(rgyud 'grel): sogs bral ba'i chos ni 'od gsal ba dang zung du 'jug pa'o/ /de rtog pa ni de gnyis kyi rang bzhin dang mi mthun par gzhan bu ? pas nyin mtshan 'das pa'o/ /rkyen ni dge pa'i gshes gnyen dang ma ? pa'o/ /mi 'byin pa'i thabs ni
209b1(rgyud 'grel): de'i gdams pa las so/ /dang ldan ni lam rim gyis ma sbyangs kyang grub par gnas pa'i don la 'dod pa'o/ /sun ba byin pa ni ma bstan pa dang log par bstan pas so/ /rkyen ni mos pa'i gang zag dang phrad pas so/ /mi 'byin pa'i thabs ni
209b2(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa dang sbyar te chos bstan pa'o/ /dam tshig ni bza' ba'i dam tshig bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'o/ /mi ston pa ni mi gtsang ba'i blos dor te dus 'das pa'o/ /rkyen ni rdzas nye bar gnas pa'o/ /mi 'byin pa'i thabs ni mi rtog pa'i sems
209b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis so/ /nyes pa 'di rnams lci yang yod kyang gnod pa ni 'dra'o/ /ci'i phyir zhe na rtsa ba'i ltung ba yin pas so/ /sngags pas 'di dag spangs nas ni/ /dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni spang bya spangs pa'i yon tan no/ /gzhan
209b4(rgyud 'grel): du dam tshig las nyams na/ /nyams pas bdud kyis bzung bar 'gyur/ /de nas sdug bsngal myong 'gyur zhing/ /thur du ltas te dmyal bar 'gro zhes bya ba ni nyams pa'i nyes pa mdor bsdus pa'o/ /de bas nga rgyal bcom nas ni/ /bdag
209b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid ma 'khrul shes par bya/ /zhes pa ni bag bya ba la bslab pa'o/ /dbang bskur nas ltung ba bcu bzhi pa dang bla ma lnga bcu gang 'dod pa'i sgrub thabs dag ni don rgyas par ston pa yin pas nges par nan tan gyis bslabs te gzhan du na bla ma'i
209b6(rgyud 'grel): nyes pa'o/ /de ltar bcu bzhi po bsdun gsum ste/ /thun mong gi byang chub kyi sems mi nyams par byed pa dang/ khyad par gyi byang chub kyi sems mi nyams par byed pa dang/ de gnyis ka mi nyams par byed pa'o/ /ltung ba dang po dang gnyis pa ni/
209b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ka ma nyams par byed pa'o/ /spun la dang byams srod dang/ byang chub sems 'dor dang/ grub pa'i mdza' smod pa dang/ gdugs pa byams pa spong ba ste/ lnga po de dag ni thun mong gi sems mi nyams par byed pa ste/ de bsan 'bad pas bsrung ngo
210a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang bsgrogs pa dang/ phung po smod pa dang/ dag pa'i chos la yid gnyis dang/ ming sogs bral la ded rtog dang/ sems sun 'byin pa dang/ dam tshig mi bsten pa dang/ shes rab smod pa de rnams
210a2(rgyud 'grel): spangs pas khyad par gyi byang chub kyi sems mi nyams par byed pa'o/ /yang de ni lta spyod bsgom gsum gyi rang bzhin yang yin te/ chos la yid gnyis dang/ ming sogs bral la der rtog spangs pas lta ba rnams nyid rtogs pa'o//
210a3(rgyud 'grel): dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang lnga pa dang drug pa dang bdun pa dang brgyad pa bcu pa'i dgu spangs pas bsgom pa'i man ngag dang/ sems sun 'byin pa dang/ dam tshig mi sten pa dang/ shes rab smod pa gsum
210a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi dgu spangs shing sbyangs pas spyod pa'o/ /de gsum ma spangs par bsgoms pas bka' 'das dang/ bla ma brnyas pa ma spangs pa yin no/ /debas na bcu dang lnga bcu pa nan tan yang dang yang du bya ste dngos grub thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin
210a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir ro/ /nyams na nyes pa thams cad kyang 'byung ngo/ /de lta ma yin par sngags tshig tsam gyis man ngag bstan nas/ bla mar khas 'che ba ltung ba'i snang du bsgrubs na ni dge ba'i rgyu byas pa bas/ /mi dge ba'i bdag po'i rkyen zhes bya/
210a6(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa'i grogs po dang bdud sdig can dang/ slu bar byed pa zhes bya ste skyon mang du mi brjod do/ /da lta bu'i bla ma dang slob ma de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi phung po rnams brnyed pa dang bskur sti'i rgyur bsgrubs pas ngan song
210a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrub ba'i thabs dang rkyen des dug dang bdud rtsi 'dres pa dang 'dra'o/ /de bas na bla ma dam pa bsten pa gces par rdo rje 'char chen pos gsungs so/ /dam pa'i grogs dang bla ma dang/ /ma brang srid par 'khyams pa las/ phan phyir bla ma'i lung bzhin du/
