232b6(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa byas pa rnams/ bka' sogs bslus te shin tu lci/ /blun pos sdig pa lci ba min/ /rang bzhin blun pa nyid kyis so/ /zhes bya ba yang mkhas pas bka' bslus pa dang/ khyad du bsad pas lci bar shes par bya'o/ /de'i phyir don du mi gnyer ba ni ltung
232b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /gzhan yang sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig thun bzhi'i rim pas / sku'i dam tshig ni lha'i rnam par bsgoms pa dang/ gsung gi dam tshig ni sngags kyi grangs dang / thugs kyi dam tshig ni bden pa gnyis kyi tshul gyis/ me rtog pa dang gzhan yang rtsa'i 
233a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul 'khor mi bsgom pa'o/ /gzhan yang 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa lnga'i rang bzhin shes par byas te/ mi sbyang ba dang/ rnam par snang mdzad dang/ dri chu la sogs pa bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga'i rang bzhin shes
233a2(rgyud 'grel): par byas te/ sbar sdud la sogs pa sbyangs nas mi bstan par 'dor ba dang/ gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis nas/ chu ser la sogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems rnams bsten par mi byed cing 'dor ba dang/ gzhan yang yan
233a3(rgyud 'grel): lag gi dam tshig mang du bshad pa rnams bstan par mi byed pa dang/ rtog pa dang bral zhing mnyam pa nyid kyi don rtogs te/ blang ba dang dor ba med pa'i dam tshig la mi gnas pa'o/ /de dag las 'da' bar byed pa ni ltung ba'o/ /yan lag dus dngos
233a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhir 'gyur ba yang shes par bya'o/ /sdar ba ni bshad zin pa dang 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams kyi dam tshig nyams par 'gyur pa dang/ ldang pa yang de nyid las shes par bya'o/ /yul dang bsam pa dang dus dang rkyan? gyi bye brag gis nyes pa dang
233a5(rgyud 'grel): nyes pa med pa yang shes par bya'o/ /ltung ba bcu gsum pa'i bshad pa'o// //de ni ltung ba bcu bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste/ shes rab rang bzhin bud med la/ /smos par byed pa bcu bzhi pa/ zhes bya ba smos ste/ shes
233a6(rgyud 'grel): rab kyi rang bzhin ni sangs rgyas kyi yul shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ste/ /de yang gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gis dus su bzung ba dang/ rig pa'i brtul zhugs nye bar bsten pa la bya ste/ de dag kyang khyad par dang bye brag gi dbye ba yang shes
233a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /yan lag dus dngos bzhir 'gyur ba dang/ yul dang bsam pa dang dus dang rkyen gyi bye brag gis nyes pa dang lci yang dang nyes pa med pa la sogs pa yang shes par bya'o/ /ldang ba ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pas so/ /?
233b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ba ni bud med thams cad de phyogs su bsdu pa'o/ /bshags pa'i tshad kyang yan lag gi nyes pa'i tshang ngo/ /ltung ba bcu bzhi pa'i bshad pa'o/ /de dag nye bar bsdus te bshad pa/ /sngags pas de dag spangs na ni/ /dngos grub myur du 'thob? par 'gyur//
233b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du dam tshig nyams pas na/ nyams pas bdud kyis bzung bar 'gyur/ /de nas sdugs sngal myong 'gyur zhing/ /thur du bltas te dmyal par 'gro/ /de bas nga rgyal bcom nas ni/ /bdag nyid dang ldan gus pa dang/ /ma 'khrul bas ni gzung
233b3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /gal te nyams na bla ma la/ /phul la sogs pas dri ma 'dag /bdag nyid gzhan la phan 'dod pas/ /bla ma dkon mchog mchod byas shing/ gsum la skyabs 'gro nas brtsams te/ /bsod nams tshogs ni nyer bsags nas/ /byang chub
233b4(rgyud 'grel): sems la sogs pa yis/ /sdom pa thams cad gzung bar bya zhes pa la sogs pas bshad de/ /de dag kyang tshig gnyis kyis phan yon bstan pa dang tshig bshad gcig gi sa dam tshig las nyams pa'i nyes dmigs bstan pa dang /tshig bshad
233b5(rgyud 'grel): phyed kyis bdag nyid gus pa dang ldan pas ma 'khrul pas dam tshig gzung bar bya'o/ /zhes bstan pa'o/ /tshig rkang gnyis kyis ni dri ma las ldang bar bstan to/ /tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis kyis ni bla ma dang dkon mchog mchod cing tshogs de
233b6(rgyud 'grel): nye bar gzung zhing/ dam tshig dang sdom pa gzung bar bstan to/ /'di dag ni bsdus pa'i don no// //yan lag gi don yang/ thabs dang shes rab dang/ /de kho na nyid bcu dang/ rgyu dang 'bras du dang/ thabs kyi de kho na nyid do/ /tshul
233b7(rgyud 'grel): bdun dang/ bskyed rdzogs gnyis dang/ bsnyen bsgrub kyi bye brag gis bdag dang/ gzhan gyi don bya bar 'dod pa ni sngags pa ste/ de lta bus dam tshig gi dri ma spangs pa ni snod du gyur pa ste/ mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'o/ /gzhan
234a1(rgyud 'grel): du dam tshig las nyams na ni/ /tshe 'di la yang bdud kyis gzung ste/ sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur la/ phyi ma la yang rdo rje dmyal ba la sogs par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag la sogs pa'i tshad ni gong du bstan pas 'dir
234a2(rgyud 'grel): ma bstan to/ /de bas na bdag nyid ma 'khrul bar rtag tu dam tshig rnams rjes su gzung bar bya'o/ /gal te nyams na yang bla ma la phul pa dang bshags pa'i tshad rnams kyis dri ma las ldang bar bya'o/ /bdag nyid la phan par 'dod pas/ dkon  
234a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog gsum la sogs pa la/ /skyabs su 'gro ba nas brtsams te / bsod nams kyi tshogs nye bar bsag par bya'o/ /byang chub sems kyi sdom pa la sogs te sdom pa thams cad gzung bar bya'o/ /rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi pa'i rgya
234a4(rgyud 'grel): cher bshad pa'i nye bar bsdus pa'i bshad pa'o// //da ni yan lag gi nyes pa bshad par 'dod nas/ /he ru ka dang slod? dpon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes pa ni mchod par brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang
234a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'i he ru ka dang bla ma tha mi dang la phyag 'tshal ba'i don to/ /rab tu bde ba 'phrog par byed/ /yan lag gnyis pa bdag gis bshad/ ces bya ba ni/ rab tu bde ba 'phrog par byed pa ni
234a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhi dam tshig las bde ba thams cad skyed pa'o/ /yan lag nyes pa de yis bshad/ ces pa ni yan lag gi dngos gzhi ma rdzogs pa'o/ /yan lag gi gtso bo tsam yod pa ni sbom po'o/ /bshags pa dus 'das pa ni lci ba'o/ /gzhan du ni nyes
234a7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang phra mo'o/ /nyes pa med pa yang shes par bya'o/ /de dag bye brag du phye bas na/ nga yis bshad pa'o/ /de nyid bshad par 'dod nas/ dam tshig dang mi ldan pa'i/ /rig ma bsten par dga' ba dang zhes bya ba smos te/ dam tshig dang mi ldan pa
234b1(rgyud 'grel): ni dbang ma thob pa dang /? pa bdag nyid lam dang pa dang/ sku gsung thugs kyi rig ma'i lo grangs dang mtshan nyid dang mi ldan pa'o/ /ldan yang chags pas nye bar bsten zhing mya ngan las 'das pa la mi dga' ba la sogs sten par byed
234b2(rgyud 'grel): na yan lag gi nyes pa'o/ /dri ma las ldang ba ni tshogs la bshags pa ste/ /dam tshig dang ldan pa la rjes su bslab pa'o/ /shan 'dra ba ni phyogs su bsdu pa'o/ /yan lag gi nyes pa dang po bshad pa'o// //
234b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa bshad par 'dod nas/ tshogs kyi 'khor lor brtsod pa ni/ /yan lag nyes pa gnyis par bshad/ ces pa ni/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang/ dpa' bo'i ston mo dang/ tshogs kyi nang du rtsod pa ste/ stan de nyid la zhi ba ni yan lag
234b4(rgyud 'grel): gi nyes pa'o/ /dus las 'das pa ni sdom po'o/ /gzhan du nyes byas dang phra mo'o/ /ldang ba ni de nyid la bshags shing nyes pa'i rim pas tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs kyi dri ma las ldang ngo/ /shan 'dra ba ni phyogs su bsdu pa'o/ /zhing dang bsam
234b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khyad par las kyang shes par bya'o/ /nyes pa med pa yang shes par bya'o/ /yan lag gi nyes pa gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o// //yan lag gi nyes pa gsum pa bshad par 'dod nas/ /ma gsungs pa yi rig ma las/ /sngags
234b6(rgyud 'grel): pas bdud rtsi thob byed pa/ /yan lag nyes pa gsum pa yin/ /zhes bya bas bshad de/ ma gsungs la ni rmod pa'o/ /de las bdud rtsi lnga 'thob par byed pa ni yan lag gi nyes pa'o/ /bshags pa tshang las 'das pa lci ba'o/ /nyes pa phra mo dang nyes pa med pa
234b7(rgyud 'grel): yang shes bar bya'o/ /ldang ba ni tshogs pa la bshags te/ /dam tshig dang ldan pa'i bdud rtsi bsten par bya'o/ /gsungs pa'i rjes su 'jug par bya'o/ /yan lag gi nyes pa gsum pa'i bshad pa'o/ /da ni yan lag gi nyes pa bzhi pa bshad par bya ste/
235a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang chos yan lag shes gyur yang/ /gzhan la mi ston shes rab ngan/ /yan lag nyes pa bzhi pa yin/ zhes bya ba smos te/ 'dod pa'i bsam pas gsang pa'i chos shes kyang/ gzhan la ston par mi byed na/ yan
235a2(rgyud 'grel): lag gi nyes pa sbom po'o/ /bshags pa dus 'das pa ni lci ba'o/ /nyes pa dang phra mo dang nyes pa med pa yang shes par bya'o/ /ldang ba ni dam pa gcig la bshags te cig la phan 'dogs pa la bya'o/ /yan lag gi nyes pa bzhi pa'i bshad
235a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// /da ni yan lag gi nyes pa lnga pa bshad par 'dod nas/ dang pas sems can chos kyi rgyu/ /gzhan gyi gtam byed byang chub sems/ /yan lag nyes pa lnga pa yin/ zhes bya ba smos te/ dad pa dang ldan pa'i sems can chos
235a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyu /byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i gtam 'drin/ chags pa'i dbang gyis bre mo'i gtam la sbyor par byed na yan lag gi nyes pa sbom po'o/ /bshags pa dus 'das pa ni lci pa'o/ /nyes pa dang phra mo dang nyes pa med pa yang shes par
235a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /ldang pa ni maN+Dal cig sngon du 'gro bas dam gcig la bshags par bya'o/ /bsdam zhing rjes su gzung bar bya'o/ /yan lag gi nyes pa lnga pa'i bshad pa'o// //da ni yan lag gi nyes pa drug pa bshad par 'dod nas/
235a6(rgyud 'grel): nyan thos nang du zhag bdun 'das/ yan lag nyes pa drug pa yin/ zhes bya ba smos te/ nyan thos ni gang zag la bdag med pa tsam rtogs shing/ lus dag gi bslab pa las gnas nas rang gi don gyi mya ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer zhing/ /
235a7(rgyud 'grel): zab mo'i don gyi 'jigs pa ni nyan thos so/ /de'i nang du zhag bdun 'das te rang gi spyod pa mi byed na yan lag gi nyes pa spom po'o/ /bshags pa dus 'das pa lci ba'o/ /nyes pa phra mo dang nyes pa med pa yang shes par bya'o/ /dri ma las ldang ba ni
235b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa las bshags te/ rjes su bslab pa'o/ /yul dang bsam pa dang dus 'das phra mo dang nyes byas dang/ nyes pa med pa yang shes par bya'o/ /yan lag gi nyes pa drug pa'i bshad pa'o// //da ni yan lag gi nyes pa bdun pa bshad
235b2(rgyud 'grel): par 'dod nas/ rnal 'byor ye shes mi shes par/ /da ni sngags pa yin zer ba/ /yan lag nyes pa bdun pa yin/ zhes smos te/ rnal 'byor ye shes ni gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid mi shes pa ste/ sgra tsam la mngon par zhen pas ni sngags pa'o
235b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis rlom sems pa ni yan lag gi nyes pa sbom po'o/ /bshegs pa dus 'das pa ni lci ba'o/ /nyes pa phra me dang nyes pa med pa yang shes par bya'o/ /ldang ba ni maN+Dal? cig tsam sngon du 'gro bas dam pa gcig gi
235b4(rgyud 'grel): mdun du bshags par bya ba dang / phyis bsdam zhing yang dag pa'i don la 'jug par bya'o/ /yan lag gi nyes pa bdun pa'i bshad pa'o// //da ni yan lag gi nyes pa brgyad pa bshad par 'dod nas/ snod min sems can
235b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la/ /phyi yi chos 'chang byed pa las/ /gsang ba'i chos rnams 'chad pa ni/ /yan lag nyes pa brgyad pa yin zhes bya ba smos te/ 'di yang rkyen du mi 'tshams pa'i gang zag la/ dus ma yin par 'dod pa'i bsam pas bshad na/ yan
235b6(rgyud 'grel): lag gi nyes pa sbom po'o/ /bshags pa dus las 'das na lci pa'o/ /nyes pa phra mo dang nyes pa med pa yang shes par bya'o/ /yul dang bsam pa dang dus dang/ rkyen gyi dbang las nyes pa lci yang dang/ nyes pa med pa yang shes par bya'o/ /dri
235b7(rgyud 'grel): ma las ldang ba ni tshogs pas ldang ba'o/ /'di dag thams cad shan 'dra ba ni phyogs su bsdu pa'o/ /khyad par gyi dgag pa med pa ni ltung ba bdun pa'i bshad pa las shes par bya'o/ /'di rnam yan lag nyes pa ste bskal pa mang por
236a1(rgyud 'grel): dmyal bar skye/ zhes bya ba smos te yan lag gi nyes pa gcig po gsum ma bshags par dus 'das na bskal pa mang por dmyal bar 'gro'o/ /de'i phyir 'jigs pa dang bcas pa ste/ mi nyams par bya zhing/
236a2(rgyud 'grel): nyams na yang 'byor pa ci yod pas dri ma las ldang bar bya'o/ /yan lag gi nyes pa brgyad pa'i bshad pa'o/ /rgyud gzhan las ltung pa'i mtshan nyid gzhan bshad pa yang brjod par bya ste/ rang lha blang dor ltung ba mig /de nyid dus 'das
236a3(rgyud 'grel): ri bong can/ /lha gzhan dga' ba yon tan no/ /rig byed dngos la zhen pa yin/ /ma rdzogs rdzogs byed mda' yin no/ /'jig rten chos phyir dbang po'o/ /khyad du gsod pa yang ni ri/ /gong min tshul ston bkra shis so/ /'phrin las ma rtogs
236a4(rgyud 'grel): gza' zhes grags/ /don med gnas pa phyogs yin no/ /brtse ba gtong ba drag po ste/ /dman pa'i spyod pa nyi ma'o/ /zang zing rtog pa yan leg go /yongs su mi 'dzin sa zhes bya/ /rang spyod dor ba chos zhes bya ba smos te/ de dag kyang yan lag
236a5(rgyud 'grel): du dang ldan pas nyes par 'gyur pa yang gong du bstan pa las shes par bya'o/ /de dag kyang rim pa bzhin du bshad par bya ste/ mig ni gnyis so/ /rang lha dor ba ni yi dam spong ba'o/ /de lam gus pa la sogs pa gnyis su brtags ste bla dor
236a6(rgyud 'grel): ni ltung ba'o/ /thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang/ /yang na rtog ge pa rnams kyis rang gi 'dod pa'i lha la dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po la sogs pa bzhugs pa snang ste / gzhan yang mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba mchog gyi rgyud la dgongs nas/
236a7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lus la bsdus nas/ byin gyis brlabs na khyad par du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bshad pas phyogs 'di lta bus kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo 'pho ba la sogs pa yang tshul de nyid
236b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis shes par bya'o/ /dbang dang mi ldan pa la ldang ba'i dus na me tog bab pa dang/ bla ma'i rjes su mos pa dang/ thabs khyad par can thob pa dang/ las gzhon dang 'brel ba'i dus rnams su nyes pa med do/ /thams cad du mnyam pa nyid rtogs mnyes
236b2(rgyud 'grel): pa med do/ /gzhan du nyes pa dang bcas pa'o/ /ri bong can ni zla ba ste/ gcig ces bya'o/ /de nyid dus 'das pa ni nyin dang mtshan mo 'das pa ste/ lha la lus dang ngag dang yid kyis mchod pa dang yon tan gzung ba la sogs pa ma byas pa'o/ /le lo dang
236b3(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa la sogs pas/ lan gnyis gnyis kyis bskang pa'o/ /bla ma'i bya ba dang na ba la nyes pa med do/ /yon tan ni gsum mo/ /lha gzhan ni mu stegs kyi lha rten la sogs pa'o/ /mchod cing phyag byed pa'o/ /bla ma la sogs pa bdun du byas nas
236b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan 'dul ba dang/ srogs la bab pa dang/ chad pa la sogs pa 'gal bar 'gyur na nyes pa med do/ /rig byed ni bzhi'o/ /dngos la zhen pa ni sgyu ma lta bur mi shes par dngos po thing? zug du dkyil 'khor la sogs pa sgom pa'o/ /dmigs pa 'dzin
236b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ brtas par byed pa la nyes pa med do/ /mda' ni lnga'o/ /ma rdzogs pa ni bdag smin par ma byas pa'o/ /rdzogs par ni gzhan smin par byed pa'o/ /rang rdzogs nas gzhan rdzogs par byed pa la nyes pa med do/ /dbang po ni drug ste/ 'jig rten
236b6(rgyud 'grel): chos ni tshe 'di tsam gyi don du zab mo la zhugs te phyi ma la sogs pa gzhan gyi don du byang chub 'dod pa'o/ /gtsor byas pa las zhar la rgyas pa la nyes pa med do/ /ri ni bdun no/ /khyad du gsod pa ni bslab pa 'og ma dang nyes byas la sogs pa'i dam tshig
236b7(rgyud 'grel): mi srung pa'o/ /gong ma dang 'gal ba dang / yar ldan pa dang/ na ba la nyes pa med do/ /bkra shis ni brgyad do / /gong min tshul ston pa ni gzhan dad par byas nas/ rnyed pa la sogs pa don du gnyer ba ste/ shes bzhin ? yon tan dang ldan par bstan pa'o//
237a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul pa dang gdul bya mthong ba dang/ ma rtogs pa la nyes pa med do/ /gza' ni dgu'o/ /phrin las ma rtogs pa ni zhib? la sogs pa sbran? du snyen pa ma byas par sbyor ba byas pas las gang yang mi 'grub pas/
237a2(rgyud 'grel): skur ba dang the tshom skye ba ste nyes par 'gyur ro/ /'phral du spyad par 'os pa la mthus bstangs pa la nyes pa med pa'o/ /phyogs ? zhes pa ni bcu'o/ /don med gnas pa ni smin par byas nas rkyen drag po med par snyom las dang bcas par dus 'da' bar
237a3(rgyud 'grel): byed pas nyes pa dang bcas pa'o/ /'dul pa dang gzhan dang 'gal ba na nyes pa med pa'o/ /drag po ni bcu gcig pa'o/ /rtse ba gtong pa ni don mthong ba yal bar 'dod ba ste/ nyes pa dang bcas pa'o/ /bdag gis mi nus pa dang/ gzhan yod pa la nyes
237a4(rgyud 'grel): pa med do/ /nyi ma ni bcu gnyis zhes bya ba ste/ dman pa'i spyod pa ni rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig blangs nas gong ma la sgrag nas nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod pa byed pa'o/ /gzhan 'dul ba dang/ kha na ma tho ba spang ba'i phyir dang / dus shes pas spyad
237a5(rgyud 'grel): pa la nyes pa med do/ /yan lag ni yid de bcu gsum mo/ /zang zing rtog pa ni 'jig rten chos la chags na bka' dang 'gal bas gzhan gyi ngor 'jug pa'o/ gdul ba'i thabs dang/ don chen por 'gyur na nyes pa med do/ /sa ni bcu bzhi pa'o/ /yongs su mi
237a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa ni sjom pa zhig pa rnams so/ /de yal bar 'dor ba ni nyes par 'gyur ro/ /rang nyes pa khas len pa dang/ gzhan kyis 'dul ba dang/ 'du shes pa la nyes pa med pa'o/ /tshes zhes bya ba ni bco lnga pa'o/ /rang spyod 'dor ba ni rang gi spyod pa mi byed
237a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ spyod pa de yang rnam pa bzhi ste las dang po pas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa bya bar gsungs te/ rgyud gzhan las kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa gnas skabs gzhan du yang bstan te/ dgongs pa gzhan no/ /cung zad bstan pa thob? nas rig pa'i ?
237b1(rgyud 'grel): zhugs kyi spyod pa ste/ sngags spyod kyis zla drug la sogs par bya bar bshad do/ /brtan pa thob pa rnams kyis mgon po kun tu spyod pa la gnas par bya'o/ /zhes bshad pa'i rgyud chen po las bshad do/ /de nas mnyam gzhag gi spyod pa chen po rang
237b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyis rtog pa dang bral ba gnyis kyi rnam par bral ba ste / de la ni blang ba dang dor? ba'i shes pa las 'das pa'o/ /zhes bshad pa ste/ snod kyi rim pas rgyud sna tshogs la spyod pa'i tshul dpag tu med pa bstan te/ de'i phyir na de rnams kyi dgongs
237b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ snod kyi rim pas rdo rje slob dpon gyis spyod pa'i tshul yang mdza' yas ba de dag gi rim pa dang sbyar te/ sman dang sman pa dang/ nad pa dang nad kyi bye drag gi tshul gyis shes par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pas shes par bya'o/ /'dir rnal 
237b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor gyi lam rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya ste/ rnal 'byor la brten pa dang thabs kyi dam tshig la brten pa'o/ /kha cig dam tshig la brten nas rnal 'byor gyi grol ba yang yod/ kha cig la rnal 'byor la brten nas dam tshig gi grol ba yang yod
237b5(rgyud 'grel): kha cig 'di la dngos grub thob pa yang yod/ /kha cig bar ma dor thob pa yang yod/ kha cig skyes nas thob pa yang yod/ kha cig ni lan grangs gzhan la thob pa yang yod de/ de dag kyang rnal 'byor chen po'i tshul du spyod pa rnams so/ /de bas na las dang
237b6(rgyud 'grel): po pa'i rnal 'byor pas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa kha na ma thob dang bral bas gnas par bya ste/ de yang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud cho ga zhib mo ba rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa dang yang 'gal bar mi byed pa ste/ brtan pa ma thob pa nyams par 'gyur ba dang/ kha na
237b7(rgyud 'grel): mtho bas ma dang par 'gyur ba dang/ mtshan ma'i g.yeng ba sna tshogs su 'gyur bas sdom pa gsum la gnas par bya'o/ /thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud byi? rnal 'byor pas sdom pa gsum ldan la gnas pas kyang rang rang gi cho ga las nyams pa ni las dang
238a1(rgyud 'grel): po pas kyang mi bya'o/ /gzhan du ni khyim pa'i tshul gyis kyang sdom pa rang rang dang mthun pa la gnas par bya'o/ /dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa ni thams cad kyi nang na mchog ste/ de skad du yang /tshogs? kyi 'khor lo'i ?
238a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje slob dpon mkhas shing nus pa dang ldan yang/ dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa slob dpon du mchog go /de med kyang dge tshul gyis bya'o/ /de dag kyang med na khyim pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya'o/ /zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i phyir byang chub sems
238a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gyur nas ni/ lha gzhan la ni mi mos pas/ dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang/ de la gzhol zhing 'bad pa yis/ /gsod dang rku dang 'khrig pa dang/ /rdzun dang chang ni rnam par spangs/ /khyim pa'i tshul du gnas nas ni/ /gsar? sngags?
238a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po rnam par bsgrub/ /gal te de ni rab byung na/ /sdom pa gsum la gnas par bya/ /so sor bar dang/ byang chub sems/ rig 'dzin rang gi sdom pa'o/ /zhes bshad pa'o/ /gzhan yang khyim pa'am rab tu byung yang rung/ brtan pa ma thob par du ni//
238a5(rgyud 'grel): kha na ma tho rdul med par/ /bdud rtsi lnga la rtag tu spyad/ /khrus dang sdom pa sngar spyad med/ /dka' thub kyis kyang mi gdung bar/ /'dod pa thams cad spyad par bya/ /ci bde bar ni gnas nas bsgrub/ /'jig rten ma dad smod 'gyur bas/ de dag nyid kyi
238a6(rgyud 'grel): nyams 'gyur bas/ bskal pa brgyar yang mi 'grub bo/ /rang gi spyod pa ma yin pa/ bslab pa kun dang grong khyer skad/ /de las nyams par mi bya'o/ /zhes bshad pa'i phyir/ las dang po pas rang gi spyod pa'i tshul las ma nyams par sdom pa thams 
238a7(rgyud 'grel): cad la gnas par bya'o/ /de'i phyir sdom pa gsum la gnas pa ni /rnal 'byor chen po'i don la 'jug pa thams cad kyis gnas par bya ste/ khyim pa la sogs pas kyang rang dang mthun pa'i sdom pa gsum la gnas par bya'o/ /de dag las
238b1(rgyud 'grel): dri ma las ldang ba yang bye brag du ldang ba 'am/ tshul gcig la ldang ba las mkhas pas tshul gcig pa'i tshul du ldang bar bya'o/ /de dag las phan tshun 'gal pa yang dus dang gang zag? gi nus pa dang bsam pas mi 'gal par shes par bya ste/
238b2(rgyud 'grel): yul dang rkyen dang gdul bya dag shes par bya'o/ /de'i phyir/ chags bcas nor bu 'das pa dang/ rin thang tshang ba thob blo ldan/ /shes bzhin mi gzhan bsang ba dang/ mi chos bla ma ra rgyal byed/ khu ba 'byin la sogs pa rnams/ /chos 'dul
238b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dir ni rtsa ba chad/ /bdag stong gzhan la smod sogs kyi/ /pha ma 'dra'i nyes pa byas pa rnams/ /tshul bzhin gnas pas rab tu bsten/ /bla ma la sogs gnod byed bsad/ /dge mthong dbang sogs brtul shugs dus/ /gzhan gyi bur
238b4(rgyud 'grel): med spyad par bya/ /sems can don mthong chos rnams brdzun/ /'phags nor ser sna can nor phrogs/ /chos 'dul ba las rtsa ba 'chad/ /gzhan du sems dge thabs chen ldan/ /brtan pa ma thob par du yang/ /sdom gsum ldan pas 'jug
238b5(rgyud 'grel): mi bya/ bde ba 'dzin nus pa yin par/ /gzhan yang 'jug pa ma yin no/ /de stsogs bye brag tshul gnas kun/ /mkhas pas rang gis phye la dpyod/ /bstan la gnod pa 'jig pa rnams/ /dang po 'jig rten gnod sogs spang zhes bshad pa ste/
238b6(rgyud 'grel): de bas na brtan pa thob pa dang/ gzhan gyi don khyad par du nus pa dang/ dgon pa chen po dang/ du khrod la gnas pa dang / dgongs pa mdza' dag gi don shes pas dus la mkhas par byas te/ /bag yangs su gnas par bya pa dang/ spyod pa khyad par
238b7(rgyud 'grel): can la 'jug par bya'o/ /de'i phyir dang po bdud rtsi bsams te bza' / /yang na dri bsad rims kyis bslab/ /gzhan du 'bar 'bud bdud rtsi mthong/ /rtog dang bral ba mchog yin no/ /thams cad mkhas 'dra bdud rtsi yin/ /nyon mongs rigs shes mkhas
239a1(rgyud 'grel): pas so/ /bsad dang gso bar nus pa dang/ /'gugs dang mi snang sped shes pas/ /sngags kyi rtul zhugs spyad pa'o/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pas spyad par bya ba'i rim pa yang las dang po pas sdom pa gsum la
239a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas par bya'o/ /de'i phyir/ cho ga zhib mo'i tshul 'di dag kyang rang gi tshul 'di dang 'gal ba ma yin par spyad par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ? zhig bshad par bya'o/ /gzhan dag phyi rol gyi tshul ni 'dir brtag pa ma yin no zhes smra ba de
239a3(rgyud 'grel): dag la bshad zin pas ma spros so/ /de'i phyir gcad zhing gos kyang gcad bar bya/ /gtsang ma'i grogs dang lhan cig tu/ rdo rje sdom pa dam pa yi/ /bslab pa'i tshig ni yang dag blangs/ /dkon mchog bzhi yi sbyor ba dang/ phyag rgya de la gzhol bar
239a4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang/ /slob dpon dang ni pha ma'o/ /nyin re zhing ni ci nus par/ /khrus bzhi rab tu sbyor bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ji ltar 'khrub dag /go rim bzhin du bshad par bya/ /sdom pa gsum la gnas pa ni/ /dang po'i ?
239a5(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa yin/ /gnyis pa yi ni khrus bshad pa/ bshags dang gsol ba la sogs pa'o/ /phyag brgyad grol ba gsum pa'o/ /bzhi pa chu ste tha pa'o/ /khrus kyi cho ga 'di rnams kyis/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis de bzhin bkru ? gos gsum ?
239a6(rgyud 'grel): kyang brje bar bya/ /dang po'i gos su bshad pa ni/ /sdom pa gsum la gnas pa dang/ bsgrub pa'i cho ga ngag pa'o/ /gnyis pa khrel yod ngo tsha shes/ /gsum pa thub pa'i gos rnams so/ /gos gsum du ni yongs su bsgrags/ /thams cad bza' dang 'dod?
239a7(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /kha na ma tho gang med pa/ /sha chang sgog pa la sogs pa/ /mi bza' rnam par spang bar bya/ /dri mi zhim dang mi gtsang ba'i/ /bza' dang btung ba rnams kyang spang/ /gzhan la gnod dang ldan pa dag /sems kyis kyang ni mi bya'o/ /g.yem pa
239b1(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi sbyor ba yang/ /mi sdug bsgoms la spang par bya/ /bsod nams byed la rtag tu brtson/ /theg pa chen po'i don sems pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' i tshul rgya che/ /shes rab pha rol phyin la mkhas/ /klog cing rnam par sems pa dang/ /yang dang yang
239b2(rgyud 'grel): du gsol ba 'debs/ /dgra dang thun dang tha ma la/ /sems snyoms mi 'jigs rab tu sbyin/ /zhe sdang 'joms? pa bsgom pa ni/ /khyams shing dga' la des pa can/ /chos dang gang zag bdag med ba/ /'dus byas rnams kyang 'khrul pa tsam/ /mngon
239b3(rgyud 'grel): sum blo can brtan pa ni/ /bdus byas kun gyis mi rmongs so/ /srog la bab par gyur na yang/ /byang chub sems ni mi btang zhib/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang/ nam yang btang bar mi bya'o/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /shes rab dril bu zhes
239b4(rgyud 'grel): bshad do/ /slob dpon smad par mi bya ste/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /sbyor ba lhod par ma gyur pas/ /go cha rab tu brtan par gyis/ /pha rol phyin drug spyod pa yang/ /rim pa bzhin du slob par byed/ /sems can kun gyi don dang ldan/ /byang
239b5(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' i tshul spyod pa/ /kha na ma tho rdul tsam yang/ /srog la yang ni mi? blta bar/ /rab tu byung dang khyim pa yi/ /'du 'dzi dag kyang rnam par spang/ /bu dang chung ma dag la yang/ /srid pa'i bcings pa dag las grol/ /brkam dang chags
239b6(rgyud 'grel): dang gdug pa med/ /rmongs pa dang ni le lo med/ /bag yod spyod cing brtson 'grus che/ /rnal 'byor bsgrub pa bsgrub par bya/ /lta ba kun las rnam par grol/ /yang dag nyid kyi lam bsgom pa/ /dgongs pa'i tshig la rab tu mkhas/ /don shes don ni
239b7(rgyud 'grel): rtogs par 'gyur/ /tshul dang tshul min cho ga shes/ /de nyid rnal 'byor rab tu mkhas/ /sems can kun la rab tu byams/ /byang chub spyod pa'i don sems pa/ /'di 'dra'i tshul ni bzang po la/ /de lta bu'i bsgrub pa yis/ /grol pa dang ni dngos grub 'thob//
240a1(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub thams cad dogs pa med/ /phyogs dang dgos dang las rnam spa/ /'phags pa thams cad rnam par spang/ /lha rnams ? med par mi bzhin/ /rnam par yang ni spang par bya/ /nyi ma re re rab
240a2(rgyud 'grel): bsdams shing/ /bsrung pa'i cho ga byas pa las/ bgegs ni med kyi ma 'jigs shig/ sems ni rab tu 'dul dka' 'di/ /bgegs ni cung zad med snyam pas/ /sems ni dag? pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rang gi sems ni bdud ces gsung
240a3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sems ni bgegs yin no/ /rnam par rtog pa thams cad spang/ /rnam par rtog las bgegs kun 'byung/ /gdul dka' i sems ni rab brlung? nas/ /'dod pa lnga ni spar bar bya/ /sngon gyi rjes su dran nas brtsams/ /rdo rje sems
240a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bsgom par bya/ /'jig rten na ni gang zag bzhi/ /bskal ba brgyar ni brtson byas kyang/ /cho ga bzhin du kun spyad kyang/ /de dag 'grub par yod mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni ma bskyed dang/ /the tshom yod pa nyid dang ni/ /gang
240a5(rgyud 'grel): zhig bka' stsal? mi byed dang/ /ma dad pas ni mi 'grub po/ /pha? dang mar ni shes pa dang/ /tshangs dang dge sbyong 'bad pa dang/ /gtsang zhing zhi bdul ba dang/ /bsdams shing thar pa la sems pa/ /rgyal srid mtho ris longs spyod dang
240a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i yon tan brtson phyir min/ /gzhan du sems can thams cad phyir/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsngo byas pa/ /de bzhin kha zas chod shes shing/ /mtshan mo mi nyal ba la dga' / /'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs 'byung/ /rnam
240a7(rgyud 'grel): par rtog pa mi sems shing/ /sems ni rab tu dga' gyur nas/ /mi g.yo bar ni sems par bya/ /legs bshad shin tu rnam phye ba'i/ /chos kyi don la mngon par dga' / /sems can gnod la sogs pa'i rgyu/ /drag shul spyod pa'i
240b1(rgyud 'grel): las mi byed/ /sems can gdugs pa la sogs pa'i/ /nyes pa dag kyang rab tu bzod/ /rig sngags mtshon dang de bzhin mtshan/ /lha yi bcings pa rnams dang ni/ /dman ma dag dang lha yi grib/ /lha yi mtshan ma la sogs kun/ /bza' 
240b2(rgyud 'grel): ba dag ni sna tshogs pa/ /mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid byas pa rnams/ /mi 'gong zhing ni mi bza' ste/ /nam yang brdzi bar mi bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor rnams la/ /nam yang spyad par mi bya'o/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher bshad do//
240b3(rgyud 'grel): lus dang ngag dang spyod pa bstan pa dang rang gi tshul dang 'gal bar mi gyur pa rnams spyad par bya'o/ /de dag las/ dra? mi zhim dang bcas pa yang/ 'dod pa lnga ni spang bar bya/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa rang gi tshul ci rigs par shes par
240b4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de dag la sogs pa yang tshul ji ltar spyad pa la sogs pa rdo rje 'phreng ba las bshad pa'i dgongs pa la mkhas pas spyad par bya'o/ /de bas na brtan pa ma thob pa'i dbang du byas nas slob dpon ye shes zhabs kyis gzhan yang
240b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyud gzhung 'jug gi rnal 'byor pas/ /rnal 'byor bzhi yi cho ga dang/ /snang srid sgyu ma'i sbyor ba yis/ /'gro 'chag nyal rang 'dug pa rnams/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mdzad pa'o/ /byed dang smra dang bskyod pa rnams/ /b+hag las ni g.yeng
240b6(rgyud 'grel): mi bya/ /zas ni bdud rtsir rab dmigs la/ /tha dad med pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /phyi yi sbyin bsreg tshul du ni/ /rtag tu tshogs kyi mchod pa bya/ /'gro ba rang bzhin dag pa yis/ /dbang bskur ba yi tshogs ni/ /phyi yi chus kyang bkru bar bya/ /nyal ba
240b7(rgyud 'grel): shes rab snying rjes nyal/ /ldang na dpal ldan klu yis bskul/ /thams cad rang bzhin dag pa yis/ /dag pa'i lha dang gnas su snang/ /sems nyid cing yang snang pa'i phyir/ /bde sdug rnam par brol ba'o/ /zhes bshad pa'i tshul gyis na/ brtan pa ma
241a1(rgyud 'grel): thob pa las dang po pa'i spyod pa rnams kyi spyad pa bstan par shes par bya'o// //de bas na las dang po pa sdom pa la mi gnas shing rang gi spyod pa'i tshul cho ga bzhib mo 'dor ba dang/ gong ma'i
241a2(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa khyad par can la 'jug pa ni bya dgos pa'i spyod pa ma byas pa dang/ re zhig bya ba ma yin pa'i spyod pa byas pa'i phyir ltung bar 'gyur ro// //sdom pa gsum la gnas shing rang gi spyod pa tshul bzhid byed pas gong ma'i
241a3(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa shes par bya ba la nyes pa med do/ /bslab par bya ba yin pas de bas na thos pa btsal zhing bsam par bya'o/ /de nas cung zad brtan pa thob nas gsang sngags kyi spyod pa la 'jug par bya ste/ rig ma mtshan dang ldan pa cha lnga dang
241a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan par byin gyis brlabs te/ yongs su smin pa dang bde ba chen pos de kho na nyid brtan par bya ba zla ba drug la sogs par dgon pa chen por bdud rtsi rnam par lnga la sogs par spyad cing/ /rang gi de kho nas ril bu la sogs pa khar
241a5(rgyud 'grel): bcug la bsgrub par bya'o/ /de dag kyang rtog pa dang bral bas spyad par bya'o/ /de'i phyir bdud rtsi la sogs pa ni rtog pa med pas bsgrub par bya ba dang/ rang bzhin gyi nus pa dang ldan pas grub pa'i phyir rjes su bsngags pa'i phyir rtag tu
241a6(rgyud 'grel): spyad par bya'o/ /gzhan yang bsams te bza' ba dang/ thog ma nas bslab par bya'o/ /de'i phyir na rtog ge ba rnams kyi rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir sgyu 'phrul dra ba las gsungs pa/ /gshad gci khrag dang ga bur rnams/ /sha chen dag kyang
241a7(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg bya/ /ci ste ye shes sems dpa' i zhal/ /mi gtsang ba yis bkang na'o/ /ji ltar sdig pa skye mi 'gyur/ /gal te sdig gyur 'bras bu gang/ /sems can mi shes pas rmongs nas/ /thabs dang shes rab rnams spangs shing/ /gyi
241b1(rgyud 'grel): rol dngos la mngon zhen pa/ /rnam rtog dri bas blun byas gang/ /de dag gis ni dge sdig gi /phung po gnyis su rnam par brtags/ /chos 'dir rang bzhin gyis dag ste/ /skye ba med cing gnas med kyang/ /sems can gnod pa sel ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas
241b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis thabs kyi bstan/ /dam pa'i don du dge spangs na/ /bsod nams med pa ci zhig smos/ /dper na chu klung chus gang la/ /pha rol 'gro ba'i sems can dag/ rtswa dang shing la sogs bsdus te/ /chu la rkyal ba'i gzings byas nas/ /
241b3(rgyud 'grel): de la 'jus? te legs brgal nas/ /bor te bde bar 'gro ba ltar/ /de bzhin 'khor ba pha rol gyi/ /chos kyi lam ni skyed byas nas/ /chos dang chos min rnam spangs la/ /byang chub bde ba 'thob pa bzhin/ /de bzhin rnam rtog dra spongs la/ /shin tu
241b4(rgyud 'grel): zab mo'i chos spel te/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs lam la/ /sngags rig rnams rtogs ma byed cig /rnam rtog rmongs pa chen po ste/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung byed pas/ /nam mkha' lta bu dri med pa'i/ /rnam par mi rtag ting 'dzin gnas//
241b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar te/ /lus dang ngag dang sems bsdus na/ /nga'o snyam nas gzi bskyed gzugs/ /rnam pa kun gyi rnam brgyan nas/ /rnal 'byor ldan la tshe 'di la/ /ye shes rdzogs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /las las byung bar bstan
241b6(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /skyes pa bud med gzugs med? la/ /brnyad pa nyid du mi bya 'di/ /rdo rje lus can dam tshig yin/ /ngan rtog bzang rtog dra ba yis/ /sems kyi sems can rnams la ni/ /sna tshogs gtum pas sun mi dbyung/ /rdo rje sems ldan dam tshig
241b7(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /srid pas skye rtsub phra ma yis/ /tshig dag rnam par mi smra zhing/ /nyan ni bde bar 'dod pa yis/ /rdo rje dag can dam tshig yin/ /rnam par snang mdzad cher 'khrugs mchog /sha yi khams la gnas pa yin/ /rkang la ma 'khrugs rgyal po ste//
242a1(rgyud 'grel): khrag la rin chen? 'byung? ba'i gtso/ /sems can rnams kyi rus dud? pa'o/ /? tshig rnams pa phral bas thus? pa'i skyes mchog don yod grub/ /dam tshig shes pa rnams la ni/ /gsang
242a2(rgyud 'grel): chen nga yis bstan pa 'od/ /blo ldan rdo rje sems kyis ni/ /rtag tu bsten cing bsgom par bya/ /'dod chags ? sdur de bzhin rmongs/ /srid dang 'du byed rnams 'brel ba'i ? 'di rnam pa lnga po 'di/ /thub pa skyes mchog rnams kyis
242a3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs/ /bshad cig khu ba de mchil khrag /'dzag pa 'byung ba bzhis bsdus pa/ /bsgom pa'i blo gros rdzogs pa yis/ /dam tshig rtag par bya ba ste/ /rtag tu bza' zhing sbyin par bya/ /zhes bshad pos 'di'i don la/ mkhas
242a4(rgyud 'grel): pas rtog pa med pas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bas gsang sngags kyi rtul shugs kyi skabs su khyad par du spyad par bya'o/ /rang gi rigs las byung ba'i bu mo smin par byas la spyad par bya ste/ /kha na ma thob pa dang bral bas chog bzang
242a5(rgyud 'grel): po dang ldan pa bsten par bya ba'i phyir/ /de nyid las/ de nas bu mo mig yangs mo/ /lo ni bcu drug lon pa la/ /gzugs dang mdangs dang lar tshor ldan/ /gser gyi rna cha g.yo bag can/ /gcig cig legs par btsal nas su/ /lha mo byi
242a6(rgyud 'grel): bong? lags byas te/ /rigs lnga yi ni mtshon cha can/ /las kyis rjes su bsgom byas nas/ /bzhag ste sprad pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /pad+ma la ni rdo rje gzhug /sprad pa dang ni 'khyud pa yis/ /rdo rje dang ni pad+ma bskur/ /gang gyi tshul du bsgyur ba dang//
242a7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin spra dang bsdu ba yis/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan pa dang/ gzhon yang thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud mang po las/ dgongs pa can gyi tshig bstan pa rnams/ don gzhan la dgongs pa rnams gdul bya khyad par du gyur ba'i
242b1(rgyud 'grel): phyir bsam pa la dgongs ba dang/ /brtan pa thob pa'i gang zag gi dbang du mdzad pa'i phyir gzhan du ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /lam 'di lta bu la brten pa dang brtan pa ma yin pa yang/ /rnal 'byo pa'i nus pas 'gugs pa dang/ mi snang
242b2(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa la sogs pas bya ba bar gsungs kyi/ /gzhan du na snyigs ma lnga'i dus su gang zag ngan song du gzhal zhing 'dod pa dang ldan pas thabs shes rab kyi rgyud la brten nas dus dang snod du ma gyur pa yang/ 'dod chags la
242b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i bsam pas sgra ji bzhin du sbyar bas phal cher ngan song du skye ste/ rdo rje theg pa spong bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i phyir/ dgongs pa'i don la mkhas par bya'o// //brten pa ched thob rnams kyis ni//
242b4(rgyud 'grel): mgon po kun tu sbyong ba ste/ /rtog pa dang bral brtan thob pas/ /thams cad bza' zhing thams cad byed/ /'di yis mi bya gang yang med/ /cung zad mi smra gang yang med/ /rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa ste/ /mdze ma dang 'jigs pa yod pa
242b5(rgyud 'grel): min/ /dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su/ /sngags pa seng ge bzhin du rgyu/ /srog dang rtsol ba bsngam pa med/ /nyon mongs dug sogs rang bzhin dag /lam dang gnyen po spang bya med/ /mgo skyes gyen 'greng ras dang bral/ /thal bas byugs
242b6(rgyud 'grel): nas thod pas brgyan/ /thig le bkod nas kha TI 'dzin/ /la lar smra bar mi byed cing/ /drag tu rgyug cing grong khyer rgya/ /rgyal mtshan ldan mthong chad 'gugs shing/ /khrag dang khu pa de bzhin te/ /dge slong la sogs phyag mi byed/ /lha rten
242b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag byas 'gas par 'gyur/ /ril bu mi snang rgyal po'i khyim/ /yul gyis bskyod pa ma yin te/ /'jig rten chos la chags sdang med/ /sangs rgyas la sogs phyag mi byed/ /glang chen nyos dang seng ge zhon/ /nags dang ri khrod bsod snyoms
243a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jug /dur khrod tshod khang srang du rgyu/ /'byung po bzhin du gnas pa mchog /'di ni kun tu spyod pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad de/ de'i phyir 'di ni brtan pa thob pa rnams kyi'o/ /gzhan du thog ma nas 'jug
243a2(rgyud 'grel): pa de dag phal cher nyams te ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas na rim pas 'jug pa rnams ltung bar mi 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/ /bskyod pa'i rim pa dang/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa la rim pa bzhin du 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas kyang spyod pa'i
243a3(rgyud 'grel): tshul de bzhin du gnas par bya ste/ de'i phyir/ bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas te/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod rnams la/ /thabs ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /skas kyis rim pa bzhin du gsungs zhes bshad pa 'di yang legs
243a4(rgyud 'grel): par bshad par 'gyur ro// //de nas mnyam par bzhag pa'i spyod pa chen po rang bzhin gyi rtog pa dang bral ba mi rtog pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa la gnas par bya ste/ de'i phyir 'di'i spyod pas gnas pas/ /spros bcas med cing mnyam
243a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhag med/ /bya dang byed dang rtsol las 'das/ /dag dang ma dag dngos po rnams/ /sgyu ma bzhin du dngos med par/ /brtags pas dben pas blang dor med/ /'dod chags la sogs mi spong ste/ /gzhan gyis sangs rgyas sgrub mi byed/ /yod med rtag
243a6(rgyud 'grel): chad mdza' las 'das/ /kha dog dbyibs med lus dag med srog rtsol rim dang cig car spong/ /yi ge mtshan ma phyag rgya med/ /phyogs bcu gang la'ang gnas mi byed/ /gzung 'dzin rnam rtog yul las 'das/ /dam tshig sdam pa dkyil
243a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor med/ /de nyid bcul rnam mi rtog /bsgom bya bsgom byed bsgom pa med/ /sangs rgyas sems can bdag rtsol bral/ /rgyu 'bras lam la sogs pa spong/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i dngos rnams la/ /nam mkha' bzhin du rtag mi byed/ /mchod rten
243b1(rgyud 'grel): glegs bam la sogs spong/ /bdud dang dngos grub gnyis su med/ /rang rig shes brjod yul las 'das/ /sgra dang brda dang dbang po yis/ /'di la bstan bya rdul yang med/ /rtog ge'i spyod las 'das pa ste/ /dam pa'i rjes 'brangs rang gis rig/
243b2(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba med pa'i dam pa mthong/ /rjes su shes pa sgra ma bzhin/ /rab mdza' i shes pa rtog gom pas/ /rtog ming gzhan don nor bu bzhin/ /sku gsum ye shes lnga la sogs/ /thub pa'i yon tan dpag bsam shing/ /ston dus skad cig gis
243b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs ltar/ /de phyir de la gsang ba 'dus/ /bzhi pa'i dbang gis rab tu rgyun?/ /de nyid dpal mchog dang po'i ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mthar phyin lam/ zhes bshad pa'i phyir 'di ni mthar phyin pa'i spyod pa ste/ mnyam par bzhag pa'i spyod
243b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan pa'o// //dus shes pa'i spyod pa las 'gal bar spyod pa rnams kyi ni bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /bla ma'i bka' dang don chen po mthong ba dang/ gang zag la sogs pa'i dus shes pa dang/ srog gi bar chad du 'gyur
243b5(rgyud 'grel): pa la nyes pa med do/ /ltung ba de dag la nyes pa tshe 'bring gi rim pas/ /dbang dang tshogs la bshags pa dang/ /dkyil 'khor ston du 'gro bas dam pa gcig la bshags pa'o/ /phyis bsdam par bya ba la brlab? par bya'o/ /ltung ba bco lnga pa'i
243b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bshad pa'o// //da ni yan lag gnyis pa bshad par bya ste/ /de'i phyir/ dam pa nyer bsten cig shos min/ /snod dang ldan pa rnam par brtag/ /'dod phyir gzhan la gnod pa spang/ /dkon mchog la sogs nor la min//
243b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan don skad cig yal mi dor/ /byang chub min par dge mi 'jug /rnam shes 'pho ba de nyid mkhas/ /gzhan du yan lag nyes pa'o/ /de nas sdug bsngal chen po 'thob/ /zhes bshad pa ste/ 'di dag gi spyi'i mtshan nyid gong du bstan pa las shes
244a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /dam pa nye bar bsten pa ni bla ma dam pa ste/ /de yang sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ /slob dpon med par gyur na ni/ /dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur bas/ /slob dpon mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /ye shes snying po khyod
244a2(rgyud 'grel): nyon cig /brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan/ /bzod ldan drang zhing g.yo sgyu med/ /gsang sngags rgyud kyi sbyor shes pas/ /dkyil 'khor bra ba'i las bya'o/ /de nyid bcu ni yongs shes shing/ /sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /theg pa mchog
244a3(rgyud 'grel): la rtag dga' bas/ /de ni slob dpon yin par gsungs/ /shes bshad pa dam pa ma yin pa/ bsten na yan lag gi nyes pa'o/ /cig shos min pa ni dam pa ma yin pa ste/ /de nyid las phyi rol bstan bcos yongs shes shing/ /nyan thos
244a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi lam bsgrod kyang/ /gsang ba de nyid bsdu ba dang/ /theg pa chen po mi shes pa/ /snying rje yod pa ma yin dang/ /dad med brtson 'grus mi ldan pa/ /rtag tu dan pa'i tshul spyod dang/ /bstan chos rnams la smod pa yin/ /zhes bshad pas so//
244a5(rgyud 'grel): de bas na bla ma gzhan gyi don byed pa mchog go /bdag gi don can nyon mongs pas zil gyis non pa ni mchog ma yin pa'o/ /zhes bshad pas/ de bsten pa de ni yan lag gnyis pa'o// //snang dang ldan pa ni yang slob ma ste/ /de nyid
244a6(rgyud 'grel): las/ dge ba bsgom la dga' ba dang/ /rtag tu bla ma la gus dang/ /rgyun tu lha rnams mchod byed pa/ /yon tan ldan pa slob ma yin/ /slob dpon ci 'drar blta zhe na/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /de nyid rtag tu rdo rje 'chang/ /zhes bya ba la
244a7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa de nyid rgyas par shes par bya'o/ /de bas na snod min bsten pa ni yan lag gi nyes pa'o/ /rin chen can ni smin par byas pa'o/ /'dod phyir gzhan la gnod pa spang zhes bshad de/ /'dod pa ni nyon mongs pas kun nas bslang pa ste/ des mi
244b1(rgyud 'grel): bzad pa dang/ sha dang pags pa dang rus pa'i phyir yongs su smin par byas pas de dag spyad na yang yan lag gi nyes pa'o/ /mi nan ni ltung ba'i phyogs su bsdu bar bya'o/ /de ni dri ma las ldang ba yang de nyid kyi phyogs su bsdu'o/ /dkon mchog la sogs nor la ma ni
244b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bshad pa ste/ dkon mchog gsum dang/ grogs khyad par can rdo rje sdus na la sogs pa'i dkor la ma byin par mthu dang 'dab bus spyad na ltung ba la sogs par 'gyur te/ /de yang zhing khyad pa can gyi nor bdun ri ba phul te/ de nas dpa' bo'i
244b3(rgyud 'grel): ston mo byas la/ /'dus pa la bshags te bsdam par bya'o/ /tha na gdug spos kyang mnam par mi bya'o/ /zhes bshad pas so/ rim pas na smad pa'o/ /tha mal pa dus shes pas so/ /ser sna can la mthu la sogs pas phrogs te don
244b4(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pas spyad par bya'o zhes bshad pas de'i phyir rim pa shes par bya'o/ /gzhan don skad cig yal mi dor zhes bya ba ni gong du bshad zin to/ /byang chub med par dge mi 'jug /ces bshad pas ni/ smin par byas pas tha na lus ngag
244b5(rgyud 'grel): gi dge ba phra mo gcig kyang/ /dang po byang chub du sems bskyed pa dang/ tha mar yongs su bsngo ba'o/ /bsngo ba yang 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o/ /de'i phyir sgyu ma'i blo can gyis bya bar gsungs te/ /'phags pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas las/ byang
244b6(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' blo gros rab tu zhi ba byang chub kyi ched spyod pas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med par khong du chud par bya ste/ sbyin pa yang ngo bo nyid med par khong du chud par bya'o/ /len pa yang ngo bo nyid med par khong du chud par bya'o/ /yon gnas kyang ngo
244b7(rgyud 'grel): bo nyid med par khong du chud par bya'o/ /bsngo ba yang ngo bo nyid med par khong du chud par bya'o/ /gang yang bsngo bar byed pa de yang ngo bo nyid med par khong du chud par bya'o/ /gang du bsngo bar byed pa de yang ngo bo nyid med par khong du chud par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir 
245a1(rgyud 'grel): zhe na/ sbyin ga ni spyid pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi stong ngo/ /de bzhin du len pa po dang yon gnas dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang/ yongs su bsngo ba dang/ gang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa dang sbyar par bya ste/ /de ltar na
245a2(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid la mos pa de ni bsam pa tshad med pa'i sgo nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ /sbyin pa de ni sbyin ga'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming yang 'thob ste/ zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad pa ste/ de yang sbyor
245a3(rgyud 'grel): ba sgyu ma lta bu la gnas la/ /de'i dngos gzhi mi dmigs pas rnam par stong pa ? rgyu ma las kyang 'das pa'o/ /rjes las thob pa'i shes pas smon lam rgya chen po tshad gzung du med par bsngo bar bya'o/ /zhes bshad pas dad pa med pa la dngos
245a4(rgyud 'grel): grub 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ /de'i phyir gzhan du nyes par 'gyur ro/ /rnam shes 'pho ba ni rnal 'byor pa 'chi bshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'chi ba'i tshe na bden pa gnyis kyi tshul gyis sgyu ma'i blo dang ldan pas chags sdang la sogs pa med
245a5(rgyud 'grel): pas dkyil 'khor gsal bar byas la/ dri ma las ldang ba sngon du 'gro bas/ /sdog 'phrog pa'i rim pas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsdus te/ /rang gi ye shes dang mi gnyis par byas te/ 'od zer gyis khams gsum dag par byas la dkyil
245a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la bltas te/ /thabs dang shes rab kyi dbus su rang gi yi ger bsdus la/ /rang gi de nyid kyi thugs kar 'od zer dang bcas pas 'jug par bya'o/ /gzhan dun nyes pa dang bcas pa'o/ /de dag kyang tshogs pa la bshags te bsdam par
245a7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /gzhan yang lta ba dang spyod pa des par gnas pa la the tsho skye ba dang/ theg gsum gyis gdul bya'i rim pa dang/ sbyar nas mi 'dul bar gcig tu sbyor ba dang/ /de kho na nyid bcu la mi gnas par dkyil 'khor dang slong ma smin par byed
245b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ bdud brtag pa'i thabs la mkhas par mi byed pa dang rtsa ba dang yan lag gi sdom pa zhig gam ma zhig pa bsam par bya ba dus 'das pa dang/ /phra mo'i nyes byas kyang khyad du bsad nas ma bshags par dus 'das na dug chung yang
245b2(rgyud 'grel): rmal mched pa bzhin du dus 'das pas gzhi de nyid las 'phel ba yang tshad de nyid du 'phel bas/ /de bas de dag kyang yan lag gi nyes pa'o/ /bla ma'i bka' dang bya ba byung ba dang/ na ba dang bar chad dang bcas pa dang/ don chen po mthong ba la
245b3(rgyud 'grel): nyes pa med do/ /dri ma las ldang ba yang gong du bstan to/ /ltung ba'i rigs de dag kyang/ yul dang bsam pa dang/ rkyen gyi dbang dang sbyor ba'i bye brag gis lci yang la sogs pa gzhag ste yul las ni yul nye bar gnas pa dang/ zhing gi bye
245b4(rgyud 'grel): brag go /des rtogs shing khong du chud pa dang/ /skyo zhing mi 'dod pa dang/ bdag gis kyang shes pa'o/ /dus dang bsam pa las ched du bsams pa dang/ /rang bzhin du gnas pa'o/ /rkyen gyis ni nad dang 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i bar chad
245b5(rgyud 'grel): med pa dang/ 'gro ba gzhan la sogs pa'i dgos pa ma mthong ba'o/ /sbyor bas ni lus kyis bya ba dang/ dag gis sbyor ba'o/ /de dag gis ni dngos gzhir 'gyur ro/ /gzhan du ci rigs pa'i nyes pa'o/ /nyes pa de dag kun gyi thun mongs du
245b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang dang ldan pa kun la shes par bya'o/ /de dag las dri ma las ldang ba yang sbyor ba chung ba dang/ de nyid kyis nyes par 'gyur ba dang/ rang nyid kyis ldang bar nus pa dang/ rkyen ma tshang ba dang/ dur khrod la sogs pa ni bdag nyid cho ga dang ldan
245b7(rgyud 'grel): pas byin gyis brlabs kyis ldang bar bya ste/ de'i phyir smras pa cho ga rdzogs pas rnam par sbyang/ /yon tan phyogs kyis rnam par 'phel/ /mig gis rnam par brgyan byas la/ /thabs chen mtshan gyi tshad du mdzes/ /de dkyil ri bong brgyad pa'i
246a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi/ dang po'i lnga pas mdzes pas 'dzag /tshes la ri bong can gyis brgyan/ /sgra yig de nyid thig les mdzes/ /bcu drug phyed pa brgyad kyi 'og /dbang po'i phyogs kyis rnam par 'phel/ /rig byed lnga pas thabs kyis
246a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzes/ /yang na steng 'og dbang po yin/ /bcu drug byed byed thig le dbri/ /thig le las kyang rnam par 'das/ /thig le rnam par rdzogs par ldan/ /sgra yig dang po yon tan ldan/ /srog dang rtsol ba rnams bsdams nas/ rims bzhin
246a3(rgyud 'grel): tsaN+Da li 'bar bas/ /mkhas pas rim bzhin rnam par spyad/ /zhes bya ba 'di dag gis kyang dri ma las sdang bar bshad pa'o/ /da ni ltung ba la sogs pa thams cad kyang chu chod nas brtsis nas rim pas dri ma las ldang ngo/ /gzhan du na
246a4(rgyud 'grel): yan lag gi nyes pas sdug bsngal 'thob bo zhes bshad pa'o/ /yan lag gi nyes pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o// //de nas de'i 'bras bu'i thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud mang po nas 'byung ba bshad par bya ste/
246a5(rgyud 'grel): de'i phyir/ dang ldan the tshom dman mi mos/ /tshul bzhin cho ga ldan pa ni/ /mngon sum rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /mchog dang thun mong rgyas par 'gyur/ /zhes bshad pa ste/ dang ldan zhes pas dang pa dang ldan pa dngos grub kyi snod du bzhag
246a6(rgyud 'grel): pas/ kun gyi thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /dad pa med pa la dngos grub 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ de'i phyir dang pa dang ldan pa'i gang zag la rang bzhin gyis dngos grub 'grub/ /ji ltar dang ba'i snod du yang/ /rtog med zla ba'i gzugs brnyan
246a7(rgyud 'grel): 'char/ /dad pa dkar po'i bzhi rten yin/ /dad pa med pa'i mi rnams la/ /dkar po'i lo dog mi skye ste/ /sa bon me yis tshig pa la/ /myu gu sngon po mi 'byung bzhin/ zhes bshad pas/ snying rje dang shes rab dang brtson 'grus kyis grogs byas
246b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzhan gyi don gnyer bar 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsten par bya'o zhes bshad par bya'o/ /the tshom yod pa ni yid gnyis za ba'o/ /de yang thabs shes rab kyi rgyud mang po las grub pa'i mdza' sna tshogs su brtags pa/ /'di rag 'gal
246b2(rgyud 'grel): pa mi srid pas don dang bcas pa dang don med par 'gyur ro/ /zhes rtog pa de dag kyang/ don de dag khong du chud pa ste/ thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud de dag ji ltar dpag bsam gyi shing dang 'dra? bris/ /des kyang skyes du mang po'i 'dod pa cha shas kyi
246b3(rgyud 'grel): bye brag gis kyang bsgrub bar nus te/ dngos po mdza' dag gis grub pa ni ma yin no/ /spros pa bral ba gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo la rtog pa med pa'i tshul du gus pa dang bcas pa'i grub pa'i mdza' de dag kun gyis rtog pa med pa'i tshul
246b4(rgyud 'grel): du 'gal bar gal 'gyur/ /de'i phyir rtags kyi cha'i nus par byin gyis brlabs pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba re re la 'jug pas bslu ba med pa'i don dang yang 'phrad par 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir bshad pa'i rgyud chen po las/ nam mkha' i snying po
246b5(rgyud 'grel): khyod nyon cig /gnyis med ye shes don ldan pa'i/ /de dang 'dra ba'i rgyud kun la/ /yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing/ /bum pa bzang po 'dra bar ni/ /gus pas tshul bzhin gnas pa la/ /gcig gyur thabs kyi bye phrag gis/ /nus pa bsam
246b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis mi khyab ste/ /de lta de ltar de bzhin bsgrub/ /cho ga nyams pas 'grub pa'ang min zhes bshad pa 'di ni/ tshul de dag las tha dad pa'i sgo nas 'bras bu dang ldan pa yang mngon sum du 'grub pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i phyir smras pa/ lha dang drang sred
246b7(rgyud 'grel): bden pa'i dag /gang la sbyor ba'i nus pa yang/ /slu bar byed pa ma mthong na/ /ye shes chags pa mi mnga' ba'i/ /smon lam snying rjes gzhan don 'jug /thams cad mkhyen pas smos ci dgos/ zhes bshad pas de la brtag par mi bya'o/ /'on kyang
247a1(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu dam pa nye bar brten pa dang bral bas 'dod pa dang bral bas 'dod pa dang/ phrag dog dang/ nga rgyal gyis non pas zhugs pa rnams ni rtags 'khrul pas don dang phrang bar byed pa ma yin no/ /de'i phyir slob
247a2(rgyud 'grel): dpon las ni dngos grub 'thob zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgya cher bshad do/ /gzhan yang de lta bu'i dbang du mdzad nas/ lung ma rtogs par rtog ge yi/ /chos rnams rnam par gnas ma yin/ /drang srong rnams kyi shes pa yang/ /g.yang
247a3(rgyud 'grel): lung ni sngon tu btang/ /long pa'i rkang pas tshod dpags shing/ /nyam pa'i g.yang sar rgyag byed ltar/ /rjes su dpag la gtsor 'dzin pa/ /rnam par ltang bar dka' ma yin/ /zhes bshad pas de ni 'gal bar 'gyur ro/ /dman pa la ni mos pa ni
247a4(rgyud 'grel): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la smod pa dang bral ba'o/ /gzhan yang skyes bu tshe 'di'i 'bras bu 'dod pa la phyi ma'i tshe la 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /skyes bu phyi ma la 'dod pa 'di la yang rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /mchog 'dod pa la thun mong yang
247a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /thun mong la mos pa la mchog dang de nyid kyang thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub rab dang 'bring dang tha ma yang rim pas thob par 'gyur ro/ /de phyir/ drug cu pa'i rtsol ba yis/ /sa lu'i 'bras dang phrad ma yin/ /dman la mos
247a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /mchog rnams thob par ga la 'gyur/ zhes bshad pas so/ /tshul bzhin cho ga ldan pa ni/ zhes bshad pa yang/ tshul bzhin cho ga dang ldan pa ni/ thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud las/ gang yang rung ba'i grub pa'i mdza' i
247a7(rgyud 'grel): cho ga dang ldan pa'o/ /de'i phyir rgyud mang ba dang grub pa'i mdza' i tshul thams cad du bdag gis bshad pa ste/ kun gyi thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de bas na dgongs pa'i don la mkhas pas brtags par mi bya'o/ /mngon sum rdo rje sems
247b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' de ni dam tshig dang ldan pa dang/ /spyod pa la gnas pa rkyen gzhan gyis 'gal bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyi rol mchog dang thun mong rgyas par 'gyur/ /zhes bshad pas/ /'bras bu rgyas pa na bstan te/ thun mong brgyad la sogs pa dang/ rdo rje
247b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'i sa thob pa'o/ /de'i phyir bshad pa dang/ rtog pa thams cad shes rab tu shes pas/ dngos po sgyu 'dra bsdam bya sdom byed med/ /rang bzhin gnas dang gzhan gyi nas pa bskyed/ /ngo bo nyid dang sdom bya sdom byed dang/ /rtsa ba yan
247b3(rgyud 'grel): lag de bzhin yan lag go /rdo rje sems sogs bder gshegs ma lus kyang/ /de la 'da' bar spyod pa me yin no/ /mi 'dod dngos po thams cad sreg par byed/ /sdug bsngal sna tshogs rnams kyi gzhi ni gzhi rtsa ste/ /bder gshegs kun gyis bu
247b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin rab dgongs nas/ /sku gsum ye shes chu yi zla ba bzhin/ /nad med nor dang rkang 'gro mang po 'phel/ /'bad pa med par 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyal po la sogs gsong por smra byed cing/ /skye bo mang pos rtag tu dgur bar
247b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /'khor dang longs spyod mang pos rnam par mdzes/ /rims dang gdon la sogs pa'i gnod pa rnams/ /bla ma mkha' 'gro dam tshig rjes dran pas/ /de dag las kyang myur du thar par 'gyur/ /rin thad med pa'i rin chen rnams kyang 'gal
247b6(rgyud 'grel): gdon dang mkha' 'gro rnams kyis 'bar bar mthong/ /rdo rje 'chang ba mang po rjes su 'brang/ /byang chub sems dpa' mang pos spun bzhin dgongs/ /sngags dang zhing las skyes pa'i mkha' gros kyang/ /rgyang nas gzigs shing dngos grub
247b7(rgyud 'grel): ster bar byed/ /'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis rtag tu skyob/ /gdug pa can rnams mthong nas dga' bar byed/ /'bad pa med par gsungs pa'i las rnams 'grub/ /bskal pa mang por sdom la gnas pa bas/ /skad cig gnas pas
248a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu rdzogs par byed/ /ldog pa med pa'i byang chub sems gzung nas/ /thabs kyis bsod nams tshogs ni rab rdzogs byed/ /bde ba'i dag can de ni lung bstan te/ /brtags pa rnams log bden pa'i
248a2(rgyud 'grel): don mthong nas/ /sa nas sar? 'bar mi mthun phyogs spangs te/ /sgyu ma lta bus rtog med mnyam par gnas/ /kha sbyor bde chen mtshan gyis rnam brgyan pa/ /stobs dang mi 'jigs phyogs kyi chos rnams dang/ /pha rol phyin pas dang
248a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang bcu sogs/ /dag pa'i zhing du rtag par tshogs chen bskor/ /'dul ba'i don du sna ba 'gags pa mos/ /legs par mtshan yong rgyan gyis gang yang nas/ /dud las yol med dung ba'i chu dres bzhin/ /'bad rtse mo rtog med pa'i
248a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nor bu ltar/ /smon lam grub pas thugs rje 'gag pa min/ /longs spyod chen pos mnyam pa nyid la gnas/ /'dod pa'i yon tan sgrub pas 'gag pa med/ /sdom ldan rnams la mngon sum gnas shes bshad/ /zhes bshad pa
248a5(rgyud 'grel): yang thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud mang po las/ /'bras Ta? mar du bshad pos bdag gis mdor bsdus te bshad pa'o/ bskal pa mang por tshogs bsags nas/ /rin chen snod du bdud rtse 'dzag /rtag tu brtson par mi byed par /ci phyir
248a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i dug gis myos/ /zhes bshad pas kyang de na de nyid 'grub par bstan te/ bskal pa mang po nas rgyud shin tu sbyangs pa dang/ tshogs bsags pa dang/ smon lam las grub pas rin po che'i snod lta bur gyur ba'i nang du bdud rtsi
248a7(rgyud 'grel): 'thung bar mi byed pa'i 'dod pa'i theg pas bcings nas/ nyon mongs pa'i dug gis myos par byed ces bshad/ /de'i phyir lam 'di lta bu ni shin tu thob par dka' ba'i lam na/ /rtag par bsten par bya ba dang/ theg pa chen po shes rab kyi pha
248b1(rgyud 'grel): rol tu phyin pa thob pa rnams kyang phyir mi ldog par bshad do/ /de nyid kyang thob par dka' ba yang/ /sangs rgyas rnams la bkur sti byas/ /de las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun/ /dge ba'i bshes kyis mgon byas pa/ /'di mnyam pa yi snod yin no/ /zhes
248b2(rgyud 'grel): bshad do/ /de bas na gus pa dang bcas pas thob par dka' ba'i lam 'di rtag par bsten par bya'o/ /thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud mang po las/ 'byung ba'i sdom pa'i 'bras bu rnam par bshad pa mdor bsdus pa'o// //
248b3(rgyud 'grel): de bas na rtsod pa'i dus kyi gang zag nyon mongs pas rgyud 'khrugs pas/ sdom pa dang/ dam tshig la gnas pa dka' ba ste/ /de'i dus su sdom pa dang/ dam tshig la gnas te mnyam par bzhag nas skad cig ci ma bsgoms pas kyang dus
248b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du bskal par gnas pa bas don chen por 'gyur zhes bshad do/ /de yang brtsod pa'i dus kyi gang zag gi mtshan nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa dang po'i rgyud las bka' stsal te/ /rtsod pa'i dus kyi 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams ni//
248b5(rgyud 'grel): lhag par yang sdig ba'i las la gzhol zhing/ ? zhing shes rab zhan te/ /rdo rje slob dpon gang yin pa/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba la log par gzhol ba dang/ /dge slong rnams kyang mi dge ba bcu byed pa la gzhol ba dang/ khyim pa rnams kyang
248b6(rgyud 'grel): dkon mchog gsum gyi yo byad la yongs spyad par 'gyur ba dang/ /mkhas pa rnams kyang ma thos pa'i rgyud 'chad cing/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis rgyud kyi 'grel pa byas nas/ /don phyin ci log tu bstan pas/ /dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur
248b7(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ /grong mi rmongs pa rnams kyang log par dad pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal mtshan rnams sun phyung nas/ khyim pa la bsten bkur byed par 'gyur pa dang/ spob pa rnams kyang zhe sdang gi blos slob dpon gyi skyon rtog pa dang/ 
249a1(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod la chags nas slob dpon dam pa ma yin pa la yang bstod cing mchod par 'gyur la/ /bla ma'i bsnyen bkur sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ rnams ni byed par mi 'gyur zhing/ 'chad pa po rnams ni mi
249a2(rgyud 'grel): dge ba bcu la 'jug par 'gyur zhing/ /bsgrub pa po rnams kyang bza' btung la chags par byed pa dang/ bud med rnams kyang 'dod pa la shin tu chags zhes gsungs so/ /gzhan yang mngon pa'i bstan chos las/ bstan pa ni srol gong
249a3(rgyud 'grel): ma bzhin zhes bshad do/ /de'i phyir rnal 'byor pas 'bad par bya ba'o zhes rjes su gdams pa'o// //sna tshogs rgyud dang theg chen mdo/ /dam pa kun gyi dgongs pa dang/ gzhan sogs gzhung lugs mang po las//
249a4(rgyud 'grel): zhal dang 'dra ba'i bshad pa 'di/ /rgya cher 'brel ba'i dri ma med/ /lam gyi sbron ma zhes bya ba'i/ /bla ma brgyud dang lhan cig skyes/ /dang dang snying rje gtsor byas pas/ /sna tshogs rgyud dang slob dpon gyi dgongs pa sna tshogs brtags pa
249a5(rgyud 'grel): las/ /ngal las dge ba gang 'thob des/ /'das sogs bla ma rdo rje spun/ /dam tshig ma lus nyams pa gang/ /bla ma 'jam bcas mdun byas te/ /bdag sogs dam tshig dag gyur cig/ thams cad dngos grub snod gyur la/ /thun mong mchog
249a6(rgyud 'grel): gis rnam brgyun te/ /'gro kun rdo rje 'dzin gyur cig/ rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa lam gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba de la phan par byed pa'i yan lag dang bcas pa/ /slob dpon 'jam dpal grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
249a7(rgyud 'grel): myang ro stag tshal du dI paM ka ra bod du byon tsan bsgyur/ pu ri sha'i grong khyer du A tsarya u pa d+ha sh+rI badzra shI la dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong brtson 'grus seng ges legs par mnos te gus par bsgyur ba'o/ /bal po'i khyim dud ma'i lo/ /rin chen grags
249b1(rgyud 'grel): pa bdag gis 'ongs/ /'grel dpe rnying pa la yang btugs/ /shin tu yang ni dag par gyis// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra satwa sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje sems dpa' i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje
249b2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thog mar bdag nyid stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ skyil mo krung gis gnas la/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las bsgral te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' i sa la dgod par bya'o/ /zhes
249b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems bskyed pa sngon du song ba'i rjes la/ /de nas rang tha mal par gnas pa'i spyi bo'i steng du baM las pad+ma dkar po/ /de'i steng du a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba/ /de'i steng du hUM dkar po yongs su gyur pa las dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 
249b4(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog dkar po/ 'od zer kha dog lnga 'phro ba/ rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byang bzang po brgyad cus mdzos pa/ phyag g.yas pa rdo rje thugs kar 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas dril bu rked
249b5(rgyud 'grel): par 'dzin pa/ sku rol pas bzhugs pa/ zhabs g.yas pa cung zad brkyang ba'i 'theb chen gyis bdag gis tshangs bug la reg par bsams la/ de'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng du hUM la yi ge brgya bas bskor nas yod par bsams la/ de
249b6(rgyud 'grel): las 'od 'phros pas 'og min na bzhubs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ka nas bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'o ma lta bu drangs nas/ rdo rje sems dpa' i thugs kar zhugs nas zhabs kyi 'theb chen gyi sna ba tol nas bdag gi tshangs pa'i bu ga
249b7(rgyud 'grel): nas zhugs pas lus thams cad 'chi med kyis bdud rtsis gang bar bsams te/ des bdag gi chi rabs thog ma med pa nas bsags pa'i mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa byas pa'i sdig pa thams cad dud khu lta bu rkang 'thil nas 'thon par
250a1(rgyud 'grel): bsams te/ lus shel dag pa ltar phyi nang sal le bar bsam mo/ /de nas dngos sam yid kyis mchod pa dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags brgya po ji lta ba bzhin ngag par brjod do/ /de nas dpal rdo rje sems
250a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i zhal nas rigs kyi bu khyod kyi sdig pa thams cad dag go zhes gsung par bsams la de nyid du thim par bsam mo/ /bdag nyid nus ldan kun gyis mchog tu gyur par shes par bya'o/ /lam thams cad kyi dag byed kyi thabs dpal
250a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' i yi ge brgya pa'i sgrub thabs/ bla ma mngon shes can rdo rje gdan pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //yul dbus kyi dpe ji lta ba bzhin lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos gtsug
250a4(rgyud 'grel): lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du gus pas bsgyur ba'o// //*/ /dpal gsang ba thams cad kyi phyi'i cho ga'i snying po brgyan zhes bya ba slob dpon 'jam dpal grags pas mdzad//
250a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI sarba gu hya bi d+hi garb+ha a lang+ga ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba thams cad kyi spyi'i cho ga'i snying po rgyan zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum rgyal ba mchog rnams kyi/ /ye
250a6(rgyud 'grel): shes blo gros chen po'i sku/ /sems can kun la phan skyed pa/ /'jam pa'i mgon la phyag 'tshal te/ /theg mchog gsang ba thams cad kyi/ /cho ga'i snying po rgyan gyur ba/ /dang po'i las can rjes gzung phyir/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i
250a7(rgyud 'grel): tshul 'di bshad/ /rtsa ba bzhi dang dag pa dang/ /tshogs dang yan lag kun bsdus pa/ /rdo rje ye shes 'thab byed pa/ /lam gyi 'khor lor shes par bya/ /blo ldan thar pa'i bdag nyid de sems/ /bzod ldan dul ba'i slob ma yis/ /grub pa'i rtsa
250b1(rgyud 'grel): ba mchog gcig pu/ /bla ma bsten bya dang por brtag/ snying rje med cing khro la gdug /khengs shing chags lam bsdams dang/ /bcom dang bcas pa nyid dang ni/ /brkam bcas slob ma dge las bzlog /ral gri til dang snag tsha dang/ /khyim
250b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi las la mngon brtson zhing/ /rang gi don sems rnyed pa 'dod/ /bla ma brnyes byed sems can la/ /nyer 'tshe 'gro la ngan pa sbyor/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i chog yis/ /rtag tu 'tsho ba sgrub byed cing/ /'jig rten chos phyir dge la 'jug/
250b3(rgyud 'grel): chad dang smad 'tshong la gdungs shing/ /de nyid gnyis po mi shes par/ /rtag tu slob dpon nyid du sems/ /tshangs spyod brtan par ma gyur pa/ /na chung bde la mngon par zhe na/ /de nyid bcu la mi gnas bar/ /dkyil 'khor las la 'jug byed cing/
250b4(rgyud 'grel): dbul ba'i slob ma la sdang zhing/ /dam chos dman la sbyor ba dang/ /rtag tu rnyed pa don gter bas/ /skal min gsang ba la 'god dang/ /sdom pa gsum po mi 'dzin cing/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba nyer gnas pa/ /chos la ser sna kun spyod cing/ /dam tshig
250b5(rgyud 'grel): las la sbyor byed pa'i/ /slob dpon rib mas spang bar bya/ /de bsten dmyal sogs 'bras la sbyor/ /brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan/ /bzod ldan drang la g.yo sgyu med/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor bshes/ /snying rjer ldan nang bstan bcos mkhas//
250b6(rgyud 'grel): de nyid bcu ni yongs shes shing/ /dkyil 'khor 'bri ba'i las la byang/ /dran gsal brtson 'grus dang ldan zhing/ /thig le che la brtag tu dga' / /blo sbyangs rig pa lnga 'dzin cing/ /sngags bshad sbyor ba gnas mkhas dang/ /de nyid lung thob rim
250b7(rgyud 'grel): brgyud ldan/ /'gro ba'i thar pa la sems shing/ /kun tu dge la 'god pa'o/ /tshor sogs bya ba rnams dor nas/ /sdom gsum dge la 'jug pa dang/ /de nyid sgom la tshangs spyad sgrub/ /skal dang skal min sems can la/ /tshul dang tshul min cho ga shes
251a1(rgyud 'grel): ser sna rnam spang dman mi mos/ /rnyed sogs chos la mi lta zhing/ /bla ma lha la rab dang mchod/ /dman sogs sems can sun mi 'byin/ /zhu ma med khengs sems rnams spangs pa/ /slob dpon mchog tu shes par
251a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ rtsod pa'i dus ni 'di nyid na/ /rnam rgyas nyon mongs dbang gis ni/ /slob dpon skyon dang yon tan 'dres/ /dge la rnam brten yon tan dag/ shas cher gyur pa rnam par gzung/ /'gro mgon bla ma bstan par bya/ /bla ma gnas pa'i mdun dge du//
251a3(rgyud 'grel): gcer bu dang ni dbugs sgrogs dang/ /chags pa'i las dang tsug tsug dang/ /snabs dang lud pa mdun 'dor dang/ /g.yan pa 'phrug dang g.yal chen dang/ /drag tu langs 'dug rdul sbrug dang/ /chigs nyed pa dang rkang rkyong dang/ /gdings
251a4(rgyud 'grel): drag 'dings gzhan rdags dang/ /'grong dang don med 'chag la sogs/ /bag med lus ni ma bsdams pa /rnam pa kun tu mi bya'o/ /'phya dang lta brgang byed pa dang/ /ma 'brel smra dang 'gram chal dang/ /brdzun dang brnyas te zlos pa dang//
251a5(rgyud 'grel): phra ma dang nir chod dang/ /mi gzhan zher 'debs la sogs pa/ /byed pa dag gi ma sdams pa'i/ /sgra yi skyon rnams spang bar bya/ /srog dang lus dang longs spyod dang/ /de'i don dang grags pa la/ /ltos med ngan du sems pa dang/ /mi sdug par
251a6(rgyud 'grel): blta brnyas pa dang/ /de yi skyon rtog gus mi byed/ /rtag tu bral bar sems pa dang/ /de yi tshig la bdud skyed byed/ /rtag tu bslu ba'i sems ldan zhing/ /g.yo sgyus kun tu spyod pa dang/ /khong khro skad cig gis chags byed/ /tshul min
251a7(rgyud 'grel): las kyi bsam pa kun/ /bag med sems ni ma bsdams pa/ /g.yeng ba chen por gyur pa ste/ /nam du yang ni mi bya'o/ /bla ma la ni bka' blang zhing/ /gus pas 'dud pa'i sems bya ste/ mnyan na bde ba'i ngag dag gi /brtul zhugs can gyis
251b1(rgyud 'grel): don rnams gsol/ /ston pa mchod dang rang rnal 'byor/ /bza' btung bshad gci 'dor ba dang/ /mtshams nang 'gro dang gnyug ma'i las/ /bya ba me tog gzhan rnams dri/ /slob ma rgyal mtshan dang ldan pas/ /bla ma khyim pa'i rtags
251b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin na/ /khrus dang spang pa'i nyes pa dang/ /chos las ma tog phyag mi bya/ /dman pa'i las dang phyag byas na/ /'jig rten smad pas nyams byas shing/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /smad pa'i las ni byas par 'gyur/ /de nyid
251b3(rgyud 'grel): bcu ni shes gyur pa'i/ /brtul zhugs 'dzin pa yon gnas su/ /dbang bskur rab gnas sbyin sreg dang/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo sogs dpon du/ /gos dkar can ni mi dga' 'o/ /brtul zhugs 'dzin pa rmongs gyur na/ /yon tan dus lam
251b4(rgyud 'grel): me gtogs par/ /las kyi rdo rje 'am 'khor du min/ /de ltar de dag ma byas kyang/ /bla ma la brnyas mi 'gyur te/ /rdzas dang bkur 'os kun gyis mchod/ /de yis grags pa bsgrag bya zhing/ /lus srog longs spyod kun bsrung zhing/ /lus srog
251b5(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod kun gyis bsten/ /mngon sum du 'am lkog tu yang/ /dge ba bsgo ba'i bka' las ni/ /nam du yang ni 'da' mi bya/ /de la sems kyi mngon phyogs shing/ /kun tu de yi sems bsrung ngo/ /longs spyod rnams las dang por te/ /nyin
251b6(rgyud 'grel): re 'am zla ba lo la sogs /dus 'das bla ma ma bsten par/ /grub par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa ni/ /smig rgyu'i chu la 'thung 'dod cing/ /phub ma brdungs las 'bras 'dod dang/ /rgya mtsho'i chu la mar bzhin no/ /byas par nges par bsten dgos na//
251b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan dge 'dun la phul te/ /khyim pa'i cha lugs gnas byas nas/ /'bad ? bla ma mnyes par bya/ /de yi mtshan nas mi brjod cing/ /grib ma 'ang 'gom par mi bya la/ /phyag rgya mthong bar gyur pa na/ /khengs pa'i lta bas lta mi bya/ /brnab
252a1(rgyud 'grel): sems kun tu spang ba dang/ /thal sbyar zhes dang bcas pas/ /tshig brjod kun tu bda' bar bya/ /don rnams thams cad sgrub pa dang/ /'jig rten spyod dang mi mthun pa'i/ /las la slob dpon gnas na yang/ /
252a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid 'khrul zhes bsam pa'am/ /bsam mi khyab dran gus ldan pas/ /rtag tu de dang 'bral mi bya/ /na ba la sogs bsgrub dka' dang/ /mi dge la sbyor tshig dag la/ /bdag par gsol te btang snyoms bzhag /de ltar bya dang
252a3(rgyud 'grel): bya min pa/ /thams cad du ni brtags byas nas/ /nyes ba kun dang bral bar sbyang/ /rtsa ba'i cho ga'i rnam par bye ba ste dang po'o// //dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /lnga bcu rtsa gnyis sbyor ba las/ /grub pa pas? ni
252a4(rgyud 'grel): gzung bar bya/ /de la rdo rje slob dpon sogs/ /dor ba'i kha na ma tho ba/ /lce dang yang dang dag pa dang/ /cha 'dra ba ni shes par bya/ /yul bsam sbyor ba'i bya brag dang/ /dus dang nyes pa lan grangs dang/ /zla ba dang ni bkra shis nyid/ /de ni
252a5(rgyud 'grel): rim par rnam phye ba/ /dbang sogs slob dpon rim par gnas/ /bla med rgyud sogs de bzhin te/ dbang sogs spyan ni des par gzung/ /sbyor dang sdong bs dor ba yis/ /yon tan sdug bsngal zhing khyad dang/ /mnar sems tshul mindor
252a6(rgyud 'grel): ba las/ /sdom gsum mi yi 'gro ba dang/ /gcig gnyis gsum gyi mthar thug par/ /don dam lhag bsam thig le'i gzugs/ /rnal 'byor chen po sogs rim ltar/ /thams cad nyams kyang ma rdzogs par/ /dbang bzhi po ni 'dzin pa yi//
252a7(rgyud 'grel): snod ni rab tu brtags par bya/ /gang zag chos la bdag med dang/ /rnam rig shes pa'i rang bzhin las/ /rim par gyur te rang bzhin dang/ /rkyen dang dregs pa'i bdag nyid dang/ /rtag la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rim/ /dad sogs chen po chung du'i mdza' 
252b1(rgyud 'grel): bsrung dang bsten pa bza' ba shes/ /gnyis gsum? rig pa'i brtul thugs ldan/ /yul gyi sbyor ba la brten nas/ /mnar sems chags rmongs che sogs rim/ /mnar sems 'khrug dang mdud par 'dzin/ /bskam dang chags dang 'dod par dga' /
252b2(rgyud 'grel): skur 'debs log rtog rmongs pa rnams/ /gsum gnyis gcig gi lus ngag yid/ /sbyor pa'i nyes pa rab rdzogs byed/ /gcig gnyis gsum gyi lor gnas las/ /dus kyi che sogs rnam par bzhag/ rnam dag thos bsam bsgom pa'i dus/ /srog
252b3(rgyud 'grel): dang lus dang longs spyod dang/ /ltud dang spom lci nyes byas ri mo/ /srog sogs nyes pa'i khyad par shes/ /byang chub srog dang lus kyi rim/ /yul gsum bral dang bla med sogs/ /dor dang sbyugs dang ngan du brjod/ /zab dang dbang sogs cho ba'i
252b4(rgyud 'grel): mdza' i/ /gsang dang ma rungs ngan du sems/ /phyal cher mi bden snyam dang bden/ /'phel dang dga' dang btang snyoms dang/ /yul las rim par zlog pa dang/ /ldog dang mi 'jug ma dad dang/ /yul dang bral dang srog sogs rim/ /gcig gnyis
252b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum las nges par skyes/ /de ltar lag pa mda' dang mig nges par sbyor ba sogs 'byung shes/ /lha yi tshul sogs thams cad la 'ang/ /sbyor ba rnams ni brteg par bya/ /na dang dbang nyams bya ba dang/ /gzhan gyi don dang don chen dang//
252b6(rgyud 'grel): skye med brtan pa dgos ldan dang/ /nus pa rnyed dad gnas pa dang/ /bka' bsgo ba dang bar chad dang/ /nyes pa med par shes par bya/ /ji srid ltung ba ma spyad cing/ /gong ma'i yon tan mngon ma gyur/ /bslab dang 'gal ba'i las mi spyad/ /dam
252b7(rgyud 'grel): tshig rtog las ma grol ba/ /de srid sbyor ba nges par gnas/ /sgra sogs nyan dang 'chad pa dang/ /nyan thos sogs bka' rang rgyal sogs/ /dri chen sogs te nyan thos sogs/ /ma gus byol song gzhan gyi lus/ /thabs kyi lam dang dregs par ldan
253a1(rgyud 'grel): kun rdzob brjod bcas dad brtan dang/ /bgrang 'phreng sogs dang bud med rnams/ /yul gyis 'dra bar shes par bya/ /slob dpon dang ni slob ma dag/ 'khon 'dzin gus pa rnam par bral/ /sdom gsum 'dzin pa'i blo med
253a2(rgyud 'grel): cing/ /dgongs pa'i don shes mi byed cing/ /shar gnyen don la skyo sems dang/ /chags dang 'dod pas bstod las bzlog/ 'dod don gnyer dang mchod yul du/ /dad pas 'du shes mi 'jugu cing/ /bdag med gus pa rnam spangs dang/
253a3(rgyud 'grel): mel tshe 'dul bar mi sems te/ /dman la gus pa'i blo bskyed cing/ /'dod phyir gzhan sems bsrung blo med/ /mdan? bsrung ba'i blo bskyed dang/ /phyag rgya mi mthun log blor byed/ /bsams pas thams cad 'drar shes bya/ /srog sogs 'tshe las
253a4(rgyud 'grel): ma bzlog dang/ /bsam bzhin du ni ma bshags dang/ /sbyor ba log par byed pa dang/ /tho brtsams pa dang chags sbyor dang/ /cung zad ba dang tshul min zhes/ /lam dang rgyan po 'gyed sogs sar/ /chad dang cung zad ngal la sogs/ /the tshom za zhes
253a5(rgyud 'grel): mngon brjod dang/ /dan du smra las zlog mi byed/ /dngos po bden zhes mngon brjod bya/ /grogs dang kha zas bag yangs dang/ /drag po'i sbyor bam spas pa/ /mtshan ma 'gom dang ming brjod dang/ /bud med phan tshun mi smra ba/ /rig ma la khengs sems
253a6(rgyud 'grel): dman pas/ /gtam gyi sbyor ba ma byas pa/ /nyes pa dag ni 'dra bar 'gyur/ /chung du'i nyes pa yun ring po/ /che dang kun la 'dra ba yin/ /de ltar nyes pa'i rnam pa kun/ /'phel dang ltung sogs rab rdzogs pas/ /lo gcig dang ni thun mtshams las
253a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bar rnal 'byor pas shes bya/ /nyin mtshan kun tu rab bsgrims nas/ /nyes pa'i gnas ni shes par bya/ /gal te ltung sogs byung gyur na/ /yi ger brgyas ni byin gyis brlab/ /ji srid dus las ma 'das par/ /dag pa'i las la nyer
253b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas bya/ /'gyod bcas nyer ba 'phel mi 'gyur/ /gnyen po'i dge las ma g.yos na/ /sman pa'i gnas ni bsgrubs pa min/ /mchog gi sems ni sngon 'gro bas/ /rang gis lam ni nges par gzung/ /lam bral mnar med sogs 'gro bas/ /sngags
253b2(rgyud 'grel): pa rtag tu bag med par/ /nyes pa btang snyoms mi bzhag cing/ /bag yod pas ni kun tu bsgrub/ /bla ma dang ni grogs po dang/ /tshangs par mtshungs par spyod rnams dang/ /kun tu lta bas dam tshig gzung/ /slob dpon la sogs dam tshig la//
253b3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshe ba phrogs la sogs pa yis/ /yan lag gtso bo byung gyur na/ /lhag par nyes pa 'phel 'gyur bas/ /dngos de byin gyis brlabs nas ni/ /'bad bas myur du spyad par bya/ /sgom sogs phra ba'i phra ba mthar/ /nyes pa rtag tu bsam
253b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /sgra tsam la ni rab gzhol ba'i/ /sngags pa mnar med sogs 'gro bas/ /ra ni sngags pa zhes sgrogs shing/ /gsang ba'i lam la brten nas kyang/ /tshul khrims yal bar dor mi bya/ /dkar po'i gos la rab gnas te/ /ngo tsha rnam par
253b5(rgyud 'grel): dor nas su/ /log par g.yem la mngon par zhe na/ /du 'bod sems can dmyal bar ltung/ /yul min pa la drag shul dang/ /'dod pa yis ni ma byin len/ /gzhan dang byang chub don med par/ /rdzun dang phra mtshig rtsub par/ /smyo sogs glu dang bre mo'i
253b6(rgyud 'grel): gtam/ /sems can rnams la rab sdang dang/ /gzhan gyi rdzas la bdag gi ri? sems /skur 'debs lam la log 'dzin pa/ /mnar med sogs par ltung ba'i rgyu/ /sngags pas rtag tu spang bar bya/ /nus pa brtan pa mthob cing/ /'du ba'i dzas
253b7(rgyud 'grel): las ma gtogs pa/ /chang gis bag med byed pa dang/ /rang nyid shi dang smad pa dang/ /bdag la ma byin ma blangs par/ /snod du ltung las ma gtogs par/ /sha za kha na mthong 'gyur/ /bstan pa'i don las ma gtogs par/ /rigs brgyud rab tu
254a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phel 'dod dang/ /na chung bde la brkam pa yis/ /sngags pa rtag tu nyams par 'gyur/ /sems brtan tshul la bshad mthong nas/ /nga ni sngags pa mchog zhes te/ /dge slong la sogs phyag mi byed/ /brtul
254a2(rgyud 'grel): zhugs 'dzin pa'i phyag la sogs/ /rmongs pa gang zhig dang du len/ /rung smrig gos la sogs pa rnams/ /mal stan la sogs longs spyod du/ /byas na sngags sogs 'grub mi 'gyur/ /dge slong gsang ba 'dzin 'gyur cing/ /khan mi tho
254a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam spangs pa/ /'jig rten gsum gyis phyag rgya'i 'os/ /theg gsum thos pa 'dzin pa dang/ /sdom pa gsum la rab gnas shing/ /rnam kun nyes pa las zlog dang/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal mtshan ldan/ /thub pas rgan po nyid
254a4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa/ /kun gyi nang na dge slong mchog /gang gis chos gos mthong ba na/ /bdud la sogs pa rnam skrag pas/ /de ni ston pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur/ /nga ni dge slong zhes brjod cing/ /theg pa gsum po mthos dang/ /lus ngag sdod
254a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ma sdams par/ /rgyan po pa bzhin gnas byed cing/ /bud med bsten pa'i lam dga' bas/ /sngags pa zhes ni rlom byed pa'i/ /brtul zhugs 'dzin pa'i 'jig rten na/ /ngan skyugs ka shigs g.yogs 'dra/ /rang gi bslad pa yi
254a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin par/ /gsang ba thos la sngon brten nas/ /lung bod? bzhin du mngon spyod pa/ /dge slong rnams dang gnas gcig tu/ /longs spyod dam pa rnams dang ni/ /bya ba gcig la dbang ba min/ /gal te de dang lhan cig na/ /dpa' bo bsgrub
254a7(rgyud 'grel): las nyams par byed/ /mgon po'i mtshan ma rnam spangs te/ /gal te khyim pa'i rtags 'dzin na/ /des ni de lta'i nyes mi skyed/ /lan mang nyes par gyur na yang/ /gnyen po'i stobs ni dor mi bya/ /rnam pa kun tu rab bsdams te/ /rnal 'byor la ni
254b1(rgyud 'grel): brtson par bya/ /sems can kun la phan bsams shing/ /rang gi dam tshig gzung ba dang/ /mchod pa'i las la mngon brtson bya/ /ma dad pa ni spang bya zhing/ /dam tshig bzhi la rim gyis 'jug/ zas la sogs la bltos med par/ /chos kyi
254b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sogs nges par bya/ /sems can gnod pa la sogs pa/ /sdom gsum 'dzin pas rab tu spang/ /dngos sam yang na brgyud nas kyang/ /'gro la gnod pa yongs spangs te/ /rigs brgyud dam bca' brtan 'dzin pa/ /so sor
254b3(rgyud 'grel): thar pa in zhes bya/ /sems can don du dge songs dang/ /sangs rgyas 'bras la nyer sems shing/ /rjes gzung bya ba gang byed pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' i tshul khrims shes/ /sku dang gsung thugs phrin las kyis/ /'gro ba tshar bcad
254b4(rgyud 'grel): rjes 'dzin par/ /mkhas pas dam bca' brtan blangs te/ /bdud 'jom rig 'dzin sdom par 'dod/ /sdom gsum dge la rnam brten nas/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis/ /'cho ba sgrub ba'i las mi spyad/ /rtag tu glo bur 'gron mchod de//
254b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang/ /gsang sngags rig ba'i tshogs rnams la/ /rtag tu mchod ba'i las bya zhing/ /shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs/ /theg pa chen po klag pa dang/ /de don bsam par bya ba ste/ /dam tshig can dang bla ma dang/ /lha
254b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams mchod cing sdang mi bya/ /yi ge 'dri mchod sbyin pa dang/ /klog dang nyan dang 'chad la sogs/ /dge ba'i las la mngon brtson pas/ /nyi ma don med mi bya zhing/ /glegs bam la sogs gsang ba'i tshogs/ /dam tshig med la ma sbyid te//
254b7(rgyud 'grel): sngags rgyud gus pas rab tu gsang/ /mtshon cha til dang tshong la sogs/ /mkhas pas rtag tu spang bar bya/ /rgyan po 'gyed dang lta ba dang/ /smad 'tshong ma dang chang la gdud/ /'jig rten smad pa'i las dang ni/ /gzhan sems mi bder 'gyur
255a1(rgyud 'grel): za yi/ /lus dang ngag gi spyod pa kun/ /rab tu bsgrims te spang bar bya/ /'du 'dzi'i nang du gsang ba yi/ /chos dang ma rdzogs sems can dang/ /rdo rje'i tshig la rtsod pa dag/ sngags pa dam tshig nyams byed bas//
255a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bed kun tu mi bya'o/ /bzhad gad gtam gyi sbyor ba las/ /rang gi dpal nyams byed pa yi/ /tshig dag sngags pas brjod mi bya/ /dpal nyams brnyes pas ngan song ltung/ /mi snang mkha' la 'gro sogs kyi/ /dngos grub don du mi sems
255a3(rgyud 'grel): shing/ dbang po'i sgo ni rab sdams te/ /de bzhin kha zas tshod shes pas/ /shes bzhin du ni gnas pa ste/ /mtshan mo mi nyal mngon brtson pas/ /rnal 'byor gsum la gnas par bya/ /dus kyis mchod pa dang ldan zhing/ /chogs
255a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi mchod la rtag 'jug bya/ /rtag tu bla ma brten bya zhing/ /lo yi mtshon mtshams thams cad du/ /dbang bskur ba ni yang dag blang/ /maN+Dal mchod rten bskor ba'i las/ /sbyin bsreg dang ni rab gnas dang/ /'byung po che dang
255a5(rgyud 'grel): dman pa yi/ /gtor ma'i las la brtson byas na/ /tshe dang bsod nams 'phel 'gyur bas/ /byang chub kyi ni rgyu nyid phyir/ /'bad de de yi las bya'o/ /bsod nams tshogs kyi rgyu yin te/ /dus bzhir dge slong chos ston gsol/ /byis pa
255a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams la kha zas dang/ /dman pa slong la khro med cing/ /snying rjes non pa'i sems kyis ni/ /zas la sogs pa cha bgos te/ /kun la snyoms par sbyin par bya/ /so sor thar sogs sdom bcas pa'i/ /nyes pa shin tubra mo la//
255a7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bos khyad du bsad min te/ /gru dang skas la 'dzeg bzhin gnas/ /chos la ser sna mi spyod cing/ /chos min pas ni brid mi bya/ /sngags pas nga rgyal cher bskyed/ /khengs pa med pa'i sems kyis su/ /kun la bran bzhin gnas byas nas//
