255b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshe ba med par bsgrub par bya/ /ril bu la sogs dam tshig dang/ /rdo rje phreng sogs yo byad rnams/ /gsang ba'i rdzas su rnam brtags te/ /nam du yang ni 'bral mi bya/ /tshul ldan thar ba'i bdag nyid sems/ /'jig rten na ni rnyed dka' bas//
255b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags pas rtag tu gus byas te/ /phyag la sogs pas mngon mchod bya/ /sdom gsum cho ga mi ldan par/ /sngags pa'i bdag nyid mi 'gyur te/ /dang po so sor thar pa yi/ /sdom pa legs par ma gzung bar/ /gsang sogs tshulu la
255b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas byed pa/ /thab las 'bras bskyed bzhin no/ /rtsa ba rnyed par mi 'gyur bas/ /dang po skyabs 'gro nas brtsams te/ /sdom gsum chog rab tu brtag /de ltar sngags pa tshul ldan pas/ /dngos grub la ni dogs med de/ /ston pa sangs rgyas
255b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs bstod cing/ /lha sogs 'jig rten kun gyis bkur/ /gzhi rnam par dbye ba ste/ gnyis pa'o// //nyon mongs pas ni zil non cing/ /gal te dam tshig las 'das na/ /sdug bsngal mang po skye 'gyur
255b5(rgyud 'grel): te/ /de bas dag pa'i las rnams spyad/ /ltung sogs nyes pa'i rim pa las/ /dang por bdag sems sun phyung ste/ /yul mdun snyan gsan phab nas kyang/ /gsum bslad gsum gyi sbyor ba las/ /sdom gsum 'gal ba bshags
255b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /bde gshegs kun gyi snying pos bya/ /dpral ba snying gar phyag rgya sngags/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam dag byed/ /phyi nang lha dbang bdud rtsis bkru/ /hUM yaM yi ge gsum gyis bsdu/ /lte bar gru gsum pa? yis bsreg/ dmigs
255b7(rgyud 'grel): pas stong pa mi dmigs gsum/ /rang gi cho ga bzhi yis dbang/ /tshogs ni 'du ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /mkhyen par gsol te gnang bar nod/ /rten la smra bshags bzlas par ldan/ /zhing khams kha dge lnga ldan pa/ /cho ga bzhin du dbul
256a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /che dang tse ti'i sbyor pa yis/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhir/ /dus min 'chi ba 'ang bslus par 'gyur/ /de bas mchod rten las rnams bya/ /til la sdig pa'i gzugs dmigs te/ /me yi
256a2(rgyud 'grel): las kyis rnam par sbyang/ /nyes pa'i rim pa shes byas nas/ /gtor mas dag pa nyid du bya/ /ji skad bshad pa'i dam tshig rnams/ /gang du nyams par gyur pa des/ /rang gi lta yi snying po'i sngags/ /'bum phrag tsam du bzlas brjod
256a3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ yang na kha dog dbyibs med cing/ /rigs dang mtshan ma mi dmigs shing/ /rnam thar chags sogs las grol pa/ /zab mo'i bsam gtan nyid dmigs bya/ /yang na bshad sogs rgyar tshud cing/ /rang gi las kyis 'chi 'gyur
256a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rkyen zad pa yi sems can rnams/ /dag pa'i don phyir srog bskyab bya/ /gzhan yang mdo sogs gsang ba'i bka' / /ma lus pa ni klag pa dang/ /mchod cing rab tu gnas byas na/ /sdig pa kun dang bral bar 'gyur/ /me dang chu
256a5(rgyud 'grel): dang sbrul gdug dang/ /seng ge stag dang chom rkun dang/ /glang chen smyo dang sha za dang/ /bkren dang rgyal po'i chad pa dang/ /nang dang spa bkod zhum pa dang/ /'dod bral grags pa ma yin dang/ /skal ngan rab tu 'jig byed cing/ /bgegs
256a6(rgyud 'grel): med 'tshe ba med pa dang/ /sangs rgyas kun kyis rab dgongs shing/ /rdo rje 'dzin rnams bsrung ba dang/ /zhi sogs mi snad la sogs dang/ /rdo rje ye shes 'thob byed cing/ /skye po kun gyis bkur 'gyur ba/ /de lta'i yon tan 'thob byed
256a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ bla ma la ni bkur sti dang/ /rnyed pa dang ni rim gro dang/ /gus pa chen pos rab bsten nas/ /sdig kun rnam dag bdag nyid 'gyur/ /dpa' bos don yod rdo rje can/ /bsnyen sogs rim pa sngon 'gro bas/ /chog rab tu rdzogs byas
256b1(rgyud 'grel): nas/ dkyil 'khor bzhengs te bdag 'jug go /yang na chu yi nang zhugs dang/ /yang na mig btsum gyur pa 'am/ /yang na sku gzugs la bltas te/ /rgyal ba'i tshogs la rnam gtad nas/ /stong phrag lngar ni sangs rgyas kyi/ /snying po rab tu bzla bar bya//
256b2(rgyud 'grel): dkar po'i brgyad dang bco lnga la/ /dag pa'i bdag nyid byas nas kyang/ /rgya chen mchod pa sngon 'gro bas/ /bzlas brjod bstan pa byas nas ni/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam dag par/ /rgyal ba dam pas gsungs pas na/ /the tshom dang ni bral 'gyur
256b3(rgyud 'grel): bas/ /sngags pas rtag tu spyad par bya/ /mtshan mo mi nyal rnal 'byor gyis/ /mkha' la rgyal ba'i tshogs dmigs te/ /phung po gsum pa'i mdo sde dag /gal te cho ga bzhin spyad na/ /kha na ma tho sbom po yang/ /zla ba gsum gyis rnam
256b4(rgyud 'grel): dag par/ /thub pas gsungs par shes byas te/ /dad pa yis ni kun tu spyad/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig po/ /pad dkar zla ba'i dbus gnas shing/ /rdo rje dril bu rgyan spras pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' legs dmigs shing/ /yi ge brgya pa
256b5(rgyud 'grel): chog bzhin/ /nyi shu rtsa ni re re bzlas/ /ltung sogs byin gyis brlabs gyur pa/ /'phel ba ru ni mi 'gyur zhes/ /grub pa mchog rnams kyis bshad pas/ /thun mtshams su mi spyad par bya/ /'bum phrag tu ni bzlas gyur na/ /rnam par dag pa'i
256b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid 'gyur/ /rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /dag pa'i bla ma brtan byas te/ /sku ngar gsung thugs rgyal ba yi/ /rdo rje bzlas pa nyer gnas na/ /rnam dag lam gyi rang bzhin 'gyur/ /sems ngal sogs nas rang gi lus/ /bdag po'i rang
256b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gnas byas te/ /'khor lo drug gam bzhi gnyis gcig /char bya rkyang ba'i gnas nyid las/ /bde sogs rnam par yang dag gnas/ /dag pa la dmigs dag par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang/ /ral gri 'phra ba'i bdag nyid bsam//
257a1(rgyud 'grel): sems brtan tshul la gnas byas na/ /sdug bsngal bskyed rtsa kun las grol/ /mdor na lus rog spyod pa kun/ /rab tu bsgrims dang ldan pa yi/ /gnyen po'i sdom pa la sems shing/ /mchod sogs rnal 'byor
257a2(rgyud 'grel): tshul ldan na/ /nyes pa kun dang rnam bral zhing/ /dpa' pos lam ni rdzogs par byed/ /rtag tu bag med par gnas na/ /nyes pa chung du phra mo yang/ /sbrul gyi mche pas btab bzhin du/ /lus ngag sems ni nyams par byed/ /de yi dbang
257a3(rgyud 'grel): gis sdug bsngal dang/ /'tshe ba dag ni 'byung 'gyur zhing/ /lam las nyams pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de bas na rdo rje slob dpon nas brtsams te rims kyis lce'i? rnams shes par bya zhing dri ma las ldang bar bya'o/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor gcig tu
257a4(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa phra ba'i phra ba rnams kyang rnal 'byor pas yal bar dor bar mi bya'o/ /gzhan du drang srong chen po b+hi sha mi tra dang/ /rig sngags 'chang gi slob dpon gzhon nu'i sde dang/ /rgyal ba'i zhabs dang/ rin chen ldan dang/
257a5(rgyud 'grel): bram ze bzang po'i bshes gnyen la sogs pa rnams chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ni log par rtog pa dgag pa las blang par bya ba ma yin te/ /sangs rgyas ni bsod nams kyis nye bar bsgrubs pas so/ /lam bskyed pa'i
257a6(rgyud 'grel): rim pas tha mal pa'i dngos po spangs te/ gzugs kyi skus sems can rnams kyi don byed pa ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bas lha'i rnam pa dang spyod pa phyin ci ma log par bsgrub par bya'o/ /zhes zer ba dang/ gzhan yang
257a7(rgyud 'grel): bram ze stong nyid blo dang/ kha che'i mkhan po rab snang byed dang/ A nanda badzra dang /dge snyen sid+d+hi kar dang/ mkhas pa chen po dpal gyi seng ge dang/ snang mdzad rdo rje dang/ dge slong theg dpal dang/ legs sbyin bzang po dang/ dpal sham thabs
257b1(rgyud 'grel): sngon po can dang/ /dge slong ma dga' mo la sogs pa rnams bskyed pa'i rim pa dang/ /spyod pa'i tshul gsungs pa ni chad par smra ba dgag pa dang/ rten 'brel gyis rten 'brel gyi 'bras bu grub pa dang/ /zab mo'i don gyis 'jig pa'i 'jig rten
257b2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams re zhig gzung ba'i thabs su gsungs pa las yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste de ni mi mthun pa'i rgyu las skyes pa ma yin pas 'dir stong pa nyid mtshan ma mthong pa
257b3(rgyud 'grel): bsam gyis mi khyab cing spros pa rnam par chad pa ni rnal 'byor pas mi bsam pa'i tshul gyis bsten nas 'bras bu'i mchog dang ldan no/ /zhes zer pa ni re zhig phyogs tsam mtshon pas zhugs pa ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
257b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi lam nges par rnyed pa ma yin pas de'i phyogs su rnam par lta pa dang bral bas gnas par bya ste/ lta ba'i tshul spros pa dang bral ba rtogs pa dang/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ting 'dzin la rim gyis 'jug pa dang /dam tshig rnams nye bar bsten
257b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ rim gyis 'jug pas spyod pa'i tshul shes pa rnams ni theg pa mchog la nges pa skyes pa ste /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lam gyis de nyid mngon du rtogs nas 'dod pa'i don dang ldan par 'gyur bas/ /lam gyi rim pa dang sbyar te chu la gnyis
257b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa 'di nye bar gzung bar bya'o/ /rdo rje theg pa la rab tu zhugs te dngos po la mngon par zhen pa dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i lam khyad du bsad nas dge ba la mi sbyor bar gnas pa dang/ dus dang dgos pa la sogs pa la mi?
257b7(rgyud 'grel): bltos par rang bzhin dang bcas pa las 'da' bar byed pa dang/ gzhan ma dad pa bzlog par mi nus pas yul gyi spyod pa dang 'gal bar byed pa dang rang dbang med pa dang/ don chen po gtso bor byas pa las ma rtogs par rang gi rnal 'byor
258a1(rgyud 'grel): dang spyod pa'i tshul 'dor ba ni tshul ma yin pas gnas te/ de de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' las 'das shing ltung ba dang lhan cig pa zhes bya bar 'gyur bas/ 'bras bu las nyams pa'i bdag nyid yin te
258a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bad pa'i dam tshig las ma nyams pa'i tshul gsum gyis 'gro bar bya'o/ /dag pa'i cho ga rnam par phye ba ste gsum pa'o// //sdig pa thams cad rnam dag cing/ /rgya cher 'bras la nyer sbyor ba/ /rnal 'byor spyod
258a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i cho ga rim dag /nya sogs brgyad la rab tu spyad/ /grags sogs bsam pa dor nas su/ /dben pa 'am sum rim khang pa ru/ /bgeg bsal shis pa rab brdzod nas/ /'byor pa thams cad yongs su brtag /de nas las kyi rdo rje yis//
258a4(rgyud 'grel): pa yi rnam lngas legs byugs te/ /dam tshig che dang ldan byas nas/ /shing shun la sogs dri bzang dang/ /tsan dan sogs pas chag chag gdab/ sa ni le tser? byas nas kyang/ /kha dog sna tshogs pa yis ras/ /pad+ma'i ri mo dang ldan pa/ /thams
258a5(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi ni gdan du sbyin/ /dbus su dpal ldan na ra li/ /lags pa ma nyams pa'i gdan/ /shar dang me la khyi yi ste/ /lho ru rta nyid dpa' pos gsungs/ /nub du glang chen ldags pa ste/ /byang du ba lang nyid yin no/ /sad na thams cad mi yi
258a6(rgyud 'grel): bsngags/ /de lta bu yi stan dang ni/ /shing dang nya phyis dag dang ni/ /nar ke las yi snod/ /mi yi thod pa dag bsham mo/ /thun mong snod ni thod pa ste/ /yang na thams cad la yang shing/ /rgyan dang cha lugs 'chang ba yi/ /dbyug sngon po ni sgo la dgod//
258a7(rgyud 'grel): phyi dang nang dang thams cad du/ /las kun byed pa thab sbyor te/ /rnal 'byor ma yi cho ga la/ /sgron ma la sogs nye bar dgod/ /dri yi chus ni khrus bya ste/ /las kyi rdo rjes yongs bskul nas/ /rim gyi sgo drung 'ongs
258b1(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang/ /rnal 'byor ma dang bdag thong sogs/ /dbyug sngon po la gsol btab nas/ /'du ba'i khang par legs 'ongs te/ /slob dpon la ni phyag byas pa/ /bsgo ba thos nas gral la 'khod/ /dpa' bo dpal mo rnams rdzogs nas/ /re re yi
258b2(rgyud 'grel): yang mdun nyid du/ /dkyil 'khor rdzogs par dbul par bya/ /de nas las kyi rdo rje yis/ /rab dang bas ni phyag byas nas/ /kun nas gsol pa gdab par bya/ /sems can don du sems dge pas/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma rnams kun/ /tshul bzhin
258b3(rgyud 'grel): chog ldan pa yis/ /rnal 'byor la ni nyer gnas mdzod/ /de rdzas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /chags dang de bzhin sdang ba dang/ /khengs pa med pa'i sems kyis su/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun dang/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams rab mnyes kyis/ /kun la
258b4(rgyud 'grel): dga' dang ldan par mdzod/ /de ltar rjes su gnang thob nas/ /dam tshig thams cad dran byas te/ /yi ge brgya pa mngon brjod cing/ /rnam kun dag pa'i bdag nyid bya/ /dpa' pos bsrung pas brtan byas te/ /rang gi cho ga yongs rdzogs par/ /g.yeng
258b5(rgyud 'grel): ba med pa'i sems kyis su/ /de nas rab tu bzlas byas te/ /lha rnams cho ga bzhin du mchod/ /de ltar bya ba brtan byas nas/ /tshogs kyi longs spyod thams cad ni/ /las kyi rdo rjes 'dus byas te/ /'bar 'bud sogs kyis byin gyis brlab /
258b6(rgyud 'grel): phung du 'ong ba legs dmigs te/ /bla ma mchog rnams rab tu mchod/ /de nas dkyil 'khor dbang po sogs/ re re nas ni mchod par bya /bla med rgyud kun las byung ba'i/ /rigs ni sum cu rtsa drug lha/ /bdag po'i ming ni mngon pas te/ /
258b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang bcas shes brjod nas mchod/ /'jig rten gsum na rab gnas pa'i/ /sngon du grub pa thams cad la/ /me tog ro yi mthar thug pa/ /shis pa'i don du mchod par bya/ /de nas zhing skyong la sogs pa'i/ /chen po rab tu mchod byas la//
259a1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma rnams ni/ /dang por me tog sngon 'gro bas/ /mngon mchod de nas gzugs la sogs/ /rang rang gi ni sngags brjod nas/ /go rim bzhin du dbul bar bya/ /dur khrod rgyan dang ldan pa
259a2(rgyud 'grel): yis/ brda skad ces ni mngon brjod do/ /dpa' mo rnams kyis longs spyod phyir/ /skyes pa'i thod pa cha gcig par/ /ma da na ni rab tu brtag /dpa' bo rnams kyis longs spyod phyir/ /g.yas pa rtse gsum phyag rgya yis/ /sha chen po ni
259a3(rgyud 'grel): legs gzung ste/ /g.yas g.yon steng 'og tu byas nas /tshig 'dis dam tshig rab tu brtag /gzigs shig mdzes pa dam pa'i chos/ /'di la the tshom mi bya ste/ /bram ze khyi dang rdol pa rnams/ /rang bzhin gcig tu rtogs la zo/ /sku
259a4(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs kyi yi ge las/ /so so ru ni mngon brjod nas/ /a la la ho mthar swAhA/ /dpa' po bsam gtan brtan 'dzin cing/ /pad+ma'i skor ba sngon 'gro bas/ /g.yas g.yon steng 'og byas nas ni/ /tshig 'di yis ni blang bar bya/ /
259a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags dri ma bral ba yis/ /rin thang med pa legs 'ongs chos/ /gzungs dang 'dzin pa rnams spangs pa/ /de kho na la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'bru gsum po ni mngon brjod cing/ /gtso bos snang ba byin nas ni/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams
259a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi/ /rang gi longs spyod gang yin pa/ /so sor rab tu spyad byas nas/ /de nas kun la thun mong ngo/ /chad ni dpa' mos ma sbyang bar/ /dpa' po la ni skal med de/ /shal de bzhin dpa' bos so/ /go rim bzhin du spyad bya zhing/ /ro yi longs spyod
259a7(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyin nas/ /chags bral 'jig rten chos dor te/ /'dod pa'i bstan bcos las byung ltar/ /gnyis ka'i longs spyod la rab gnas/ /phan tshun dam tshig gtam smra zhing/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis 'ongs pa dang/ /dor na rtsa ba
259b1(rgyud 'grel): nyams 'gyur bas/ /'bad pas dam tshig legs dran bya/ /longs spyod gsum po nyid med par/ /tshogs kyi bya bar 'gyur ma yin/ /bla mas rjes su gnang min par/ /glu dang gar sogs mi bya'o/ /ji ltar mchod dang longs spyod dag /tshim pa ru
259b2(rgyud 'grel): ni ma byas par/ /bre mo'i gtam dang 'du 'dzi'i sems/ /rnam pa kun tu mi bya ste/ /byas na dmyal sogs 'bras thob 'gyur/ /mchod tshe bshud dang du 'bod de/ /sred pas yi dags nges par 'gyur/ /rang gi gsan gtan bral gyur na/ /
259b3(rgyud 'grel): dud 'gro'i gnas su ltung phyi dang/ /bsam pa rab tu brtan pa yis/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang/ /sa gsum po ni rab tu mchod/ /ji srid gtor ma ma btang bar/ /'khor lo'i phyi rol 'gro mi? bya/ /gang du dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma/ /
259b4(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ /'dod pa'i las ni rab tu bsgo/ /yi ge brgya pas brtan byas/ /rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni/ /'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad ni /legs par gsol ba gdab par bya/ /bzod par gsol ba sngon 'gro bas/ /thams cad kyang ni
259b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol/ /bsod nams yongs su bsngos byas te/ /dga' bas rab tu gnas par bya/ /tshogs kyi cho ga'i rnam par phye ba ste bzhi pa'o// //dkyil 'khor gyi ni las rnams la/ /sa gzhi bgegs bral yid 'ong bar//
259b6(rgyud 'grel): khru gang tshad du sa bcad de/ /'thas shing srog chags med par bya/ /dag byed lnga ni legs bskol bas/ /snyoms par byugs te rab tu mnye/ /sor ni nyi shu bzhi ldan par/ /dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /sngo dang ljang khu rdul med pa/ /nyer byug
260a1(rgyud 'grel): de la rin chen nam/ /'bru mar me tog skyon bral bas/ /ri dang gling dang nyi zlar bcas/ /zhing ni rab tu dag byas nas/ /'khor lo rin chen rta glang po/ /dmag mi khyim kyi bdag po dang/ /bud med rin chen rang gi
260a2(rgyud 'grel): lus/ rang gi yon tan kun ldan par/ /rnam bkod mgon po la rab dbul/ /dag pa'i sa la bdag gnyis dang/ /rin chen bdun ni bkod pa 'am/ /dag pa'i zhig ni bco lnga dang/ /lus ngag yid dang 'dod pa'i tshogs/ /lnga ni rab tu
260a3(rgyud 'grel): dbul ba dang/ /rdo rje pad+ma rA ga dang/ /mrgad dang ni karke ta/ /chu shel sbug dang baiDUrya/ /dbang sngon po dang ldan par dbul/ /dung dang dung chen pad+ma dang/ /pad+ma che dang bum pa dang/ /gter dang 'dod pa'i ba nyid dang/ /dpag bsam shing
260a4(rgyud 'grel): chen rab rgyas pa/ /dpa' bos mgon po la rab dbul/ /ri dang nyi zla gling bzhi po/ /badzra re ge hUM brjod nas/ /dag pa'i sems kyis dbul bar bya/ /sman dang rin chen ma gtogs par/ /lan mang du ni dgod mi bya/ /mu yi sngags ni sngon
260a5(rgyud 'grel): brjod pas/ /gtsang ma'i gnas su dor bar bya/ /dpa' mo mchog gi sems dmigs nas/ /rang gi lha yi bsam gtan gyis/ /sa ni skyon dang bral gyur pa/ /bskos te rab tu sbyar bar bya/ /rin chen dri yis chur bcas pas/ /gong bu dag ni
260a6(rgyud 'grel): sngon byams nas/ /sngags 'dis byin gyi brlabs par bya/ /na mo b+ha ga ba te bai ro tsa na pra b+hA rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ arha te/ saM myak? saM bud+d+ha ya / tadya thA/ oM sAk+Sh+me sUk+Sh+me saM me saM ma/ shAn+te dAnde/ a sa mA ro pa/ a nA lam+be / tar
260a7(rgyud 'grel): ma be ya sho pa ti ma hA te dza ni dA ku le/ nirba Na sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya/ a d+hiSh+Thi na/ a d+haSh+Thi te swAhA/ nyi shu rtsa gcig mngon brjod pas/ /sku yi de nyid rab dran bya/ /de nas dum bu ci rigs par/ /chos gang rgyu 'byung sogs
260b1(rgyud 'grel): brjod nas/ /rgyar ni rab tu gdab par bya/ /de nas mgon po rnam snang dpal/ /gang chen mtshor ni legs dmigs nas/ /mchod de me tog rab tu dor/ /'gro ba gzung phyir gsol btab nas/ /rgya cher yongs su bsngo bar bya/ /chos gang rgyud 'byung la
260b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa/ /thams cad du ni bsngags par bya/ /des ni 'gro ba'i 'tsho byed cing/ /sdig kun rnam dag byed pa dang/ /las dang yang dag grub ster ba'i/ /las la dga' dang ldan pa yis/ /sngags pas rtag tu 'bad par bya/ /gang du yid
260b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jug bgegs spangs pa/ /dkar zhing snum pa'i sa gzhi la/ /bslang dang mchod pa sogs byas te/ /zlum po khru gang tshad byas la/ /sor ni bcu gnyis rab tu bsko/ /sor gnyis skyed de bzhi yis yang/ /legs byas shin tu dkar par byug/ /
260b4(rgyud 'grel): phyi nas pad+ma'i phreng byas te/ /dbus su pang dbus pad dkar nyid/ /steng du rdo rje 'am pad dkar phreng/ /yid du 'ong ba bri bar bya/ /sgo dang rta babs dang ldan par/ /re gas yongs su bskor bar bya/ /ku shas g.yas skor nyid byas nas/ /tsanda sgron shing n+ya gra d+ha/
260b5(rgyud 'grel): thang shing la sogs 'o ma can/ /thab kyi dbyibs bzhin cung zad dma'/ /yam shing sor ni bcu gnyis la/ /lo ma me tog dang ldan zhing/ /tsan dan dkar po'i chus btags te/ /dkar po'i snod du legs par bzhag /mchod yon zhal ?
260b6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs dang/ /til dang yung kar 'bras chen zho/ /zan dang 'o ma ku sha dang/ /dur ba 'bras dang nas dang gro /so ba dang ni ma sha sogs/ /dngul sogs snod du legs par bzhag /bram ze 'am dge 'dun khyim las kyes/ /me ni rlung yab kyis
260b7(rgyud 'grel): sbar zhing/ /rig byed yi ge sngon 'gro bas/ /dzwa la dzwa la hUM zhes brjod/ /thab ni khang pa nyid byas nas/ /de dbus raM las bskyed pa yi/ /las kyi lha ni bsam par bya/ /mdog dkar zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ /pad dkar rab tu rgyas pa dang/ chu
261a1(rgyud 'grel): shel phreng ba legs 'dzin cing/ /spyi blugs dang ni dung bsnams te/ /ra skyes pad dkar gdan la bzhugs/ /gos dkar shel sogs rgyan dkar dang/ /gos dkar zhi pas gzigs pa'o/ /legs dmigs
261a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'dis spyan drang bya/ /oM tshur sbyon tshur sbyon 'byung po che/ /lha yi drang srong bram ze mchog /bsregs blugs zhal zas pa zhes slad du/ /chen po 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhugs/ /badzra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ /las kyi chu yis
261a3(rgyud 'grel): bsangs nas kyang/ /dgug sogs las kyi ro mnyam bya/ /sku yis de nyid sngon 'gro bas/ /mchod yon zhal gsil la sogs kun/ /swA hA dang/ ni rab ldan pas/ ma lus pa ni dbul bar bya/ /thab 'dra'i gdan la legs
261a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas te/ /byang gi phyogs su mngon phyogs pas/ /lag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur gyis/ /gzar bu legs par gzung nas su/ /zhi ba'i sems ni sngon 'gro bas/ /yam shing mar nas brtsams nas kyang/ /rdzas rnams thams cad rab tu
261a5(rgyud 'grel): dbul/ /oM agna ye swAhA/ til ni grangs mthar tshang bar bya/ /dad pas me ni 'bar byas nas/ /de nas rang gi lha rnams ni/ /rang rang gi ni cho ga ltar/ /bskyed dang spyan drang sogs spyad nas/ /mchod de yam shing mar la sogs/ /
261a6(rgyud 'grel): snying po zhi ba'i las rab bskul/ /dgang blugs bdun ni kun tu dbul/ /me yi lha la las kyi sngags/ /oM sarba pA ba daM ha na badzra ya/ sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ /lha ni gshegs gsol la sogs pa/ /spyad byas me'i lha rab mchod
261a7(rgyud 'grel): las dang dngos grub rnam bslangs nas/ /gshegs su gsol byas rab tu bsdu/ /yang na dpal ldan rdo rje sems/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pu/ /pad dkar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas te/ /sku ni drang
261b1(rgyud 'grel): po'i bdag nyid la/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' zhing/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur ldan/ /dung dang kun da zla 'dra dang/ /dang po rdo rje dril 'dzin zhing/ /cod pan sogs pas rnam par mdzes/ /'od dkar zla ba la brten cing/ /sems can
261b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams la rab rtse'i bdag /bskyed de spyan drang mchod sogs bya/ /yi ge drug ni mngon brjod nas/ /mgon po'i las la de nas bskul/ /mthar ni las rnams thams cad spyad/ /yi ge brgya ni rab brjod nas/ /don rnams gsol zhing nye bar
261b3(rgyud 'grel): spyad/ /de ltar sngags dang mchod pa rnams/ /zung du ma thim pa nyid gces/ /gzer bu la sogs mi 'byor na/ /g.yas pa'i mthe bos mdza' mnan te/ /g.yon gyi sor mo lnga gzhibs nas/ /mchod sbyin rab spyad de nas ni/ /ci bde bar
261b4(rgyud 'grel): yang gsungs pa nyid/ /yang na thab khung la sogs pa/ /bri ba la sogs bde bar spyad/ /mar dang til dang yams shing rnams/ /med par sbyin bsreg las rnams ni/ /zhi sogs dag pa nyid mi 'gyur/ /de bas mkhas pas tshul shes pas/
261b5(rgyud 'grel): cho ga thams cad spyad par rigs/ /thams cad du ni sems dge bas/ /spyod bcu rab gnas bdag nyid bya/ /sems dge rab tu bsgrubs pa yis/ /las rnams thams cad don chen du/ /'gyur bar gsungs pa shes byas na/ /byang chub sems
261b6(rgyud 'grel): ni sngon 'gro bas/ /nyin dang mtshan mo nam du yang/ /dus 'das don med mi bya ste/ /sbyang dang tshogs ni 'phel bar bya/ /sa gzhi yid 'ong bdag can bu/ /sems dge me tog sil mas bkang/ /gdan la sogs pas rab brgyan to?/ /sku gzugs
261b7(rgyud 'grel): gsung rab mchod rten dang/ /rdo rje dril bu rig la sogs/ /yid du 'ong ba legs par dgong/ /de la phyag sogs gus byas te/ /mchod yon zhal gsal me tog sogs/ /mar me dri dang bza' ba dang/ /sgra dang gar dang glu dbyangs rnams/ /rgya cher
262a1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu dbul bar bya/ /de ltar dge ba rnams brten nas/ /yang dag yid du 'ong ba rnams/ /'byor ram yang na sbrul pa yis/ /nam mkha' gang bar byas nas kyang/ /yon tan ldan pa thams cad du/ /tshad
262a2(rgyud 'grel): med sems kyis dbul bar bya/ /de ltar dge la rnam brten nas/ /dpag med 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir/ /chad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /'bras bu yongs su bsngo bar bya/ /sbyin pa dang ni yon gnas dang/ /bdag dang rdzas dang
262a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu dang/ /rang dam gzhan nam gnyi ga 'am/ /sgyu med par yang skye min pas/ /rang bzhin gyi ni mi dmigs shing/ /snang ba med pa'i bdag nyid la/ /sems ni brtan par rab tu bzhag/ de las langs nas sems dpa' mchog
262a4(rgyud 'grel): gos pa med cing dri ma bral/ /'khor ba dag pa'i chos brjod bya/ /de ltar gnas pa'i mi mchog ste/ /tshangs dang dbang phyug dbang po dang/ /khyab 'jug dang ni gzhon nu dang/ /dga' byed nor sbyin la sogs pa/ /dregs pa chen po dang ldan pa'i
262a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyang/ /brtse dang ldan pas bspung ba dang/ /don grub rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang/ /man ngag shin tu rnyed dka' bas/ /de yi lag na nye bar gnas/ /sa steng grags pa dang ldan zhing/ /dgos pa thams cad
262a6(rgyud 'grel): yid bzhin du/ /skye bo mang pos rab tu sgrug /dbul ba dang ni sdug bsngal dang/ /nad? dang bkren pa nyer zad byed/ /dag byed sgrub pa'i pho nya dag /'bad pa med par mdun du gnas/ /de yi spyod pa mi nyams shing/ /rnam gsum grol ba'i
262a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid 'gyur/ /de ni skye bos mthong gyur na/ /sdig pa thams cad rab zhi zhing/ /thar pa'i lam la 'jug par 'gyur/ /las kun 'bras bu dang ldan zhing/ /mtho ris mi yul sa 'og tu/ /spyod cing sems can rjes 'dzin bde/ /?
262b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum sa la rdo rje 'dzin/ /rgyal mchog de ni chags shing gnas/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho srid pa'i rba rlabs drags po dang ldan zhing/ /nyon mongs sbrul dang chu srin sogs ni gdug pa'i mtshe bar ldan/ /tshe ni mi rtag dbang med rnam rtog rlung
262b2(rgyud 'grel): gis g.yos mthong nas/ /dpal 'byung 'chi med dam pa'i chos la 'bad pas nyer gnas gyis/ /dri med lung las bshad mthong mgon pos rjes bzung bas/ /kun bzang spyod la snang ba rab skyes dga' dang ldan/ /log par ltung la nyer
262b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs 'gro la rnam brtse bas/ /snying po rgyan gyur cho ga rgyud kun tshul 'di byas/ /dad pas nyer bsgrubs skyon bral dge ba rnams rgyas pas/ /'gro bas lam rtogs dri med 'bras la nyer gnas shog /dad pas spyod pa'i tshul byas la/ /
262b4(rgyud 'grel): don dang sgra yig 'khrul gyur pa/ /bla ma mkha' i 'gro grub kun gyis/ /nyer brtser bdag la bzod par mdzod/ /gsang ba thams cad kyi spyi'i cho ga snying po rgyan ces bya ba/ /slob dpon 'jam dpal grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// /
262b5(rgyud 'grel): bal po'i mkhan po ka na ka sh+rI dang/ lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o/ /slad kyis rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta ha sye badzra dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong nyi ma rdo rjes bsgyur?  cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
262b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga zhes bya 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa bzhugs/ /rgya gar skad du/ gaN tsakra bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang
262b7(rgyud 'grel): dag bde bas ma lus gang/ /dngos grub ster mdzad brtse ba can/ /rnam grol chos sku'i bdag nyid de/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal/ /dpal ldan gsang ba'i rgyud las ni/ /gsung sogs shin tu spas pa nyid/ /gsal bar mdor ba
263a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzes par ni/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga bshad/ /sngags pas khyad par mtshan mo'i dus/ /zhag re'ang ni ji snyed par/ /zla re dang ni lo re la/ /'khor lo las 'das nyams par 'gyur/ /nye bar 'tshe med dur
263a2(rgyud 'grel): khrod mgon/ /rdzing bu'i 'gram dang skyed mos tshal/ mtsho dogs chu klung ri sul dang/ rang gi khyim sogs 'bras bur bcas/ /yang dag brgyad po thob gyur pa/ dpal ldan chog shes snying rje ldan/ /'jig rten chos la mi
263a3(rgyud 'grel): chags shing/ /sring dang sgyu sogs rnam par spangs/ /snyan par smra zhing 'dzum pa'i bzhin/ /bzod can brtan la brtson 'brus ldan/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dbang phyug tu/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' gsungs/ /'khor lo
263a4(rgyud 'grel): ba yang de nyid kyi/ /slob ma sred sogs rnam par spangs// dbang bskur thob cing blo ldan bzod/ /brtson dang dran pa la sogs ldan/ dam tshig spyang bya spyod pa rnams/ rgan pa'i rim pa bzhin du 'dod/ /dbang ma thob pas mi rigs
263a5(rgyud 'grel): par/ /sgrub pos 'khor lor? bya'o/ /me tog bdug sogs mang me ldan/ /sna tshogs ston mo btung bas brgyan/ /mal stan yon tan bcas pa yis/ /'phags pa'i skye bo ci sogs pa'o/ /de nas tshogs kyi dbang phyug gdan/ /
263a6(rgyud 'grel): rol ma stag pags dur khrod ras/ /rgyan ni rang gi rigs las so/ /phyi rol dam pa'i phyag rgyas 'khyud/ /rang gi slob mas yongs su bskor/ /des kyang rang rig dag la 'khyud/ /ci nus bsam gtan dag gis bya/ /bla ma'i cho ga
263a7(rgyud 'grel): shes shing dran/ /brtson 'grus bzod dang ldan pa dang/ /bla ma la gus blo mthun pa/ /las kyi rdo rjer dngar? ba sngags/ /dbang bskur yang ni gdung can dang/ /thob dang sgyu can dag dang ni/ /dbang ma thob par 'khor lo gang/ /ring po
263b1(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang bstan mi bya/ /bla mas bde chen bsgom byas nas/ /'byung po kun la gtor ma sbyin/ /stobs la sogs pas sbyang byas la/ /me tog gis ni rang lus mchod/ /snod ni re re kun la sbyin /bla ma la ni snod? gnyis dbul/ /de bzhin
263b2(rgyud 'grel): bza' btung nyis 'gyur ro/ /de nas rang zhal he? khung du/ /rnam rig pa li'i mchod yon bya/ /lag pa dgang gzar blugs gzar gyis/ /yid kyis me lha stobs sogs bsregs/ /nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg gis?/ /rang 'dod lha ni tshim
263b3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /glu sogs kyis ni mnyes bya zhing/ /yang dang yang du brda tshig swa?/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lnga/ /rig ma mig bzangs brgyad la ni/ /cho ga bzhin du rten zhes bya?/ /ko la la sogs ci shas bya/ /he ru ka yi gzugs kyis? gar//
263b4(rgyud 'grel): dran pa brjed med rnal 'byor bya/ /sgom la chags pa'i sems kyis na?/ /rtag tu sems kyis goms par bya/ /rdo rje chos dang sangs rgyas kyi/ /rnal 'byor pha dang ma tshogs kun/ /glu dang gar la goms bya zhing/ /mchog tu glu dang gar bya'o/
263b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di nyid tshogs kyi bsrung ba ste/ /bdag nyid kyis kyang de bzhin bsrung/ /'di yis 'jig rten dbang du byed/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa 'di nyid yin/ /rgyun tu glu ni len pa dang/ /gang du rtag tu gar byed pa/ /tshogs kyi dbang phyug mdun bya'o/ /
263b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas dri ni mtshon par bya/ /sgog pa'i dri ni dang po ste/ /bya rgod spos ni gnyis pa yin/ /de nas ga bur tsan dan dri/ /glu dbyangs su ni mtshon bya ba/ /sgra ni dang ba bung ba'i sgra/ dri yi mthar ni thos pa dang/ /lce sbyang dag gi sgra yang ni/ /phyi rol bskyed mos
263b7(rgyud 'grel): tshal du mtshon/ /gang gi bdag gis mi rnyed pa 'am/ /snod ma yin pas 'jigs pa gang/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga sogs/ /bsam gtan kyis ni yongs su brtag /'khor lo'i dbang phyug byin brlabs pa/ /snod skyon rjes su gzung bar bya/ /bdud dang
264a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pas snod de ni/ /ha cang myur min bul ba min/ /bgegs sogs brnyas pa spang pa'i phyir/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgyas smra bar bya/ /? bsgra med cing ma yengs pas/ /cung zad 'thungs nas legs bkang
264a2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ phyag 'tshal pa yis khyad par gyis/ /gong gi phyag rgyas dbul par bya/ /sgrub pa po yis yang dang yang/ /de dag kun la phyag bya'o/ /snod na si la bzhag pa 'am/ /gzhan la byin par gyur pa na/ /lag nas sa bon chad
264a3(rgyud 'grel): pas bcad/ /rang gis thams cad mi btung ngo/ /bza' dang btung ba rang gis ni/ /shin tu ltogs kyang blang mi bya/ /rtsod pa la sogs byang byed pa/ /de nas de ni gdon par bya/ /gal te gdon par mi nus na/ /de tshe sdig pa la brtags
264a4(rgyud 'grel): pas/ rang nyid gzhan du 'gro ba 'am/ /mi smra ba la brten par bya/ /las kyi rdo rjes btung sogs la/ /rang gis blangs kyang nyes pa med/ /spyod lam shugs kyis phyir 'gro na/ /de ni dgag par mi bya'o/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal zhe sdang gis
264a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan snod dam pa ma yin pa'i/ /tshig gis smad dang rtsod pa'i gtam/ /mi dga' ba yang spang bar bya/ /bkag pa rnams ni spyod gyur na/ /rtsa ba'i ltung dang sbom po ni/ /myur du gso ba'i cho ga bya/ /de ni sdang ba'i cho gar grags/ /rdo rje slob
264a6(rgyud 'grel): dpon tshim gyur pas/ /bar du gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /glu gar la sogs rgyun du ni/ /de yis bka' yis gnang bar bya/ /tshogs kyi 'dus pas byas pa ni/ /lag pa rkang sogs bag ldan bya/ /shin tu bag med rgyu yi phyir/ /btung ba mang po
264a7(rgyud 'grel): spyad mi bya/ /ma dag gis ni g.yengs par 'gyur/ /g.yengs pas rnal 'byor 'khrugs 'gyur zhing/ /rnal 'byor nyams pas dngos grub med/ /bdud kyi las ni bzlog par dka' / /gang yang sems ni bsrung nus pas/ /rang ngam gzhan yang

264b2(rgyud 'grel): ji snyed lus kyi g.yo 'gul dang/ /ngag gi brjod pa ji snyed pa/ /de snyed pa/ /de snyed sngags dang phyag rgya ste/ /he ru ka dpal go 'phangs gnas/ /gang gi dug gi dum bu yis/ /skye bo rnams ni 'chi 'gyur ba/ /dug gi de nyid shes pa yis/ /dug gis dug ni 'joms

264b4(rgyud 'grel): yis/ rnal 'byor pa'i dga' nyams byed/ /de ltar cho gas 'khor lo cher/ /rang gi slob ma dbang bskur phyir/ /bsgom pa la sogs stobs nyid kyis/ /tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub ster/ /bsgom pa la sogs de bzhin 'dir/ /yang ni bka' gsal
264b5(rgyud 'grel): byed pas kyang/ /gal te ltung ba med gyur na/ /skye ba bcu drug dag la 'grub/ /bla mas tha ma'i gtor ma sbyin/ /de bzhin phyi rol lhag gtor nas/ /sgrub pa po yis phyag 'tshal zhing/ /smon lam dag ni gdang par bya/ /ma lus rtogs pa las 'das pa//
264b6(rgyud 'grel): srid zhi mnyam sbyor rtag mi 'gyur/ /dpe med bde ba'i ros dgyes pa'i/ /rnal 'byor tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje yan lag ma sbyar bas/ /gting gtog phung po yongs bcom 'gyur/ /bdag gi dge bas 'di yis ni/ /thabs 'di myur ba nyid ston
264b7(rgyud 'grel): shog/ dngos po kun gyis phyag byas nas/ /dpal ldan tshogs kyi 'khor lo yi/ /rim pa 'di ni bsdus nas kyang/ /ci bde bas na gnas par bya/ /'di ni bla ma'i rim thob pa'i/ /bdag nyid dran par bya ba'i phyir/ /cho ga cung bzad brjod pa la/ /

265a2(rgyud 'grel): 'chang yul skal bzang la chags shing/ sring pa las grol zhi ba'i phyag rgya chen po thob par shog /mahA paN+Di ta a b+hya ka ra guptas mdzad pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga rdzogs ho// //mahA paN+Di ta sh+rI ratna
265a3(rgyud 'grel): rak+Shi ta'i zhal snga nas// /rgya gar skad du/ ga Na tsakra de d+hi/ bod skad du/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshogs rnams bsag par bya ba dad//

265a5(rgyud 'grel): las thams cad pa'i skyes bu lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas chag chag bdab pa dang/ /maN+Dal bya ba dang me tog dgram pa dang/ /mchod pa bsham pa dang/ /phyogs skyong gi gtor ma rgya chen po la sogs pa bsham/ /de nas slob dpon

265a7(rgyud 'grel): bar 'os pa kun bkug la de dag gis gsol ba bdab pa?/ /khro po sngon po mdzes pa ste/ /khyod ni bzang po yid du 'od/ /nor rin chen gces bcings pa'i/ /dbyug pa phyag na bsnams pa ste/ /bdag ni 'khor ba las sgral phyir//

265b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje slob dpon la me tog phul gsol ba gdab/ /rnal 'byor pa kun la yang me tog gtor la bskul bar bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms la mos pa tsam gyis lce lag byin gyis brlab po/ /rdo rje dang dril bu yang
265b3(rgyud 'grel): hUM gis byin gyis brlabs la mngon par brtogs pa brjod/ /hUM thog ma med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems pa bdag po'i gtso/ /oM ma hwa badzra hUM/ dril bu yang/
265b4(rgyud 'grel): a(rgyud 'grel): sred pa rang bzhin gyis dag phyir/ /ngo bo nyid kyis gdod nas dag /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis/ /srid pa dam pa mchog tu byed/ /oM badzra g+haN+Da a/ de nas mchod pa'i khyad par thams cad 'bru gsum gyis byin gyis brlab po/
265b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyis 'od zer gyi bla ma dang bcas pa'i lha rnams nam mkha' la bltas la/ yon chab dang/ zhal pas le dang/ /zhabs bkru dbul zhing/ me tog nas sgra snyan gyi bar du rim pas mchod do/ /de nas de kho na 'am gzhung gang
265b6(rgyud 'grel): yin pas bstod pa bya/ /yan lag bdun pa mdo rgyas gang yang rung bya'o/ /yi ge brgya bas bzod gsol byas gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas shu n+yA ta'i sngags kyis stong pa nyid du bsgoms la/ /yi ge hUM gi snang ba las rab dang dra ba dang sa
265b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhing bsgoms la/ /de nas 'byung ba rim rtsegs ri rab rin po che'i rang bzhin bsgoms la de'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba la sna tshogs rdo rje bsams te/ de'i lte ba la b+h+ruM las gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas par bskyed nas/ der gang
266a1(rgyud 'grel): yin pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la ye shes kyi lha spyan drangs te mchod nas dbyer med par bstim mo/ /de nas chang la bsrung ba dang byin gyis brlab pa gzhung bzhin byas te/ /yi ga ha dmar pos kha dog
266a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs la/ he dkar pos dri dan gsal te h+rI(rgyud 'grel): mthing kha nus pa bcom nas bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsams la/ /de nyid kyi 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bkug ste bstim mo/ /de nas rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha la so so'i ming
266a3(rgyud 'grel): nas brjod cing mchod de/ /de nas bdud rtsi dang bcas pa'i srin lag gis maN+Dal gru gsum bris la der bdud rtsi btor bas zla ba'i gdan phyogs mtshams su gyur par bsam mo/ /der ye shes 'khor lo mos pa tsam gyis bsams la bdud rtsis
266a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod de /de nas bdag nyid la mchod de 'di ltar 'theb srin gyis lce rtsa dang sme ma'i dbus dang spyi bor gtor ro/ /de nas de dag mi dmigs par bsams la gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor la yon chab la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis mchod de bstod
266a5(rgyud 'grel): pa byas la gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas zhing skyong rnams la gtor ma rgya chen po btang ste yi ge 'bru gsum gyis sbyang btang sbar ba dang/ /rtogs par byas la/ maN+Dal thig bzhi btab pa'i le'u tshe dgu bar byas te dbus ma la ye shes kyi
266a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lon bsam/ /phyogs 'tshams la zhing skyong brgya dam mo sum cu gnyis dang bcas pa spyan drangs la mchod do/ /oM shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang/ ri bo dang ni ri su la phug /grong dang bzhi mang? nyid dang ni/ khyad par du na khang stong dang//
266a7(rgyud 'grel): rigs su ngan khyim dang thang dang? ni/ /khyad par du ni chu la gnas/ /nag po drag po drag chen po/ /lha spyir mnyam du bsten pa dang/ /nag po gtsigs dang mi sdug pa/ /dga' las 'das pa'i log 'dren rnams/ /rgan byed mo dang drag mo dang/ /mi sdug//
266b1(rgyud 'grel): ma dang u ma dang/ /rgyal ma rnam par rgyal ba ma/ /mi thub gzhan gyi mi thub ma/ /nag mo bzang mo nag chen mo/ /nag skom? ma rnal 'byor ma/ /dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo/ /rab tu sdang dang 'phyang ba mo/ /'phrog phyed ma dang dmar ser ma//
266b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byed grong nas rnal 'byor ma/ drag mo gzugs dang gzugs chen mo/ /mche ba gtsigs dang thod chen ma/ /thod 'phre 'phreng can kha TwAM ma/ /sprul chen ral gri dgra sta? can/ /rdo rje'i bzhin gzhu can ma/ /da bzhin gshegs pa mkha' 
266b3(rgyud 'grel): chen po/ /las kun rjes su sgrub byed ma/ /de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen de/ /rdul med rnal 'byor 'byin pa'o/ /rdo rje dbang mo bka' 'di yis/ /thams cad ma lus 'dir 'dus shig /oM kak+ka d+hA na ba
266b4(rgyud 'grel): b+han d+ha na/ khakh+kha d+han/ sarba duSh+TaM ha na ha na/ /g+ha ta ya g+hA ta ya/ a mu ka hUM dzwa(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas bkug la pad+ma'i gdan la gnas par bsams la/ mchod pa lngar byin gyis brlabs la de nyid dbul te /so so'i lce hUM las rdo rjer byin gyis
266b5(rgyud 'grel): brlabs pa'i rdo rje'i spu gu'i 'od kyis bdud rtsi mchod par bsams la chos bshad de/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod do/ /de nas spron lam gdab ste/ /sems can thams cad sdig med cing/ semS
266b6(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad bde gyur cig /gang gis lam nas 'gro ba yis/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang phrad par shog /ma sgral ba rnams bsgral bar bya/ /ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol/ /de ltar nyid du rjes brtse bas/ /rnal 'byor bstan bcos
266b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas la dogs ces pas bsngo ba byas la gshegs su mi gsol lo/ /de nas rnal 'byor pa pho mo kun lha'i dkyil 'khor du bltas la dang por dris mchod/ /de nas me tog dang bdug pa dang mar mes tshul bzhin du mchod/ de nas bdud rtsi'i
267a1(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa'i chang gis mchod de/ /de nas lag pa g.yas par chang gzung la g.yon pa rtse gsum par byas te chig 'dis chang sbyin te/ ltos shig mdzes pa dam tshig chos/ /de la the tshom yod ma yin//
267a2(rgyud 'grel): bram ze khyi dang gdol ba gsum/ /rang bzhin gcig tu rtogs pas bza' / /zhes brjod la drang ngo/ /len pa pos brjod pa/ /'dod chags dri ma dang bral ba'i/ /rin thang med las legs 'ongs chos/ /gzung dang 'dzin med rnam par
267a3(rgyud 'grel): spangs/ /de kho na nyid la bdag phyag 'tshal zhes brjod pa pad+mas bskor ba dang bcas pas bla'o?/ /de nas 'og ma rnams phrang pa la 'di skad brjod de/ /sbyor ba'i dngos grub don du ni/ /spyod kun de nyid de bzhin du/ /rnal 'byor pa yis
267a4(rgyud 'grel): kun tu sbyang/ /ji ltar bde ba spyad par bya zhes brjod la drang ngo/ /de'i 'og tu sha dang mngal sogs pas mchod do/ /de nas bshos so sor drangs la/ de dag kun gyi bud bsdus la slob dpon la dbul/ slob dpon gyi phung cha gnyis su
267a5(rgyud 'grel): mgos la/ /cha gcig byin gyis brlabs g.yon phyogs su bzhag ste dkyil 'khor gyi lha la dbul/ /cha gcig g.yas su bzhag la byin gyis brlabs te phyogs skyong gi gtor mar dbul te/ oM a kA ro mu khaM zhes pa'i sngags
267a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis mchod la de nas ci bder rol zhing spyod do/ /skabs der bkra shis kyi glu blang ngo/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang phyogs skyod la gnang ba nod pa dang bzod gsal byas la gshegs gsol lo/ /de nas ye shes kyis lha la
267a7(rgyud 'grel): yi ge brgyabs? bzong gsol byas la badzra mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas gshegs su gsol/ /dam tshig gi lha la oM At+ma tiSh+Tha d+hU zhes brjod la bdag gi snying gar bsdu'o/ /oM sarba duSh+Tha? grihma gats+tsha hUM zhes pas phyi rim gyi lha gshegs su gsol lo//
467b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas lhag ma bsdus te khyim gyi lhag ma ni khyim de nyid kyi mi ma yin pa la bsngo'o/ /rnal 'byor ba rnams kyi lhag ma ni phyi rol gyi sha za la sogs pa'i mi ma yin pa rnams la sbyin de phyi'i sgor bskyol/ /lhag ma de lta bu bza' ba'i skal ba
467b2(rgyud 'grel): med pa la yang slob dpon gyi kha nas bdud brtsi byin no/ /de nas yon bdag la bkra shis dang smon lam gdab po/ /de nas gtor skyel log pa dang tshogs kyis khang pa'i sgong me long dang bu ? dkol dang/ chu chan gyi zho dang/ ? gyis mch+do go/
467b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas nang du phyin la rnal 'byor pa pho mo rnams la yang de ltar mchod par bya'o/ /ma 'ongs skye bo gang dag tshogs rnams bsag par 'dod pa dang/ /bslab pa'i lam la ris par zhugs pa'i sgrub pa po/ /dag gi dri med lung dang bla ma'i mdams
467b4(rgyud 'grel): dag ltar/ /ma nor bzung ste bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i phyir du dris pa yin/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa'i cho ga slob dpon nag po pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ //rgya gar gyi mkhan po kri d+hA pa de nyid dang/
467b5(rgyud 'grel): bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas bcas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la bab pa'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ ga Na tsakra bid+hi/ bod skad du/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag
467b6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /shin tu dad pa chen po yis/ /rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal nas/ /mdor bsdus tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni/ /yang dag par ni brtsams par bya/ /dngos rub thams cad 'grub byed pao/ /rtag tu bya 'am zla bar ni/ /yang na lo rin ni bya/ /longs
467b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyong mchog dang ldan pas ni/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo mchod par bya/ /rang gi slob ma dag dang ldan/ /de yang dam tshig sdom la gnas/ /yon tan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du ni/ /bde ba chen po dang ldan nas/ /de ltar dam
268a1(rgyud 'grel): tshig dbus gnas la/ /rang gi ting 'dzin rdzogs byas nas/ /dang po 'byung po'i gtor ma gtang/ /de nas rim bzhin bzhugs su gsol/ /de yang shes rab dang ldan par/ /med na ting nge 'dzin gyis bsam/ /me
268a2(rgyud 'grel): tog spos dang mar me dang/ /dri chab phreng dang na bza' dang/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du ni/ /gza' ba btung ba lha bshos rnams/ /de dag gis ni mchod par bya/ /de ltar phyi yi mchod byas nas/ /nang gi mchod pa dag ni bya/ /pad+ma lta
268a3(rgyud 'grel): bur rang gi kha/ /haM? khung nyid du bsam byas la/ /dgang bzang bkang ba blugs par bya/ /lag pa blugs gzar dag gi kyang/ mchod rdzas yang dag dbul bar bya/ /de ltar haM gyis mchod byas nas/ /rang gi dka' ba'i rtsed mo yis//
268a4(rgyud 'grel): yi dam lha ni myos? par bya/ /tshogs kyis mchod la dam tshig spyod/ /sems ni brtan par shes rab spyod/ /btud pa'i snod ni mang gyur na/ /kun la re re sbyin par bya/ /bla ma la ni nges par gnyis/ /yang dag par ni dbul
268a5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /gza' ba gang zhes bla ma pa'o/ /bla ma la dang brtson 'grus ldan/ /sems bzang bzod dang ldan pa yis/ /las rnams kun ni bya ba yin/ /sngags pa rang gis byin rlabs nas/ /gzhan dag la ni sbyin par bya/ /de yis
268a6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma phyag rgya yis/ /gus par byas te blang bar bya/ /ma dad pas ni bang mi bya/ /sgom yab kun ni btang mi bya/ /bkres skom yod kyang rang gi ni/ /blang bar ni mi bya'o/ /bdud rtsi bzhin du btung bar bya/ /sa la bong bar mi bya zhing//
268a7(rgyud 'grel): slar ni skyogs ni sbyin par bya/ /gnang ba byin nas sa la gzhag /btang ba gzhan la sbyin mi bya/ /sa la 'jog pa chang bas bcad/ /rtsod byed slob don la smod dang/ /nga rgyal dang ni ldan pa ni/ /tshogs kyi nang du bzhag mi bya/
268b1(rgyud 'grel): bla ma dag gi bza' bdud la/ /gnang med len par byed gyur pa/ /chad pas bcad dam yang na dbyung/ /de nyid mi nyan par 'gyur na/ /rang gi gnas nas gzhan du 'gro/ /yang na nyal la 'dug par bya/ /gang zhig dngos grub 'dod pa las//
268b2(rgyud 'grel): 'thab mo pa sogs sems kyis kyang/ /ngos pa ru ni bsam mi bya/ /byas gyur phyis ni mi bya ba'i/ /sdom pa yang dag par ni blang/ /ra ni ro bar gyur na ni/ /nan tan gyis ni lus ngag bsngam/ /las kyi rdo rje dag gis ni/ /rang gis blangs te
268b3(rgyud 'grel): bza' bar bya/ /de nas skyon ni med par bstan/ /gar la sogs pa'i rol mo rnams/ /gnang ba med par mi bya'o/ /gang la gnang ba byin pas yis/ /tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /de yi skad cig nyid la bya/ /de ltar gang gis ma byas
268b4(rgyud 'grel): las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' cag go /phyi rol tu ni 'byung ba'i tshe/ /lus ngag yid gsum bsdam byas te/ /bla ma la ni phyag byas la/ /phyi rol tu ni 'byung bar bya/ /spyod yul du ni bab? gyur na/ /sdug bsngal gyis ni bzung mi bya//
268b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba thams cad bsngal la ni/ /dga' ba dang ni bcas par bya/ /sems kyi dran pa med gyur na/ /lha yi ting 'dzin dang mi ldan/ /ting nge 'dzin dang mi ldan na/ /lha yi dngos grub thob mi 'gyur/ /ting nge 'dzin la yangs gyur na/ /skyon de
268b6(rgyud 'grel): grong ma nyid dang mtshungs/ /rtse gcig sdems? kyis dngos grub 'thob/ /der? 'dug par mi nus na/ /phyag byas la ni 'gro bar bya/ /lhag ma thams cad bsdus nas ni/ /phyi rol tu ni gtor ma gtang/ /rdzogs nas mgu ba la sogs sbyin//
268b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag gi byas la ni bzang por gsol/ /tshigs? bcad? khong lo'i cho ga byang? 'bras/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag gis gar thob pa/ /khams gsum sems can rnams ni yang dag par/ /dngos grub chen po yang dag thob gyur cig/ /paN+Di ta bzang po 
269a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pas tshogs kyi 'khor lo mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya sh+rI b+hu drA dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos 'gyur ba'o// //
269a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya bzhugs/ slob dpon rdo rje he ru kas mdzad pa/ /rgya gar skad du/ ga Na tsakra bi d+hi tsin+ta ma Ni nA ma/ bod skad du/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba/ /
269a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchog dang thun mong kun gyi gzhi/ /lam dang dngos grub mthar phyin pa/ /rgyud las gsungs pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /der 'dir bsdus te brjod par bya/ /dam tshig nyams pa'i skyon sel cing//
269a4(rgyud 'grel): mi mthun phyogs rnams 'joms byed pa/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa nyid/ /lhag pa'i lha yang tshim par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ni/ /myur du lung bstan thob par byed/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga yi/ /rim 'dis
269a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byin/ /ji ltar yang dag sbyor ba las/ /rab tu bshad kyis lha mo nyon/ /'dod pa'i don kun grub byed cing/ /dge ba'i tshogs la 'dud pa gang/ /zos pas dngos grub 'gyur ba nyid/ /de bzhin rdo rje phreng ba
269a6(rgyud 'grel): las/ de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa 'dis/ /gang zhig mchod pa bzhin du spyad/ /rang bzhin dngos grub nye ba nyid/ /'dir ni mgon dang dus dang ni/ /gnas dang rdzas dang bya ba'o/ /mchog tu gyur pa'i cho ga
269a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dis/ /gang zhig dngos grub mngon du 'gyur/ /de la tshogs gyi 'khor lo'i sgra/ /don ni dgos pa'i sgo nas te/ /mgron gyi rang bzhin bshad par bya/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'phreng ba las/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i ting nge 'dzin/ /mnyam zhing gcig tu gyur
269b1(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /brda dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba shes/ /dam tshig ldan pa 'jug pa'o/ /de la mang du 'dus pa tshogs/ /'khor lo lha yi rim pa nyid/ /thun mong dus su bshad pa nyid/ /khyad par 'di yis shes par bya/ /thams cad du ni dam tshig cig
269b2(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa thams cad yongs su spangs/ /bla ma la gus ting 'dzin gnas/ /sbyin sogs yon tan rgyan spras pa'i/ /thabs 'dir tshogs kyi 'khor lo la/ /bgegs med par ni rab tu 'jug /gzhan du skyon dang bcas par 'gyur/ /thabs dang shes
269b3(rgyud 'grel): rab phan tshun du/ /yid 'phrog bya dang bya min mkhas/ /lo ni nyi shu lnga lon pas/ /lhag pa yongs su spang bar bya/ /yongs shes thabs ni thams cad la/ /shes rab gcig gis bya ba min/ /'dir ni sgrub pa gcig pa yi/ /bla mas slob ma
269b4(rgyud 'grel): rjes su gzung/ /ji skad sdom pa 'byung ba las/ /gang zhig dkyil 'khor dge bar 'gyur/ /slob dpon sngon du phyogs byas nas/ /slob dpon yon tan ma bsdams na/ /'jig rten pa yis dpyas par 'gyur ro/ /slob dpon med par gyur pa na/ /gzhan
269b5(rgyud 'grel): yang bla ma mtshan nyid ldan/ /'khor lo'i dbang phyug byas pa nyid/ /gus pa gcig pa'i tshul gyis spyad/ /de yang rdo rje phreng ba las/ /zhi sogs pa'i phrin las dang/ /sngags kyi sbyor ba'i cho ga shes/ /bya ba nyi shu'i dbye bas ni/ /bla ma'i cho ga bya ba
269b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang/ /brtson 'grus bsam gtan pha rol 'gro /nyin mtshan rtag par dge la spro/ /shes rab rno zhing bzo gnas mkhas/ /gnyis med yon tan gyis lci ba/ /'di ni dpal ldan bla ma'o/ /nang du gsang ba 'dus la sogs
269b7(rgyud 'grel): phyi ru nyan thos spyod pa can/ /man ngag rim pa'i khyad par gyis/ /ji ltar rigs pa'i spyod pa la/ /slob ma rje 'dzin ston pa dngos/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor la sogs dang/ /mdo dang las kyi tshogs rnams dang/ /don dam pa yi bya ba mkhas/ /snang ba gsum
270a1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa la/ /rang gis goms 'gyur gzhan la ston/ /rnal 'byor rim pa'i slob dpon te/ /yid 'phrog bsdud pas slob dpon no/ /de nyid bcu ni yongs su shes/ /dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i las la mkhas/ /slob ma rjes 'dzin
270a2(rgyud 'grel): nus pa dang/ /gsang ba'i dbang gi mthar son pa/ /shes rab snying rje mtshungs par ldan/ /rgyud kyi rim pa'i sbyor ba mkhas/ /zab mo'i spyod pa rab ldan pa/ /'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' dngos/ /ji skad phyag na rdo rje yis/ /'khor lo sdom pa 'grel
270a3(rgyud 'grel): pa las/ /thun mong bsod nams bsag pa'i rgyu/ /ye shes dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs/ /dge bsnyen pha ma la sogs pa/ /slob dpon dag la rab tu phyogs/ /gsang sngags theg pa'i cho ga 'dir/ /slob dpon rnam pa gsum yin la/ /khyim pa
270a4(rgyud 'grel): dge tshul dge slong ste/ /tha ma 'bring dang mchog yin no/ /sbyin bdag blo gros mi 'phel phyir/ /thun mong spang bya'i slob dpon ni/ /snying rje med cing khro ba dang/ /khengs shing chags la mi brtan pa/ /bslab pas ma bsdams 'dod pa che/ /rang la bstod la mi bya'o//
270a5(rgyud 'grel): khyad par khyim pa'i slob dpon ni/ /bud med bcas shing dkor zas dang/ /zhing las g.yo ga dang tshod pa dang/ /rmongs pa rnyed phyir cho smra ba/ /'di ni tshogs kyi slob dpon min/ /'dir ni tshul khrims yon tan ldan/ /rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor la sogs pa la
270a6(rgyud 'grel): yon bdag zil gnon bkur ba'i gnas/ /'di nyid 'khor lo'i dbang phyug 'gyur/ /'dis ni dkyil 'khor gtso bo dag /ma byas yon bdag bsod nams nyams/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'di nyid du/ /dam tshig sdom pa ma gcig na/ /'khor lo'i dbang

270b1(rgyud 'grel): rim gzhan du gyur pa na/ /rnal 'byor lhag pa'i lha la mchod/ /de yi rjes rim pa 'dis/ /skad cig byed pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /bsgrub pa de yis lha mchod pa/ /'di nyid yang dag mtshan nyid yin/ /tha dad so so'i rgyud dag gis/ /bslab pas grel par
270b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa la/ /pa/? yi rim pa so so yi/ /phan tshun dam tshig sbyor mi shes/ /'khor lo'i cho ga nyams pa nyid/ /de rnams mgron gyi rnam bzhag go /de nas lha yi brgyal gyis/ /gong du gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /maN+Dal sngon du 'gro ba yis/ /sngags
