270b5(rgyud 'grel): snam/ ji ltar 'dod cing ji ltar nus/ /grub par nus na nyin re'am/ /lo zla kun tu bya ba'o/ /gnas ni dben par gsad pa yi/ /'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bya/ /phyag rgya chen po thig le las/ /thams cad 'jigs pa spangs pa yi/ /skye bos dben zhing
270b6(rgyud 'grel): yang 'phrog ba/ /grod dam ldum ra zhags tshil dang/ /dur khrod ri yi phug tu'o/ /dang po yid 'jug byi dor bya/ /dkyil 'khor rnam par me tog dgram/ /rdo rje phreng pa'i rgyud las ni/ /me tog sna tshogs bkram pa yi/ /gzhal yas khang gis
270b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par smras/ /de dag gnas kyi rnam bzhag go /gang zhig dam tshig med par ni/ /bu la sogs pa'ang mi gzhug go /ji skad sdom pa 'byung ba las/ /yongs su grub pa'i gnas dag dang/ /gdan la 'jug par bya ba ni? dgon dang gzhon pa'i dbye bas dor
271a1(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon rjes su 'jug par bya/ /snod dang mi ldan nga rgyal che/ /bla ma'i skyon rtog shes rgyud rtsub/ /gong ma'i dbang gis ma smin pa/ /rang gi bu dang chung ma dang/ /de bzhin bran dang bran mong bcas/ /dngos grub
271a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod phyir sgrub pa pos/ /dam tshig 'di dag gzhug mi bya/ /de ltar 'di dag gzhug pa na/ /rmongs dang dngos grub ring bar 'gyur/ /dam tshig dral gyur sdug bsngal zhing/ /de bzhin lus ngag yid kyis myong/ /gnas nas 'thon dang phun
271a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs nyams/ /sna tshogs sdug bsngal myong ba nyid/ /sgrub pos 'di bzhin mchod pa'i yul/ /pha rol rnal 'byor dngos grub nyams/ /dam tshig med pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /nam yang bskor bar mi bya'o/ /mchod yul rnam par bzhag pa ni//
271a4(rgyud 'grel): tshul dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu/ /snyan gsan phab pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /slob dpon rjes su 'jug par bya'o/ /phyi ru rnal 'byor khrus byas nas/ /sgo dag skyong ba'i slob dpon la/ /tshig bcad 'di yis 'jug par bya/ /khro bo sngon po mdzes
271a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ /khyed na dam tshig yid du 'ong/ /nor bu rin chen spras pa yi/ /dbyug pa phyag na bsnams pa nyid/ /bdag ni 'khor ba las bsgral phyir/ /rnal 'byor tshogs kyi dbus dag tu/ /bzang po'i sgo ni phye nas su/ /dpa' bos gnang
271a6(rgyud 'grel): gis gtang du gsol/ /nang du stan la rgan rim gyis/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rim pa 'am/ /yang na gral gyi rim pa'o/ /de nas slob dpon yon bdag gis/ /ri rab steng du skad cig la/ /gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang dkyil du//
271a7(rgyud 'grel): lhag pa'i lha yi gzugs su blta/ /dam tshig sems dpa' i rang bzhin la/ /ye shes sems dpa' gzhug par bya/ /a rg+ha dang ni zhal gsil dang/ /bsang chu sngon du 'gro ba yis/ /me tog phreng ba spos la sogs/ /thun ming gi ni mchod pa dbul//
271b1(rgyud 'grel): yon gyi bdag pos bstod pa bya/ /dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor los sgyur/ /ye shes lnga dang sku gsum nyid/ /'gro ba skyob la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ji snyed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /kun tu rtog pa 'ching gcod cing/ /'jig rten bya ba
271b2(rgyud 'grel): rab 'jug ma/ /de snyed rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yod med rtog pa las grol zhing/ /'khor 'das rnam pa gnyis med pa/ /dpe med bde bas gang gyur pa'i/ /'khor lo'i dpa' bo la sogs bstod/ /'dis ni mngon par brkyang phyag 'tshal lo/ /slob
271b3(rgyud 'grel): dpon rgyud kyi dbye bas der/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis rim pas ni/ /rang gi lha yi gzugs su 'gyur/ /ji lta'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgom/ /yon bdag yi dam gzhan yin na/ /ston la rang gi yi dam ste/ /rjes la skad cig nyid la ni/ /yon bdag 'dod lha'i
271b4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor bsgom/ /rgyud las gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /las kyi rdo rje'i bya ba ni/ /ji skad bde mchog 'byung ba las/ /gtsang zhing zhi la blo gros ldan/ /rmongs dang ser sna rnam par spangs/ /thams cad dang ni mthun par lta/ /las kyi rdo
271b5(rgyud 'grel): rjer der rtog go/ de bzhin rdo rje phreng ba las/ /khyod ni rang 'byung rdo rje sems/ /mtshungs med las kyi rdo rje nyid/ /de nas sna tshogs gron? mo dang/ /sha dang chang ni mnyam por sbyor/ /longs spyod yid 'phrog bde ba can/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes
271b6(rgyud 'grel): a smra dang ni sa ni sa/ /mi dmin re ke la sogs/ /'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /tshogs kyi dkyil du dbul ba ni/ /yang dag sbyor ba'i rgyud las gsungs/ /'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs/ /ji ltar tshogs pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /bdud rtsi ril
271b7(rgyud 'grel): bu chu yis bsang/ /sngon du gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las/ /thog mar gtong ma chen po ni/ /sna tshogs pa yi bza' ba dang/ /btung pa dang ni ldan pa nyid/ /thog ma par dang tha ma ni/ lhag pa lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /gtor
272a1(rgyud 'grel): ma dbul bar bya ba ni/ /mdun du dri bzang sogs pas byug /dri yi thig les dkyil 'khor la/ /rang gi lha yi 'khor lo ni/ /cho ga bzhan du bskyed la mchod/ dam tshig sems dpa' mkha' nyid las/ /ye shes sems
272a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' dgug par bya/ /de yi rtsibs bcur khro bo bcu/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i lte ba la/ /sgrub pa po yi lha nyid de/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i phyi rol tu/ /'khor dang bcas pa'i phyogs skyong dang/ /zhing skyong dur khrod la sogs pa/ /ji ltar mngon rtogs
272a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis su/ /skad cig gis ni rang gi lha/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i gzugs su blta/ /yum dang bcas pa nyid du bsgom/ /dam tshig lin? gzhug par bya/ /ji ltar cho ga la sogs pa/ /gtor ma bdud rtsir byin brlabs te/ /rang rang sngags kyis
272a4(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar bya/ /khyad par so so'i mngon rtogs ni/ /gzhung mang 'jigs pas ma dris shing/ /yongs su grags pa cung zad bkod/ /de nas g.yon pa'i ming med dang/ /rgan po'i sor mo gnyis sbyar nas/ /shes rab khu ba byin gyis brlag /de yi
272a5(rgyud 'grel): mdun du chos 'byung bri/ /shes rab thabs kyi khu bas gtor/ /lhag pa lha yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /gzugs brnyan bzhin du gsal bar blta/ /bsrung bas byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas/ /ting 'dzin byed pa rgyun mi bcad/ /de nas las kyi rdo rje
272a6(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /slob dpon la ni snod gnyis dbul/ /gzhan pa rnams la re re'o/ /mchod rdzas bla ma nyis 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan rnams mnyam por shes/ /'ga' zhig tshim par ma gyur na 'ang/ /rang gis blang par mi bya ste/ /las kyi rdo rje las blangs
272a7(rgyud 'grel): na/ ltung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig lag nas lhung ba dag /dngos po gzhan gyi dga' bar bya/ /'dren pas ha cang gang ba min/ /len pa ha cang stongs pa min/ /phan tshun gcig la gcig min bzhin/ /'dod ces dag gis smra pa min/ /yang/
272b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dren pas pad skor phyag rgya ste/ /g.yon pas steng du bskyod par bya/ /len pas kyang ni de bzhin no/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni dbul bya zhing/ /'dren pas de bzhin shes par bya/ /g.yas pa'i lha srung? btsugs te/ /thog mar thabs dang shes rab la/ /gzigs
272b2(rgyud 'grel): shig mdzes pa dam pa'i chos/ /'di la the tshom bya mi rung/ /bram ze khyi dang gdol pa yang/ /rang bzhin gcig tu dgongs te rol/ /tshigs bcad 'dis ni sbyin par bya'o/ /yang ni len pa po yis ni/ /bde gshegs chos la rin thang med/ /'dod chags
272b3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs dri ma bral/ /gzung 'dzin rnam par spangs pa yis/ /de kho na nyid la skyabs su mchi'o/ /tshigs bcad 'dis ni len par bya'o/ /bla ma'i bka' drin gnang ba yi/ /snod ni sa la bzhag mi bya/ /gnang ba thob gyur bzhag par bya'o/ /de las gzhan
272b4(rgyud 'grel): du chad par 'gyur/ /slob dpon rjes gnang ma byin par/ /rnal 'byor bza' tung? bon gzhan min/ /slob dpon thog mar rang gi ni/ /phyag rgya mchod la de nas rol/ /btung ba dga' ba skyed pa tsam/ /de bas lhag dang chad pa min/ /bde ba skyed phyir btung ba ste//
272b5(rgyud 'grel): myos pa'i phyir ni ma yin no/ /rnal 'byor lha yi nga rgyal ni/ /dus rnams kun tu bya ba nyid/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud las ni/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lor 'dus pa na/ /gtam gyi rnyed pa la sogs pa/ /de bzhin g.yeng pa spang bar bya/ /mchil ma 'dod la sogs pa
272b6(rgyud 'grel): ? smad ? 'thog dang rgod pa dang/ /rkang lag brkyang bar mi bya'o/ /yang yang ldang dang 'dug pa dang/ /mgrin pa bsgyur sogs rtag tu spang/ /gang zhig dgos pa'i dbye ba la/ /brda skad phyag rgya bgo bar bya/ /'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor dbang phyus/ /gnang ba
272b7(rgyud 'grel): khyon par ma gyur par/ /gzhan du glu dang gang dang ni/ /de bzhin rol mo 'khrol la sogs/ /zab mo'i skad sogs 'dri ba min/ /gnang ba thob nas ci bder 'gyur/ /gang zhig bza' dang btung ba la/ /thing bdud rtsir sbyar byas la/ /de nas rang gi lte bar ni/ /gang 
273a1(rgyud 'grel): zhig dgos pa'i dbye ba yis/ /lha yi 'khor lo gnas par bsam/ /rang gis lag pa g.yas dang g.yon/ /blugs gzang dag dag? zad rang gzugs nyid/ /lte ba'i lha la mchod pa'i tshul/ /long spyod chogs kyis mchod par bya/ /de bzhin
273a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs la sogs pa'i yul/ /mig la sogs pa'i dbang po nyid/ /ji ltar lha yi gzugs kyis ni/ /rnam par dag pa'i ro gcig pa'i phan tshul shes pa nyid kyis/ /de yang rdo rje phreng ba las/ /lte ba pad+ma'i dbus su ni/ /dpa' bo dbang phyug dran pa nyid//
273a3(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig phan tshun gcig la gcig /rnam par dag par mi shes na/ /de la 'khor lo'i 'bras bu med/ /thams cad dngos grub 'bras nyams 'gyur/ /gang da? rim pa 'di yis na/ /phyi dang nang gis bdag nyid kun/ /ro gcig par ni spyad byas nas/ /de ni
273a4(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par 'gyur ba nyid/ /yang dag tshogs 'khor 'bras bu 'byin/ /myos byed bde ba bskyed pa'i tshe/ /glu dang gar ni byed 'dod na/ /gnang ba thob nas rdo rje gi?/ /glu gar rnal 'byor pa yis bya/ /de yang brtag gnyis rgyal pa las/ /glu ni rnam dag sngags gnas//
273a5(rgyud 'grel): gar ni sgom pa byed ba nyid/ /de yis phyir ni glu dang gar/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rgyun tu bya/ /dga' ba rdo rje bsdams pa yis/ /rkang pa rdo rje rtse gcig dang/ /rnal 'byor mnyam par bzhag pa yis/ /bde ba bskyed phyir ga ri nyid/ /thar pa'i rgyud ni brjod par bya'o
273a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyud las gsungs pa'i rim pa ste/ /gzhan du du gnang ba ma yin no/ /de bzhin rdo rje 'bring ba las/ /dga' ba bskyed nas gnang ba yis/ /glud pa gar ni bya ba nyid/ /gang zhig rdo rje bsdams la sogs/ /de bzhin lha ni mnyes pa nyid/ /rgyud las gsung ba rdo rje'i
273a7(rgyud 'grel): blu/ ko la e reSh+Thi a d+ho lA sum? ni re kak+ko la/ /g+ha na kri bi Ta ho badzra i/ /ka ru Ne ki a i na ro lA/ /ta hi baM la kha dzThA? i/ g+ha DheM ma a ni pidz+nyA a a i/ /ha le kA leny+dzA ra pa Ni a i/ mdu dur Shidzdza a i/ /tsa u sa ma kats+tsha ri sihwa? / /b+hU ra lA i A i/ /A
273b1(rgyud 'grel): a inTTa r+Na ?Tu li a ta hi b+haM ru kha pi a i/ /pra k+Sha Na khe Ta ka ranTa shud+d+ha a shud+d+ha na ma Ni a i/ /ni rang su a ka tsdza DA wi/ /ta hi dzaM sa wi a NI a i/ ma la a dza kun+tu ru pa TU i Dim+bi ma ta ti ni bidzdza a i/ /grub thob bla mas gsungs pa'i
273b2(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs /stong pa snying rje dbyer med par/ /don stan rdo rje'i glu nyid do/ /gzhan du rtog pas phan tshun du/ /sprel? ba ba rdo rje'i glu ma yin/ /rdo rje rkang pa'i gar? la sogs/ /gzhan du rags phyir 'dir ma spros/ /'dir ni chog ji bzhin du/ /glu gar la sogs
273b3(rgyud 'grel): rim pa ni/ /byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ba nyid/ /de la thun mong byin brlabs rtags/ /de yang brtag gnyis rgyal po las/ /gsungs par mi bzhin shes byas te/ /'khor lo'i dbang phyug mdun du ni/ /gang zhig gus pas glu dang gar/ /byas pas
273b4(rgyud 'grel): dri yi mtshan nyid ni/ /thog mar sgog pa'i dri nyid de/ /de nas yang ni bya rgod dri/ /gsung? ma la ya yi dri/ /byin brlabs glu yi mtshan nyid do/ /dang pa'i dang ni bung ba'i sgra/ /thos pas glu yi khyad par nyid/ /pa lang tshe yi sgra nyid ni/ /phyi rol nye
273b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mtshan nyid/ /khyad par byin gyis brlabs pa'i rtags/ /de yang rdo rje phreng ba las/ /gal te thun mong rnal 'byor ma/ /'dus pa'i tshogs su 'ongs pa na/ /g.yon pa'i ts+tsho mo'i brda yis ni/ /bde ba'i phyag rgya bya ba nyid/ /de la sgrub pa
273b6(rgyud 'grel): po yis ni/ /gtam 'dri rnam rtog byar mi rung/ /cung zad 'dri bar 'dod pa yang/ /gang zhig rdo rje slob dpon nam/ /yang na las kyi rdo rje yis/ /brda dang phyag rgya 'dri bar 'gyur/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyi rnal 'byor ma/ /yang dang
273b7(rgyud 'grel): ? tu 'gro zhing 'od/ /de la the tshom za ba dang/ /ya mtshan 'jigs par byed don sogs/ /sgrub pa po yis mi bya ste/ /byas nas dngos grub nyams pa nyid/ /de nas dkyil 'khor sdud pa na/ /lhag ma'i gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /de yang
274a1(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba las/ /lhag ma'i gtor ma'i sbyor ba yis/ /dngos grub rnal 'byor chen por 'gyur/ /oM k+Shi u ts+tshi Sh+Te k+She tra pA lA ya swAhA/ /sngags 'dis brjod cing kha prus gdab/ /yang ni slob dpon sngon 'gro bas/ /gang zhig
274a2(rgyud 'grel): ma mthong gyur pa na/ /rtags kyi sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid ni/ /rnal 'byor gyis ni shes par bya/ /gang zhig byad zlum kha dog dmar/ /gzhan bzang sman ma ring ba ni/ /'od dpag med kyi rigs shes bya/ /de la rus sbal phyag rgya bstan/ /cung zad spom zhing
274a3(rgyud 'grel): dmigs dkyus ring/ /dkar ser mdog can yid 'phrog ma/ /sna tshogs gos ni 'dzin pa ste/ /ri mo gsum 'greng dpral bar mtshan/ /gang du gnas pa'i sa dag tu/ /grong ba'i shi sogs gtam smra ba/ /'di nyid rin 'byung rnal 'byor ma/ /dpal
274a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan mkha' 'gro zhes byar blta/ /rtse gsum pa yi phyag rgya bstan/ /g.yon brkyang pa yi gar stabs kyis/ /de yi mdun du blta bar bya'o/ /lag tu g.yon pas byin nas ni/ /phyag rgya rab tu ston par byed/ /kha dog gnag cing gos nag 'dzin//
274a5(rgyud 'grel): sgra li dpral ba gzhu yi dbyibs/ /mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog par ston/ /sems 'gro ba yi mar rab grags/ /g.yon bskum dge ba'i gar kyis ni/ /phyag rgya rab tu bstan par bya/ /mi bskyod pa yi rigs su shes/ /g.yon pa'i stangs kyis lan yang
274a6(rgyud 'grel): 'debs/ /lus sgom gsus pa cung zad 'phyang/ /mig yangs rdzi ma thang ba la/ /byin ba sgom zhing mdzes pa ni sa 'og grus pa shes ba ste/ /rnam snang rigs su shes pas na/ /de la dung gi phyag brgya star mig skam pa spu thams cad langs/ /lus skem lag
274a7(rgyud 'grel): ba ring ba la/ /mkha' 'gro zhes sgra rab tu sgrogs/ /'di nyid don grub rigs su shes/ /de la rab blta mdza' ma bskor/ /lag pa g.yon gyi dbye ba yis/ /ba dan phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /ji ltar 'di dag la mkhas pas/ /rab tu 'bad pas shes par bya//
274b1(rgyud 'grel): dri ba 'am phyag rgya byed pa na/ /de yi don gyis mchod par brjod/ /gang zhig 'di rnams thams cad la/ /dpa' bo brkyang ba'i bya ba ni/ /dpa' bo'i ston mo zhes su brjod/ /tshogs kyi dbang phyug de lta min/ /de bzhin dpa' mo brkyang pa la/ /dpa' mo'i dbang phyug
274b2(rgyud 'grel): ston mo nyid/ /de ltar 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la/ /shes rab thabs dang bcas pa nyid/ /gzhan yang gang zhig stobs dang ni/ myos byed khu ba rkyang bas ni/ /'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs/ /stobs dang myos byed khu bar ni/ /mi ldan yon tan
274b3(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams nyams/ /gtso bo tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi/ khyad par shes rab g.yon du bzhag /'dir ni ji ltar 'byor ba dang/ /ji ltar nus pa'i rim pa yis/ /lha yi bdag nyid dkyil 'khor sogs/ /rnam par dag pa'i tshogs mchod/ /thams cad
274b4(rgyud 'grel): rang gi rnal 'byor gyis/ /'dir ni dge bar 'dod pas na/ /rnam dag lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /slob mas tshogs kyi rnal 'byor goms/ /nang gi dbang phyug gyur pa ste/ /rgyan par shin tu goms pas na/ /gang tshe cho ga 'di yis ni/ /rim pa 'di ni rnam
274b5(rgyud 'grel): par sbyang/ /de tshe rtag tu goms pas na/ /spros bcas spros med rnam par bzhag /de nas sgrub pa po yis ni/ /zhal gsal phyag phyis go la dbul/ /yon tan sogs pas mnyas par bya/ /rang gi lha yi 'khor lo nyid/ /dang po thar bar 'gyur
274b6(rgyud 'grel): ba ste/ /de nas bsod nams bsngo bar bya/ /bzod par gsol la tshogs kyi ni/ /'khor lo gshegs par bya ba nyid/ /bdag nyid dbang phyug gyur pas na/ /gzhan la phyag ni bya mi dgos/ /cho ga'i rim pa 'di yis ni/ /ji ltar rigs
274b7(rgyud 'grel): par 'bad gyur na/ /de yi bsod nams mdza' ma ni/ /tshad bzung nus pa ma yin no/ /de ltar phyag na rdo rje yis/ /gsungs pa'i rjes su 'brangs par 'gyur/ /tshogs gyi 'khor lo cho ga yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba/ paN+Di ta ratna rak+Shi tas mdzad pa
275a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta ratna rak+Shi ta pa'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lotsA ba shAkya'i dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa grub pa dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //
275a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ /ga Na tsa kra bid+hi brA ka sa nA ma/ bod skad du/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga rim par phye ba zhes bya ba/ /rje btsun mi 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan bde chen rgyal po yis/ /rdo rje sems phyag 'tshal
275a3(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /dngos grub dgos pa kun bsgrub pa'i/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rim bshad bya/ /de la tshogs kyi 'khor lo brgya rtsa'am 'bum pa sogs pa byed par 'dod pas 'byor pa dang bstun pa'i mi pa ni gsum ste/ /rgyal po lta bu'i dang/ dmangs
275a4(rgyud 'grel): lta bu'i dang/ /rnal 'byor pa'i rim pa lta bus bya ba'o/ /dang po ni 'byor pa dang ldan pas rgyud gang dang rtog bsre mthun pa'i rnal 'byor pho mo lha grangs dang mnyam pa rang gi slob dpon sngon du 'gro ba'i blo can rnams kyis de'i cho ga dang/
275a5(rgyud 'grel): brda dang phyag rgya la sogs pa tha ma snyoms 'jug gi bar du bya ba na gcig ste/ /rim par phye ba dang po'o/ /gnyis pa ni ji ltar tshogs pa'i 'byor pa dang/ /ji ltar rigs pa'i rnal 'byor pho mo rnams rdo rje slob dpon sngon du 'gro bar bya
275a6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ cho ga ni rgyud kyi dbye ba las shes te/ /de lta bu'i bya ba gcig tu 'dod de rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o/ /gsum pa ni 'byor pa dang ldan pas rgyud du ma'i rnal 'byor pa rang gi rig byed la mkhas pa'i tshogs la/ /spro ba dang bsdu ba'i
275a7(rgyud 'grel): rim pas bya ste/ /de ltar rnal 'byor pa'i grangs ji snyed pa de snyed tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dbye ba shes par bya ste/ /'di rim par phye ba gsum pa'o/ /de thams cad la gnas dang rdzas dang/ rnal 'byor pa dang/ cho ga dang/ yon bdag la
275b1(rgyud 'grel): bar chad med par bya'o/ /grangs du ma byas par 'dod pas tshul 'dis ni yongs su shes par bya'o/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga rim par phye ba zhes bya ba/ /A tsArya he ru ka badzra yis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+DI ha ratna rak+Shi ta'i zhal lnga nas lo
275b2(rgyud 'grel): tsA ba grub pa dpal bzang pos sgyur ba'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ kA ya bA ka tsit+ta/ su pra tiSh+Tha nA ma/ bod skad du/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
275b3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku gsung thugs rten bla ma la/ /gus pas phyag 'tshal rten gsum la/ /rgyud dang bla ma'i gsungs brten nas/ /sgrib sbyong rab gnas bri bar bya/ /slob dpon de nyid bcu shas shing
275b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid kun dang yang dag ldan/ /phyag rgya sngags dang cho ga shes/ /las rnams kun la mkhas pa ste/ /dam sdom byang chub sems 'byongs pas/ /bsnyen pa rnam gsum rdzogs byas la/ /de dang 'dra ba'i grogs bcas kyis/ /dus zla gza' skar
275b5(rgyud 'grel): tshes grangs ni/ /nyi ma'i khyim ni bcu gnyis te/ /dgun dpyid ra 'bring ro hi ta'i/ /dus su nyi ma log nas ni/ /byang 'gro zla drug nyin mo 'phel/ /de drug zhi ba rab gnas shis/ /dbyar sten ra 'bring zla drug lhor/ /nag 'phel dra nyi der mi btsam/ /phur blu?
275b6(rgyud 'grel): lag dang pha ba sangs/ /zla ba bzang ldan gza' ste shes/ /nyi spen dmag dpon nor 'joms dang/ /chu smad snar ma gro bzhin dang/ /lag dang snron snubs rgyal chu stong/ /khrums smad skye dgu 'phel ba dang/ /rab tu gnas pa'i mchog tu byed/ /yid
275b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod dngos grub mi bzhi ste/ /snrubs? dang gra bzhin de bzhin te/ /lag gis skal bzangs snang mas rgyal/ /mgo yis nye bar zhi bar byed/ /chu ton gyi ni bu dag gson/ /khrums smad rtag par dngos grub ster/ /rgyal gyis tshe ring bstan par 'gyur//
276a1(rgyud 'grel): snron gyis mchog tu bde bar byed/ /lha mtshams kyis ni mchog steng 'gyur/ /gza' dang skar ma de dag kyang/ /dar rgud mi rigs las dang sbyar/ /tshes gcig gsum lnga drug bdun bcu/ /drug po nor 'dzoms spang
276a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan shis/ /gza' skar tshes grangs mthun 'dzom na/ /mar gyi do la'ang bya bar shis/ /gnam stong bcu bzhi kun tu spang/ /zla ba bza' dang skar ma dang/ /nyi ma sdus 'dzoms skad cig la/ /ji skad gsungs pa bzhin byas na/ /bsam pa thams
276a3(rgyud 'grel): cad yongs rdzogs shing/ /rab tu gnas pa mchog 'gyur te/ /'khor los sgyur rgyal dbang phyug ni/ /thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /slob dpon mtshan ma thob pa na/ /gza' dang rgyu skar rtsi mi dgos/ /bgegs dang leg par 'dren pa'ang med/ /bza' 
276a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams thams cad rjes mthun zhing/ /bgegs dang rgyu skar lha rnams nyid/ /de drug bka' sgrub kun gnas shing/ /gzugs brnyan mchod rten la sogs kyis/ /dos grub dag ni ster bar mdzad/ /yid kyis cung zad gang bsams pa/ /skye dang skye bar
276a5(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par 'gyur/ /yang thog mchod rten la sogs gnas/ /khyim dang lha yi gnas rnams su/ /sangs rgyas la sogs rab gnas bya/ /brdungs lugs 'khur bris sogs rten ni/ /rang rang mtshan nyid ldan pa ste/ /zhi khrol sogs rang tshul mthun//
276a6(rgyud 'grel): tshad kyis tshad la phab cing bzang/ /de 'dra rab tu gnas par 'gyur/ /bzlog pa skyon 'gyur da phyir gza'/ /rab gnas dgos dang mi dgos gnyis dam pa'i don du dpyad pa na/ /gang zhig gang gis gang du rlabs/ /gdod ma nas zhi skye med la/ /ji
276a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ji ltar rab tu gnas/ /chos rnams thams cad 'od gsal du/ /rtogs dang ldan pa'i mchod gnas la/ /rab tu gnas pa mi dgos te/ /yang na stong nyid ma rtogs kyang/ /mchod rten glegs bam sku gzugs sogs/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul
276b1(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs las/ /byung ba min na mi 'byung bar/ /rtogs te shin tu dang ldan na/ /rab tu gnas pa mi dgos so/ /dang po'i las can ma 'byongs la/ /'jig rten tha snyad kun rdzog tu/ /'gro bas de nyid mi shes la/ /ston pas rab tu gnas pa bshad
276b2(rgyud 'grel): dbye ba sgra don skyon yon las/ /bya ba'i thabs dang rnam pa drug/ /don dam spros med rab gnas dang/ /kun rdzob sku gsung thugs gsum ste/ /yon tan 'phrin las zhog la 'byung/ /dam tshig sems dpa' sbyangs skyed la/ /ye shes sems dpa' yun
276b3(rgyud 'grel): ring du/ /gnas pa'i phyir na rab tu gnas gang du sku gzugs rdzogs pa la/ /byin ma brlabs par rang gnas na/ /de la ? ye? shes 'gyur zhing/ /de srid mchod par de mi 'os/ /dper na skyes bu la la zhig /rim pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa na/ /'jig
276b4(rgyud 'grel): rten kun gyi mchod mi byed/ /de bzhin byin ma brlabs sku la/ /gang zhig phyag 'tshal mchod byed pa/ /dam tshig bral zhing sngags dman te/ /sbyin reg thal ba 'bras med mtshungs/ /'jam dpal rtsa ba'i rgyud chen las/ /skye ba tshul khrims 'chal 'di la//
276b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'gro ma tho ri sod min la/ /bde ba mchog tuAng mi 'gyur na/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams ni/ /'grub par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos/ /ta la'i mgo bcad sngo min ltar/ /de bzhin sngags sgrub rmongs pa dang/ /tshul khrims nyams shing
276b6(rgyud 'grel): sdig las byed/ /rtag tu bud med chags pa la/ /'di ni rab tu bstan ma yin/ /mi dge bshes gnyen bsten pas ni/ /sngags kyi rgyal po ga la 'grub/ /yon tan yang ni tsa rgyud las/ /'jig rten sngags rnams ji snyed dang/ /de slob bse ru byang
276b7(rgyud 'grel): chub sems/ /bdag nyid chen pos gsungs pa yin/ /cho ga gzhung dang mthun par ni/ /rab tu gnas pa byas nas kyang/ /ri mo 'di ni mdun gzhag na/ /sngags rnams ma lus 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin mchod dang phyag 'tshal dang//
277a1(rgyud 'grel): mthong dang reg pa cam gyis kyang/ /sdig pa'i rlog pa kun las grol/ /ras ris la sogs mthu chen la/ /don du gnyer dang bskul bas ni/ /myur du skye ba don yod thog /rjes su yi rang de bzhin no/ /rten 'di mthod pa'i
277a2(rgyud 'grel): skye bo yi bsod nams theb pa don yod pa/ /bskal pa bye ba rnams su yang/ /brjod par yang ni mi nus so/ /las ni yon bdag bsod nams spel /sngags pas dge ba rnyed par byed/ /de bzhin slob dpon sngags gnas pas/ /chos ldan
277a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa byed pa gang/ /de yis skye bar mchod par 'gyur/ /bya thabs chog dag pas bya/ /chog dman gnas bkra mi shis /'dir sdug pha rol 'jigs pa che/ /dngos grub 'dod pas cho gar 'bang/ /cho ga'i tshul legs bsod nams ni/ /mthong
277a4(rgyud 'grel): dang mi mthong rnams su skye/ /sku gzugs sngags kyi mtshan nyid kyis /rten la byin brlabs 'jug par 'gyur/ /gang zag blo rigs tha dad pas/ /yon mchod 'byor chog tshogs pa yis/ /rab gnas rgyas pa sbros bcas bya/ /'bring pos cho ga cha tsam
277a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ bsdus pa ting 'dzin thun gcig la/ /rdul tshon la sogs mi dgos bya/ /rgyas pa mtshan ldan bla ma la /slob mas lan gsum gsol btab nas/ /bka' bsgo slob mas rdzas ba sogs te/ /yid 'ongs gnas su bsnyen gsum bskyal/ /
277a6(rgyud 'grel): sa yi chag gzhung bzhin bya/ /lha bum sbyin sregs yi lha/ /sta gon spyi dang mthun par bya/ /'di skrabs? slob ma sta gon ni/ /gang byed gzhung dang mthun gnas yin/ /de yang sngags grogs slob dpon 'dra/ /yon bdag sta gon gnas pa ni/ /
277a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa bkra shis cho ga 'di/ /brtsams nas yongs su rdzogs kyi bar/ /yon mchod la sogs ma rnams kun/ /lus dag yid spyod bzang ltas bya/ /ba'i phyogs kun thag ring spang/ /bzang ngan gang byung mi rabs bdun/ /'byung bas ngan
277b1(rgyud 'grel): na 'bang sogs bzlog /nang par dkyil 'khor rdzas chang bsham/ /shar lhor rab gnas dbang stegs ni/ /dbangs khru rgya ni sten dang sbyar/ /ba yis lngas byugs pad 'khor ser/ /nyi nub dpon slob khrus byas brgyan/ /bgegs bskrad chang lhag
277b2(rgyud 'grel): bskang byas te/ /bum pa'i bsnyen bsgrub gzhung ltar bya/ /de yang bsung pa'i 'khor lo nas/ /mchod bstod bsgom bzlas par du ni/ /mtshan ma byung gi bar du bya/ /de rjes rang 'jug dbang yang blang/ /de rjes snyan gsan gsol ba gdab/ /
277b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir phyin gtor ma rgya chen gtang/ /bgegs la bka' bsgo bden bdar bya/ /nang zhugs nye regs 'thor ba thung byas/ /sngon du yon bdag dbang rgyas bskur/ /de nas rab gnas sta gon te/ /rten gsar rnams ni der drangs la/ /dkyil 'khor
277b4(rgyud 'grel): mkhar gdegs bdag khror bsgyur/ /bgegs la bka' bsgo stang stabs bya/ /khro bo'i bstod bzlas ra dra sogs/ /bsrung 'khor rgyas par bsgom par bya/ /gong nas rten gsar bzhugs pa na/ /na bza' car g.yog zhal phyir bstan/ /dkyil
277b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bris nas ta gon te/ /ma bris rab gnas dbang nus med/ /slob dpon brtan ma thob nus med/ /dkyil 'khor bris chog dgos med 'gyur/ /nges na rgyud dang bla ma ni/ /dam pa'i snyan brgyud gdams ngag dgos /sta gon bgegs ni bskrad
277b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnang/ /dngos gzhi byin brlabs sbar ba'i gnang/ /rjes ni bstan pa dar rgyas gsum/ /sta gon nub mo phyag rgya dgrol/ /dkyil 'khor shar sogs ku sha'i steng/ /seng ge'i nyal stabs chos nyid nyal/ /skya rang shar dus chos nyid las/
277b7(rgyud 'grel): langs te khrus byas brgyan lhar bskyed/ /rten gsar tha mal dri sbyang phyir/ /shing bu gru gsum me spar la/ /kham phor steng du bag zan gyi/ /kod pu gsum la mar me spar/ /'bras kyi chang bu gsum la ni/ /rdo rje gtsug tor gnod sbyin gyis/ /
278a1(rgyud 'grel): sku la phyi bkru lan gsum bya/ /'bras med bag phyes? bya bar los?/ /sngags gnyis zlos shing yongs su kar brag/ /mi gtsab dor bsam sla ngar blugs/ /de rjes chu med de ltar bya /? na g.yon steng ngo chu me ?
278a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ zho ? bsres dang yungs kar la/ /oM sarba pA paM? da ha na badzrA ya swAhA/ /zhes zlas med bsregs bzhi mdor dor/ /bdag chal sug pa nye shing pa/ /shu ti sran phye ba yi lnga/ /til mar gyis na sngags bcas bkru/ /bag chags sbyang
278a3(rgyud 'grel): phyir chu brgyad khrus/ /rdul g.yang me long bstan byas te/ /chab gtsang chur cang sman chab dang/ /sbru cha ba 'o ma 'bru sna lnga/ /rin chen mchod yon khrus byas la/ /shing pa la ras kyis sku phyis la/ /dbang stegs steng du bzhugs gsol la//
278a4(rgyud 'grel): mar dang dra? lnga ga pur dad/ /tsan dan dza ti gur gam dang/ /gla rtsi byugs te stong par sbyang/ /stong pa'i sngags gsum rim bzhin brjod/ /de nas lhar bskyed dngos de 'am/ /dkyil 'khor gang bris yi dam lha/ /gtso 'khor bcas pa
278a5(rgyud 'grel): 'am gtso rkyang ni/ /mngon par byang chub lngas bskyed la/ /rab gnas dbang bskur mnga' gsol gsum/ /rab gnas ye shes sems dpa' yi/ /spyan drangs chos brgyad gnyan gsan dbang/ /spyan drangs bzhugs gsol khus? mchod yon/ /phyag
278a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal sum bsres sku gsung thugs/ /byin gyi brlabs pa'i bar du bya/ /de la mchod pa'i rim pa ni/ /rin chen maN+Dal thun mong lnga/ /rgyan dang gzhal yas gdugs rgyal mtshan/ /ba dan? 'ang? na dang blar dang/ /me tog phreng ba rol mos bskor//
278a7(rgyud 'grel): na bza' nam mkha' mdzod zhal zas/ /gling bzhi'i maN+Dal 'bul bar bya/ /rang rang sngags dang rten 'brel gyis/ /snying po brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /yi ge brgya pa brgya rtsa brgyad/ /bzlas pas brtan par byed
278b1(rgyud 'grel): ba yin/ /da dag spyi yi rab gnas te/ /khyad par sku gsung thugs rnams la/ /rang rang cho ga gzhung bsrang la/ /mchod rten la sogs thugs rten la/ /khyad par chos bzhi byin gyis brlabs/ /rdo ring them skas chu srin gyi/ /rgyal mtshan la sogS
278b2(rgyud 'grel): dbul ba'o/ /byin brlabs sa gzhi chos kyi dbyings/ /seng khrim 'jigs bzhir byin brlabs/ /rmad ni dge bcu khri 'phang ni/ /dang po dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi/ /gnyis pa yang dag spong ba bzhi /gsum pa rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi/ /bzhi pa snang
278b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dbang po lnga/ /bum rten stobs lngar byin gyis brlabs/ /bum pa byang chub yan lag bdun/ /kha bsgyer 'phags lam yan lag brgyad/ /de dag rgyu chos byin brlab ste/ /'bras bu'i chos su 'di ltar bslab/ /srog shing mkhyen bcu ? legs ni//
278b4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes bzhi dang rnam thar bzhi/ /'khor lo bcu gsum sa bcu dang/ /dran pa nyer gzhag gsum du brlab/ /char khebs gzugs? ni ? rje'i skyabs/ /tog? ni chos dbyings ngo bo nyid/ /phyi ni sku gsum nang gzhal yas/ /rdo ring rin chen them
278b5(rgyud 'grel): skad dang/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan dang dbyangs dang/ /rin chen phreng pa nyi zla dbul/ /bya ru thabs dang shes rab ?/ /gdan ? dbul ba rgyas pa yin/ /mchod rten sku bsdus rab gnas bya/ /? gnas legs par bya/ /sku gzugs khyad par chos
278b6(rgyud 'grel): brgyad de/ /spyan? ? bu skra sbrul skya'i bzhar/ /longs sku'i dung gi so mang bshad/ /shangs dbyes sku thog tshems rtsa bru?/ /ljags bzhar snyas skabs bru zhing gsal/ /na bza' sprul pa'i sku la ni/ /smad gsum chu tshags par 'khar sil / /longs
278b7(rgyud 'grel): sku zhi? la dar gi ste/ /khro ba stag lpags dang ston gyi/ /stong g.yogs rgyan ni sbrul ? sogs/ /sbrul sku rgyan med longs zhi la/ /bris 'god 'bul bsam ? chogs dbul/ /dngos su dbul du yod na rab/ /gsung rab zhal bsro'i khyab
279a1(rgyud 'grel): par dgu/ /don gsung skye 'gag med par brlab/ /tshig gsung yig 'gru gsung rab ni/ /yan lag tshad med bzhi bcur brlab/ /khri dbul glegs thag dbul/ /na bza' zhal khab rgya rim bdun/ /pha rol phyin
279a2(rgyud 'grel): ba yum chen mo/ /mdo sde 'dul ba byang chub che/ /rgyud sde rdo rje chos sogs te/ /chog yid dam la sogs pa/ /ngo shes bye brag mi shes sbyi/ /yang na bden gnyis yi ger bsam/ /dri lta yis ni de nas byug /sa bon lnga'i gtor bya'i? don//
279a3(rgyud 'grel): skye med rtogs pa gsal ba yis/ /chos sku la ni chos sku thim/ /gnyis su med bsam me tog dbul/ /thugs kyis mchod pa dri yis byug /de nas sbyir ni dbang bcu gcig /bum pa dbu rgyan tsed pan dang/ /phyag rgya ming dbang las bzhi'i
279a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang/ /chos kyis rgyal po gsang ba'i dbang/ /thabs shes gdugs dang phreng dbang bskur/ /rjes la mnga' gsol rten kun la/ /rdzas brgyad sna bdun dbul ba dang/ /bkra shis byin cher gsol ba ni/ /'brang rgyas la sogs bkra shis

279a6(rgyud 'grel): oM hUM a badzri khaM/ sku yis su ma 'gyur khril ni/ /mdun du ma nub mi yor bzhugs/ /de ltar ma byas skyon med 'byung/ /de nas slob dpon yon bdag gnyis/ /me tog gtor te gdan khri nas/ /gzung la gzhugs pa ? lan gsum gsol//
279a7(rgyud 'grel): de nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad sogs/ /bstod pa rgyas bsdus skabs dang sbyar/ /de yi yon tan la dad pas/ /me tog smos dang de bzhin dri/ /mar me lha bshos na bza' sogs/ /sngags ldan rgyas bsdus skabs dang sbyar/ /de nas yon
279b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag 'dun bzhag la/ /me tog dri yis mnga' gsol ba/ /rten 'brel snying po zlos bzhin du/ /lha la 'bul bzhin byas la/ /gzeng bstod mchod pa'i rjes gnang sbyin/ /gsang ba'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das/ /phyag na rdo rje 'khor bcas la/

279b3(rgyud 'grel): bas 'di nyid du/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i mchod pa rnams/ /bdag la mthun pa'i nus pa med/ /de phyir khyed ni bzod par gsol/ /de dag gang dag brtul zhugs can/ /dge slong dge bsnyen dge bsnyen ma/ /mchog tu gus pas mchod

279b5(rgyud 'grel): sku ni 'di yin gyis/ /khyod kyis ma nyams srung mchod kyis/ /sngags kyi bza' bca' yon bdag la/ /skabs 'dir sbyin te 'di skad brjod/ /sngags kyis gtsang sbra'i bza' bca' dag /gzugs brnyan bdag po khyod la sbyin/ /
279b6(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs lhag ma 'di dag ni/ /zos na sdig pa byang bar 'gyur/ /gal te lhag nyid dge 'dod na/ /bla ma gus pas dge bya zhing/ /de ltar rnam pa thams cad du/ /bla ma yang dag mnyes byas te/ //yon gyi dam pa dbul
279b7(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ /rta dang glang po shing rta nor/ /longs spyod yo byad dbul 'di brjod/ /bla ma yongs su mnyes pa yis/ /las dang dngos grub thams cad 'thob/ /de bas dngos po thams cad kyis bla ma mnyes par byed par shog /de nas
280a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan mo gtang rag ste/ /mnyen dang rigs rgyud 'khor rnams kyis /bzang ba'i glu gar rol mo ste/ /dung la sogs pa'i rol mo dbul/ /lho phyogs rgyas pa'i thab byas la /'o ma can gyi bud shing brtsig/
280a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bru dang mngar gsum mar 'o mas/ dang po mjug tu me lta mchod/ /bar du dkyil 'khor rab gnas lha/ /stong dam lnga brgya sogs sngags 'dis/ /oM badzra A u She puShtsir? ku ru swAhA/ sdig zhi tshe dpal rgyas par 'phel/ /gtad ngag lhag
280a3(rgyud 'grel): chad bskang pa yi/ /mchod bstod gzod gsel skabs sbyang bya/ /rten gsang ye shes mi gshegs te/ /tsA ru'i ston mo rgyas par bya/ /dkyil 'khor lha gshegs dam tshig sdu/ /rdul tshon a kAr sngags bsdus te/ /chu sogs dor la ba'i
280a4(rgyud 'grel): lngas byug /de nas 'gro rnams dang bya'i phyir/ /shing rta khri sogs mtho bar bteg /mchod pha rol mo dang bcas pas/ /grong khyer rnams su bskor bar bya/ /spros mi dga' la bsdus pa ni/ /bsnyen pas cho ga sta gon dang/ /dkyil 'khor
280a5(rgyud 'grel): bri? sgrub rten gsar la/ /bgegs bskrad yi ge brgyas brtan par/ /gong bzhin spyan dbye la sogs pa/ /nub gcig la ni kun rdzogs bya/ /mnga' gsol rgyas par ma grub kyang/ /'di la nyes par mi 'gyur ro/ /shin tu bsdus pa'i

280a7(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs/ /byin gyis brlab dang dbang bskur ba/ /snying ga'i sa bon 'od kyis ni/ /'og min rigs lnga'i thugs ka nas/ /bkra shis lha mo 'bum rol bcas/ /dbang bskur rigs bdag rgyas btab bsam/ /rten 'brel snying po
280b1(rgyud 'grel): brgya rtsa res/ /di dab me tog gtor byugs te/ /rang rang lha la chos skur? thim/ /bsams la rdo rje mchod bstod bya/ /rjes sogs spyi dang mthun par bya/ /lha khang rab gnas 'dir ma bshad/ /da ni phyag mtshan byin dbab? ste/ /swa b+hA'i sngags kyi stong dang las/ /dkar rigS
280b2(rgyud 'grel): lha khang mchod rten gnas/ /khang khyim bruM las 'khor rnam snang/ /gsung riD dmar dang po ti cod/ /gaN+Di cha lang dril bu sogs/ /dzri las pad+ma snang mdza' yas/ /nag sngo rdo phur 'phreng thugs/ /hUM rdo rje las mo bskyod skyed/ /ser po bar mdzod yon tan rigs/ /aM las rin
280b3(rgyud 'grel): chen rin 'byung bskyed/ /las rigs ljang gu rgya gram gri/ //bi las ral gris don yod grug/ chos skyod rnams la rang rang gis/ /'jig rten 'bag la rig gsum gyis/ /rigs kyi 'bag la rang rang ltas/ /dom? shes kun de 'drer 'am/ /rigs bstun gong gis
280b4(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya/ /srogs chags gtso bo'i sprul skus bya/ /bsrung 'khor kun dga' ? bkad sa/ /gzhal yas khang dam a mo li/ /chu mig khron sogs mI ma kI/ /bzang shing ra dang ldum ra sogs/ /shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang mas/ /phyugs lhas pa r+Na sha
280b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ri/ 'bru dang bad mdzod 'dzam+b+ha la/ /yon bdag dkyil 'khor mthong ba lta/ /ma mthong na ni sprul skus bya/ /bla ma'i sku 'bag thugs dam ste /mi shes rang gi yi dam las/ /sngags la ma zhag sprul pa'i sku/ /kun la dgug gzhug gong bzhin bya /phrin las rgyas
280b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i cho ga ste/ /rab gnas rim gsum 'khor bcas 'di/ /bdag gis rang bzor ma bya ste? /gtso tshor klu sgrub lugs gtsor bzhag /rdo rje 'chang nas gnyis brgyud pa'i/ /lung dang dra ba'i na ro dang/ /byang chub sems las thob pa yi/ /sgeg pa rdo ska ldan mchog
280b7(rgyud 'grel): de gsum snyan nas snyan brgyud pa'o/ /man ngag bla ma mnyes pas thob/ /rgyud dang bstan bcos legs brten nas/ /rang nyid dran pa gso ba dang/ /gzhan yang bdag 'dra gti mug la/ /phan phyir gzhan gyis bskul nas bri/ /ma rtogs nongs pa gzod par gsel
281a1(rgyud 'grel): brtsams pa'i dge ba bcu zad des/ /se naM bde chen sku thob shog /sku dang gsung dang thugs rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba/ dpal mar me mdzad ye shes gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI baM ka ra dang/ lo tsA brgya brtson ser gis bri ka
281a2(rgyud 'grel): ma la shI lar bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /rgya gar skad du /kA ma shAsta nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'dod pa'i bstan bcos zhes bya ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsal dang yan lag bde stangs dang/ /rigs dang rjes dang sngags rnams ?//
281a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags pas shes na 'jig rten 'dir/ /bde ba'i mchog ni bsgrub par bya /bde ba'i khyad par bskyed pa'i phyir/ /drang srong swar ya nas gsungs/ /'dod pa'i bstan bcos 'bum snga las/ /klu sgrub kyis ni stong phrag gcig/ bsdus te de las bdag gis kyang/ /bde ba
281a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub phyir 'di gsung ngo/ /'bad pas rol byed ma rnams kyi/ /mkhas pas bde ba bskyed par bya/ /yang na shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /rol byed ma yi rigs shes 'gyur/ /'dod pa sten pa'i dus su ni/ /bung med rnams ni mgu bar 'gyur/ /bud med rigs ni rnam bzhi ste/ /skyes pa rnamS
281a5(rgyud 'grel): kyang de bzhin no/ /pad+ma can dang dud can ma/ /glang chen ma dang sna tshogs ma/ /ri pong dang mi byu mchog dang/ /rta dang de bzhin rgo ba dang/ /pad+ma'i gdong can skal bzangs ma/ /'dod pa'i gzugs can gud med mchog/ /khams gsum kun tu grags pa yi/ /pad+ma can gyi mtshan nyid do/ par?
281a6(rgyud 'grel): gdong pa ring zhing gzugs bzang ma/ /sku ldan kun gyi yid du 'od/ /dang pa'i 'gros can blo bzang? ma/ /'di ni dung can ma zhes bya 'tsho zhing cung zad mche ba can/ /yan lag ma nyams mdzes ldan mchog /mdog ldan skal bzang gsang ba thug /da ni glang chen ma ru grags/ /sgyud ?
281a7(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs can yan lag gnag/ sna tshogs gzugs can snyan par smra/ /byams ldan sems ni ma bkrugs mchog/ de ni sna tshogs ma zhes bya/ /pags pa stong zhing 'jam pa dang/ /gser gyi me tog dang mtshungs rtags/ /yan lag bkla zhing kha dog gnag gang gi
281b1(rgyud 'grel): rtags ni de ri bor/ /gdong pa ring zhing skad bzang mchog /rol byed ma rnams mgu bar byed/ /pags pa dmar ldan rtsed mo mdzes/ /de yis rtags ldan khyu mchog yin/ /shin tu ring zhing sbom po ni/ /dpag med ston ster pa'o/ /mgrin sngon dang ni mtshungs pa ste/ /'bras can ltar
281b2(rgyud 'grel): ni bshad pa yin/ /thung zhing sbom pa glang nya yin/ /brtan zhing rol byed ma yid 'ong/ /rtagS kyi tha snyad de yis ni/ /ri dags rgo ba zhes su brjod/ /'dod pa'i bstan bcos mdza' dag las/ rtags kyi mtshan nyid 'de bzhi bstan/ /lhan cig skyes pa bad kan can/ /ring brlung can mkhris pa can/ /rked bzlu ?
281b3(rgyud 'grel): zhing bzang mo ste/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang mtshungs mig/ yongs su rdzogs shing 'dod pa rdzogs/ /skye gnas mdzes pa lhan cig skyes/ /bud med mdog dkar pad+ma can/ /yid 'byung las 'byung ring bar bshad/ /tsho zhing gsang la rgyas pa ni/ /grang ba'i reg ldan bad kan can/ /mgo yin rgyas bzang mo ste
281b4(rgyud 'grel): kha'i 'gram gnyis shin tu dog /skra li mgo bo lhag par che/ gang gi mtshan ma de rlung can/ /spal pa'i rgyab 'dra mgrin pa sra/ /dro ba'i rig pa yang dag ldan/ /mdog ser zla mtshan myur ba ni/ /mtshan ma de yod mkhris pa can/ /dus kyi sor ni ri bong ste/ /de bzhin rgu ba khyu mchog bcad/ /rta ni la ye?
281b5(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i tshad/ /bzang po'i tshad kyi rgo ba'o/ /rigs pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi shes par bya/ /bud med dag gi rigs dag dang/ /mtshan pas the tshom med par shes/ /pad+ma can ni nor sbyin mo/ /dang ma dri za mo ru bshad/ /glang chen sha za ma yin te/ /tshogs ma ni srin mong bshad/ /ri bong
281b6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma can gyi bdag khyu mchog dung ma de? bzhin te/ /rta ni glang chen ma'i bdag /sna tshogs ma ni rgo ba'o/ /nor sbyin mo ni nor gyis mgu/ /dri zhim spos sogs dri za mo/ /bza' dang bcas pas sha za mgu/ /dpa' ba gnyis kyi srin mo mgu/ /rigs ma mthun pa mthun bya'i phyir/ /rdzas kyi sbyor ba bshad
281b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /lan brgyab krus pa'i mar gyis ni/ /rtags ni 'bad pas bsku bar bya/ /me la cung zad bsros gyur na/ /'dod pa'i dus su sbom par 'gyur /rtsa ba bcu pa'i bcud kyis len/ /bzhos thog 'o ma bsres te btung/ /'dod pa'i nus pa med pa rnams/ /bzlog dka' i 'dod pa skye bar 'gyur/ /sbal pi/
282a1(rgyud 'grel): yan lag lnga blangs nas/ /chu skyes dmar po'i ze 'bru bsres/ /phye ma b+ha ga'i nang du ni/ /zhag gsum bcug pas chung bar 'gyur/ /gang du zla ba gnas par ni/ /der ni 'dod pa rtag tu gnas/ /gcig tu gyur pas mnyam pa'i bde/ /long spyod grol bar mkhas pas bskyed
282a2(rgyud 'grel): yul dang rigs kyi bye brag ni/ /shes nas las kyi tshogs rnam sbyar/ /so dang sen mo gnas rnams ni/ /tshes kyi sbyor bas shes par bya/ /tshes gcig la ni spyi bo ste/ /gnyis pa la ni rna par bshad/ /gsum pa la ni sna ru ste/ /de bzhin bzhi pa gdong yin te/ /lnga pa la ni mgrin par gnas
282a3(rgyud 'grel): drag pa la ni dpung par/ /bdun pa la ni snying gar gnas/ /brgyad pa de bzhin lte bar bstan/ /dgu pa lte bar blta bar bya/ /bcu pa ka rags 'khor par gnas/ /btsug pa ni gsang bar brtag/ bcu gnyis pa ni brla dag gnas/ /bcu gsum pa ni bus mo ste/ /bcu bzhi pa ni byin pa gnyis /phan
282a4(rgyud 'grel): steng pa ni rkang po? la du'o/ /yang de'i zla ba gnas la ni/ /rim bzhin bu ni zlog par bya/ /'phel dang 'grib pa'i tshul du ma/ /mkhas pas shes nas spel bar bya/ /smin drug dang ni smal? po mgo/ /khra dang ? chung de bzhin te/ /bre dang yul dag chos la ni/ /mkhas pas rtag bu spang par bya/ /dus min pa ni mi
282a5(rgyud 'grel): brtsam ste/ /rol byed ma dang phrad mi bya/ /gal te chags pas 'jug gyur na/ /the tshom med par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /mnye pa'i bde ba dus su ni/ /rol mo sna tshogs bstan par bya/ /bud med mchog rnams mig pa'i phyir/ /dang po'i zhun pa'i sten par bya/ /so dang sems gdang pa ni/ /bde pa'i dus su bsten par
282a6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ par? bas myol ba'i dus su ni/ /sen mo la sogs khyad par gdab/ /nyi ma zla ba 'pho dus dang/ /zla ba zhag gi mtshams de bzhin/ /'chings? 'dod pa spyad mi bya/ /bud med zla mtshan dus su ni/ /sa bon lon pas spang bar sngags/ /skal ldan ma yi b+ha ga las/ /mkhas pas me tog blang byas nas/
282a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhos thog 'o mar bsres byas nas/ /bud med mo gsham rnams la ni/ /byin pas bu bzang skye bar 'gyur/ /gzhan gyis mi thub dkar po'i rtsa/ skur pa dkar pos dkri bar bya/ /bud med rked par bcing byas na/ /bde bar bu ni btsa' bar 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i bstan chos rgyas pa las/ /bcing ?
282b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi po bshad par bya/ pad+ma'i bcing thabs gnyis log dang/ /kha rlab bsdams dang ni reg pa'o/ /b+ha ga la ni'o byas nas/ /skye gnas lag pas brtse bar bya/ /'bad pas lingka bcug byas nas/ /dal pas rgyab pa brtsam par bya/ /rkang pa byin pas gnas byas nas/ /mgul nas rtag tu 'khyung
282b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /sen mo yan lag 'bri byas nas/ /myur ba'i brgyab pa brtsam par bya/ /'di ni pad+ma'i bcing thabs te/ /pad+ma can dang lhan cig rtsam/ /'di ni yul can dgyes pas/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i yon tan ster/ /rkang pa gnyi gi mnan byas nas/ /rkang pa gcig khyad par du/ /'bad pas rtag tu chad byas
282b3(rgyud 'grel): na/ 'jam pa'i brgyab par du ma par bya/ /byin pa gis ni phye bas na/ /rang gi byin pa'i nang du 'jug /de nas phrag par dgal bar bya/ /slar yang mgul nas bzung bar bya/ /rtags ni 'bad? pas ? byas nas/ /yang dang yang du brgyab par bya/ /rang gi yon tan 'byung 'gyur na/ /'o mas lan gsuM
282b4(rgyud 'grel): ? byas nas/ /de bzhin b+ha ga bkru ba byas/ /dung can ma yi nu ma bzung/ /snga ma'i 'dug stangs slob bcings nas/ /bsrub bcing sngags 'di brjod par bya/ /oM ca la tsa la swAhA/ /stong bzlas pas ni dngos grub ste/ /lton slabs rnams skye bar 'gyur/ /da ni gnyid log 'dug stangs te/ /dud can ma
282b5(rgyud 'grel): dang lhan cig bshag/ brlag nyis kyi ni brla bsdams te/ /nu ma lag pas bzung bar bya/ /byin khung dri mos phye byas nas/ /'bad pas rtags ni 'jug par bya/ /de ni glong po dag gi na/ /rol byed ma yi byin pa phye/ /ma mchu tsum pe byas nas su/ /de'i 'og tu brgyab par bya/ /'di ni bsdams pa'i? 'dug stangs
282b6(rgyud 'grel): ? glang ? ma la sbyang byas nas/ /lton? rgyun rnams ster bar 'gyur/ /yan lag bar chun 'khyad byas nas/ /rol byed ma yin ? drog 'jig /rang gi brla stengs bzhag byas nas/ /rtags ni 'bad pas 'jug par bya/ sa la bsdad par byas nas ni/ /de 'og mgrin pa g.yas pas 'byung/ lag pa
282b7(rgyud 'grel): ? yon ? ngo bos bzung/ /yang dang yang du brgyas par bya/ /sna tshogs ma dang lhan cig ?/ deg pa'i dug stangs tsog bur bshad/ /sna tshogs ma ni tshum pa nas/ /mgrin par 'khyud pas ston ster/ /de dang chang ni btung bar bya/ /bcud kyis len kyang khyad par du/ /? yang du ngal so zhing/ /so rtsi ? kyang
283a1(rgyud 'grel): bza' bar bya/ /tshig ni snyan par smra bar bya/ /'bad pas rigs kyi sgra ni brjod/ /dus shes pa yi mkhas pas ni/ /sna tshogs gos ni bgo par bya/ /pad+ma'i dri can pad+ma'i/ /dung ma mar gyi dri
283a2(rgyud 'grel): yis brtag/ glang chen ma ni rtul dris so/ /'o ma'i dri yis sna tshogs brtag /nu ma btsir par bya ba dang/ /mkhas pas mang du btsum pa na/ /mgrin par la byur? cing ma mchu myang/ /de ltar las rnams byas nas ni//
283a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas glu dang gar rnams kyis/ /rol byed ma rnams mgu bar bya/ /'dod chags khyad par sbyar ba yis/ /'khor pa'i sdug bsngal skye mi 'gyur/ /'dod ldan gang zag rnams kyis ni/ /sar sna zhe sdang spang
283a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /dul zhing ngo tsha shes pa dang/ /rol byed ma yi rtse ezla rnams/ /'bad de kun tu gsang bar bya/ /'jam pas 'dul te drag pos min/ /slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i/ /'dod pa'i bstan
283a5(rgyud 'grel): 'chos rgyas pa las/ /bsdus te gzugs bzang bdag gis ni/ /'gro la phan phyir snying por bsdus/ /'dod pa'i bstan bcos mdor bsdus pa/ /slob dpon gzugs bzang gis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
